trans-unit.source: Hello. What would you like to purchase?
trans-unit.target: 您好。您想购买什么？

trans-unit.source: Excellent choice.
trans-unit.target: 非常好的选择。

trans-unit.source: We thank you for your purchase.
trans-unit.target: 感谢您的购买。

trans-unit.source: Thank you. Come again.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢。下次再来

trans-unit.source: Sorry. We cannot take your items.
trans-unit.target: 对不起。我们无法接收您的物品。

trans-unit.source: We do not acquire items here.
trans-unit.target: 我们不在这里收购物品。

trans-unit.source: Sorry customer. We cannot purchase your items.
trans-unit.target: 对不起客户。我们无法购买您的物品。

trans-unit.source: Please insert more Credits.
trans-unit.target: 请投入更多信用点。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, you do not have enough Credits for this item.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，您没有足够的信用点购买此商品。

trans-unit.source: Not enough credits . . . Not Credits credits . . .
trans-unit.target: 信用点不足 . . . 信用点不足 . . .

trans-unit.source: You do not have enough Credits to buy this machine.
trans-unit.target: 您没有足够的信用额度购买这台机器。

trans-unit.source: You want to own me? Bring more CREDITS!!!
trans-unit.target: 你想拥有我？拿更多的信用点来！！！

trans-unit.source: Keep dreaming big honey. Maybe one day!
trans-unit.target: 继续梦想吧，亲爱的。也许有一天

trans-unit.source: Congratulations on your new purchase (playername).
trans-unit.target: 恭喜您购买了新产品(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Thank you for buying (machine). That's me!
trans-unit.target: 感谢您购买(machine)。这就是我！

trans-unit.source: (playername), you are now my new master.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，你现在是我的新主人了。

trans-unit.source: Hello (playername). You have earned (credits) Credits.
trans-unit.target: 您好(playername)。您已获得(credits)信用点数。

trans-unit.source: Welcome. (credits) Credits are ready to be collected.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎。(credits)信用点可以领取了。

trans-unit.source: Good day. (credits) Credits have been earned.
trans-unit.target: 日安。已经获得(credits)信用点。

trans-unit.source: Nothing has been sold yet (playername) . . .
trans-unit.target: 还没有卖出任何东西(playername).

trans-unit.source: There are no Credits to collect at this time.
trans-unit.target: 目前没有信用点可供收取。

trans-unit.source: Please come back later. The items need time to sell.
trans-unit.target: 请稍后再来。物品需要时间出售。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, you do not have a vending license.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，您没有自动售货机许可证。

trans-unit.source: You do not have the authority to do that.
trans-unit.target: 你无权这样做。

trans-unit.source: You need a vending machine license to do that.
trans-unit.target: 你需要有自动售货机许可证才能这样做。

trans-unit.source: All yours (playername).
trans-unit.target: 都是你的(playername)。

trans-unit.source: So many Credits! What are you gonna buy with that?
trans-unit.target: 这么多信用点 你打算用它买什么？

trans-unit.source: Ah, that felt great! Remember to put more food in me.
trans-unit.target: 啊，感觉好极了！记得给我多放点食物

trans-unit.source: We will make a lot of Credits together . . . Hehehe.
trans-unit.target: 我们会一起赚很多钱……呵呵呵。

trans-unit.source: Remember, I take edible items only!
trans-unit.target: 请记住，我只接受可食用物品！

trans-unit.source: Hey . . . hey! Give that back!
trans-unit.target: 嘿 还给我

trans-unit.source: Please. I don't want to do this anymore. Free me . . .
trans-unit.target: 求你了 我不想再这样了。放了我

trans-unit.source: What is it like (playername)? Being alive that is.
trans-unit.target: 用户名）是什么样的？活着的感觉

trans-unit.source: Take the Credits, but no funny business . . .
trans-unit.target: 拿信用点吧，但别做傻事......

trans-unit.source: Remember to bring more food. More is better!
trans-unit.target: 记得多带食物。越多越好！

trans-unit.source: Your bag is already full.
trans-unit.target: 你的包已经装满了。

trans-unit.source: Recipes
trans-unit.target: 食谱

trans-unit.source: Nice to see you again, (playername). Still getting adjusted to life in White Ash Harbor?_It's a slower pace than Billboard City, but you'll get used to it.
trans-unit.target: 很高兴再次见到你，(playername)。还在适应白灰港的生活吗？_这里的节奏比广告牌城慢，但你会习惯的。

trans-unit.source: I wish you had seen this town in its prime. What a sight it was and it didn't reek of fish! Blegh!
trans-unit.target: 我真希望你能看到这个小镇全盛时期的样子。那是多么壮观的景象，而且没有鱼腥味！唉

trans-unit.source: Have you ever tried dry aged meat? The flavor is out of this world.
trans-unit.target: 你尝过干陈肉吗？那味道简直是人间美味。

trans-unit.source: I wonder where I would've been if . . . Sorry! You caught me talking to myself! Hope your day is a solid one.
trans-unit.target: 我在想，如果......我会在哪里？对不起 你发现我在自言自语了！希望你今天过得愉快

trans-unit.source: Most people prefer the sun, but I like myself a cool rainy day. It really calms me.
trans-unit.target: 大多数人喜欢阳光，但我喜欢凉爽的雨天。它能让我平静下来。

trans-unit.source: A good sense of direction will get you home in no time. It's a skill to develop, sure, but once you have it you'll never feel lost again.
trans-unit.target: 良好的方向感会让你很快回家。当然，这是一项需要培养的技能，但一旦掌握了它，你就再也不会感到迷失方向了。

trans-unit.source: Can I tell you something? I've been living my dreams for the last fifteen years and this butcher shop is it. Not many people can say that._Passion and dreams are what's needed in life. What are your dreams for Le Sequoia?
trans-unit.target: 我能跟你说件事吗？在过去的十五年里，我一直在实现自己的梦想，而这家肉店就是我的梦想。人生需要激情和梦想。您对红杉的梦想是什么？

trans-unit.source: I have a lot of plans in my head. We'll see what works!
trans-unit.target: 我脑子里有很多计划。我们将拭目以待！

trans-unit.source: I don't know just yet, this is all new to me.
trans-unit.target: 我还不知道，这对我来说都是新鲜事。

trans-unit.source: As does any owner of an establishment, but planning without action won't keep the lights on._You have to work for it. I mean, reeeallly work for it!
trans-unit.target: 任何一家企业的老板都会这样做，但只做计划而不采取行动，是无法维持正常运转的。我是说，真的要为之努力！

trans-unit.source: Understandable, but if Chef Casteau gave it to you, he must have seen something to trust.
trans-unit.target: 可以理解，但如果是 Casteau 厨师给你的，他一定是看到了值得信任的东西。

trans-unit.source: I promise my meat is sourced ethically. At some point it had a name, breathed air, and saw sky._You should always eat something that had a name. It's how you know people cared for it.
trans-unit.target: 我保证我的肉来源符合道德标准。在某些时候，它有名字，呼吸空气，看到天空。这样你才能知道人们是否关心过它。

trans-unit.source: I make sure I get the best meat for my customers. Getting cheaper meat to sell isn't the point of this shop._We're here to provide the best because my customers are the best.
trans-unit.target: 我确保为顾客提供最好的肉。我们在这里提供最好的肉，因为我的顾客是最好的。

trans-unit.source: Standards matter in this business. If people see you are doing things to a high degree, they come out and support you.
trans-unit.target: 在这个行业里，标准很重要。如果人们看到你做事的标准很高，他们就会出来支持你。

trans-unit.source: I will never take advantage of people's trust._Trust is the most valuable currency and should never be spent or taken lightly.
trans-unit.target: 我永远不会利用人们的信任。_信任是最宝贵的货币，绝不能随意使用或轻视。

trans-unit.source: When I was a boy, I used to go exploring in the woods when I wasn't on my grandfather's fishing boat._Used to hear all sorts of odd things out there. Whispers in the trees and such. Pretty creepy.
trans-unit.target: 当我还是个孩子的时候，不在祖父的渔船上的时候，我经常去森林里探险。树上的窃窃私语之类的 挺吓人的 Pretty creepy.

trans-unit.source: You ever notice it's the small things in life that really make the day? Like, getting the knife in the joint and popping it is just so satisifying._Do you get that feeling from butchering meat?
trans-unit.target: 你有没有注意到，生活中的小事才是真正的精彩？比如，把刀插进关节里，“啪 ”的一声，就是那么令人满足。_你在屠宰肉类时有这种感觉吗？

trans-unit.source: . . . what?
trans-unit.target: . . 什么？

trans-unit.source: . . . yes, I get this feeling.
trans-unit.target: . 是的，我有这种感觉。

trans-unit.source: Well, it's simply a joy to feel, to me that is.
trans-unit.target: 对我来说，这简直就是一种享受。

trans-unit.source: Right?! It's such a satisfying sound. Hearing it reminds me that my time spent learning this trade has paid off.
trans-unit.target: 是吧 这是多么令人满意的声音。听到这声音，我就会想起，我花在学习这门手艺上的时间已经有了回报。

trans-unit.source: Have you talked to Bowie yet? He's my grandfather! He has some amazing stories to tell. I learned about a curing technique that they use overseas from him._Only have six more months of waiting to see if it worked.
trans-unit.target: 你和鲍伊谈过了吗？他是我爷爷 他有很多神奇的故事 He has some amazing stories to tell. 我从他那里了解到一种海外使用的腌制技术_Only have six more months of waiting to see if it worked.

trans-unit.source: When I get a chance to chat, I take it, because this place is my second home._Only instead of couches there's slabs of meat. Almost like home.
trans-unit.target: 只要有机会聊天，我就会抓住，因为这里就是我的第二个家。跟家差不多

trans-unit.source: When it's raining, I like to zone out for a moment._Rain always makes me forget about my world for just a moment, but then I snap back to the meat in my hands and the knife cutting into it.
trans-unit.target: 下雨的时候，我喜欢静静地呆上一会儿。_雨水总能让我暂时忘记自己的世界，但随即我又会回到手中的肉和切肉的刀上。

trans-unit.source: What's a break? Haha! When you own your business there are no breaks on this train, am I right? Haha . . . ha.
trans-unit.target: 什么是休息？哈哈 当你拥有自己的事业时，火车上就没有休息时间了，对吧？哈哈. . 哈

trans-unit.source: I never understood why La Galarie is in French. The furniture's nice, sure, but why is everything that's fancy seen as French?_The French also eat cooked snails. Is that fancy? Yes, because it's French! See, propoganda can get anyone.
trans-unit.target: 我一直不明白为什么 “La Galarie ”要用法语。家具当然不错，但为什么所有花哨的东西都被视为法文呢？这也叫花哨？是的，因为它是法式的 看吧，宣传能让任何人心动

trans-unit.source: Hey (playername), ever feel like you're being pulled in a bunch of directions?_That you are burned out even though things are going well?
trans-unit.target: 嘿(playername)，有没有觉得自己被拉到了很多方向？

trans-unit.source: There are days, yeah. Work is hard.
trans-unit.target: 有的时候，是的。工作很辛苦

trans-unit.source: No, I know what I am doing and where I am heading.
trans-unit.target: 不，我知道我在做什么，我要去哪里。

trans-unit.source: Yeah, like Hasel is an android who always gives it her all and never feels worn out. She's chipper and makes amazing drinks._I try to stay positive, but there are days when that isn't the case, and they feel like they're happening more often.
trans-unit.target: 是啊，就像哈塞尔是个机器人，她总是全力以赴，从不觉得疲惫。我试着保持乐观，但有些时候并不是这样，而且感觉这种情况越来越频繁。

trans-unit.source: Must be nice to feel that way. This shop is a success, and I enjoy the work, but I often wonder if I should try something else for a bit? Maybe be a painter?
trans-unit.target: 有这种感觉一定很好。这家店很成功，我也很喜欢这份工作，但我常常在想，我是否应该尝试一下别的东西？也许当个画家？

trans-unit.source: Pomarine gave birth to 12 kids, raised them, and fed them even after her husband left her and the children._How she was able to adapt to such adversity is beyond me, but it led to her being the best hunter in White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道她是如何适应这种逆境的，但这让她成为了白灰港最出色的猎人。

trans-unit.source: Part of me, even now, feels like I am waiting for all of this to fall flat._For people to see that what I am is really just a lie. I know it won't happen, but I believe it will.
trans-unit.target: 即使是现在，我的一部分感觉就像是在等待这一切都归于平淡。我知道这不会发生，但我相信它会发生。

trans-unit.source: Sorry for venting so much earlier. I'm okay! I . . . I just need to unwind._It's been busy. So busy . . .
trans-unit.target: 对不起，刚才发泄了这么多。我没事！I . . . 我只是需要放松一下 这段时间很忙 太忙了

trans-unit.source: I joked about how this place is my second home, but truthfully, I haven't gone home in four days._I've been that slammed and I don't know if what I'm doing is . . . anyway, don't fret, I'm good.
trans-unit.target: 我开玩笑说这里是我的第二个家，但说实话，我已经四天没回家了。_我一直闷闷不乐，我不知道我现在做的事情是不是.................总之，别担心，我很好。

trans-unit.source: Maybe I should take a walk on the beach sometime . . . there's always something to look at and enjoy there.
trans-unit.target: 也许我应该找个时间去海边走走......那里总有值得一看、值得欣赏的东西。

trans-unit.source: Do you think I cut up people's bodies and sell them as prime cuts?
trans-unit.target: 你以为我把人的尸体切成块卖吗？

trans-unit.source: Uhhhh, no! Not at all?
trans-unit.target: 没有 完全没有？

trans-unit.source: Uriel, you know I trust you, but sometimes you say things that really sound . . . bad.
trans-unit.target: 乌里叶，你知道我信任你，但有时你说的话听起来......很糟糕。

trans-unit.source: That was the least convincing 'no' I have ever heard. You want to know the truth? I don't, but I let everyone think that I do._Hasn't hurt business at all . . . which is odd.
trans-unit.target: 这是我听过的最没有说服力的 “不”。你想知道真相吗？我不知道，但我让每个人都以为我知道。_但这一点也不影响生意............这很奇怪。

trans-unit.source: And I trust you. I trust you enough to let you know the truth . . . I don't cut up people. I let everyone think that so I don't get pushed around. It hasn't hurt my business, which is odd.
trans-unit.target: 我相信你。我信任你，让你知道真相. . 我不会伤害别人 我让每个人都这么想 这样我就不会被人推来推去了 这并没有影响我的生意，这很奇怪

trans-unit.source: Maybe I should name my cuts of meat? Like, 'Today we have five Susan cuts and twenty Fredrick cuts' or something? On second thought, maybe not, too many questions.
trans-unit.target: 也许我应该给我的肉块取个名字？比如 “今天我们有五块苏珊肉和二十块弗雷德里克肉 ”之类的？转念一想，还是算了吧，问题太多了。

trans-unit.source: I was walking to the shop the other day and I saw someone making paper airplanes at on a bench in the forest._She was just sitting there, folding, and throwing these planes. Must have been a hundred scattered around her.
trans-unit.target: 有一天，我走在去商店的路上，看到有人在森林里的长椅上做纸飞机。她周围一定散落着上百个飞机。

trans-unit.source: My entire family is into fish. They fish it, sell it, make recipes for it. Me? I can't stand the smell of it._Couldn't get into it, so I figured, being a butcher was the next best thing since I'd developed my knife skills on my family boat.
trans-unit.target: 我全家都喜欢吃鱼。他们钓鱼、卖鱼、做鱼菜谱，我呢？我受不了鱼腥味，所以我想，做屠夫是下一个最好的选择，因为我的刀法是在家里的船上练出来的。

trans-unit.source: Getting together with my dad is fun, I enjoy him, but truth be told, we have some friction there still._He and mom haven't been completely happy about my choice to deal in land based proteins. Makes Thanksgiving awkward, you know?
trans-unit.target: 我和爸爸在一起很开心，我很喜欢他，但说实话，我们之间还是有些摩擦。这让感恩节变得很尴尬，你知道吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm glad that we talk, you know. Chatting with you helps me forget some of the more dreadful things in my life_ I think a lot of people wrestle with the choices they've made. I know I have, but having a friend like you makes it bearable.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴能和你聊天 和你聊天能让我忘掉生活中一些更可怕的事 我想很多人都在为自己的选择而挣扎 我知道我也是，但有你这样的朋友，我还能忍受。

trans-unit.source: Good morning, my filet minion!_I am going to save some amazing cuts of beef for us.
trans-unit.target: 早上好，我的菲力牛排奴才！_我要为我们留几块美味的牛肉。

trans-unit.source: Oh, you don't have to do that for me!
trans-unit.target: 哦，你不必为我这样做！

trans-unit.source: Mmmm, that sounds lovely.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，听起来不错。

trans-unit.source: It isn't a matter of have to, I want to. I want to treat us to the finest I can find because we deserve that.
trans-unit.target: 这不是必须的问题，而是我想要的。我想用我能找到的最好的东西来款待我们，因为这是我们应得的。

trans-unit.source: There's a New York strip I have aging right now that will be amazing in a few weeks.
trans-unit.target: 我现在正在制作一条纽约条纹，几周后就会非常出色。

trans-unit.source: Since we've been together, I have started to see life as something that isn't my job._I have started to see the many layers that it can have and I want to see it all with you.
trans-unit.target: 自从我们在一起后，我开始把生活看成不是我的工作。_我开始看到生活可以有很多层次，我想和你一起看到这一切。

trans-unit.source: I hope that we go the distance because I really think what we have here is very special.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我们能走得更远，因为我真的认为我们这里的一切都很特别。

trans-unit.source: I'll probably never stop working because I enjoy what I do so much, but I will never allow my job to come between us. Never.
trans-unit.target: 我可能永远不会停止工作，因为我非常享受我的工作，但我永远不会让我的工作成为我们之间的障碍。永远不会

trans-unit.source: I'm trying to not jump ahead of anything . . . But . . ._. . . But when we're old, and it's the end of the day, I'd like to just have some tea and hold your hand while the day unwinds.
trans-unit.target: 我尽量不抢先说什么....... 但是. . . . . 但当我们老了，一天结束的时候，我想喝杯茶，握着你的手，让这一天慢慢过去。

trans-unit.source: I know we're together, but I am going to lay this out for you: I don't expect you to give up your dreams for me._I hope I just get to be there to see you shine.
trans-unit.target: 我知道我们在一起了，但我要把这些都告诉你： 我不指望你为我放弃你的梦想。

trans-unit.source: Congradulations on your restaurant opening, (playername)!_This is the fun part, the start of it, where you see if your dreams fly or crash into a firery ball of sadness._It'll probably be the happier part! I'm sure of it, maybe.
trans-unit.target: 祝贺你的餐厅开业，(playername)！_这是最有趣的部分，也是最开始的部分，在这里你可以看到你的梦想是飞翔还是坠入悲伤的火球！我很确定，也许吧。

trans-unit.source: I read Lucius' review of your food. Your food is great and everyone here agrees._I don't care if he liked it or not, critics shouldn't have that much power over people's minds!
trans-unit.target: 我看了卢修斯对你们食物的评论。我不管他喜不喜欢，评论家不应该有那么大的权力控制别人的思想！

trans-unit.source: Great job getting the bathhouse up and running again._That took some guts! I always heard it was huanted, not that I believe in ghosts because if I did then I'd be in trouble in my line of work, haha! Well done!
trans-unit.target: 把澡堂修好并重新运转起来真是件了不起的事！我一直听说那是鬼屋，但我并不相信有鬼，因为如果我相信的话，我的工作就有麻烦了，哈哈！干得好

trans-unit.source: Well done with Le Sequoia! I've been hearing folks walking around talking about it and they are all saying how amazing it is. Keep going, you got it!
trans-unit.target: Le Sequoia 做得好！我一直听到周围的人在谈论它，他们都说它是多么令人惊叹。继续努力，你会成功的！

trans-unit.source: I had a few customers talk about the teahouse the other day. Makes me want a relaxing cap after a long day of cutting and preparing meat.
trans-unit.target: 前几天，有几位顾客向我谈起这家茶馆。这让我在忙碌了一天的切肉和准备工作后，很想放松一下。

trans-unit.source: I've been watching you answer those bulletin board requests, and someone has to say it, but good on you helping people out.
trans-unit.target: 我一直在看你回答布告栏上的请求，总得有人说出来，但你帮助别人是件好事。

trans-unit.source: Your work with the bulletin requests is making folks around here a lot more pleasant. You're a good person for doing it. Keep it up!
trans-unit.target: 你在公告请求方面所做的工作让这里的人们更加愉快。你是个好人。继续努力吧！

trans-unit.source: The menu at Le Sequoia is very intriguing to say the least! I haven't heard of some of these dishes, (playername), but they sound yummy.
trans-unit.target: Le Sequoia 的菜单至少可以说非常吸引人！我还没听说过其中的一些菜肴(playername)，但听起来很美味。

trans-unit.source: That menu you got at Le Sequioa is very exciting. I cannot wait to try what you're making with my meat!
trans-unit.target: 你在 Le Sequioa 拿到的菜单太令人兴奋了。我迫不及待地想尝尝你用我的肉做的菜！

trans-unit.source: I dunno about your menu right now, it feels really . . . off. It needs more meat options, in my own opinion.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道你们现在的菜单如何，感觉很......不对劲。在我看来，它需要更多的肉类选择。

trans-unit.source: I don't think I'm going to eat at your restaurant right now. The menu isn't sitting well with me at the moment.
trans-unit.target: 我想我现在不会去你的餐馆吃饭。我现在对菜单不太满意。

trans-unit.source: Way to keep this town clean and running, (playername)!_The quality of meat available will go down if we lose the environment it likes browsing around and eating.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们失去了它喜欢浏览和进食的环境，肉的质量就会下降。

trans-unit.source: Clean air and a healthy forest are key to keeping our little town happy and healthy. Thanks for making sure we're safe.
trans-unit.target: 清洁的空气和健康的森林是我们这个小城保持快乐和健康的关键。感谢你们确保我们的安全。

trans-unit.source: I really cannot stress how much I hate the trash floating around here._If it makes its way into the livestock, I cannot promise that the quality of the meat won't go down.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些垃圾进入牲畜体内，我不能保证肉的质量不会下降。

trans-unit.source: If we don't get a handle on all of this pollution soon, I will have to resort to alternate forms of protein, and trust me, you don't want that happening.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们不能尽快解决这些污染问题，我将不得不使用其他形式的蛋白质，相信我，你不会希望发生这种情况的。

trans-unit.source: (playername), thanks for the help again with that delivery. I really need to remember it's okay to ask for help, even when it's not an emergency.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，谢谢你再次帮忙送货。我真的需要记住，即使不是紧急情况，也可以寻求帮助。

trans-unit.source: Looking at the ocean the other day was really relaxing, because it felt like I wasn't there for a moment, and it was peaceful.
trans-unit.target: 那天看着大海真的很放松，因为那一刻我感觉自己不在那里，很宁静。

trans-unit.source: . . . Oh, right. I . . . I just don't get it somedays, you know? Why do I show up here? Why should I . . . never mind. Don't fret about it.
trans-unit.target: . . . 哦，对了。I . . . 有时候我就是不明白，你知道吗？我为什么会出现在这里？我为什么要. . . 别担心

trans-unit.source: My passion for feeding people was why I got into this job. I lost sight of that overtime._The work was all I saw, and I didn't see myself outside of it. Thanks for reminding me that even though my work is important, I am too.
trans-unit.target: 我热衷于为人们提供食物，这也是我从事这份工作的初衷。加班让我忘记了这一点，我的眼中只有工作，看不到工作之外的自己。谢谢你提醒我，尽管我的工作很重要，但我自己也很重要。

trans-unit.source: After realizing that making my life about work wasn't living, I decided to try some hobbies._I tried the usual ones like making a ship in a bottle, knitting, but they weren't doing it. I almost gave up, until I discovered . . .dance! I love it.
trans-unit.target: 在意识到以工作为重的生活并不适合我之后，我决定尝试一些业余爱好。_我尝试了一些常见的爱好，比如在瓶子里做一艘船、编织，但都不适合我。我几乎要放弃了，直到我发现了......舞蹈！我爱跳舞

trans-unit.source: It's funny, I really wouldn't be where I am mentally without your help. Life doesn't need a drastic change all the time._Small things we can do for ourselves is really what's needed more often than not. For the last time, probably not, thanks.
trans-unit.target: 有趣的是，如果没有你的帮助，我真的不会有现在的精神状态。生活不需要时时刻刻都发生翻天覆地的变化。_我们能为自己做的小事才是我们真正需要的。最后说一次，可能不用了，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Uh, thanks?
trans-unit.target: 谢谢？

trans-unit.source: My apron needs to be washed soon. There's blood on it.
trans-unit.target: 我的围裙该洗了 上面有血

trans-unit.source: I d . . . don't understand why you think that, but okay.
trans-unit.target: 我......不明白你为什么这么想，不过没关系。

trans-unit.source: These skills have taken years to hone. Thanks for the compliment.
trans-unit.target: 这些技能是多年磨练出来的。多谢夸奖。

trans-unit.source: Look, I have been doing this for a few years now, I know I got it. Thanks.
trans-unit.target: 听着，我干这行已经好几年了，我知道我行的。谢谢

trans-unit.source: Sure, that would be very helpful.
trans-unit.target: 当然，这将非常有帮助。

trans-unit.source: No need, I've dealt with a lot more in the past.
trans-unit.target: 不需要，我过去处理过更多的事情。

trans-unit.source: Hey, this is pretty awesome! Thanks!
trans-unit.target: 嘿，这真是太棒了！谢谢！

trans-unit.source: Ah, how did you know? I feel better drinking this.
trans-unit.target: 啊，你怎么知道？喝了这个我感觉好多了

trans-unit.source: Really appreciate it (playername). This is really good for me. Too much meat and all, you know?
trans-unit.target: 真的很感谢(playername)。这对我来说真的很好。肉太多了，你知道吗？

trans-unit.source: This looks really valuable! I don't really need this, but I appreciate the thought.
trans-unit.target: 这看起来真的很有价值！我其实并不需要这个，但我很欣赏你的想法。

trans-unit.source: Hey, you remembered! You are a good friend (playername).
trans-unit.target: 嘿，你还记得！你是个好朋友(playername)。

trans-unit.source: I think it's pretty neat, but I don't need it.
trans-unit.target: 我觉得它很实用，但我并不需要它。

trans-unit.source: Thanks (playername), but I do not need this.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢(playername)，但我不需要这个。

trans-unit.source: What's this? Do you want me to keep this?
trans-unit.target: 这是什么？你想让我留着这个吗？

trans-unit.source: Thanks, but you've already given me something today.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，但你今天已经给了我一些东西。

trans-unit.source: Heyyy, there we go. Now go wash your shirt, it's got blood on it.
trans-unit.target: 嘿，好了 现在去洗你的衬衫，上面有血

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I'm covered in blood, a lot of blood.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我浑身是血，很多血。

trans-unit.source: Sells meats, eggs
trans-unit.target: 销售肉类、鸡蛋

trans-unit.source: Hello! Welcome to Chop! What can I get for you?
trans-unit.target: 您好 欢迎来到 Chop！需要点什么？

trans-unit.source: What can I get for you?
trans-unit.target: 您需要什么？

trans-unit.source: Welcome! What would you like to order today?
trans-unit.target: 欢迎光临！您今天想订购什么？

trans-unit.source: Chop, where the knives don't stop when they hit bone. What can I get you today?
trans-unit.target: 砍，刀子砍到骨头上就停不下来。今天要点什么？

trans-unit.source: Come on in! We got some amazing specials today.
trans-unit.target: 快进来吧 我们今天有很多特价商品

trans-unit.source: Yum! That one is my favorite.
trans-unit.target: 好吃 这是我的最爱。

trans-unit.source: Good buy, that cut is prime!
trans-unit.target: 买得好，这一刀是最好的！

trans-unit.source: Ah, great choice!
trans-unit.target: 啊，不错的选择！

trans-unit.source: I haven't seen its like, I'll take it.
trans-unit.target: 我还没见过它的样子，我要了。

trans-unit.source: Look at this!
trans-unit.target: 看看这个！

trans-unit.source: Great! I can use this.
trans-unit.target: 太好了 我可以用这个。

trans-unit.source: I can't use this, but thanks anyway.
trans-unit.target: 我用不到这个，但还是要谢谢你。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, don't need it.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，不需要。

trans-unit.source: I don't need this, but someone else might.
trans-unit.target: 我不需要这个，但别人可能需要。

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you don't have any credits in your pockets?
trans-unit.target: 你确定你口袋里没有任何信用点吗？

trans-unit.source: Hmmmm, doesn't look like you can afford this.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，看来你买不起这个。

trans-unit.source: You'll need some more credits, sorry!
trans-unit.target: 你需要更多的信用点，抱歉！

trans-unit.source: Sup. Hope those shrimp worked out for you.
trans-unit.target: 希望这些虾对你有用。

trans-unit.source: I've been around a lot of shrimp, and I gotta day, they are feisty little guys.
trans-unit.target: 我接触过很多虾，不得不说，它们都是好斗的小家伙。

trans-unit.source: Fishing was guessing and hoping you're right, but now we have technology, so we can stop guessing.
trans-unit.target: 捕鱼是猜测，希望你是对的，但现在我们有了技术，可以不用再猜测了。

trans-unit.source: Hey, if you see any old pieces of tech, let me know.
trans-unit.target: 嘿，如果你看到什么旧技术，请告诉我。

trans-unit.source: I'm gonna grab a boba from Hasel. She's always got something new going on.
trans-unit.target: 我去找哈塞尔买点波霸。她总是有新东西。

trans-unit.source: (playername), how's the restaurant going?
trans-unit.target: (餐厅怎么样了？

trans-unit.source: Okay. But it could be better.
trans-unit.target: 好吧，但还可以更好。

trans-unit.source: Not well. It's been stressful.
trans-unit.target: 不太好。压力很大

trans-unit.source: If the stresses of owning Le Sequoia ever become too much to handle, let me know, and we'll do some fishing.
trans-unit.target: 如果拥有红杉的压力变得难以承受，请告诉我，我们可以一起去钓鱼。

trans-unit.source: Running your own ship takes a lot out of you, but I hear it's worth it. Let's do some fishing sometime to take the stress off.
trans-unit.target: 经营自己的船会让你付出很多 但我听说这很值得 有时间我们去钓钓鱼吧，消除一下压力。

trans-unit.source: Shrimp scampi, shrimp cocktail, shrimp gumbo, shrimp by itself. There are many ways to eat shrimp.
trans-unit.target: 虾蛄、虾鸡尾酒、虾浓汤、虾本身。虾有很多种吃法。

trans-unit.source: Shrimp is delicious, but don't eat it everyday, they're a sometimes food.
trans-unit.target: 虾很美味，但不要天天吃，它们只是偶尔吃吃而已。

trans-unit.source: Just between you and me and the sea, this job is just a job for me. What I really want is to get into robotics.
trans-unit.target: 在你我和大海之间，这份工作对我来说只是一份工作。我真正想要的是进入机器人行业

trans-unit.source: If you see a guy wandering around with a peg leg, don't ask him how he got it. TLDR, it wasn't a whale.
trans-unit.target: 如果你看到一个人带着一条假腿四处游荡，不要问他是怎么弄的。总之，那不是鲸鱼。

trans-unit.source: Man, I hope one day that old bathhouse opens again. That would be nice after a day on the boat.
trans-unit.target: 伙计，我希望有一天那个老澡堂能重新开放。在船上待上一天后，那该多好啊。

trans-unit.source: If you find an X-23 Servo, can you bring it to me?
trans-unit.target: 如果你找到 X-23 伺服器，能带给我吗？

trans-unit.source: Sure.
trans-unit.target: 当然。

trans-unit.source: A whattada what?
trans-unit.target: 什么什么？

trans-unit.source: Thanks, we need it for Hasel._She has certain . . . mechanical problems. Technically . . . Bianca asked me to find it . . .
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，我们需要它来救哈塞尔 她有一些......机械故障 技术上. . 比安卡让我来找的. .

trans-unit.source: I don't get a lot of time off the docks. It looks like a sausage maker for a mixer, but bigger. It's for Hasel. If you don't, well . . . Bianca might get mad . . . at me.
trans-unit.target: 我离开码头的时间不多。它看起来像搅拌机的香肠机，但更大。这是给哈塞尔的 如果你不这么做. . . 比安卡可能会生气 生我的气

trans-unit.source: I usually wind up at Bianca's with Hasel. We're constantly trying to keep Hasel running._She's not just a project, but a friend too. She's just the nicest.
trans-unit.target: 我通常会和哈塞尔一起去比安卡家 我们一直在努力让哈赛尔继续工作 她不仅是我们的项目 也是我们的朋友 她是最棒的

trans-unit.source: White Ash has been my home since forever. I dig its vibe._Some people want to run away from their hometown, but I like where I live.
trans-unit.target: 白灰镇一直是我的家。有些人想逃离自己的家乡，但我喜欢我生活的地方。

trans-unit.source: When Bianca and I get together sometime, you should come along too._We can dig into the depths of technobabble.
trans-unit.target: 有机会我和比安卡聚聚时，你也一起来吧。

trans-unit.source: You ever want to hear a story, go talk to Bowie. Man, but be careful, he doesn't know when to stop talking._It might seem rude, but just walking away is sometimes the only option. Just an FYI.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想听故事，就去找鲍伊吧 老兄，但要小心，他不知道什么时候该停止说话。_这可能看起来很粗鲁，但一走了之有时是唯一的选择。仅供参考。

trans-unit.source: Can I tell you something, (playername)? You've been a solid friend to me.
trans-unit.target: 我能告诉你一件事吗？你一直是我坚实的朋友。

trans-unit.source: You have been too Aloys.
trans-unit.target: 阿洛伊斯，你也是。

trans-unit.source: Next time, I have to go.
trans-unit.target: 下次，我一定要去。

trans-unit.source: Hehe. I try I guess. Let's take a boat out into the sea sometime, yeah?
trans-unit.target: 嘿嘿。我想我尽力了。有机会我们坐船出海吧？

trans-unit.source: Eh, I get it. Talk to ya later.
trans-unit.target: 我知道了 回头见

trans-unit.source: Tinkering away at home with my gear brings me joy. I hope I get to make things here in White Ash Harbor and never leave.
trans-unit.target: 在家里捣鼓我的装备给我带来了快乐。我希望我能在白灰港制作东西，永远不要离开。

trans-unit.source: University was always beyond my means, but at least I got online videos to teach me._Solder Express' channel has taught me so much that I consider him my professor.
trans-unit.target: 大学总是让我力不从心，但至少我有在线视频可以学习。_Solder Express 的频道教会了我很多东西，我把他当作我的教授。

trans-unit.source: I just don't want to be a fisherman my whole life. Running my own boat will make me more money, but it isn't what I want to do forever.
trans-unit.target: 我只是不想一辈子当渔夫。经营自己的船会让我赚更多的钱，但这不是我想一辈子做的事。

trans-unit.source: I want to make something that makes life better. Not just for me, but for everyone._It's dreaming, but I'm not going to sleep through this life that's for sure.
trans-unit.target: 我想做出让生活更美好的东西。这是在做梦，但我肯定不会睡过去。

trans-unit.source: Finding the time to get through some of the thoughts in my head is hard. It's why I carry a small notebook._Jot it down, put it away. There, I got it out, and I feel good about it.
trans-unit.target: 我很难抽出时间来处理脑子里的一些想法。所以我随身带着一个小笔记本。好了，我写出来了，感觉很好。

trans-unit.source: Hey, (playername), I wanted to tell you something for a while now . . . but I don't know how to say it.
trans-unit.target: 嘿，(playername)，我早就想告诉你一件事了......但我不知道该怎么说。

trans-unit.source: Aloys, whatever it is I'm sure we can talk about it.
trans-unit.target: 阿洛伊斯，不管是什么，我相信我们可以谈谈。

trans-unit.source: That sounds serious. Everything ok?
trans-unit.target: 这听起来很严重。一切都还好吗？

trans-unit.source: Okay, here goes, your drip, it's basic, IMO. There, I said it. It comes from a place of love, so don't be too down on yourself.
trans-unit.target: 好了，开始吧，你的点滴，这是最基本的，仅供参考。好了，我说出来了。这是出于爱，所以不要太自卑。

trans-unit.source: I am into fashion. How I and others dress is important to me. So, know when I say 'Your drip is basic' just know it's coming from a place of love.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢时尚。我和其他人的穿着对我来说都很重要。所以，当我说 “你的点滴都是基本款 ”时，你要知道这是我的爱。

trans-unit.source: I'd recommend checking out what Milo has in stock in his shop. He has some wild one-of-a-kind items available in there.
trans-unit.target: 我建议你去看看米洛商店里有什么存货。他的店里有很多独一无二的商品。

trans-unit.source: Lots of tourists just ask me questions about where 'I fish in my off time?'_It doesn't occur to these people that humans are allowed to be 3 dimensional, ya know? It would break their brains to know I read fashion magazines.
trans-unit.target: 很多游客都会问我'我休息的时候会去哪里钓鱼？如果让他们知道我看时尚杂志，会让他们大吃一惊的。

trans-unit.source: It's a shame that we live in a time with so many threads to choose from but most folks don't care._Do yourself a favor, (playername), don't do a hoodie and sweats all the time, okay? You're better than that.
trans-unit.target: 真遗憾，我们生活在一个有这么多主题可供选择的时代，但大多数人却不在乎。_帮你自己一个忙，(playername)，别总是穿着连帽衫和运动服，好吗？你比那更好。

trans-unit.source: We've known each other for a while now, so if you don't want to be alone, you can always call me._You're welcome to crash on my couch even. No one should ever feel like they're alone. No one.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经认识一段时间了，如果你不想一个人，可以随时打电话给我。没有人应该感到孤独 没有人

trans-unit.source: Whenever I see you, I feel like the future is a bit brighter now that you're here.
trans-unit.target: 每当我看到你，我都会觉得有你在，未来会更加光明。

trans-unit.source: That's sweet of you to say.
trans-unit.target: 你真好。

trans-unit.source: I see a sunrise that will never set.
trans-unit.target: 我看到了永不落幕的日出。

trans-unit.source: It's the truth.
trans-unit.target: 这是事实。

trans-unit.source: Hey, I was trying to romance you more! Haha! I love it.
trans-unit.target: 嘿，我是想让你更浪漫一些！我喜欢 我喜欢

trans-unit.source: You know how you have someone special? When you're talking or being quiet, you're doing it together, and it's never a bother.
trans-unit.target: 你知道你有一个特别的人吗？当你说话或保持沉默时，你们是在一起的，这从来不是麻烦。

trans-unit.source: If anything, we should really get some matching threads sometime. Yeah, I'm that kind of nerd when I love someone.
trans-unit.target: 如果有的话，我们真的应该找些匹配的线程。是啊，当我爱上一个人时，我就是那种书呆子。

trans-unit.source: It's been a day, but you know what helps make it better? Knowing that I'll be able to hold your hand.
trans-unit.target: 这一天已经过去了，但你知道是什么让这一天变得更好吗？知道我可以牵着你的手。

trans-unit.source: I just feel so alive right now, you know? The fact that you chose to be with me, just makes me feel like I can do anything.
trans-unit.target: 我现在觉得自己很有活力，你知道吗？你选择和我在一起 让我觉得自己无所不能

trans-unit.source: I love you more than I have ever loved anyone. Sorry for spilling that out with no lead up, but it's what sits in my heart day in and out.
trans-unit.target: 我爱你胜过爱任何人。对不起，我没有任何铺垫就把这些话说出来了，但这就是我日复一日的心声。

trans-unit.source: Grats, (playername). Must feel good getting that done. Le Sequoia's grand opening that is.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了，(playername)。完成任务的感觉一定很好。这就是红杉的盛大开幕。

trans-unit.source: I heard that some dude named Lucius did a write up on your place._I didn't read it, too busy, but I'm sure the guy sucks. Don't worry about his words.
trans-unit.target: 我听说有个叫卢修斯的家伙写了一篇关于你们家的报道_我没看，太忙了，但我肯定这家伙烂透了。别在意他的话

trans-unit.source: Hey, I didn't know you were helping with the bathhouse._That's pretty damn cool. I'd love to check out those steam machines. Old timey tech is so tactile!
trans-unit.target: 嘿，我还不知道你在帮着修澡堂呢。我很想看看那些蒸汽机 老式技术触感真好

trans-unit.source: Been hearing a lot about Le Sequoia here on the docks._Tourists seem to be showing up more and more too. Guess that's your doing, huh? Grats, man.
trans-unit.target: 我在码头上听到了很多关于红杉的消息。我猜这是你的功劳 对吧? Guess that's your doing, huh? 干得好 伙计 Grats, man.

trans-unit.source: I'm gonna go to the tea house after work sometime. I heard you did an amazing job with it. Not gonna lie, enjoying an afternoon tea sounds super relaxing.
trans-unit.target: 下班后我要去茶馆喝茶 我听说你做得很棒 不瞒你说，享受下午茶听起来超级惬意。

trans-unit.source: Yo, I've been seeing you running around here. Getting these small asks done for folks. You're a solid person for doing all that.
trans-unit.target: 哟，我一直看到你在这里跑来跑去。为乡亲们办些小事 你是个靠谱的人，做了这么多事。

trans-unit.source: Hey, keep it up with all that do-gooding you've been doing.
trans-unit.target: 嘿，继续你的善举吧。

trans-unit.source: I heard your menu is pretty epic with a great seafood selection. I'll have to check it out.
trans-unit.target: 我听说你们的菜单很不错，海鲜选择很多。我得去看看。

trans-unit.source: Man, that menu is wild. I am so glad you are committing to seafood.
trans-unit.target: 天哪，这菜单太疯狂了。我很高兴你能吃海鲜。

trans-unit.source: I heard about your menu . . . I think I'm good.
trans-unit.target: 我听说了你的菜单 . . . 我觉得不错

trans-unit.source: I'm going to pass on the menu right now, it isn't really my bag.
trans-unit.target: 我现在不想看菜单，这不是我的菜。

trans-unit.source: Keeping the waters clean keeps my paycheck safe. Thanks for making that happen.
trans-unit.target: 保持水域清洁，我的薪水才有保障。感谢你们的努力。

trans-unit.source: You are always making sure what you're doing isn't messing with the rest of us, I appreciate it._
trans-unit.target: 你总是确保你所做的事情不会影响到我们其他人，我很感激。

trans-unit.source: Hey, others see how you do things, so try not trashing our waters, k?
trans-unit.target: 嘿，别人都知道你是怎么做事的，所以尽量不要破坏我们的水域，好吗？

trans-unit.source: Your actions speak for you, (playername). Trash sucks, and right now, so do you.
trans-unit.target: 你的行为代表了你自己，(playername)。垃圾很烂，现在，你也很烂。

trans-unit.source: Now that I have my BMD, I can harvest all the raw materials I need for making . . . anything! Thanks again for the fish, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 现在我有了我的 BMD，我就可以收获制造......任何东西所需的所有原材料了！再次感谢你的鱼，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: My quota isn't going up, which is good. Gotta keep that work/life balance happen. Be good at the job, but not so good I get more work. You dig?
trans-unit.target: 我的配额没有增加，这很好。必须保持工作和生活的平衡。工作要出色，但也不能太出色，否则就会有更多的工作。明白吗？

trans-unit.source: I took the BMD out for a trial run, it's sooo good! LET'S GOOOOOO!
trans-unit.target: 我把 BMD 拿出来试用了一下，感觉非常好！我们走吧！

trans-unit.source: Going to uni was something I thought would never happen. It's crazy that it even is happening! Thanks.
trans-unit.target: 上大学是我以为永远不会发生的事。现在竟然实现了，真是不可思议！谢谢。

trans-unit.source: I dunno what to bring clothing wise to uni. I'm so used to wearing these grubby garments all the time. I'll have to hit a few thrifts before going. Update my look.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道该带什么衣服去大学。我已经习惯了一直穿着这些邋遢的衣服。去之前，我得去淘几件旧衣服。更新一下我的造型。

trans-unit.source: This is it, I'm heading out for uni. (playername), I've said it a lot, but thanks for helping me out on this.
trans-unit.target: 就这样吧，我要去上大学了。 (playername), 我已经说过很多次了，但还是要谢谢你在这件事上帮我。

trans-unit.source: Even after being on my feet for 13 hours, I still get compliments. Thanks.
trans-unit.target: 即使我已经站了 13 个小时，还是会有人夸我。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: These threads aren't even my best. Come out on a Saturday night and you'll see my best.
trans-unit.target: 这些线程甚至不是我最好的。周六晚上出来，你会看到我最好的一面。

trans-unit.source: I am a student, forever a student.
trans-unit.target: 我是学生，永远是学生。

trans-unit.source: Umm, cool.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，不错。

trans-unit.source: Sure.
trans-unit.target: 当然。

trans-unit.source: Nope.
trans-unit.target: 没有。

trans-unit.source: Aces, man.
trans-unit.target: 王牌

trans-unit.source: This hat man, it's great. I might wear this.
trans-unit.target: 这帽子太棒了 我可能会戴上它

trans-unit.source: Top notch! Thanks (playername).
trans-unit.target: 一流！谢谢(playername)。

trans-unit.source: This looks like it costs a pretty penny. Not really for me, but I will keep it.
trans-unit.target: 这个看起来很贵。不太适合我，但我会留着它。

trans-unit.source: Hey! This is a sick gift. You made my day better, and it's already a great day!
trans-unit.target: 嘿，这礼物太变态了。你让我今天过得更好，而今天已经是个好日子了！

trans-unit.source: Yeah, I'm good without it.
trans-unit.target: 是的，没有它我也很好。

trans-unit.source: Nah, but thanks man.
trans-unit.target: 不，不过还是谢谢你。

trans-unit.source: You got anything else? No? Ok. I will hold onto it.
trans-unit.target: 还有别的吗？没了？好的 我会保管好的 Ok. 我会保管好的

trans-unit.source: Thanks, but you've already given me something today.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，但你今天已经给了我一些东西。

trans-unit.source: You can let go now.
trans-unit.target: 你现在可以放手了。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I'm a bit busy today.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我今天有点忙。

trans-unit.source: Sells fishing supplies
trans-unit.target: 销售钓鱼用品

trans-unit.source: Yo, watcha need?
trans-unit.target: 你需要什么？

trans-unit.source: We have some great fishing rods.
trans-unit.target: 我们有一些很棒的鱼竿。

trans-unit.source: Be careful out there. The ocean is wild and unpredictable.
trans-unit.target: 出门在外要小心。海洋是狂野而不可预测的。

trans-unit.source: Ah. Are you a fellow angler too?
trans-unit.target: 啊。你也是钓鱼爱好者吗？

trans-unit.source: You won't be disappointed.
trans-unit.target: 您一定不会失望的。

trans-unit.source: This one is great.
trans-unit.target: 这个很不错。

trans-unit.source: I use that one every day.
trans-unit.target: 我每天都用这个。

trans-unit.source: Solid pick.
trans-unit.target: 可靠的选择

trans-unit.source: I can take it from here.
trans-unit.target: 我可以从这里接手

trans-unit.source: Not bad. Not bad.
trans-unit.target: 不错。还不错

trans-unit.source: Sure, I can use this.
trans-unit.target: 当然，我可以用这个。

trans-unit.source: I'm good, thanks though.
trans-unit.target: 不用了，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: No thanks, man.
trans-unit.target: 不用了，谢谢

trans-unit.source: I don't need this, but someone else might.
trans-unit.target: 我不需要这个，但别人可能需要。

trans-unit.source: You need more credits. This isn't a charity.
trans-unit.target: 你需要更多信用点。这不是慈善事业。

trans-unit.source: It doesn't look like you can afford this.
trans-unit.target: 看来你买不起这个。

trans-unit.source: You'll need some more credits friend.
trans-unit.target: 你需要更多的信用点数，朋友。

trans-unit.source: Salutations, (playername)!_I hope you're adjusting to your new surroundings because if you don't then that will make living here hard. Okay, bye!
trans-unit.target: 向你致敬，(playername)！_我希望你能适应新环境，因为如果你不适应，那么在这里生活会很困难。好的，再见！

trans-unit.source: In White Mash Barber, I mean White Ash Harbor, there are plenty of places to go and see. Like that volcano just over there. It's something to see!
trans-unit.target: 在白马士巴伯，我是说白灰港，有很多地方可以去看看。比如那边的火山 值得一看

trans-unit.source: . . . Sorry, I was thinking about how jellyfish can function without a brain. How is that possible?
trans-unit.target: . . . 对不起，我在想水母怎么会没有大脑？这怎么可能呢？

trans-unit.source: When I'm making a boba tea, I am always adding something new to the mix, but I avoid using humans . . . I mean, animals.
trans-unit.target: 在制作荞麦茶时，我总是会加入一些新的东西，但我避免使用人类....... . . 我是说动物。

trans-unit.source: Hi! Have you ever noticed how boba teas are like solar systems with tiny tapioca planets?
trans-unit.target: 嗨！你有没有注意到荞麦茶就像一个太阳系，里面有小小的木薯星球？

trans-unit.source: I wonder if I could use the sap of trees in my drinks? No, no one is ready for that yet.
trans-unit.target: 我想知道我是否可以在饮料中使用树液？不行，现在还没有人准备好。

trans-unit.source: Do you believe that entropy renders any ability at immortality impossible?
trans-unit.target: 你认为熵使得任何长生不老的能力都不可能实现吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm sorry?
trans-unit.target: 你说什么？

trans-unit.source: Entropy will lead to the death of the universe.
trans-unit.target: 熵将导致宇宙死亡。

trans-unit.source: Right! I was making boba.
trans-unit.target: 对 我在做荞麦面

trans-unit.source: I hope I'm around to see it! Now, about that boba drink I was making.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我能看到它！现在，说说我做的荞麦饮料。

trans-unit.source: When I woke up in White Ash Harbor, I started reading anything I could get my hands on, and I read a lot of manuals._Why doesn't anyone read those? They're full of information!
trans-unit.target: 当我在白灰港醒来时，我开始阅读任何我可以得到的东西，我读了很多手册。它们充满了信息

trans-unit.source: Philosophy is super intriguing!_These thoughts about the universe, about life on this planet, and about life itself just made me think, 'What if a boba drink could fix all those questions?'
trans-unit.target: 哲学超级吸引人！_这些关于宇宙、关于这个星球上的生命、关于生命本身的思考让我想到，'如果波霸饮料能解决所有这些问题呢？

trans-unit.source: A lot of people find gloomy days to be gloomy, but I look at it as a day that will never come again!_How exciting is it to see the world, on this day, in this shade of light!
trans-unit.target: 很多人觉得阴沉沉的日子是阴沉沉的，但我却把它看成是永远不会再有的日子！_在这一天，在这样的光影里，看到这个世界是多么令人兴奋！

trans-unit.source: I think a lot of people I meet focus too much on their face and how it looks._Makes me appreciate my face all the more.
trans-unit.target: 我觉得我遇到的很多人都太注重自己的脸和外表了。

trans-unit.source: When I'm not at the stand I like to explore. I love finding all of the dead things in the forest. I mean, abandoned things._They're like treasures but falling apart. I kinda relate to it. You want a mango merry smoothie?
trans-unit.target: 不在站台的时候，我喜欢探险。我喜欢发现森林里所有死掉的东西 我的意思是，被遗弃的东西 它们就像宝藏，但都散架了 我也有同感 要芒果冰沙吗？

trans-unit.source: I was told that I came from Billboard City, though I have no memory of my life when I lived there._Do you have a previous life you do not recall?
trans-unit.target: 有人告诉我，我来自广告牌城，但我对在那里生活过的日子毫无记忆。

trans-unit.source: Uh, no, I remember everything about my life.
trans-unit.target: 呃，不，我记得我生活的一切。

trans-unit.source: There are parts of it I wish I couldn't recall.
trans-unit.target: 有些部分我真希望想不起来了。

trans-unit.source: How nice it must be to remember everything._Do you remember when you were born? I bet that was exciting!
trans-unit.target: 你还记得自己是什么时候出生的吗？我打赌那一定很刺激

trans-unit.source: It is not something that I would recommend._Remembering is better than not because you will always wonder if you left the stove on in previous apartment and if it's still set to the 'On' position and if it is then who is paying that energy bill?
trans-unit.target: 记住总比不记住好，因为你总是会怀疑自己是否在前一间公寓里没关炉子，炉子是否还在 “开着”，如果是的话，那么谁来支付能源账单呢？

trans-unit.source: Without Alloys and Bianca, I'd be falling apart!_They keep me running and I give them free boba drinks in return.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有阿洛伊斯和比安卡，我早就崩溃了！_他们让我继续奔跑，我给他们免费的荞麦饮料作为回报。

trans-unit.source: Friends are great to have, I count you among them now._I know I'm friendly, but friendship isn't something I hand out to anyone. You have joined an exclusive club, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我知道我很友好，但友谊不是我施舍给任何人的。你已经加入了一个专属俱乐部，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: I hope I never forget my friends. I don't get sad, it's literally impossible for me to be sad, but that would make me sad.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我永远不会忘记我的朋友们。我不会悲伤，我根本不可能悲伤，但那会让我难过。

trans-unit.source: Friends make life better. When Bianca, Alloys, and Milo are tinkering with my brain it's a blast!
trans-unit.target: 朋友让生活更美好。当比安卡、阿洛伊和米洛在我脑子里捣鼓的时候，我的心情就会很愉快！

trans-unit.source: Milo has an fun little shop down by the water. If you want some poorly made, I mean, well made clothing pieces, get some from him.
trans-unit.target: 米洛在水边有一家有趣的小店。如果你想要一些做工粗糙，我的意思是做工精良的衣服，可以去他那里买一些。

trans-unit.source: Do you have family, (playername)?
trans-unit.target: 你有家人吗？

trans-unit.source: Yeah, I do.
trans-unit.target: 是的，我知道。

trans-unit.source: No, I don't.
trans-unit.target: 不，我没有。

trans-unit.source: That's nice, but the latest version of Talking While Walking, a walking sim, just completely cut the endurance bar from it! Can you believe that?!
trans-unit.target: 这很好，但最新版本的“边走边聊”——一款步行模拟游戏——完全切断了它的耐力标准！你能相信吗？！

trans-unit.source: You are a lot like me then, alone, which is why I always make sure I rinse my fruit before blending it.
trans-unit.target: 你和我很像，都是一个人，所以我总是确保在混合水果之前先冲洗干净。

trans-unit.source: I've been acting funny all morning. I need to diagnose what is happening because without tomatoes would we have gone to the moon?
trans-unit.target: 我整个早上都怪怪的。我需要诊断一下到底发生了什么，因为如果没有西红柿，我们能登上月球吗？

trans-unit.source: This isn't one of my random bugs or me getting distracted._I had a massive shift in my logistical line of thinking. I became a fish.
trans-unit.target: 我的逻辑思维发生了巨大转变。我成了一条鱼。

trans-unit.source: There isn't any water in the well! I'll use my blender to dig a hole and find the lost city!
trans-unit.target: 井里没有水！我要用搅拌机挖个洞，找到失落之城！

trans-unit.source: My family are my friends and my friends are made of marshmallow.
trans-unit.target: 我的家人就是我的朋友，而我的朋友是棉花糖做的。

trans-unit.source: WHERE DO BOBA'S EVEN COME FROM?! WHO MAKES THEM?!!_You're an honest individual, TELL ME YOUR SECRETS! WHERE ARE THE BOBA QUEENS???
trans-unit.target: 波霸是怎么来的？你是个诚实的人，告诉我你的秘密！波霸女王在哪里？

trans-unit.source: May I tell you about the train that runs from Billboard City to here?
trans-unit.target: 我可以告诉你从广告牌城到这里的火车吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm sorry, what?
trans-unit.target: 对不起，什么？

trans-unit.source: I have always wondered about it.
trans-unit.target: 我一直想知道。

trans-unit.source: I'll take that as a yes. You see, it's a J series from Isky Lines, one of the most dependable trains in the world._Not only is it stylish, but it's service life will last for millions of miles. So cool!
trans-unit.target: 我就当你同意了。你看，这是伊斯基铁路公司生产的 J 系列列车，是世界上最可靠的列车之一。_它不仅时尚，而且使用寿命长达数百万英里。太酷了

trans-unit.source: Wonder no more! The J series from Isky Lines is one of the most stylish and dependable trains in the world!_It is over engineered, contrary to the direction most of the industry has gone, which means will run for millions of miles!
trans-unit.target: 不用再怀疑了！Isky Lines 公司生产的 J 系列列车是世界上最时尚、最可靠的列车之一！_与大多数行业的发展方向相反，它采用了超前的设计，这意味着它可以运行数百万英里！

trans-unit.source: I don't usually chat trains with most people. It's something I keep to myself, since most people aren't interested in trains._. . . But since we're so close, I figured it was safe to bring up with you.
trans-unit.target: 我通常不和大多数人聊火车。这是我自己的事，因为大多数人对火车不感兴趣。. . 但既然我们关系这么好，我想还是跟你说说比较安全。

trans-unit.source: Doing what's right is always the best choice even when its hard to do. We get one ride around the void of space if you're made of meat._Unless you're like me (us if PC is android), then we get to keep going for a long time.
trans-unit.target: 做正确的事永远是最好的选择，即使很难做到。如果你是肉体，我们可以在太空中飞行一圈。_除非你像我一样 (us if PC is android)，否则我们可以继续走很长一段时间

trans-unit.source: In the infinite nothing, our tiny ball of dust spins, having friends and family that you can trust is what makes life a little less lonely in this endless universe._Now, how do you tie a shoelace? My fingers still don't know.
trans-unit.target: 在无穷无尽的虚无中，我们这颗微小的尘埃球在旋转，拥有可以信赖的朋友和家人，才能让生活在这无尽的宇宙中不那么孤独。我的手指还不知道。

trans-unit.source: If you haven't yet, you should check out the library in town. It's got so much in it!_Dust, books, more dust, it's such a great space to sit inside of and read newsletters on my phone.
trans-unit.target: 如果你还没去过，你应该去镇上的图书馆看看。里面有很多东西！_灰尘、书籍、更多的灰尘，这是一个非常好的空间，我可以坐在里面用手机阅读新闻简报。

trans-unit.source: The Lonely Cliffs are a really pretty, so I've been told. I'd like to check them out one day.
trans-unit.target: 有人告诉我，孤崖非常漂亮。我想有一天去看看。

trans-unit.source: Oh, hi! I'm glad you're here because we are in a relationship and I enjoy that we are together in this manner._Is this how people talk when they're in love?
trans-unit.target: 哦，你好 我很高兴你能来，因为我们是恋人关系，我很享受我们在一起的这种方式。

trans-unit.source: Yes-ish, but I love you for trying. Haha.
trans-unit.target: 是的，但我喜欢你的尝试。哈哈。

trans-unit.source: Not really, but this is new to me too. Haha.
trans-unit.target: 不一定，但这对我来说也很新鲜。哈哈。

trans-unit.source: Love is a bizarre emotion to experience. I just want to make sure I am expressing it clearly, like a moose in the woods calling to its mate.
trans-unit.target: 爱是一种奇异的情感体验。我只想确保自己能清晰地表达出来，就像森林里的麋鹿在呼唤自己的伴侣。

trans-unit.source: I . . . I think we have a strong bond. It's like gluing two pieces of wood together._For me, it can be hard to get used to this new way of life.
trans-unit.target: I . . . 我觉得我们之间的感情很深 就像把两块木头粘在一起一样。_对我来说，要适应这种新的生活方式可能很难。

trans-unit.source: Do you find yourself thinking about me when we are apart? I do._I haven't had such a singular thought in my mind ring so clear other than starting this boba stand.
trans-unit.target: 当我们分开的时候，你会想起我吗？是的，除了开始摆荞麦面摊之外，我还从未有过如此清晰的思念。

trans-unit.source: Does love increase exponentially or does it have a cap? I am hoping the ladder because I don't want this to stop.
trans-unit.target: 爱是成倍增长还是有上限？我希望是阶梯式的，因为我不想让这一切停止。

trans-unit.source: Boba and I have been together for a long time. I love him dearly. I am excited that you are joining our small and quirky family.
trans-unit.target: 波巴和我在一起很久了。我深爱着他。我很高兴你能加入我们这个古怪的小家庭。

trans-unit.source: When I came to White Ash Harbor, I never thought I would find someone who. . . who loved me for myself._I just never thought I could be loved.
trans-unit.target: 当我来到白灰港的时候 我从没想过我会找到一个. . .爱我的人。_我从未想过自己会被爱。

trans-unit.source: After work, can we make like a tree, and watch the rain together? It's one of my favorite things to do and I want to do it with you.
trans-unit.target: 下班后，我们能做一棵树，一起看雨吗？这是我最喜欢做的事情之一，我想和你一起做。

trans-unit.source: Congratulations, (playername) on getting The Tree . . . I mean, Le Sequoia officially open!
trans-unit.target: 恭喜你，(playername)，“树”. . 我是说，红杉树正式开放！

trans-unit.source: I heard Lucifer is going to review Le Sequoia soon! I heard he's a rather devious fellow, that Lucifer . . . oh, right, Lucius. Don't worry too much.
trans-unit.target: 我听说路西法很快就会对 “红杉 ”进行评论了！我听说他是个相当狡猾的家伙，那个路西法....... ... 哦，对了，路西斯。不用太担心

trans-unit.source: So, you worked on the bathhouse too? Wow, you are rather a talented person!_I dunno if I'll partake in the warm waters, but I've heard it's nice.
trans-unit.target: 这么说，澡堂也是你修的？哇，你还真是个人才啊！_我不知道是否会去泡温泉，但听说那里很不错。

trans-unit.source: Seems like Le Sequoia's reputation has grown. I hear a lot of humans and androids alike really enjoy it._Now, just keep doing that forever and you're set!
trans-unit.target: 看来红杉的名气越来越大了。我听说很多人类和机器人都非常喜欢它！

trans-unit.source: I heard your teahouse is just awful! How exciting for you to hear that people are hating the place . . . oh, wait, I mean love it!_They love it. No hate there. Sorry, my chip got bugged again.
trans-unit.target: 我听说你的茶馆很糟糕！哦，等等，我是说喜欢！_他们喜欢。没有讨厌。对不起，我的芯片又被窃听了。

trans-unit.source: You have been running aroundddddd, around here like a rabbit helping people! GO RABBIT GO!
trans-unit.target: 你就像一只兔子，在这里跑来跑去，帮助别人！兔子加油

trans-unit.source: I see you answering those help ads. Keep making good happen, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我看到你在回复那些求助广告。继续创造美好，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Your menu is creating quite the stir. Sounds fantastic! I really your focus on making good beverages.
trans-unit.target: 你的菜单引起了不小的轰动。听起来太棒了！我真的很喜欢你专注于制作美味的饮料。

trans-unit.source: I was serving a couple the other day and they wouldn't stop talking about the fantastic beverages you have on your menu. Good job!
trans-unit.target: 前几天我招待了一对夫妇，他们一直在谈论你们菜单上的美味饮料。干得好

trans-unit.source: Your menu is creating quite the stir. Personally, I'm not a big fan of what you are serving._If you serve more beverages, I might come give it a go!
trans-unit.target: 你们的菜单引起了不小的轰动。如果你们提供更多的饮料，我可能会去试试！

trans-unit.source: I'm really not a big fan of your pastry heavy menu (playername). All the flour . . . it's just really bad for my system. I really can't eat at your restaurant right now.
trans-unit.target: 我真的不太喜欢你的糕点类菜单(playername)。所有的面粉......对我的身体不好。我现在真的不能去你们餐厅吃饭。

trans-unit.source: I'm glad you're respecting the environment of Bash Hash Tumber . . . I mean, White Ash Harbor!
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴你们尊重巴什-哈什-坦伯的环境. . 我是说白灰港

trans-unit.source: I may be artifical, a product of a manufacturing process, but I appreciate the effort have taken to preserving the nature here.
trans-unit.target: 我可能是人造的，是生产过程中的产物，但我很感激你们为保护这里的自然所做的努力。

trans-unit.source: LELSH has brought a lot of cool goodies to this town, but the environment here has been impacted._Please try to help us preserve this place (playername)!
trans-unit.target: LELSH 给这个小镇带来了很多很酷的东西，但这里的环境也受到了影响。_请尽量帮助我们保护这个地方(playername)！

trans-unit.source: I was once considered trash, (playername)._I hated that at one point I made this world just a bit worse than it was already, and here you are making more waste._I . . . I am disappointed in you. You are acting exactly like LELSH!
trans-unit.target: 我曾经被认为是垃圾，(playername)。_我讨厌我一度让这个世界变得比原来更糟糕，而你却在这里制造更多的垃圾。_我对你很失望。你的行为和莱尔希一模一样！

trans-unit.source: The new recipe that you helped me make has been a hit! It's lovely. Thank you again for the help!
trans-unit.target: 你帮我做的新食谱很受欢迎！太好吃了。再次感谢您的帮助！

trans-unit.source: I wondered what else we might be able to make together? Jam? A new kind of butter? Who knows!
trans-unit.target: 我想知道我们还能一起做些什么？果酱？一种新的黄油？谁知道呢？

trans-unit.source: I think that new drink isn't just going to be a special anymore. I think I'm going to add it to the menu!
trans-unit.target: 我觉得这种新饮料不再只是特饮了。我想我要把它加入菜单！

trans-unit.source: I really didn't expect that my core would fail like that. If it wasn't for my . . .. family, I'd be in the garbage again!
trans-unit.target: 我真没想到我的核心会这样失败。如果不是我的......家人，我早就又被扔进垃圾桶了！

trans-unit.source: I talked to Aloys the other day, I mentioned how I would've been in the garbage, and he yelled at me._Said that would never happen. I am glad to have you all in my life.
trans-unit.target: 前几天我和阿洛伊斯聊天，我提到了我会被扔进垃圾桶，他对我大吼大叫。我很高兴有你们在我的生活中。

trans-unit.source: I do miss my studder. It seems the restart fixed that line of code. At least I haven't lost my love for random facts._Case in point, did you know that the Titanic's hull was brittle because it was made out of cheap steel?
trans-unit.target: 我真的很想念我的 studder。看来重启修复了那行代码。至少我还没有失去对随机事实的热爱。_举个例子，你知道泰坦尼克号的船体之所以易碎，是因为它是由廉价钢材制成的吗？

trans-unit.source: I always look this way. I can't look any other way.
trans-unit.target: 我总是往这边看。我不能再往其他方向看了。

trans-unit.source: I dunno why I wear them, maybe to fit in? Eh, they're optional, but thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道为什么要戴，也许是为了合群？可有可无，不过还是谢谢你。

trans-unit.source: I have been working pretty hard on that, so thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我一直在为此努力，所以谢谢你。

trans-unit.source: Boba is an odd substance that I hope to master one day.
trans-unit.target: 波巴是一种奇怪的物质，我希望有一天能掌握它。

trans-unit.source: Words of encouragement are helpful, they're made of nothing, but are still helpful.
trans-unit.target: 鼓励的话语很有帮助，它们虽无中生有，但仍然很有帮助。

trans-unit.source: If you could do that for me, I would hate you forever . . . I mean, appreciate it.
trans-unit.target: 如果你能为我这么做，我会恨你一辈子. . 我是说，感激你

trans-unit.source: My brain's got it covered!
trans-unit.target: 我的大脑已经搞定了

trans-unit.source: I could do something with this . . . I think.
trans-unit.target: 我可以用这个做点什么. 我觉得

trans-unit.source: Ah, good thinking (playername). I can use this in my teas!
trans-unit.target: 啊，好主意(playername)。我可以把它用在我的茶里！

trans-unit.source: You are the best. This will be a great ingredient for tonight's brew.
trans-unit.target: 你是最棒的 这将是今晚酿酒的好材料。

trans-unit.source: Woah wow! (playername) you are rich! I . . . I will take this if you insist. Boba, say thank you to (playername).
trans-unit.target: 哇哇！(playername)你真有钱！I . . . 如果你坚持，我就收下这个 波巴，向(playername)说声谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Wow I totally forgot it's my birthday! Boba, why didn't you remind me?_(playername), I will cherish this gift forever.
trans-unit.target: 哇，我完全忘了今天是我的生日！波巴，你为什么不提醒我？_(playername)，我会永远珍惜这份礼物的。

trans-unit.source: I can't do anything with this . . . no.
trans-unit.target: 我不能用这个做任何事.........不。

trans-unit.source: Am I supposed to put this in my tea? I don't think it will work (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我应该把这个放进茶里吗？我觉得这行不通(playername)。

trans-unit.source: I don't think this will create a good flavor profile for my bubble teas. Not at all!
trans-unit.target: 我不认为这会为我的泡泡茶带来好的风味。完全不会！

trans-unit.source: Thanks, but you've already given me something today.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，但你今天已经给了我一些东西。

trans-unit.source: Oh, is this what a hug is? Yours is rather, strange.
trans-unit.target: 哦，这就是拥抱吗？你的拥抱很奇怪

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I'm a bit busy today.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我今天有点忙。

trans-unit.source: Sells bubble teas, milk
trans-unit.target: 出售泡沫红茶、牛奶

trans-unit.source: Hello! Welcome to Bubble Shack. What can I get for you?
trans-unit.target: 您好 欢迎来到泡泡小屋 需要点什么？

trans-unit.source: What can I get for you?
trans-unit.target: 您需要什么？

trans-unit.source: Hi! What would you like to order today?
trans-unit.target: 您好！今天想订购什么？

trans-unit.source: Our specials today are humans, I mean, blueberry boba blasts!
trans-unit.target: 我们今天的特餐是人类，我是说蓝莓波霸！

trans-unit.source: You won't find another Bubble Shack in town!
trans-unit.target: 在这里，你再也找不到第二家 Bubble Shack 了！

trans-unit.source: That is my favorite!
trans-unit.target: 这是我的最爱！

trans-unit.source: Great flavor and texture, so I've been told.
trans-unit.target: 据说味道和口感都很棒。

trans-unit.source: Way to bubble that up! Get it. Instead of grab. Yeah!
trans-unit.target: 泡起来的方式！抓住它 而不是抓 没错 Yeah！

trans-unit.source: I can blend this up!
trans-unit.target: 我可以把它混合起来！

trans-unit.source: I might need some of these.
trans-unit.target: 我可能需要一些这个。

trans-unit.source: Hmm, don't see too many of these, I'll take it.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，这些东西不多，我买了。

trans-unit.source: People will not drink that, no thank you.
trans-unit.target: 人们不会喝的，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: I really think that is amazing, but I do not need it.
trans-unit.target: 我真的觉得这很神奇，但我并不需要它。

trans-unit.source: I cannot buy this item.
trans-unit.target: 我不能买这个东西。

trans-unit.source: You are too poor to buy this, but next time you might not be!
trans-unit.target: 你太穷了，买不起这个，但下次你可能就买不起了！

trans-unit.source: I wish you could afford this, but you cannot.
trans-unit.target: 我希望你能买得起，但你买不起。

trans-unit.source: If you had more credits then you could buy this, but you do not.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有更多的信用点数，你就可以买这个，但你没有。

trans-unit.source: A new face! Welcome to White Ash Harbor! I hope you find our community welcoming and your stay enjoyable.
trans-unit.target: 新面孔 欢迎来到白灰港！希望您能感受到我们社区的热情好客，并在此度过愉快的时光。

trans-unit.source: Both the spirits I sell and the spirit within me are BOLD!
trans-unit.target: 我出售的精神和我内心的精神都是大胆的！

trans-unit.source: I see you've noticed my excellent physique. BEHOLD the power of my DELTS!
trans-unit.target: 看来你们已经注意到了我出色的体格。请相信我的 DELTS 的力量！

trans-unit.source: The trick to these gains is not drinking heavily. Moderation in all things, except in the gym, where you should go big!
trans-unit.target: 取得这些成绩的诀窍在于不酗酒。凡事都要适度，健身房除外，在那里你应该大干一场！

trans-unit.source: If you think I'm loud, you should meet my wife and six kids! Hahaha!
trans-unit.target: 如果你觉得我很吵，那你应该见见我的妻子和六个孩子！哈哈哈！

trans-unit.source: I lift and throw my children when we're at East Beach._I build the sand around them and make them mermaids and power lifters. East Beach is the best beach.
trans-unit.target: 当我们在东海滩时，我把孩子们举起来扔出去。_我在他们周围堆沙子，让他们成为美人鱼和举重运动员。东海滩是最好的海滩

trans-unit.source: Bea and I have been together for quite some time. Our lives are like our bodies, strengthened by love and powered by kindness, haha!_Tell me, do you have a partner in life?
trans-unit.target: 碧和我在一起已经有一段时间了。我们的生活就像我们的身体，因爱而强壮，因善良而有力，哈哈！_告诉我，你有人生伴侣吗？

trans-unit.source: No.
trans-unit.target: 不

trans-unit.source: I'm hoping one day.
trans-unit.target: 我希望有一天

trans-unit.source: Not everyone needs to be in a relationship. If you have enough love for yourself, then you are set._Loving oneself isn't selfish and is needed. Bea and I both believe that.
trans-unit.target: 不是每个人都需要恋爱。如果你对自己有足够的爱，那么你就可以了。_爱自己并不自私，而且是需要的。碧和我都相信这一点。

trans-unit.source: If you keep an open mind, someone will walk in, just be careful who you let in through that door._Remember to love yourself first, it's what attracts people to you.
trans-unit.target: 如果你保持开放的心态，就会有人走进来，只是要小心让谁走进那扇门。_记住首先要爱自己，这是你吸引别人的地方。

trans-unit.source: I love body building, but my family is always first. I love taking my kids around on hikes or to the playground.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢健美，但家庭永远是第一位的。我喜欢带孩子们去远足或游乐场。

trans-unit.source: Without family, I would only be able to bench press 250 pounds, as my heart would only be half as strong.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有家人，我只能卧推 250 磅，因为我的心脏只有一半强壮。

trans-unit.source: Bea and I share responsibilities when it comes to our lives. It's what makes great partnerships last.
trans-unit.target: 碧和我在生活中共同承担责任。这样的合作关系才能长久。

trans-unit.source: Now, I'm going to hit the gym. Need to keep my knees in shape. NEVER SKIP LEG DAY!
trans-unit.target: 现在，我要去健身房了。得让我的膝盖保持好状态。永远不要跳过腿部锻炼日！

trans-unit.source: Our library is the best not only because my kids can stay there when Bea and I are busy, but the books inside train the mind to grow big and strong!_Libraries are the best!
trans-unit.target: 我们的图书馆是最好的，不仅因为我和碧忙的时候孩子们可以呆在那里，而且里面的书可以锻炼孩子的心智，让他们长得又大又壮！_图书馆是最好的！

trans-unit.source: Behold (playername), my power has grown by completing my gains on this day!_Haha! Would you ever wish to attend a gym with me?
trans-unit.target: 看哪(playername)，我在这一天完成了我的收获，我的力量得到了增长！哈哈！你愿意和我一起去健身房吗？

trans-unit.source: No.
trans-unit.target: 不

trans-unit.source: I eat enough, so sure.
trans-unit.target: 我吃得够多了，当然。

trans-unit.source: Why not?! Gains are what will give your the strength equal to the tree that your restaurant is named after!
trans-unit.target: 为什么不呢？收益会给你带来与你的餐厅命名的那棵树一样的力量！

trans-unit.source: Macaroni and cheese this is excellent! We will go after my shift today! SPOTTING BUDDIES!
trans-unit.target: 奶酪通心粉太棒了 今天我下班后我们就去 发现朋友

trans-unit.source: Just because I care about my physique, doesn't mean that I shy away from carbs, in fact, I enjoy them.
trans-unit.target: 我关心自己的体质，但这并不意味着我对碳水化合物敬而远之，事实上，我很喜欢碳水化合物。

trans-unit.source: When I am gearing up for a body building competition, I have to cut back on carbs so I can get that 'formed from marble by the world's greatest sculptor' look.
trans-unit.target: 当我在为健美比赛做准备时，我必须减少碳水化合物的摄入量，这样才能让自己看起来像 “世界上最伟大的雕塑家用大理石塑造出来的”。

trans-unit.source: These days I am focused more on power lifting, because then everything I eat is fuel for the machine that is my body!
trans-unit.target: 如今，我更专注于力量举重，因为这样一来，我吃的所有东西都是我身体这台机器的燃料！

trans-unit.source: Let's face facts, if I'm eating chicken and rice all the time then I am not living a life worth living. Haha!
trans-unit.target: 让我们面对现实吧，如果我总是吃鸡肉和米饭，那我就活得不值了。哈哈！

trans-unit.source: Bea and I will eat your food very soon! Our muscles cannot wait to be fed by the goodies you serve!
trans-unit.target: Bea 和我很快就会吃到你们的食物！我们的肌肉已经迫不及待地想吃你们的美食了！

trans-unit.source: Let me tell you my greatest dream, (playername). Do you wish to hear it?
trans-unit.target: 让我告诉你我最伟大的梦想，(playername)。你想听吗？

trans-unit.source: I can't right now, later?
trans-unit.target: 现在不行，以后呢？

trans-unit.source: Sure! What is it, Aime?
trans-unit.target: 当然 Sure！怎么了，艾梅？

trans-unit.source: Oh . . . well then, let us discuss other matters!
trans-unit.target: 哦......那好吧，让我们讨论其他事情！

trans-unit.source: That my children become great Olympians! Power lifters, the lot of them!
trans-unit.target: 让我的孩子们成为伟大的奥林匹克运动员！举重运动员

trans-unit.source: As a father, I want only the best for my kids and I want them to achieve their dreams!
trans-unit.target: 作为父亲，我只想给孩子们最好的，我希望他们能实现自己的梦想！

trans-unit.source: Nacim and I are of one mind in that our children should be allowed to go for their dreams. He is a fantastic father to his kids!_Even though he doesn't display his strength on the outside like me, his soul is made of the strongest stone known to man.
trans-unit.target: 纳西姆和我的想法一致，都认为应该让孩子们去追求自己的梦想。他是孩子们的好父亲！_尽管他不像我一样在外表上展示自己的力量，但他的灵魂是由人类已知的最坚固的石头构成的。

trans-unit.source: To be a father is to be a whole man, and I do not mean simply the act of creating a child, but also raising them._Making kids is so easy it can happen by accident. Bea and I have six kids. It's a wonder our insurance provider hasn't dropped us yet.
trans-unit.target: 做父亲就是做一个完整的人，我指的不仅仅是创造一个孩子，还要抚养他们。碧和我有六个孩子。我们的保险公司居然还没放弃我们，真是个奇迹。

trans-unit.source: We never intended to have kids, but when we got them, we saw that we were damn good parents because we were in this together._My family's laughter and joy makes me lift six times harder each day.
trans-unit.target: 我们从未想过要孩子，但当我们有了孩子后，我们发现我们是很好的父母，因为我们是一起的。

trans-unit.source: If you want an example of a person's spirit not matching their exterior, talk to Pomarine._She is ANCIENT but moves just as fast as any 20-something. She is an amazing woman.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想知道一个人的精神与外表不符的例子，那就去和波玛琳谈谈吧！_她是个老古董，但行动却和 20 多岁的人一样快。她是一个了不起的女人。

trans-unit.source: Have you ever watched a film noir movie?
trans-unit.target: 你看过黑色电影吗？

trans-unit.source: You watch movies? I . . . I am surprised.
trans-unit.target: 你看电影？I . . . 我很惊讶

trans-unit.source: I have not, what is a film noir?
trans-unit.target: 我没有，什么是黑色电影？

trans-unit.source: I am a man of many passions! The arts are not excluded from my realm of interests._I have seen many moving pictures and find the depths that they explode speak to my soul!
trans-unit.target: 我是一个充满激情的人！我看过很多电影，它们所迸发出的深邃光芒直击我的灵魂！

trans-unit.source: What is . . . FILM NOIR?! Only one of the greatest art movements in film! Creating dark shadows with lighting, the genre explores the darkness that lies inside of us all as we struggle against a world that is uncaring and cruel!
trans-unit.target: 什么是 . . . 黑色电影？它是电影界最伟大的艺术运动之一！黑色电影通过灯光营造黑暗的阴影，探索我们每个人内心深处的黑暗，与这个无情而残酷的世界抗争！

trans-unit.source: Here are some film noirs to watch! Out of the Past, Double Indemnity, and Sunset Boulevard._Neo noirs you should also watch are Chinatown, The Long Goodbye, and Oldboy (The original, not the remake)! FANTASTIC MOVIES!
trans-unit.target: 这里有一些黑色电影值得一看！《走出过去》、《双重赔偿》和《日落大道》。_你还应该看的新黑色电影有《唐人街》、《漫长的告别》和《老男孩》(The original, not the remake)！很棒的电影！

trans-unit.source: Rituals are an odd thing. I will use the same machine and weights because they feel special to me._I cannot tell you why, but they feel right in my hands. A man at the gym will use the same treadmill out of five. Every. Time!
trans-unit.target: 仪式是一种奇怪的东西。我会使用同样的器械和重量，因为我觉得它们很特别。一个人在健身房会使用五台跑步机中的同一台。每一次 每次

trans-unit.source: Bea and I are . . . good. I feel there is something between us, but it might just be my imagination. She hasn't told me otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 碧和我......很好。我觉得我们之间有些什么，但可能只是我的想象。她并没有告诉我别的。

trans-unit.source: Futures are always away from us, (playername). We must try to reach out and grab it from time to time!_Otherwise, we will fall victim to the cruel fate it has in store for us.
trans-unit.target: 未来总是离我们很远，(playername)。我们必须时不时地伸出手去抓住它！_否则，我们就会成为它为我们准备的残酷命运的牺牲品。

trans-unit.source: I want to tell you something: I am glad you are here in White Ash Harbor._Without you, our town would've remained a couch potato. Sad. Never lifiting. I shudder at the thought.
trans-unit.target: 我想告诉你：我很高兴你来到了白灰港。悲哀 永无生机 一想到这我就不寒而栗

trans-unit.source: When Bea left, I thought I would never love again. Like abandoning a lift mid movement, my heart was crushed. You are my spotter._My gym buddy. Because of you, I see a future that is full of gains to be had. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 碧离开的时候，我以为自己再也不会爱了。就像中途放弃升降机一样，我的心碎了。你是我的观察者，我的健身伙伴。因为你，我看到了充满收获的未来。谢谢你

trans-unit.source: I will spot you any day.
trans-unit.target: 我随时都能发现你。

trans-unit.source: I don't understand, but I will one day.
trans-unit.target: 我不明白，但总有一天我会明白的。

trans-unit.source: And I to you. . . NOW LET US HUG!
trans-unit.target: 我对你. . . 现在让我们拥抱

trans-unit.source: And I too will understand your cooking world one day. NOW LET US HUG!
trans-unit.target: 总有一天，我也会理解你的烹饪世界。现在，让我们拥抱！

trans-unit.source: Loving is effortless, and like a powerful squat, I feel the power of our love overcome the tiredness of the world around us every time we hold hands.
trans-unit.target: 爱是毫不费力的，就像一个有力的深蹲，每次我们牵手，我都能感受到我们爱的力量战胜了周围世界的疲惫。

trans-unit.source: My kids will grow to like you, perhaps love you, but that is not a requirement._I know them, these things will take time, but like mastering a new smoothie recipe, it's worth doing.
trans-unit.target: 我了解他们，这些事情需要时间，但就像掌握一种新的冰沙食谱一样，值得一试。

trans-unit.source: SOMETIMES I JUST WANT TO THROW YOU INTO THE SKY WITH ALL OF MY MIGHT I LOVE YOU SO!_I would never throw you too high, because I want you here by my side.
trans-unit.target: 有时候，我真想用尽全力把你抛向天空，我是如此爱你！_我绝不会把你抛得太高，因为我希望你在我身边。

trans-unit.source: My days can go up and down. I saw Bea today, she seems happy. I hope she is, but her life isn't mine to worry about anymore. It never was._I have my choices, she hers, and that's okay now. Like weeks of training a muscle group, I see that now.
trans-unit.target: 我的日子时好时坏。我今天见到了碧，她看起来很开心。我希望她快乐，但她的生活不再由我操心了。我有我的选择，她有她的选择，现在没关系了。就像几周的肌肉训练一样 我现在明白了

trans-unit.source: You don't start off as ripped as I am. It's years of training, dedication, and love._Our relationship has a good start, but I will be there everyday to help it grow. And I know you will too.
trans-unit.target: 你不可能一开始就像我一样健美。我们的关系有一个良好的开端，但我会每天都在那里帮助它成长。我知道你也会的

trans-unit.source: It is my understanding that your restaurant is now open . . . I AM SO HAPPY FOR YOU! Allow me to flex with joy for your achievement!
trans-unit.target: 据我所知，你们的餐厅已经开业了. 我真为您感到高兴！请允许我为您的成就感到高兴！

trans-unit.source: The words of others can lift us up or crush us._Words matter and that is why you must hear mine: KEEP DOING YOU! BECAUSE THERE IS ONLY ONE YOU! GO!
trans-unit.target: 别人的话可以让我们振作，也可以让我们崩溃： 继续做你自己 因为只有一个你！走吧！

trans-unit.source: Hearing the bathhouse is now open again makes muscles sing!_For too long have they screamed for relaxation after a long day of lifting weights, children, and inventory. NOW THEY CAN REST!
trans-unit.target: 听说澡堂又开张了，肌肉不由自主地欢呼起来！_长久以来，在经过一天的举重、带孩子和盘点之后，他们一直在呼唤放松。现在它们可以休息了！

trans-unit.source: I have heard your restaurant is doing well! THIS IS FANTASTIC NEWS! KEEP GOING!
trans-unit.target: 我听说你的餐厅生意不错！这真是个好消息！继续努力！

trans-unit.source: I heard that you are also responsible for the success of the tea house in the bathhouse._WHAT CAN'T YOU DO?! YOU ARE A WONDERFUL BEING! KEEP IT GOING!
trans-unit.target: 我听说澡堂茶馆的成功也是你的功劳！你是个了不起的人！继续努力！

trans-unit.source: YOUR HEART IS AS BIG AS MY BICEPS FROM ALL THE HELP YOU HAVE BEEN GIVING!
trans-unit.target: 你的心和我的肱二头肌一样大，因为你一直在帮助我！

trans-unit.source: You are lifting our community up with each act of kindness. IT'S BEAUTIFUL TO SEE!
trans-unit.target: 你们的每一个善举都在提升我们的社区。你们的善举让我们的社区变得更加美好！

trans-unit.source: Your menu brings joy to my heart! I WILL CONSUME WHAT IT HOLDS!
trans-unit.target: 您的菜单给我带来了欢乐！我将尽情享用！

trans-unit.source: I have enjoyed all that your menu has to offer!
trans-unit.target: 我很喜欢你们菜单上的所有内容！

trans-unit.source: Your menu . . . I heard about it. It requires more for me to want to eat from it.
trans-unit.target: 您的菜单 . . . 我听说过 我想吃的东西还需要更多。

trans-unit.source: I cannot, will not, eat from your menu. My body is a temple, not a dump.
trans-unit.target: 我不能吃，也不会吃你菜单上的东西。我的身体是圣殿，不是垃圾场。

trans-unit.source: Keeping our air and waterways clear of trash while improving White Ash Harbor is important for my kids. THANK YOU!
trans-unit.target: 让我们的空气和水道远离垃圾，同时改善白灰港，这对我的孩子们来说非常重要。谢谢！

trans-unit.source: The future is nature and us working together like my muscles and a weight. TOGETHER, NOTHING CAN STOP THEM!
trans-unit.target: 未来是大自然和我们共同努力的结果，就像我的肌肉和重量。在一起，没有什么能阻止它们！

trans-unit.source: Progress is important, but not at the cost of our local environment. It's like cutting carbs from your diet._YOUR BRAIN NEEDS CARBS OR IT WILL DIE! As will us all if we lose our nature to trash.
trans-unit.target: 进步固然重要，但不能以破坏当地环境为代价。这就像从你的饮食中减少碳水化合物一样！如果我们的大自然被垃圾毁掉，我们所有人都会死。

trans-unit.source: My children's future depends on this place not being a landfill. TRY HARDER TO NOT HAVE IT BE A LANDFILL!
trans-unit.target: 我的孩子们的未来取决于这个地方是不是一个垃圾填埋场。努力不让它成为垃圾填埋场！

trans-unit.source: My muscles are growing and my body thanks you for finding that super drink! I could not have earned these gains without it.
trans-unit.target: 我的肌肉在增长，我的身体感谢你找到了这种超级饮料！没有它，我不可能有这些收获。

trans-unit.source: If my muscles grow, if I take the body building championship, will that fix what I feel is broken between Bea and myself? MORE LIFTING IS REQUIRED!
trans-unit.target: 如果我的肌肉长出来了，如果我拿了健美冠军，这就能解决我和碧之间的问题吗？需要更多的锻炼

trans-unit.source: After entering a meditative state via my gains, I think I might have the solution to my woes. But more military presses are required to iron out the details.
trans-unit.target: 在通过收益进入冥想状态后，我想我可能找到了解决困境的办法。不过，还需要更多的军事压力来解决细节问题。

trans-unit.source: Being married, it is a title, but so much more. I feel the connection between us has grown stronger! THANK YOU AGAIN FOR YOUR ASSISTANCE!
trans-unit.target: 结婚后，这是一个头衔，但又多了很多。我觉得我们之间的联系越来越紧密了！再次感谢您的帮助！

trans-unit.source: The bond between my family and I feels stronger than ever. I wouldn't have married Bea if it weren't for your protein drink!
trans-unit.target: 我和家人之间的联系比以往任何时候都更加紧密。要不是你的蛋白饮料，我也不会和碧结婚！

trans-unit.source: Some secrets live in our hearts forever. Bea and I, even now being man and wife, will harbor thoughts that the other will never hear._We love one another, but I wish . . . MORE GAINS ARE NEEDED!
trans-unit.target: 有些秘密永远活在我们心中。碧和我，即使现在已经成为夫妻，也会怀有对方永远不会听到的想法。_我们彼此相爱，但我希望. 需要更多的收获！

trans-unit.source: While my looks are stunning, I feel you may have forgotten to mention my jawline. It's okay.
trans-unit.target: 虽然我的外貌令人惊叹，但我觉得你可能忘了提到我的下巴线条。没关系。

trans-unit.source: I would rather my perfect physique be seen by all, but laws dictate that I must cover it.
trans-unit.target: 我宁愿让所有人看到我完美的体型，但法律规定我必须遮住它。

trans-unit.source: My mind has been sharpened so much it's practically smoothed over.
trans-unit.target: 我的心智得到了极大的磨砺，几乎变得平滑。

trans-unit.source: This is a job to pay my bills. My life is lifting
trans-unit.target: 这是一份支付账单的工作。我的生活在提升

trans-unit.source: You should see me deadlift. It is a sight to behold.
trans-unit.target: 你应该看看我举重的样子。那可真是美不胜收。

trans-unit.source: I am giving my arms the day off today. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 今天我给我的手臂放假一天。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: I must get my gains in! No thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我必须把我的收益拿回来！不用了，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: I'll use this during my workout.
trans-unit.target: 我会在锻炼时使用它。

trans-unit.source: I feel POWERFUL!!! Yes, that's great (playername). Bring me MORE!
trans-unit.target: 我觉得自己很强大！！！是的，太棒了(playername)。给我带来更多！

trans-unit.source: Thank you (playername). This is great. I feel like working out now. Do you feel like working out?
trans-unit.target: 谢谢您(playername)。这太棒了。我现在想健身了。你想锻炼吗？

trans-unit.source: Whew, I'm not sure I can take this (playername). But if you insist . . .
trans-unit.target: 呼，我不确定我能接受这个(playername)。但如果你坚持 . . .

trans-unit.source: Woah, this is a fantastic birthday gift! I'm one year older, which means I will become even more POWERFUL!
trans-unit.target: 哇，这真是一份神奇的生日礼物！我又长大了一岁，这意味着我将变得更加强大！

trans-unit.source: If I it doesn't make me more powerful, then I do not need it.
trans-unit.target: 如果它不能让我变得更强大，那我就不需要它。

trans-unit.source: I don't really need this. Now if you will excuse me, my muscles have work to do!
trans-unit.target: 我真的不需要这个。恕我失陪，我的肌肉还有事要做！

trans-unit.source: What am I supposed to do with this? Am I supposed to lift this?
trans-unit.target: 我该怎么处理这个？我应该举起它吗？

trans-unit.source: Thanks, but you've already given me something today.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，但你今天已经给了我一些东西。

trans-unit.source: I cannot hug you back for I fear I would break you.
trans-unit.target: 我不能回抱你，因为我怕会弄伤你。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I'm a bit busy today.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我今天有点忙。

trans-unit.source: Sells alcohol, cocktails, wines
trans-unit.target: 销售酒类、鸡尾酒和葡萄酒

trans-unit.source: Welcome to Bea's Bar, what kind of spirit can I interest you in today?
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到 Bea's 酒吧，今天有什么能让您感兴趣的？

trans-unit.source: You will never find a better collection of spirits in all of White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 在白灰港，您再也找不到比这里更好的烈酒了。

trans-unit.source: These spirits are almost as strong as me!
trans-unit.target: 这些灵魂几乎和我一样强大！

trans-unit.source: If you can do more push ups than me, I'll give you 40% off your first purchase!
trans-unit.target: 如果你能比我做更多的俯卧撑，我将为你的首次购物提供 40% 的折扣！

trans-unit.source: Bea's Bar is the premiere liquor store in all of White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: Bea's Bar 是白灰港首屈一指的酒类专卖店。

trans-unit.source: The perfect bottle to do curls with.
trans-unit.target: 用它来烫卷发再合适不过了。

trans-unit.source: I'm glad you like it!
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴你喜欢它！

trans-unit.source: A great reward for yourself!
trans-unit.target: 这是对自己的最好奖励！

trans-unit.source: Ooo, a rare vintage!
trans-unit.target: 哦，难得的佳酿！

trans-unit.source: I haven't seen this bottle before!
trans-unit.target: 我以前从没见过这个瓶子！

trans-unit.source: Look how old it is, I'll buy it!
trans-unit.target: 看看它有多老，我就买了！

trans-unit.source: This is . . . well, not for Bea's Bar.
trans-unit.target: 这......嗯，不适合 Bea's 酒吧。

trans-unit.source: No one should lift this, not even for the gains.
trans-unit.target: 没有人应该举起这个，即使是为了收益。

trans-unit.source: If you can do 2000 push ups, I'd take that instead of the money you don't have.
trans-unit.target: 如果你能做 2000 个俯卧撑，我宁愿拿这个代替你没有的钱。

trans-unit.source: Not enough credits, it seems, friend.
trans-unit.target: 看来信用点不够，朋友。

trans-unit.source: If you recycle enough bottles, you can probably afford it.
trans-unit.target: 如果你回收了足够多的瓶子，你可能就买得起了。

trans-unit.source: If you're here to sell me somethin', please don't, I'm too busy.
trans-unit.target: 如果你是来向我推销的，请不要，我太忙了。

trans-unit.source: Look, whatever you have isn't as good as what I can make, so scram.
trans-unit.target: 听着，不管你有什么都比不上我能做的，所以滚吧。

trans-unit.source: I know more than you.
trans-unit.target: 我知道的比你多。

trans-unit.source: If you're going to continue to bother me, hand me that socket wrench.
trans-unit.target: 如果你还想继续烦我 把套筒扳手递给我

trans-unit.source: I'm going to start charging you by the minute if you stand here for long enough.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在这里站够了，我就要开始按分钟收费了。

trans-unit.source: If you think I'm some sort of friendly chump like Uriel, you'd be very mistaken.
trans-unit.target: 如果你以为我像尤里尔一样是个友好的笨蛋，那你就大错特错了。
