trans-unit.source: You look like you know your way around a shop. What's your angle?
trans-unit.target: 你看起来很熟悉店里的情况 你的角度是什么？

trans-unit.source: Nothing, just trying to meet people.
trans-unit.target: 没什么，只是想认识一些人。

trans-unit.source: I've been known to dabble around with tools and such.
trans-unit.target: 众所周知，我对工具之类的东西颇有研究。

trans-unit.source: Meeting people is overrated. You want to do something worth the time? Get building.
trans-unit.target: 认识人被高估了。你想做值得花时间做的事吗？去建设吧。

trans-unit.source: Right . . . yeah, that's how people talk shop.
trans-unit.target: 是啊，人们就是这么聊天的。

trans-unit.source: Everyone has an reason to talk to anyone and it's usually self-interest that drives people to talk to one another.
trans-unit.target: 每个人都有理由与任何人交谈，而促使人们彼此交谈的通常是自身利益。

trans-unit.source: I'd prefer if you could step to the right, I'm in a hurry, and you being a wall isn't helping.
trans-unit.target: 我希望你能站到右边去，我赶时间，你这堵墙也帮不上忙。

trans-unit.source: I only talk to people when I feel like there's something to say. You're in my way again, move.
trans-unit.target: 我只在有话要说的时候才和别人说话 你又挡住我的路了 让开

trans-unit.source: . . . Look, I'm pretty tired and it's been a long day._Maybe talk to me tomorrow after I've had some vod . . . ah . . . I mean coffee.
trans-unit.target: . . . 听着，我已经很累了，而且今天也很累，明天等我喝完伏特加再跟我说吧。我是说咖啡

trans-unit.source: Be careful with yourself. If you show too much competence, people won't leave you alone.
trans-unit.target: 小心对待自己。如果你表现得太能干，别人就不会放过你。

trans-unit.source: Have you talked to Aloys?
trans-unit.target: 你和阿洛伊丝谈过吗？

trans-unit.source: Yeah, we just did some fishing not too long ago.
trans-unit.target: 是啊，我们不久前刚钓过鱼。

trans-unit.source: Who is Aloys?
trans-unit.target: 阿洛伊斯是谁？

trans-unit.source: That guy knows his stuff in terms of robotics and cognitive A.i. development._One of the sharpest minds in White Ash Harbor and he's netting for shrimp.
trans-unit.target: 他是白灰港最聪明的人之一，他正在捕虾。

trans-unit.source: I am looking to expand my business and you need some cooks in your kitchen, right?_I have some thoughts, but I'm not ready to talk about them just yet. Let's chat tomorrow.
trans-unit.target: 我想扩大我的业务，你的厨房需要一些厨师，对吗？_我有一些想法，但还没准备好说出来。我们明天再聊吧。

trans-unit.source: I can build you the most advanced food prep technology available. Sous vide?_Forget about it! I'm talking fully programmed cooks that will make anything you put in front of them! Imagine the profit margines of not having to pay cooks!
trans-unit.target: 我可以为你打造最先进的食物烹饪技术。Sous vide？我说的是完全编程的厨师，他们能做出你放在他们面前的任何东西！想象一下，如果不用付钱给厨师，利润会有多大！

trans-unit.source: I don't try to think about other people's problems too much because I can't fix them. I've tried in the past and I'm done now.
trans-unit.target: 我不会过多地考虑别人的问题，因为我无法解决他们的问题。过去我试过，现在已经不试了。

trans-unit.source: Humans are faulty and need to sleep. There are other problems with their OS, but I'm too tired to list them right now.
trans-unit.target: 人类是有缺陷的，需要睡眠。他们的操作系统还有其他问题，但我现在太累了，无法一一列举。

trans-unit.source: If you want to go on one of the best walks around here, check out the Lonely Cliffs. It's my go-to spot.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想在这里进行一次最棒的徒步旅行，不妨去孤崖看看。这是我的必去之地。

trans-unit.source: Have you thought about my proposal of automating your cook staff?
trans-unit.target: 你考虑过我提出的让厨师自动化的建议吗？

trans-unit.source: I can't ignore how it will help with my overhead
trans-unit.target: 我不能忽视它对我的管理费用的帮助

trans-unit.source: Yes, and I find it morally repugnant. Pass.
trans-unit.target: 是的，我认为这在道德上是令人厌恶的。通过。

trans-unit.source: I'll get cranking on the prototypes!
trans-unit.target: 我会开始制作原型！

trans-unit.source: Hey, look, I was just thinking it might help. Sorry for trying to help!
trans-unit.target: 嘿，听着，我只是觉得这可能会有帮助。对不起，我只是想帮忙

trans-unit.source: I always found that unless you're innovating you're standing still. And it's easy to get knocked down when you're not moving.
trans-unit.target: 我总是发现，除非你在创新，否则你就是在原地踏步。而不动就很容易被击倒。

trans-unit.source: School showed me that I was wasting my time._I could already make things with my hands, so why not get to the doing rather than the studying? I opened this place and haven't looked back.
trans-unit.target: 学校告诉我，我在浪费时间。_我已经可以用双手制作东西了，为什么不去做而不是学习呢？我开了这家店，从此一发不可收拾。

trans-unit.source: My business has propelled me forward. And whatever helps to make my life better, I take.
trans-unit.target: 我的事业推动着我前进。只要能让我的生活更美好，我都会去做。

trans-unit.source: Aloys and Hasel are my closest friends. I don't do much for most people in this world, but for them I would._Maybe you've made that list too.
trans-unit.target: 阿洛伊斯和哈塞尔是我最亲密的朋友。在这个世界上，我不会为大多数人做什么，但为了他们，我愿意。

trans-unit.source: You have a lot going on. The only difference is you are actually doing something about it rather than waiting for something to happen._Too many people do that second bit but not the first.
trans-unit.target: 你有很多事情要做。唯一不同的是，你真正在做一些事情，而不是等待事情发生。_太多人做到了第二点，却没有做到第一点。

trans-unit.source: Do you think I'm a little too harsh at times?
trans-unit.target: 你是否觉得我有时过于苛刻？

trans-unit.source: Uh, is this a trap? I feel like this is a trap.
trans-unit.target: 这是个陷阱吗？我觉得这是个陷阱

trans-unit.source: I think you have a bit of an edge, yes.
trans-unit.target: 我觉得你有点优势，是的。

trans-unit.source: I suppose I had that coming with that question._I wasn't trying to fish for compliments or something, but I dunno, I think I want to try to be less of that to the people I care about, you know?
trans-unit.target: 我想我问这个问题是自找的，我并不是想得到赞美，但我不知道，我想我要试着对我关心的人少一点这样的态度，你知道吗？

trans-unit.source: Why you have stayed around as much as you have is bonkers to me, but here we are, being friends._Haha! I just want to make sure I'm not like that always with folks I care for.
trans-unit.target: 我真不明白你为什么一直待在这里 但我们还是做了朋友_哈哈 我只是想确保我不会总是这样对待我关心的人。

trans-unit.source: The way I grew up, I just felt like I had to keep a facade up at all times, even when I was at home._It led to a lot of fights with my Mom and Dad . . . Too many, really.
trans-unit.target: 在我的成长过程中，我觉得我必须时刻保持着一副面孔，即使在家里也是如此。. . 真的太多了

trans-unit.source: I often forget that I need to have some fun or else I'll wind up like one of the robots on my shop table._Everyone needs to remember that, for sure.
trans-unit.target: 我常常忘记，我需要找点乐子，否则我就会像商店桌子上的机器人一样完蛋。

trans-unit.source: I wish people would just be a bit more helpful._I know, this is me saying this, but frankly, maybe I wouldn't have ended up this way if that was happening already while I was growing up? Maybe.
trans-unit.target: 我希望人们能多给我一些帮助。_我知道，这是我自己说的，但坦率地说，如果在我成长的过程中已经出现了这种情况，也许我就不会落得如此下场？也许吧

trans-unit.source: I'm going to impart on you some wisdom: Wall out the public, but make a side entrance for family and friends._It's better to have a core group of friends than a massive ring of acquaintances.
trans-unit.target: 我要传授给你们一些智慧： 最好有一个核心朋友圈，而不是一个庞大的熟人圈。

trans-unit.source: If there is one person around here that has surprised me the most, it's you._I don't quite get you yet, but what I have seen has impressed me.
trans-unit.target: 如果说这里有一个人最让我感到惊讶，那就是你。_我还不太了解你，但我所看到的让我印象深刻。

trans-unit.source: Hello, (playername), how are you?
trans-unit.target: 你好，(playername)，最近好吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm good. Bianca, are you feeling okay?
trans-unit.target: 我很好 比安卡，你还好吗？

trans-unit.source: A little tired, but how are you?
trans-unit.target: 有点累，但你好吗？

trans-unit.source: Good, good, I. . . I don't really know how to act in a relationship.
trans-unit.target: 很好，很好，我. . 我真的不知道在恋爱中该怎么做。 I don't really know how to act in a relationship.

trans-unit.source: Oh, I hope that you feel better soon. . . I don't really know how to do this sort of thing.
trans-unit.target: 哦，我希望你尽快好起来。. . 我真的不知道该怎么做这种事。

trans-unit.source: I love you, like I really do, but I don't know how to be around you._Does that make sense? I am trying my best. I haven't been in too many relationships.
trans-unit.target: 我爱你，我真的爱你，但我不知道如何与你相处。我已经尽力了 我没谈过几次恋爱

trans-unit.source: I've been thinking about it, and I think I have been so used to being brash with people that I've forgotten how to be. . . kind._Thanks for not giving up on me.
trans-unit.target: 我一直在想这个问题，我想我已经习惯了对人粗暴，以至于忘记了如何做人。谢谢你没有放弃我。

trans-unit.source: I think you're rubbing off on me. The other day I gave a discount to a kid who came in to repair his autoboard, UNPROMPTED._I figured I can afford to be a little soft with some people.
trans-unit.target: 我觉得你在影响我。有一天，我给一个来修自动板的孩子打了个折，没有事先通知。

trans-unit.source: I'd like to take a break some time and go somewhere with you. The amount of work we've done, I know we've earned a break._Never would I have thought I'd utter those words, but here I am, a changed woman.
trans-unit.target: 我想休息一段时间，和你去个地方。我们已经做了这么多工作，我知道我们应该休息一下。

trans-unit.source: Wherever we go in life I don't care so long as its with you, partner._I will make sure we remain financially solvent through thick and thin. I love you.
trans-unit.target: 无论我们去哪里，我都不在乎，只要能和你在一起，我的伴侣。_我会确保我们在经济上风雨同舟。我爱你

trans-unit.source: I heard Le Sequoia is open to the public. Welcome to the stress of being a business owner.
trans-unit.target: 我听说 Le Sequoia 对公众开放。欢迎感受企业主的压力。

trans-unit.source: People's opinions do not matter, so don't let some randos make you feel good or bad. Your work speaks for you._If they cross the line, you can always throw a wrench at them. Just an idea.
trans-unit.target: 别人的意见并不重要，所以不要让一些无赖让你感觉好或坏。如果他们越界，你可以向他们扔扳手。只是一个想法。

trans-unit.source: Since you helped rebuild the bathhouse, I am wondering . . . What was the guts of that place like?!_Maybe I can sneak some peaks after a soak. Don't hold out next time, k?
trans-unit.target: 既然你帮助重建了澡堂，我很想知道......。那个地方的内脏是什么样的？下次别再憋着了，好吗？

trans-unit.source: Your restaurant is supposed to good, I hear. Good job on not sucking at your job.
trans-unit.target: 我听说你的餐厅很不错 干得不错，工作还不赖。

trans-unit.source: I've been hearing the Teahouse is great. I'll have to have check it out when I'm not face deep in circuit boards.
trans-unit.target: 我听说茶馆很棒。等我不埋头于电路板时，我一定要去看看。

trans-unit.source: You've been helping out a lot. It's starting to make SOME of us who run a business look bad._Can we pace out the selfless acts, just a bit? Okay? Thanks.
trans-unit.target: 你帮了很多忙。我们能不能把无私奉献的速度放慢一点？好吗？谢谢

trans-unit.source: Ughhh, it's nice that you've been helping out so much. I said it. Tell no one!
trans-unit.target: 唉唉，你帮了这么多忙，真好。我说过了 别告诉任何人

trans-unit.source: Oh hey, your menu is looking pretty good, the drinks are looking especially tasty. I'll have to stop by after work.
trans-unit.target: 哦，嘿，你的菜单看起来不错，饮料看起来尤其可口。我下班后一定要去看看。

trans-unit.source: The beverages you're making are really great. I've had more hangovers than usual, no thanks to you.
trans-unit.target: 你做的饮料真的很棒。我宿醉的次数比平时多，这还不是多亏了你。

trans-unit.source: Yeah, I heard about your menu. Pass._Not that it's bad, it's just not for me. Thinking of all those baked goods just makes me shudder.
trans-unit.target: 我听说了你的菜单 不是说不好 只是不适合我 一想到那些烘焙食品我就不寒而栗

trans-unit.source: Nope. I'm not eating at your place. Nope._All that gluten, I'll fall alseep before I make it home.
trans-unit.target: 不 我才不去你家吃饭 所有的麸质食品 我还没到家就会晕倒的

trans-unit.source: Do you like LELSH? Personally I don't mind them. I wouldn't have the supplies I have if they weren't here._The locals here don't like their influence here.
trans-unit.target: 您喜欢 LELSH 吗？我个人并不介意他们 如果他们不在这里，我就不会有现在的生活用品。_这里的当地人不喜欢他们在这里的影响。

trans-unit.source: Ever notice how folks won't do the right thing until they see someone else doing it first?_You're the person making us see that we need to do better. Good.
trans-unit.target: 你让我们看到，我们需要做得更好。很好。

trans-unit.source: This plays feels different since you have arrived. Is it just me, or are the lonely cliffs looking more barren than usual?
trans-unit.target: 自从你来了之后，这个剧场感觉不一样了。是我的错觉，还是寂寞的悬崖看起来比往常更荒凉？

trans-unit.source: Be careful (playername), with how you are treating this place._I'm not big on the environment, but the hills and the woods have been looking a bit barren lately.
trans-unit.target: 小心(playername)，你是如何对待这个地方的。_我不太注重环境，但最近山丘和树林看起来有点荒芜。

trans-unit.source: Keeping Sasha going is why I work as hard as I do. She is the key to making my future happen.
trans-unit.target: 让萨莎继续工作是我努力工作的原因。她是我实现未来的关键。

trans-unit.source: The work you did to keep Sasha going is appreciated, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 感谢您为萨沙的生存所做的工作，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: I cannot wait for the next step with Sasha. I have some kinks to workout, but if everything lines up, I'll be all set.
trans-unit.target: 我迫不及待地想和萨莎一起迈出下一步。我还有一些问题要解决，但如果一切顺利，我就万事大吉了。

trans-unit.source: Mom and Dad were a little pissed at me, but that didn't stop them from hugging me._Felt good to help . . .dunno if I'll do it more for others, but this felt good.
trans-unit.target: 爸爸妈妈对我有点生气，但这并不妨碍他们拥抱我。.不知道以后会不会再帮别人，但感觉很好。

trans-unit.source: Like I said, I only took what was needed, what was owed._LELSH should have more done to them, but I also do not fight giant systems that will crush you for free. Pay me, and maybe I'll help.
trans-unit.target: 我说过，我只拿需要的东西，欠下的东西。_LELSH 应该对他们做更多的事情，但我也不与会免费压垮你的巨型系统作斗争。给我钱，也许我会帮忙。

trans-unit.source: I don't know what else I'll do with the tech from Sasha._It would be a shame to leave it to rot. If some freedom fighters want help, they better come strapped with credits.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道我还能用萨莎提供的技术做什么。_让它烂掉真是可惜。如果一些自由战士需要帮助，他们最好带着信用点来。

trans-unit.source: . . . neat. Don't do that again.
trans-unit.target: . ...整洁。别再这么做了

trans-unit.source: Seriously? Not the time for that.
trans-unit.target: 真的吗？现在不是说这个的时候

trans-unit.source: It's a magnificent machine, and it's cranking right now, so please stop talking.
trans-unit.target: 这是一台宏伟的机器，现在正在运转，所以请不要再说了。

trans-unit.source: It's not finished yet, but the potential is there.
trans-unit.target: 虽然还没有完成，但潜力是存在的。

trans-unit.source: I've sailed under my own wind for a while now, so thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我已经在自己的风中航行了一段时间，所以谢谢你。

trans-unit.source: I really don't need help, but today . . . I do.
trans-unit.target: 我真的不需要帮助，但今天 . . . 我需要

trans-unit.source: Don't offer again.
trans-unit.target: 不要再提供了。

trans-unit.source: I could really use this. Like I really needed this.
trans-unit.target: 我真的需要这个。就像我真的需要这个一样。

trans-unit.source: Thank you (playername). Now if you will excuse me, I will go enjoy this. Be right back.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢(playername)。恕我失陪，我要去享受一下了。马上回来

trans-unit.source: Ah! Great stuff (playername). It's been a tough day, but this will take the edge off.
trans-unit.target: 啊！好东西(playername)。虽然今天很辛苦，但这能让我消消气。

trans-unit.source: This looks valuable, but I do not need it. But since you offered, I will take it off your hands.
trans-unit.target: 这个看起来很值钱，但我不需要。不过既然你提出来了，我就从你手里接过来吧。

trans-unit.source: Huh, I don't really celebrate birthdays . . . but thank you (playername). This means something.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，我并不庆祝生日. . .但还是要谢谢你(playername)。这意味着什么。

trans-unit.source: Why are you carrying garbage?
trans-unit.target: 你为什么带着垃圾？

trans-unit.source: I can create anything I want in my workshop. Why would I need this?
trans-unit.target: 我可以在我的工作室里创造任何我想要的东西。我为什么需要这个？

trans-unit.source: Why are you giving me this (playername)? Why?
trans-unit.target: 你为什么给我这个(playername)？为什么？

trans-unit.source: Thanks, but you've already given me something today.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，但你今天已经给了我一些东西。

trans-unit.source: No. A thousand times, no. Never again.
trans-unit.target: 不，一千次，不。再也不要

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I'm a bit busy today.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我今天有点忙。

trans-unit.source: Sells augmentations (mechanical arms, processor chips, bow aim)
trans-unit.target: 销售增强器（机械臂、处理器芯片、弓箭瞄准器）

trans-unit.source: Yeah, this is Bits n Pieces, what do you want?
trans-unit.target: 是啊，这里是 Bits n Pieces，你想要什么？

trans-unit.source: You're not here for my personality, so what can I sell you?
trans-unit.target: 你来这里不是为了我的个性，那我能卖给你什么呢？

trans-unit.source: You want something?
trans-unit.target: 你想要什么吗？

trans-unit.source: What is it that you want to buy?
trans-unit.target: 您想买什么？

trans-unit.source: That part. It's okay.
trans-unit.target: 那部分 没关系

trans-unit.source: I mean, if it works for you, go ahead.
trans-unit.target: 我的意思是，如果这对你有用，那就去吧。

trans-unit.source: Yeah, that was a rare find.
trans-unit.target: 是啊，这可是个难得的发现。

trans-unit.source: I'll buy that, sure.
trans-unit.target: 我当然会买。

trans-unit.source: I'll never know when I'll need it.
trans-unit.target: 我永远不知道什么时候会需要它。

trans-unit.source: Better to be safe than sorry, I'll buy it.
trans-unit.target: 安全总比遗憾好，我会买的。

trans-unit.source: This is garbage.
trans-unit.target: 这是垃圾。

trans-unit.source: Crap, utter crap.
trans-unit.target: 垃圾，彻头彻尾的垃圾。

trans-unit.source: Why would you sell this? It's trash.
trans-unit.target: 你为什么要卖这个？这是垃圾

trans-unit.source: . . . you have no money.
trans-unit.target: . .你没钱。

trans-unit.source: I only deal in credits. Goodbye.
trans-unit.target: 我只做信用点交易。再见。

trans-unit.source: If you can't pay in credits, then I can't be bothered.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不能用信用点付款，那我就懒得理你了。

trans-unit.source: Finally awake, are you? It took me 2 days to repair your circuitry. Be more careful next time.
trans-unit.target: 你终于醒了？我花了两天时间才修好你的电路 下次小心点

trans-unit.source: Ah you are finally awake. I found you beaten and broken by the side of the road. You were lucky this time.
trans-unit.target: 啊，你终于醒了。我在路边发现你被打得遍体鳞伤 这次算你走运

trans-unit.source: Look who's finally awake. Your power core was damaged. It took a while, but I was able to fix it up.
trans-unit.target: 看看谁终于醒了 你的动力核心损坏了 虽然花了点时间，但我还是修好了

trans-unit.source: (playername)! (playername)! Ah here we are. Glad to see you up and about. You were out for 2 days._Get some rest and please be more careful next time.
trans-unit.target: (playername)！(playername)！我们到了 很高兴看到你起来了 你昏迷了两天，好好休息，下次小心点。

trans-unit.source: Ah you are finally awake (playername). I found you beaten and broken by the side of the road. You were lucky this time.
trans-unit.target: 啊，你终于醒了(playername)。我在路边发现了被打得支离破碎的你。这次算你走运。

trans-unit.source: Finally awake, are you? It took me a whole day to fix you up. It looks like you ran out of power and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 你终于醒了？我花了一整天才把你治好 看来你是没电昏倒了

trans-unit.source: Ah you are finally awake. You overworked yourself and collapsed._Please rest early next time. I don't enjoy carrying your body all the way to my shop.
trans-unit.target: 啊，你终于醒了。下次请早点休息。我可不想一路扛着你的身体去我的店里。

trans-unit.source: Look who's finally awake. Your power core overheated. It took a day, but I was able to fix it up.
trans-unit.target: 看看谁终于醒了 你的动力核心过热了 虽然花了一天时间，但我还是修好了

trans-unit.source: (playername)! Ah here we are. Glad to see you up and about. You were out for a whole day._Get some rest and please be more careful next time.
trans-unit.target: (playername)！啊，我们到了。很高兴看到你起来了 你出去了一整天，好好休息，下次小心点。

trans-unit.source: Ah you are finally awake (playername). I found you collapsed by the side of the road. It's a good thing I was nearby and saw you.
trans-unit.target: 啊，你终于醒了(playername)。我发现你倒在路边。好在我就在附近，看到了你。

trans-unit.source: Credits is the bill for the repair.
trans-unit.target: 信用点是维修费用。

trans-unit.source: And there is also the matter of my payment. That will be
trans-unit.target: 还有我的报酬问题。那将是

trans-unit.source: The supplies needed to fix you up weren't cheap. The total cost comes to
trans-unit.target: 修理你所需的用品并不便宜。总费用为

trans-unit.source: It doesn't look like you have enough credits. So I'll just take what you have for now.
trans-unit.target: 看起来你的信用点数不够。那我就先用你的了。

trans-unit.source: Running into people only reminds me how much I miss the quiet of the forest.
trans-unit.target: 与人打交道只会让我更加怀念森林的宁静。

trans-unit.source: Hunting is something that few understand, and even fewer have attempted.
trans-unit.target: 很少有人了解狩猎，更少有人尝试过狩猎。

trans-unit.source: Meat isn't simply a product of nature, but rather a living being that once breathed and roamed the earth._Although taking its life may seem brutal, it provides sustenance and allows us to survive. It's the cycle of life. It's poetry.
trans-unit.target: 肉类并不是大自然的产物，而是曾经在地球上呼吸和游荡的生命体。这是生命的轮回。这是诗歌。

trans-unit.source: Whether it's food, life, or anything worth having, success requires effort.
trans-unit.target: 无论是食物、生活还是任何值得拥有的东西，成功都需要努力。

trans-unit.source: Hunting is affordable, keeps you healthy, and keeps the environment in check when regulated correctly.
trans-unit.target: 狩猎经济实惠，能保持身体健康，如果管理得当，还能保护环境。

trans-unit.source: I am at the library all the time. I have read almost every book in it. If you possess any brains in your head you'll read more too._And if you ever try to burn or close our library, you will find my arrows not far behind you.
trans-unit.target: 我经常去图书馆。图书馆里的书我几乎都读过。如果你想烧毁或关闭我们的图书馆，你会发现我的箭就在你身后不远处。

trans-unit.source: I want people to know what real food is. Not the stuff in the freezer, but out here in the wild._Food should have lived before it is eaten, am I right?
trans-unit.target: 我想让人们知道什么是真正的食物。不是冰箱里的东西，而是这里的野外食物。

trans-unit.source: Yes, a steak that has seen the sun tastes better.
trans-unit.target: 是的，晒过太阳的牛排味道更好。

trans-unit.source: But . . . but all meat was once alive.
trans-unit.target: 但是......但是所有的肉类都曾经是有生命的。

trans-unit.source: You don't hunt cows, (playername). A real hunter would know that.
trans-unit.target: 你不是猎牛的，(playername)。真正的猎人会知道这一点。

trans-unit.source: Tell that to the lab grown garbage they're serving at Fast Patties!_Those burgers never breathed in the real wilderness and you can taste the difference!
trans-unit.target: 这些汉堡从未在真正的荒野中呼吸过，你可以品尝到它们的不同之处！

trans-unit.source: If anyone tries to say that a burger made from beef is better than one made from venison, send them my way. I'll show them how wrong they are.
trans-unit.target: 如果有人说用牛肉做的汉堡比用鹿肉做的汉堡好吃，请把他们送到我这里来。我会让他们知道他们错得有多离谱。

trans-unit.source: Deer, rabbit, gopher, trout, bear, bison, elk, moose, I've had it all and I know how to get the best cuts from each.
trans-unit.target: 鹿、兔子、地鼠、鳟鱼、熊、野牛、麋鹿、驼鹿，我都吃过，也知道如何从每一种动物身上获得最好的切割。

trans-unit.source: If you're going to offer meat on your menu, while I can't get it in bulk like Uriel, I can offer prime cuts that no one else will carry.
trans-unit.target: 如果你要在菜单上提供肉类，虽然我不能像尤里尔那样批量供应，但我可以提供别人不会供应的上等肉类。

trans-unit.source: The animals I hunt are never taunted. I don't pose with them because that would be elevating myself._I thank them for being here for me and others who will live because of them. Respect is always given.
trans-unit.target: 我猎杀的动物从不受到嘲弄。我感谢它们为我和其他因它们而活下来的人而存在。我总是给予尊重。

trans-unit.source: A tip, if you haven't figured this out yet, but try to lead your shots when hunting._If your target is on the move, shoot at where you think they'll be rather than where they are currently. There, I helped.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标在移动，就朝你认为他们会出现的地方射击，而不是朝他们目前所在的地方射击。好了，我帮上忙了。

trans-unit.source: I have 12 kids, and well, they're not kids anymore. How do you think I came to look 70 when I'm actually 44?_I'm kidding, I'm really 80.
trans-unit.target: 我有 12 个孩子，但他们都不再是孩子了。你觉得我怎么会看起来像 70 岁，而实际上我只有 44 岁？

trans-unit.source: Ha . . . ha?
I don't know if I'm supposed to laugh.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道该不该笑。

trans-unit.source: Laughing at an elderly woman's age? How dare you! If I was 80, I'd skin you right here and now. Be thankful I'm 78.
trans-unit.target: 嘲笑一位老年妇女的年龄？你好大的胆子 我要是80岁，现在就剥了你的皮 庆幸我才78岁吧

trans-unit.source: Safe move. 80 year olds aren't known for their patience. Lucky for you I'm 66.
trans-unit.target: 安全行动 80岁的老人可没有耐心 算你走运，我66岁了

trans-unit.source: All of my kids have moved on with their lives. Am I sad? No!_It means I've done the parenting part damn well, now that they're out in the world doing their thing.
trans-unit.target: 我所有的孩子都已步入社会。我伤心吗？不！_这说明我把养育孩子的工作做得很好，现在他们已经在外面的世界里做自己的事情了。

trans-unit.source: Having kids breaks you. It breaks you in ways you never thought possible, but it breaks you so you can become something better._If anyone disagrees, they will find themselves staring at the pointy end of an arrow.
trans-unit.target: 生孩子会让你崩溃。它以你从未想过的方式击垮你，但它击垮你是为了让你变得更好。

trans-unit.source: When I down an elk or any big game, I think about my kids and how full their stomachs will be._Some are in their 40's, but you never stop being a mom.
trans-unit.target: 当我捕杀麋鹿或任何大型猎物时，我都会想到我的孩子们，想到他们的肚子会有多饱。

trans-unit.source: I only collect busts for the wall of creatures who gave me the best hunt. If you want one for your restaurant, you'll just have to go and get it.
trans-unit.target: 我只为那些给了我最好猎物的生物墙收集半身雕像。如果你也想为你的餐厅收藏一个，那就去买吧。

trans-unit.source: I stay away from older structures while I am hunting in the woods._You should too, not only because they are unsafe, but also because they are creepy. I don't do creepy.
trans-unit.target: 我在树林里打猎时，会远离老式建筑。_你也应该如此，不仅因为它们不安全，还因为它们令人毛骨悚然。我不喜欢阴森恐怖。

trans-unit.source: This is something I don't often offer, but do you want to get a bust for your place?_I can take you right now to nab it.
trans-unit.target: 这是我不常提供的服务，但你想为你的住处买个半身像吗？

trans-unit.source: Um . . . let me think about it first.
trans-unit.target: 嗯......让我先想想。

trans-unit.source: I'd prefer to have painting instead. It's more humaine.
trans-unit.target: 我更喜欢画画。这样更有人情味。

trans-unit.source: That's not the attitude that'll down one of the giants of the forest!
trans-unit.target: 这种态度可不会让森林巨人倒下！

trans-unit.source: Humane . . . is it humane to buy a bust made in a sweatshop from exploited labor? Is that humane?
trans-unit.target: 人道. ......购买血汗工厂剥削劳工制造的半身像是否人道？这人道吗？

trans-unit.source: I started hunting because I had to feed my kids. My husband left us a long time ago and I had to do something to keep everyone alive.
trans-unit.target: 我开始打猎是因为我必须养活我的孩子们。我丈夫很久以前就离开了我们，我必须做点什么让大家活下去。

trans-unit.source: The quiet of the forest allowed me to survive. Home was filled with sound, but out there, it's just me._Being among the trees saved me and the meat it provided saved my family.
trans-unit.target: 森林的宁静让我得以生存。家里到处都是声音，但在外面，只有我一个人。_在树丛中生存救了我，它提供的肉食也救了我的家人。

trans-unit.source: I haven't forgiven my ex for leaving us the way he did. Leaving my kids. Leaving me.
trans-unit.target: 我还没有原谅我的前夫，他就这样离开了我们。离开我的孩子 离开我

trans-unit.source: In some ways, my ex made me who I am today. A stronger person who could debone and skin him in under 20 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 在某些方面，我的前男友成就了今天的我。我是一个更坚强的人，可以在 20 分钟内把他剥皮抽筋。

trans-unit.source: Your restaurant has been helpful to our small town. I'm actually impressed._I compliment sparingly as it takes a lot of doing to earn one, so, bask in my admiration because it isn't shown all that often.
trans-unit.target: 你的餐馆对我们这个小镇很有帮助。我很少赞美别人，因为要得到别人的赞美需要付出很多努力，所以，请接受我的赞美吧，因为这种赞美并不常见。

trans-unit.source: May I be honest for a moment?
trans-unit.target: 我能实话实说吗？

trans-unit.source: Pomarine, when aren't you honest?
trans-unit.target: 波马林，你什么时候不诚实了？

trans-unit.source: No, you cannot.
trans-unit.target: 不，你不能。

trans-unit.source: I'm glad to see my life's policy is being seen by others._Now, I wanted to tell you that your fly is down. Pull that up before anyone else sees. There, I helped.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴看到我的人生方针被别人看到了。_现在，我想告诉你，你的拉链拉下来了。在别人看到之前拉起来 好了，我帮上忙了

trans-unit.source: Oh stop it! Hahahaha, but in all seriousness, your fly is down. Pull that up before anyone else sees. There, I helped.
trans-unit.target: 别说了 哈哈哈，不过说真的，你的拉链拉下来了。在别人看到之前拉起来 好了，我帮上忙了

trans-unit.source: You will never find peace if you don't find yourself the time to be bored._Being bored allows you to take account of yourself and know who you are. So, get bored sometime, okay?
trans-unit.target: 如果你不给自己找点无聊的时间，你就永远不会找到平静。_无聊可以让你审视自己，了解自己是谁。所以，找个时间无聊一下，好吗？

trans-unit.source: It's a day ending in Y and you're asking me a question._Why does this feel like something that's happened hundreds of times before? But, thanks for checking in anyway. I always appreciate it. I'm good.
trans-unit.target: 今天是以 “Y ”结尾的一天，而你却在问我一个问题。不过，还是谢谢你的来访 我一直很感激 我很好

trans-unit.source: I have so many grandchildren. I am truly blessed to be surrounded by such love._I did the best I could as a mother and I am happy that my children could see that I tried my best.
trans-unit.target: 我有这么多孙子孙女。作为母亲，我已经尽了最大的努力，我很高兴我的孩子们能看到我尽了最大的努力。

trans-unit.source: I have came to a conclusion: Owning a mistake is the best and fastest way to move on with your life._If you don't, it haunts you, and you get resentful. Just say 'I was dumb and I am sorry. Now let's eat some dinner.' It's that simple.
trans-unit.target: 我得出了一个结论： 如果你不承认错误，它就会纠缠着你，让你心生怨恨。只要说'我很笨，我很抱歉。现在我们去吃晚饭吧。就这么简单。

trans-unit.source: Many people haven't made it as far as you have in such a short span of time._Take a moment to be impressed with yourself, okay? You're allowed that much in life.
trans-unit.target: 很多人都没有你在这么短的时间内走得这么远。_花点时间对自己刮目相看，好吗？生命中允许你这么做

trans-unit.source: Le Sequoia is open now? Good luck. Don't screw it up._Remember to use fresh, natural ingredients only! You don't know what they put into that packaged stuff they sell in stores . . .
trans-unit.target: Le Sequoia 现在开门了吗？祝你好运 记住只使用新鲜、天然的食材！你不知道商店里卖的包装食品里都放了些什么. . .

trans-unit.source: I find the opinion of others to be rather useless._I am older than you, which is why I know when to ignore some words over others. That guy's? Praise or no, just forget about him.
trans-unit.target: 我觉得别人的意见毫无用处。_我比你年长，所以我知道什么时候该忽略一些话，而不是另一些话。那个家伙？管他赞不赞扬，忘了他吧。

trans-unit.source: My joints thank you for getting the bathhouse up and running. I cannot wait to do a nice soak after a long day of hunting.
trans-unit.target: 我的关节感谢你们把澡堂建起来并投入使用。打了一天猎后，我迫不及待地想好好泡个澡。

trans-unit.source: Your restaurant is getting a lot of attention. It's good to see young ones striving forward and pushing towards a goal.
trans-unit.target: 你的餐厅受到了广泛关注。很高兴看到年轻人努力向前，朝着目标前进。

trans-unit.source: Tea, it's the life blood of any society. I hear the teahouse is a place to go and enjoy some peace._I cannot wait to try! What? An old lady can't be excited sometimes?
trans-unit.target: 茶，是任何社会的生命之源。我听说茶馆是个享受宁静的好去处！什么？老太太就不能偶尔兴奋一下吗？

trans-unit.source: Community is built around us helping one another to survive._Your good works haven't gone unnoticed and I'm not the only one who's been watching.
trans-unit.target: 你们的善举并没有被忽视，并不是只有我一个人在关注。

trans-unit.source: The golden rule rings pretty loud in your head, doesn't it? That's why you keep answering those calls for help. Don't change and keep being you.
trans-unit.target: 黄金法则在你的脑海中响彻云霄，不是吗？这就是你不断回应求助电话的原因。不要改变，继续做你自己。

trans-unit.source: Your menu, I find your use of fresh meat to be adequate. Good job.
trans-unit.target: 你的菜单，我觉得你对鲜肉的使用很充分。干得好

trans-unit.source: Don't fret too much if others are not singing your praises about the menu. Personally, I love it._By the way, have you every tried a carnivorous diet? You should sometime.
trans-unit.target: 如果别人没有对你的菜单大加赞赏，也不要太在意。顺便问一句，你尝试过肉食吗？有机会应该试试。

trans-unit.source: Your menu, it stinks. Talk to me when you serve more meat. Bye.
trans-unit.target: 你的菜单太臭了 等你上更多肉的时候再跟我说吧 再见

trans-unit.source: Just my luck. The one good chef in town and you decide to serve veggies instead of meat._Guess I'll have to make do with cooking my own food.
trans-unit.target: 我真倒霉 镇上唯一的好厨师，你却决定用蔬菜代替肉类_看来我只能自己做饭了。

trans-unit.source: Having the environment not be completely trashed by consumerism is important. Good on you for leading that balance._LELSH on the other hand . . . well, they are definitely tipping that balance for the worse.
trans-unit.target: 让环境不被消费主义完全破坏是很重要的。另一方面......好吧，他们绝对是在破坏这种平衡。

trans-unit.source: If we lose the forest, the rivers, the seas, then where do we live? How do we thrive? Let's hope we never have to answer those questions.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们失去了森林、河流和海洋，那么我们在哪里生活？我们该如何繁衍生息？希望我们永远不必回答这些问题。

trans-unit.source: Hunting and fishing are a fantastic way to gather natural ingredients. Just remember to do it in moderation._Nature needs time to replenish its resources.
trans-unit.target: 狩猎和捕鱼是收集天然材料的绝佳方式。大自然需要时间来补充资源。

trans-unit.source: You know, the lands are looking a bit barren lately . . . keep making things worse around here and you'll be seeing the end of my arrow pointed at ya.
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗，最近这里的土地看起来有点贫瘠......再让这里的情况变得更糟，你就等着看我的箭射向你的末端吧。

trans-unit.source: The kids loved the baskets. They asked me how I did it and I said I got some help from a higher power. They were pretty confused, but hey, you are taller than me.
trans-unit.target: 孩子们很喜欢这些篮子。他们问我是怎么做到的，我说我得到了高人的帮助。他们很困惑，但嘿嘿，你比我高。

trans-unit.source: I think I'd like to craft more. Is this the first step toward the grave? Making things with feathers and pine cones?
trans-unit.target: 我想我还想做更多的手工艺品。这是走向坟墓的第一步吗？用羽毛和松果做东西？

trans-unit.source: Having a hobby that isn't hunting has been fun. I really enjoy being able to make these small baskets._Thanks, (playername) for showing a young women, such as myself, that there is more to life.
trans-unit.target: 有一个不打猎的爱好很有趣。我真的很喜欢能制作这些小篮子。_谢谢你，(playername)让我这样的年轻女性看到了生活中还有更多的乐趣。

trans-unit.source: That hunt took it out of me. I never thought I was going to get that boar. Thought I would've died trying . . . Good thing I'm terrible at predicting futures!
trans-unit.target: 那次狩猎让我精疲力尽。我从没想过能猎到那头野猪 我还以为自己会死在猎杀野猪的路上呢 还好我不擅长预测未来

trans-unit.source: I cannot believe that LELSH made The Crimson Boar. How irresponsible of them to think they can play maker like that! Maybe I'll hunt them for a change . . .
trans-unit.target: 我无法相信 LELSH 制作了《深红野猪》。他们竟然认为自己可以像那样扮演制作人，真是太不负责任了！也许我会找他们换换口味……

trans-unit.source: Now that I am done hunting one of the most dangerous games out here, I might have to hunt humans now . . . I am joking . . . of course.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我已经猎杀了这里最危险的动物之一，我现在可能要去猎杀人类了....... 当然，我是在开玩笑。

trans-unit.source: My camouflage must not be working today if you could see me.
trans-unit.target: 如果你能看到我，我今天的伪装一定失效了。

trans-unit.source: Ha! Hahahahahaha! That's rich.
trans-unit.target: 哈！哈哈哈哈 太有钱了

trans-unit.source: Don't be fooled by my age, my brain is as sharp as the arrows I shoot.
trans-unit.target: 不要被我的年龄所迷惑，我的大脑和我射出的箭一样锋利。

trans-unit.source: I do what I do because I have to.
trans-unit.target: 我这样做是因为我必须这样做。

trans-unit.source: Don't slow me down.
trans-unit.target: 别拖我后腿

trans-unit.source: I'm faster than you.
trans-unit.target: 我比你快

trans-unit.source: Good thinking. I think this will make my next hunt more comfortable.
trans-unit.target: 想法不错。我想这将使我下一次狩猎时更加得心应手。

trans-unit.source: Ah thank goodness. Whew I need this! Hey (playername), can you help me apply this?_Hey! Why are you moving away from me?
trans-unit.target: 谢天谢地 我需要这个！嘿(playername)，你能帮我套上这个吗？

trans-unit.source: Perfect! DOWN WITH THE SUN! (playername), you aren't so bad after all . . .
trans-unit.target: 太完美了 太阳下山了！ (playername)，你还不算太坏。

trans-unit.source: Valuable, yet useless. You must understand, I live simple life (playername), free of material desires.
trans-unit.target: 有价值，但无用。你必须明白，我的生活很简单(playername)，没有物质欲望。

trans-unit.source: Hey you remembered! You are the best (playername)!
trans-unit.target: 嘿，你还记得！你是最棒的(playername)！

trans-unit.source: I don't need it.
trans-unit.target: 我不需要

trans-unit.source: I appreciate the thought, but I won't be able to use this.
trans-unit.target: 我很感谢你的想法，但我用不上它。

trans-unit.source: No no no. Why are you giving me this?_Sorry, I'm a bit irritated today. See this sunburn? It doesn't feel good. NOT AT ALL.
trans-unit.target: 不不不 对不起，我今天有点烦躁。看到这个晒伤了吗？感觉不太好 一点都不好

trans-unit.source: Thanks, but you've already given me something today.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，但你今天已经给了我一些东西。

trans-unit.source: Next time, ask first!
trans-unit.target: 下次，先问问！

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I'm a bit busy today.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我今天有点忙。

trans-unit.source: I'm sorry. I don't feel that way about you.
trans-unit.target: 对不起 我对你没那种感觉 I'm sorry. 我对你没那种感觉

trans-unit.source: Sells tools - bow, spears, fishing rods
trans-unit.target: 出售工具 - 弓、矛、钓竿

trans-unit.source: Welcome to Huntorium, where you'll find anything that is sharp and pointy for hunting.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到 Huntorium，在这里您可以找到任何用于狩猎的尖锐物品。

trans-unit.source: We have bows, spears, and fishing rods. No guns, since they are used by the weak.
trans-unit.target: 我们有弓、矛和鱼竿。没有枪，因为枪是弱者使用的。

trans-unit.source: We carry only the finest tools for hunting the biggest or smallest game.
trans-unit.target: 我们只提供最好的工具，用于狩猎最大或最小的猎物。

trans-unit.source: Points carries the best hunting equipment available.
trans-unit.target: Points 拥有最好的狩猎装备。

trans-unit.source: Skill will never be capped by equipment, but having good equipment does help build skill.
trans-unit.target: 技能永远不会被装备所限制，但拥有好装备确实有助于培养技能。

trans-unit.source: Ah, yes! A dependable brand.
trans-unit.target: 啊，是的！一个可靠的品牌。

trans-unit.source: You'll need it where you're going.
trans-unit.target: 你要去的地方需要它。

trans-unit.source: It'll never let you down!
trans-unit.target: 它永远不会让你失望！

trans-unit.source: What an intriguing offer.
trans-unit.target: 多么诱人的提议啊

trans-unit.source: I'll buy it at a high price!
trans-unit.target: 我会高价买下它！

trans-unit.source: Fantastic.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了

trans-unit.source: This is trash.
trans-unit.target: 这是垃圾。

trans-unit.source: Get this out of here.
trans-unit.target: 把这个拿走

trans-unit.source: You thought I would buy this?
trans-unit.target: 你以为我会买这个？

trans-unit.source: We do pounds of flesh here, but in the animal variety, not human.
trans-unit.target: 我们这里也有肉食，不过是动物的肉食，而不是人类的肉食。

trans-unit.source: You can buy it next time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以下次再买。

trans-unit.source: We don't extend credit here, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我们这里不赊账，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Good day to you! Such a wonderful day isn't it?
trans-unit.target: 日安 多么美好的一天，不是吗？

trans-unit.source: It appears that your chakra's need an alignment. I suggest checking out my crystals to fix that.
trans-unit.target: 看来你的脉轮需要调整。我建议查看我的水晶来解决这个问题。

trans-unit.source: Healing can come in many forms, in my case, they come in the form of crystals.
trans-unit.target: 治疗可以有多种形式，就我而言，它们是以水晶的形式出现的。

trans-unit.source: A nice salt lamp in your home will help purify the air. Also, they are a de-light!
trans-unit.target: 在家中摆放一盏漂亮的盐灯，有助于净化空气。此外，它们还能去光！

trans-unit.source: I see you have some interest in my crystals and wares._I have some more inventory coming in tomorrow if you want to come back and see what's new for SEASON.
trans-unit.target: 我看到你们对我的水晶和商品很感兴趣，明天我还会有一些存货进来，如果你们想回来看看本季度的新产品的话。

trans-unit.source: I see in your future. . . this lovely collection of moon crystals._Just like a room at Circuit Lodge, they make any space peaceful and ready for a nice slumber.
trans-unit.target: 我看到了你的未来。......这一系列可爱的月光水晶_就像 Circuit Lodge 的房间一样，它们让任何空间都变得宁静，让人沉沉睡去。

trans-unit.source: I'm April, owner of April's Treasures! Your soul seems aligned with mine._Your name is (playername), correct?
trans-unit.target: 我是艾普丽尔，艾普丽尔宝藏的主人！你的灵魂似乎与我一致。_你的名字是(playername)，对吗？

trans-unit.source: What? Yeah, yes, I'm the new owner of The Sequoia restaurant
trans-unit.target: 是的，是的，我是红杉餐厅的新老板

trans-unit.source: Wait, how did you know my name?
trans-unit.target: 等等，你怎么知道我的名字？

trans-unit.source: Oh! How nice to meet you! I am so happy to hear that The Sequoia is reopening._Since it closed it's felt like something's been missing in White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 很高兴见到你 我很高兴听到红杉餐厅重新开张的消息。_自从它关门后，我就觉得白灰港少了点什么。

trans-unit.source: . . .the universe is very mysterious in its comings and goings. Giving names and not. I am attuned to it. I have . . . the gift.
trans-unit.target: . ......宇宙的来去非常神秘。给出名字，又不给出名字。我与之契合。我有......天赋。

trans-unit.source: My shop has been my haven for over three years now. It's always been my dream to have a shop since I was a little girl.
trans-unit.target: 三年多来，我的小店一直是我的天堂。从我还是个小女孩起，拥有一家商店就是我的梦想。

trans-unit.source: I sell the real treasures of the earth in the form of garnets, amethysts, and pearls. These gems are the real wonders of the planet.
trans-unit.target: 我出售石榴石、紫水晶和珍珠等地球上真正的珍宝。这些宝石是地球上真正的奇迹。

trans-unit.source: Beyond just being gorgeous and wonderful to look at, my gems can ensure proper health in conjunction with a doctors visit.
trans-unit.target: 我的宝石不仅华丽美观，还能在看医生的同时确保身体健康。

trans-unit.source: Yes, doctors can bandage physical wounds, but they cannot use sound to heal the broken spirit or use the power of crystals to mend the heart.
trans-unit.target: 是的，医生可以包扎身体上的伤口，但他们无法用声音治愈破碎的心灵，也无法用水晶的力量修补心灵。

trans-unit.source: There are a few people in town I trust, but first and foremost is Nabiha._She sells some of the freshest fruits and vegan products available because she understands what goes into our bodies is important.
trans-unit.target: 她出售一些最新鲜的水果和纯素食产品，因为她知道吃进我们身体里的东西很重要。

trans-unit.source: I truly believe that we and the earth are connected. It's why I don't wear shoes. Tell me, do you enjoy the touch of the planet on your feet?
trans-unit.target: 我真的相信，我们和地球是相连的。这也是我不穿鞋的原因。告诉我，你喜欢地球在你脚上的触感吗？

trans-unit.source: Yes, I try to get some dirt on my feet daily.
trans-unit.target: 是的，我每天都会试着在脚上沾点泥土。

trans-unit.source: No, I am good in shoes, thanks.
trans-unit.target: 不，我穿鞋很好，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Exactly! It's our lack of connection that is hurting us as a society. It's why everyone should have some lava stone around. To keep them grounded.
trans-unit.target: 没错！正是因为我们缺乏联系，我们的社会才会受到伤害。所以每个人身边都应该有一些熔岩石 让他们脚踏实地

trans-unit.source: Manufactured petroleum product has no room in my store, though I understand that when you're cooking in a kitchen, it has its uses.
trans-unit.target: 我的商店里没有石油制成品，但我知道在厨房烹饪时，石油制成品还是有其用途的。

trans-unit.source: You should get yourself some gems. Surround yourself with opals, rose quartz, and emeralds!_Feel their energy and internalize that energy so you can return it to the world.
trans-unit.target: 你应该给自己买些宝石。用蛋白石、玫瑰石英和祖母绿环绕自己！_感受它们的能量，并将这种能量内化，这样你就能将其回馈给世界。

trans-unit.source: The power of gems is why there is so much propaganda out there against their use._Saying they're 'not useful' and 'hold no actual healing capiabilities'!
trans-unit.target: 宝石的力量就是为什么有那么多反对使用宝石的宣传_说它们 “没有用处”、“不具备实际治疗能力”！

trans-unit.source: Do we know where vaccines come from? No, we don't! Gems come from the earth and were never made by man._Everything that man makes turns out bad, look at our planet for evidence of that.
trans-unit.target: 我们知道疫苗从何而来吗？不知道！人类制造的所有东西都会变坏，看看我们的地球就知道了。

trans-unit.source: I bathe with a citrine stone in the water. It helps energize my spirit and cleanse my body. No chemicals used on this skin!
trans-unit.target: 我用黄水晶石在水中沐浴。它能帮助我振奋精神，清洁身体。这种皮肤不使用任何化学物质！

trans-unit.source: One of my favorite places to go to is South Beach._The spirits there are roaring and fill everyone who visits with so much life. I love it. Check it out sometime if you want.
trans-unit.target: 南海滩是我最喜欢去的地方之一。_那里的灵魂在咆哮，让每个到访的人都充满生机。我喜欢那里。如果你愿意，有空去看看吧。

trans-unit.source: My crystals, they sometimes take me places while I sleep. Have you noticed this as well?
trans-unit.target: 我的水晶，有时会在我睡觉时带我到一些地方。你也注意到了吗？

trans-unit.source: Nope, but that salt rock lamp looks dope at my house.
trans-unit.target: 没有，不过那盏盐岩灯在我家看起来很不错。

trans-unit.source: I've noticed some . . . shadows around my house.
trans-unit.target: 我注意到我家周围有一些......影子。

trans-unit.source: Hmm, maybe its their placement in my home? Something is off.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，也许是因为它们在我家的摆放位置？有些不对劲。

trans-unit.source: . . . I . . . I'm glad I'm not the only one who's noticed it.
trans-unit.target: . . . I . . . 我很高兴我不是唯一一个注意到这一点的人。

trans-unit.source: Seeing open spaces is such a luxury. I wish people would understand just how nice it is to live around here.
trans-unit.target: 看到开阔的空间是一件多么奢侈的事情。我希望人们能理解生活在这里有多么美好。

trans-unit.source: I am from Billboard City, everything you see and touch is man made and its making the people there sick._It's why I love White Ash Harbor so much. You can still see nature here.
trans-unit.target: 我来自广告牌城，你所看到和接触到的一切都是人造的，这让那里的人们感到恶心。在这里，你仍然可以看到大自然。

trans-unit.source: What I want for my children, for my family one day, is to have a piece of nature to hold on to even when the days are hard.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我的孩子、我的家人有一天也能拥有一片大自然，即使在艰苦的日子里也能坚持下去。

trans-unit.source: My future kids will never be without love and without nature._They will live in a better world than the one I knew growing up.
trans-unit.target: 我未来的孩子们永远不会缺少爱，不会缺少大自然。_他们将生活在一个比我成长过程中的世界更美好的世界里。

trans-unit.source: I would be interested in speaking with the owner of the bathhouse. Her name is Aylin, right? I think we should partner up._I could contribute my stones to help out with the healing waters her bathhouse offers. I think it would work well!
trans-unit.target: 我想和澡堂的老板谈谈 她叫艾琳，对吧？我可以贡献我的石头，帮助她的浴场提供治疗水。我觉得效果不错

trans-unit.source: I hope you don't mind, but I made you something.
trans-unit.target: 希望你不介意，我给你做了点东西。

trans-unit.source: That's very kind! Thank you!
trans-unit.target: 你真好！谢谢！

trans-unit.source: Oh, you really shouldn't have.
trans-unit.target: 哦，你真不该这样。

trans-unit.source: Of course! After everything you've done for me, I figured a likeness of the forest alter carved from jade would help cleanse your spirit.
trans-unit.target: 当然 在你为我做了这么多之后，我觉得用玉石雕刻的森林变身像 会有助于净化你的灵魂。

trans-unit.source: I foresaw that you would be a little hesitant._It's your nature to be humble, but you've done a lot for me, so carving a likeness of the forest alter from jade to cleanse your spirit is the least I can do.
trans-unit.target: 我预料到你会有点犹豫。_谦虚是你的天性，但你为我做了很多，所以用玉石雕刻一个森林守护神的肖像来净化你的灵魂是我最起码能做的。

trans-unit.source: Pomarine may be old, but she is a kind lady and full of knowledge. I say kindness, but what I really mean is her honesty, which she despenses liberally.
trans-unit.target: 波玛琳虽然年事已高，但她是一位善良的女士，而且知识渊博。我说她善良，其实是指她的诚实，而她却对诚实嗤之以鼻。

trans-unit.source: A lot of my clients are searching for something. Often, what they don't know, is that what they're looking for is already there. They just need a gentle nudge.
trans-unit.target: 我的很多客户都在寻找某种东西。通常，他们不知道的是，他们要找的东西已经在那里了。他们只需要轻轻一推。

trans-unit.source: I just want you to know that if you ever hear from a ghost that you should never, ever, ask how they are doing._They will not stop talking and dishes will be thrown. It's a mess.
trans-unit.target: 我只是想让你知道，如果你听到鬼魂的消息，你千万千万不要问他们过得怎么样。真是一团糟

trans-unit.source: A soak at the bathhouse is just what the my astral projection needs at this moment._Soaking in its waters will give me that boost I need, even if the heat is made artifically.
trans-unit.target: 泡在澡堂里正是我的星体投影此时此刻所需要的。_泡在澡堂的水里会给我带来我所需要的动力，即使热量是人工制造的。

trans-unit.source: I knew my vision was correct about you. I knew when I first met you that you would bring prosperity to our town and you have._I am grateful that you are here, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我知道我对你的看法是正确的。当我第一次见到你时，我就知道你会给我们的小镇带来繁荣，你做到了。

trans-unit.source: I am going to promise you something: I will never peer into our future._I'd rather have the now with you and see where we land.
trans-unit.target: 我向你保证：我永远不会窥视我们的未来。

trans-unit.source: That's very sweet, thank you.
trans-unit.target: 你真好，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Could, you at least see some lotto numbers?
trans-unit.target: 你至少能看到一些乐透号码吧？

trans-unit.source: For us, I will keep the playing field level. I shouldn't know more than you when it comes to our relationship.
trans-unit.target: 对我们来说，我会保持公平竞争。在我们的关系上，我不应该比你知道得更多。

trans-unit.source: Hahaha! (playername)! I could never do such a thing. Also, all gambling outcomes are blocked by the powers that be for VERY obvious reasons.
trans-unit.target: 哈哈哈 (playername)！我绝不会做这种事。另外，由于非常明显的原因，所有赌博结果都被权力机构封锁了。

trans-unit.source: I really hope when we've been together for long enough that I will never know all of you._Sure, I'll know how you like your coffee or your favorite color, but I want to keep finding things or trying to decipher pieces of you.
trans-unit.target: 我真的希望，当我们在一起的时间足够长时，我永远不会了解你的全部。_当然，我会知道你喜欢怎样的咖啡或你最喜欢的颜色，但我想不断发现一些东西，或试图解读你的片段。

trans-unit.source: Last night I received a vision! We will have something wonderful happen to us very soon!_I know I said I wouldn't use my gift for us, but this wasn't something I actively did. It just happened! Ahhh! I can't wait to see what it is!
trans-unit.target: 昨晚我收到了一个异象！我们很快就会有美好的事情发生！_我知道我说过我不会为我们使用我的天赋，但这不是我主动做的事情。它就这么发生了！啊哈！我等不及要看看是什么了！

trans-unit.source: The future is uncertain, even when I do my readings, because it relies on the person who is here today to make it happen._And they have to want to make it happen. I hope our future is bright, because I want it for us.
trans-unit.target: 未来是不确定的，即使我做了我的解读，因为它依赖于今天在这里的人去实现。我希望我们的未来是光明的，因为我希望我们的未来是光明的。

trans-unit.source: Out of all the readings I've done, there is one I will never forget._I had this young woman in front of me, I opened myself to the universe, and I saw nothing for her._I have never told anyone that before. I just hope she's okay.
trans-unit.target: 在我做过的所有解读中，有一次我永远不会忘记。_我面前有一位年轻的女士，我向宇宙敞开了自己，却什么也没看到。我只希望她没事。

trans-unit.source: I want to hold your hand until I can't anymore. It's us until we're dust and become part of the Earth once again.
trans-unit.target: 我想握住你的手，直到我再也握不住。这就是我们，直到我们化为尘土，再次成为地球的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Ah! I forgot to mention, congrats on opening Le Sequoia! The town feels different compared to before I left.
trans-unit.target: 啊！我忘了说了，祝贺红杉酒店开业！和我离开之前相比，这座小镇给人的感觉完全不一样了。

trans-unit.source: I saw a darkness was encroaching your aura. And then I saw the arrival of Lucius and knew that he was the cloud!
trans-unit.target: 我看到黑暗正在侵蚀你的光环。然后我看到了卢修斯的到来，知道他就是那片云！

trans-unit.source: I CANNOT BELIEVE YOU WORKED ON THE BATHHOUSE AND DIDN'T TELL ME! My gift must be off._I can't believe I didn't see you were working on it. Whatever, I'm jumping in!
trans-unit.target: 我真不敢相信你修了澡堂却没告诉我 我的天赋一定有问题 我居然没发现你在修它 不管怎样，我都要加入

trans-unit.source: Your restaurant is really starting to get noticed. A lot of my clients have been telling me about it. They love it! Good work!
trans-unit.target: 你的餐厅真的开始受到关注了。我的很多客户都跟我说起过。他们都很喜欢！干得好

trans-unit.source: Not that you need to hear this from me, but the teahouse is amazing! I'm not the only one who loves it._So many clients have been talking about it. It is just divine! I always say that tea is the key to unlock our spirits.
trans-unit.target: 你不需要听我说，但茶馆真的很棒！不只是我一个人喜欢，很多客户都在谈论它。茶馆真是太棒了！我常说，茶是开启我们心灵的钥匙。

trans-unit.source: I doesn't take a pyschic to see that you're a good person for doing as much as you do. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 我不需要心理医生也能看出你是个好人，因为你做了那么多。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: I saw you helping out our neighbors. I saw it via the power of my gift. Thank you for being a positive force in our community!
trans-unit.target: 我看到你在帮助我们的邻居。我通过礼物的力量看到了这一点。感谢您成为我们社区的积极力量！

trans-unit.source: Your menu looks so good! MMMmmmmmm!
trans-unit.target: 你的菜单看起来真不错！MMMMMMMMM！

trans-unit.source: I love seeing the menu change overtime. It is always so tempting!_Your focus on greens is fantastic. Delicious and healthy!
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢看到菜单随着时间的推移而变化。它总是那么诱人！_你对绿色蔬菜的关注太棒了。美味又健康！

trans-unit.source: Your menu? It's . . . it's yours! You made it! Yay.
trans-unit.target: 你的菜单？是......是你的！你做的 耶 Yay.

trans-unit.source: I cannot do this anymore, your menu does nothing for me. Sorry._All that meat . . . I get a bit queasy just thinking about it.
trans-unit.target: 我不能再这样做了，你的菜单对我毫无用处。对不起，所有的肉. . 我一想起来就有点反胃

trans-unit.source: The environment is at the top of my list of things I am constantly thinking about and you have done a great job not making a mess of it! Thanks.
trans-unit.target: 环境是我经常考虑的首要问题，你们做得很好，没有把环境搞得一团糟！谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Usually, running a business and caring for the environment don't go hand-in-hand, and yet, you have done it! Keep going!
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，经营企业和爱护环境是不能兼得的，而你们却做到了！继续努力

trans-unit.source: I know you want to grow you restaurant (playername), but be careful how you treat this land._It is a living and breathing being, and it needs time to heal itself.
trans-unit.target: 我知道你想发展你的餐厅(playername)，但请小心对待这片土地。

trans-unit.source: You have damaged the landscape in the name of consumerism! HOW DARE YOU!
trans-unit.target: 你们以消费主义的名义破坏了景观！你们怎么敢这样做？

trans-unit.source: I hope the greenhouse is treating you well. It always did for me. I'm glad someone else gets to use it since I haven't had a lot of time to plant as much as I'd like.
trans-unit.target: 希望温室对你有好处。我一直都很好。我很高兴有人能用上它，因为我没有太多时间去种植我想种植的东西。

trans-unit.source: I wonder if Regrow the Planet is needing more seeds? I'll have to check their website and see.
trans-unit.target: 不知道 “再生星球 ”是否需要更多种子？我得去他们的网站看看。

trans-unit.source: I like to think that my seeds are feeding someone somewhere who needs it. Potatoes are such a universal food.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我的种子能喂饱某个需要它的人。马铃薯是如此普遍的食物。

trans-unit.source: My new crystal ball is working fantastic! AH! I love it so much. The picture I'm getting now is so clear._Past, future, all the planes of existence are open to me again. Thank you, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我的新水晶球棒极了 啊 我太喜欢它了。我现在看到的景象是如此清晰。_过去，未来，所有存在的星球都再次向我敞开。谢谢你，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: I wonder if the forest spirit enjoyed the tea. They always give a critique even when I make it the way they wanted last time. Such picky spirits.
trans-unit.target: 不知道森林精灵是否喜欢喝茶。即使我按他们上次的要求做了，他们也总是要提意见。真是挑剔的精灵。

trans-unit.source: Look, I usually don't wish ill upon anyone, but I hope that boar had their cave roughed up by a rampaging human! Would serve them right!
trans-unit.target: 听着，我通常不希望任何人受到伤害，但我希望那头野猪的洞穴被横冲直撞的人类捣毁！这才是他们该做的

trans-unit.source: Thank you, I just use essential oils. All natural.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，我只用精油。纯天然。

trans-unit.source: No mixed fabrics! 100% organic.
trans-unit.target: 无混合织物！100% 有机面料。

trans-unit.source: Still trying to keep that mind in line, but thank you for recognizing my work.
trans-unit.target: 我仍在努力保持清醒的头脑，但还是要感谢您对我工作的认可。

trans-unit.source: I will not rest until crystals are in every home.
trans-unit.target: 在水晶走进千家万户之前，我决不罢休。

trans-unit.source: Doing the right thing can be hard sometimes, thanks.
trans-unit.target: 做正确的事有时很难，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: I accept! Thanks for the help!
trans-unit.target: 我接受！感谢您的帮助！

trans-unit.source: I am a big girl, I can manage on my own.
trans-unit.target: 我是个大姑娘了，我自己能行。

trans-unit.source: This is only going to help me out, thank you!
trans-unit.target: 这只会对我有帮助，谢谢你！

trans-unit.source: I . . . I can feel the energies within this crystal! Thank you (playername)!
trans-unit.target: I . . . 我能感受到这块水晶的能量！谢谢(playername)！

trans-unit.source: What a fantastic specimen. I will keep this one safe.
trans-unit.target: 多么神奇的标本。我会好好保管这只的。

trans-unit.source: Expensive, yet hollow. I do not feel any positive energies from this object.
trans-unit.target: 昂贵却空洞。我没有从这件物品中感受到任何积极的能量。

trans-unit.source: My goodness . . . How did you foresee that it was by birthday? Do you have the . . . Gift . . . As well?
trans-unit.target: 我的天啊 你怎么知道是我的生日？你有. . . 礼物 也有吗？

trans-unit.source: It's lovely, but it isn't for me. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 它很可爱，但不适合我。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: I need something with a bit more soul. A bit more dazzle.
trans-unit.target: 我需要更有灵魂的东西。更耀眼一点。

trans-unit.source: Is this for me? Oh . . . thanks . . . I guess.
trans-unit.target: 这是给我的吗？哦 . . 谢谢 . . . 我想是吧

trans-unit.source: Thanks, but you've already given me something today.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，但你今天已经给了我一些东西。

trans-unit.source: Oh, a hug. I am okay for now, please stop.
trans-unit.target: 哦，一个拥抱。我现在很好，请停下来。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I'm a bit busy today.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我今天有点忙。

trans-unit.source: Sells gift items, crystals, accessories
trans-unit.target: 销售礼品、水晶和饰品

trans-unit.source: Welcome to April's Treasures!
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到 “四月珍品”！

trans-unit.source: April's Treasures provides natural remedies to heal your problems.
trans-unit.target: 四月珍品 "为您提供治疗问题的自然疗法。

trans-unit.source: Nothing is more natural than the items in this store.
trans-unit.target: 没有什么比这家商店的商品更天然了。

trans-unit.source: I also sell souvenirs!
trans-unit.target: 我还卖纪念品！

trans-unit.source: Everything in April's Treasures was made by the earth.
trans-unit.target: 四月的珍宝》中的一切都是大地的杰作。

trans-unit.source: It's organic!
trans-unit.target: 它是有机的！

trans-unit.source: It will help sooth your pains.
trans-unit.target: 它将有助于舒缓你的疼痛。

trans-unit.source: That'll keep your energies aligned.
trans-unit.target: 这将使你们的能量保持一致。

trans-unit.source: That's organic?! I'll buy it!
trans-unit.target: 那是有机的？我会买的

trans-unit.source: You got what?! I'll take it.
trans-unit.target: 你有什么？我来拿

trans-unit.source: You can't find this anywhere! Please let me buy it.
trans-unit.target: 到处都找不到 请让我买吧

trans-unit.source: This is not organic.
trans-unit.target: 这不是有机的。

trans-unit.source: This is made from chemicals. No, thank you.
trans-unit.target: 这是用化学品做的 不用了，谢谢

trans-unit.source: I cannot in good conscience buy this item.
trans-unit.target: 我不能昧着良心购买这件商品。

trans-unit.source: I sell stones, but stones aren't accepted at the grocery store.
trans-unit.target: 我卖石头，但杂货店不接受石头。

trans-unit.source: You need to have credits to buy this, sorry! Capitalist society and all!
trans-unit.target: 您需要有信用点数才能购买，抱歉！资本主义社会就是这样！

trans-unit.source: I truly believe that you will have money one day. Just not today.
trans-unit.target: 我真的相信，总有一天你会有钱的。只是不是今天。

trans-unit.source: Ah, pleasure to see you again friend. Have you seen my daughter Aminata?_She can be a little monster sometimes, always running around and getting into trouble.
trans-unit.target: 啊，很高兴再次见到你，朋友。你见过我女儿阿米娜塔吗？她有时像个小怪物，总是到处乱跑，惹是生非。

trans-unit.source: Being a parent is not a full-time job, it's a full-time job with way too much overtime and no lunch break.
trans-unit.target: 为人父母不是一份全职工作，而是一份加班太多、没有午休的全职工作。

trans-unit.source: The other day my oldest lost her teddy. A zombie apocalypse would have been easier to survive . . .
trans-unit.target: 有一天，我的大女儿弄丢了她的泰迪熊。如果是僵尸启示录，她会更容易活下来.......

trans-unit.source: My afternoon has been a whirlwind of naps, practices, and meal planning for the week.
trans-unit.target: 我的下午一直在忙着午睡、练习和一周的饮食计划。

trans-unit.source: Everyone needs a hobby and mine's gaming._When the kids are asleep I tend to play waaaaaay into the night. I should sleep more. Haha, nah.
trans-unit.target: 每个人都需要一个爱好，而我的爱好就是游戏。_当孩子们睡着后，我往往会玩到深夜。我应该多睡一会儿。哈哈，不。

trans-unit.source: Hasel's boba shop is one of the funnest places to visit in town._If you haven't gone yet, I highly recommend it. She makes so many fun new drinks. Go when you can.
trans-unit.target: 哈塞尔的荞麦面店是城里最有趣的地方之一。她做了很多有趣的新饮品。有空就去吧。

trans-unit.source: Oh yeah, I love games! I've played Brim Fantastico, Soul Field, Time Loss DEMON 7, Indiana Highway 9, and Lightdrip Cravass._What games have you played lately?
trans-unit.target: 哦，是的，我爱游戏！我玩过 Brim Fantastico、Soul Field、Time Loss DEMON 7、Indiana Highway 9 和 Lightdrip Cravass。

trans-unit.source: I've been wanting to check out Pilot: Conflict Earth.
trans-unit.target: 我一直想看看《飞行员》： 冲突地球》。

trans-unit.source: I haven't had the time to even think about gaming.
trans-unit.target: 我甚至没有时间去考虑游戏。

trans-unit.source: I'm not the biggest fan of western games. They're often too short and stifled. They don't say enough._Now, Japanese games and indie titles, that's where the . . . Aminata! Get that out of your mouth!
trans-unit.target: 我不是西方游戏的忠实粉丝。它们往往过于简短和乏味。现在，日本游戏和独立游戏才是我的............. 阿米娜塔 别再说了

trans-unit.source: You should! Gaming is so much fun! I love long games that take weeks to complete because I am getting the most out of . . . Aminata!_Get that out of your mouth!
trans-unit.target: 你应该这么做！游戏乐趣无穷！我喜欢花几周时间完成的漫长游戏，因为我可以从中获得最大的乐趣。阿米娜塔！_把那句话从你嘴里说出来！

trans-unit.source: Gaming is the one vice I allow myself. When we were, I am, when I was younger I drank and did all the stuff young people did. Now? Gaming is it.
trans-unit.target: 游戏是我唯一允许自己染上的恶习。我们年轻的时候，我年轻的时候，我喝酒，做所有年轻人做的事情。现在呢？就是游戏

trans-unit.source: I gotta adjust this harness, one sec. There we go, yeah, you keep napping. This stroller is the only way Robin sleeps. When she's 16, it might be a problem!
trans-unit.target: 我得调整一下安全带，等一下 好了 你继续睡吧 这婴儿车是罗宾睡觉的唯一方式 等她16岁了 这可能就成问题了

trans-unit.source: I should be going to bed at 10 PM, but when I'm deep into a questline I find 2 AM is when I pass out.
trans-unit.target: 我应该在晚上 10 点上床睡觉，但当我深入任务线时，我发现凌晨 2 点是我昏睡的时候。

trans-unit.source: Should I get more sleep? Sure, but . . . I need some time for myself once the kids are in bed. I'll sleep more later.
trans-unit.target: 我应该多睡一会儿吗？当然，但是...... 等孩子们上床睡觉后，我需要一些自己的时间。我晚点再睡。

trans-unit.source: You've been pretty busy. I see you getting things done at Le Sequoia. I can't wait to have some food there myself.
trans-unit.target: 你一直都很忙。我看到你在红杉餐厅忙得不可开交 我等不及要去那里吃点东西了。

trans-unit.source: Here's a point blank question: You want kids one day?
trans-unit.target: 我有个直截了当的问题： 你想要孩子吗？

trans-unit.source: One day, yes.
trans-unit.target: 有一天，是的。

trans-unit.source: No, don't have the time for them.
trans-unit.target: 不，没时间了。

trans-unit.source: I don't say people should have children, but if you are going to have some, know there is no going back._You, as a person, are changed and you need to remember that change is going to help you survive what's coming.
trans-unit.target: 我不是说人们应该生孩子，但如果你要生孩子，你要知道你已经没有退路了。

trans-unit.source: If your life isn't made for kids, then great! We don't need anymore terrible parents, we have enough of them these days. Haha!
trans-unit.target: 如果你的生活不适合孩子，那很好！我们不需要再有糟糕的父母了，现在的父母已经够多了。哈哈！

trans-unit.source: Children are a joy, but they are here to challenge you. You can't be the same person after they arrive._You have to evolve. If you don't change, then you join the ranks of terrible parents.
trans-unit.target: 孩子是快乐的，但他们是来挑战你的。他们来了之后，你就不能再是原来的你了。如果你不改变，那么你就会加入糟糕父母的行列。

trans-unit.source: Not gonna lie, there are days when this gig is soul crushing. It's hard to navigate, especially when I'm soloing without a main tank by my side.
trans-unit.target: 不瞒你说，有那么几天，我的工作让我心力交瘁。这很难驾驭，尤其是当我独奏时，身边没有主坦克。

trans-unit.source: Shh, shh, Robin, there you go. One of the best parks to take these two to isn't too far away from town._It has some amazing starter trails for the kids to go hiking on.
trans-unit.target: 嘘，嘘，罗宾，你来了。最适合带这两个孩子去的公园之一就在离镇上不远的地方。

trans-unit.source: Why become a parent if it's hard as hell somedays?_. . . Because even when you're done, tired, and just plain cooked, you get invited to your bedroom that is now a cafe where you have lively conversations with dolls._And it's wonderful.
trans-unit.target: 如果为人父母有时也很辛苦，那又何必为人父母呢？. 因为即使你做完了、累了、煮熟了，你也会被邀请到你的卧室，那里现在是一个咖啡馆，你可以在那里和玩偶们进行生动的对话。

trans-unit.source: I recommend, if you haven't been already, to go to the library in town._It's quiet, safe, and a perfect spot to take a nap. . . Not that I know anything about that, haha!
trans-unit.target: 如果您还没有去过，我建议您去镇上的图书馆。_那里安静、安全，是您小憩的绝佳地点。. 我可不懂这个，哈哈！

trans-unit.source: Having kids is a lot of fun and work, but if you have a partner it does make it easier . . ._May . . . may I tell you about Allison?
trans-unit.target: 生孩子是一件很有趣也很辛苦的事情，但如果你有一个伴侣，就会轻松很多. .............

trans-unit.source: Of course.
trans-unit.target: 当然。

trans-unit.source: I really have to go.
trans-unit.target: 我真的得走了。

trans-unit.source: Thank you, I . . . I haven't talked to anyone about her. Since Robin's been born and keeping up with Aminata's needs, it's something I don't have time for.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你，我. . 我还没跟任何人提起过她 自从罗宾出生后，还要照顾阿米娜塔，我就没时间了。

trans-unit.source: Oh, yeah, sure. Have a great day.
trans-unit.target: 哦，是的，当然。祝你愉快

trans-unit.source: Allison was the best. Just simply the best. She wasn't perfect, none of us are, but to me she was the best friend and partner I loved having._Allison died a few months after Robin was born. I'm okay, I'm okay.
trans-unit.target: 艾莉森是最棒的。就是最好的 她并不完美，我们都不完美，但对我来说，她是最好的朋友，也是我最爱的伙伴。 艾莉森在罗宾出生几个月后去世了。我没事 我没事

trans-unit.source: I need to go see a therapist though. Grief is a terrible thing to deal with, especially when you have to raise two kids on your own._Keeping yourself near the front of line mentally is hard.
trans-unit.target: 但我需要去看心理医生。悲伤是一件可怕的事情，尤其是当你要独自抚养两个孩子的时候。

trans-unit.source: I can't let my kids see the grief inside of me._I don't blame Allison either, she wasn't in full control of herself . . . and I didn't see it. I thought she was just tired.
trans-unit.target: 我不能让我的孩子们看到我内心的悲伤。_我也不怪艾莉森，她没有完全控制住自己............我也没看出来。我以为她只是累了

trans-unit.source: Allison was a light in this world and our lanterns burn brighter because we knew her. I miss her every day and I wish she could be here to see how amazing of a big sister Aminata is to Robin.
trans-unit.target: 艾莉森是这个世界上的一盏明灯，因为认识她，我们的灯笼更加明亮。我每天都在想念她，我希望她能在这里看到 Aminata 是罗宾多么了不起的大姐姐。

trans-unit.source: I take my kids to the beach when the weather is right. It's one of our favorite spots. Lots of good memories there.
trans-unit.target: 天气好的时候，我会带孩子们去海边玩。那是我们最喜欢的地方之一。那里有很多美好的回忆。

trans-unit.source: I was reading this book last night and found myself wondering if I am reading because I actually like it?_Or because I feel the need to read a book. You know?
trans-unit.target: 我昨晚在读这本书时，发现自己在想，我读这本书是因为我真的喜欢它，还是因为我觉得有必要读一本书。你知道吗？

trans-unit.source: Sometimes our hobbies change and that's okay.
trans-unit.target: 有时候，我们的爱好会发生变化，这没什么。

trans-unit.source: Maybe it's the book. Stop reading it?
trans-unit.target: 也许是因为这本书。不读了吗？

trans-unit.source: Isn't it strange? When the things we liked doing for so long just don't make sense suddenly?
trans-unit.target: 这不是很奇怪吗？当我们喜欢做了很久的事情突然变得毫无意义？

trans-unit.source: Yeah, that's probably the solution.
trans-unit.target: 是的，这可能就是解决办法。

trans-unit.source: I've been trying to figure out why my reading has been dropping off, and I think it's because it was something I did with Allison._Now that it's just me, I'd rather play a game or watch a show. Is it strange that I feel guilty?
trans-unit.target: 我一直在想我的阅读量为什么会下降，我想是因为这是我和艾莉森一起做的事情。我感到内疚很奇怪吗？

trans-unit.source: I'll never forget when I took Aminata to the playground when she was a solo child._There was a kid there that tried to push her out of the way of the slide, and by out of the way, I mean over the edge. Kids are mini sociopaths.
trans-unit.target: 我永远忘不了阿米娜塔还是个独居儿童时，我带她去游乐场玩。_那里有个孩子试图把她从滑梯上推开，我说的 “推开 ”是指从边上推开。孩子们都是小型反社会者。

trans-unit.source: Prisca has done a lot for me. When I first lost Allison, she made sure I got free daycare until Aminata could go to school and a week off of work for grief._It was amazing and needed since daycare could've easily taken my entire paycheck.
trans-unit.target: Prisca 为我做了很多。当我第一次失去艾莉森时，她确保我得到了免费的日托服务，直到阿米娜塔可以上学为止，还为我请了一周的假，以减轻我的悲痛。

trans-unit.source: I was wondering what the hell it is going to take for me to get past this one level on The Fires of Eternity._The boss is impossible! I've died . . . SO MANY TIMES! Ugh! But I love that game. Can't get enough of it.
trans-unit.target: 我在想，我到底要怎样才能通过《永恒之火》的这一关？我已经死了. . . 好多次了 但我喜欢那款游戏 但我爱死这游戏了 爱不释手

trans-unit.source: One of the things about kids, is that they are always trying to show you their love whenever they see you struggling._My girls snuggle me any chance they can, but when I'm feeling down, they just dig in deeper. Helps, every, time.
trans-unit.target: 我的女儿们一有机会就会依偎着我，但当我情绪低落时，她们就会钻得更深。每次都有帮助。

trans-unit.source: We are going to get you a console and you are going to get into some games!_That is, if you want to. I mean, it's your decision.
trans-unit.target: 我们会给你买个游戏机，然后你就可以玩游戏了！_也就是说，如果你愿意的话。我的意思是，这是你的决定。

trans-unit.source: I have my own, sir!
trans-unit.target: 我有我自己的，先生！

trans-unit.source: I am intrigued, sure!
trans-unit.target: 我当然很感兴趣！

trans-unit.source: AH! Yesssss! We are going to have some many fun nights of adventure and not looking directly at one another for hours! I can't wait!
trans-unit.target: AH！是的 我们将度过许多有趣的冒险之夜，而且不会直视对方几个小时！我等不及了

trans-unit.source: I'll get ya setup and we'll ease into this whole thing. If you don't dig it, then I'm sure Aminata will take it over in a few weeks anyway. Haha!
trans-unit.target: 我会把你安排好的，我们会慢慢适应这一切的。如果你不喜欢，我相信过几周阿米娜塔就会接手了。哈哈

trans-unit.source: I haven't felt this relaxed in. . . forever it feels like. I never thought I'd feel this way again.
trans-unit.target: 我已经很久没有这么放松过了。好像永远都没有了 我从没想过还会有这种感觉

trans-unit.source: I'm not trying to live in the past, but when Allison died, I never thought I would be in position to ever feel alive again._I know that sounds dark, but you've brought some light into my life. I am grateful we're together.
trans-unit.target: 我并不想活在过去，但当艾莉森去世时，我从未想过自己还能再有活着的感觉。我很感激我们能在一起。

trans-unit.source: I know the girls are excited for us when I wake up to them jumping on my bed asking when you are coming over?!_Ha! They're a rowdy bunch, but they're a good bunch.
trans-unit.target: 我知道女儿们为我们感到兴奋，当我醒来时，她们在我床上跳来跳去，问我你们什么时候过来？她们是一群吵闹的家伙，但她们是一群好孩子。

trans-unit.source: (playername), I love you, but I am trying really hard to get us through the next phase of this boss fight._My brain is racking so many ideas on how to accomplish this feat, but with our love combined, I'm sure I'll figure out the meta we need for it.
trans-unit.target: (游戏名)，我爱你，但我真的很努力地想让我们通过下一阶段的 BOSS 战。_我的大脑正在绞尽脑汁地想如何完成这一壮举，但只要我们的爱结合在一起，我相信我会想出我们需要的方法。

trans-unit.source: Time has flown by! Congrats on the restaurant being open! It's nice to see all your hard work paying off.
trans-unit.target: 时间过得真快！祝贺餐厅开业！很高兴看到你们的努力得到了回报。

trans-unit.source: Being a parent has made me a wiser person, I think._One thing to learn is that not everyone will like you. It doesn't matter, because there are other people that will always have your back
trans-unit.target: 我认为，为人父母让我变得更加睿智。_要学会的一件事是，不是每个人都会喜欢你。这不要紧，因为还有其他人会永远支持你。

trans-unit.source: When do you sleep?! You worked on the bathhouse too! Man, folks without kids really do have all the time in the world, hahahaha!_Well done, (playername). You should be proud of yourself, but please, take it easy at some point, eh?
trans-unit.target: 你什么时候睡觉？你还修了澡堂！没有孩子的人真的有的是时间，哈哈哈哈！_干得好，(playername)。你应该为自己感到骄傲，但也请放松一下，好吗？

trans-unit.source: I've been hearing a lot of chatter with folks checking in about Le Sequoia and it's good chatter too! Keep doing your thing, (playername). It's working.
trans-unit.target: 我听到了很多关于 Le Sequoia 的唠叨，也是很好的唠叨！继续做你的事，(playername)。这很有效。

trans-unit.source: That teahouse of yours is getting a lot of folks from far and wide checking in._Between the bathhouse and Le Sequoia, it's feeling like White Ash Harbor is something more than a fishing town.
trans-unit.target: 你的那家茶馆吸引了很多来自四面八方的客人。_在澡堂和红杉之间，感觉白灰港已经不仅仅是一个渔业小镇了。

trans-unit.source: Yo, I've been seeing you running around here like a rabbit helping people. Keep it up! Clearly people need it.
trans-unit.target: 哟，我一直看到你像只兔子一样在这里跑来跑去帮助别人。继续努力 显然，人们需要它。

trans-unit.source: I don't know where you are getting the energy from to do all of those bulletin board posts!_I can barely get my shoes on without needing a nap!
trans-unit.target: 我不知道你哪来那么多精力在公告栏上发那么多帖子！_我都快穿不上鞋了，还得打个盹！

trans-unit.source: When I get some free time, I'll try out that menu I've been hearing about._For me, nothing beats a croissant in the morning.
trans-unit.target: 对我来说，没有什么比早上吃羊角面包更惬意了。

trans-unit.source: Seeing all those pastries on your menu, it's got my mind spinning, I need to have some of that food and soon!
trans-unit.target: 看到你们菜单上的这些糕点，我的思绪一下子就飞了起来，我得赶紧吃点这些食物！

trans-unit.source: Eh, I dunno if I'm down with the food on your menu. Doesn't jive with me._I'm a pastry man, in case you are wondering.
trans-unit.target: 我不太喜欢你菜单上的食物 我是个糕点师，如果你想知道的话

trans-unit.source: Not really into that menu filled with all those beverages, but someone else probably is, so good for them.
trans-unit.target: 我不太喜欢菜单上的那些饮料，但别人可能喜欢，所以对他们来说是件好事。

trans-unit.source: The local environment is a resource that I treasure because I want my kids to have what I had growing up._Thanks for not burning it all for the sake of a paycheck.
trans-unit.target: 当地的环境是我珍惜的资源，因为我希望我的孩子能拥有我成长过程中拥有的一切。

trans-unit.source: Don't think I haven't seen what you're doing here._I am glad you've been making active choices to help out the rest of us by not polluting our town.
trans-unit.target: 别以为我没看到你在这里做的事情_我很高兴你一直在积极地选择帮助我们其他人，不污染我们的城市。

trans-unit.source: Man, I know you got to make a living, but could you please try not damaging the landscape to make it?
trans-unit.target: 伙计，我知道你要谋生，但你能不能不要为了谋生而破坏景观？

trans-unit.source: Do you get that you are harming our town? You really should get your head set straight, because if you make this place a pit for my kids, I'm going to bop you.
trans-unit.target: 你知道你正在危害我们的小镇吗？你真的应该清醒一下，因为如果你把这里变成我孩子们的乐园，我会揍扁你的。

trans-unit.source: Getting that cake made for Aminata was pure magic. She loved it and it made her party! Thanks again, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 为 Aminata 制作蛋糕纯粹是一种魔法。她非常喜欢，这也让她的派对更加精彩！再次感谢您，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Allison was the one who baked. I tried, but the best I can do a box cake and that's usually for the fun of it and breakfast. Ha ha!
trans-unit.target: 艾莉森是烤蛋糕的人。我试过了，但我最多只能做一个盒装蛋糕，而且通常是为了好玩和当早餐。哈哈！

trans-unit.source: Now, a problem, Aminata wants that cake . . . everyday! She might come up and bother you sometimes for it, so, be prepared.
trans-unit.target: 现在有个问题，Aminata 每天都想要那个蛋糕！她有时会为了蛋糕来找你麻烦，所以你要做好心理准备。

trans-unit.source: Sorry for before, I know I said thank you, but I was caught up in the moment and couldn't do words then._What you did was huge for me and my girls. Thank you so much for that. It is something I will never forget.
trans-unit.target: 之前很抱歉，我知道我说了谢谢，但我当时太投入了，无法用言语表达。非常感谢你。我永远不会忘记。

trans-unit.source: The photobook and objects have their own shelf in the living room._The girls can access it at anytime. It's something I never thought I would have done, but since I accepted help, it is done. Thank you again, seriously.
trans-unit.target: 照片集和物品在客厅里都有自己的架子。这是我从未想过要做的事情，但既然我接受了帮助，就一定要做好。再次感谢你们，真的。

trans-unit.source: Uhh, I got hairbands in my hair. I guess it's a look.
trans-unit.target: 我头发上有发带 我猜这是个造型

trans-unit.source: This shirt is on its third day of duty, but thanks.
trans-unit.target: 这件衬衫已经穿了第三天了，不过还是谢谢你。

trans-unit.source: I'm surprised there's even a thought left in this walnut after the smallest amount of sleep I've gotten.
trans-unit.target: 我很惊讶，在我睡了这么一小觉之后，这颗核桃竟然还有思想。

trans-unit.source: My kids area is a reflection of my effort and today they're sitting at about a 5/10. Haha.
trans-unit.target: 孩子们的活动区反映了我的努力程度，今天他们的得分大约是 5/10。哈哈。

trans-unit.source: There are days, thanks.
trans-unit.target: 有的时候，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Hand me that will you?
trans-unit.target: 递给我好吗？

trans-unit.source: I've changed enough dirty diapers in my time. I got this.
trans-unit.target: 我换过的脏尿布够多了。我有这个

trans-unit.source: Heeyyy, would you look at that? Thanks.
trans-unit.target: 嘿嘿，你能看看吗？谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Perfect for my crafts day with my girls. Thanks (playername).
trans-unit.target: 非常适合我和女儿们一起做手工。谢谢(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Wow! You found this? What a nice shell! This will be great for Aminata's art project.
trans-unit.target: 哇哦 你找到的？多漂亮的贝壳啊 这对阿米娜塔的艺术项目很有帮助。

trans-unit.source: Woah this looks valuable (playername)! I'm not sure what to do with this though . . .
trans-unit.target: 哇，这看起来很有价值(playername)！不过，我不知道该怎么用它......

trans-unit.source: Awww you remember my birthday (playername)! I will enjoy this with my daughters.
trans-unit.target: 噢，你还记得我的生日(playername)！我会和我的女儿们一起享受的。

trans-unit.source: I am not able to use that at all during this current stage in my life.
trans-unit.target: 在我目前的人生阶段，我根本无法使用它。

trans-unit.source: Thanks, but I'm not sure what to do with this.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，但我不知道该怎么处理这个。

trans-unit.source: Uhh, is this for me? Is this for Aminata? Who is this for?
trans-unit.target: 这是给我的吗？是给阿米娜塔的吗？这是给谁的？

trans-unit.source: Thanks, but you've already given me something today.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，但你今天已经给了我一些东西。

trans-unit.source: That's surprising. I hope it helped you?
trans-unit.target: 真没想到。希望对你有帮助？

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I'm a bit busy today.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我今天有点忙。

trans-unit.source: Oh, hi again. Hope you're having a good day.
trans-unit.target: 又见面了 希望你今天过得愉快

trans-unit.source: You're new here, right? I know most of the people in White Ash Harbor, so you stick out like a rotten potato._Not that you're rotten, but you're noticeable. Take it easy.
trans-unit.target: 你是新来的吧？我认识白灰港的大多数人，所以你就像烂土豆一样显眼。_不是说你烂，而是你很显眼。别紧张

trans-unit.source: I am Anna-May, dunno why I didn't say that last time. My family owns Takashi Farms and we grow lots of crops._Some organic, some industrial sized, you know, varied amounts.
trans-unit.target: 我叫安娜-梅，不知道为什么上次没说。我的家族拥有高志农场，我们种植了很多农作物，有些是有机的，有些是工业用的，你知道，数量不一。

trans-unit.source: So, you're the new owner of the Sequoia? . . . Don't get creeped out, it's a small town, so word gets around pretty fast about anything new.
trans-unit.target: 你是红杉的新主人？. . . 别被吓到了，这是个小镇，所以新消息传得很快。

trans-unit.source: White Ash Harbor is a small town, so the nightlife here isn't the best, but I would recommend Bea's Bar._It's pretty noticible, but it's also one of the only places in town for late night fun. Take that as you will.
trans-unit.target: 白灰港是个小镇，所以这里的夜生活并不是最好的，但我还是要向您推荐 Bea's Bar。你可以这么认为。

trans-unit.source: What are your thoughts of White Ash Harbor so far?
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，您对《白灰港》有什么看法？

trans-unit.source: It's a cute small town.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个可爱的小镇。

trans-unit.source: I miss hustle and bustle of Billboard City.
trans-unit.target: 我怀念喧嚣的广告牌城。

trans-unit.source: Small doesn't begin to describe this town is.
trans-unit.target: 用 “小 ”不足以形容这个小镇。

trans-unit.source: You're from Billboard City and you optionally came here? To this town by the sea? To this place that isn't Billboard City?
trans-unit.target: 你来自广告牌之城，却选择来到这里？来到这个海边小镇？来到这个不是广告牌城的地方？

trans-unit.source: I couldn't imagine leaving such a place like Billboard City to come here. I mean, what an odd thing to do. You sure you're okay in the head?
trans-unit.target: 我无法想象离开广告牌城这样的地方来到这里。我是说，这是件多么奇怪的事啊 你确定你脑子没问题？

trans-unit.source: The culture in White Ash Harbor is stale to put it lightly. No art scene at all and making connections into that world is difficult at a distance.
trans-unit.target: 轻描淡写地说，白灰港的文化很陈旧。这里根本没有艺术氛围，要想与艺术界建立联系也很困难。

trans-unit.source: My sister, May-Lou, loves this place, and I do too, but I just . . . it's not filling my cup anymore.
trans-unit.target: 我姐姐梅露喜欢这个地方，我也喜欢，但我只是......它再也填不满我的杯子了。

trans-unit.source: It's hard to think that for a lot of people here, that this is it for them, and they're okay with that. I wish I could do that too.
trans-unit.target: 很难想象，对这里的很多人来说，这就是他们的生活，而他们也能接受。我也希望我能做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: I think I am going to do a public art piece involving the payphones._They are such a relic of the past that somehow has survived until now. I find them just fascinating.
trans-unit.target: 我想我要做一件与公用电话有关的公共艺术作品。我觉得它们非常迷人。

trans-unit.source: Do you feel the weight of the Sequoia's legacy around your neck at all?_It heard was a lively spot back in the day.
trans-unit.target: 你有没有感觉到红杉的遗产在你脖子上的分量？

trans-unit.source: Every. Day. They are big shoes to fill.
trans-unit.target: 每。每一天。他们的任务很艰巨。

trans-unit.source: No. Chef Casteau believes in me.
trans-unit.target: 不 卡斯特厨师相信我

trans-unit.source: One rule when it comes to legacy: It doesn't have to keep going. It just hurts if your the one who ends it.
trans-unit.target: 说到遗产，有一条规则：它不一定要继续下去。如果是你终结了它，那才是最痛苦的。

trans-unit.source: Making it your own . . . but you at least have an interest in the work to be done. Enough that you're going to make it your own. Must be nice to be that free.
trans-unit.target: 把它变成你自己的......但你至少对要完成的工作有兴趣。足以让你把它变成你自己的。自由自在的感觉一定很好

trans-unit.source: You went to cooking school, right? Like, you chose your profession. It wasn't handed down to each generation whether they liked it or not. You got a choice.
trans-unit.target: 你上过烹饪学校，对吧？你选择了你的职业 并不是每一代人都喜欢的 你可以选择

trans-unit.source: It wasn't like your father's father's father started a business you have to run now and if you hate it you're being the bad guy, right?_I'm . . . I'm not speaking from experience except that I am speaking . . . from experience.
trans-unit.target: 它不像你父亲的父亲的父亲创办的企业，你现在必须运行，如果你恨它，你是坏人，对不对？我说的不是经验之谈 只不过我说的是......经验之谈。

trans-unit.source: I know a lot of people would rather live somewhere with sunshine happening 24/7, but I don't._I like that I have seasons and get to experience all their splendor and bother. Otherwise, it's just boring, ya know?
trans-unit.target: 我知道很多人都希望生活在一个全天候都有阳光的地方，但我不这么想。_我喜欢四季分明的生活，喜欢体验四季的绚烂和烦恼。否则，就太无聊了，知道吗？
