trans-unit.source: I want Takashi Farms to thrive, but, I just want it to thrive without me.
trans-unit.target: 我希望高志农场茁壮成长，但我只希望它在没有我的情况下茁壮成长。

trans-unit.source: A place I always loved visiting when I needed some alone time was and always will be the library._It's a fantastic space that gives me what I need: Air that doesn't smell like compost.
trans-unit.target: 当我需要独处的时候，我总是喜欢去图书馆： 没有堆肥味的空气。

trans-unit.source: You know what I really want out of life? To make art and make a living off of it.
trans-unit.target: 你知道我真正想要的生活是什么吗？创造艺术，并以此为生。

trans-unit.source: Why not go for it then?
trans-unit.target: 那为什么不去做呢？

trans-unit.source: You could still make art in your free time.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以在空闲时间创作艺术作品。

trans-unit.source: It's hard to break away from something that your parents believe will take care of you long after they're gone. And you kinda believe it too.
trans-unit.target: 你的父母相信，在他们离开很久以后，他们还会一直照顾你。你也有点相信这一点。

trans-unit.source: No half-measures, (playername). If I treat what I want in life a 'fun little thing I get to do' it will forever be a small thing. It will never grow.
trans-unit.target: 不能半途而废，(playername)。如果我把我想要的生活当作 “我可以做的有趣的小事”，它将永远是一件小事。它永远不会成长。

trans-unit.source: I have always loved creating art. I often use the animals around the farm as inspiration for many of my pieces._Its just, making a living from it is hard. If I don't go for it, if I don't go now, I will forever wonder what could have been?
trans-unit.target: 我一直热爱艺术创作。我经常以农场周围的动物为灵感，创作出许多作品。如果我不去做，如果我现在不去做，我将永远不知道本来可以做什么？

trans-unit.source: I do not want to end up like some of the people here. Trapped in a shell I never made.
trans-unit.target: 我不想落得和这里某些人一样的下场。被困在我从未制造过的躯壳里。

trans-unit.source: I love my family, but it's been difficult for them to understand just why I want to do art as a venture._'It's hard', they say, so is harvesting 37 acres of crops!
trans-unit.target: 我爱我的家人，但他们很难理解我为什么要把艺术作为一项事业。他们说'这很难'，收割 37 英亩的庄稼也很难！

trans-unit.source: I have made some connections in Billboard City from the art shows I've done here in town._Maybe . . . maybe I should go for it. May-Lou gets why I should do it and that's good enough for me!
trans-unit.target: 我在广告牌城举办的艺术展上结识了一些人_也许......也许我应该去做。梅露明白我为什么要这么做，这对我来说就足够了！

trans-unit.source: When I'm a big time artist in Billboard City, there is one place I know I will miss, and that's the wharf._It's a bit of a contradiction because I don't like the beach all that much, but I love the sound of the wood planks at the warf under my shoes.
trans-unit.target: 这有点矛盾，因为我并不太喜欢海滩，但我喜欢码头木板在我鞋底发出的声音。

trans-unit.source: Do you follow esports at all? It's something of a hobby of mine.
trans-unit.target: 你关注电竞吗？这是我的业余爱好。

trans-unit.source: No, not really something I'm interested in.
trans-unit.target: 不，我不感兴趣。

trans-unit.source: I would be intrigued in checking it out. I've heard a lot about it.
trans-unit.target: 我很想去看看。我听说过很多关于它的事。

trans-unit.source: A lot like art, it's not for everyone, and I understand that. I don't agree with it, but I understand it.
trans-unit.target: 就像艺术一样，它并不适合每一个人，我理解这一点。我不同意，但我理解。

trans-unit.source: Oh my goodness, then you must watch the Fathom of Myths playoffs! They are happening soon and I think you would love it!
trans-unit.target: 哦，天哪，那你一定要观看《神话深渊》季后赛！季后赛马上就要开始了，我想你一定会喜欢的！

trans-unit.source: I dunno if this is true for you, but when I am painting, I feel lost in my work. Not that I am directionless, more like nothing else matters around me when I am in front of that canvas or drawing pad.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道你是否也是这样，但当我在画画时，我会觉得迷失在自己的作品中。并不是说我没有方向，而是当我面对画布或画板时，我觉得周围的一切都不重要了。

trans-unit.source: I'll never forget when I was little and I pulled this carrot from the ground and the carrot looked like a face!_May-Lou teased me, saying that it was how I was going to look when I am old! Jokes on her, we're twins, she's going wrinkly with me!
trans-unit.target: 我永远忘不了小时候，我从地里拔出一根胡萝卜，那根胡萝卜就像一张脸！_梅露取笑我说，这就是我老了以后的样子！她真会开玩笑，我们是双胞胎，她会和我一起长皱纹的！

trans-unit.source: I have been selling some pieces lately! Seeing people really connect with my work has been such a boost._It . . . it shows that I'm worth it. I'm worth trying this new thing out.
trans-unit.target: 我最近卖出了一些作品！看到人们真正喜欢我的作品，我感到非常振奋。它......说明我值得。我值得尝试这个新事物。

trans-unit.source: You probably already know this, but doing something on your own is scary._Your restaurant is raving now, but when you first got here, I'm sure you felt shaky._Maybe you still do? I don't think that feeling really goes away.
trans-unit.target: 你可能已经知道这一点了，但独自做一件事是很可怕的。_你的餐厅现在生意兴隆，但当你刚来这里时，我肯定你会感到胆颤心惊。我不认为这种感觉会消失

trans-unit.source: I really admire the amount of courage you had to come here and re-open Le Sequoia._It takes grit to go after something as hard as you have even though it might not pan out. You're pretty inspo, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我真的很钦佩你来到这里并重新开张 Le Sequoia 的勇气。_即使可能不会成功，也要像你一样努力去做一件事，这需要勇气。你很有灵感，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Look, I really like you, a lot, but . . ._. . . But I am never going to ask your opinion on an art piece I am making.
trans-unit.target: 听着，我真的很喜欢你，但是....... . . 但我永远不会就我的作品征求你的意见

trans-unit.source: I get it!
trans-unit.target: 我明白了！

trans-unit.source: Why not? I got eyes.
trans-unit.target: 为什么不呢？我有眼睛

trans-unit.source: Exactly, I won't expect you to ask me to give you notes on a dish you're trying out._I might hate it, but it might be a big hit with everyone else, but if you take my note to heart you'll never know. Same goes for my art.
trans-unit.target: 没错，我不会指望你让我给你试做的一道菜提意见。_我可能不喜欢这道菜，但它可能很受其他人的欢迎，但如果你把我的意见记在心里，你就永远不会知道了。我的艺术也是如此。

trans-unit.source: And I got a mouth, but that doesn't mean I'll like everything you make in the kitchen and that might derail any chance of a cool dish being made._I respect you, but your eyes probably won't understand what I've painted on my canvas.
trans-unit.target: 我有一张嘴，但这并不意味着我会喜欢你在厨房里做的所有东西，这可能会破坏做出一道酷菜的任何机会。

trans-unit.source: We're both professionals, and I will respect your work as much as you respect mine._But let's both remember to relax with one another still, okay? Good.
trans-unit.target: 我们都是专业人士，我会尊重你的工作，就像你尊重我的工作一样。_但我们都要记得彼此放松，好吗？好的

trans-unit.source: Since we've been together, my mind has been able to find new material I never knew I had waiting inside. You make me my best me.
trans-unit.target: 自从我们在一起后，我的大脑就能找到新的素材，我从来不知道我的内心深处还有这么多素材。你让我成为最好的自己。

trans-unit.source: I have had relationships in the past, but this, us, feels different. It doesn't feel like it's going to end in three months or something._I feels like it will grow and keep on growing. I love that idea.
trans-unit.target: 我过去也谈过恋爱，但这次，我们，感觉不一样。我不觉得我们的关系会在三个月内结束。我喜欢这种感觉。

trans-unit.source: Hey, I love you.
trans-unit.target: 嘿，我爱你

trans-unit.source: You and I will go places. I just know it. And I cannot wait for the adventure we will be taking together, my love.
trans-unit.target: 你和我一定会有一番作为的。我就知道 我迫不及待地期待着我们一起去冒险，我的爱人。

trans-unit.source: How cool is it now that Le Sequoia is open? People are filling the seats. Eating your food. It's gotta be a blast! Good luck!
trans-unit.target: 红杉餐厅开张了，这有多酷？人们坐满了座位。吃着你的食物 一定很热闹 祝你好运 Good luck！

trans-unit.source: In the art world, critics are everywhere, because a lot of them were artists who couldn't make it_ They're bitter beans, (playername). I'm still working on this, but try not to give them too much weight in your mind.
trans-unit.target: 在艺术界，批评家无处不在，因为他们中的很多人都曾是一事无成的艺术家_他们是苦豆子，(playername)。我还在努力，但尽量不要让他们在你心目中占太重的分量。

trans-unit.source: Oh my god, you helped get the bathhouse reopened?! How, what . . . I mean, that's amazing!_It's such a gorgeous piece of architecture and a piece of history here in White Ash. So cool!
trans-unit.target: 天啊，你帮我让澡堂重开了？怎么可能？我是说，这太不可思议了！_它是如此华丽的建筑，也是白灰镇的一段历史。太酷了

trans-unit.source: I've been hearing from patrons at the stall that Le Sequoia is super good. People are finding you! That's awesome!
trans-unit.target: 我一直听摊位上的顾客说 Le Sequoia 超赞。人们找到了你！太棒了

trans-unit.source: The teahouse is a favorite spot of mine, but I'm not alone, a lot of people chat about it. It's very popular.
trans-unit.target: 茶馆是我最喜欢的地方，但不只是我，很多人都在谈论它。这里很受欢迎。

trans-unit.source: You may be new, but you're doing more for this town than most people who have lived here since day one. Keep it up.
trans-unit.target: 你可能是新来的，但你为这个小镇所做的，比大多数从第一天起就住在这里的人还要多。继续努力吧

trans-unit.source: (playername), I just wanted you to know that the good you are doing echoes out from you._It will bounce around and inspire others. I should know, I'm one of them.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，我只是想让你知道，你所做的好事会在你身上产生回响。我应该知道，我就是其中之一。

trans-unit.source: Your menu has a lot of what I love. I cannot wait to eat at Le Sequoia!
trans-unit.target: 您的菜单上有很多我喜欢的菜。我迫不及待地想去 Le Sequoia 餐厅用餐了！

trans-unit.source: I ate there the other day and wow! What you are offering on the menu I haven't seen here, well, ever!
trans-unit.target: 我前几天在那里吃过，哇！你们菜单上的东西，我在这里从来没见过，嗯，从来没见过！

trans-unit.source: I dunno about your menu. It's okay, I guess.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道你的菜单。还可以吧

trans-unit.source: No offense, but no thanks. The food on your menu doesn't look good to me.
trans-unit.target: 无意冒犯，但不用了，谢谢。我觉得你们菜单上的菜不好吃。

trans-unit.source: Way to keep your ventures growing without trashing our environment! As a farmer, artist, and resident here, believe me when I say we all appreciate it.
trans-unit.target: 在不破坏我们环境的前提下，让你的企业不断发展壮大！作为一名农民、艺术家和这里的居民，请相信我，我们都很感激。

trans-unit.source: You've done a lot for us by not making consumerism your top priority. Being a conscientious business owner will net you more love than anything else.
trans-unit.target: 你没有把消费主义当作头等大事，已经为我们做了很多。做一个有良心的企业主，会让你得到更多的关爱。

trans-unit.source: The impact of LELSH here has been growing. I have to admit, they put out some cool gadgets here and there._Just don't turn into one of them (playername). I will be very upset . . . if you did that.
trans-unit.target: LELSH 在这里的影响越来越大。我不得不承认，他们时不时会推出一些很酷的小玩意儿。如果你这么做了，我会很生气的。

trans-unit.source: Our local environment is on the brink of failure thanks to you! I will never be able to make art if you kill my family's business with all this waste that's being made.
trans-unit.target: 多亏了你们，我们当地的环境已经濒临破产！如果你们用这些废物扼杀了我家族的事业，我将永远无法从事艺术创作。

trans-unit.source: With these colors, I'll rule the world! Muhahahahaha! I've always wanted to do that. Thank you for not judging me outloud.
trans-unit.target: 有了这些颜色，我就能统治世界！哈哈哈哈哈 Muhahahaha！我一直都想这么做。谢谢你没有大声批评我。

trans-unit.source: I've been thinking about branching into murals at some point._The only problem is, I can load spray cans by myself, and buying them would be very costly. Oils it is for a while.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的问题是，我可以自己装载喷漆罐，而购买喷漆罐又非常昂贵。暂时只能用油画颜料了。

trans-unit.source: Once I get some more patrons, I know I'll be on the right track towards being a successful artist! Thanks for the help again.
trans-unit.target: 一旦我有了更多的赞助人，我知道我将走上成为一名成功艺术家的正轨！再次感谢您的帮助。

trans-unit.source: My patron loved the piece I made for them with the paint you made for me! Ahhhh! It's happening!
trans-unit.target: 我的赞助人很喜欢我用你为我调制的颜料为他们制作的作品！啊哈 开始了

trans-unit.source: I hope that Macman arcade cabinet is working out for you. I like the aesthetics of retro games, but not necessarily the gameplay itself.
trans-unit.target: 我希望 Macman 街机柜能为你所用。我喜欢复古游戏的美感，但不一定喜欢游戏本身。

trans-unit.source: Since I made that commission, I have had a few more possible patrons reach out to me! AHHHHHHH! So cool!
trans-unit.target: 自从我接受委托后，又有几位可能的赞助人联系了我！太酷了 太酷了

trans-unit.source: My dye needs some work, but okay I'll take it.
trans-unit.target: 我的染料还需要改进，不过好吧，我会接受的。

trans-unit.source: There's a small boutique in town run by Milo. Great threads.
trans-unit.target: 镇上有一家米洛开的小精品店。很棒的衣服

trans-unit.source: My brain just works, I can't control it sometimes, but it makes cool art.
trans-unit.target: 我的大脑就是这样工作的，有时我无法控制它，但它能创造出很酷的艺术品。

trans-unit.source: Which work? My brush or the bok choy?
trans-unit.target: 哪个有用？我的刷子还是大白菜？

trans-unit.source: Every bit of encouragement helps, so thanks.
trans-unit.target: 每一点鼓励都很有帮助，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Grab this and thanks.
trans-unit.target: 拿上这个，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: I'm a daughter of a farmer, I got it.
trans-unit.target: 我是农民的女儿，我明白。

trans-unit.source: I've been looking for one of these, thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我一直在找这个，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: This will be great for my next sculpture.. Thanks (playername). You aren't so bad.
trans-unit.target: 这对我的下一个雕刻作品很有帮助...... 谢谢(playername)。你还不错

trans-unit.source: Hmmmmm yes . . . Oh yess . . . This is a great piece. I'll take that then.
trans-unit.target: 嗯哼 是的 . 哦，是的......。这幅画很棒 那我要了。

trans-unit.source: I don't need this, but I guess I can sell this.
trans-unit.target: 我不需要这个，但我想我可以卖掉它。

trans-unit.source: Ah, what a perfect birthday gift! I can definitely use this in my art.
trans-unit.target: 啊，真是一份完美的生日礼物！我一定能把它用在我的艺术创作中。

trans-unit.source: Ehhhhhh, I'm good.
trans-unit.target: 嗯嗯嗯，我很好。

trans-unit.source: There is no artistic value, no artistic potential to this object.
trans-unit.target: 这件物品没有艺术价值，也没有艺术潜力。

trans-unit.source: This looks kinda dull.
trans-unit.target: 这看起来有点沉闷。

trans-unit.source: No thank you, you gave me one already.
trans-unit.target: 不用了，谢谢，你已经给了我一个。

trans-unit.source: I'm really okay with you asking if I want a hug in the future.
trans-unit.target: 你以后问我要不要拥抱，我真的没意见。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I'm a bit busy today.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我今天有点忙。

trans-unit.source: I'm still a little worried about giving you that scythe. Show me your toes . . . actually, that's a weird ask._I'm sure you still have all eight of them just like me. Haha!
trans-unit.target: 我还是有点担心把镰刀给你。让我看看你的脚趾......事实上，这是个奇怪的要求。_我相信你和我一样，八个脚趾都还在。哈哈

trans-unit.source: Everything we grow on our farm gets used, even the oddly shaped veggies are donated to food pantries. No waste here!
trans-unit.target: 我们农场种植的每一样东西都会被利用起来，即使是形状怪异的蔬菜也会捐给食品救济站。这里没有浪费！

trans-unit.source: You ever suddenly need a mint? Because I do.
trans-unit.target: 你有没有突然需要薄荷糖的时候？因为我需要。

trans-unit.source: Rainy days are the best days when you're not in a field, let me tell you.
trans-unit.target: 雨天是最好的日子，当你不在田野里的时候，让我告诉你。

trans-unit.source: I wish I had some coffee right now, it would pair well with the vibe.
trans-unit.target: 我真希望现在就能喝上一杯咖啡，那就更配这氛围了。

trans-unit.source: Being right next to Nabiha's booth is both inspiring and frightening._She has some of the best fruit you will find and I don't think our farm will ever be able to match it.
trans-unit.target: 她的水果是你能找到的最好的，我想我们的农场永远也比不上。

trans-unit.source: Hi (playername). How are you handling running a restaurant all by yourself?
trans-unit.target: 你好(playername)。你是如何独自经营一家餐馆的？

trans-unit.source: My culinary training has prepared me for this!
trans-unit.target: 我所接受的烹饪培训让我对此有所准备！

trans-unit.source: It's been a struggle. I don't know what to do.
trans-unit.target: 我一直在挣扎。我不知道该怎么办。

trans-unit.source: That's great to hear! I can't wait to see Le Sequoia flourish._I hope our farm's fresh veggies will be helpful towards that goal!
trans-unit.target: 很高兴听到这个消息！我迫不及待地想看到红杉树茁壮成长。_我希望我们农场的新鲜蔬菜将有助于实现这一目标！

trans-unit.source: Running a business is hard, but I think you will learn the ins and outs soon enough._If you are ever in need, be sure to ask the folks in town for help and guidance.
trans-unit.target: 经营生意很难，但我想你很快就能掌握其中的门道。_如果你有需要，一定要向镇上的人寻求帮助和指导。

trans-unit.source: The Sequoia was a really beloved place in town. Knowing that it's back makes waves, so don't be too shocked when people know of you at least.
trans-unit.target: 红杉曾是城里人人喜爱的地方。知道它回来了，就会掀起波澜，所以当人们知道你时，至少不要太震惊。

trans-unit.source: My sister and I loved The Sequoia. The roasted chicken with balsamic reduction was to die for, so, if you don't have that on your menu I might cry.
trans-unit.target: 我和妹妹都很喜欢红杉餐厅。香醋汁烤鸡让人欲罢不能，如果你们的菜单上没有这道菜，我可能会哭出来。

trans-unit.source: Do you know if the last match between Team Pots N Pans and Team Wind is still going on?_My stream isn't buffering for some reason and this being the finals, I don't want to miss it!
trans-unit.target: 你知道锅碗瓢盆队和风之队之间的最后一场比赛还在进行吗？

trans-unit.source: Oh, you're still okay with talking to me? Glad I didn't scare you off! It's just, I have very few things in life that I care about and finding amazing food and e-sports is two of them.
trans-unit.target: 哦，你还愿意跟我说话？很高兴没把你吓跑！只是，我一生中只关心几件事，而寻找美味食物和电子竞技就是其中两件事。

trans-unit.source: I've been trying to get the library to upgrade their machines in town so I can hold tournaments for fighting games!_Funds are always tight, but I think it'll happen one day. Maybe.
trans-unit.target: 我一直想让镇上的图书馆升级他们的机器，这样我就可以举办格斗游戏比赛了！_资金总是很紧张，但我想总有一天会实现的。也许吧

trans-unit.source: Tell me, (playername), what are your thoughts on lava cake?
trans-unit.target: 告诉我，(playername)，你对熔岩蛋糕有什么看法？

trans-unit.source: Lava cake is a redundant desert.
trans-unit.target: 熔岩蛋糕是一种多余的沙漠。

trans-unit.source: I'm not a fan, but I get why people like it.
trans-unit.target: 我不是它的粉丝，但我明白人们为什么喜欢它。

trans-unit.source: Wow, those are some feelings to have on the subject. I, in fact, like lava cake and was curious if you liked it which I now know is a no.
trans-unit.target: 哇，你对这个问题还真有感情。事实上，我很喜欢熔岩蛋糕，我很好奇你是否喜欢它，现在我知道你是不喜欢的。

trans-unit.source: I know a lot of chefs are passionate about their distaste for that dessert. Glad to see you're not that pretentious.
trans-unit.target: 我知道很多厨师都对这种甜点深恶痛绝。很高兴看到你没有那么自命不凡。

trans-unit.source: Bowie also is a bit of a foodie, even though you'd never suspect it from his laid back fishing vibe. He's my foodie buddy!
trans-unit.target: 鲍威也是个美食家，尽管从他悠闲的钓鱼氛围中你永远不会怀疑这一点。他是我的美食好友！

trans-unit.source: A lot of people in White Ash Harbor aren't what they seem to be on the surface. Hopefully there aren't a lot of serial killers posing as normal folk.
trans-unit.target: 白灰港的很多人并不像表面上看起来那样。希望没有很多连环杀手假扮成普通人。

trans-unit.source: Food and desserts are my creative outlet. My sister is the artist of the family, she wants to be one full-time, and I hope she makes it. Me?_I like the farming and keeping my creativity my own.
trans-unit.target: 食物和甜点是我的创作源泉。我妹妹是家里的艺术家，她想成为一名全职艺术家，我希望她能做到。我呢？

trans-unit.source: Not many people know this, but Anna May and I used to dress the same. Every day._Well . . . until our parents finally understood that we really meant no when we said no. We were already 14 by then.
trans-unit.target: 没有多少人知道，安娜-梅和我以前每天都穿一样的衣服。直到我们的父母终于明白，我们说 “不 ”是真的 “不”。那时我们已经14岁了

trans-unit.source: Before you opened Le Sequoia, one of the only spots in town was Bea's Bar._She makes great drinks and is lovely, but there were some big misses from time to time with her food menu.
trans-unit.target: 在您开设 Le Sequoia 之前，镇上仅有的几家餐厅之一就是 Bea's Bar。

trans-unit.source: What are your goals in this life (playername)?_Just working till you're dead like the rest of us?
trans-unit.target: 你此生(playername)的目标是什么？

trans-unit.source: To make great food everyday.
trans-unit.target: 每天制作美味佳肴

trans-unit.source: To build an empire of frozen food products and make money.
trans-unit.target: 建立一个冷冻食品帝国并赚钱。

trans-unit.source: That's very romantic. Mostly I meant what is it that you want to do in this life? I am not all about my work all the time. What kind of a life is that, even?
trans-unit.target: 这很浪漫。我的主要意思是，你这辈子想做什么？我不是一直都在工作。那是什么样的生活？

trans-unit.source: That is ambitious. Guess that's one way of making a living, even if it does sound a bit . . . cold and dispassionate. Eh? See what I did there?
trans-unit.target: 真是雄心勃勃。我想这也是一种谋生之道，尽管听起来有点......冷酷无情。嗯？看到我做了什么吗？

trans-unit.source: I am going to keep the farm going when my parents hand it over to me, but I do want to do other things in this life as well.
trans-unit.target: 当我父母把农场交给我时，我会继续经营下去，但我也想在这一生中做其他事情。

trans-unit.source: Retirement isn't in the cards for us, meaning you and I. Our jobs are for life, right (playername)?
trans-unit.target: 我们的工作是终身的，对吗(playername)？

trans-unit.source: I don't know if the farm will last forever or if I'll be alive beyond next week, so I try to outline my life but not plan hard for it.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道农场是否会永远存在下去，也不知道下周之后我是否还能活着，所以我试图勾勒出我的生活轮廓，但并不刻意规划。

trans-unit.source: I am taking a page out of my sister's book and making sure I have something for myself outside of work that I want to do with my life._Such as making a puppet show. I will one day do that . . . maybe.
trans-unit.target: 我正在借鉴我姐姐的做法，确保自己在工作之余也有自己想做的事情。也许有一天我会这么做的......。

trans-unit.source: When I was a kid, I would go exploring in the caves along the beach._Be careful in there, some of the animals can be pretty big. Just keep your distance.
trans-unit.target: 当我还是个孩子的时候，我会去海边的洞穴里探险。保持距离

trans-unit.source: How's everything going for you so far?_Life in White Ash Harbor adding towards something?
trans-unit.target: 白灰港的生活有什么进展吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm a little stressed about how my shop is doing.
trans-unit.target: 我对自己店铺的经营状况有点紧张。

trans-unit.source: I am feeling pretty relaxed these days.
trans-unit.target: 这些天我感觉很放松。

trans-unit.source: Yep, when you're running your own ship, stress varies in size, but it is there.
trans-unit.target: 是的，当你经营自己的船时，压力大小不一，但它确实存在。

trans-unit.source: I get that. What helps me is goal setting. If I can check that item on my list, I feel like I've done something worthwhile. It's simple, but it works.
trans-unit.target: 我明白。对我有帮助的是设定目标。如果我能勾选清单上的那一项，我就会觉得自己做了一件有意义的事。这很简单，但很有效。

trans-unit.source: My dad asked me to check and see why the farm's computer was running so slow._I opened it up, and wow, I haven't seen that much dust and feathers inside a space since one of our pillows exploded during pretty nasty pillow fight.
trans-unit.target: 我打开一看，哇，自从我们的一个枕头在激烈的枕头大战中爆炸以来，我还从来没有在一个空间里看到过这么多的灰尘和羽毛。

trans-unit.source: Farmers are the kind of folks who would rather lose their arm to a auger than give up. Farmers are a hopeful lot, I give us that.
trans-unit.target: 农民是那种宁可被钻头钻断胳膊也不会放弃的人。我承认，农民是充满希望的一群人。

trans-unit.source: Feeding folks and giving them what they need is what brings me joy. Well, that and reading . . . and talking to friends._I think humans need many avenues of joy. Confining yourself to just one is rather limiting.
trans-unit.target: 为人们提供食物，满足他们的需要，这就是我的快乐所在。我认为人类需要多种获得快乐的途径。我认为人类需要多种获得快乐的途径。

trans-unit.source: Change is a normal thing to have happen to someone. Look at Thelio._He's been working on his anger for years and you can see him trying hard. Change is normal, but that doesn't mean it's easy.
trans-unit.target: 改变是一件很正常的事情。看看 Thelio。_他多年来一直在努力克制自己的愤怒，你可以看到他很努力。改变是正常的，但并不意味着容易。

trans-unit.source: I love our small town, but it would have rotted away if you didn't show up when you did._I mean that, we are a community of hard workers, but you brought something that was missing here: Direction.
trans-unit.target: 我爱我们的小镇，但如果你们不出现，它早就烂掉了。_我是认真的，我们是一个勤劳的社区，但你们带来了这里缺少的东西： 方向

trans-unit.source: I really hope I don't scare you away from me. . . I just really want this to work because you are someone I admire and love._I hope you are okay with my intense personality.
trans-unit.target: 我真的希望我不会把你从我身边吓跑。. 我真的很希望能和你在一起，因为你是我钦佩和爱戴的人。

trans-unit.source: I am right there wheat you.
trans-unit.target: 我就在你身边。

trans-unit.source: I am here for you through thick and thin.
trans-unit.target: 我与你们风雨同舟。

trans-unit.source: Ah, puns, that's how I know this is real. I'm glad you can pick up what I was sowing! Haha!
trans-unit.target: 啊，双关语，所以我才知道这是真的。我很高兴你能理解我的意思！哈哈！

trans-unit.source: And you know what I like, you meant what you just said, and that gives me a calm I have been missing in my life. I love us.
trans-unit.target: 你知道我喜欢什么吗？你刚才说的都是真心话，这让我感到了生活中一直缺少的平静。我爱我们

trans-unit.source: I woke up at 4 am today to make sure we got everything harvested from this season's plantings._I can really go for a bath, tea, and you sometime soon.
trans-unit.target: 我今天凌晨四点就起床了，以确保我们这一季种植的所有作物都能收获。

trans-unit.source: I meant it when I said you make me feel like a warm cup of tea. I don't say that to just anyone._I love tea and like four people and you're one of them. It's a short list, count yourself lucky. Haha!
trans-unit.target: 当我说你让我感觉像一杯温暖的茶时，我是认真的。我喜欢茶，喜欢四个人，你是其中之一。这是个很短的名单，算你走运。哈哈

trans-unit.source: Farmers are known for their patience, but I am less patient when it comes to dating._It's cost me in the past, but when I love someone, I love them with all of me. So, when are we getting married? Don't answer that! PATIENCE, Mae-Lou!
trans-unit.target: 农民的耐心是出了名的，但我在谈恋爱时就没那么有耐心了。_过去我为此付出过代价，但当我爱上一个人时，我会用我的全部去爱他。我们什么时候结婚？别回答 耐心点，玫露

trans-unit.source: I am very ready to bypass the awkward 'getting to know you' phase of our relationship._I cannot wait to be in the 'cozy sweats and knowing what the other wants without speaking' portion. I'm lazy, what can I say?
trans-unit.target: 我已经做好准备，绕过我们关系中尴尬的 “了解你 ”阶段。_我迫不及待地想进入 “舒适的汗水和不说话就知道对方想要什么 ”的阶段。我很懒，我能说什么呢？

trans-unit.source: I am not trying to get my hopes up but . . ._I am a farmer, we don't count anything until we harvest it, but I really hope the romance we've planted here will sprout into something lovely.
trans-unit.target: 我并不想抱太大的希望，但......_我是个农民，我们在收获之前不会计算任何东西，但我真的希望我们在这里种下的浪漫会发芽，变成可爱的东西。

trans-unit.source: I saw that Le Sequoia is open! It's nice to see hard work pay off, doesn't it? Good job.
trans-unit.target: 我看到红杉餐厅开张了！看到辛勤工作得到回报，感觉很好，不是吗？干得好

trans-unit.source: Your first review. It must be exciting. Keep shooting for the stars, (playername). I will be cheering you on.
trans-unit.target: 您的第一份评论。一定很激动人心。继续向星星进发吧，(playername)。我会为你加油的。

trans-unit.source: After a long day pulling a harvest from the ground, laying in a big, warm bath sounds lovely. Thanks for giving us that peace at the end of the day.
trans-unit.target: 从地里拔了一天的庄稼后，躺在温暖的大浴缸里听起来很舒服。谢谢你在一天结束时给我们带来宁静。

trans-unit.source: People here have been saying you are doing some great stuff at Le Sequoia. Keep going!
trans-unit.target: 这里的人都说你在 Le Sequoia 做了很多很棒的事情。继续努力！

trans-unit.source: My family and I love the teahouse, but I also know it's a big draw for tourists too. Good work.
trans-unit.target: 我和家人都很喜欢这家茶馆，但我也知道它对游客也有很大的吸引力。干得好

trans-unit.source: You're doing some good answering those help ads. Go you.
trans-unit.target: 你在回复求助广告方面做得不错。加油

trans-unit.source: Someone needs to make you a pie sometime. I feel you've more than earned it for all the good you've done.
trans-unit.target: 改天得有人给你做个派。你做了这么多好事，我觉得你应该得到它。

trans-unit.source: I've heard you have a great veggie selection on the menu at Le Sequoia and color me intrigued! I cannot wait to try some of these dishes out.
trans-unit.target: 我听说您在 Le Sequoia 的菜单上有很多蔬菜选择，这让我很感兴趣！我迫不及待地想尝尝这些菜肴。

trans-unit.source: My inner foodie was so happy being at Le Sequoia the other day. Everything looked just delicious and my food was perfect!_I didn't know you could make vegetables taste like that!
trans-unit.target: 前几天在红杉餐厅，我内心的美食家们开心极了。一切看起来都那么美味，我的食物也非常完美！_我不知道蔬菜还能做成这样的味道！

trans-unit.source: I heard you have a great menu (playername), but I'm just not a big fan of the focus on meat. Sorry.
trans-unit.target: 我听说你们的菜单(playername)很不错，但我不太喜欢以肉为主。对不起。

trans-unit.source: I had hoped you would use my veggies in your menu. To say I'd sad about that would be . . . It would be an understatement. Goodbye.
trans-unit.target: 我一直希望你能在菜单中使用我的蔬菜。如果说我为此感到难过，那就太....... 是轻描淡写 再见了

trans-unit.source: Our farm needs the land to be healthy. You've done a great job foraging wild ingredients without damaging the land.
trans-unit.target: 我们的农场需要土地来保持健康。你们在不破坏土地的前提下觅食野生食材，做得很好。

trans-unit.source: I dunno how you manage it, but White Ash Harbor looks better than ever._It's easy to overharvest the natural resources, but the forest and the hills look as lively as ever.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道你们是怎么做到的，但白灰港看起来比以前更好了。_过度开采自然资源很容易，但森林和山丘看起来还是那么生机勃勃。

trans-unit.source: I found a wrapper in my field from one of the vending machines. I hope this isn't your doing (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我在我的田里发现了一个自动售货机的包装纸。我希望这不是你干的(playername)。

trans-unit.source: If my crop fails because we cannot source unpolluted ground water, you'll be hearing from me._Or maybe . . . your ankles will be hearing from my scythe.
trans-unit.target: 如果我的庄稼因为无法获得无污染的地下水而歉收，你就等着我的消息吧！_或者，也许......你的脚踝会被我的镰刀割伤。

trans-unit.source: I am very happy to report that mom and dad really like those veggie dishes you made for them. Thanks for that.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴地告诉你，爸爸妈妈非常喜欢你为他们做的那些素菜。谢谢你们。

trans-unit.source: I've been heading the library every once in a while to find more veggie based recipes. It's been a lot more fruitful than any internet based ones.
trans-unit.target: 我每隔一段时间就会去图书馆寻找更多素食食谱。这比在网上找食谱更有收获。

trans-unit.source: A lot of my research has shown me that there is more to veggies than bell pepper and cucumbers. Some have some real medicinal properties to them!
trans-unit.target: 我的大量研究表明，蔬菜的作用远不止甜椒和黄瓜。有些蔬菜还具有真正的药用价值！

trans-unit.source: My Nana is doing better since she had that drink you made for her._Her pain is less, she isn't completely cured, but I'll take this over where she was before.
trans-unit.target: 自从我奶奶喝了你为她调制的那杯酒后，她好多了。_她的疼痛减轻了，虽然还没有完全痊愈，但比起她以前的状况，我觉得现在好多了。

trans-unit.source: The other day, while Nana was tending to her garden, a lady bug landed on her and she said she was the luckiest lady in the world._Getting her outside again was because of you, thank you for that moment.
trans-unit.target: 有一天，娜娜在打理花园时，一只瓢虫落在了她身上，她说她是世界上最幸运的女人。

trans-unit.source: Life shouldn't be pain, but pain is a motivator to do certain things because we want to avoid pain._To me, pain is like a friend who has a harsh truth to tell you, and if you don't listen to it then it's gonna suck.
trans-unit.target: 生活不应该是痛苦的，但痛苦是我们做某些事情的动力，因为我们想避免痛苦。_对我来说，痛苦就像一个朋友，他要告诉你一个残酷的事实，如果你不听，那就会很糟糕。

trans-unit.source: I got some mud on me, but thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我身上有些泥，不过还是谢谢你。

trans-unit.source: Oh, these are not to be seen as anything other than making sure I'm not nude.
trans-unit.target: 哦，除了确保我没有裸体之外，这些可不能被看成是别的什么。

trans-unit.source: How do you compliment a brain? That seems odd.
trans-unit.target: 如何赞美大脑？这似乎有点奇怪。

trans-unit.source: As a farmer, that's what I do all day everyday. It's tiring. Haha!
trans-unit.target: 作为一个农民，我每天都在干这个。真累啊 哈哈！

trans-unit.source: When you work all night to birth a calf only to lose it in the morning . . . it takes it out of yea, but also reminds you that life is fragile.
trans-unit.target: 当你彻夜工作生下一头小牛，却在清晨失去了它......这让你感到沮丧，但也提醒你生命是脆弱的。

trans-unit.source: Hop up, let's go.
trans-unit.target: 跳起来，我们走

trans-unit.source: No thanks, I got it.
trans-unit.target: 不用了，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Perfect for waking me up. You are very thoughtful (playername).
trans-unit.target: 非常适合唤醒我。你真体贴(playername)。

trans-unit.source: I sooooo needed this! Thanks (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我太需要这个了！谢谢(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Whew, talk about right place at the right time! This will hit the spot for sure!
trans-unit.target: 真是天时地利人和！这肯定会让人眼前一亮！

trans-unit.source: How much did you spend on this! Oh, it's for me? Oh . . . I will take . . . this.
trans-unit.target: 你在这上面花了多少钱 哦，给我的？哦 . . . 我要......这个

trans-unit.source: You just made this game perfect (playername). I really mean it.
trans-unit.target: 你让这个游戏变得完美了(playername)。我说真的

trans-unit.source: You should just chuck it into a field._Uh, sorry. I'm not myself without some . . . Never mind.
trans-unit.target: 你应该把它扔到田里去。没点......我就不是我自己了。没关系 Never mind.

trans-unit.source: No no no. I don't want this right now.
trans-unit.target: 不不不 我现在不想这样

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I don't need this.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我不需要这个。

trans-unit.source: Thanks, but you've already given me something today.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，但你今天已经给了我一些东西。

trans-unit.source: Not too tight, my back is killing me.
trans-unit.target: 不要太紧，我的背疼死了。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I'm a bit busy today.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我今天有点忙。

trans-unit.source: Sells vegitables
trans-unit.target: 销售蔬菜

trans-unit.source: Takashi Farms has the freshest veg you'll find anywhere.
trans-unit.target: Takashi 农场有你在任何地方都能找到的最新鲜的蔬菜。

trans-unit.source: Our veggies were just pulled out of the ground this morning. Mind the dirt.
trans-unit.target: 我们的蔬菜今天早上刚从地里拔出来。小心泥土

trans-unit.source: Never put tomatoes in the fridge! They will go bad.
trans-unit.target: 永远不要把西红柿放进冰箱！它们会变坏的。

trans-unit.source: Remember, everything wants to be a crab. Even veggies.
trans-unit.target: 记住，所有东西都想成为螃蟹。就连蔬菜也不例外。

trans-unit.source: Our prices are based on the market. Right now, the market is here, so this is the price.
trans-unit.target: 我们的价格以市场为基础。现在，市场就在这里，所以这就是价格。

trans-unit.source: That's so fresh!
trans-unit.target: 太新鲜了

trans-unit.source: I am glad to see it go home with someone.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴看到它被人带回家。

trans-unit.source: I love those!
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢这些！

trans-unit.source: I didn't know you could get these around here!
trans-unit.target: 我都不知道这附近能买到这些东西！

trans-unit.source: I am buying all of these for a reason. Reasons you don't need to know.
trans-unit.target: 我买这些东西都是有原因的。你不需要知道的原因。

trans-unit.source: Where did you get these?
trans-unit.target: 你从哪里得到这些的？

trans-unit.source: These are terrible, no one will eat them.
trans-unit.target: 这太难吃了，没人会吃。

trans-unit.source: I can't do anything with that.
trans-unit.target: 我对此无能为力。

trans-unit.source: If you can't be serious, then neither can I.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不认真，那我也不认真。

trans-unit.source: You need credits to buy food here.
trans-unit.target: 在这里购买食物需要信用点数。

trans-unit.source: We are not a charity, sorry.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我们不是慈善机构。

trans-unit.source: I know you really want it, but I also really want to stay open, and cannot give away food.
trans-unit.target: 我知道你们很想要，但我也很想继续营业，不能把食物送人。

trans-unit.source: Are you a bag of trash? Then why are you talking to me? I got trash to collect. MOVE!
trans-unit.target: 你是垃圾吗？那你为什么跟我说话？我有垃圾要收 走

trans-unit.source: Want to help? Grab a bag, a claw arm, and get to work.
trans-unit.target: 想帮忙吗？拿上袋子和爪子，开始工作吧。

trans-unit.source: I have to get Mrs. Mary Anne her medication and talking to you isn't going to get that done.
trans-unit.target: 我得去给玛丽-安妮太太拿药 和你说话是没用的

trans-unit.source: There is so much I need to do today and stopping to talk to you isn't one of them.
trans-unit.target: 我今天要做的事情太多了，停下来和你谈谈并不是其中之一。

trans-unit.source: Okay . . . we, I . . . I may have gotten off on the wrong foot earlier. Sorry about that.
trans-unit.target: 好吧......我们，我......。我刚才可能说错话了。很抱歉

trans-unit.source: Living in a city with so much hidden potential makes me a bit abrasive sometimes because I want it to shine bright ASAP._I get too wrapped up in the doing that I forget my manners sometimes. So, again, sorry about how I was behaving.
trans-unit.target: 生活在这座潜藏着巨大潜力的城市里，我有时会变得有些粗鲁，因为我希望它尽快绽放光芒。所以，再次为我的行为道歉。

trans-unit.source: My role with the city is a super official one. As the intern, I serve White Ash Harbor and her citizens._I have a moment, is there anything you need right now?
trans-unit.target: 我在市政府的角色是超级官员 作为实习生，我为白灰港和她的市民服务。_我有时间，你现在有什么需要吗？

trans-unit.source: Right now, I think I'm okay, thanks though?
trans-unit.target: 现在，我觉得我很好，不过还是谢谢你。

trans-unit.source: I . . . wait, you're not going to bite my head off?
trans-unit.target: 我......等等，你不会把我的头咬掉吧？

trans-unit.source: I am simply offering assistance to a citizen of my town. It's always there. Never question it.
trans-unit.target: 我只是向本镇的一位市民提供帮助。它总是在那里。不要质疑它。

trans-unit.source: You ever had a bad day? Try a bad week sometime.
trans-unit.target: 你有过糟糕的一天吗？试试糟糕的一周吧。

trans-unit.source: Look, I . . . ugh, I apologize. I have a lot to do right now and that's how it always is around White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 听着，我......唉，我道歉。我现在有很多事情要做 白灰港总是这样的

trans-unit.source: I got events to plan, community gatherings to organize, and some deliveries to be completed.
trans-unit.target: 我有活动要策划，有社区聚会要组织，还有一些交付工作要完成。

trans-unit.source: My job is volunteer work for the city, but man, it would take the sting out of some of my work if they paid me.
trans-unit.target: 我的工作是为市政府做义工，但如果他们给我报酬，我就不会这么辛苦了。

trans-unit.source: I was talking to Bowie the other day and found out about the old mines that are in the wilderness around White Ash Harbor._Death trap or an opportunity for eco-tourism? Lemme see how we can make those spaces safe for the public.
trans-unit.target: 前几天我和鲍伊聊天时，发现了白灰港周围荒野上的老矿井。死亡陷阱还是生态旅游的机会？让我看看如何才能让这些地方对公众安全。

trans-unit.source: Hey, do you like wrestling? Random question, I know, but answer nonetheless.
trans-unit.target: 嘿，你喜欢摔跤吗？我知道这是个随机问题，但还是回答一下吧。

trans-unit.source: Yes! Chair combat and stories are the best.
trans-unit.target: 是的 椅子上的战斗和故事是最精彩的。

trans-unit.source: No, I find the activity boring if I'm honest.
trans-unit.target: 不，说实话，我觉得这项活动很无聊。

trans-unit.source: Ah, you must have seen last week's Coliseum Rumble! What the hell is going with T-Train?_Does he love Elysium or not? Make up your damn mind man! Right? At least he put on a good show with that chair . . .
trans-unit.target: 啊，你一定看过上周的 “竞技场大乱斗 ”了！他到底爱不爱极乐世界？你他妈自己好好想想吧 对不对？至少他用那把椅子演了一场好戏. .

trans-unit.source: I find you rather boring, if I'm honest. Oh, I'm sorry, did I say that out loud?
trans-unit.target: 说实话，我觉得你挺无聊的。哦，对不起，我说大声了吗？

trans-unit.source: I don't know why, but romantic subplots in wrestling really resonate with me. It feeds something inside of me._Seeing these massive people, going through hell, for the ones they love is just inspiring to me.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道为什么，但摔跤比赛中的浪漫情节真的能引起我的共鸣。看到这些大块头的人，为了他们所爱的人，历经磨难，我很受鼓舞。

trans-unit.source: The Hades in the Cage match is on tonight. You gonna watch?_My money is on Red Fin because if he doesn't get the attache case tonight, his fianc� Gidget, once thought dead in a plane accident in the mountains, will be taken off life support.
trans-unit.target: “阎王笼 "的比赛今晚举行 你要看吗？我赌红鳍赢，因为如果他今晚拿不到手提箱 他的未婚妻吉吉特曾被认为死于山中的飞机事故

trans-unit.source: I . . . I can't believe Red Fin didn't win. This loss will haunt him throughout this storyline._Man, I don't think he's gonna make it into the championships this year. Poor Gidget . . .
trans-unit.target: I . . . 我不敢相信红翅没有赢 这次失利会让他在整个故事情节中都耿耿于怀。_伙计，我觉得他今年进不了冠军赛了。可怜的吉吉特

trans-unit.source: If I fell off the top of the cage like T-Train did the other night as a firefighter, I'd probably be dead!_How these guys just get back up and walking is simply impressive.
trans-unit.target: 如果我像那晚的消防员 T-Train一样从笼子顶上摔下来，我可能已经死了！_这些人是如何重新站起来行走的，简直令人印象深刻。

trans-unit.source: Seeing what your restaurant has done for White Ash Harbor gives me a lot of hope for new businesses in town._I think. . . I think we're hitting an up swing!
trans-unit.target: 看到您的餐厅为白灰港所做的一切，我对镇上的新企业充满了希望。. . 我觉得我们正处于上升期

trans-unit.source: This latest event I'm planning for the city has me running all over town! Ugh!_I need like five assistants! WHY DOESN'T THIS POSITION PAY?!
trans-unit.target: 我最近为市里策划的这个活动让我满城跑！我需要五个助手！为什么这个职位没有薪水？

trans-unit.source: Why not ask the city council for a stipend or even a job?
trans-unit.target: 为什么不向市议会申请津贴甚至工作呢？

trans-unit.source: This is why volunteering can't be a full-time job.
trans-unit.target: 这就是志愿服务不能成为全职工作的原因。

trans-unit.source: . . . I dunno, they might just . . . you know what? I will. Yeah, because if I'm not the one to get these events going then no one is! They'd be stuck without me . . . I think.
trans-unit.target: . . . 你知道吗？我会的 是啊，因为如果我不负责这些活动 那就没人能负责了 没有我，他们会被困住的 我想也是

trans-unit.source: True enough, but it doesn't help that none of this wouldn't get done unless I was the one running around to get it done!_HEY, that gives me an idea . . . I'll talk later, gotta go.
trans-unit.target: 这倒是真的，不过这也没办法，除非是我自己跑来跑去，否则这些事都做不成！_嘿，这给了我一个主意....... 待会儿再说，我得走了。

trans-unit.source: I'm going to petition that the city council give me a stipend! I'm a little freaked that they might dump me over it . . . but I am worth it, damn it!
trans-unit.target: 我要向市议会请愿，给我一笔津贴！我有点担心他们会因此而抛弃我............但我值得，该死的！

trans-unit.source: I got trucks coming in today with my order of tables and chairs so the city doesn't have to keep renting them everytime we hold an event._Meaning, I'm busy for the day. Let's chat later though, okay?
trans-unit.target: 今天有卡车运来我订购的桌椅，这样市里就不用每次举办活动都要租桌椅了。晚点再聊，好吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm taking a break, because if I don't do that then I'll . . . who's texting me . . . NO!_Wrong address WRONG ADDRESS! Get that popcorn over to city hall NOW!
trans-unit.target: 我要休息一下，因为如果我不这样做，我就会......谁在给我发短信....... 地址错了 地址错了 马上把爆米花送到市政厅去

trans-unit.source: You'll be happy to know that I stood up for myself today and got the stipend!_They couldn't imagine not having me around. I'm just glad I get to help out this community without having to hunt for a paycheck elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 你会很高兴知道，我今天为自己出了头，拿到了津贴！_他们无法想象没有我在身边的日子。我很高兴能为这个社区出一份力，而不用去别的地方讨薪。

trans-unit.source: One of my favorite places to be in just in town. I work in it all day, but I love seeing everyone being there and living their lives in it._It refills my passion and that helps me be the best public servant I can be.
trans-unit.target: 就在城里，这是我最喜欢的地方之一。我整天都在这里工作，但我喜欢看到每个人都在这里生活。

trans-unit.source: Guess what I found the other day! Go ahead! GUESS!
trans-unit.target: 猜猜我那天发现了什么？猜吧！猜猜看

trans-unit.source: I CAN'T! I DON'T DO WELL UNDER PRESSURE!
trans-unit.target: 我做不到 我不擅长承受压力

trans-unit.source: Bigfoot! You finally found Bigfoot!
trans-unit.target: 大脚怪 你终于找到大脚怪了

trans-unit.source: You don't do well under pressure? Aren't you a chef?! Anyway, I found THE book that was written for me!_It's a wrestling love story called 'Ladder Fight Confessions' and I am eating this book its so good!
trans-unit.target: 你在压力下表现不好？你不是厨师吗？总之，我找到了那本为我而写的书！_这是一个摔跤爱情故事，名叫《梯斗告白》，我正在吃这本书，它太好吃了！

trans-unit.source: What? No! There's a Bigfoot? Why? Doesn't matter! I found THE book that was written for me!_It's a wrestling love story called 'Ladder Fight Confessions' and I am eating this book its so good!
trans-unit.target: 什么？没有 有大脚怪？为什么？这不重要！我找到了一本写给我的书！_这是一个摔跤爱情故事，名叫《梯斗告白》，我正在吃这本书，它太好看了！

trans-unit.source: Now that I have some funding, I have been able to get so much more done around here._You wouldn't have imagined how much work . . . one moment, I got a text . . . NO! I gotta go!
trans-unit.target: 现在我有了一些资金，我可以在这里做更多的事情了。_你不会想象有多少工作......有一刻，我收到了一条短信....... 我得走了！我得走了

trans-unit.source: I think the people of White Ash Harbor are kind of like my family since I don't really have one._Mom died when I was seven and dad vanished not long after. This town took care of me and that's why I do what I do.
trans-unit.target: 我认为白灰港的居民就像是我的家人，因为我没有真正的家人。这个小镇照顾我，所以我才做了现在的工作。

trans-unit.source: If I wasn't doing this job, what would I be doing?_I frankly don't know, because working to make this city the best it can be is all I've wanted to do with my life.
trans-unit.target: 老实说，我也不知道，因为努力让这座城市成为最好的城市是我一生的追求。

trans-unit.source: I finished that book I was telling you about, and wow, what a tear jerker!_Also, it's got some amazing . . . well . . . plot. So much great plot. Yep! Great plot.
trans-unit.target: 我看完了我跟你说过的那本书，哇，真是催人泪下啊！_另外，这本书还有一些惊人的......嗯......情节。这么多精彩的情节。没错！伟大的情节。

trans-unit.source: I really need to suggest to our outreach department that we advertise the giant seqouia tree growing in our town's backyard._Could you imagine if people actually heard about it? Eco-tourism is the future.
trans-unit.target: 我真的需要向我们的外联部建议，我们应该宣传一下生长在我们镇后院的巨型海棠树。生态旅游是未来的趋势。

trans-unit.source: When it comes to us, I am going to make sure that I have boundaries setup so I will not be answering . . ._. . . Answering any messages that come in while we're hanging out . . ._Oh, there's a lot of new messages.
trans-unit.target: 当涉及到我们的时候，我要确保我设置了界限，所以我不会回答. . . _.。. . ......_哦，有很多新留言。

trans-unit.source: You can answer them, it's okay.
trans-unit.target: 你可以回答，没关系。

trans-unit.source: AHEM!
trans-unit.target: AHEM！

trans-unit.source: I meant it when I said I wouldn't. . . but I'm going to start doing that after I answer THESE ones and then no more!
trans-unit.target: 我说我不会的时候是认真的. .但我在回答完这些问题后就会开始这样做，然后就不会再回答了！

trans-unit.source: Yea, yea, I know what I said, but. . . these look important! Uhhhhh! AHHHH! It can wait! I'm sure they'll figure it out.
trans-unit.target: 是的，是的，我知道我说了什么，但是. . 这些看起来很重要！啊啊啊 啊！可以等等 我相信他们会想出办法的

trans-unit.source: Boundaries are something I am working on because I have a responsibility to the city and to you._I'm just asking that you please give me some grace while I am learning how to do it.
trans-unit.target: 界限是我正在努力的事情，因为我对这座城市和你们负有责任。

trans-unit.source: I cannot wait to watch some wrestling matches with you! Ahhhh! It's gonna be so much fun!
trans-unit.target: 我等不及要和你一起看摔跤比赛了！啊哈 一定会很好玩的

trans-unit.source: I am planning our time for the week, and I have a two meeting slots coming up._One is with the city planning commission and the other is dinner, you and me and a premade dinner._You won't have to cook! I promise.
trans-unit.target: 我在计划我们这周的时间，有两个会议要开。_一个是和市规划委员会的会议，另一个是晚餐，你和我，还有一份事先准备好的晚餐！我保证

trans-unit.source: I do not want to fail at our relationship. Like, I don't want us to fall apart because of my lack of action._I want to give my 110% and know that I did my best in the event of anything happening. Not that I want that, but I have a plan for anything.
trans-unit.target: 我不想我们的关系失败。比如，我不想因为我的不作为而导致我们的关系破裂。_我想付出 110%的努力，并且知道在发生任何事情的时候，我已经尽力了。我并不希望这样，但我对任何事情都有计划。

trans-unit.source: You will not find another partner who is as committed as I am, this I promise you. You and me are always at the forefront of my mind.
trans-unit.target: 我向你保证，你再也找不到像我这样全心全意的伴侣了。你和我永远是我心中最重要的两个人。

trans-unit.source: I was in a planning meeting when I heard that your restaurant is open. Congratulations.
trans-unit.target: 听说你的餐厅开张时，我正在参加一个计划会议。祝贺你

trans-unit.source: Lucius' reviews are pretty infamous here in Town Hall. Some of the other people in the building really like how . . . direct he can be._I think he's a jerk. Plain and simple. Don't give jerks the time of day.
trans-unit.target: 卢修斯的评论在市政厅很出名 大楼里的其他人都很喜欢他的直率 简单明了 别给混蛋好脸色看

trans-unit.source: How . . . how did I miss you working on one of the biggest pieces of White Ash Harbor's cultural landmarks?!_How did you even get in? I heard it was haunted and . . . regardless, it's great to see it open again. Thanks for helping with that.
trans-unit.target: 你是怎么进来的？我听说那里闹鬼，......不管怎样，看到它重新开放真是太好了。谢谢你的帮助。

trans-unit.source: Your restaurant is making its way into a lot of conversations I am having. Seems like a real nice spot. I'll have to check it out.
trans-unit.target: 我在很多谈话中都提到了你的餐厅。看起来是个不错的地方。我得去看看。

trans-unit.source: I overheard some tourists say the Teahouse was sublime. Whatever you're doing, keep doing it. White Ash is growing well because of it.
trans-unit.target: 我无意中听到一些游客说，茶馆非常棒。无论你在做什么，都要坚持下去。白蜡树因此发展得很好。

trans-unit.source: Are you answering the bulletin board requests too? I thought I was the only one doing that! High-five! Yeahhh!
trans-unit.target: 你也在回复公告板上的请求吗？我还以为只有我一个人这么做呢！击个掌 是啊

trans-unit.source: Hey now, are you doing more requests than me? Is that even possible?! I don't think you realize how competitive I can be!_Consider this a challenge! I will out help others more than you! Muhahaha! I mean, good job helping out.
trans-unit.target: 嘿，你的请求比我还多？这可能吗？我想你还没意识到我的好胜心有多强！_把这当成一个挑战吧！我会比你更多地帮助别人！哈哈哈！我是说，你帮得很好。

trans-unit.source: I heard about what you have on your menu. Sounds rather fancy, but it's getting attention._Oh, by the way, I really like a good pastry. Remember that.
trans-unit.target: 我听说了你的菜单 听起来很花哨 但很受关注 顺便说一句 我很喜欢美味的糕点 记住了 Remember that.

trans-unit.source: Your menu is amazing, especially the pastries and baked goods. I finally went and at it Le Sequoia and, wow! I haven't had anything like it before.
trans-unit.target: 您的菜单令人惊叹，尤其是糕点和烘焙食品。我终于去吃了红杉餐厅，哇！我以前从未吃过这样的东西。

trans-unit.source: Your menu . . . uhhh, I'm not the foodie type, but it sounds meh. I knew when I saw all that meat in the menu.
trans-unit.target: 你的菜单. 我不是美食家，但听起来不怎么样。看到菜单上的肉，我就知道了。

trans-unit.source: I dunno why you keep asking me about the menu because nothing has changed since you last asked.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道你为什么一直问我菜单的事，因为从你上次问到现在，什么都没变。

trans-unit.source: I hate litter and you have done a great job keeping it at bay. Thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我讨厌乱扔垃圾，你们做得很好。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: People who drop trash in town get a grim look from me. Our town isn't trash, so do not treat it as such! Thanks for not leaving trash behind.
trans-unit.target: 在镇上扔垃圾的人都会遭到我严厉的批评。我们的小镇不是垃圾场，所以不要把它当成垃圾场！谢谢你没有留下垃圾。

trans-unit.source: Hey! Your little venture in town is causing the place to become a trash heap! Clean up your act!
trans-unit.target: 嘿，你在镇上的小生意让这里变成了垃圾堆！你给我老实点

trans-unit.source: I HATE LITTER! Stop making it or so help me I will bring down the might of my position as intern to this fine town!
trans-unit.target: 我讨厌酒！别再制造了，否则我就把我实习生的威信降到这个小镇上！

trans-unit.source: Those poor kids! I had no idea that they didn't have any place to live._I thought the thieves were more mustache-twirling bad-guys! Not hungry children!
trans-unit.target: 那些可怜的孩子 我还以为小偷都是些留胡子的坏蛋呢！而不是饥饿的孩子

trans-unit.source: The kids are running around town hall and driving me crazy!! I have to get them into classes or something._Maybe I'll talk to some of the older folks in town, Bowie and Pom-somthing I think? Maybe they can help.
trans-unit.target: 孩子们在市政厅跑来跑去，快把我逼疯了！我得让他们去上课什么的！我得让他们去上课什么的。_也许我可以和镇上的一些老人谈谈，我想是鲍伊和庞姆什么的。也许他们能帮上忙。

trans-unit.source: I have been running into brick walls trying to find their parents! There isn't much to go on._They are not on any public registry. Ughhhh! I am too young to be an auntie!
trans-unit.target: 为了找到他们的父母，我四处碰壁！他们不在任何公共登记册上。唉唉唉 我太年轻了，当不了阿姨！

trans-unit.source: I . . . I cannot believe that happened! I AM MAYOR NOW! I think I'm the youngest mayor in this town's history! That's still settling in for me.
trans-unit.target: I . . . 我真不敢相信会发生这种事 我现在是镇长了 我想我是这个镇历史上最年轻的镇长了 我还没适应过来呢

trans-unit.source: I am lining up some social programs to help out with folks who need it._Doesn't matter how much you make, if you need assistance, we got you covered. That's my motto!
trans-unit.target: 不管你挣多少钱，只要你需要帮助，我们都会帮你。这是我的座右铭！

trans-unit.source: Oh boy, there is so much to do._Mayor Dummy, the previous mayor, left so much to rot that I am doing a lot of boring fixing of very important items for the city._It's going to suck up a lot of funds, but we need to do it.
trans-unit.target: 哦，天哪，要做的事情太多了。_前任市长 Dummy 留下了太多的烂摊子，我正在做很多无聊的修缮工作，这些都是城市非常重要的项目。

trans-unit.source: Are . . . are you being serious right now?
trans-unit.target: 你. . . 你现在是认真的吗？

trans-unit.source: I am a hot mess, please walk away.
trans-unit.target: 我现在一团糟，请走开。

trans-unit.source: My mind is in two dozen places right now and none of them are here talking to you.
trans-unit.target: 我现在满脑子都是你，但没有一个是在这里和你说话。

trans-unit.source: Getting an event to go off without a problem takes a lot of planning. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 要让活动顺利进行，需要很多计划。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: This city deserves the love I have for it.
trans-unit.target: 这座城市值得我如此热爱。

trans-unit.source: I could really use your help right now. There, I said it.
trans-unit.target: 我现在真的需要你的帮助。我说了

trans-unit.source: I got it. I really got it. Please stop.
trans-unit.target: 我明白了 我真的明白了 请停下来

trans-unit.source: That is pretty damn perfect. Thanks. These seeds will shape the future of White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 太完美了 谢谢。这些种子将塑造白灰港的未来。

trans-unit.source: How did you know I was looking for these? These need to be planted right away. Yes yes.
trans-unit.target: 你怎么知道我在找这些？这些得马上种上 是啊是啊

trans-unit.source: Great minds think alike (playername)! We should work together in the future. I think together, we can make a real difference.
trans-unit.target: 大智若愚(playername)！我们今后应该合作。我认为，只要我们齐心协力，就能带来真正的改变。

trans-unit.source: This is valuable . . . but what good will this do for White Ash Harbor?
trans-unit.target: 这很有价值......但这对白灰港有什么好处？

trans-unit.source: A conscientious citizen and a great friend? You really are something (playername)._Now, let's get back to it shall we? Even though it's my birthday, I have more work to do! The town ain't gonna clean itself!
trans-unit.target: 有良知的公民和好朋友？现在，让我们回到正题上来，好吗？虽然今天是我的生日，但我还有更多的工作要做！这个镇不会自己干净的

trans-unit.source: Get me something more useful. No no, not for me. For this town!
trans-unit.target: 给我弄点更有用的东西 不不，不是给我的 是为了这个小镇

trans-unit.source: Ehhh, I can't do anything with this.
trans-unit.target: 呃，我拿这个没办法。

trans-unit.source: The town has enough waste, and you give me this?
trans-unit.target: 镇上的垃圾已经够多了，你还给我这个？

trans-unit.source: Thanks, but you've already given me something today.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，但你今天已经给了我一些东西。

trans-unit.source: What are you doing?! I will punch you if you ever do that again.
trans-unit.target: 你在干什么？你再这样我就揍你

trans-unit.source: My schedule is full. Another time.
trans-unit.target: 我的日程已经排满了。下次吧

trans-unit.source: Would you like to purchase your first home for (credits) Credits and (powercells) Power Cells?
trans-unit.target: 您想用 (credits) 信用点和 (powercells) 动力电池购买第一套住房吗？

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to upgrade your house for (credits) Credits and (powercells) Power Cells?
trans-unit.target: 您确定要用(credits)信用点和(powercells)能量电池来升级您的房子吗？

trans-unit.source: Do you want to make this final upgrade to your house for (credits) Credits and (powercells) Power Cells?
trans-unit.target: 您想用(credits)信用点和(powercells)能量电池对您的房子进行最后一次升级吗？

trans-unit.source: The house is all yours. It's just to the West, behind Circuit Lodge Inn.
trans-unit.target: 房子是你们的了。它就在西边，电路小屋旅馆的后面。

trans-unit.source: Thanks! We will make the upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢！我们将进行升级。

trans-unit.source: Great! We will make the upgrade. I wish I could afford a home this big . . .
trans-unit.target: 太好了！我们会升级的。真希望我能买得起这么大的房子 . . .

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to expand Le Sequoia for (credits) Credits and (powercells) Power Cells?
trans-unit.target: 您确定要扩建 Le Sequoia 以获得(credits)信用点和(powercells)动力电池吗？

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to upgrade Le Sequoia for (credits) Credits and (powercells) Power Cells?
trans-unit.target: 您确定要以 (credits) 信用点和 (powercells) 动力电池来升级 Le Sequoia 吗？

trans-unit.source: Do you want to make this final upgrade to Le Sequoia for (credits) Credits and (powercells) Power Cells?
trans-unit.target: 您想用 (credits) 信用点和 (powercells) 动力电池对 Le Sequoia 进行最终升级吗？

trans-unit.source: I look forward to dining in the new restaurant!
trans-unit.target: 我期待着在新餐厅用餐！

trans-unit.source: Whew. The restaurant is going to be a beauty.
trans-unit.target: 哇 餐厅一定会很漂亮。

trans-unit.source: This is very exciting. Le Sequoia is going to be FABULOUS!
trans-unit.target: 这太令人兴奋了。Le Sequoia 一定会非常出色！

trans-unit.source: You don't have enough Credits and Power Cells to make that purchase.
trans-unit.target: 您没有足够的信用点和能量电池来购买。

trans-unit.source: Please make sure you have enough Credits before talking to me. I am very busy.
trans-unit.target: 在与我交谈之前，请确保您有足够的信用点。我很忙。

trans-unit.source: Ahem. You don't have enough Power Cells to make that purchase.
trans-unit.target: 咳咳。你没有足够的 “能量电池 ”来购买。

trans-unit.source: maple
trans-unit.target: 槭树

trans-unit.source: oak
trans-unit.target: 橡木

trans-unit.source: orange tile
trans-unit.target: 橙瓦

trans-unit.source: purple tile
trans-unit.target: 紫瓦

trans-unit.source: terracotta
trans-unit.target: 兵马俑

trans-unit.source: parquet
trans-unit.target: 镶木地板

trans-unit.source: purple parquet
trans-unit.target: 紫色镶边

trans-unit.source: blue tile
trans-unit.target: 蓝瓦

trans-unit.source: wood tile
trans-unit.target: 木瓦

trans-unit.source: Maple
trans-unit.target: 枫木

trans-unit.source: Oak
trans-unit.target: 橡树

trans-unit.source: Orange Tile
trans-unit.target: 橙色瓷砖

trans-unit.source: Purple Tile
trans-unit.target: 紫色瓷砖

trans-unit.source: Terracotta
trans-unit.target: 兵马俑

trans-unit.source: Parquet
trans-unit.target: 镶木地板

trans-unit.source: Purple Parquet
trans-unit.target: 紫色镶木地板

trans-unit.source: Blue Tile
trans-unit.target: 蓝色瓷砖

trans-unit.source: Wood Tile
trans-unit.target: 木纹砖

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want me to install (floortype) flooring in your home for (credits) Credits?
trans-unit.target: 您确定要我为您家安装(floortype)地板并花费(credits)信用点吗？

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want me to install (floortype) flooring in Le Sequoia?
trans-unit.target: 您确定要我在 Le Sequoia 安装(floortype)地板吗？

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want me to install (floortype) flooring in Le Sequoia for (credits) Credits?
trans-unit.target: 您确定要我用(credits)信用点在 Le Sequoia 安装(floortype)地板吗？

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want me to install (floortype) flooring in the Tea House for (credits) Credits?
trans-unit.target: 您确定要我以(credits)信用点在茶馆安装(floortype)地板吗？

trans-unit.source: Your home will look great with these!
trans-unit.target: 有了它们，您的家一定会非常漂亮！

trans-unit.source: Ah, I'll head over and install these soon. It should look great.
trans-unit.target: 啊，我马上就去安装。看起来应该不错。

trans-unit.source: Ah, I'll head over and install these soon. Are you sure Aylin is ok with this?
trans-unit.target: 啊，我马上就去安装。你确定 Aylin 可以接受吗？

trans-unit.source: Would you like to construct a (buildingName)?
trans-unit.target: 您想建造一座(buildingName)吗？

trans-unit.source: Replace your (replacedBuildingName) with a (buildingName)?
trans-unit.target: 用(replacedBuildingName)替换(buildingName)？

trans-unit.source: We will get started right away. The facility will take 2 days to construct.
trans-unit.target: 我们将立即开始施工。该设施的建造需要 2 天时间。

trans-unit.source: Well hello there young one. Care to sample some of our fish? Freshly caught this morning!_Oh, you are the new chef taking over Le Sequoia! Fantastic! My name is Bowie. Come by if you need any fresh seafood.
trans-unit.target: 你好，年轻人。想尝尝我们的鱼吗？今早刚钓上来的！_哦，你就是接管红杉餐厅的新主厨！好极了 我叫鲍伊 如果你需要新鲜的海鲜，就过来吧。

trans-unit.source: (playername), if you think the fishing here is great, then you've never been to Reddington! It's a small little town, but the fish they catch are the size of buses!
trans-unit.target: (如果你觉得这里的钓鱼很棒，那你一定没去过雷丁顿！这是个小镇，但他们钓到的鱼却有公共汽车那么大！

trans-unit.source: Well, well . . . Birds are flying low, aren't they . . .
trans-unit.target: 好吧，好吧 . . 鸟儿在低空飞行，不是吗？

trans-unit.source: Smooth seas never made a skilled sailor, so I'm sure you're getting the hang of the ropes with your restaurant. Hold fast!
trans-unit.target: 风平浪静的海面造就不出熟练的水手，我相信你一定已经掌握了餐厅的窍门。抓紧了

trans-unit.source: Did you already meet the butcher, Uriel? He is my grandson!
trans-unit.target: 你见过屠夫尤里尔了吗？他是我孙子

trans-unit.source: You live long enough and you see some things, hear some stories, and meet some memorable folks._Strangers are friends you haven't met yet and that's a true statement! Don't do foolish things, but don't close yourself to the world either.
trans-unit.target: 人活得久了，就会看到一些东西，听到一些故事，遇到一些难忘的人。_陌生人是你未曾谋面的朋友，这句话一点不假！不要做傻事，但也不要闭门造车。

trans-unit.source: Uriel's a good kid. Kind-hearted. I am very proud of him and his shop. Have you been to it yet?
trans-unit.target: 尤里尔是个好孩子。心地善良。我为他和他的店感到骄傲 你去过了吗？

trans-unit.source: No, not yet.
trans-unit.target: 不，还没有。

trans-unit.source: Yes! Uriel is a swell guy.
trans-unit.target: 是的 乌里叶是个好人

trans-unit.source: Oh, you should, it's called Chop. He's very talented!
trans-unit.target: 哦，你应该去看看，它叫 Chop。他很有才华

trans-unit.source: He is isn't he? Got that from me you know. Had to make sure someone in my family knew how to talk to people!
trans-unit.target: 他不是吗？这是我教他的 我得确保家里有人知道怎么跟人说话

trans-unit.source: I hope to see this small town reawakened, I miss the time when White Ash harbor was a place of festivities and dreams.
trans-unit.target: 我希望看到这个小镇重新焕发生机，我怀念白灰港那个充满欢庆和梦想的时代。

trans-unit.source: I used to play poker with the owner of the bathhouse. I think her name was. . . I can't remember, but I just remember she was good at cards.
trans-unit.target: 我以前常和澡堂老板玩扑克牌 我记得她叫. . . 我不记得了 但我只记得她很会打牌

trans-unit.source: Ah, I see I am a bit late for my afternoon nap. Mustn't be late for things like that!
trans-unit.target: 啊，看来我午睡有点晚了。这样的事情可不能迟到！

trans-unit.source: This morning my neighborhood cat came to say hello, I couldn't resist giving her some fish and chips.
trans-unit.target: 今天早上，我家附近的猫来打招呼，我忍不住给了它一些鱼和薯条。

trans-unit.source: This one time I was fishing far off the coast and there was so much fish that I could've walked back home!_Point is, White Ash Harbor, the world even, has some secrets waiting for anyone who explores its depths.
trans-unit.target: 有一次，我在离海岸很远的地方钓鱼，那里有很多鱼，我都可以走回家了！_关键是，白灰港，甚至是整个世界，都有一些秘密在等着探索它深处的人。

trans-unit.source: Got a moment to hear some yarn be spun? Living as long as I have means I have plenty of it to share._There I was, fifty feet in the air, painting a mural in Billboard city, when the sissor lift under me began to crash faster than the stock market!
trans-unit.target: 有时间听听我的故事吗？我在五十英尺高的空中，在广告牌城画壁画，这时我脚下的剪刀升降机开始以比股市还快的速度坠落！

trans-unit.source: Sorry Bowie, not right now, got things to do.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，鲍伊，现在不行，我还有事。

trans-unit.source: Go on!?
trans-unit.target: 继续！？

trans-unit.source: I leapt from the . . . Ah, yes, of course. Youth, always in a rush. I'll tell you some other time.
trans-unit.target: 我从......跳了下去。啊，是的，当然。青春，总是匆匆忙忙。改天再告诉你吧

trans-unit.source: I leapt from the platform and landed in some bushes. Dazed, I got up, and found the most beautiful woman. And that's how I met my wife. What a happy accident that was, hue hue hue!
trans-unit.target: 我从平台上一跃而起，落在了一些灌木丛中。我茫然地爬起来，发现了最美丽的女人。就这样，我遇到了我的妻子。这是多么幸福的意外啊，呜呜呜

trans-unit.source: Look at the town, it's gorgeous in its white coat._You know what would be nice? A cup of mulled wine._It would fit perfectly with this wintery atmosphere.
trans-unit.target: 看看这个小镇，它穿着白色的外衣，美极了。来一杯闷酒，_它与这冬日的气氛再配不过了。

trans-unit.source: Uriel is a good kid. Kinda been on the outs with my daughter and her husband since the kid added land meat to his business._Dunno why they're being so particular about it! Kid still knows how to debone a tuna like lightning still!
trans-unit.target: 乌里叶是个好孩子。自从我女儿和她丈夫在他的生意中加入了陆地肉类之后，他们就有点不和了！这孩子还知道怎么像闪电一样把金枪鱼去骨呢

trans-unit.source: Back for some more of this old man's charm? No? Well if you got the time, I'd love to tell you about that time I fought off a giant squid.
trans-unit.target: 还想再感受一下这位老人的魅力吗？不回来？如果你有时间，我很乐意告诉你 我击退巨型乌贼的故事。

trans-unit.source: That old shrew of Pomarine did her thing again. She cheats somehow in the game of cards. I don't know how, but she does!
trans-unit.target: 波马林那个老泼妇又作怪了。她在牌局中不知用什么方法作弊 我不知道她是怎么出老千的，但她就是这样！

trans-unit.source: I hear your tree restaurant is supposed to be good. I'll be stopping by and trying it out sometime. Trying out new things keeps you young!
trans-unit.target: 我听说你的树餐厅应该不错。有机会我会去尝尝的。尝试新事物能让人保持年轻！

trans-unit.source: Tell me, is there anyone waiting for you when you're off shift from The Sequoia?
trans-unit.target: 告诉我，当你从水杉餐厅下班时，有没有人在等你？

trans-unit.source: No, haven't had to the time, wouldn't be fair.
trans-unit.target: 不，没时间，这样不公平。

trans-unit.source: Yes, I have, in spite of it all. Why do you ask?
trans-unit.target: 是的，我有，尽管这一切。你为什么这么问？

trans-unit.source: That's a shame. Young love is an amazing adventure. Everything feels high stakes and every moment that passes is one that burns bright._I cannot recommend it enough.
trans-unit.target: 真遗憾。年轻的爱情是一场奇妙的冒险。一切都充满了紧张刺激的感觉，每一个瞬间都在熊熊燃烧。

trans-unit.source: Good, in this life you need someone to share it with, otherwise you wind up alone and rambling to anyone who'll lend you an ear, hue hue hue.
trans-unit.target: 很好，人生在世，需要有人与你分享，否则你就会孤独终老，对任何愿意倾听你的人喋喋不休，唉声叹气。

trans-unit.source: The photographs on the walls of my home are my life. I love photography almost as much as traveling._Take as many pictures and videos as you need, because when you get old, memories are a warm blanket on a cold night.
trans-unit.target: 我家墙上的照片就是我的生活。我对摄影的热爱几乎不亚于旅行。_拍摄尽可能多的照片和视频，因为当你老了，回忆是寒夜里温暖的毯子。

trans-unit.source: If you find yourself in a place you don't know with people you don't know, don't worry._Grab some food, some drink, and soon you'll know everyone and everything.
trans-unit.target: 如果你发现自己在一个不熟悉的地方，和不认识的人在一起，不要担心。_吃点东西，喝点酒，很快你就会认识所有的人和事物。

trans-unit.source: I know The Sequoia is taking a lot of your attention, but when you get a second, you should set off to somewhere you've never been before._I promise you, you will not regret it.
trans-unit.target: 我知道《红杉》占用了你太多的精力，但是当你有时间的时候，你应该出发去一个你从未去过的地方。

trans-unit.source: There are days that I wonder if I've made the best choices. It's what you do when you're my age, but when I look back, all I get is a smile._Guess it was worth it, even if I lost a few friends and lovers along the way.
trans-unit.target: 有些时候，我会怀疑自己是否做出了最好的选择。但当我回首往事时，我只能报以微笑。_我想这是值得的，即使一路上我失去了一些朋友和爱人。

trans-unit.source: I'm sure you've heard this from everyone, but the library is a gem to see. We are all proud of it and love having one._There was this one time I was dating a librarian and. . . ah, no, I need to nap now! Hewhewhew!
trans-unit.target: 我相信大家都说过，图书馆是我们的宝藏。我们都为它感到骄傲，并喜欢拥有它。_有一次，我和一位图书管理员约会，. 啊，不，我现在得打个盹！休休！

trans-unit.source: I never thought I would live this long. I have outlived some of the healthiest people I know._I don't know how I did it. None.
trans-unit.target: 我从没想过自己能活这么久。我比我认识的一些最健康的人都长寿。没有

trans-unit.source: Did you make a deal with a sea witch?
trans-unit.target: 你和海巫婆做了交易吗？

trans-unit.source: Random is random, Bowie. Just is.
trans-unit.target: 随机就是随机，鲍伊。就是这样

trans-unit.source: You know, there was this one time that I met a sea witch. We were just off the coast of New England and she was delightful._Did I give her anything of value other than my hat? Nope. Nothing comes to mind.
trans-unit.target: 有一次，我遇到了一个海上女巫。我们当时就在新英格兰的海岸边 她很讨人喜欢 我除了给她我的帽子之外 还给了她什么值钱的东西吗？没有 Nope. 我什么都没想起来

trans-unit.source: Hardtack and gristle!_I lost my boat in a squall forty years ago and was picked up three days later by another boat that then hit a reef and sank._Thankfully we were close enough to shore we could swim it. Random is random, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 四十年前，我的船在一次大风中失去了踪影，三天后被另一艘船救起，那艘船触礁沉没。随机就是随机，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: I'm glad we met, you know? It's funny that I talk to so many people so often, but it's rare to have a repeat customer for my bather._Hewhewhew! I appreciate our friendship, (playername). Truly.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴我们见面了，你知道吗？有趣的是，我经常和很多人聊天，但很少有回头客光顾我的浴缸！我很感激我们的友谊，(playername)。真的

trans-unit.source: I don't mention my wife all that often. She passed decades ago from cancer not long after my daughter was born._Her name was Heidi and she was one of the bravest ladies to ever walk this Earth. I miss her to this day.
trans-unit.target: 我很少提到我的妻子。几十年前，我女儿出生后不久，她就因癌症去世了。她的名字叫海蒂，是这个世界上最勇敢的女性之一。我至今怀念她。

trans-unit.source: I share plenty of stories, but I usually don't share too many personal stories._Those are only reserved for folks like you because those types of stories are pieces of you. They shouldn't be known by everyone.
trans-unit.target: 我分享了很多故事，但我通常不会分享太多私人故事。_那些故事只留给像你这样的人，因为那些类型的故事是你的一部分。它们不应该被所有人知道。

trans-unit.source: Here's one not many have heard. When Heidi had just gotten the diagnosis, she planned a trip around the world._She was terminal, and she didn't want my last memory of her being one in a hospital bed, so we went and we loved it.
trans-unit.target: 这是个没多少人听过的故事。海蒂刚被确诊时，她计划了一次环球旅行_她已是晚期，她不希望我对她的最后记忆是躺在病床上，所以我们去了，我们很喜欢这次旅行。

trans-unit.source: Our lives always involve the lives of others._What we do isn't just for us but for people we will never meet._Being old, I look at my clothes and think about who will wear them one day when I'm not here. It's nice to think about, really.
trans-unit.target: 我们的生活总是与他人的生活息息相关。_我们所做的一切不仅是为了自己，也是为了那些我们永远不会遇到的人。_我老了，看着自己的衣服，想着有一天我不在了，谁会穿它们。想想也挺好的，真的。

trans-unit.source: You're restaurant is open now, you say? Hewhewhew! That sounds lovely! Well done!
trans-unit.target: 你说你的餐厅开张了？Hewhewhew！听起来不错 干得好 Well done！

trans-unit.source: Who's this Lucius and why should you give a hoot what he has to say?_People love places that critics hate all the time. Don't fret. If your food is good, then you're good.
trans-unit.target: 这个卢修斯是谁，你为什么要在乎他说的话？别担心 如果你的食物好吃，那你就是好的。

trans-unit.source: I can't believe the bathhouse is open again?! It's honestly been decades!_I've been soaking in there so often, I don't think my bones can handle it any more!
trans-unit.target: 真不敢相信澡堂又开张了？老实说，我已经在那里泡了几十年了！_我觉得我的骨头已经受不了了！

trans-unit.source: Le Sequoia's reputation is growing. I hear about it all the way out here on the docks! And that's a long way to yell! Hewhewhew!
trans-unit.target: 红杉的名声越来越大。我在码头上一直听到这个消息！这吆喝声可真够远的。 And that's a long way to yell！Hewhewhew！

trans-unit.source: That teahouse inside the bathouse is a hit, it seems! People are talking all about the different teas so much I can't fit my stories in edgewise! Hewhewhew!
trans-unit.target: 看来，澡堂里的茶馆很受欢迎！人们都在谈论各种茶叶，我的故事都插不上嘴了！呵呵呵

trans-unit.source: I've heard you've been doing some good out there, (playername). It warms my old heart to hear you helping out so much.
trans-unit.target: 我听说你在外面做了些好事，(playername)。听到你这么乐于助人，我这颗老心都暖暖的。

trans-unit.source: Winds from the east! You've been flying through those bulletin board ads! Keep the winds at your back, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 东风 你已经飞过了那些公告栏广告！让风在你背后，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Rather nice menu you have at Le Sequoia! Glad you serve seafood there. I'll have to eat there soon.
trans-unit.target: 你们 Le Sequoia 的菜单相当不错！很高兴你们提供海鲜。我很快就会去吃的。

trans-unit.source: Your food selection is impressive! I'll give ya that much. To be honest, if there's fish, I'm there._I can eat anything with fish. Fish n chips, fish sticks, steamed fish, grilled fish . . . oh and there's fish stew . . . oh and there is . . .
trans-unit.target: 你的食物选择令人印象深刻！老实说，只要有鱼，我就会去 老实说，只要有鱼，我就会去。炸鱼片、炸鱼条、清蒸鱼、烤鱼......哦，还有炖鱼......哦，还有......。

trans-unit.source: I am not much for the stuff on your menu. All those cold and frozen dishes? My stomach can't handle it.
trans-unit.target: 我不太喜欢你们菜单上的东西。那些凉菜和冷冻菜？我的胃受不了

trans-unit.source: Until you put something on your menu I can stomach, I can't eat at your restaurant. I'm sorry._Maybe some hot seafood? I am always ready for some hot seafood.
trans-unit.target: 除非你的菜单上有我能吃得下的东西 否则我不能在你的餐厅吃饭 对不起。_来点热海鲜怎么样？我随时都想吃热海鲜

trans-unit.source: If everything went to pot around here, I would've run out of stories years ago._Thankfully, the fish are active and so am I! Glad you're treating this place well.
trans-unit.target: 幸好鱼儿很活跃，我也是！很高兴你能善待这里。

trans-unit.source: You're a leader in this town, you know that right? Staying the course is keeping the creation of trash in check. Keep doing it!
trans-unit.target: 你是这里的领导者，知道吗？坚持到底就是控制垃圾的产生。继续努力

trans-unit.source: We must keep our waterways safe and clear of trash. Otherwise, if the kids today get less than we did growing up, then what is the point, eh?
trans-unit.target: 我们必须保证水道安全，清除垃圾。否则，如果现在的孩子得到的比我们成长过程中得到的还少，那还有什么意义呢？

trans-unit.source: I haven't seen our harbor in such a state in all of my years! How dare you spoil the sea with garbage!_If I was twenty years younger, I'd knock your block off!
trans-unit.target: 我这么多年都没见过我们的港口变成这样！你们竟敢用垃圾糟蹋大海！_如果我再年轻二十岁，我就把你们的脑袋打掉！

trans-unit.source: It's so nice to have my camera back in my hands. I remember once I hit a marlin with it when I was taking pictures out at sea._I knocked that fish out and got the photo! Hewhewhew!
trans-unit.target: 相机重新回到我手中的感觉真好。我记得有一次在海上拍照时，我用相机打中了一条马林鱼！Hewhewhew！

trans-unit.source: This camera is so tough that I once dropped it from five floors up._It hit a palm tree, bounced on to a peddle cab, took a picture of the passengers in it, and landed in bush._I still have that photo on my wall! Hewhewhew!
trans-unit.target: 这台相机非常坚硬，有一次我从五层楼高的地方把它摔了下来。_它撞到了一棵棕榈树上，弹到了一辆三轮车上，给车上的乘客拍了一张照片，然后落在了灌木丛里！休休

trans-unit.source: Looking through the pictures, I am seeing faces I haven't seen in decades. I miss these folks._That's something for you young people to remember, take photos with those you love, because your time with them isn't promised past today.
trans-unit.target: 翻看这些照片，我看到了几十年未见的面孔。我很想念这些人。_这一点年轻人要记住，和你爱的人一起拍照，因为你和他们在一起的时间不会在今天过去。

trans-unit.source: I haven't been this happy in decades, (playername)! Laura and I, it's like we were all those years ago._I feel like a young man with some white hair! Hewhewhewhew!
trans-unit.target: 我已经有几十年没这么开心了，(playername)！劳拉和我，就像多年前一样。_我觉得自己像个头发花白的年轻人！嘻嘻嘻嘻

trans-unit.source: Laura and I were out the other day and went to the bathhouse. She said she might not ever go back to Billboard City! Haha!
trans-unit.target: 劳拉和我前几天出去玩，去了澡堂。她说她可能再也不会回广告牌城了！哈哈

trans-unit.source: I took Laura on a walk in the forest. I popped the question there and she said yes! I am so excited to finally tie the knot with her.
trans-unit.target: 我带着劳拉在森林里散步。我在那里向她求婚，她答应了！终于能和她喜结连理了，我非常激动。

trans-unit.source: Ooooh._Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你

trans-unit.source: Hue hue hue._You would be surprised to hear the story behind that shirt, let me tell you about it, one of these days.
trans-unit.target: 这件衬衫背后的故事一定会让你大吃一惊，总有一天我会告诉你的。

trans-unit.source: Time doesn't only wrinkle your skin, it also matures your mind._Live a good and full life, understood?_Good. . .
trans-unit.target: 时间不仅会让你的皮肤起皱，也会让你的心智更加成熟。_好好生活，充实生活，明白吗？. .

trans-unit.source: Thank you kid._You know, I used to be a fisherman back in the day. Sadly my body is too weak now, but I'm glad I can still work in the same field.
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗，我以前是个渔夫。遗憾的是，我现在身体太虚弱了，但我很高兴还能从事同样的工作。

trans-unit.source: Hue hue hue! You're right kid, keep fighting!
trans-unit.target: Hue hue hue！你说得对，孩子，继续战斗吧

trans-unit.source: Oh yes you could do something for me!
trans-unit.target: 哦，是的，你可以为我做点什么！

trans-unit.source: Go, have fun._Well, well, What are you still doing here, wasting your time with a boring old man?
trans-unit.target: 去吧，玩得开心点。_好了，好了，你还在这里干什么，和一个无聊的老头浪费时间吗？

trans-unit.source: Well, well._Thank you!
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你

trans-unit.source: Perfect for a chilly evening by the sea. You are very thoughtful (playername).
trans-unit.target: 非常适合在海边度过寒冷的夜晚。您真是体贴入微(playername)。

trans-unit.source: This should wake me up! Thank you (playername).
trans-unit.target: 这应该能唤醒我！谢谢 (playername).

trans-unit.source: Whew, I don't know if I can accept this (playername). Isn't this expensive? Well, I will keep it. To remind me of you, the rising star of the culinary world.
trans-unit.target: 呼，我不知道我能不能接受这个(playername)。这不是很贵吗？好吧，我会留着它 让我想起你，烹饪界的新星。

trans-unit.source: Aha, just perfect (playername). You know me too well._To be honest, I never really liked getting gifts on my birthday. But tea? Tea I can live with.
trans-unit.target: 啊哈，太完美了(playername)。老实说，我从来都不喜欢在生日那天收到礼物。但是茶呢？茶我可以接受

trans-unit.source: Hmmm . . . What should I do with this?
trans-unit.target: 嗯 . . . 我该怎么处理这个？

trans-unit.source: Thanks (playername). But an old man like me can't do anything with this.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢(playername)。但像我这样的老头子拿这个没办法。

trans-unit.source: Well well well. What do we have here? Oh . . . no . . . I can't really use this.
trans-unit.target: 好了好了 这里有什么？哦... 不... 我真的不能用这个

trans-unit.source: You're very generous, but I don't need another one. Thanks.
trans-unit.target: 你很慷慨，但我不需要另一个。谢谢

trans-unit.source: Hue hue hue.
trans-unit.target: 色调色调

trans-unit.source: These bones don't got it in them today. Try again another time.
trans-unit.target: 这些骨头今天没力气了。下次再来吧

trans-unit.source: Romance? At my age? No thank you!
trans-unit.target: 浪漫？在我这个年纪？不，谢谢

trans-unit.source: Sells seafood & other sea products
trans-unit.target: 销售海鲜和其他海产品

trans-unit.source: Your customers will be very happy, because we received top quality fish today!
trans-unit.target: 你们的客户会很高兴的，因为我们今天收到了最优质的鱼！

trans-unit.source: No one has fresher fish than we do!
trans-unit.target: 没有人比我们的鱼更新鲜了！

trans-unit.source: I am an old man, I didn't get this from the sea, the younger folks got it for me!
trans-unit.target: 我是个老人，这不是从海里捞上来的，是年轻人帮我捞上来的！

trans-unit.source: This fish was just plucked from the ocean this morning!
trans-unit.target: 这条鱼是今天早上刚从海里捞上来的！

trans-unit.source: Fish that fought and lived taste so much better than that farmed stuff.
trans-unit.target: 战斗和生活过的鱼比养殖的鱼味道要好得多。

trans-unit.source: Yum! That one is my favorite.
trans-unit.target: 好吃 这是我的最爱。

trans-unit.source: That's top quality product! Would you like anything else today?
trans-unit.target: 这是顶级产品 今天还需要点什么吗？

trans-unit.source: Ah, great choice!
trans-unit.target: 啊，不错的选择！

trans-unit.source: I haven't seen something like that in decades!
trans-unit.target: 我已经有几十年没见过这样的东西了！

trans-unit.source: I am intrigued as to how you got this.
trans-unit.target: 我很好奇你是怎么得到这个的。

trans-unit.source: I gotta have it!
trans-unit.target: 我一定要得到它！

trans-unit.source: I can't sell this.
trans-unit.target: 我不能卖这个。

trans-unit.source: This isn't something my customers will want.
trans-unit.target: 这不是我的客户想要的东西。

trans-unit.source: I don't carry this kind of stuff.
trans-unit.target: 我不带这种东西。

trans-unit.source: Even when I was lost in a distant land, I knew I needed money to buy things.
trans-unit.target: 即使我在遥远的地方迷失了方向，我也知道我需要钱来买东西。

trans-unit.source: I can't loan you anything. You want some stinky fish?
trans-unit.target: 我不能借给你任何东西 你想吃臭鱼吗？

trans-unit.source: I really like chatting with you, but you need credits to make a purchase, sorry!
trans-unit.target: 我很喜欢和你聊天，但你需要信用点才能购买，抱歉！

trans-unit.source: I don't have to be careful. I'm rich.
trans-unit.target: 我不必小心翼翼。我很有钱

trans-unit.source: Oh, you're still trying to talk to me? Why?
trans-unit.target: 哦，你还想跟我说话？为什么？

trans-unit.source: Mumzy always said that if I want something, I can get it. You don't have anything I want.
trans-unit.target: 妈妈总是说，如果我想要什么，我就能得到。你没有我想要的东西

trans-unit.source: New things are good, so long as they aren't trying to tell me what to do or try to change me as an individual.
trans-unit.target: 新事物是好的，只要它们不是试图告诉我该怎么做，或者试图改变我这个人。

trans-unit.source: Wait . . . you run (restaurant name)? The dump with amazing food. It's the talk of all the caddies at my golf club and they know good food. My name is Angi! If it's lizard men free, I'll come by.
trans-unit.target: 等等. . 你经营(restaurant name)？就是那家有美味佳肴的垃圾场。我高尔夫俱乐部的球童们都在谈论这家餐厅，他们都很懂美食。我叫安吉 如果蜥蜴人有空，我会来的

trans-unit.source: Have you thought about adding a theme to your establishment?
trans-unit.target: 您是否想过为您的企业增添一个主题？

trans-unit.source: A mascot? No, I am not doing that.
trans-unit.target: 吉祥物？不，我不干。

trans-unit.source: Oh, you mean like a jungle theme or something? I've been thinking about it.
trans-unit.target: 哦，你是说丛林主题之类的？我一直在考虑

trans-unit.source: I really think you should! Themed restaurants are all the rage as they offer something fun to do, prices can be maxxed bc of said fun, and when they close are a great tax write off!
trans-unit.target: 我真的认为你应该这么做！主题餐厅风靡一时，因为它们能提供有趣的活动，价格也会因为这些活动而达到最高点，而且当它们关闭时，还能抵税！

trans-unit.source: Exactly! I was thinking something classy, something with a bit of oddness to it. Hear me out, Alice in Wonderland! I'll let that soak in because I know it's genius
trans-unit.target: 没错 我在想一些有品位的东西 一些带点古怪的东西 听我说 爱丽丝梦游仙境 我知道这是个天才，我就不多说了

trans-unit.source: If you are connected online you are being fed lies daily. Just because something is new doesn't mean that it is true. Books on the other hand, they are truer than people. Facts, matter, and all birds are secretly drones.
trans-unit.target: 如果你上网，你每天都在被灌输谎言。新事物并不意味着它是真实的。另一方面，书籍比人更真实。事实是重要的，所有的鸟儿都是秘密的无人驾驶飞机。

trans-unit.source: What kind of books do I read? I have the entirety of Parker U's catalog in my memory core as we speak. They are the best, I only read them, do not offer me anything else because it is probably filled with lies.
trans-unit.target: 我读什么样的书？我把帕克大学的全部书目都放在我的记忆核心里。它们是最好的，我只读它们，不要给我其他任何东西，因为里面可能充满了谎言。

trans-unit.source: Mumzy has always encouraged me to grow my interests. One of the books she gave me was on furniture making. I found a lot of the designs in it to be intriquing. I might even try to build an 'ottoman' or whatever.
trans-unit.target: 妈妈一直鼓励我培养自己的兴趣。她给我的一本书是关于家具制作的。我发现里面的很多设计都很有趣。我甚至可以尝试做一个 “长椅 ”什么的。

trans-unit.source: Mumzy believes that the world online is full of lies and I'll get sick if I connect to it. I have seen how some androids behave over the years and I can see what she means. Information is dangerous when it's allowed to flow freely.
trans-unit.target: Mumzy 认为，网络世界充满了谎言，如果我上网，就会生病。这些年来，我见过一些机器人的行为，我明白她的意思。信息一旦自由流动，就会带来危险。
