trans-unit.source: Do you go online, (playername)?
trans-unit.target: 你上网吗，(playername)？

trans-unit.source: Of course, it's how the modern world functions.
trans-unit.target: 当然，现代世界就是这样运转的。

trans-unit.source: I try to avoid it. Only run necessary updates and such.
trans-unit.target: 我尽量避免。只运行必要的更新等。

trans-unit.source: Of course . . . does that mean I am missing stuff that is happening around us?
trans-unit.target: 当然......这是否意味着我错过了我们身边发生的事情？

trans-unit.source: Yeah, same! I knew you would get it. Stuff out there is full of lies like how the last election went down. We all know that they did it and it's all rigged!
trans-unit.target: 对，一样 我就知道你会明白的。外面的东西都是谎言，就像上次大选一样。我们都知道是他们干的，都是被操纵的！

trans-unit.source: I have begun to think that maybe I am missing out on something. Conversations with strangers who might . . . no, Mumzy wouldn't want me to talk to strangers. Yet, we started off as strangers and now we are not. Here we are, talking. I feel . . . fine.
trans-unit.target: 我开始觉得，也许我错过了什么。与陌生人交谈可能会......不，妈妈不想让我和陌生人交谈。然而，我们一开始是陌生人，现在却不是了。我们在这里聊天。我感觉......很好。

trans-unit.source: Connecting with you has shown me that maybe . . . maybe Mumzy doesn't know . . . everything.
trans-unit.target: 与你的交流让我明白，也许......也许妈妈并不了解......一切。

trans-unit.source: I am going to do it, (playername). I am . . . going to log in on the information super highway. The series of tubes. The sum total knowledge of all humans. I am going to log on to . . . THE NET!
trans-unit.target: 我要这么做，(playername)。我要......登录信息高速公路。一连串的管道。全人类知识的总和。我要登录....... 网络！

trans-unit.source: (playername)! (playername)! I KNEW I WAS RIGHT! The birds! They are DRONES! I found a group talking all about it and they have evidence. The pictures, it's soooo clear that I do not understand how anyone else could . . . IS THAT A PIGEON?! RUN!
trans-unit.target: (playername)！(我就知道我是对的！） 我就知道我是对的 那些鸟 它们是无人机 我找到一个小组在讨论这件事 他们有证据 这些图片太清楚了，我不明白其他人怎么会知道。那是鸽子吗？快跑

trans-unit.source: My head . . . ughhhhh! I ran an update to my server core and I feel terrible. Was Mumzy right, (playername)? Am I going to die now that I've been online?
trans-unit.target: 我的头......唉唉唉！我更新了服务器核心，感觉糟透了。Mumzy 是对的吗，(playername)？我上线后会死吗？

trans-unit.source: What? No, you won't. You got the update through the official launcher, right?
trans-unit.target: 什么？不会的 你是通过官方启动器获得更新的，对吧？

trans-unit.source: Ah, looks like you're having the android equivalent of a hangover. It should wear off.
trans-unit.target: 啊，看来你是宿醉了。应该会好的

trans-unit.source: I think so? I went online and click on something that blinked at me saying 'Click Here' and that's when everything got strange.
trans-unit.target: 我想是这样吧？我上网点击了一个闪烁的东西，上面写着 “点击这里”，然后一切就变得奇怪了。

trans-unit.source: A hangover? No, this isn't a hangover. This is something else, something worse . . . maybe I shouldn't have clicked on the 'Click Here' button that was flashing at me.
trans-unit.target: 宿醉？不，这不是宿醉。这不是宿醉，而是其他更糟糕的事情......也许我不应该点击向我闪来的 “点击这里 ”按钮。

trans-unit.source: Mumzy said she wanted me in her life. My first memories were in my room. I felt larger and smaller when she hugged me for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 妈妈说她希望我出现在她的生命中。我最初的记忆是在我的房间里。当她第一次拥抱我时，我感觉自己变大了，又变小了。

trans-unit.source: Mumzy isn't picking up the phone anymore. I call and all I get is �Stop calling, this isn't Mumzy, this is Dale's Towing.� WHY DID MUMZY'S NAME CHANGE?!
trans-unit.target: 妈妈再也不接电话了。我打电话过去，得到的回答是：别打了，我不是穆姆西，我是戴尔拖车公司。 为什么妈妈的名字会变？

trans-unit.source: I went and saw someone. An IT technician and they were able to fix my damaged data loop. I am set now, updated, and working, and wow! I feel like I can do anything!
trans-unit.target: 我去找了一个人。一位 IT 技术人员，他们修复了我损坏的数据回路。我现在已经设置好了，更新好了，可以工作了，哇！我感觉自己无所不能了！

trans-unit.source: I stepped through the looking glass, (playername) and I can't go back. Mumzy is angry, but she hasn't disowned me. I know so much now. Thank you, for not leaving me to rot during my crisis.
trans-unit.target: 我穿过了镜子，(playername)我回不去了。妈妈很生气，但她没有嫌弃我。我现在知道了很多。谢谢你，没有让我在危机中自生自灭。

trans-unit.source: Always, I always look good.
trans-unit.target: 我一直都很帅

trans-unit.source: Top drawer, just like me.
trans-unit.target: 和我一样，都是最棒的。

trans-unit.source: Unpolluted and sharp, like my looks.
trans-unit.target: 不受污染，锋芒毕露，就像我的外表一样。

trans-unit.source: . . .oh, you mean my investment portfolio? How do you know about that?
trans-unit.target: . .哦，你是说我的投资组合？你怎么知道的？

trans-unit.source: Mumzy gives me all the encouragement I need.
trans-unit.target: Mumzy 给了我所有的鼓励。

trans-unit.source: Mumzy would be furious, but I am out of my depth here.
trans-unit.target: Mumzy 肯定会大发雷霆，但我实在是无能为力。

trans-unit.source: No, no handouts. Mumzy taught me to never accept a handout.
trans-unit.target: 不，不要施舍。妈妈教我永远不要接受施舍。

trans-unit.source: Oh, it's a, a, a thing! Neat.
trans-unit.target: 哦，这是一个，一个，一个东西！真不错

trans-unit.source: Ew. No.
trans-unit.target: Ew. 不

trans-unit.source: You must be mistaken. I got one of these already. And here I thought you were being creative in your gift giving!
trans-unit.target: 你一定弄错了。我已经有一个了 我还以为你送礼物很有创意呢！

trans-unit.source: You have to sign this NDA first.
trans-unit.target: 您必须先签署这份保密协议。

trans-unit.source: I have my reservation at the squash court today. So sorry!
trans-unit.target: 我今天在壁球场有预约。非常抱歉

trans-unit.source: Me . . . date you? Ha. Haha. HAHAHA!! Oh, you're being serious. I mean, I am unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 我......和你约会？约会你？哈哈。哈哈！哦，你是认真的。我是说，我没空。

trans-unit.source: Okay, okay, okay, but why are all of the suppliers out of cloth napkins?! I gotta find . . . excuse me.
trans-unit.target: 好吧，好吧，好吧，但为什么所有供应商都没有布餐巾了？我得去找......不好意思

trans-unit.source: I swear if I get another vendor bailing on me I will . . . Uh, hi.
trans-unit.target: 我发誓，如果再有供应商抛弃我，我就....... 呃，嗨

trans-unit.source: Look, I can see you are trying to be friendly, and that's kind and all, but right now I need to get everything sorted for when my bistro starts service.
trans-unit.target: 听着，我知道你是想表示友好，这很好，但现在我需要把一切都安排好，等我的小酒馆开始营业。

trans-unit.source: Hi again, I've been very busy lately, and I want to say thank you for seeing how I am doing. We don't know one another at all, but a stranger checking in on me tells me that perhaps I should take a breath.
trans-unit.target: 大家好，我最近一直很忙，我想对你们说，谢谢你们关心我的近况。我们根本不认识，但一个陌生人的问候告诉我，也许我应该喘口气。

trans-unit.source: My name is Fleur, nice to meet you, (playername). I would love to chat, but I have to get going. Stop by my family's bistro sometime. It's called Traveler's and we can chat if I'm not putting out either a literal or metaphorical fire.
trans-unit.target: 我叫 Fleur，很高兴认识你，(playername)。我很想和你聊聊，但我得走了。有空来我家的小酒馆坐坐吧。如果我不是在救火，我们可以聊聊。

trans-unit.source: I looked you up since we last talked. You own Le Sequoia in White Ash Harbor?! Why are you here?
trans-unit.target: 上次谈话后我查了你的资料 你是白灰港红杉酒店的老板？你怎么会在这里？

trans-unit.source: I'm going to knock Otto Canton down a peg on The 100.
trans-unit.target: 我要把奥托-坎顿在 “100 ”节目中的地位降低一个档次。

trans-unit.source: I need to show people that my successes are my own alone and not due to parterning with the names of others.
trans-unit.target: 我需要向人们证明，我的成功是我一个人的成功，而不是与他人的名字相提并论。

trans-unit.source: You're going to climb over Canton's shop? Good luck to you then.
trans-unit.target: 你要爬过坎顿的商店？祝你好运

trans-unit.source: Classic imposter syndrome, but I get the need to want to prove yourself on your terms. Wish I had that opportunity, but I'm just happy to run a successful business. - Change to not mention Bobby- Adjusted
trans-unit.target: 典型的冒名顶替综合症，但我理解你想用自己的方式证明自己的需要。真希望我也能有这样的机会，但我很高兴能经营一家成功的企业。- 改为不提鲍比--已调整

trans-unit.source: Traveler's sits comfortably in the 50s on The 100 and I am proud of that. This place has been here for thirty years and it's my turn at the wheel. God help me.
trans-unit.target: 旅行者餐厅在 “The 100 ”排名中稳居 50 位，我为此感到自豪。这个地方已经存在了三十年，现在轮到我掌舵了。上帝保佑我

trans-unit.source: One of the main drawbacks to this spot is that there is very little I can do to make it my own because our clientele knows us and knows what they like and change isn't on the menu.
trans-unit.target: 这家餐厅的一个主要缺点是，我几乎无法把它变成我自己的餐厅，因为我们的顾客了解我们，知道他们喜欢什么，菜单上没有变化。

trans-unit.source: We've been in that 53 spot for a long time. We haven't gone up or down. Some people might be accepting of that, but me, I want to push us up just a bit.
trans-unit.target: 我们在这 53 个位置上已经很久了。我们没有上升或下降。有些人可能会接受这一点，但我，我想把我们的排名再往上提一点。

trans-unit.source: Just . . . trying anything to help us move up The 100 feels like we would risk going down too. It's hard to move out of quick sand when every twitch could save or kill you just the same.
trans-unit.target: 只是......想尽一切办法帮助我们爬上 100 英尺，感觉就像我们也要冒着掉下去的风险。当你的一举一动都有可能救你，也有可能要了你的命时，你就很难从急速的风沙中走出来。

trans-unit.source: Tell me, (playername), you have anyone waiting for you back in White Ash?
trans-unit.target: 告诉我，(playername)，你有谁在白灰等你吗？

trans-unit.source: No, I don't. Why are you asking?
trans-unit.target: 不，我没有。你为什么这么问？

trans-unit.source: I do, why?
trans-unit.target: 是的，为什么？

trans-unit.source: Don't fret, you're not my type, I have a girlfriend, but she's far away. I was curious to see how you handle long distance stuff, but I got my answer.
trans-unit.target: 别担心，你不是我喜欢的类型，我有女朋友，但她在很远的地方。我很好奇你是如何处理异地恋的，不过我已经得到了答案。

trans-unit.source: Good for you! I gotta ask though, how do you do it? The long distance thing? I ask because I have a girlfriend who lives in Neon Foundry. I know, far away, but we love each other.
trans-unit.target: 对你有好处！不过我得问问，你是怎么做到的？长途旅行？我这么问是因为我有个女朋友住在霓虹铸造厂。我知道，很远，但我们彼此相爱。

trans-unit.source: I met Remy at a restaurateurs conference. She runs a hippy dippy vegan spot in the Art Tunnel of Neon Foundry, has an eyebrow piercing, and wouldn't usually be my type, but in that moment, she was.
trans-unit.target: 我是在一次餐馆老板会议上认识雷米的。她在霓虹铸造厂的艺术隧道里经营着一家嬉皮素食店，还穿了眉环，通常不会是我喜欢的类型，但在那一刻，她就是我喜欢的类型。

trans-unit.source: Remy has this ability to make me forget all of my stresses from Traveler's. When I call her, everything vanishes, and I just feel . . . oh no! I have to get those restocks done now!
trans-unit.target: 雷米有一种能力，能让我忘掉旅行者餐厅给我带来的所有压力。当我给她打电话时，一切都烟消云散，我只觉得......哦，不！我现在必须补货了！

trans-unit.source: I want to be with her, (playername). Every moment I am awake, and it's hard because I can't leave Traveler's on a whim to see her. Not these days.
trans-unit.target: 我想和她在一起，(playername)。每时每刻我都醒着，但这很难，因为我不能心血来潮地离开旅行者酒吧去看她。这几天不行

trans-unit.source: I want to show my parents they were right to trust me with their shop. I can't blow it, even for love. I can't drop this dream. It's too precious.
trans-unit.target: 我要向父母证明，他们把店交给我是对的。我不能毁了它，即使是为了爱。我不能放弃这个梦想 它太珍贵了

trans-unit.source: I got a text from Remy. She wants to come here! I don't know what to do.
trans-unit.target: 我收到了雷米的短信 她想过来 我不知道该怎么办

trans-unit.source: You say yes and she comes here and you are happy for a fleeting moment.
trans-unit.target: 你答应了，她就来了，你的幸福一闪而过。

trans-unit.source: This is a question? You are seriously asking me this? Fleur, just have fun.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个问题？你真的要问我？费洛尔 玩得开心点

trans-unit.source: I say yes, she comes here, and then I ignore her because I have Traveler's to deal with day in and out! Ughhhhh!
trans-unit.target: 我说可以，她就来了，然后我就不理她了，因为我每天都要面对旅行者的问题！唉唉唉

trans-unit.source: You see, I don't need this. I get this enough from the part of my brain that yells this at me daily. I'm nervous about having fun!
trans-unit.target: 你看，我不需要这些。我的大脑每天都在对我大喊大叫，我已经受够了。我为找乐子而紧张

trans-unit.source: It's hard to let go and enjoy the day when everything is screaming at you to not do that because you gotta make money, honey.
trans-unit.target: 亲爱的，当所有的事情都嚷嚷着让你不要这么做，因为你得赚钱时，你就很难放手去享受每一天。

trans-unit.source: Do you remember the last time you enjoyed the day? I don't and I'm tired of it. When Remy gets here, I am handing off Traveler's duties to my assistant. This place can survive without me for five days.
trans-unit.target: 你还记得上一次享受这一天是什么时候吗？我不记得了，也厌倦了 等雷米来了，我就把旅行者的职责交给我的助手 这里没有我也能撑五天

trans-unit.source: She's almost here! Two days from now she'll be here and I just lost my chef and our supplier is out of garlic, GARLIC, of all things! I'm just waiting for, nope, not gonna say it!
trans-unit.target: 她就快到了！再过两天她就到了 而我刚失去了我的主厨 我们的供应商又没大蒜了 大蒜 什么都没了 我就等着，不，不说了

trans-unit.source: This is it. I'm going to hang out with my girlfriend and nothing will stop me from doing this. Traveler's will be here when I'm back. Yep. Okay. I'm going now.
trans-unit.target: 就是这样 我要和我的女朋友出去玩 没有什么能阻止我这么做 我回来的时候旅行者餐厅就在这了 好的 好吧，我现在就走

trans-unit.source: Thanks.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Thank you, yes, these are from five seasons ago.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，是的，这些是五季前的作品。

trans-unit.source: My brain is shot from anxiety and sleep deprivation, but thank you?
trans-unit.target: 我的大脑已经被焦虑和睡眠不足折磨得不成样子了，但还是要谢谢你？

trans-unit.source: Please, I think about it enough.
trans-unit.target: 拜托，我已经想得够多了。

trans-unit.source: . . .you know what? Thanks, it's hard to remember to take the positives when they come along.
trans-unit.target: . .你知道吗？谢谢，当积极的一面出现时，很难记住要抓住它。

trans-unit.source: If you could help me, I'd appreciate it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您能帮助我，我将感激不尽。

trans-unit.source: I've got my big girl pants on, thanks though.
trans-unit.target: 不过，我已经穿上了大女孩的裤子，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: This is perfect, thanks!
trans-unit.target: 太完美了，谢谢！

trans-unit.source: Not really my style. Thanks.
trans-unit.target: 不是我的风格。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: You gave me one of these. I liked it, but I don't need two.
trans-unit.target: 你给了我一个 我很喜欢，但我不需要两个。

trans-unit.source: Who doesn't have time for a hug? Come in here!
trans-unit.target: 谁没时间拥抱一下？进来吧

trans-unit.source: Traveler's needs me tonight, I can't.
trans-unit.target: 旅行者餐厅今晚需要我，我不能去。

trans-unit.source: I'm not into like that, okay?
trans-unit.target: 我不喜欢那样，好吗？

trans-unit.source: Hello, who are you?_If you are asking, my name is Milo, and if you weren't asking, well now you know.
trans-unit.target: 你好，你是谁？_如果你想知道，我叫麦洛，如果你不想知道，现在你知道了。

trans-unit.source: How do you feel today? 'Good' is an action and not a state of being, so please answer in a manner that reflects how you actually feel._Myself, I am feeling joyful at the moment.
trans-unit.target: 您今天感觉如何？好 "是一个动作，而不是一种状态，因此请以反映您实际感受的方式回答。

trans-unit.source: My parents always taught me not to voice my opinion to someone's face, unless it's a good one._I found it's a good rule to live by, which is why I will not share what I think of your outfit, but man, it's hard.
trans-unit.target: 我的父母总是教导我，不要当着别人的面发表意见，除非是好的意见。_我发现这是一条很好的生活准则，这就是为什么我不会分享我对你的服装的看法，但老兄，这很难。

trans-unit.source: Did you know? Oni masks are usually reserved for traditional ceremonies and performances around Japan.
trans-unit.target: 您知道吗？鬼面具通常用于日本各地的传统仪式和表演。

trans-unit.source: Interacting with neurotypicals is just so tiring. I wish everyone could keep up during conversations, but sadly only a few can track with me._I could go on, but right now I am exhausted
trans-unit.target: 与神经症患者交流太累了。我希望每个人都能在谈话中跟上我的节奏，但遗憾的是，只有少数人能跟上我的节奏。

trans-unit.source: You are the new chef in town? I've heard about you. Some people believe you are rather overblown and don't deserve the free restaurant._Others think you're fine. I don't know where I sit yet, but I'll come to a conclusion soon enough.
trans-unit.target: 你是城里新来的厨师？我听说过你。有些人认为你太夸张了，不配拥有这家免费餐厅。我还不知道自己的立场，但我很快就会得出结论。

trans-unit.source: You're a chef, have you ever tried to make a Japanese pancake?_The big fluffy ones that look like a cloud on a plate?
trans-unit.target: 你是一名厨师，有没有试过做日本煎饼？

trans-unit.source: Yes, and they are a delight.
trans-unit.target: 是的，它们很讨人喜欢。

trans-unit.source: No, I haven't yet.
trans-unit.target: 不，我还没有。

trans-unit.source: They are! I really love them with whipped cream and fresh blueberries. You have passed my test. Congrats.
trans-unit.target: 就是这样！我非常喜欢它们配上鲜奶油和新鲜蓝莓。你通过了我的测试。祝贺你

trans-unit.source: I am sorry to hear that. You have failed my test. For now I bid you adieu.
trans-unit.target: 很遗憾听到这个消息。你没有通过我的测试 现在我向你告别

trans-unit.source: I love traditional Japanese masks, though I think my favorites are Hannya masks._I guess we can say they look a bit weird and creepy, but to me they are extremely beautiful.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢日本的传统面具，但我最喜欢的是汉尼亚面具。_我想我们可以说它们看起来有点怪异和令人毛骨悚然，但对我来说，它们非常漂亮。

trans-unit.source: To me, making something of quality is the point of making anything. I truly loathe the fast fashion you are wearing as it is both cheap and bad for the planet._Don't worry, you're not the only one who has terrible taste.
trans-unit.target: 对我来说，制造高质量的东西才是制造任何东西的意义所在。我非常讨厌你穿的快速时尚，因为它既廉价又对地球有害。

trans-unit.source: I will go to Japan one day. I will.
trans-unit.target: 总有一天我会去日本的。我会的

trans-unit.source: I don't have many friends in my life outside of Hasel, Aloys, Fluer, Thelio, and now you. Have a good day, my friend.
trans-unit.target: 在我的生活中，除了哈塞尔、阿洛伊斯、弗鲁尔、提里奥和你之外，我没有多少朋友。祝你愉快，我的朋友。

trans-unit.source: If you ever find yourself needing some time for peace, then I recommend East Beach._It's natural wonders and the roar of the ocean always put my mind at ease.
trans-unit.target: 如果你发现自己需要一些宁静的时间，那么我向你推荐东海滩。_这里的自然奇观和大海的咆哮声总能让我心旷神怡。

trans-unit.source: Hi friend! What have you done for someone else today?
trans-unit.target: 嗨，朋友！今天你为别人做了什么？

trans-unit.source: Oh, uhhh, still working on that.
trans-unit.target: 哦，呃，还在努力中。

trans-unit.source: I helped with some deliveries earlier.
trans-unit.target: 我之前帮忙送了些东西。

trans-unit.source: Remember, a community is only as good as the people who live in it. We should help others using our talents. I hope you cook something for someone in need today.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，一个社区的好坏取决于生活在其中的人。我们应该利用自己的才能帮助他人。我希望你今天能为需要帮助的人做点什么。

trans-unit.source: Deliveries? I wasn't expecting that, I was expecting you cooking something for someone. Huh, that is curious.
trans-unit.target: 送货？我没想到会这样，我还以为你会给人做饭呢。真让人好奇

trans-unit.source: You know I own a clothing shop, but I don't order in blanks from some place online._I get my materials from local suppliers who make sure the stitches are solid. It's what allows my clothes to last longer than anyone elses.
trans-unit.target: 你知道我开了一家服装店，但我不从网上订购坯布。正是因为这样，我的衣服才能比别人的更耐穿。

trans-unit.source: I will make my own clothing line at a scale that would help keep a lot of people warm, but also last a long time._It's hard to get quality and quantity, but I won't sacrafice the ladder to make the former happen.
trans-unit.target: 我将制作自己的服装系列，其规模既能帮助很多人保暖，又能长期穿着。_质量和数量很难兼得，但我不会牺牲阶梯来实现前者。

trans-unit.source: Oni are formed when an evil person dies and goes to one of the Buddist hells._They come back as a demon to terrorize the living. In today's world, they are seen as a good luck charm that scares away bad luck.
trans-unit.target: 当一个恶人死后进入佛教的地狱之一时，就会形成 “鬼”。在当今世界，它们被视为吉祥物，可以驱走厄运。

trans-unit.source: When it's raining, I tend to feel a little at ease, because the rhythm of it hitting the roof just helps me focus away from any troubling customers in my shop.
trans-unit.target: 下雨的时候，我往往会感到轻松一些，因为雨点打在屋顶上的节奏感能让我把注意力从店里那些烦人的顾客身上转移开。

trans-unit.source: In case you didn't know, Prisca is one of the most helpful people in town._She does so much for so many people. She helped me setup my store, so if you need things, be sure to look her up.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不知道，Prisca 是镇上最乐于助人的人之一。她帮我开店，所以如果你需要什么东西，一定要找她。

trans-unit.source: Hi friend! Tell me, do you have anyone special in your life? I'm asking because I am not seeking any sort of relationship with you._I inquire because I am curious about your life.
trans-unit.target: 嗨，朋友！告诉我，你的生活中有什么特别的人吗？我之所以这么问，并不是想和你建立什么关系。

trans-unit.source: No, I don't have the time for one.
trans-unit.target: 不，我没有时间。

trans-unit.source: Yes, I have someone who is special to me.
trans-unit.target: 是的，我有一个特别的人。

trans-unit.source: That is a shame to hear. Everyone needs someone, I believe, even if that person isn't a romantic interest to them, because no human is made to be alone.
trans-unit.target: 听起来真让人遗憾。我相信，每个人都需要一个人，即使这个人对他们来说并不浪漫，因为没有人是注定孤独的。

trans-unit.source: I'm glad to hear that (playername). I hope to one day have someone like that in my life. If she will have me that is, but we will see time goes forward.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴听到这个消息(playername)。我希望有一天我的生命中也能有这样一个人。如果她愿意接受我的话，但我们要看时间的推移。

trans-unit.source: Making a friend is difficult for me because I am very honest with people._I think it will serve me well in a relationship because honesty is what's needed to make one work.
trans-unit.target: 交朋友对我来说很困难，因为我对人非常诚实。_我认为这对我的恋爱关系很有帮助，因为诚实是促成一段关系的必要条件。

trans-unit.source: I'm making an Oni mask at home. I hope to be able to use it at an upcoming festival._Now I just need a spiked club. Do you think that will get through security?
trans-unit.target: 我正在家里做一个鬼怪面具。我希望能在即将到来的庆典上用上它。_现在我只需要一根带刺的棍子。你觉得能通过安检吗？

trans-unit.source: My parents have always treated me with respect and love. I am very lucky to have parents who are not condescending to me or treat me like a child._Respect is earned and they have earned mine.
trans-unit.target: 我的父母一直尊重我，爱护我。我很幸运能有这样的父母，他们不会对我居高临下，也不会把我当孩子看待。

trans-unit.source: You know what I need right now? A boba tea from Hasel. When I'm off work let's go over there and have one._If you pick the wrong flavor I will let you know, okay?
trans-unit.target: 你知道我现在需要什么吗？哈塞尔的波霸茶 如果你选错了口味，我会告诉你的，好吗？

trans-unit.source: Have you ever been to Milk and Wheat? It's a corner store in town._It not as good as the other stores around here but my friend Thelio works there and I like to visit him. He's a good guy.
trans-unit.target: 你去过 “牛奶和小麦 ”吗？它不像附近的其他商店那么好，但我的朋友 Thelio 在那里工作，我喜欢去拜访他。他是个好人

trans-unit.source: Have you ever wondered about what life would be like if you were born 'normal'?
trans-unit.target: 您是否想过，如果您生来就是 “正常人”，生活会是什么样子？

trans-unit.source: No one is normal, Milo.
trans-unit.target: 没有人是正常的，麦洛

trans-unit.source: I really do wonder somedays.
trans-unit.target: 有时候我真的很纳闷。

trans-unit.source: I don't envy or feel jealous about it, but I'd be curious to see what a day would be like as a neurotypical.
trans-unit.target: 我不羡慕也不嫉妒，但我很想知道神经正常人的一天会是什么样子。

trans-unit.source: When my mind is whirling, I don't get as much done, but that doesn't mean that I am not thinking about something._Usually I have my rubik's cube. It helps to move the pieces around in my hand when that happens.
trans-unit.target: 当我胡思乱想时，我做不了那么多事情，但这并不意味着我没有在想什么。在这种情况下，把魔方在手里移动一下会有帮助。

trans-unit.source: I really do like watching horror movies. They are hilarious, even though it is probably unintentional._But there's something about watching people scream and run for their lives from a masked killer makes me laugh.
trans-unit.target: 我真的很喜欢看恐怖电影。虽然可能是无心之失，但看着人们在蒙面杀手面前尖叫、逃命，还是会让我发笑。

trans-unit.source: Each garment I make, I know it will live a long life, and as long as I know they are made of quality, then I am happy being a humble tailor.
trans-unit.target: 我知道我做的每一件衣服都会有很长的寿命，只要我知道它们是用高质量的材料做成的，那么我就很乐意做一个卑微的裁缝。

trans-unit.source: This place is full of people nowadays. I am not going to lie, not that I ever do, but I miss when it was quieter._Sure, less sales, but also, I could hear the ocean sometimes. Now, it's just constant chatter.
trans-unit.target: 现在这里到处都是人。当然，销售量少了，但有时我还能听到大海的声音。现在，这里只有喋喋不休的唠叨声。

trans-unit.source: I was walking to the shop today and saw a little kid with a baseball bat on rollerblades._I don't know why, but I am bothered by that image.
trans-unit.target: 今天，我走在去商店的路上，看到一个小孩子拿着棒球棒在滑旱冰。

trans-unit.source: Have you ever been to Milk and Wheat? It's a corner store in town._It not as good as the other stores around here but my friend Thelio works there and I like to visit him. He's a good guy.
trans-unit.target: 你去过 “牛奶和小麦 ”吗？它不像附近的其他商店那么好，但我的朋友 Thelio 在那里工作，我喜欢去拜访他。他是个好人

trans-unit.source: Do you like horns or no horns for your oni mask? No judgement, just want to know.
trans-unit.target: 你喜欢鬼脸面具上有角还是没有角？不做评价，只是想知道。

trans-unit.source: Horns please!
trans-unit.target: 请按喇叭！

trans-unit.source: No horns, thank you.
trans-unit.target: 没有喇叭，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: They do add a lot of drama to the mask, I agree.
trans-unit.target: 我同意，它们确实为面具增添了不少戏剧性。

trans-unit.source: It's a clean look for the mask. I'll emphasize the teeth to create some drama.
trans-unit.target: 面具的外观很简洁。我会强调牙齿，以营造一些戏剧效果。

trans-unit.source: Making us a set of oni masks is something that I just popped into my head. I think it would be a lot of fun to have a set like that.
trans-unit.target: 为我们制作一套鬼怪面具是我突发奇想的事情。我觉得制作一套这样的面具会非常有趣。

trans-unit.source: Since we've been together, my brain has been on fire with ideas._I have drawn so many clothing doodles that I might need a new drawing pad soon.
trans-unit.target: 自从我们在一起后，我的脑子里就充满了各种想法。_我画了太多的衣服涂鸦，我可能很快就需要一个新的画板了。

trans-unit.source: Free flowing ideas, a sense of warmth throughout the day, I see why people like being in a relationship._When I was single, I loved myself and my ideas, but having someone who also shares my dreams just makes things feel a bit warmer.
trans-unit.target: 我明白为什么人们喜欢恋爱了。_当我单身时，我爱我自己和我的想法，但有一个和我有同样梦想的人，会让我感觉更温暖。

trans-unit.source: If we're together for long enough, I'm sure the subject of marriage will come up._I don't think I need something so formal as a ceremony to feel like we're together forever, but if you do, let me know.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们在一起的时间够长，我相信结婚的话题一定会出现。_我不认为我需要像仪式这样正式的东西来感觉我们永远在一起，但如果你需要，请告诉我。

trans-unit.source: I love you more than oni masks. I said it and I mean it. In my mind you are above that line._Which is a place that no one else has ever been to including my parents. I love them, but not as much as oni masks.
trans-unit.target: 我爱你胜过鬼脸面具。我说过，我是认真的。在我心中，你就在那条线之上。_那是一个包括我父母在内的任何人都不曾去过的地方。我爱他们，但比不上鬼面人

trans-unit.source: 115_MILO_PROGRESSION
trans-unit.target: 115_miloo_progression

trans-unit.source: I heard Le Sequoia is open! I hope you last longer than the average restaurant!
trans-unit.target: 我听说红杉餐厅开张了 我希望你能比一般餐厅坚持得更久！

trans-unit.source: Lucius is a rather trite critic. I find his reviews to be boring and lacking of any real thought._I suspect his review of Le Sequoia will be the same level he's beeing phoning in for years now regardless if it's a positive or negative review.
trans-unit.target: 卢修斯是个相当老套的评论家。我怀疑他对《红杉树》的评论，不管是正面的还是负面的，都会是他多年来的老样子。

trans-unit.source: I am not that found of baths. I am very much a shower person, but I am glad to see the building is open. It is very pretty and cute.
trans-unit.target: 我不太喜欢洗澡。我非常喜欢淋浴，但我很高兴看到这座建筑已经开放。它非常漂亮可爱。

trans-unit.source: Your food must be good because people in my shop have been talking about it a lot. It's annoying, but good for you!
trans-unit.target: 你的食物一定很好吃，因为我店里的人经常谈论它。这很烦人，但对你有好处！

trans-unit.source: I join many others when I say the teahouse is sublime._That word is a very good word to use for it and I overheard someone say it so I decided to use it again in this conversation._Good job on the teahouse (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我和很多人一样，都说茶馆是一个崇高的地方。_这个词用在这里非常好，我无意中听到有人这么说，所以我决定在这次谈话中再次使用这个词。

trans-unit.source: Thank you for doing as much as you have for people asking for help._It takes a lot to even ask for help, so it's good to see you are honoring their request by answering it.
trans-unit.target: 感谢你们为求助者提供了这么多帮助。_求助者甚至需要付出很大的努力，所以很高兴看到你们回应了他们的请求，这是对他们的尊重。

trans-unit.source: Helping people is so important these days or any days to have ever existed. Good work helping out when you can.
trans-unit.target: 助人为乐在当今时代或任何时代都是如此重要。在你力所能及的情况下，帮帮忙吧。

trans-unit.source: Your menu doesn't have food I wouldn't eat. So, that's nice!_And there are a lot of vegetarian choices. So that's nice too!
trans-unit.target: 你们的菜单上没有我不吃的食物。而且还有很多素食选择。这也不错！

trans-unit.source: When I ate at your restaurant, the menu selections were almost too much goodness in one spot!_You can expect to see me more often.
trans-unit.target: 我在你的餐厅吃饭时，菜单上的选择几乎让人目不暇接！_你可以期待经常见到我。

trans-unit.source: I do not like your menu. Why? Well, there is too much meat in there, and not enough greens.
trans-unit.target: 我不喜欢你的菜单。为什么？肉太多了，蔬菜不够。

trans-unit.source: Have you changed the menu yet? No? Then no, I'm good.
trans-unit.target: 你换菜单了吗？没有？那就不用了

trans-unit.source: I am glad that you and I are of one mind when it comes to running a successful business and also not destroying the planet in the process. Well done!
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴，在成功经营企业和不破坏地球的问题上，你我意见一致。干得好

trans-unit.source: What's the point of money if we destroy everything in the process?_Money can't buy you air and water if it's all microplastics. No future with that stuff around.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们在这一过程中毁掉了一切，那么金钱还有什么意义呢？有这些东西在，就没有未来。

trans-unit.source: I have nothing to say to you if you pollute and destroy our town for the sake of a credit._We all have a responsibility here (playername).
trans-unit.target: 如果你们为了一点信用点而污染并破坏我们的城镇，那我也无话可说。_我们都有责任(playername)。

trans-unit.source: You have doomed our children and their future for nothing but ones and zeros. I hope you sleep poorly.
trans-unit.target: 你们注定了我们的孩子和他们的未来只能是 1 和 0。我希望你睡不好觉。

trans-unit.source: This is a mask I have sought after for a very long time. Holding it in my hands is such a joy. Thank you again.
trans-unit.target: 这是我追寻已久的面具。将它捧在手中，我感到无比喜悦。再次感谢您。

trans-unit.source: I have displayed the mask in my home. I get to look at it every day and I am so glad I get to.
trans-unit.target: 我在家里展示了这个面具。我每天都能看到它，我很高兴能看到它。

trans-unit.source: When Aloys came over the other day he noticed my newest home decoration. He asked to hold it. I laughed and said no. No one gets to hold it.
trans-unit.target: 前几天，阿洛伊斯来我家时，注意到了我最新的家居装饰。他要求拿着它。我笑着说不行。没人能拿着它。

trans-unit.source: My heart isn't as full as I wish it were, but I'm glad I tried to find love.
trans-unit.target: 我的心并不像我希望的那样充实，但我很高兴我努力去寻找爱。

trans-unit.source: I don't know what to do with my feelings for Hasel._I don't want to throw them away, but keeping them around is probably a bad idea. Could become toxic.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道该怎么处理我对哈塞尔的感情_我不想把它们丢掉，但把它们留在身边可能是个坏主意。可能会变成毒药

trans-unit.source: I've decided to place my emotions into an admiration section of my brain._I don't want to let those warm feelings go, but also, I am not under the delusion that we will be together someday.
trans-unit.target: 我决定把我的情感放在大脑的 “钦佩 ”部分。_我不想让那些温暖的感觉消失，但我也不妄想我们有一天会在一起。

trans-unit.source: 115_MILO_INTERACT
trans-unit.target: 115_miloo_interact

trans-unit.source: My face was given to me by my mom and dad. I had very little to do with it other than adding some highlights to it. Tell them about my face, they did the work.
trans-unit.target: 我的脸是爸爸妈妈给我的。除了给我的脸增加了一些亮点之外，我几乎没做什么。跟他们说说我的脸吧，都是他们的功劳。

trans-unit.source: Ah, you noticed my clothes and the Oni mask? Thanks, I'm pretty proud with how this print came out, it was really difficult since I had to do it by hand.
trans-unit.target: 啊，你注意到我的衣服和鬼怪面具了？谢谢，我对这次印制的效果很满意，因为我必须手工制作，所以难度很大。

trans-unit.source: Look, my brain is mine and mine alone. You don't need to talk about it.
trans-unit.target: 听着，我的大脑是我一个人的 你不需要谈论它。

trans-unit.source: I was taught that a job must be done well when you commit to the task. The job allows me to survive, but I hope it will lead me to my dreams.
trans-unit.target: 我受到的教育是，当你投入到工作中时，就必须把工作做好。这份工作让我得以生存，但我希望它能引领我实现梦想。
. . . 好的

trans-unit.source: Your request to help me with this task is approved.
trans-unit.target: 您帮助我完成这项任务的请求已获批准。

trans-unit.source: My mom was right about some people having a beautiful heart._But I don't need your help right now. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 我妈妈说有些人有一颗美丽的心是对的_但我现在不需要你的帮助。但我现在不需要你的帮助

trans-unit.source: I thought something like this would be beyond my means for a while. This means a lot to me. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 我还以为这样的事情会让我暂时力不从心。这对我意义重大。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Hey, this is pretty stylish! Thank you friend!
trans-unit.target: 嘿，这可真够时尚的！谢谢朋友！

trans-unit.source: You know, I think I misjudged you (playername). You do have great taste.
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗，我想我错怪你了(playername)。你确实很有品味。

trans-unit.source: Expensive yes. But is it stylish? . . . . The answer would be a resounding . . ._. . . No . . .
trans-unit.target: 贵是贵。但它时尚吗？答案是肯定的。. . 不时尚

trans-unit.source: What . . . Whoa . . . Hey! Is this a gift for me? Few people remember my birthday. This means a lot (playername). And look, it's a stylish piece too!
trans-unit.target: 什么 . . 哇 . . . 这是给我的礼物吗？很少有人记得我的生日 这意味着很多(playername)。看，这也是一件时尚的作品！

trans-unit.source: I wouldn't know what to do with that, but thank you._If you want to give me something, give me materials I can use for mask making, or some healthy meals.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想给我什么，请给我制作面具的材料，或者一些健康的食物。

trans-unit.source: Not stylish (playername). Not stylish at all. I thought you had potential, but alas, I was wrong.
trans-unit.target: 不时尚(playername)。一点都不时尚。我以为你很有潜力，可惜我错了。

trans-unit.source: No. I don't like the look of this. Do you like the look of this?
trans-unit.target: 不，我不喜欢这个样子。你喜欢这个样子吗？

trans-unit.source: You have given me this specific item already today. Is your brain okay? Maybe you should lie down.
trans-unit.target: 你今天已经给了我这个特定的东西。你的脑子还好吧？也许你该躺下

trans-unit.source: What are you doing? Are we lovers or something?_No offense but I really don't like being touched, so don't ever do that again, I'm not joking.
trans-unit.target: 我们是恋人还是什么？无意冒犯，但我真的不喜欢被人碰，所以别再那样做了，我不是在开玩笑。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I'm a bit busy today.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我今天有点忙。

trans-unit.source: Love is something that shouldn't be given away and I cannot accept your love because you are my friend, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 爱是不该被放弃的东西，我不能接受你的爱，因为你是我的朋友，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Sells clothing
trans-unit.target: 销售服装

trans-unit.source: Hello, this shop sells clothes, go ahead and get some.
trans-unit.target: 你好，这家店是卖衣服的，去买吧。

trans-unit.source: Hello, I made the clothes in this shop. Buy some.
trans-unit.target: 你好，这家店的衣服是我做的。买一些吧

trans-unit.source: Hello, the clothes in this shop are not terrible, unlike the clothes you are wearing.
trans-unit.target: 您好，这家店的衣服并不难看，不像您身上穿的衣服。

trans-unit.source: Hello, yes that's my name out front. Don't steal from here.
trans-unit.target: 你好，是的，这是我的名字。别在这儿偷东西

trans-unit.source: Hello, it's good you dropped by, you definitely need new clothes.
trans-unit.target: 你好，你能来真好，你肯定需要新衣服了。

trans-unit.source: That will cover your body.
trans-unit.target: 这将覆盖你的身体。

trans-unit.source: You will not find another print like that.
trans-unit.target: 你再也找不到这样的印刷品了。

trans-unit.source: This is an excellent choice.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个很好的选择。

trans-unit.source: These will be used to make more clothes.
trans-unit.target: 这些将用来制作更多的衣服。

trans-unit.source: I will buy them.
trans-unit.target: 我会买的。

trans-unit.source: This will be useful.
trans-unit.target: 这将很有用。

trans-unit.source: Why would you think I needed that?
trans-unit.target: 你为什么认为我需要那个？

trans-unit.source: This has nothing to do with what I make.
trans-unit.target: 这与我做的东西无关。

trans-unit.source: I don't need this, stop trying to sell me it.
trans-unit.target: 我不需要这个，别再向我推销了。

trans-unit.source: I have to pay people with the credits people pay me for the goods I sell and you don't have any.
trans-unit.target: 我必须用人们为我出售的商品支付的信用点来支付给别人，而你却没有。

trans-unit.source: You need credits to buy that.
trans-unit.target: 你需要信用点数来购买。

trans-unit.source: This is a store, not a food bank.
trans-unit.target: 这是一家商店，不是食物银行。

trans-unit.source: Is there something you need?
trans-unit.target: 您需要什么吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm not obligated to ask if you're okay just because you bothered me.
trans-unit.target: 我没有义务因为你打扰了我，就问你好不好。

trans-unit.source: If you need something, please hesitate to ask.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要什么，请尽管开口。

trans-unit.source: Look, I need to be somewhere very soon. A movie premiere to be exact. If you're done, I'd really like to get moving.
trans-unit.target: 听着，我马上要去一个地方。确切地说，是电影首映式 如果你说完了，我真的想走了

trans-unit.source: I may have overexaggerated about the premiere._It was a movie that hasn't been screened yet in White Ash Harbor in the screening room in the library.
trans-unit.target: 我可能夸大了首映式。_那是一部还没有在白灰港图书馆放映室放映过的电影。

trans-unit.source: Have you seen Hell Closet 5: Gentrification?
trans-unit.target: 你看过《地狱壁橱 5：平民化》吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm sorry, what?
trans-unit.target: 对不起，什么？

trans-unit.source: If it's anything like Hell Closet 3, then I'm sold.
trans-unit.target: 如果能像《地狱 Closet 3》一样，那我就卖给你了。

trans-unit.source: Yeah, that's what I figured. Cool
trans-unit.target: 是啊，我也是这么想的。酷

trans-unit.source: Wait, stop, you saw Hell Closet 3? You're a fan of the Closetverse?! Color me shocked.
trans-unit.target: 等等，停，你看过《地狱衣橱 3》？你是《地狱衣橱》的粉丝？我很震惊

trans-unit.source: This town is just a blip on the map and I really can't wait to leave it. Head to a place with a real tea house and far away from here.
trans-unit.target: 这个小镇只是地图上的一个小点，我真的迫不及待地想离开它。去一个有真正茶馆的地方，离这里远远的。

trans-unit.source: When the rain is out, that's when I know I'm going to have a good day, because waiting for me at the end of it is a cup of tea.
trans-unit.target: 下雨的时候，我就知道自己今天会过得很好，因为在雨后等着我的是一杯茶。

trans-unit.source: This is my day job, pays the bills, and helps me get better gear so I can do what I am really into: 3-D modeling monsters.
trans-unit.target: 这是我的日常工作，既能支付账单，又能帮我获得更好的装备，这样我就能做我真正喜欢的事情： 3D怪物建模

trans-unit.source: When it's foggy out, I sometimes think that there are creatures waiting in the mist. Just beyond what I can see._Makes the walks home feel safer than usual because any creeps out there would be eaten before they say something stupid.
trans-unit.target: 外面起雾的时候，我有时会想，雾里一定有什么生物在等着我。这让我在回家的路上比平时更有安全感，因为外面的怪物在说蠢话之前就会被吃掉。

trans-unit.source: If you're looking for some fun gear that has some horror to it, check out Milo's._I know of his style isn't for everyone, but his clothing will last forever if treated right.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在寻找一些有趣的、有恐怖感的装备，可以去 Milo's 看看。_我知道他的风格并不适合每一个人，但如果处理得当，他的衣服可以穿很久。

trans-unit.source: Look, I don't really need to chat right now . . . okay?
trans-unit.target: 听着，我现在不需要聊天，好吗？

trans-unit.source: You look like you someone to talk to..
trans-unit.target: 你看起来像一个人说话。

trans-unit.source: Fine, I'll leave you be then.
trans-unit.target: 好吧，那我就不打扰你了。

trans-unit.source: . . . it's just, my life is hard. I know everyone's is, but today, it's my turn. And I am tired of feeling like it's my turn every day. That's all.
trans-unit.target: . .只是，我的生活很艰难。我知道每个人的生活都很艰难，但今天轮到我了。我已经厌倦了每天都轮到我的感觉。就这样

trans-unit.source: Sorry (playername). It's just been one of those days.
trans-unit.target: 对不起(playername)。这只是其中的一天。

trans-unit.source: Every Tuesday I have to go into Billboard City for therapy. I wonder if it's even worth it.
trans-unit.target: 每周二，我都要去广告牌城接受治疗。我不知道这是否值得。

trans-unit.source: I could really do for a 'Reggie Comes Home' marathon. I need that ax wielding man to raise my spirits by killing all the unsuspecting teenagers.
trans-unit.target: 我真的很想看一场 “雷吉回家 ”马拉松。我需要那个挥舞着斧头的男人杀光所有不知情的少年，让我精神振奋。

trans-unit.source: Today is going to be the nicest day. Nope, couldn't even try to mean that one.
trans-unit.target: 今天将是最美好的一天。不，我根本没那个意思。

trans-unit.source: My therapist says that if I try to reframe my day, then I can take control of it. Only problem is . . . I don't mean it when I try._I don't feel like my words mean anything when I say them. Another gift from Mom and Dad.
trans-unit.target: 我的心理医生说，如果我试着重新规划我的一天，那么我就能掌控它。唯一的问题是......。我觉得我说的话没有任何意义。爸妈给我的另一份礼物

trans-unit.source: I love horror, but I've heard that some parts of the woods around here have some funky stuff going on in them._I'm talking about voices from the wood and such. That's a big nope for me! I'll take my fake ghosts every time, thank you.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢恐怖片，但我听说这里有些地方的树林里有些怪东西。这对我来说是个大问题！我每次都会选择假鬼，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: There's a triple feature happening next week of the original 'Harry has Two Skulls' trilogy._I was wondering if you'd like to come?
trans-unit.target: 下周将举行 “哈利有两个头颅 ”三部曲的三连映。

trans-unit.source: I don't think I'll have the time next week, sorry.
trans-unit.target: 下周应该没时间了，抱歉。

trans-unit.source: I don't really like horror movies.
trans-unit.target: 我不太喜欢恐怖电影。

trans-unit.source: It's . . . okay. I understand.
trans-unit.target: 这......好吧。I understand.

trans-unit.source: Ah I see, that's too bad. Thought you might like it.
trans-unit.target: 啊，我明白了，太糟糕了。还以为你会喜欢呢。

trans-unit.source: For the longest time, I was afraid of being stuck in this town, and while it isn't the place I want to be forever I gotta say that it's not the worst spot to be either.
trans-unit.target: 长久以来，我一直害怕被困在这个小镇，虽然这不是我想永远呆下去的地方，但我得说，这也不是最糟糕的地方。

trans-unit.source: If you haven't yet, please see some Korean horror. It is from a different plane of existence and it is one filled with blood.
trans-unit.target: 如果你还没有看过，请去看看韩国的恐怖片。它来自另一个世界，是充满血腥的世界。

trans-unit.source: My cat came up to me the other day while I was having some tea. She sat in my lap and we watched the rain together._It's the most peaceful I've been in months. Guess that means something's going right, huh?
trans-unit.target: 前几天我喝茶的时候，我的猫走过来。这是我几个月来最平静的时候。我猜这意味着有什么事情正在发生，是吧？

trans-unit.source: I got you a copy of 'Santa Dies Tonight' as a thanks . . . Thanks for not giving up on me._My therapist said making friends with people outside of my bubble is important and you helped me out. More than you will know. So, thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我给你买了一本《圣诞老人今夜逝去》作为感谢. . . 我的心理医生说，和我的圈子之外的人交朋友很重要，你帮了我大忙。你帮我的忙比你知道的还多 所以，谢谢你

trans-unit.source: I had this one patient come in today and they wouldn't stop talking about the old mines around town._The moron broke their ankle trying to climb down into one. Some history is better left forgotten, IMO.
trans-unit.target: 今天来了一位病人，他们一直在谈论镇上的老矿井。在我看来，有些历史还是忘了的好。

trans-unit.source: You ever fall off a hobby, (playername)?
trans-unit.target: 你有没有从爱好上摔下来过，(playername)？

trans-unit.source: Yes, and it sucks.
trans-unit.target: 是的，而且很糟糕。

trans-unit.source: No, I really haven't had time to make any.
trans-unit.target: 没有，我真的没时间做。

trans-unit.source: Right? I was really into 3D modeling, but I haven't had any time to really play with that more. It sucks!
trans-unit.target: 对不对？我很喜欢三维建模，但一直没时间玩。这很糟糕！

trans-unit.source: Hobbies are super important to your mental health! Try to find some for yourself, (playername)._I was really into 3D printing, but now . . . I just feel so disconnected from it. It sucks.
trans-unit.target: 爱好对你的心理健康超级重要！我曾经非常喜欢 3D 打印，但现在............. 我只是觉得自己与它脱节了。太糟糕了。

trans-unit.source: I look at my 3D printer and just sigh at it._Maybe when things at the clinic calm down a bit, I could find some energy to make stuff. At least I have my horror movies still.
trans-unit.target: 我看着我的 3D 打印机，不禁叹了口气。_也许等诊所里的事情稍微平静下来，我就能找到一些精力来制作东西了。至少我还有恐怖电影。

trans-unit.source: It's funny to me, but I still flinch when I see schlock horror movie gore._I deal with real wounds and blood on my daily, but SEEING someone's arms being ripped off just makes me whince.
trans-unit.target: 我每天都要面对真实的伤口和鲜血，但看到有人被扯掉胳膊，我还是会感到害怕。

trans-unit.source: I think I might run a horror movie marathon here in town sometime soon._Horror has always been seen as a rather low class affair, but it can be high art, it's a matter of understanding it.
trans-unit.target: 我想，不久的将来，我可能会在这里举办一场恐怖电影马拉松。_恐怖电影一直被视为低级趣味，但它也可以是高雅艺术，关键在于对它的理解。

trans-unit.source: Ugh, the clinic is just always yelling at me! I feel like I am never able to fully relax away from it._It constantly needs supplies, the patients are always there, I just don't feel like I could leave it even if I wanted to. Ughhhh!
trans-unit.target: 诊所总是对我大吼大叫！它总是需要补给，病人总是在那里，我就是觉得即使我想离开，也离不开它。唉唉唉

trans-unit.source: When I hold movie nights at room in the library I invite anyone who would want to come and experience some of the best horror available._I sometimes get up to seven people in attendance! I take my wins where I can.
trans-unit.target: 当我在图书馆的房间里举办电影之夜时，我会邀请任何愿意来的人，体验一些最好的恐怖片！我尽我所能赢得胜利。

trans-unit.source: I wouldn't let you know this when we first met, but I am very messed up._Are you sure you want to stick around?
trans-unit.target: 我们初次见面时，我不会让你知道这些，但我现在一团糟。

trans-unit.source: I don't want to be anywhere else.
trans-unit.target: 我不想去别的地方。

trans-unit.source: Like a fly on sticky paper, I'm stuck to you.
trans-unit.target: 就像粘纸上的苍蝇，我被你粘住了。

trans-unit.source: I'm sure you don't mean that, but also, I get what you are saying. Thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我相信你不是这个意思，但我也明白你的意思。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: And we will go far, little fly, or at least I hope so. I like us.
trans-unit.target: 我们会走得更远，小苍蝇，至少我希望如此。我喜欢我们

trans-unit.source: Now that we are officially an item, I am now going to require you to watch the entire Human Worm series._Yes, prepare for six full length films that deal with a man eating dirt. Lots of dirt, and blood of course.
trans-unit.target: 既然我们已经正式成为恋人，我现在就要求你看完整个《人形虫》系列。_是的，准备看六部关于一个人吃泥土的完整电影。当然是大量的泥土和鲜血。

trans-unit.source: I can't wait to watch Sleepover Camp with you! That ending!_Ohhhh! I'll never be able to experience it for the first time again, but watching people see it. . . AHHH! I love it. Can't wait.
trans-unit.target: 我等不及要和你一起看《过夜营》了！那个结局！_Ohhhh！我再也无法第一次体验它了，但看着人们看到它. . . 我爱死了 我爱死了。等不及了

trans-unit.source: I am not going to stop going to therapy by the way._I will not always be available some days emotionally and I hope you can understand that on those days it isn't because I don't love you._It's because I am trying to love myself.
trans-unit.target: 顺便说一句，我不会停止接受心理治疗。_有些时候，我在情感上并不总是有空，我希望你能理解，在那些日子里，并不是因为我不爱你，_而是因为我在努力爱自己。

trans-unit.source: It's been a long day at the clinic. Can we just watch a bunch of stupid teens get murdered in a forest and pass out?_I could really go for that right now.
trans-unit.target: 在诊所忙了一天了 It's been a long day at the clinic. 我们能看一群愚蠢的青少年在森林里被杀 然后昏睡过去吗？

trans-unit.source: I am onboard with being together until we aren't anymore._That can involve not being in love anymore, death, or being brought back from the dead to roam the earth as a shambling zombie._I would eat brains with you. I love you that much.
trans-unit.target: 我愿意和你在一起，直到我们不再在一起。_这可能包括不再相爱、死亡，也可能是死而复生，变成一具行尸走肉在人间游荡。我就是这么爱你

trans-unit.source: Oh, hey, cool on you for opening your restaurant. Hope it goes well for you.
trans-unit.target: 哦，嘿，你开餐馆真不错。希望你一切顺利。

trans-unit.source: Who's this Lucius? Eh, I wouldn't give anyone's opinion any weight, even my mother's, and trust me when I say she has A LOT of opinions.
trans-unit.target: 卢修斯是谁？我不会把任何人的意见放在心上 即使是我妈妈 相信我 她有很多意见

trans-unit.source: You have no idea how happy I am to see that bathhouse open!_I have been pining for the day when it would open and I could go for a long soak.
trans-unit.target: 你不知道，看到澡堂开张我有多高兴！_我一直盼着有一天澡堂开张，我就可以去泡个澡了。

trans-unit.source: I had this tourist in here a bit ago who needed stitches for something I can't talk about, and they were saying how good Le Sequoia is._So, you got that going for ya.
trans-unit.target: 前不久，我这里来了一位游客，他因为一些我不能说的事情需要缝针，他们说红杉乐有多好。

trans-unit.source: A tourist couple came in for a twisted ankle from a hike._They were so excited when I said they should visit the bathhouse because it meant they could do tea there too._You've got a bit of a good rep with that place.
trans-unit.target: 一对游客夫妇因登山扭伤了脚踝而前来就诊。_当我说他们应该去澡堂时，他们非常兴奋，因为这意味着他们也可以在那里喝茶。

trans-unit.source: I heard you've been a pretty helpful around town. Thanks! it's nice to see someone trying to change things for the better.
trans-unit.target: 我听说你在城里帮了不少忙。谢谢！很高兴看到有人在努力改变现状。

trans-unit.source: You're still at the whole 'helping everyone' thing?_Wow, I didn't know you have the endurance to keep it going for this long. Way to go there, tiger!
trans-unit.target: 你还在做 “帮助大家 ”这件事？干得好，老虎

trans-unit.source: I heard word from a newsletter writer who needed their finger sewed back on that your menu is great._He said that you have some great frozen desserts. I'll have to check it out.
trans-unit.target: 我听一位需要缝合手指的通讯作者说，你们的菜单很棒。我得去看看。

trans-unit.source: I finally got a chance to eat at your restaurant, and wow it's good! Like, really good! So, way to go on that.
trans-unit.target: 我终于有机会去你的餐厅吃饭了，哇，味道真不错！真的很好吃 干得好

trans-unit.source: A local fisherman who came in with a hook in their cheek said your menu isn't that good._That there were too many vegetarian dishes. After he told me what's on it, I don't think I will visit anytime soon.
trans-unit.target: 一位当地渔民带着鱼钩进来，他说你们的菜单不怎么样，素菜太多了。在他告诉我菜单上有什么之后，我想我很快就不会再来了。

trans-unit.source: I just don't think I'm going to be able to make it to your restaurant while the menu is what it is._But if you had frozen treats . . . well then I might change my mind.
trans-unit.target: 但如果你们有冷冻食品......我可能会改变主意。

trans-unit.source: Hey, you've done some good work around here by not throwing a bunch of garbage around town or the area._Thanks for not making White Ash Harbor into 'Radioactive Fighter 4: Alleys of Death.'
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你没有把白灰港变成《放射性战士 4：死亡巷》。

trans-unit.source: Another fisherman was in here with a broken arm, and he was telling me that the harbor seems cleaner these days than it was 10 years ago._That's nice to hear, isn't it?
trans-unit.target: 另一个渔民的胳膊断了，他告诉我现在的港口比十年前干净多了。

trans-unit.source: It doesn't take a brain surgeon to see that you're creating a lot of garbage with your rapid consumerism business plan.
trans-unit.target: 不需要脑外科医生也能看出，你的快速消费主义商业计划正在制造大量垃圾。

trans-unit.source: I had a fisherman come in with a shattered thumb after he slipped on some debris that had collected in the harbor._Worst he's seen in 10 years, know anything about it? Maybe it has something to do with all the garbage lately.
trans-unit.target: 有位渔民被港口里的垃圾滑倒，导致拇指粉碎性骨折。也许这和最近的垃圾有关。

trans-unit.source: It's gotta be said, Vanx the Skull Collector is everything I wanted it to be. Thanks again for the help.
trans-unit.target: 不得不说，骷髅收集者凡克斯就是我想要的一切。再次感谢你们的帮助。

trans-unit.source: I never knew that Vanx became a skull collector because she was indebt!_I thought it was because she wanted vengeance for for her village. Pilots always have this weirdness to them.
trans-unit.target: 我从来不知道凡克斯成为骷髅收集者是因为她欠债！_我以为是因为她想为她的村庄复仇。飞行员总是有这种怪癖。

trans-unit.source: I finished the entire series and I feel . . . empty._Like, I had this thing that filled my life, but now that the journey of Vanx is done, I feel adrift . . . until I find a new series to fill the void. It's an endless cycle.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个无休止的循环。

trans-unit.source: I cannot believe I get to go to Uni! This is still so odd for me to think about, and the fact that I can let the clinic go for a while is . . . just so strange._But good! Very good! Thank you again for helping me out.
trans-unit.target: 我真不敢相信我能上大学！想到这些，我还是觉得很奇怪，我可以暂时放下诊所的事......实在是太奇怪了！非常好 再次感谢您对我的帮助。

trans-unit.source: I am almost packed up. Walter is getting settled into the clinic._This is becoming more real than the decapitation scene Dead Phenoix Rising.
trans-unit.target: 我差不多收拾好了 沃尔特正在诊所里安顿下来。_这比《死神崛起》中的斩首场景还要真实。

trans-unit.source: It's time, (playername). I'm heading off to Uni . . . I am looking forward to it._Thank you for everything you do here. I don't do well with goodbyes, so this is a see you later.
trans-unit.target: 是时候了，(playername)。我要去大学了. . . 谢谢你在这里所做的一切。我不善于道别，所以再见了。

trans-unit.source: I don't need this right now.
trans-unit.target: 我现在不需要这个。

trans-unit.source: Thanks?
trans-unit.target: 谢谢？

trans-unit.source: It's been a long road, and I still got miles to go, but thanks.
trans-unit.target: 这是一条漫长的路，我还有很长的路要走，但还是要谢谢你。

trans-unit.source: Uhhh, this is my day job.
trans-unit.target: 这是我的日常工作。

trans-unit.source: I've had to find motivation in the oddest places over the years.
trans-unit.target: 这些年来，我不得不在最奇怪的地方寻找动力。

trans-unit.source: . . . fine, can you help me?
trans-unit.target: . .好吧，你能帮我吗？

trans-unit.source: Back off, man!
trans-unit.target: 退后

trans-unit.source: I will use this everyday. For what? That is a secret.
trans-unit.target: 我每天都会用到它。用来做什么？这是个秘密。

trans-unit.source: Yeah! I like this. Better watch out world!
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢这个 我喜欢这个 世界最好小心点

trans-unit.source: I think I can do some serious damage with this. Know what I mean? Thank you (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我想我能用它造成一些严重的伤害。明白我的意思吗？谢谢(playername)。

trans-unit.source: This costed a pretty penny. I can tell. But what am I supposed to do with this?
trans-unit.target: 这花了不少钱。我看得出来 但我该拿它怎么办呢？

trans-unit.source: This is the best birthday present ever! You are awesome (playername). I will cherish this weapon.
trans-unit.target: 这是最好的生日礼物！你太棒了(playername)。我会珍惜这把武器的。

trans-unit.source: That's straight trash.
trans-unit.target: 这简直就是垃圾。

trans-unit.source: This feels a bit weak in my hand.
trans-unit.target: 拿在手上感觉有点无力。

trans-unit.source: How much damage can I do with this? None? Then why are you giving me this?
trans-unit.target: 我能用它造成多大伤害？没有？那你为什么给我这个？

trans-unit.source: I got this from you already. Do you have a horde of them laying around or something to give out to people?
trans-unit.target: 我已经从你那里得到了这个。你是不是有一大堆这样的东西，可以分给别人？

trans-unit.source: Look, can we not?!
trans-unit.target: 听着，我们能不能不要这样？

trans-unit.source: My day is full and I can't get out of the clinic today.
trans-unit.target: 我今天一天都很忙，无法离开诊所。

trans-unit.source: Sells painkillers, antidotes, bandages
trans-unit.target: 出售止痛药、解毒剂和绷带

trans-unit.source: This is the place you can buy pills and thing to stop your bleeding.
trans-unit.target: 在这里您可以买到止血药和止血用品。

trans-unit.source: All of the blood stopping product you could ever want.
trans-unit.target: 你想要的所有止血产品。

trans-unit.source: If you want something, you can get it, please don't ask me for help.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要什么，你可以得到，请不要向我寻求帮助。

trans-unit.source: Use the fewest amount of words possible during your visit please.
trans-unit.target: 请在参观过程中尽量减少用词。

trans-unit.source: Did you consume poison thinking it was mouthwash? We have an antidote for you.
trans-unit.target: 您是否误以为是漱口水而服用了毒药？我们为您准备了解毒剂。

trans-unit.source: That's on sale.
trans-unit.target: 正在打折。

trans-unit.source: I can't even pronounce that one.
trans-unit.target: 我甚至都不会发音。

trans-unit.source: It was sealed when I put it on the shelf.
trans-unit.target: 我把它放在架子上时，它是密封的。

trans-unit.source: My manager might get pissed if I don't buy this.
trans-unit.target: 如果我不买这个，我的经理可能会生气。

trans-unit.source: Huh, and it's legal, right?
trans-unit.target: 是合法的吧？

trans-unit.source: I hope it's sterilized.
trans-unit.target: 我希望它是消毒过的。

trans-unit.source: Ew, no!
trans-unit.target: 不是吧

trans-unit.source: Why would I want to buy that?
trans-unit.target: 我为什么要买这个？

trans-unit.source: No one wants that. No one will ever want it. Get rid of it.
trans-unit.target: 没有人想要这样。没有人会想要它。把它扔掉

trans-unit.source: Last I checked, we live in a Capitalist hellscape, so credits please.
trans-unit.target: 上次我检查时发现，我们生活在资本主义地狱之中，所以请付信用点。

trans-unit.source: You need credits to buy stuff, man.
trans-unit.target: 你需要信用点来买东西，伙计。

trans-unit.source: No. Good intentions won't buy you bandages.
trans-unit.target: 不，善意不会给你买绷带。

trans-unit.source: Hey!_Hey!!!!_Ah . . . glad you are finally awake. You had some nasty injuries, but I managed to fix you up with some Medi-Gel.
trans-unit.target: 嘿_嘿_啊。很高兴你终于醒了。你受了重伤，但我设法用一些Medi-Gel治好了你。

trans-unit.source: Hello there!_Anyone home?_Hello!_Ah it looks like you are ok. You where unconscious for two days. It's a miracle I managed to bring you back.
trans-unit.target: 你好_有人在家吗_你好_啊，看起来你没事。你昏迷了两天。我能把你带回来真是个奇迹。

trans-unit.source: Knock knock. Anyone home?_Ah there we are._A tourist found you broken and bloodied by the edge of town. You were lucky that someone found you!
trans-unit.target: 敲，敲。有人在家吗_啊，我们到了_一位游客在城镇边缘发现你浑身是血。你很幸运，有人找到了你！

trans-unit.source: Hey (playername). Glad you are back among the land of the living. I was half expecting you to turn into a zombie._I may have binged too many Resident Undead movies this week.
trans-unit.target: 嘿(playername)。很高兴你回到了人间。我原本以为你会变成僵尸。我本周可能看了太多《不死族居民》电影。

trans-unit.source: Thank goodness. You are awake (playername). It wasn't easy to fix you up. You had some scary cuts and bone fractures._What in the world were you doing?
trans-unit.target: 谢天谢地。你醒了(playername)。把你治好并不容易。你有一些可怕的伤口和骨折_你到底在干什么？

trans-unit.source: Hey!_Glad you are awake. You seemed to have fainted. Please don't overwork yourself like that in the future.
trans-unit.target: 嘿_很高兴你醒了。你好像晕倒了。以后请不要那样过度劳累。

trans-unit.source: Ah here we are. You seemed to have collapsed from overwork. Please remember to eat and sleep.
trans-unit.target: 啊，我们到了。你似乎因过度劳累而昏倒了。请记得吃饭和睡觉。

trans-unit.source: Oh, you are awake. Is it wrong to say that I enjoyed it more when you were asleep? You looked so peaceful.
trans-unit.target: 哦，你醒了。说你睡着的时候我更喜欢它是不对的？你看起来很平静。

trans-unit.source: Looks like the sleeping beauty is finally awake. Please don't overexert yourself like that anymore (playername). You had me worried.
trans-unit.target: 看起来睡美人终于醒了。请不要再那样过度劳累了。你让我担心。

trans-unit.source: Please don't be mad (playername), but while you were unconscious, I used some makeup to make you look like a zombie._Wanna see a photo I took?_No? Are you sure? Oh . . .
trans-unit.target: 请不要生气(playername)，但当你昏迷时，我用了一些化妆品让你看起来像僵尸。你看到我拍的照片了吗_不？你确定吗？哦。

trans-unit.source: Running a clinic isn't cheap! That will be
trans-unit.target: 经营一家诊所并不便宜！那将是

trans-unit.source: So let's see. The IV bag, plus the Medi-Gel,_and the use of the X-ray machine . . . _ . . . The total cost will be
trans-unit.target: 让我们看看。静脉注射袋，加上Medi-Gel，以及X光机的使用。总成本为

trans-unit.source: Credits will be the cost of this stay.
trans-unit.target: 信用点将承担此次住宿的花销。

trans-unit.source: You don't seem to have enough credits. I'll let it go this time. Please pay whatever you can. It isn't cheap running a clinic.
trans-unit.target: 你似乎没有足够的信用点。这次我就放手。请尽你所能付款。经营一家诊所并不便宜。

trans-unit.source: Bonjour, baby! Your face is new around here, no?_Welcome to White Ash Harbor. If you need a drink, see me at the bar that is named after moi: Bea!_Au revoir pour le moment.
trans-unit.target: 你好，宝贝！你的脸是新的，不是吗_欢迎来到白灰港，如果你需要喝一杯，请在以我名字命名的酒吧见我：Bea_再见了。

trans-unit.source: You will have to excuse me, I have a date with six wonderful children and my husband at the beach. Au revoir.
trans-unit.target: 请原谅，我和六个可爱的孩子以及我的丈夫在海滩上有个约会。再见。

trans-unit.source: Idiot, je jure devant Dieu si je les revois dans la rue, je . . . pardonne-moi, I wasn't talking about you, but someone else who shall remain nameless.
trans-unit.target: 白痴，我向上帝发誓，如果我在街上看到他们，我。。。对不起，我不是在说你，而是有人会无名。

trans-unit.source: Excusez-moi, but if you're going to ask me how I got such massive muscles, all I can say is your body is a reflection on how you've spent your time. Bon chance.
trans-unit.target: 不好意思，但如果你要问我为什么我有这么大的肌肉，我只能说你的身体反映了你是如何度过时间的。好机会。

trans-unit.source: Am I French? Wow, euh, comment dire ca . . . Oui. I thought it was obvious. Haha!
trans-unit.target: 我是法国人吗？哇，呃，评论可怕的ca。是的。我认为这是显而易见的。哈哈！

trans-unit.source: If you are looking for some fun in town, this is the spot! Haha! I am joking!_Go to the Rec Center! It's on the docks. It has weights and equipment and an arcade! Super fun for everyone!
trans-unit.target: 如果你想在城里找点乐子，这就是地方！哈哈！我在开玩笑_去康复中心！它在码头上。它有重量和设备，还有一个街机！超级有趣的为大家！

trans-unit.source: Since you're here, I have a question, what is your favorite drink to have on a rainy day?_Moi, I love a nice hot toddy.
trans-unit.target: 既然你在这里，我有一个问题，下雨天你最喜欢喝什么_莫伊，我喜欢热腾腾的土豆。

trans-unit.source: Hot cocoa with marshmallows.
trans-unit.target: 热可可配棉花糖。

trans-unit.source: Brandy, warms my soul.
trans-unit.target: 白兰地，温暖我的灵魂。

trans-unit.source: Ah, a classic, no? Problem with those is finding the proper chocolate mix. Those powder bags are merde.
trans-unit.target: 啊，经典，不是吗？问题在于找到合适的巧克力混合物。那些粉袋是商品。

trans-unit.source: Brandy? Huh, didn't take you as an 87 year-old war veteran, but if this job has taught me one thing it's that people are full of surprises.
trans-unit.target: 白兰地？嗯，我没有把你当作87岁的退伍军人，但如果说这份工作教会了我一件事，那就是人们总是充满惊喜。

trans-unit.source: Why do I tend bar with six kids at home? Because I like to live dangerously, and in this context, that means living with as little sleep as possible. Ha!
trans-unit.target: 为什么我家里有六个孩子，我要去酒吧？因为我喜欢危险地生活，在这种情况下，这意味着尽可能少地睡觉。哈！

trans-unit.source: Contrairement to popular stereotypes, not all bartenders are alcoholics._It would be bad for business if I was one. I just love partying and being in the vibe.
trans-unit.target: 与流行的刻板印象相反，并非所有调酒师都是酗酒者_如果我是其中之一，那对生意就不好了。我只是喜欢聚会和置身其中。

trans-unit.source: With my tricepts, built from rocking six children to sleep and going to the gym, I can flip and spin not only the small bottles but the massive jugs as well._Kegs? Tu ferais mieux d'y croire.
trans-unit.target: 有了我的三头肌，从摇晃六个孩子到睡觉再到去健身房，我不仅可以翻转和旋转小瓶子，还可以旋转大罐子_凯格？这是我的宝贝。

trans-unit.source: I never wake up in the AM. That's Aime's time since I work nights. Never liked seeing the sun rise. Watching it set? C'est merveilleux.
trans-unit.target: 我从不在早上醒来。那是艾米的时间，因为我晚上工作。我从来不喜欢看日出。看着它设置？这是merveilleux。

trans-unit.source: I hope one day that old bathhouse opens up. I don't know what it would be like, but I imagine it is beau inside.
trans-unit.target: 我希望有一天那家旧澡堂能重新开张。我不知道那会是什么样子，但我想里面很美。

trans-unit.source: Your opinion, I need it. What would you say is fair?_Having the ability to go to the gym for a moment of alone time._Or working out at home so you don't need to hire a sitter for six children?
trans-unit.target: 你的意见，我需要它。你认为什么是公平的_有能力去健身房独处一会儿_或者在家锻炼，这样你就不需要为六个孩子雇保姆了？

trans-unit.source: Going to the gym, gotta get that center in your day.
trans-unit.target: 去健身房，每天都要去那个中心。

trans-unit.source: Home. The kids might have fun while you're working out?
trans-unit.target: 回家。你锻炼的时候，孩子们可能会玩得很开心吗？

trans-unit.source: That's my position. I need time away from the job, away from the kids, hell, away from Aime so I can just exist._That isn't being selfish, that's caring for myself! Merci!
trans-unit.target: 那是我的立场。我需要时间远离工作，远离孩子，地狱，远离艾米，这样我才能生存_这不是自私，这是在照顾自己！谢谢！

trans-unit.source: Spoken like a human who has no children! Sure, it is fun for them for a moment, but then they get bored._'Maman, I want a cookie!' 'Maman, play with us, this is boring!' Boom, no more workout, and your butt explodes in size.
trans-unit.target: 说话像一个没有孩子的人！当然，这对他们来说很有趣，但后来他们会感到无聊妈妈，我想要一块饼干！”妈妈，跟我们玩吧，这太无聊了！”砰的一声，不再锻炼，你的屁股就会爆炸。

trans-unit.source: You should take my advice, and find yourself some time away from The Sequoia. Grab a drink, do some dancing, party a little? It can't hurt.
trans-unit.target: 你应该听从我的建议，找点时间远离红杉。喝点什么，跳点舞，开个小派对？不会痛的。

trans-unit.source: Wow, would you look at this weather? It rains more often than not, makes the rooftop bar feel that much more special when the sun comes out.
trans-unit.target: 哇，你能看看这种天气吗？经常下雨，让屋顶酒吧在太阳出来时感觉更特别。

trans-unit.source: I am very tired today. I'm going to catch a nap, somewhere.
trans-unit.target: 我今天很累。我要去某个地方小睡一会儿。

trans-unit.source: Every day is a fight for someone else, it is why I choose to be kind to others . . . unless they owe me money, then I am not so kind.
trans-unit.target: 每一天都是为别人而战，这就是为什么我选择对别人友善。除非他们欠我钱，否则我就没那么好。

trans-unit.source: If you haven't yet, check out Uriel's shop Chop for the best meats._Unless you want some wild meat, then go to Pomarine. She will set you up right. This I promise.
trans-unit.target: 如果你还没有，去Uriel的Chop商店看看最好的肉_除非你想吃些野肉，否则就去番茄吧。她会给你安排好的。我保证。

trans-unit.source: (playername), bonne journee, I have burnt both ends of my candle as of late. Will you do me a favor?_Bring me some coffee, I will need it with my scotch.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，亲爱的，我最近把蜡烛两头都烧了。你能帮我一个忙吗_给我拿些咖啡来，我需要它和我的苏格兰威士忌一起喝。

trans-unit.source: Uppers and downers all at once? You doing okay, Bea?
trans-unit.target: 上升和下降同时发生？你还好吗，Bea？

trans-unit.source: I thought bartenders being alcoholics was an seterotype?
trans-unit.target: 我以为酒保酗酒是一种刻板印象？

trans-unit.source: What I am doing is surviving, mon ami. Jessica is getting her toddler molars in, while Lyam is having a wonder week during the bar's annual inspection from the county._To say I am tired and stressed would not do justice to my current situation.
trans-unit.target: 我所做的就是生存，我的朋友。杰西卡正在把蹒跚学步的臼齿插进去，而莱姆在县酒吧的年度检查中度过了一个奇迹般的一周_说我累了，压力很大，这不符合我目前的处境。

trans-unit.source: It is only a stereotype when I need it to be! When it serves my purpose! Comprendre?!_Sorry, it's been a long week on top of a long night. Please, the coffee.
trans-unit.target: 只有在我需要的时候，这才是一种刻板印象！当它达到我的目的时！压缩_抱歉，在漫漫长夜的基础上，又度过了漫长的一周。请，咖啡。

trans-unit.source: Being pushed to your brink is what parents do day in and out, mon ami._It's part of the job, even if that job wasn't the one you really wanted.
trans-unit.target: 被推到你的边缘是父母日复一日所做的，我的朋友_这是工作的一部分，即使这份工作不是你真正想要的。

trans-unit.source: I love my life Aim� and the kids, but we didn't actually want kids when we started having them._It was an accident that made us think, 'Hey, this could be fun.'_It is, but sometimes I get funned out, vous connaissez?
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢我的生活目标和孩子们，但当我们开始生孩子的时候，我们其实并不想要孩子_这是一场意外，让我们想，‘嘿，这可能很有趣。’_确实如此，但有时我会被逗乐，你觉得呢？

trans-unit.source: I hit the gym today and I am back to feeling good as new, baby! I feel like I can take on a tour bus full of thirsty patrons! Apportez le jour!
trans-unit.target: 我今天去健身房了，感觉像新的一样好，宝贝！我觉得我可以乘坐一辆满载口渴顾客的旅游巴士！欢迎光临！

trans-unit.source: You should come around some time and see the kids and Aime. They'd love to meet you and I think you'll enjoy the wild bunch too.
trans-unit.target: 你应该找个时间过来看看孩子们和艾米。他们很想见你，我想你也会喜欢这群狂野的人。

trans-unit.source: I have been a bartender for a very long time. I hear many things, but one of the most bizarre are the. . . comment dit-on, hauntings in the woods._Multiple people have said they have heard things out there. Makes one think a bit, no?
trans-unit.target: 我当酒保很久了。我听到很多事情，但最奇怪的是。评论：《林中的幽灵》_许多人说他们听到了外面的事情。让人想一想，不是吗？

trans-unit.source: Bon chance, is what my mother said to me when I started having children._'Bon chance' feels like rather useless advice. What do you think?
trans-unit.target: 当我开始有孩子的时候，我妈妈对我说，祝你好运“好机会”感觉像是无用的建议。你怎么认为？

trans-unit.source: I think it's a rather hollow piece of advice.
trans-unit.target: 我认为这是一条相当空洞的建议。

trans-unit.source: I don't have kids, but they seem like work.
trans-unit.target: 我没有孩子，但他们看起来像工作。

trans-unit.source: It is hollow, this I know for sure.
trans-unit.target: 这是空洞的，我对此深信不疑。

trans-unit.source: It is, mon ami, it is, but I do not blame them. They did nothing wrong and wouldn't exist without my choices being involved . . . but I am very tired.
trans-unit.target: 是的，我的朋友，是的，但我不怪他们。他们没有做错任何事，如果没有我的选择，他们就不会存在。但我很累。

trans-unit.source: You must understand something, (playername)._I am a woman who wanted the world at her feet, but before I could take off, I was grounded by love._I dunno if it was the best exchange looking back on it.
trans-unit.target: 你必须明白一些事情，(playername)_我是一个想要世界在她脚下的女人，但在我起飞之前，我被爱所束缚_回想起来，我不知道这是否是最好的交换。

trans-unit.source: I was watching the latest body building championship on TV the other day._Mon Dieu, these days the lifters look more like luggage than people with how much bronzer they use!
trans-unit.target: 前几天我在电视上看最新的健美锦标赛_天哪，这些天举重运动员看起来更像是行李，而不是他们用了多少古铜色化妆品的人！

trans-unit.source: I do not want my days to be filled with regrets._I try to live my life by the choices I have made when I was younger, but myself, today, finds that idea of a regretless life to be a lie._Regret is natural, but its merely a matter of not stewing in it.
trans-unit.target: 我不想让我的日子充满遗憾_我试着按照年轻时所做的选择来生活，但今天我自己发现，无悔生活的想法是一个谎言_后悔是自然的，但这只是一个不沉溺其中的问题。

trans-unit.source: I was at the beach with my children, and les enfants they found a big rusty key._I wonder if it was for a pirate ship or something? Imagine finding treasure! So exciting!
trans-unit.target: 我和孩子们在海滩上，孩子们发现了一把生锈的大钥匙_我想知道这是为了海盗船还是别的什么？想象一下找到宝藏！太激动人心了！

trans-unit.source: There is much that has happened here in White Ash Harbor and will continue to do so long after we are gone._Hopefully we do something crazy to get added the myths! If we could only be so lucky.
trans-unit.target: 白灰港发生了很多事情，在我们离开后很长一段时间内都会继续发生_希望我们做一些疯狂的事情来添加神话！要是我们能这么幸运就好了。

trans-unit.source: What is your favorite kind of drink to start your day?_This answer will tell me much about you. Go ahead.
trans-unit.target: 你最喜欢哪种饮料来开始新的一天_这个答案会告诉我很多关于你的事。前进。

trans-unit.source: Coffee.
trans-unit.target: 咖啡。

trans-unit.source: Tea.
trans-unit.target: 茶。

trans-unit.source: Bold, a shot of energy. Perhaps that is why you have been able to accomplish so much, mon amour.
trans-unit.target: 大胆，充满活力。也许这就是为什么你能取得如此大的成就，我的爱人。

trans-unit.source: Quaint, a calmness in the morning It must keep you steady under pressure, mon amour.
trans-unit.target: 平淡，清晨的宁静它必须让你在压力下保持稳定，亲爱的。

trans-unit.source: I love learning about my partner. It is what gives me joy._Perhaps the challenge will start once we've learned everything about one another, no?_Perhaps that day will never come. Who knows?
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢了解我的伴侣。这就是给我快乐的东西_也许一旦我们了解了彼此的一切，挑战就会开始，不是吗_也许那一天永远不会到来。谁知道呢？

trans-unit.source: I was meeting with my agent and I learned that my schedule will be rather. . . hectic._We are both professionals, I believe that we will be okay, at least I hope so.
trans-unit.target: 我正在和我的经纪人会面，我了解到我的日程安排将相当。忙碌_我们都是专业人士，我相信我们会没事的，至少我希望如此。

trans-unit.source: I am having the kids over for a few days, would you like to hang out for dinner sometime? Stop on in and witness the madness and the love, haha!
trans-unit.target: 我要带孩子们过来几天，你想找个时间出去吃晚饭吗？停下来，见证疯狂和爱，哈哈！

trans-unit.source: I hope Aime is okay. He can be very dramatic, but he's not a bad person._I wish him only the best and hope he finds someone for himself. Now, I am going to hug you tight!
trans-unit.target: 我希望艾米没事。他可能很戏剧化，但他不是一个坏人_我只希望他一切顺利，希望他能找到一个属于自己的人。现在，我要紧紧地拥抱你！

trans-unit.source: Je t'aimerai chaque jour o� nous serons ensemble. Pour toujours.
trans-unit.target: 我们在一起的每一天我都会爱你。永远。

trans-unit.source: 117_BEA_PROGRESSION
trans-unit.target: 117_收益_进展

trans-unit.source: Felicitations mon ami! Look at Le Sequoia! It is brilliant and so are you!
trans-unit.target: 恭喜我的朋友！看看红杉！太棒了，你也是！

trans-unit.source: I have dealt with my fair share of annoying people, mon ami, and let me tell you, give them nothing for they are nothing!
trans-unit.target: 亲爱的，我已经处理过不少烦人的人了，让我告诉你，不要给他们任何东西，因为他们什么都不是！

trans-unit.source: Je ne peux pas attendre pour aller! I hear about the bathhouse and my muscles screamed in joy! Aime and I cannot wait to go for a dip sometime.
trans-unit.target: 我等不及要走了！我听到浴室和我的肌肉高兴地尖叫！爱，我不能等着去浸泡。

trans-unit.source: A lot of the patrons at my bar talk about Le Sequoia. You are gaining quite the reputation, no?
trans-unit.target: 我酒吧里的很多顾客都在谈论红杉。你的名声越来越高了，不是吗？

trans-unit.source: Your teahouse is being seen as a une jolie petite chose that lives inside of the bathhouse. It gives warmth to the place that is already warm, haha!
trans-unit.target: 你的茶馆被视为一个住在澡堂里的小女孩。它给已经温暖的地方带来了温暖，哈哈！

trans-unit.source: Continuez votre bon travail!
trans-unit.target: 继续做好工作！

trans-unit.source: Vous aidez les autres. C'est ce que j'adore. I hope you continue doing good around town!
trans-unit.target: 你在帮助别人。这就是我喜欢的。我希望你继续在镇上做好事！

trans-unit.source: Your menu, it should challenge the patron! I believe yours does this well._And those drinks! I think I might have some competition!
trans-unit.target: 你的菜单，应该挑战顾客！我相信你的做得很好_还有那些饮料！我想我可能会有一些竞争！

trans-unit.source: Your food is lovely, mon ami. The menu, do not change it._I love the beverages you serve. And that's saying something, coming from me!
trans-unit.target: 你的食物很好吃，我的朋友。菜单，不要改变。我喜欢你们提供的饮料。这是在说什么，来自我！

trans-unit.source: Ah, your menu, I wouldn't say it is good because it leaves a lot to be desired._Seafood? Bleh. I have to smell it from my shop every day.
trans-unit.target: 啊，你的菜单，我不会说它好，因为它还有很多地方需要改进_海鲜？布莱。我每天都要在商店里闻它。

trans-unit.source: No, no, no, I do not wish to dine with your menu being in its current state._On the other hand, if you had some tasty cocktails fit for a gal like me, well hun I might just drop by.
trans-unit.target: 不，不，不。我不想在你的菜单处于当前状态的情况下用餐_另一方面，如果你有一些适合我这样的女孩的美味鸡尾酒，嗯，我可能会顺便来看看。

trans-unit.source: My children can play on the beach and not find much trash. For this I am grateful because it means that they have a future.
trans-unit.target: 我的孩子们可以在海滩上玩耍，不会发现太多垃圾。为此，我很感激，因为这意味着他们有未来。

trans-unit.source: Seeing that the town is not buried in garbage, I have you to thank for this, because I have seen your work expand but the trash has not. Good job.
trans-unit.target: 看到这个城镇没有被垃圾掩埋，我要感谢你，因为我看到你的工作扩大了，但垃圾没有。干得好。

trans-unit.source: Comment oses-tu faire ca a notre ville, espece d'humain pourri!
trans-unit.target: 你怎么敢这样对我们的城市，你这个腐烂的人！

trans-unit.source: Vous d�truisez notre ville pour quoi? Credits? Vous nous condamnez tous avec vos choix!
trans-unit.target: 你操纵我们的城市是为了什么？信用点？你用你的选择谴责我们所有人！

trans-unit.source: Thank you again, mon ami for your assistance the other night. I wouldn't have been able to do it without you!
trans-unit.target: 再次感谢你，我的朋友，那天晚上你的帮助。没有你，我就做不到！

trans-unit.source: I really should hire some part-timers to cover for when I have a mass sickness like that happen!
trans-unit.target: 我真的应该雇佣一些兼职人员来应对我发生那样的大规模疾病！

trans-unit.source: There are days I feel like I live behind this bar, (playername). I wish . . . no, no. I am fine.
trans-unit.target: 有些日子我觉得我住在这个酒吧后面(playername)。我希望。不，不，我很好。

trans-unit.source: The children have been . . . quieter as of late. I do hope they come to understand one day that this is for the best.
trans-unit.target: 孩子们已经。最近更安静了。我希望有一天他们能明白这是最好的。

trans-unit.source: I do not know if what I've done has been the best for everyone involved, but for me, it has been helpful._I love my children, and I hope Aime will be okay, but I am excited for my future.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道我所做的是否对所有参与者都是最好的，但对我来说，这是有帮助的_我爱我的孩子，我希望艾梅会没事，但我对我的未来感到兴奋。

trans-unit.source: The meetings have been . . . how do you say, rampant! Unrelenting! It will be worth it once we start shooting!
trans-unit.target: 会议已经。你怎么说，猖獗！无情！一旦我们开始拍摄，这将是值得的！

trans-unit.source: 117_BEA_INTERACT
I am quite the look, no?
trans-unit.target: 我很好看，不是吗？

trans-unit.source: These are work clothes, but I keep them pressed.
trans-unit.target: 这些是工作服，但我一直熨着。

trans-unit.source: It is more like putty these days.
trans-unit.target: 这些天它更像是油灰。

trans-unit.source: If I'm not passionate about my work, then what I am doing?
trans-unit.target: 如果我对工作没有热情，那么我在做什么？

trans-unit.source: Bottle flipping, while challenging to learn, isn't rocket science. Merci quand m�me.
trans-unit.target: 翻瓶虽然很难学习，但并不是什么高深莫测的科学。谢谢你。

trans-unit.source: Oui, thank you.
trans-unit.target: 是的，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: No, I got this.
trans-unit.target: 不，我明白了。

trans-unit.source: This is a fine ingredient (playername). I'm getting excited thinking of all the possibilities!
trans-unit.target: 这是一种很好的配料。想到所有的可能性，我都很兴奋！

trans-unit.source: Perfect (playername). This could be great in a cocktail.
trans-unit.target: 完美(playername)。这在鸡尾酒中可能很棒。

trans-unit.source: It smells great. This has a lot of potential. It really does.
trans-unit.target: 闻起来很香。这有很大的潜力。确实如此。

trans-unit.source: Valuable, yet ineffective. Perhaps something I can use next time?
trans-unit.target: 有价值，但无效。也许下次我可以用点什么？

trans-unit.source: Oui, oui! Thank you for thinking of me (playername)! You've made my day just a little bit brighter.
trans-unit.target: 是的，是的！谢谢你想我(playername)！你让我的一天变得明亮了一点。

trans-unit.source: Eh, I don't need it.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，我不需要它。

trans-unit.source: Ehh, perhaps something I can use next time?
trans-unit.target: 嗯，也许下次我可以用点什么？

trans-unit.source: I have everything I need in my kids, my husband, and my bar. I have no need for such trifles.
trans-unit.target: 我的孩子、丈夫和酒吧都有我需要的一切。我不需要这些琐事。

trans-unit.source: Yes, yes, I got something from you already.
trans-unit.target: 是的，是的，我已经从你那里得到了一些东西。

trans-unit.source: I won't squeeze too hard, for I might break you.
trans-unit.target: 我不会挤得太紧，因为我可能会把你摔坏。

trans-unit.source: I am exhausted. No thank you.
trans-unit.target: 我累坏了。不用了，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Sells alcohol, cocktails, wines
trans-unit.target: 销售酒类、鸡尾酒、葡萄酒

trans-unit.source: If you think I look good, get ready for the drinks I serve.
trans-unit.target: 如果你觉得我看起来不错，准备好我提供的饮料。

trans-unit.source: Vous ne trouverez rien de mieux, promis.
trans-unit.target: 你不会找到更好的，我保证。

trans-unit.source: I can make cocktails, pour beer, whatever you need is here, mon ami.
trans-unit.target: 我可以调制鸡尾酒，倒啤酒，你需要的都在这里，我的朋友。

trans-unit.source: I have non-alcholics too both beers and mocktails are yours to have today!
trans-unit.target: 我也有非酒精饮料，啤酒和无酒精鸡尾酒都是你今天要吃的！

trans-unit.source: Come, share some spirits with the rest of the flock!
trans-unit.target: 来吧，和其他羊群分享一些精神！

trans-unit.source: Une delicieuse boisson.
trans-unit.target: 美味的饮料。

trans-unit.source: That's a new recipe for me, but it's good.
trans-unit.target: 这对我来说是个新食谱，但很好吃。

trans-unit.source: A classic drink.
trans-unit.target: 经典饮料。

trans-unit.source: Oh, I must have this for my clientle.
trans-unit.target: 哦，我必须为我的客户买这个。

trans-unit.source: A fine bottle that I will use daily.
trans-unit.target: 一个我每天都会用的好瓶子。

trans-unit.source: I've never heard of this before! Where did.. nevermind, I must have it.
trans-unit.target: 我以前从没听说过这个！哪里。。没关系，我必须拥有它。

trans-unit.source: C'est des ordures.
trans-unit.target: 这是垃圾。

trans-unit.source: No.
trans-unit.target: 不。

trans-unit.source: Never.
trans-unit.target: 从未。

trans-unit.source: You must have credits to buy here, mon ami.
trans-unit.target: 你必须有信用点才能在这里买东西，我的朋友。

trans-unit.source: I cannot loan out credits, how will I feed my family?
trans-unit.target: 我不能借出信用点，我怎么养家糊口？

trans-unit.source: I wish you luck in finding money.
trans-unit.target: 我祝你好运找到钱。

trans-unit.source: 118_AYLIN
Greetings, (playername). Everything goes well with the Teahouse I presume?_If you need anything, please let me know.
trans-unit.target: 问候，(playername)。我想茶馆一切顺利吧_如果你需要什么，请告诉我。

trans-unit.source: My bathhouse is my life. That is why I don't partner with just anyone and why, even now, I am a little weary of you. Please don't make me regret this decision.
trans-unit.target: 我的浴室就是我的生命。这就是为什么我不与任何人合作，为什么即使现在，我也有点厌倦你。请不要让我后悔这个决定。

trans-unit.source: You must be mistaken, just because I am alone, doesn't mean that I am in need of friendship.
trans-unit.target: 你一定搞错了，我一个人并不意味着我需要友谊。

trans-unit.source: Few people find themselves in the position I am making for myself: A second act. It is early on, but I believe that something will come from this effort.
trans-unit.target: 很少有人发现自己处于我为自己创造的位置：第二幕。现在还为时过早，但我相信这项努力会有所收获。

trans-unit.source: Very few understand that a community requires a gathering place. Otherwise, people stop growing, and so does the community._It was my family's duty, and now my duty to provide this important service.
trans-unit.target: 很少有人知道一个社区需要一个聚会场所。否则，人们就会停止成长，社区也是如此_这是我家人的责任，现在我有责任提供这项重要的服务。

trans-unit.source: My bathhouse is. . . was the jewel of this town. I hope it will glow as bright as it once did.
trans-unit.target: 我的澡堂是。是这座城市的瑰宝。我希望它能像以前一样闪闪发光。

trans-unit.source: Are you here simply because Vincent asked you to be here or is there something else driving you?
trans-unit.target: 你来这里只是因为文森特让你来这里，还是有别的什么东西在开车送你？

trans-unit.source: Originally, yes, but my feelings have changed.
trans-unit.target: 起初，是的，但我的感觉已经改变了。

trans-unit.source: This place always stirred my curiosity.
trans-unit.target: 这个地方总是激起我的好奇心。

trans-unit.source: I figured that was the case, but I wanted confirmation. It isn't shameful to take on a job for the sake of it._Not everything has to be a passion project.
trans-unit.target: 我想是这样的，但我想确认一下。为了工作而接受工作并不可耻。并非所有事情都必须是充满激情的项目。

trans-unit.source: The Peony Bathhouse has something to it that casts a spell on most who see it. It's why I am so protective of it.
trans-unit.target: 牡丹浴室里有一种东西，能让大多数看到它的人着迷。这就是为什么我如此保护它。

trans-unit.source: You might think it odd to find the bathhouse in such disrepair seeing as I hold it in such regard._But you must understand that my . . . my shell, didn't allow me to do a lot of the physical labor needed to keep it running.
trans-unit.target: 鉴于我对澡堂的看法，你可能会觉得它年久失修很奇怪_但你必须明白，我的。我的外壳，不允许我做很多体力劳动来保持它的运行。

trans-unit.source: Did you know? Recent androids like me have a protective membrane against any moisture. It's why I can stand to be in the bathhouse all the time.
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗？最近像我这样的机器人有一层保护膜，可以抵御任何水分。这就是为什么我可以一直站在澡堂里。
