trans-unit.source: Looking out at White Ash Harbor, I am reminded that even though life is hard, it is worth living because we only have one chance at it.
trans-unit.target: 望着白灰港，我想起，尽管生活很艰难，但值得活下去，因为我们只有一次机会。

trans-unit.source: Hate cuts both ways. For the people who perpetuate it, it changes their soul for the worse. For the people it's aimed at, it reduces them to a sub-human status._It is why letting go of it is a must if we're going to get anywhere as a community.
trans-unit.target: 仇恨是双向的。对于那些使它永久化的人来说，它使他们的灵魂变得更糟。对于它所针对的人来说，它将他们降低到亚人类的地位_这就是为什么如果我们想作为一个社区取得任何进展，就必须放手。

trans-unit.source: I am curious about how much the town has changed. It's been so long since I've walked its paths. I wonder if that fisherman is still around?_What was his name? Dowie? Bowie. Yes, he was always a fun person to chat with.
trans-unit.target: 我很好奇这个城镇发生了多大的变化。我已经很久没有走过它的路了。我想知道那个渔夫是否还在附近_他叫什么名字？Dowie？鲍伊。是的，和他聊天总是很有趣。

trans-unit.source: Since the bathhouse is both my business and my home, I display my most prized pieces of art inside for everyone to enjoy._They are one of a kind pieces to remind myself that I am one of a kind.
trans-unit.target: 由于澡堂既是我的生意，也是我的家，我在里面展示了我最珍贵的艺术品，供大家欣赏_它们是独一无二的作品，提醒自己我是独一无二的。

trans-unit.source: You're saying you're not off an assembly line?
trans-unit.target: 你是说你没有离开装配线？

trans-unit.source: Where did you get these from? They look, old.
trans-unit.target: 你从哪里弄来的？他们看起来，老。

trans-unit.source: It's a story I am not telling yet.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个我还没有讲的故事。

trans-unit.source: I have my contacts who purchased the pieces for me on my behalf in Billboard City. They are originals and were made . . . quite some time ago.
trans-unit.target: 我的联系人代表我在Billboard City购买了这些作品。它们是原创的，并且是。很久以前。

trans-unit.source: Time plays such funny tricks with our minds, doesn't it? Everything you think happened five years ago was really ten and ten was really twenty.
trans-unit.target: 时间在我们的头脑中玩着如此有趣的把戏，不是吗？你认为五年前发生的一切实际上都是十，十实际上是二十。

trans-unit.source: Thank you once again for all of the work you've done around the bathhouse. It's refreshing to see it shine once more.
trans-unit.target: 再次感谢您在澡堂周围所做的一切工作。看到它再次发光，真是令人耳目一新。

trans-unit.source: You will have to excuse me, I am rather tired today, so much to do before we open again.
trans-unit.target: 请原谅，我今天很累，在我们再次开门之前有很多事情要做。

trans-unit.source: I believe we have everything in place._Even if we don't, we shouldn't hold back and wait for the perfect day because those days don't show up from nothing, you make them.
trans-unit.target: 我相信我们一切就绪_即使我们没有，我们也不应该退缩，等待完美的一天，因为那些日子不是凭空出现的，而是你创造的。

trans-unit.source: Where will I go around town? I don't know. So much has changed that I really will be a tourist in my home town._It's rather exciting to have that possibility once again.
trans-unit.target: 我在城里要去哪里？我不知道。变化太大了，我真的会成为家乡的游客_再次有这种可能性真是太令人兴奋了。

trans-unit.source: What is something that brings you joy in Le Sequoia, (playername)?
trans-unit.target: 在《红杉》中，什么能给你带来快乐？

trans-unit.source: I love my staff and the atmosphere of my restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢我的员工和餐厅的氛围。

trans-unit.source: The challenge of creating new dishes.
trans-unit.target: 创造新菜肴的挑战。

trans-unit.source: Being surrounded by the right people can make for a joyful experience, it is true.
trans-unit.target: 被合适的人包围可以带来快乐的体验，这是真的。

trans-unit.source: Knowing what you do best and being able to express that skill everyday would bring a smile to my face as well.
trans-unit.target: 知道你最擅长什么，并且能够每天表达这种技能，也会让我脸上露出笑容。

trans-unit.source: Hearing the chatter of my neighbors and folks from far off places inside my bathhouse has brought me a calm I haven't felt in a long time.
trans-unit.target: 在澡堂里，听到邻居和远方的人们的喋喋不休，让我平静了很久。

trans-unit.source: Art is an expression that few can grasp well. It's why I only display the finest pieces I can find._The name of who painted what doesn't matter to me. What it makes me feel is all that matters.
trans-unit.target: 艺术是一种很少有人能掌握的表达方式。这就是为什么我只展示我能找到的最好的作品_谁画了什么对我来说并不重要。它让我感觉到的才是最重要的。

trans-unit.source: You will never find peace if you are constantly pulling the past along with you. Peace is a clean break from previous actions._It can hurt, but I am reminded today that it is worth it.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不断地回忆过去，你永远不会找到平静。和平是与以往行动的彻底决裂_这可能会带来伤害，但今天我意识到这是值得的。

trans-unit.source: Remember the most important thing in life is a towel with a thread count over 500. Except nothing else.
trans-unit.target: 记住，生活中最重要的事情是一条线数超过500的毛巾。除了别的什么。

trans-unit.source: Nadjet is someone I hold dear. She is the closest I have to family, but she's also my employee._It's a complicated relationship, but I hope I have struck a balance between us that is based on mutual respect.
trans-unit.target: Nadjet是我所珍视的人。她是我最亲近的家人，但她也是我的员工_这是一种复杂的关系，但我希望我们之间能在相互尊重的基础上取得平衡。

trans-unit.source: Tell me, (playername), where do you stand on flowers?
trans-unit.target: 告诉我，(playername)，你站在花的哪里？

trans-unit.source: I don't, I would never stand on flowers. What a waste.
trans-unit.target: 我不会，我永远不会站在花上。真是浪费。

trans-unit.source: I think they are vital and should be treated with respect for the place they serve in nature.
trans-unit.target: 我认为它们至关重要，应该尊重它们在自然界中的作用。

trans-unit.source: You are quite the joker, aren't you, (playername)? Haha. Very good.
trans-unit.target: 你真是个爱开玩笑的人，不是吗？哈哈。很好。

trans-unit.source: They are very vital, indeed. I revere these small, seemingly fragile creations because they are resilient and beautiful. They give much to the world.
trans-unit.target: 它们确实非常重要。我敬仰这些看似脆弱的小作品，因为它们坚韧而美丽。他们给了世界很多。

trans-unit.source: I have this memory, perhaps it was a dream? In it, I am a child walking around my family home and find my father working in the garage._He handed me a hammer and that's all I can remember. Memory or dream, I cherish it.
trans-unit.target: 我有这样的记忆，也许是一场梦？在这本书中，我是一个在家里走来走去的孩子，发现我的父亲在车库里工作_他递给我一把锤子，我只记得这些。记忆或梦想，我珍惜它。

trans-unit.source: Each of our days that pass us by is a day that will never return and most people will never cherish it because they are caught by time and their position in life._I know I speak from a position of privilege in that neither encroach upon my life.
trans-unit.target: 我们度过的每一天都是一个永远不会回来的日子，大多数人永远不会珍惜它，因为他们被时间和他们在生活中的地位所束缚_我知道我说话是出于特权，因为这两者都没有侵犯我的生活。

trans-unit.source: My hope is that I will better the world around me rather than destroy it._Those who wish to melt down the hills for the sake of profit do not understand the world they live in for they think it is only for themselves.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我能让周围的世界变得更好，而不是毁灭它。那些为了利润而想熔化山丘的人不了解他们生活的世界，因为他们认为这只是为了他们自己。

trans-unit.source: I truly believe we need to hoist those who are of good character into leadership roles._If we don't give good models to base ourselves off of then I fear that the rot of society will grow ever deeper with each huckster in the spotlight.
trans-unit.target: 我真的认为，我们需要提拔那些品行良好的人担任领导职务_如果我们不给自己树立好的榜样，那么我担心随着每个小贩成为人们关注的焦点，社会的腐败会越来越深。

trans-unit.source: I plan on venturing to your restaurant for an actual night out very soon now that I am not needed here every single day._If your restaurant is anything like the teahouse, then I believe I will be in for a grand time.
trans-unit.target: 我计划很快去你的餐厅度过一个真正的夜晚，因为我不是每天都需要来这里_如果你的餐厅有点像茶馆，那么我相信我会在这里度过一段美好的时光。

trans-unit.source: Most of my life in this shell has been waiting for my life to start._Now that it's going, after all this time, I'm glad it's started with you.
trans-unit.target: 我在这个壳里的大部分时间都在等待我的生活开始_经过这么长时间，事情已经开始了，我很高兴它是从你开始的。

trans-unit.source: Aylin, you'll never have to wait again.
trans-unit.target: 艾林，你再也不用等了。

trans-unit.source: Same.
trans-unit.target: 一样。

trans-unit.source: I don't plan on it. I watched life grow and change outside of my window for too long._Now I want to be the one in the frame with you by my side.
trans-unit.target: 我没有计划。我看着生活在窗外成长和变化太久了_现在，我想成为画面中的那个人，有你在我身边。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of our age gap at least we are on the same page in this relationship.
trans-unit.target: 不管我们的年龄差距有多大，至少我们在这段关系中意见一致。

trans-unit.source: Where should we go? What should we see? It's been a very long time since I've walked around Billboard City._I wonder if it's improved or slid further into squalor? Regardless, a trip somewhere would be nice.
trans-unit.target: 我们该去哪里？我们应该看什么？我已经很久没有在Billboard City漫步了_我想知道它是有所改善还是进一步陷入肮脏？不管怎样，去某个地方旅行会很好。

trans-unit.source: There is still a lot to do here in White Ash Harbor, but we must find time for ourselves, otherwise we will crumble._Work must not be the center of us. It will not hold if that's the case.
trans-unit.target: 白灰港还有很多事情要做，但我们必须为自己找时间，否则我们会崩溃的_工作不能成为我们的中心。如果是这样的话，它就不会成立。

trans-unit.source: I love my bathhouse and you, I cannot ever choose between my two loves, and I hope I never have to.
trans-unit.target: 我爱我的澡堂和你，我永远不能在我的两种爱之间做出选择，我希望我永远不必这样做。

trans-unit.source: If losing my human body meant that I got to meet you today, then it was a worthwhile exchange._Being alive as long as I have been and finding anything like us just felt more and more impossible with each passing year.
trans-unit.target: 如果失去我的身体意味着我今天能见到你，那么这是一次值得的交换_我活了这么久，发现像我们这样的东西，年复一年，感觉越来越不可能。

trans-unit.source: I am grateful for my time with you. I am grateful for my life here._Since I entered this shell, I thought I would stand alone in the shadows of life until the Earth stopped spinning._I don't feel that way anymore because of you.
trans-unit.target: 我很感激和你在一起的时间。我很感激我在这里的生活_自从我进入这个外壳，我想我会独自站在生命的阴影中，直到地球停止旋转_因为你，我不再有这种感觉了。

trans-unit.source: 118_AYLIN_Random Interact
trans-unit.target: 118_AYLIN_随机交互

trans-unit.source: We still have a lot of work to do.
trans-unit.target: 我们还有很多工作要做。

trans-unit.source: This bathhouse is my life. It gives me purpose.
trans-unit.target: 这个澡堂就是我的生活。它给了我目标。

trans-unit.source: No, I will not discuss my past with you.
trans-unit.target: 不，我不会和你讨论我的过去。

trans-unit.source: Vincent and I have know each other for a long time.
trans-unit.target: 文森特和我认识很久了。

trans-unit.source: (playername), I trust you will not let me down.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，我相信你不会让我失望的。

trans-unit.source: 118_AYLIN_PROGRESSION
trans-unit.target: 118艾林进展

trans-unit.source: Le Sequoia huh? I remember eating there when Vincent was the chef._I don't like to leave the bathhouse much, but it felt like a second home when he was there.
trans-unit.target: 红杉？我记得文森特当厨师的时候在那里吃饭_我不太喜欢离开澡堂，但当他在那里的时候，感觉就像第二个家。

trans-unit.source: It seems you've met the critic Lucius Delacourt?_I've heard about him. Be careful (playername). Someone like him always have something hidden up their sleeves.
trans-unit.target: 你好像见过评论家Lucius Delacourt_我听说过他。小心(playername)。像他这样的人总是有一些东西藏在袖子里。

trans-unit.source: The bathhouse is reopened and I couldn't be more nervous and excited for it. Thank you, again, for your assistance in making this possible.
trans-unit.target: 澡堂重新开放了，我非常紧张和兴奋。再次感谢您的帮助。

trans-unit.source: Word around is that Le Sequoia is the reason a lot of tourists have started coming to town._The bathhouse has benefited from these extra visitors. I like this partnership.
trans-unit.target: 有传言说，勒红杉是很多游客开始来这里的原因_澡堂从这些额外的访客中受益匪浅。我喜欢这种伙伴关系。

trans-unit.source: The teahouse has always been vital to the bathhouse experience._Seeing it open and filled is exhilarating and I am glad I entrusted you to do this for me. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 茶馆一直是澡堂体验的重要场所_看到它被打开和填满是令人兴奋的，我很高兴我委托你为我做这件事。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Nadjet told me that you've been very busy helping out people in town._It is admirable, but please remember that we have a business to run still.
trans-unit.target: Nadjet告诉我，你一直在忙着帮助城里的人_这令人钦佩，但请记住，我们还有生意要做。

trans-unit.source: Our community has been improving for multiple reasons but one of them has been your ability to help out with your own hands._Your effort is admirable.
trans-unit.target: 我们的社区一直在改善，原因有很多，但其中之一就是你自己动手帮忙的能力_你的努力令人钦佩。

trans-unit.source: Your focus on drinks is admirable. It's not easy to create a great beverage. Personally, I still prefer tea above all else.
trans-unit.target: 你对饮料的专注令人钦佩。创造一种好饮料并不容易。就我个人而言，我仍然更喜欢茶。

trans-unit.source: My internal mechanisms does not allow me to eat much food these days, but I still eat at your place often._That should say everything you need to know.
trans-unit.target: 这些天我的内在机制不允许我吃太多食物，但我仍然经常在你家吃饭_这应该说明你需要知道的一切。

trans-unit.source: You menu I've heard is . . . full of meat. You may serve whatever you wish, but I prefer to stay away from consuming other living beings.
trans-unit.target: 我听说你的菜单是。满是肉。你可以随心所欲地服务，但我更喜欢远离食用其他生物。

trans-unit.source: Even if I could eat more food, I wouldn't eat at your restaurant with its current menu._However, if you change your mind and served good tea, I might drop by.
trans-unit.target: 即使我能多吃点东西，我也不会在你们餐厅吃现在的菜单_不过，如果你改变主意，端上好茶，我可能会顺道来。

trans-unit.source: You been respectful towards the life forms here in White Ash Harbor. For this I am grateful.
trans-unit.target: 你对白灰港的生命形式很尊重。对此，我深表感激。

trans-unit.source: I will never allow my bathhouse to dirty this land and I am glad that we are in agreement on that front.
trans-unit.target: 我绝不会允许我的澡堂弄脏这片土地，我很高兴我们在这方面达成了一致。

trans-unit.source: I thought you were different from the others._I thought you might be better than the hucksters, the frivolous ones, the ones who burn the planet for profit, but I see you are just the same.
trans-unit.target: 我以为你和其他人不一样_我原以为你可能比那些小贩、轻浮的人、那些为了利润而烧毁地球的人要好，但我看到你也一样。

trans-unit.source: This town has done a lot to me, but I would never do what you are doing to it at this very moment._I expected this from LELSH, but not from you (playername). Please reconsider your ways.
trans-unit.target: 这个城市对我做了很多，但我永远不会像你现在这样对待它_我本以为这是从LELSH那里得到的，但不是从你(playername)那里得到的。请重新考虑你的方式。

trans-unit.source: Now that the bathhouse is functioning properly once again, I can rest a little more at night.
trans-unit.target: 既然澡堂又能正常工作了，我晚上就可以多休息一会儿了。

trans-unit.source: Thank you again for repairing my bathhouse._It is an old building, but it has decades left in it before anything else needs to be addressed . . . I hope.
trans-unit.target: 再次感谢你修理我的澡堂_这是一座古老的建筑，但在需要解决其他问题之前，它还有几十年的时间。我希望。

trans-unit.source: The hot water running through the bathhouse is as close to having blood flowing through my veins as I will get.
trans-unit.target: 流过澡堂的热水几乎让我的血管里流淌着鲜血。

trans-unit.source: It seems like everyone had a fantastic time tonight!_If so, then I believe we will have helped out White Ash Harbor recover some of its dignity.
trans-unit.target: 今晚似乎每个人都度过了一段美好的时光_如果是这样，那么我相信我们将帮助白灰港恢复一些尊严。

trans-unit.source: I do not understand influencers or their culture._I find it beyond my comprehension, but if it isn't harming anyone, then it I don't have to try to understand. I'm pleased they will help us out.
trans-unit.target: 我不了解有影响力的人或他们的文化_我发现这超出了我的理解范围，但如果它没有伤害到任何人，那么我就不必试图理解它。我很高兴他们会帮助我们。

trans-unit.source: Nadjet has been showing me some of the influencers posts and it appears that the reactions has been positive._I believe we are heading toward something good here, (playername).
trans-unit.target: Nadjet一直在向我展示一些有影响力的帖子，看起来反应是积极的_我相信我们正在朝着好的方向前进。

trans-unit.source: 118_AYLIN_INTERACT
trans-unit.target: 118_圆柱体_相互作用

trans-unit.source: Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 非常感谢。

trans-unit.source: Thank you?
trans-unit.target: 非常感谢。

trans-unit.source: My mind is more advanced than most minds in this town.
trans-unit.target: 我的头脑比这个镇上的大多数人都先进。

trans-unit.source: If I don't work hard, then why am I here?
trans-unit.target: 如果我不努力工作，那我为什么在这里？

trans-unit.source: I've been around long enough to know what I am doing, but thank you nonetheless.
trans-unit.target: 我已经在这里呆了足够长的时间，知道我在做什么，但还是谢谢你。

trans-unit.source: If you would please come this way.
trans-unit.target: 请你往这边走。

trans-unit.source: I have not requested your help. Now please leave me be, I must attend to something.
trans-unit.target: 我没有请求你的帮助。现在请别管我，我必须处理一些事情。

trans-unit.source: Good thinking (playername)! This will help . . . I think.
trans-unit.target: 好主意(playername)！这将有助于。我想。

trans-unit.source: Your thoughtfulness is appreciated. My android body requires regular maintenance, and this should help.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你的体贴。我的机器人身体需要定期维护，这应该会有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: Thank you (playername). I think this will make me a bit stronger.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你(playername)。我想这会让我变得更强壮。

trans-unit.source: This is valuable (playername), but I really have no need for such trinkets.
trans-unit.target: 这很值钱，但我真的不需要这样的小饰品。

trans-unit.source: My birthday? . . . It's been ages since I've thought about it . . ._At the end of the day, we are just life forms borrowing time from this planet. Perhaps birthdays are a way to remind us?_Anyways, thank you (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我的生日。我已经很久没想过了_归根结底，我们只是从这个星球上借用时间的生命形式。也许生日是提醒我们的一种方式_不管怎样，谢谢你(playername)。

trans-unit.source: I don't need this. Perhaps something more useful next time?
trans-unit.target: 我不需要这个。也许下次会有更有用的东西？

trans-unit.source: This can't help me (playername). Not at all.
trans-unit.target: 这帮不了我(playername)。一点也不。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to buy my friendship (playername), you will have to do better than that.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想买我的友谊(playername)，你必须做得更好。

trans-unit.source: You gave me this already. I don't need anymore.
trans-unit.target: 你已经给我这个了。我不再需要了。

trans-unit.source: Step away. Now.
trans-unit.target: 走开。现在。

trans-unit.source: Bathhouse business calls and I must tend to it.
trans-unit.target: 澡堂的业务电话，我必须处理。

trans-unit.source: I still can't believe you thought I was a ghost! I didn't know I could act so good.
trans-unit.target: 我还是不敢相信你以为我是鬼！我不知道我能演得这么好。

trans-unit.source: If you do what the boss says you should do, then you'll be okay. Don't do it, then maybe you find out what the bottom of the pier looks like. I dunno.
trans-unit.target: 如果你按照老板说的去做，那么你会没事的。别这样，也许你会发现码头底部是什么样子的。我不知道。

trans-unit.source: The folks in this town that messed with Aylin were lucky that she didn't share how much they bothered her with me.
trans-unit.target: 这个镇上那些惹Aylin的人很幸运，她没有和我分享他们对她的困扰。

trans-unit.source: Trust isn't the only thing that is earned, respect is too. Respect can open doors you never even dreamed were possible.
trans-unit.target: 信任不是唯一能赢得的东西，尊重也是。尊重可以打开你从未梦想过的大门。

trans-unit.source: If you play your cards right, you might even be called a friend one day by moi. That's French for me. It's fancy talk.
trans-unit.target: 如果你打得好，你甚至有一天可能会被我称为朋友。这对我来说是法语。这是花言巧语。

trans-unit.source: This place has its charms, one of them is the arcade!_Okay, it's only two machines in the rec center, but when was the last time you saw a real arcade?! It's unreal.
trans-unit.target: 这个地方有它的魅力，其中之一就是拱廊_好吧，娱乐中心只有两台机器，但你上一次看到真正的街机是什么时候？！这太不真实了。

trans-unit.source: A very long time ago, back when dates started with a '1', people used to apply soap to their body after taking a bath._It was their form of a deodorant.
trans-unit.target: 很久以前，当日期以“1”开头时，人们习惯在洗澡后在身上涂肥皂_这是他们的除臭剂。

trans-unit.source: Why . . . why do you know that?
trans-unit.target: 为什么。你为什么知道？

trans-unit.source: That's awful.
trans-unit.target: 太可怕了。

trans-unit.source: My business is baths and people use soap in baths, so I took it upon myself to learn the history of soap._I wouldn't lye to ya about it. Get it? Lye. Ha!
trans-unit.target: 我的业务是洗澡，人们在洗澡时使用肥皂，所以我主动学习了肥皂的历史_我不会骗你的，明白吗？赖。哈！

trans-unit.source: Can ya imagine the smells? No one thinks about that when they talk about time travel._People in the 1800's most definitely had a funk.
trans-unit.target: 你能想象这些气味吗？当人们谈论时间旅行时，没有人会想到这一点_19世纪的人们无疑感到恐惧。

trans-unit.source: I've worked in The Peony Bathhouse for a very long time._Since I was 18, and in that time I've learned one thing: If the boss says something's wrong, then something's wrong.
trans-unit.target: 我在牡丹澡堂工作了很长时间_从我18岁开始，在那段时间里，我学到了一件事：如果老板说有什么不对劲，那就是有什么不对头。

trans-unit.source: If there is one thing I trust in this world, it's Aylin. If there is one thing I don't trust in this world, it's cops._They're not all do gooding for the people types._Trust someone who has experience on that topic.
trans-unit.target: 如果说这个世界上有一件事我信任，那就是艾林。在这个世界上，如果有一件事我不相信，那就是警察_它们并不都对人们有益_相信在这方面有经验的人。

trans-unit.source: I know that Aylin has to trust you with fixing the bathhouse because I am not that skilled in the fixing of things._I can fix things but that's a different kind of fixing.
trans-unit.target: 我知道艾林必须信任你修理澡堂，因为我修理东西没那么熟练_我可以修理东西，但那是另一种修理方式。

trans-unit.source: Inspite of my slightly prickly exterior, I am actually a happy person, I just . . . don't show folks who are new that side of myself._If people think you're soft, then they try to mold you into something you never wanted to be.
trans-unit.target: 尽管我外表有点多刺，但我其实是个快乐的人，我只是。不要让新来的人看到我的那一面_如果人们认为你软弱，那么他们就会试图把你塑造成你从未想过的样子。

trans-unit.source: During my time as a ghost I overheard and saw some pretty interesting stuff._One time I watched a man casually drop off box with seven kittens on a bench in town and leave._I helped get them all adopted, of course, but how heartless, right?
trans-unit.target: 在我做鬼的时候，我无意中听到并看到了一些非常有趣的东西_有一次，我看到一个男人漫不经心地把带着七只小猫的盒子放在镇上的长椅上，然后离开了_当然，我帮助他们全部被收养了，但这是多么无情，对吧？

trans-unit.source: I have a confession to make. I haven't always been in the . . . how do I phrase this, in the normal 9 to 9 job market._I worked in the private landscaping industry. Specifically in providing fresh fertilizer deposits.
trans-unit.target: 我有件事要坦白。我并不总是在。在正常的朝九晚五的就业市场中，我该怎么说呢_我在私人园林绿化行业工作。特别是在提供新鲜肥料储备方面。

trans-unit.source: That sounds like a totally normal job.
trans-unit.target: 这听起来像是一份完全正常的工作。

trans-unit.source: Oh boy . . . are you talking about the mob?
trans-unit.target: 哦，天哪。你是在说暴徒吗？

trans-unit.source: Even when I was digging 6 foot holes in the ground to fill with FERTILIZER, I was still the cheerful person standing before you._I don't let anything get me down, not even the dead.
trans-unit.target: 即使我在地上挖了6英尺深的洞来装肥料，我仍然是站在你面前的那个快乐的人_我不会让任何事情让我失望，即使是死者。

trans-unit.source: You get it. It was a life I had to live for a while, that is until Mrs. Aylin came along and offered me this job. She really helped me out.
trans-unit.target: 你懂的。这是我必须过一段时间的生活，直到艾林太太来给我这份工作。她真的帮了我一把。

trans-unit.source: I look at rainy days as being able to take a moment to contemplate something profound: Marshmallows might just be clouds made from sugar. Maybe.
trans-unit.target: 我把雨天看作是能够花点时间思考一些深刻的事情：棉花糖可能只是糖做成的云。也许 吧。

trans-unit.source: If I am 100% honest, I do miss the fertilizer business somedays._There is something cathartic about helping the forest grow big and tall. I helped out the environment with that job.
trans-unit.target: 如果我百分之百诚实，我确实会想念化肥行业_帮助森林长得又大又高有一种宣泄作用。我通过那份工作帮助改善了环境。

trans-unit.source: Just so we're clear, I never once helped create the fertilizer, I simply was very good to placing the fertilizer out in the world.
trans-unit.target: 为了让我们清楚，我从来没有帮助创造过肥料，我只是很擅长把肥料放在世界上。

trans-unit.source: Don't let anyone's judgement sway you from doing what it is you want to do, okay? If they try, send 'em my way.
trans-unit.target: 不要让任何人的判断影响你做你想做的事，好吗？如果他们尝试，就把他们送到我这里。

trans-unit.source: One of my favorite things to do is watch people in town._For a long time I just watched everyone because I was supposed to be a ghost, but now I get to be me. It's nice.
trans-unit.target: 我最喜欢做的事情之一就是观察城里的人_很长一段时间，我只是看着每个人，因为我应该是个鬼，但现在我可以做我自己了。这很好。

trans-unit.source: A lot of people ask me if this is an act. The cheeriness and brashness mixed together._I'm me, no matter what, but I find it odd that so many people find that idea bizarre.
trans-unit.target: 很多人问我这是不是一种行为。快乐和傲慢交织在一起_不管怎样，我就是我，但我觉得奇怪的是，这么多人觉得这个想法很奇怪。

trans-unit.source: It's not something that is traditionally mashed together.
trans-unit.target: 这不是传统上混合在一起的东西。

trans-unit.source: I find you terrifying.
trans-unit.target: 我觉得你很可怕。

trans-unit.source: Then they just don't know anyone who's fun, in my opinion. Get away from the polite folks as they're rotten to the core. Cheers.
trans-unit.target: 在我看来，他们就是不认识任何有趣的人。远离那些彬彬有礼的人，因为他们已经堕落到了极点。干杯。

trans-unit.source: Bah! Haha, I can't believe you're still hung up on that!_You remind me of Buddy Kline, though these days Buddy is living in the root system of an oak, but he was funny like you! Worrying about stuff, esh!
trans-unit.target: 呸！哈哈，真不敢相信你还挂在那上面_你让我想起了巴迪·克莱恩，虽然这些天巴迪生活在橡树的根系中，但他和你一样有趣！担心事情，埃什！

trans-unit.source: There was a great Ramen place back in Billboard City. The broth is amazing! I'll take you there sometime.
trans-unit.target: 在Billboard City有一家很棒的拉面店。肉汤太棒了！我什么时候带你去。

trans-unit.source: Making soup is one of my favorite pastimes. I experiment constantly with different bases until I get something amazing._Case in point: Peanut butter soup with kale and fish, so GOOD!
trans-unit.target: 煮汤是我最喜欢的消遣之一。我不断地用不同的碱基进行实验，直到我得到一些惊人的东西_一个很好的例子：羽衣甘蓝和鱼的花生酱汤，太棒了！

trans-unit.source: I am hoping to introduce one of my homemade recipes to Mrs. Aylin._I know she doesn't need food, but I hope that I can convince her to offer it as a possible snack at the bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 我希望向Aylin夫人介绍我的一个自制食谱_我知道她不需要食物，但我希望我能说服她把它作为澡堂可能的小吃。

trans-unit.source: Without Mrs. Aylin, I would be nowhere fast._I am grateful every day that I get to learn so much from her and work at this fine establishment.
trans-unit.target: 没有艾林太太，我哪儿都不会快_我每天都很感激能从她身上学到很多东西，并在这个优秀的机构工作。

trans-unit.source: My. . . my feet are swollen. I think I need to take a dip in the bath myself._Hahaha! Ohhhh, that toe is not looking good. Ha! I am going to now live in the bath. Goodbye.
trans-unit.target: 我的。我的脚肿了。我想我需要自己泡个澡_哈哈哈！哦，那个脚趾看起来不太好。哈！我现在要住在浴室里。再见。

trans-unit.source: Do you think I am a jovial person?
trans-unit.target: 你认为我是个快乐的人吗？

trans-unit.source: Uhhhhhh, yes? Yes, you are quite jovial.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，是吗？是的，你很快乐。

trans-unit.source: I don't know if that's the word for you.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道这个词是否适合你。

trans-unit.source: You hesitated. That means you're not being truthful. It's okay, I understand your hesitation._I just wish I was known as that, because in my brain, I see myself as a rather happy person. Maybe I shouldn't yell as much? Yeah, that might help.
trans-unit.target: 你犹豫了。这意味着你没有说实话。没关系，我理解你的犹豫_我只是希望别人知道我是这样的，因为在我的脑海里，我认为自己是一个相当快乐的人。也许我不应该大喊大叫？是的，这可能会有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: What word would you use, (playername)? Jovial, I looked it up, sounds like a nice thing to be . . . I'd like to be seen as nice._I also know nice people get pushed around a lot too. I know I am a kind to my friends, maybe that's enough. Yeah.
trans-unit.target: 你会用什么词(playername)？乔维尔，我查过了，听起来是件好事。我希望被视为好人_我也知道好人也会被推来推去。我知道我对朋友很好，也许这就够了。是 啊。

trans-unit.source: The soap we sell in the bathhouse is high grade, organic, and made by a single Italian man who then sells it through an underground market dealer._I have made sure he supplies us and only us. Don't worry, he's being compensated properly.
trans-unit.target: 我们在澡堂卖的肥皂是高档有机肥皂，由一名意大利男子制作，然后通过地下市场经销商出售_我已经确保他只供应我们。别担心，他得到了适当的补偿。

trans-unit.source: I was at a coffee shop today and saw a man painting in the shop. I walked over and saw he was painting one of the lights hanging from the ceiling._I asked him about it and he said, 'It's not one my brightest ideas.' HAHAHAHA! Get it?!
trans-unit.target: 今天我在一家咖啡店，看到一个男人在店里画画。我走过去，看见他正在画挂在天花板上的一盏灯_我问他这件事，他说：“这不是我最聪明的想法。”哈哈哈！了解了？！

trans-unit.source: I could take a break, but if it means leaving a task hanging for Aylin, then I couldn't do that. I know she said, 'You should take a break sometime.'_But I know she means that I shouldn't stop until everything she needs done is done.
trans-unit.target: 我可以休息一下，但如果这意味着要把任务留给艾林，那么我就不能这样做。我知道她说，‘你应该找个时间休息一下。’_但我知道她的意思是，在她需要做的一切都完成之前，我不应该停下来。

trans-unit.source: There is one thing you should do for yourself and that's always keeping your brain on._I . . . I mean, I've known some people who run scams to get folk's personal information and rob them blind. Scum, the lot of them.
trans-unit.target: 有一件事你应该为自己做，那就是始终保持头脑清醒。我的意思是，我认识一些人，他们通过诈骗来获取人们的个人信息，然后盲目抢劫。人渣，他们很多。

trans-unit.source: I'd like to take a walk in the woods sometime, but, there's too many memories and grassy mounds out there for me to have a good time.
trans-unit.target: 我想找个时间在树林里散散步，但是，外面有太多的回忆和草丘，让我无法度过美好的时光。

trans-unit.source: Ya know somethin'? I think I am getting sweet on you because I am wanting to just watch a show with you._What are you into genre wise, anyway?
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗？我想我对你越来越好了，因为我只想和你一起看一场演出_不管怎样，你对流派有什么看法？

trans-unit.source: Historical dramas.
trans-unit.target: 历史剧。

trans-unit.source: Cooking shows.
trans-unit.target: 烹饪节目。

trans-unit.source: Oh. Historial dramas? You mean shows with the many layers of dresses on, and people with funny accents?_And for some reason, they play not baseball but some other game with a flat paddle?_Those kind? Guess I can give it a shot.
trans-unit.target: 哦。历史剧？你是说穿着多层衣服的节目，还有口音滑稽的人_出于某种原因，他们玩的不是棒球，而是其他一些平桨游戏_那种？我想我可以试试。

trans-unit.source: I should've known! Do you ever turn off? Guess not, but who am I to say anything about it?_I pretended to be a ghost for years just to make sure my boss wasn't bothered by possible problems in town. Let's give it a shot.
trans-unit.target: 我早该知道的！你曾经关掉过吗？我猜不会，但我有什么资格说这件事呢_多年来，我一直假装成鬼，只是为了确保我的老板不会被城里可能出现的问题所困扰。我们试试吧。

trans-unit.source: We had a shortage on salts for the baths, towels were also low, and the new staff still doesn't know nothing from nothing._I am getting a hug from you and then I'm gonna have an ice cream sundae and pass out.
trans-unit.target: 我们洗澡的盐短缺，毛巾也很低，新员工仍然一无所知_我会得到你的拥抱，然后我会吃一个冰淇淋圣代，然后昏倒。

trans-unit.source: I'll never forget this one time I was in the forest with a. . . ya know what?_I don't need to finish that story. I'm not that person anymore and you being here is evidence of that._Don't worry, I won't get rid of ya like evidence! Haha!
trans-unit.target: 我永远不会忘记有一次我和一个。你知道吗_我不需要结束那个故事。我不再是那个人了，你在这里就是证据_别担心，我不会把你当作证据扔掉的！哈哈！

trans-unit.source: Am I worthy of this love? I ask myself that when I see you, but you don't run._You don't run away, so I guess that's the answer, ain't it? As long as you think I am, then I am, and that's a start.
trans-unit.target: 我值得这份爱吗？我问自己，当我看到你，但你不跑_你没有逃跑，所以我想这就是答案，不是吗？只要你认为我是，那么我就是，这是一个开始。

trans-unit.source: Me and you, we're partners now in this life. I love ya. I love ya sick, I do. Now hug me! I can't get enough of that!
trans-unit.target: 我和你，我们现在是搭档。我爱你。我爱你生病了，我爱你。现在拥抱我！我受够了！

trans-unit.source: Let's go on the train somewhere. I think I'm due for a trip anyway after years without time off._Once the bathhouse is humming, let's figure something out. Okay? Okay.
trans-unit.target: 我们坐火车去某个地方吧。我想，在多年没有休息的情况下，我无论如何都要去旅行了。一旦澡堂嗡嗡作响，让我们想想办法。可以？可以。

trans-unit.source: 119_NADJET_Random Interact
trans-unit.target: 119_NADJET_随机互动

trans-unit.source: If you make boss mad, I will beat you to a pulp!
trans-unit.target: 如果你惹老板生气，我就揍你一顿！

trans-unit.source: I am here to serve miss Aylin. She . . . nevermind.
trans-unit.target: 我是来为艾林小姐服务的。她。没有关系。

trans-unit.source: Truth be told, I'm fairly new to White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 说实话，我是白灰港的新手。

trans-unit.source: Miss Aylin prefers not to engage with the town . . . yet.
trans-unit.target: 艾林小姐不想和镇上的人打交道。然而。

trans-unit.source: This Bathhouse will be beautiful once fixed . . . boss says.
trans-unit.target: 这个澡堂一旦修好，一定会很漂亮。老板说。

trans-unit.source: 119_NADJET_PROGRESSION
trans-unit.target: 119_NADJET_进展

trans-unit.source: I don't know nothin, but your restaurant is nice.
trans-unit.target: 我什么都不知道，但你的餐厅很不错。

trans-unit.source: People's words mean nothin'. If that Lucius guy is bothering you, let me know ok? I'll give him a good old beatdown.
trans-unit.target: 人们的话毫无意义。如果那个卢修斯的家伙打扰你，请告诉我，好吗？我要狠狠地揍他一顿。

trans-unit.source: Thanks again for helping us out with getting the Bathhouse open. I haven't seen the boss this happy in a long time.
trans-unit.target: 再次感谢您帮助我们打开澡堂。我好久没见到老板这么高兴了。

trans-unit.source: Le Sequoia's reputation is on the rise, it seems. Good!
trans-unit.target: 勒红杉的声誉似乎正在上升。好！

trans-unit.source: People are loving our teahouse and its so cool!
trans-unit.target: 人们喜欢我们的茶馆，它太酷了！

trans-unit.source: I've been watching ya being a good one around town. It's almost sweet what ya doin' for everyone.
trans-unit.target: 我一直在看着你在城里表现得很好。你为每个人做的事真是太好了。

trans-unit.source: Are you getting paid by the hour for those bulletin board answers? Esh! In either case, keep it going. People are happier because of it.
trans-unit.target: 你为那些公告板上的答案按小时计酬吗？埃什！无论哪种情况，都要坚持下去。人们因此更快乐。

trans-unit.source: I wasn't expecting your menu to have what it has on it, but what it has I haven't had ever. I am gonna to try it all.
trans-unit.target: 我没想到你的菜单上会有它的东西，但我从来没有吃过它的东西。我要试试这一切。

trans-unit.source: Everything I've tried has been delicious. It would be a shame if you stopped making good food, damn shame really. So don't stop.
trans-unit.target: 我尝试过的一切都很美味。如果你不再做美味的食物，那将是一种耻辱，真是该死的耻辱。所以不要停下来。

trans-unit.source: New food is one thing, but I dunno about yours. Maybe I'll try it . . . maybe.
trans-unit.target: 新食物是一回事，但我不知道你的。也许我会试试。也许 吧。

trans-unit.source: If you try to come near me again with that menu unchanged, I will take you to my grove in the forest and you will never leave it.
trans-unit.target: 如果你试图在菜单不变的情况下再次靠近我，我会带你去我在森林里的小树林，你永远不会离开它。

trans-unit.source: As an amateur arborist, who has contributed to the fertilization of the earth through organic means, might I say that you have done a good job . . ._. . . Keeping it clean around here.
trans-unit.target: 作为一名业余树艺家，他通过有机手段为地球施肥做出了贡献，我可以说你做得很好。保持这里的清洁。

trans-unit.source: It's good to see your work isn't trashing the place. Keep it up. If ya don't, that would be a shame . . . wouldn't it?
trans-unit.target: 很高兴看到你的工作没有破坏这个地方。坚持下去。如果你不这样做，那将是一种耻辱。不是吗？

trans-unit.source: YOU! YOU SEE WHAT YOU'RE DOIN' AROUND HERE WITH THE TRASH AND THE WHATNOT?! STOP IT.
trans-unit.target: 你！你看到你在这里拿垃圾什么的了吗？！停止它。

trans-unit.source: Look, I tried to be nice. I yelled at ya. That's me being nice, but by the look of things that didn't register . . . so let's try this._If you don't stop making trash, I'm gonna make you a part of the landscape from 6 feet down, capeesh?!
trans-unit.target: 你看，我试着表现得很好。我对你大喊大叫。这是我的好意，但从那些没有被注意到的事情来看。那么，让我们试试这个_如果你不停止制造垃圾，我就让你从6英尺深的地方成为风景的一部分，卡佩什？！

trans-unit.source: Thanks again for helping me out with planning Aylin's birthday party! She seemed super surprised!
trans-unit.target: 再次感谢你帮我策划Aylin的生日聚会！她看起来超级惊讶！

trans-unit.source: Aylin was telling me how much fun she had at the party. I gotta say, I'm glad my noggin had the idea.
trans-unit.target: Aylin告诉我她在聚会上玩得有多开心。我得说，我很高兴我的家伙有这个想法。

trans-unit.source: I think when people get older, birthdays are special again, ya know?_When we're in our 20/30s they kinda lose their meaning, but at some point I think it's smash cake again._Maybe when you're 70? How old is Aylin, anyway??
trans-unit.target: 我想当人们变老的时候，生日又变得特别了，你知道吗_当我们20多岁或30多岁的时候，它们有点失去了意义，但在某个时候，我认为这又是一场闹剧_也许当你70岁的时候？艾林多大了？？

trans-unit.source: The boss is so nice! She did all of that for me and . . . I think I'm gonna cry again. TELL NO ONE!
trans-unit.target: 老板人真好！她为我做了这一切，而且。我想我又要哭了。不要告诉任何人！

trans-unit.source: I didn't know I could figure out so much, ya know! Thanks for sticking with me during all of that running around.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道我能弄明白这么多，你知道的！谢谢你一直陪着我到处跑。

trans-unit.source: I really thought for a minute someone had Aylin, but she's no China doll, she knows how to take care of herself._Shoulda given her more credit, but ANYTHING is possible, ya know?
trans-unit.target: 我真的有一分钟以为有人拥有Aylin，但她不是瓷娃娃，她知道如何照顾自己_应该给她更多的信用，但一切皆有可能，你知道吗？

trans-unit.source: 119_NADJET_INTERACT
trans-unit.target: 119_NADJET_交互

trans-unit.source: Sure.
trans-unit.target: 当然。

trans-unit.source: This is my uniform. It's nice, but it's a uniform.
trans-unit.target: 这是我的制服。它很漂亮，但它是制服。

trans-unit.source: What an odd thing to say.
trans-unit.target: 说这话真奇怪。

trans-unit.source: When I'm on the clock, I'm going, so get out of my way and thanks!
trans-unit.target: 当我赶时间的时候，我就要走了，所以别挡我的路，谢谢！

trans-unit.source: Changing jobs is a hard adjustment.
trans-unit.target: 换工作是一个艰难的调整。

trans-unit.source: Will you please . . . help me?
trans-unit.target: 请你。帮助我？

trans-unit.source: I don't need help right now.
trans-unit.target: 我现在不需要帮助。

trans-unit.source: Oh yes! I will enjoy this. I owe ya one (playername)!
trans-unit.target: 哦，是的！我会喜欢的。我欠你一个(playername)！

trans-unit.source: Don't tell Aylin about this ok? This will be our little secret.
trans-unit.target: 不要告诉Aylin这件事，好吗？这将是我们的小秘密。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, I sneak down to Bubble Shack to get some for myself. I just don't want to be seen. Especially not by Aylin.
trans-unit.target: 有时，我偷偷溜到泡泡屋给自己买一些。我只是不想被人看到。尤其不是Aylin。

trans-unit.source: Thank . . . you for this valuable gift. However, I have everything I need living in the bathhouse. Material goods aren't everything (playername).
trans-unit.target: 谢谢。感谢你送给我这份珍贵的礼物。然而，我在澡堂里有我需要的一切。物质财富不是一切(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Hey, ya! IT IS my birthday! I feel very blessed to have you as a friend (playername).
trans-unit.target: 嘿，你！今天是我的生日！有你这样的朋友(playername)，我感到非常幸运。

trans-unit.source: I got one already.
trans-unit.target: 我已经有一个了。

trans-unit.source: NO. THANK. YOU.
trans-unit.target: 不用了，谢谢。你。

trans-unit.source: This might be valuable for someone else, but I'm not going to be distracted by material goods.
trans-unit.target: 这对其他人来说可能很有价值，但我不会被物质商品分心。

trans-unit.source: I got something like this from you already today.
trans-unit.target: 我今天已经从你那里得到了这样的东西。

trans-unit.source: It's outta left field, but okay. Here ya go.
trans-unit.target: 它在左外，但还好。给你。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I'm a bit busy today.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我今天有点忙。

trans-unit.source: Sells swimming gear & soap
trans-unit.target: 出售游泳装备和肥皂

trans-unit.source: Welcome to the White Ash Harbor bathhouse! Let me know if you need anything!
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到白灰港澡堂！如果你需要什么，请告诉我！

trans-unit.source: Hello again! Welcome back to the White Ash Harbor bathhouse!
trans-unit.target: 你好！欢迎回到白灰港澡堂！

trans-unit.source: The White Ash Harbor bathhouse is the premiere bathhouse in White Ash Harbor!
trans-unit.target: 白灰港澡堂是白灰港首屈一指的澡堂！

trans-unit.source: You will not find better hot water anywhere else! Even your shower pales in comparison!
trans-unit.target: 你在其他任何地方都找不到更好的热水！相比之下，你的淋浴也相形见绌！

trans-unit.source: Community and bubbles, a combination that works and is enjoyed by many. Welcome to the bathhouse!
trans-unit.target: 社区和泡沫，一种有效的组合，受到许多人的喜爱。欢迎来到澡堂！

trans-unit.source: That scent is new.
trans-unit.target: 那气味是新的。

trans-unit.source: We get those made especially for us.
trans-unit.target: 我们得到那些特别为我们做的。

trans-unit.source: Handmade by an android at the top of a mountain who has no hands.
trans-unit.target: 由一个没有手的机器人在山顶手工制作。

trans-unit.source: I wonder if it'll work with hot water?
trans-unit.target: 我想知道它是否适用于热水？

trans-unit.source: Where did you get . . . nevermind, I've learned never to ask.
trans-unit.target: 你从哪里得到的。没关系，我学会了不问。

trans-unit.source: I may get this for myself.
trans-unit.target: 我可以自己得到这个。

trans-unit.source: Oh, no! Bahahaha!
trans-unit.target: 哦，不！哈哈哈！

trans-unit.source: That is not happening.
trans-unit.target: 这种情况不会发生。

trans-unit.source: Maybe if you try another shop that isn't us they will buy it.
trans-unit.target: 也许如果你尝试另一家不是我们的商店，他们会买的。

trans-unit.source: You're broke, sorry.
trans-unit.target: 你破产了，对不起。

trans-unit.source: Not enough. Come again next time.
trans-unit.target: 还不够。下次再来。

trans-unit.source: Comeback when you have the funds, please!
trans-unit.target: 等你有了钱，请回来！

trans-unit.source: 120_SAHIM
trans-unit.target: 120英尺

trans-unit.source: If its meat you want, I'll be back at my stand later, but right now I am just enjoying my time.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想吃肉，我稍后会回到我的摊位，但现在我只是在享受我的时间。

trans-unit.source: You must be new to town beacuse no one who's from here walks up to anyone and just says hi, but hello nonetheless.
trans-unit.target: 你一定是新来的，因为这里没有人会走过来跟任何人打招呼，但还是打招呼。

trans-unit.source: A lot of people come to Billboard City for the food to eat and the sights to see, but none of them are ready for the smells that live here too. Haha!
trans-unit.target: 很多人来到Billboard City是为了吃东西和看风景，但他们都没有准备好忍受这里的气味。哈哈！

trans-unit.source: What do butchers and writers have in common? In both jobs you have to deal with hacks! Hahaha! I kill me. Anyway, if you want some liver later, I'll have it available at a great price.
trans-unit.target: 屠夫和作家有什么共同点？在这两份工作中，你都必须应对黑客！哈哈哈！我杀了我。不管怎样，如果你以后想要一些肝脏，我会以优惠的价格提供。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most people, I like my job, and like most people, I am not defined by my job._Humans are multifaceted sorts with many dreams and wants. I am Sahim, by the way, and I'll see you around.
trans-unit.target: 与大多数人不同，我喜欢我的工作，和大多数人一样，我不是由我的工作定义的_人类是多方面的，有许多梦想和欲望。顺便说一句，我是萨希姆，回头见。

trans-unit.source: Tell me, (playername), do you have dreams?
trans-unit.target: 告诉我，你有梦想吗？

trans-unit.source: I do, and I am living them out right now. I have three restaurants, two in White Ash Harbor, and one here in town called X.
trans-unit.target: 我确实如此，而且我现在正在把它们活出来。我有三家餐馆，两家在白灰港，一家在镇上叫X。

trans-unit.source: Nightly, why do you ask?
trans-unit.target: 晚上，你为什么问？

trans-unit.source: I am glad to hear that you are not simply dreaming, but living your dreams. It's scary to do such a thing, but here you are, doing it. Good for you.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴听到你不仅仅是在做梦，而是在实现你的梦想。做这样的事很可怕，但你来了，做这件事。对你有好处。

trans-unit.source: A joker I see, but seriously, you mustn't let your dreams be just dreams. You should try to make them a reality, unless you're just walking around naked in your dreams, then just keep those dreams in your head. Don't get arrested.
trans-unit.target: 我看到了一个笑话，但说真的，你不能让你的梦想只是梦想。你应该试着让它们成为现实，除非你只是在梦中赤身裸体地走来走去，那么就把这些梦记在脑子里。不要被逮捕。

trans-unit.source: Everyone has dreams, but not everyone wants to or needs to share them with the world at large. It's nice to have something for yourself and that's it.
trans-unit.target: 每个人都有梦想，但并不是每个人都想或需要与全世界分享。为自己拥有一些东西是件好事，仅此而已。

trans-unit.source: Have you seen The 100 today? Your shop is climbing up the ranks! Congrats my friend!
trans-unit.target: 你今天看到100了吗？你的店铺正在不断攀升！恭喜我的朋友！

trans-unit.source: When I see my friends succeed, it is then that I feel I can as well. Surrounding yourself with people who are driven is a must because they inspire you to try something new. Did you know that I write poetry? Didn't expect that from a butcher, did ya?
trans-unit.target: 当我看到我的朋友成功时，我觉得我也可以。与有动力的人在一起是必须的，因为他们激励你尝试新事物。你知道我写诗吗？你没想到屠夫会这样，是吗？

trans-unit.source: One of the things that I try to do is write every single day. If I am not exercising my prose, they might get rusty, and where would my poems be without words attached to them?
trans-unit.target: 我努力做的一件事就是每天写作。如果我不锻炼我的散文，它们可能会生锈，如果没有文字，我的诗会在哪里？

trans-unit.source: You, me, horror movie marathon! Are you in?
trans-unit.target: 你，我，恐怖电影马拉松！你在吗？

trans-unit.source: Yes, bring on the buckets of blood!
trans-unit.target: 是的，带上那桶血！

trans-unit.source: No, no thank you, I appreciate your love for it, but I just can't.
trans-unit.target: 不，不，谢谢，我很感激你的爱，但我不能。

trans-unit.source: Fantastic! Let's setup a day and go for it! I'll get some of my favorites up and ready to go.
trans-unit.target: 好极了！让我们设定一天，然后开始吧！我会把我最喜欢的一些拿起来准备出发。

trans-unit.source: I can understand that, horror is a complex genre that most don't have the bandwidth to withstand. I takes an elevated mind to really get why blood is colored blue or green sometimes.
trans-unit.target: 我能理解，恐怖是一种复杂的类型，大多数人都没有足够的带宽来承受。我需要一个高尚的头脑来真正理解为什么血液有时会变成蓝色或绿色。

trans-unit.source: I remember my first all night horror movie marathon. It was at the Neo Beverly Theater. The seats were beaten, tired, the ceiling stained from decades of cigarettes. It was magic.
trans-unit.target: 我记得我的第一部通宵恐怖电影马拉松。那是在新贝弗利剧院。座位被殴打，疲惫不堪，天花板被几十年的香烟弄脏了。这是魔法。

trans-unit.source: Horror is a topic that is often misunderstood. It has always been a genre that subverts the norms of a society to tell a story that is often pointing out a flaw in that society or an ignored people living within the walls of 'normality.'
trans-unit.target: 恐怖是一个经常被误解的话题。它一直是一种颠覆社会规范的类型，讲述一个经常指出社会缺陷或生活在“正常”墙内的被忽视的人的故事

trans-unit.source: I am trying to blend my love of horror movies and poetry. I think it'll make for some funny or deep stuff! You never know if something's going to work until you try it.
trans-unit.target: 我试图将我对恐怖电影和诗歌的热爱融合在一起。我认为这会带来一些有趣或深刻的东西！除非你尝试过，否则你永远不知道某件事是否会奏效。

trans-unit.source: If you going to ask to read some of my poetry, forget it. It's for me and me alone. I mean . . . I dunno, maybe you'll like it, but I'm not ready for that pressure today.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想读我的一些诗，那就忘了吧。这是给我和我一个人的。我是说。我不知道，也许你会喜欢，但我今天还没有准备好承受这种压力。

trans-unit.source: Would you want to read one of my poems?
trans-unit.target: 你想读我的一首诗吗？

trans-unit.source: I get to? Sure!
trans-unit.target: 我能去吗？当然！

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want me to read it? You seemed pretty guarded about it earlier.
trans-unit.target: 你确定要我读吗？你之前似乎对此很谨慎。

trans-unit.source: Okay, here it is, it's called my Bloodstained Rose. Just . . . anyway, give it a read.
trans-unit.target: 好的，它在这里，它叫我的血染玫瑰。只是。不管怎样，读一读。

trans-unit.source: I am still, but if I am going to grow at all as an artist, I have to show it a little bit.
trans-unit.target: 我仍然是，但如果我想成为一名艺术家，我必须表现出一点。

trans-unit.source: I'm glad you enjoyed my work, (playername). It felt good to show it off to someone. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴你喜欢我的工作。向别人炫耀感觉很好。非常感谢。

trans-unit.source: I've been pondering something, should I go to a reading at a poetry circle? I just . . . nevermind. Forget I said anything.
trans-unit.target: 我一直在思考，我应该去诗坛读书吗？我只是。没有关系。忘了我说过什么。

trans-unit.source: One of my favorite poets is Strunk. He's just got a cadence to his prose that I wish I could hit. He mentioned that his writing group was key in developing his style. It's the only reason why I care about finding one for myself.
trans-unit.target: 我最喜欢的诗人之一是斯特伦克。他的散文节奏很快，我真希望我能跟上。他提到，他的写作团队是发展他的风格的关键。这是我关心为自己找到一个的唯一原因。

trans-unit.source: I am going to go, %. There is a poetry group that meets up at the I'm Crazy for Beans cafe on Thursdays. I'm not looking to grow an audience or anything, but simply find a tribe.
trans-unit.target: 我要去，%。有一个诗歌小组每周四在“我疯狂地吃豆子”咖啡馆聚会。我不想增加观众或任何东西，而只是想找到一个部落。

trans-unit.source: 120_SAHIM_INTERACT
trans-unit.target: 120_安全_互动

trans-unit.source: Eh, I need a haircut.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，我需要理发。

trans-unit.source: This shirt is from one of my favorite horror games! Parasite Rains!
trans-unit.target: 这件衬衫是我最喜欢的恐怖游戏之一！寄生虫雨！

trans-unit.source: Thank you! It's where all of my ideas come from.
trans-unit.target: 非常感谢。这是我所有想法的来源。

trans-unit.source: The meat isn't hard to do, but the writing, my goodness it's tough.
trans-unit.target: 肉不难做，但写作，我的天哪，很难。

trans-unit.source: We all need a kind word. I hope you got one today yourself.
trans-unit.target: 我们都需要一句好话。我希望你今天自己也有一个。

trans-unit.source: I would appreciate it, my friend, thank you.
trans-unit.target: 我会很感激的，我的朋友，谢谢你。

trans-unit.source: No thank you, my friend, these hands have got it.
trans-unit.target: 不，谢谢你，我的朋友，这双手已经抓住了。

trans-unit.source: This is fantastic! Thank you!
trans-unit.target: 这太棒了！非常感谢。

trans-unit.source: Eh, I really don't need it.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，我真的不需要它。

trans-unit.source: Hey, you gave me one of these already! Thanks though.
trans-unit.target: 嘿，你已经给我一个了！不过还是谢谢。

trans-unit.source: I don't need that from you, thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我不需要你那样，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: I am behind on orders to be filled. Another time, my friend.
trans-unit.target: 我没有按时完成订单。下次吧，我的朋友。

trans-unit.source: I'm just not that into you. This is a nice compliment though!
trans-unit.target: 我只是没那么喜欢你。不过，这是一个很好的赞美！

trans-unit.source: 121_IAN
Hello, hello, hello! I hope you have a wonderful day in Billboard City!
trans-unit.target: 你好你好你好我希望你在Billboard City度过美好的一天！

trans-unit.source: Hello , hello, hello, again! For a town so large running into the same person twice is a bit of a treat, haha! Have a good day.
trans-unit.target: 你好，你好，你好！对于一个如此大的城镇来说，两次遇到同一个人是一种享受，哈哈！祝您今天过得愉快。

trans-unit.source: We really ought to stop meeting like this, haha! I have some fresh fish here if it strikes your fancy. They are unlike anything you'll find in Billboard City!
trans-unit.target: 我们真的不应该再这样见面了，哈哈！如果你喜欢的话，我这里有一些新鲜的鱼。它们不同于你在Billboard City找到的任何东西！

trans-unit.source: Since our comings and goings are a bit of a regular occurrence, let me tell you a story. Once I was out far, past Great Horn Point, and I was out of fuel. I looped the fin of a nearby whale and he pulled me back to the harbor!
trans-unit.target: 既然我们的来往有点频繁，让我给你讲个故事。有一次，我出远门，经过大角点，燃料用完了。我绕着附近一条鲸鱼的鳍，它把我拉回了港口！

trans-unit.source: I'm Ian, by the by, and if you want to hear more of my stories, you'll have to wait for another time as I need to count my inventory.
trans-unit.target: 顺便说一句，我是伊恩，如果你想听听我的更多故事，你就得再等一次，因为我需要清点我的库存。

trans-unit.source: My kid just sent me an emoji story! He's two! It's just a bunch of emojis, but wow, he thought to do that for me. Man, do you have kids?
trans-unit.target: 我的孩子刚刚给我发了一个表情符号故事！他才两岁！这只是一堆表情符号，但哇，他想为我做这件事。伙计，你有孩子吗？

trans-unit.source: I do not and have no plans for them.
trans-unit.target: 我没有，也没有计划。

trans-unit.source: Me? Maybe one day, but not now.
trans-unit.target: 我？也许有一天，但不是现在。

trans-unit.source: Kids are a lot of work, but worth it. I remember I didn't have any plans for them myself, but when a 7 meter long swordfish almost took me out, I had a change of perspective.
trans-unit.target: 孩子们需要付出很多努力，但这是值得的。我记得我自己也没有为他们做任何计划，但当一条7米长的旗鱼差点把我带出去时，我改变了看法。

trans-unit.source: You might someday, who knows! It took me almost dying to finally want some. But it's up to you ultimately. Join us in the land of sleepless nights! Haha!
trans-unit.target: 也许有一天，谁知道呢！我几乎要死了，终于想要一些。但最终取决于你。加入我们，在不眠之夜的土地上！哈哈！

trans-unit.source: Did I tell ya about the time I was in Baton Rouge and almost got shipped off to Canada instead? It was a crazy night, let me tell you, and the beignetes were just as hot as the lead flying over my head! Haha! - Too many references
trans-unit.target: 我有没有告诉过你我在巴吞鲁日的时候，差点被运往加拿大？让我告诉你，那是一个疯狂的夜晚，米色的衣服和飞过我头顶的铅一样热！哈哈！-引用过多

trans-unit.source: You know Bowie?! That makes sense since you told me you're from White Ash Harbor. Man, that guy has some stories to tell. He's lived a long, epic, life! It's . . . it's impressive to say the least!
trans-unit.target: 你认识鲍伊吗？！这很有道理，因为你告诉我你来自白灰港。伙计，那家伙有故事要讲。他过着漫长而史诗般的生活！这是。至少可以说，这令人印象深刻！

trans-unit.source: When I chat with folks from all walks of life, its nice to hear their stories, to trade stories, because in the end we are all just characters in someone's story.
trans-unit.target: 当我和各行各业的人聊天时，很高兴听到他们的故事，交换故事，因为最终我们都只是某人故事中的角色。

trans-unit.source: Oh boy, Peter got into the finger paints at home! The couch is not an art installation, but these things happen when a parent has to, you know, go to the bathroom. Haha! I remember this one time . . . oop! Gotta get this call.
trans-unit.target: 哦，天哪，彼得在家里迷上了指画！沙发不是艺术装置，但当父母不得不去洗手间时，这些事情就会发生。哈哈！我记得有一次。哎呀！我必须接到这个电话。

trans-unit.source: Did you see the soccer match between the Devils and the Penguins?!
trans-unit.target: 你看魔鬼队和企鹅队的足球赛了吗？！

trans-unit.source: No, I didn't catch it.
trans-unit.target: 不，我没有抓住它。

trans-unit.source: I'm sorry, the what and the what?
trans-unit.target: 对不起，什么和什么？

trans-unit.source: Awwwww, man! You missed out of a great match! They were tied for a long time before Giovannone on the Penguins drove one in from a Devils pass! Insanity!!
trans-unit.target: 哇，伙计！你错过了一场精彩的比赛！他们打了很长一段时间，然后Giovannone在企鹅队从魔鬼传球中击出一球！疯了！！

trans-unit.source: You don't follow soccer? Why do you not like fun?
trans-unit.target: 你不关注足球吗？你为什么不喜欢娱乐？

trans-unit.source: I'll forget that one time when I was at a Gator match and the lead striker, Mendez, looked directly at me and threw me the game ball. I was 12 and it was a highlight in my childhood. I have that ball still to this day.
trans-unit.target: 我会忘记有一次我在Gator的比赛中，主前锋门德斯直视我，把比赛用球扔给了我。我12岁，这是我童年的一个亮点。直到今天，我仍然有那个球。

trans-unit.source: Uh, oh right! Hi! Yeah, I'm just getting some things together. I have my high school reunion coming up and I have to find a sitter for Peter so Gwen and I can go. It's going to be fun to go back and chat.
trans-unit.target: 哦，对了！你好！是的，我只是在整理一些东西。我的高中同学聚会就要到了，我得给彼得找个保姆，这样格温和我就可以去了。回去聊天会很有趣的。

trans-unit.source: I'm sorry? Oh, the reunion. Yeah, that was fun. It was good to chat with people from way back in the day. See how far I've come along and such.
trans-unit.target: 我很抱歉？哦，团聚。是啊，很有趣。从前和人聊天很愉快。看看我已经走了多远。

trans-unit.source: This one time I was playing a game of cards on the docks and this guy threw in a golden hook on the pot. I called him on his hand and I got it! If I ever lose a hand, at least I know I have an fancy replacement hanging out somewhere.
trans-unit.target: 有一次，我在码头玩纸牌游戏，有个家伙在锅上扔了一个金钩。我打电话给他的手，我得到了！如果我失去一只手，至少我知道我在某个地方有一个花哨的替代品。

trans-unit.source: I have something to confess, (playername). Not every story I have told has been true.
trans-unit.target: 我有件事要坦白。不是我讲的每一个故事都是真的。

trans-unit.source: Oh, oh you were expecting me to be shocked. One moment, WHAT?!
trans-unit.target: 哦，哦，你还以为我会震惊呢。等一下，什么？！

trans-unit.source: Why would you lie about your life like that, Ian?
trans-unit.target: 伊恩，你为什么要对自己的生活撒谎？

trans-unit.source: You knew? And here I thought I was being so sly about it.
trans-unit.target: 你知道？在这里，我以为我在这件事上太狡猾了。

trans-unit.source: For a lot of reasons, but while they might seem exceedingly shallow in nature, it doesn't feel like that to me.
trans-unit.target: 出于很多原因，虽然它们在本质上可能看起来非常肤浅，但对我来说并不是这样。

trans-unit.source: I have told you a lot of truths laced inside of the many stories I've told, so there's that. The mains reason why I haven't been that honest is beacuse my life is boring. There. I said it
trans-unit.target: 在我讲的许多故事中，我告诉了你很多真相，所以就是这样。我之所以没有那么诚实，主要是因为我的生活很无聊。我说了

trans-unit.source: I got married young and Gwen and I had a lot of laughs and love, but I didn't go anywhere far. I was never in danger or lived by the skin of my teeth and now my back hurts when I get out of bed the wrong way.
trans-unit.target: 我很早就结婚了，格温和我有很多欢笑和爱，但我没有走多远。我从未有过危险，也从未靠牙齿为生，现在当我以错误的方式起床时，我的背会疼。

trans-unit.source: Sorry I fibbed to you. It's just, no one sets out to live a boring life. I love being married and my son gives me so much joy, I just wish I had done some more foolish adventures pre-kid.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我骗了你。只是，没有人想过无聊的生活。我喜欢结婚，我的儿子给了我很多快乐，我只是希望我在孩子出生前能多做一些愚蠢的冒险。

trans-unit.source: I remember this one time I slept all night on the sidwalk to get tickets to see The Crickets. Made friends with some hobos that night who taught me their secret hobo language they use everywhere. That's a true story! I promise.
trans-unit.target: 我记得有一次，我在人行道上睡了一整晚，去买票看《蟋蟀》。那天晚上，我和一些流浪汉交上了朋友，他们教我他们在任何地方使用的秘密流浪汉语言。这是一个真实的故事！我保证。

trans-unit.source: 121_IAN_INTERACT
It's the hat, isn't it?
trans-unit.target: 这是帽子，不是吗？

trans-unit.source: Yep, it's the hat.
trans-unit.target: 是的，是帽子。

trans-unit.source: It was almost taken by a psychic with a grudge once, so thank you!
trans-unit.target: 有一次，它差点被一个心怀怨恨的通灵者拿走，所以谢谢你！

trans-unit.source: My fish is fresh and ready to eat!
trans-unit.target: 我的鱼很新鲜，可以吃了！

trans-unit.source: Oh, thanks!
trans-unit.target: 哦，谢谢！

trans-unit.source: I'd appreciate the help if you want to do it.
trans-unit.target: 如果你愿意帮忙，我将不胜感激。

trans-unit.source: No thanks. I got it.
trans-unit.target: 不用了，谢谢。我得到了它。

trans-unit.source: I could use this! Thanks!
trans-unit.target: 我可以用这个！谢谢！

trans-unit.source: I'm good.
trans-unit.target: 我很好。

trans-unit.source: I really liked it the first time you gave me one, but I really don't need two.
trans-unit.target: 我真的很喜欢你第一次给我的，但我真的不需要两个。

trans-unit.source: Bring it in!
trans-unit.target: 把它带进来！

trans-unit.source: I got too much happening tonight.
trans-unit.target: 今晚发生了太多事情。

trans-unit.source: I'm married, so no thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我结婚了，所以不用了，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: 122_THELIO
Oh, hi person I have never met before and didn't help out. I hope you are having a good day.
trans-unit.target: 哦，嗨，我以前从未见过的人，也没有帮忙。我希望你今天过得愉快。

trans-unit.source: I'm not on the clock yet, so I'm doing my own thing right now. Have a nice day.
trans-unit.target: 我还没上班，所以我现在正在做自己的事。祝您有个美好的一天。

trans-unit.source: How's your day going? I read in one of my self-help books that asking questions is a great way to have a conversation._It's a simple principle, but it works.
trans-unit.target: 你今天过得怎么样？我在一本自助书籍中读到，提问是进行对话的好方法_这是一个简单的原则，但它奏效了。

trans-unit.source: I am zonked! I unloaded four pallet's worth of inventory this morning. I might actually take a 15 minute break today.
trans-unit.target: 我醉了！今天早上我卸下了四托盘的库存。我今天可能会休息15分钟。

trans-unit.source: Looks like you're sticking around here, huh? As a lifelong citizen of this town, welcome.
trans-unit.target: 看起来你要留在这里，对吧？作为这个城市的终身公民，欢迎。

trans-unit.source: The library is a great first stop if you're new in town. They carry many books that cover many topics and it's a chill spot. Go.
trans-unit.target: 如果你是新来的，图书馆是一个很好的第一站。他们携带了许多涵盖许多主题的书籍，这是一个寒冷的地方。去吧。

trans-unit.source: I hope to one day be in your shoes, but minus the whole restaurant thing since that venture is far too risky for me._I gotta ask, how is it to run your own business?
trans-unit.target: 我希望有一天能站在你的立场上，但减去整个餐厅的事情，因为那次冒险对我来说太冒险了。我得问，如何经营自己的企业？

trans-unit.source: I get to steer my business where I want it to be.
trans-unit.target: 我可以把我的生意引向我想要的地方。

trans-unit.source: It's a lot of work, but I don't mind it.
trans-unit.target: 工作量很大，但我不介意。

trans-unit.source: That's what I want too! One day that is. . . I am learning as much as I can from business books, newsletters, and podcasts.
trans-unit.target: 这也是我想要的！有一天。我正在从商业书籍、时事通讯和播客中尽可能多地学习。

trans-unit.source: . . . I apologize about that comment. Ugh, look, I don't get to chat with people about what I actually want to do in the future._So, my opinions come out more often than not when I do.
trans-unit.target: . . . 我为这一评论道歉。啊，听着，我不能和别人谈论我未来真正想做什么_所以，当我这样做的时候，我的意见往往会出来。

trans-unit.source: Do you meditate? If you don't, you really should. I just started doing it about last year I think and it's been very nice._I don't believe in all of the heal powers nonsense, but I know it has helped me a lot mentally.
trans-unit.target: 你冥想吗？如果你不这样做，你真的应该这样做。我想我去年才开始做这件事，而且做得很好_我不相信所有关于治愈力量的无稽之谈，但我知道这在精神上对我帮助很大。

trans-unit.source: It's hard to remember in the heat of the moment to take a breath and center yourself. Rage is a fire that feels good to burn inside of sometimes.
trans-unit.target: 在最热的时候，很难记住呼吸和集中注意力。愤怒是一种有时内心燃烧起来感觉很好的火。

trans-unit.source: I mean it when I say that I wouldn't change a thing about my life thus far because everything has led to me being here._Where would the other roads have taken me? I don't know, but I don't care.
trans-unit.target: 我的意思是，到目前为止，我不会改变我生活中的任何事情，因为一切都让我来到这里_其他道路会带我去哪里？我不知道，但我不在乎。

trans-unit.source: If you'll excuse me, (playername), I've got a lot going on right now, but let's connect later.
trans-unit.target: 如果你能原谅我，(playername)，我现在有很多事情要做，但让我们稍后再联系。

trans-unit.source: Do you think that haunted building up on the hill will ever open one day? Man I hope so. It looks so dope!
trans-unit.target: 你认为山上那座闹鬼的建筑有一天会开放吗？我希望如此。它看起来太棒了！

trans-unit.source: If I ramble a bit too much about meditation and anger and all that, it's because I am trying very hard to work on those things._I wanted to clarify that I'm not a nut, just a man who's trying to do better.
trans-unit.target: 如果我对冥想、愤怒和所有这些说得太多，那是因为我正在努力做这些事情_我想澄清一下，我不是一个疯子，只是一个想做得更好的人。

trans-unit.source: If I meditated too much I'd fall asleep.
trans-unit.target: 如果我冥想太多，我会睡着的。

trans-unit.source: It's alright. We are all a work in-progress.
trans-unit.target: 没关系。我们都是一项正在进行的工作。

trans-unit.source: You can never meditate too much . . . unless you're my dad, who meditates heavily after a turkey dinner. Ha!
trans-unit.target: 你永远不能冥想太多。除非你是我爸爸，他吃完火鸡大餐后会大量冥想。哈！

trans-unit.source: Thanks, it means a lot to hear that from someone who isn't Milo or Hasel._They're supportive of me, but sometimes I wonder if they're just being nice. So, thanks.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，从一个不是米洛或哈塞尔的人那里听到这句话意义重大_他们支持我，但有时我怀疑他们是否只是出于善意。所以，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: If you're wondering how I got these scars, it wasn't because of a shaving accident.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想知道我是怎么留下这些疤痕的，那不是因为剃须事故。

trans-unit.source: I used to get into fights, a lot of fights, as a teenager. I took every off comment is a critique against my character. I . . . I really messed up a lot of people.
trans-unit.target: 我十几岁的时候经常打架，很多打架。我删除的每一条评论都是对我性格的批评。一、我真的搞砸了很多人。

trans-unit.source: Did you hear that a new sewing shop opened in town? I am going to head straight there after work._Would rather pour money into local businesses than Black Forest online marketplace.
trans-unit.target: 你听说城里开了一家新的缝纫店吗？下班后我要直接去那里。我宁愿把钱投入当地企业，也不愿投资黑森林在线市场。

trans-unit.source: Anger often comes from trying to control something that is uncontrollable._My past is beyond me now and learning to let that go has been a long process. But I got today and today has been good.
trans-unit.target: 愤怒往往来自试图控制无法控制的事情_我的过去已经超越了我，学会放下过去是一个漫长的过程。但我得到了今天，今天很好。

trans-unit.source: Milo is one of the nicest people in town although he can be a little too truthful sometimes._Here's the thing though, you won't find a better tailor within a 100 miles. Check out his shop.
trans-unit.target: 米洛是镇上最善良的人之一，尽管他有时可能有点太诚实了_不过，事情是这样的，在100英里内你找不到更好的裁缝。看看他的商店。

trans-unit.source: What really changed my perspective on life was my grandfather. He . . . he died. Before going, he set me straight because he . . ._. . .He saw what my choices had done to my life.
trans-unit.target: 真正改变我人生观的是我的祖父。他。他死了。出发前，他纠正了我的错误，因为他。他看到了我的选择对我的生活造成的影响。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes getting some perspective helps.
trans-unit.target: 有时，获得一些视角会有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: He loved you enough to say the hard truths.
trans-unit.target: 他爱你到足以说出残酷的事实。

trans-unit.source: Right?! If he hadn't done that, I probably would be dead by now.
trans-unit.target: 正确的如果他没有那样做，我现在可能已经死了。

trans-unit.source: Fact is, when he told me that I was pissed, and didn't talk to him until his last day in the hospital._Anger makes you do stupid things.
trans-unit.target: 事实上，当他告诉我我很生气，直到他住院的最后一天才和他说话_愤怒会让你做蠢事。

trans-unit.source: One thing I do to help get the anger out is to bake bread. Kneading the dough, hitting it, that force gives it shape and makes something from the energy you give it._It's better than therapy, something I should be doing still, ha!
trans-unit.target: 为了发泄愤怒，我做的一件事就是烤面包。揉捏面团，击打它，这种力量使它成形，并从你给予它的能量中制造出一些东西。这比治疗好，这是我应该做的，哈哈！

trans-unit.source: If you really want to try baking, come by my place when Milo is there too. We usually do baking nights on Thursdays.
trans-unit.target: 如果你真的想尝试烘焙，当米洛也在的时候来我家。我们通常在星期四做烘焙之夜。

trans-unit.source: I've learned this from my time in customer service:_If anyone asks if you can check the backroom for an item, say yes, and go and check your feed for twenty minutes in the backroom._They'll think you tried and you get an extra break.
trans-unit.target: 我在客户服务部门学到了这一点：如果有人问你是否可以在后台查看某个项目，说可以，然后去后台查看你的订阅源20分钟_他们会认为你尽力了，你会得到额外的休息。

trans-unit.source: I wonder if I'll ever meet anyone who will love me for who I am today despite of who I was in the past? I dunno if I'm honest.
trans-unit.target: 我想知道，无论我过去是谁，我是否还会遇到一个会因为今天的我而爱我的人？我不知道我是否诚实。

trans-unit.source: I played in the woods all the time as a kid. I found so many cool and odd things out there._You owe yourself a walk out there if you haven't gone yet.
trans-unit.target: 我小时候一直在树林里玩。我发现外面有很多很酷很奇怪的东西_如果你还没走，你应该出去走走。

trans-unit.source: Do you think that people can change from outside forces?
trans-unit.target: 你认为人们可以从外部力量中改变吗？

trans-unit.source: Most people are incapable of massive change.
trans-unit.target: 大多数人无法进行大规模的变革。

trans-unit.source: You need to be open to it.
trans-unit.target: 你需要对此持开放态度。

trans-unit.source: That's rather pessimistic . . . I think you're wrong, but only because I have changed myself . . . At least, I thought so.
trans-unit.target: 这太悲观了。我认为你错了，但这只是因为我改变了自己。至少，我是这么认为的。

trans-unit.source: Yeah, I think you have to want it. You know something isn't working, but you can't see it yourself. You need that outside force to really guide you through it.
trans-unit.target: 是的，我认为你必须想要它。你知道有些东西不起作用，但你自己看不见。你需要外界的力量来真正引导你度过难关。

trans-unit.source: Changing your mind is one of the easiest and hardest things to do because it means that you were probably wrong about somethings._And people hate being wrong.
trans-unit.target: 改变主意是最容易也最难做到的事情之一，因为这意味着你可能对某些事情错了_人们讨厌犯错。

trans-unit.source: A few years ago I was walking to school and saw a stop sign laying on the ground. It had blood and dirt on it._I dunno what happened, but I always hoped everyone was okay.
trans-unit.target: 几年前，我步行去学校，看到地上有一个停车标志。上面有血迹和污垢。我不知道发生了什么，但我一直希望每个人都没事。

trans-unit.source: Something I started doing to get out some anger was taking kick-boxing classes._I would slam the full body bags with everything I had. Problem was it didn't do enough for me. I had to re-route my anger too, not just release it.
trans-unit.target: 为了发泄愤怒，我开始上跆拳道课_我会把我所有的东西都塞进全身的袋子里。问题是这对我来说还不够。我也必须重新安排我的愤怒，而不仅仅是释放它。

trans-unit.source: I see people day in and out and I know where most are coming from and it isn't always a good place._I hope when they hear me say 'Have a good day' they take it to heart. An act of kindness goes far, even if it's just a 'Have a nice day.'
trans-unit.target: 我每天都能看到人们进进出出，我知道大多数人来自哪里，但这并不总是一个好地方_我希望当他们听到我说“祝你今天过得愉快”时，他们会铭记在心。即使只是一句“祝你今天过得愉快”，善意的行为也会产生深远的影响

trans-unit.source: Just an fyi, don't head over to East Beach. It's a spot that's known for bad vibes and bad things happening at it at night. Trust me.
trans-unit.target: 只是一个提醒，不要去东海滩。这是一个以糟糕的氛围和晚上发生的坏事而闻名的地方。相信我。

trans-unit.source: You being with me, wanting to be in a relationship . . . I am glad.
trans-unit.target: 你和我在一起，想谈恋爱。我很高兴。

trans-unit.source: Of course! You're a lovely soul.
trans-unit.target: 当然！你是一个可爱的灵魂。

trans-unit.source: I'm glad you reciprocated my gladness.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴你回应了我的快乐。

trans-unit.source: Just, with everything that has gone on in my life, I never thought anyone would have wanted me. I guess all that onion work has paid off. Ha!
trans-unit.target: 只是，在我生命中发生的一切中，我从未想过有人会想要我。我想所有的洋葱工作都得到了回报。哈！

trans-unit.source: I'm glad that you're glad that we're in a constant state of gladness together.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴你很高兴我们一直在一起。

trans-unit.source: I am going to work harder than anyone else to make sure we have a future together that is in the black and pulling in savings at 10%.
trans-unit.target: 我将比任何人都更努力地工作，以确保我们共同拥有一个盈利的未来，并节省10%的开支。

trans-unit.source: Us, this couldn't have happened unless I cared about myself first. Does that make sense?_Because if I didn't care about myself, love myself, then I would've been bashing brains in on East Beach for credits still. It feels good to be here.
trans-unit.target: 我们，除非我先关心自己，否则这不可能发生。这有道理吗？_因为如果我不关心自己、不爱自己，那么我就会为了信用点而拼命在东海滩拼命。在这里感觉很好。

trans-unit.source: When I have my own business, we will dine in places with chandeliers and a dress code. I promise you.
trans-unit.target: 当我有自己的生意时，我们会在有枝形吊灯和着装要求的地方吃饭。我向你保证。

trans-unit.source: You have no idea how inspiring it is that someone as successful as you was even interested in me._I'm not going to compete against you, that's not the point, but I hope our relationship will push us both to be our best.
trans-unit.target: 你不知道像你这样成功的人甚至对我感兴趣，这有多鼓舞人心。我不会和你竞争，这不是重点，但我希望我们的关系能让我们都做到最好。

trans-unit.source: When the moon is gone, and the sun has shone its last ray, I will be there with you._. . . I . . . I will be happy because our souls knew one another for a brief moment in time.
trans-unit.target: 当月亮走了，太阳照完了最后一缕光，我会和你在一起。一、我会很高兴，因为我们的灵魂在很短的一段时间内就认识了。

trans-unit.source: 122_THELIO_PROGRESSION
trans-unit.target: 122-Thelio-Progress

trans-unit.source: Le Sequoia is open?! YOU DID IT! Look at you and your shiny new restaurant! Yeah!
trans-unit.target: 乐红杉开放了吗？！你做到了！看看你和你闪亮的新餐厅！是 啊！

trans-unit.source: Everyone's a critic, but sometimes you know that to spring forward. That's how I feel, anyway.
trans-unit.target: 每个人都是批评家，但有时你知道要挺身而出。不管怎样，这就是我的感受。

trans-unit.source: I read that a hot bath can really sooth someone. I'll have to check it out. Thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我听说洗个热水澡真的能让人放松。我得去看看。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: People are talking a lot right now about Le Sequoia. All good things, all good things. You got this.
trans-unit.target: 现在人们对Le Sequoia议论纷纷。一切好事，一切好事。你得到了这个。

trans-unit.source: I read a review about the teahouse and it sounds like a very calming place. I think I need that in my life too.
trans-unit.target: 我读了一篇关于茶馆的评论，听起来这是一个非常平静的地方。我想我的生活中也需要它。

trans-unit.source: Doing work around town? Good on you.
trans-unit.target: 在城里工作？你干得好。

trans-unit.source: Keep up the good work there, (playername). It helps more than you know.
trans-unit.target: 继续干得好，(playername)。它比你所知道的更有帮助。

trans-unit.source: I heard you have some great pastries and baked goods on your menu? I'll have to see it sometime._And remember to come here if you need more baking ingredients!
trans-unit.target: 我听说你们的菜单上有一些很棒的糕点和烘焙食品？我总有一天会去看的_如果你需要更多的烘焙原料，记得来这里！

trans-unit.source: My goodness gracious, that menu of yours is a wonder! I really want to try it all out.
trans-unit.target: 我的天哪，你的菜单太棒了！我真的很想尝试一下。

trans-unit.source: Ah, your menu. Uhhhh, I'm sure it's food that someone wants. Not me though. I'm not a fan of seafood.
trans-unit.target: 啊，你的菜单。嗯，我敢肯定这是有人想要的食物。但不是我。我不喜欢海鲜。

trans-unit.source: I am good. I don't need to eat off your menu. I smell fish all day already. I don't want to eat it.
trans-unit.target: 我很好。我不需要吃你菜单上的东西。我整天都在闻鱼的味道。我不想吃它。

trans-unit.source: As a person who sells stuff that makes trash, I am torn on my spot in the ecosystem food chain, but I am glad to see you're setting an example to follow.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个卖垃圾的人，我在生态系统食物链中的位置很纠结，但我很高兴看到你树立了一个榜样。

trans-unit.source: I, and other shops, look up to you and what you're doing._Making money, finding success, without having to sacrifice our local environment. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: I、 和其他商店，仰望你和你在做什么_在不牺牲当地环境的情况下赚钱，取得成功。非常感谢。

trans-unit.source: I hate it, I hate that everything is in plastic and that no one seems to have a better idea on how to do it._I thought you might, but hey, everyone's just trying to survive.
trans-unit.target: 我讨厌它，我讨厌所有东西都是塑料的，而且似乎没有人对如何做到这一点有更好的想法。我以为你可能会，但嘿，每个人都只是在努力生存。

trans-unit.source: Man, the trash is really piling up these days. I know I'm not the best actor either, but I think something needs to be done.
trans-unit.target: 天哪，这些天垃圾真的堆积如山。我知道我也不是最好的演员，但我认为需要做点什么。

trans-unit.source: I really do shower and have very good personal hygiene. I know it's weird to say, but I really want that known.
trans-unit.target: 我确实会洗澡，个人卫生也很好。我知道这么说很奇怪，但我真的很想知道。

trans-unit.source: My onion is a good one and seeing all that idea sell out so fast tells me as such.
trans-unit.target: 我的洋葱是一个很好的洋葱，看到所有的想法这么快就销售一空，我就知道了这一点。

trans-unit.source: The owner of this shop, Shannon, she's coming in soon to check on it and I cannot wait to show her the display.
trans-unit.target: 这家店的老板Shannon很快就会来看看，我等不及要给她看橱窗了。

trans-unit.source: I still can't quite wrap my head around the fact that have manifested my dream by making it known to others. WHAT A RIDE!
trans-unit.target: 我仍然无法完全理解这样一个事实，即我的梦想已经通过让别人知道来实现。多么惊险的一程啊！

trans-unit.source: Thank you again, and again, (playername) for helping me._It would have taken me so much longer to do this because I am terrible at meeting new people.
trans-unit.target: 一次又一次地感谢你(playername)帮助我。我做这件事需要更长的时间，因为我不善于结识新朋友。

trans-unit.source: I was thinking I might change the name, but . . . the brand is too well known to folks here._It would be a mistake both financially and culturally.
trans-unit.target: 我想我可能会改名，但是。这个品牌在这里太出名了_这在经济和文化上都是一个错误。

trans-unit.source: 122_THELIO_INTERACT
trans-unit.target: 122_日光交互

trans-unit.source: With these scars it's a wonder that you're not scared of me.
trans-unit.target: 有了这些伤疤，你居然不怕我，真是奇迹。

trans-unit.source: I have to wear this to work.
trans-unit.target: 我必须穿这个去上班。

trans-unit.source: Cool?
trans-unit.target: 太酷了！

trans-unit.source: I am literally only doing this job to save up for a new stand mixer.
trans-unit.target: 我做这项工作只是为了攒钱买一台新的立式搅拌机。

trans-unit.source: Raw raw, yay minimum wage?
trans-unit.target: 生的，最低工资？

trans-unit.source: I need some help.
trans-unit.target: 我需要一些帮助。

trans-unit.source: No thanks.
trans-unit.target: 不用了，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Hey, that's fantastic! I can enjoy this before bed.
trans-unit.target: 嘿，太棒了！我可以在睡前享受这个。

trans-unit.source: Yup, I like milk. You know it!
trans-unit.target: 是的，我喜欢牛奶。你知道的！

trans-unit.source: Excellent! Tasty AND nutritious. What more could a guy ask for?
trans-unit.target: 杰出的！美味又营养。一个男人还能要求什么？

trans-unit.source: Whoa, this looks valuable! Not really my jam, but I'll hold onto it for you (playername). Just let go now . . .
trans-unit.target: 哇，这看起来很值钱！这不是我的果酱，但我会为你(playername)保留它。现在放手吧。

trans-unit.source: You remembered my birthday (playername)! And look, you brought my favorite!
trans-unit.target: 你还记得我的生日！看，你带来了我最喜欢的！

trans-unit.source: If it can not be used to better myself, then it is not needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果它不能用来改善自己，那么就不需要了。

trans-unit.source: Thanks for the effort (playername), but I don't have much use for this.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你的努力(playername)，但我对此没有多大用处。

trans-unit.source: Nope. Nada.
trans-unit.target: 不，不行。没什么。

trans-unit.source: I got something from you today. I don't need more.
trans-unit.target: 我今天从你那里得到了一些东西。我不需要更多。

trans-unit.source: You smell like so many things right now. Hug me when you're clean!
trans-unit.target: 你现在闻起来像很多东西。干净的时候抱抱我！

trans-unit.source: I'm pulling a double shift today. Another time.
trans-unit.target: 我今天要上两班。下次吧。

trans-unit.source: Sells general ingredients
trans-unit.target: 销售一般配料

trans-unit.source: Hi, welcome! If you need any help, please ask.
trans-unit.target: 嗨，欢迎！如果你需要任何帮助，请问。

trans-unit.source: We just got a fresh shipment and are restocked!
trans-unit.target: 我们刚收到一批新货，正在补货！

trans-unit.source: Thank you for coming to Bits n Pieces! We sell everything!
trans-unit.target: 感谢您来到Bits n Pieces！我们什么都卖！

trans-unit.source: If you can't find what you need here, it probably doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在这里找不到你需要的东西，它可能不存在。

trans-unit.source: We sell just about anything here, but not bodies, contrary to what you might have heard.
trans-unit.target: 我们这里几乎什么都卖，但不卖尸体，这与你可能听说的相反。

trans-unit.source: It's a great price!
trans-unit.target: 这是一个很好的价格！

trans-unit.source: That's my last one!
trans-unit.target: 这是我最后一个！

trans-unit.source: You have a great eye!
trans-unit.target: 你的眼光真好！

trans-unit.source: Wow, I'll take it.
trans-unit.target: 哇，我要了。

trans-unit.source: I think that'll sell well here.
trans-unit.target: 我认为它在这里会卖得很好。

trans-unit.source: Stop talking, I'm buying it.
trans-unit.target: 别说了，我买了。

trans-unit.source: I don't want it on my shelves, thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我不想把它放在我的书架上，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: If you can't take a hint, here's this, I hate it.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不明白我的意思，那么就这样吧，我讨厌它。

trans-unit.source: I really can't sell this here. Stop asking.
trans-unit.target: 我真的不能在这里卖这个。别问了。

trans-unit.source: I can't extend credit. You have to have credits.
trans-unit.target: 我不能提供信贷。你必须有信用点。

trans-unit.source: How do you afford rent with nothing in your account?
trans-unit.target: 你的账户里什么都没有，你怎么能负担得起房租？

trans-unit.source: I wish I could help.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我能帮忙。

trans-unit.source: 123_LUCIUS
trans-unit.target: 123_卢修斯

trans-unit.source: (playername), I am enduring this place because I see so much potential in you._You must understand that if it were up to me, I would've been gone on that train as soon as I was done eating at Le Sequoia._Every day I am here pains me.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，我之所以能忍受这个地方，是因为我看到了你的巨大潜力_你必须明白，如果由我决定的话，我一在红杉餐厅吃完饭就上火车了_我在这里的每一天都让我很痛苦。

trans-unit.source: I cannot believe you left Billboard City for this . . . place._There are spots in BC, tiny stalls with a single cooktop, that give more to the culture at large than this entire hotel.
trans-unit.target: 我不敢相信你为了这个离开了Billboard City。地点_不列颠哥伦比亚省有一些地方，只有一个炉灶的小摊位，比整个酒店更能体现整个文化。

trans-unit.source: Hotel Rose is the best one in the area and I find it sorely lacking._How does a place like this dare call themselves a hotel? Motel more like it.
trans-unit.target: 玫瑰酒店是该地区最好的酒店，我发现它非常缺乏_这样的地方怎么敢自称酒店？汽车旅馆更像它。

trans-unit.source: Have you noticed the smell of fish around here? Why hasn't the city council done anything about it?_Why aren't there candle shops everywhere selling scented candles to cover the fish smell?
trans-unit.target: 你注意到这附近有鱼的味道了吗？为什么市议会没有对此采取任何行动_为什么到处都没有蜡烛店卖香薰蜡烛来掩盖鱼的味道？

trans-unit.source: Your performance during my review was . . . decent._You show promise, which is the only reason why I am still here talking to you.
trans-unit.target: 你在我的复习中的表现是。体面_你表现出了承诺，这就是我还在这里和你说话的唯一原因。

trans-unit.source: I am bored. I have been trying to find things to do around here, but the locals are not receptive to my inquiries._What a bunch of rude people! I will have to walk around and find things for myself.
trans-unit.target: 我很无聊。我一直在这里找事情做，但当地人不接受我的询问_真是一群粗鲁的人！我必须四处走走，为自己找点东西。

trans-unit.source: When you approach a dish, what is your method to understand that it is the correct choice for your establishment?_How do you choose your dishes?
trans-unit.target: 当你走近一道菜时，你的方法是什么来理解它是你的餐厅的正确选择_你是怎么选菜的？

trans-unit.source: It has to match with the menu.
trans-unit.target: 它必须与菜单相匹配。

trans-unit.source: It has to taste so good.
trans-unit.target: 它一定很好吃。

trans-unit.source: Philosophy? I didn't realize I was dealing with Plato the chef! Intriguing to say the least.
trans-unit.target: 哲学？我没意识到我在和厨师柏拉图打交道！至少可以说很有趣。

trans-unit.source: Taste is important, clearly, but I am not hearing how that item would work against the other items on your menu._A lack of vision can kill a restaurant, trust me, I've made it happen.
trans-unit.target: 味道很重要，很明显，但我没有听说这道菜与菜单上的其他菜会如何搭配_缺乏远见会毁掉一家餐厅，相信我，我做到了。

trans-unit.source: A restaurant isn't just a place that makes food, it is an experience._That's what people pay for when they come into Le Sequoia, because any idiot with an internet connection can make food. Give them a reason to give you their money.
trans-unit.target: 餐厅不仅仅是一个制作食物的地方，更是一种体验_这就是人们进入Le Sequoia时所支付的费用，因为任何有互联网连接的白痴都可以制作食物。给他们一个理由把钱给你。

trans-unit.source: I strive to sieve out the obvious and the terrible, I have never been given respect for my efforts._So, the fear I have is the respect I get and I intend to use it to make things happen in the manner I see fit.
trans-unit.target: 我努力筛除显而易见的和可怕的，我的努力从未得到过尊重_所以，我的恐惧是我得到的尊重，我打算用它来让事情以我认为合适的方式发生。

trans-unit.source: I could have decades of work erased because of the will of some idiotic editor._It is why I've invested into a few restaurants, a mobile entertainment platform, and found these investments are the start of my own fortune, but I want more.
trans-unit.target: 我可能会因为某个愚蠢的编辑的意愿而删除几十年的工作_这就是为什么我投资了几家餐馆，一个移动娱乐平台，发现这些投资是我自己财富的开始，但我想要更多。

trans-unit.source: Developing your style, your renown is vital to your future._Being allowed access into the minds of anyone for free is a power that even the biggest marketing budgets haven't been able to crack.
trans-unit.target: 发展你的风格，你的声誉对你的未来至关重要_被允许免费进入任何人的思想是一种即使是最大的营销预算也无法破解的力量。

trans-unit.source: Looking around here, outside of a few vendors, I've found nothing of note._Although, there is a man that goes by the name of Bowie whom I especially loath. He will not stop talking to me! It's infruitating!
trans-unit.target: 环顾四周，除了几家供应商，我没有发现任何值得注意的东西_虽然，有一个叫鲍伊的人，我特别讨厌他。他不会停止跟我说话的！这是侵权！

trans-unit.source: I've been seeing your name pop up more and more in the world of culinary newsletters._This means I can ask you a very important question:_Do you want to change the culinary industry?
trans-unit.target: 我看到你的名字越来越多地出现在烹饪通讯的世界里_这意味着我可以问你一个非常重要的问题：你想改变烹饪行业吗？

trans-unit.source: I do, but what's the catch?
trans-unit.target: 我知道，但有什么问题吗？

trans-unit.source: What does that even mean?
trans-unit.target: 这到底是什么意思？

trans-unit.source: Good, good. Wanting to change the system is the first step.
