trans-unit.target: 很好。想要改变制度是第一步。

trans-unit.source: It means, do you have what it takes to change the system that pushed you out here into the sticks? Do you?
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，你有能力改变把你推到困境的制度吗？你…吗？

trans-unit.source: I will go over my plans another time, but I posit my question now._I feel there is a need to address the root of the problem that is rotting culinary world from the inside out._I'm glad that you are at least curious about this endeavor.
trans-unit.target: 我将在下次再讨论我的计划，但我现在提出我的问题_我觉得有必要从内到外解决烹饪世界腐烂的根本问题_我很高兴你至少对这项努力感到好奇。

trans-unit.source: Your ability to cook will only last so long and once you are old, no one will want to keep eating the food you are making._You won't be fresh or interesting anymore . . . you'll be old, and easily forgotten.
trans-unit.target: 你的烹饪能力只能持续这么长时间，一旦你老了，没有人会想继续吃你做的食物_你将不再新鲜或有趣。你会变老，很容易被遗忘。

trans-unit.source: I see the end of my career coming faster and faster each day and I know that staying relevant is hard._Making something with the reputation you have now will help with carry you through toward the end.
trans-unit.target: 我看到我的职业生涯每天都在越来越快地结束，我知道保持相关性很难_用你现在的声誉做点什么，将有助于你走到最后。

trans-unit.source: Money moves this world (playername), and the sooner you get to the money, the longer you will have to enjoy it.
trans-unit.target: 金钱会改变这个世界(playername)，你越早拿到钱，就越能享受它。

trans-unit.source: I found a peaceful spot. It's called the Lonely Cliffs. I stood there surrounded by silence for a considerable amount of time._I . . . I've never felt such quiet ever in my life. It was lovely.
trans-unit.target: 我找到了一个宁静的地方。它被称为孤独悬崖。我站在那里沉默了相当长的一段时间_一、我这辈子从未感到如此安静。它很可爱。

trans-unit.source: I cannot make you do what I believe is the right thing here. Do you want to make frozen meals with me and together we will profit beyond our imaginations?_How about it (playername)?
trans-unit.target: 我不能强迫你做我认为正确的事。你想和我一起做冷冻餐吗？我们一起能获得超乎想象的利润吗_怎么样(playername)？

trans-unit.source: Yes, let's get started.
trans-unit.target: 好的，我们开始吧。

trans-unit.source: Money isn't worth diluting myself for it.
trans-unit.target: 金钱不值得为此稀释自己。

trans-unit.source: Excellent! I will have my lawyer draw up the paperwork and we will get started._I have many connections in the industry, so I know this will be a massive success.
trans-unit.target: 杰出的！我会让我的律师起草文书，然后我们就可以开始了_我在这个行业有很多人脉，所以我知道这将是一个巨大的成功。

trans-unit.source: I expected to hear that answer, I didn't want it, but I expected it._Pride is the downfall of many civilizations and people, keep that in mind, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我期待听到这个答案，我不想要，但我期待着。_骑行是许多文明和人民的衰落，记住这一点，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Frozen food isn't meant to be a culinary masterpiece._It may even seem hypocritical that I am pushing to make frozen foods with you since I love the culinary world_But that world will leave you behind as soon as you get gray hairs.
trans-unit.target: 冷冻食品并不意味着是烹饪的杰作_甚至可能看起来很虚伪，因为我喜欢烹饪世界，所以我在推动和你一起做冷冻食品，但一旦你头发变白，这个世界就会把你甩在后面。

trans-unit.source: When it comes down to it, you have to look out for yourself because no one else will, (playername)._Think about it, the money from the frozen food sales could be used to start fifty new restaurants.
trans-unit.target: 归根结底，你必须照顾好自己，因为没有人会这样做(playername)_想想看，冷冻食品销售的钱可以用来开50家新餐馆。

trans-unit.source: Everyone is looking for their angle in how to make money. Skill is one of them, but scale is another._The road I am setting out for us would benefit not only myself, but you as well, and any kin you have along the way.
trans-unit.target: 每个人都在寻找自己赚钱的角度。技能是其中之一，但规模是另一个_我为我们开辟的道路不仅对我自己有利，对你也有好处，对你一路上的任何亲戚都有好处。

trans-unit.source: Legacy doesn't feed the stomach, only the ego, and I am planning to be quite full.
trans-unit.target: 遗产不能填饱肚子，只能填饱自我，我打算吃饱。

trans-unit.source: I am quiet haunted by my visit to this town. I have been shown a side of life I never knew could exist. I . . . I see why you like it here. The people here are unique as is this place. The visit has been enjoyable.
trans-unit.target: 我对这个城镇的访问感到很困扰。我看到了生活中我从来不知道会存在的一面。一、我明白你为什么喜欢这里了。这里的人和这个地方一样独特。这次访问很愉快。

trans-unit.source: Ignore
trans-unit.target: 忽略

trans-unit.source: 123_LUCIUS_PROGRESSION
trans-unit.target: 123-Lucius-Progress

trans-unit.source: Le Sequoia huh? The legacy of the great chef Vincent Casteau. What will you do . . . to do his legacy justice?
trans-unit.target: 红杉？伟大厨师文森特·卡斯托的遗产。你会怎么做。为他的遗产伸张正义？

trans-unit.source: My review is polished and cannot be questioned. I gave you my thoughts in words for you to read._Do not ask me to interpret them to you like a child. Have some self-respect!
trans-unit.target: 我的评论很精彩，不容置疑。我把我的想法用文字告诉你，让你读_不要让我像孩子一样给你解释。有点自尊！

trans-unit.source: It's a lovely building and will provide yet another reason for people to visit this . . . place. It will pair well with your restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 这是一座美丽的建筑，将为人们参观这座建筑提供另一个理由。地点。它与你的餐厅很相配。

trans-unit.source: What you have done with Le Sequoia is beyond fantastic._As people hear and read about it, it will grow in their minds like . . . well, a tree._Taking root there with your name living among its branches.
trans-unit.target: 你对红杉所做的一切太棒了_当人们听到和读到它时，它会在他们的脑海中成长，就像。嗯，一棵树_在那里扎根，你的名字住在树枝间。

trans-unit.source: I suppose it is a rather quiant place._I wasn't asked to review it and in fact was told by some woman with some odd points in her hair that 'If I say a word about it in my newsletter, it'll be the end of me.'_Can you believe that? All over a teahouse!
trans-unit.target: 我想这是一个相当奇特的地方_我没有被要求复习它，事实上，一些头发上有点奇怪的女人告诉我，“如果我在通讯中说一句话，我就完了。”你能相信吗？到处都是茶馆！

trans-unit.source: Oh, you're taking time to help people with their menial problems? Why? Strange hobby for a supposed professional chef.
trans-unit.target: 哦，你在花时间帮助人们解决他们的琐碎问题吗？为什么？一个所谓的专业厨师的奇怪爱好。

trans-unit.source: You're still doing this? . . . I will never fully understand your brain and why it does what it does.
trans-unit.target: 你还在做这个吗。我永远不会完全理解你的大脑，以及它为什么会这样做。

trans-unit.source: You have a very selective and educated menu. I surmise that it will gather attention and deliver on the expectations it creates._Having some creative frozen treats on the menu doesn't hurt your cause.
trans-unit.target: 你们的菜单非常有选择性和教育性。我猜测，它将吸引人们的注意力，并实现它所创造的期望_菜单上有一些有创意的冷冻食物不会损害你的事业。

trans-unit.source: You menu is great. But pushing my duty as a critic aside, I have soft spot for frozen treats._I'll even occassionaly enjoy some mass produced store shelf ice cream. Can you believe it?
trans-unit.target: 你的菜单很棒。但抛开我作为评论家的职责，我对冷冻食品情有独钟_我甚至偶尔会喜欢一些大批量生产的商店货架冰淇淋。你能相信吗？

trans-unit.source: Your menu, it is boring and pedantic. Especially with your focus on mixology. Can it even be considered food? More like a hydrating snack.
trans-unit.target: 你的菜单，既无聊又迂腐。尤其是当你专注于调酒的时候。它甚至可以被视为食物吗？更像是一种保湿零食。

trans-unit.source: I find cereal boxes to be more inventive than what you are providing on your . . . menu. Having a focus on beverages doesn't help your cause.
trans-unit.target: 我发现麦片盒比你在…上提供的更有创意。菜单。专注于饮料对你的事业没有帮助。

trans-unit.source: As we make more money, there will be a cost, but it doesn't matter so long as we are better for it.
trans-unit.target: 随着我们赚更多的钱，也会有代价，但只要我们做得更好，这并不重要。

trans-unit.source: You have done so well in expanding your ambitions and your reach. This will only help fill your pockets.
trans-unit.target: 你在扩大你的野心和影响力方面做得很好。这只会帮你装满口袋。

trans-unit.source: Why are you wasting my time with discussions about 'environmental impact'? Don't fret about such things and just get to work.
trans-unit.target: 你为什么浪费我的时间讨论“环境影响”？别为这些事情烦恼，赶紧开始工作吧。

trans-unit.source: Sure, you are being responsible for your trash, but at what cost?_You are losing out on so much by being careful and worrying about the needs of others. Stop it!
trans-unit.target: 当然，你要对你的垃圾负责，但代价是什么_你因为小心和担心别人的需求而失去了很多。住手！

trans-unit.source: I am still in shock that we did it. We got Yum Yum to buy our product. This will lead us toward our riches, I promise.
trans-unit.target: 我们做到了，我仍然很震惊。我们让百胜买了我们的产品。我保证，这将引领我们走向财富。

trans-unit.source: As long as we stick together, we will rise to the top, together.
trans-unit.target: 只要我们团结起来，我们就会一起登上顶峰。

trans-unit.source: Harvesting as much as possible from our products is the key to ensuring that our riches arrive sooner rather than later.
trans-unit.target: 尽可能多地从我们的产品中收获是确保我们的财富尽早到来的关键。

trans-unit.source: My name plus your ideas have made the cookbook a success! From here, we will only continue to climb.
trans-unit.target: 我的名字加上你的想法使这本食谱大获成功！从这里开始，我们只会继续攀登。

trans-unit.source: I was at a book signing the other day and a fan from my newsletter told me they've been following my work since I had a blog._They have good taste, but it's amazing what people spend their time on, isn't it?
trans-unit.target: 前几天我在签售会上，我时事通讯的一位粉丝告诉我，自从我有了博客，他们就一直在关注我的工作_他们很有品味，但人们花时间在什么上真是太棒了，不是吗？

trans-unit.source: I am thinking of pitching White Ash Harbor to some investors I know back in Billboard City._Between my cookbook, our working relationship, and the results here in town, I thnk I might earn some time with the right people.
trans-unit.target: 我想把白灰港推销给我在Billboard City认识的一些投资者_从我的烹饪书、我们的工作关系和城里的结果来看，我想我可能会和合适的人相处一段时间。

trans-unit.source: 123_LUCIUS_INTERACT
trans-unit.target: 123_联系方式

trans-unit.source: A few wrinkles, but still sharp.
trans-unit.target: 有几条皱纹，但仍然很锋利。

trans-unit.source: I dress better than you.
trans-unit.target: 我穿得比你好。

trans-unit.source: It's sharper than a knife.
trans-unit.target: 它比刀还锋利。

trans-unit.source: My keyboard can bring down giants and swat gnats.
trans-unit.target: 我的键盘可以击倒巨人和蚊子。

trans-unit.source: I don't need encouragement. I am that good.
trans-unit.target: 我不需要鼓励。我很好。

trans-unit.source: I do not want to ask for it, but I need help.
trans-unit.target: 我不想要求，但我需要帮助。

trans-unit.source: I have no need for your assistance.
trans-unit.target: 我不需要你的帮助。

trans-unit.source: You're giving me this? Why? I suppose it is useful. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 你给我这个？为什么？我想它是有用的。非常感谢。

trans-unit.source: You know what I like (playername). Bit come to think of it, I think it's pretty obvious. Am I that predictable?
trans-unit.target: 你知道我喜欢什么(playername)。仔细想想，我觉得这很明显。我有那么容易预测吗？

trans-unit.source: Ah, this is a nice one. Simple, yet gets the job done.
trans-unit.target: 啊，这个不错。简单，但能完成工作。

trans-unit.source: This is an expensive gift (playername), but something I can easily purchase for myself. Try again next time.
trans-unit.target: 这是一份昂贵的礼物(playername)，但我可以很容易地为自己购买。下次再试。

trans-unit.source: A drink for my birthday? You know what (playername), I think great minds think alike. We can accomplish some great things together.
trans-unit.target: 我生日要喝一杯吗？你知道吗(playername)，我认为伟大的头脑都是一样的。我们可以一起完成一些伟大的事情。

trans-unit.source: Wasting my time with trash would be a mistake.
trans-unit.target: 把时间浪费在垃圾上是个错误。

trans-unit.source: No. I will not be able to enjoy this. Try again.
trans-unit.target: 不，我无法享受这个。再试一次。

trans-unit.source: If you want to win my friendship, you will have to do better than throwing thoughtless gifts at me.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想赢得我的友谊，你必须做得比向我扔轻率的礼物更好。

trans-unit.source: No, I don't need this, you gave me one already.
trans-unit.target: 不，我不需要这个，你已经给我一个了。

trans-unit.source: Never do that again.
trans-unit.target: 再也不要那样做了。

trans-unit.source: I do not need to hang out with you.
trans-unit.target: 我不需要和你一起出去玩。

trans-unit.source: I need your skill set, I don't need your love.
trans-unit.target: 我需要你的技能，我不需要你的爱。

trans-unit.source: 124_NABIHA
trans-unit.target: 124_纳比哈

trans-unit.source: Hello, hope you're having a wonderful day.
trans-unit.target: 你好，希望你今天过得愉快。

trans-unit.source: Ah, hello again, are you finding your way around White Ash Harbor fine enough?_If you're looking for the freshest fruit around here, you know where to find em.
trans-unit.target: 啊，你好，你在白灰港附近找到路了吗_如果你在这里寻找最新鲜的水果，你知道在哪里可以找到它们。

trans-unit.source: Life is a banquet, and most poor suckers are starving to death! Go out and enjoy life, today!
trans-unit.target: 生活是一场盛宴，大多数可怜的傻瓜都饿死了！今天就出去享受生活吧！

trans-unit.source: Here's a tip from a social butterfly: Find a stranger at a friend's party and talk with them._Maybe you make a new friend, maybe it's dinner for two, maybe it's just a nice chat, but whatever it is it becomes a chapter in your life's story.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个社交蝴蝶的建议：在朋友的聚会上找一个陌生人，和他们谈谈_也许你交了一个新朋友，也许是两个人的晚餐，也许只是一次愉快的聊天，但不管是什么，它都会成为你人生故事的一章。

trans-unit.source: When you find something in life to be passionate about, darling, go at it with full force._You'll either sink or fly, but you'll have an answer sooner rather than later.
trans-unit.target: 亲爱的，当你发现生活中有什么值得热爱的事情时，全力以赴_你要么沉下去，要么飞起来，但你迟早会得到答案的。

trans-unit.source: If you are in need of some culture, the library is about as far as you can get around here._It's the trade-off from living in a big city. Quaint life, but very little goings-on outside of the tourist or fishing industry.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要一些文化，图书馆就在你能找到的地方_这是生活在大城市的权衡。生活很平淡，但除了旅游业或渔业，很少有其他活动。

trans-unit.source: Now that Le Sequoia is under your management, have you thought about the direction you want to take your menu?_Have you thought about going vegan?
trans-unit.target: 现在Le Sequoia在你的管理之下，你有没有想过你想要的菜单方向_你想过吃素吗？

trans-unit.source: Thinking about it.
trans-unit.target: 想想看。

trans-unit.source: Color me intrigued. What's your offer?
trans-unit.target: 颜色让我着迷。你的报价是什么？

trans-unit.source: You should! Vegan food is some of the best on the planet without harming it._It would set a tone in our community if you did, and maybe other businesses would follow suit.
trans-unit.target: 你应该！纯素食品是地球上最好的食品之一，而且不会对其造成伤害。如果你这样做，它将在我们的社区树立一种基调，也许其他企业也会效仿。

trans-unit.source: I can offer options, choices, and supplies. I'd love to support any vegan options that go into our community._Get one to go vegan, others will start offering options on their menus too.
trans-unit.target: 我可以提供选项、选择和用品。我很乐意支持任何进入我们社区的素食选择_让一个人成为素食主义者，其他人也会开始在菜单上提供选择。

trans-unit.source: Vegan diets are what will keep our planet going._In Billboard City, it is very easy to find vegan choices, but in White Ash Harbor, not so much. I want to change that.
trans-unit.target: 纯素饮食将使我们的星球继续运转_在Billboard City，很容易找到素食主义者的选择，但在White Ash Harbor，就没那么多了。我想改变这一点。

trans-unit.source: Darling, always remember that the world is what we make of it. Don't like what you're seeing? Do something about it.
trans-unit.target: 亲爱的，永远记住，世界是我们创造的。不喜欢你看到的吗？对此做点什么。

trans-unit.source: I've been around the block a few times, trust me when I say that the number of friends you should have in your life should be counted on one hand._More than that and you're friendly acquaintances.
trans-unit.target: 我绕着街区走了几次，相信我，你一生中应该拥有的朋友数量应该用一只手来计算_不仅如此，你们还是友好的熟人。

trans-unit.source: I want conquest. I want people to understand that vegan is healthy, sustainable, and delicious._Meat eaters have pushed me into this mindset because they will not share the table with us unless we force them too.
trans-unit.target: 我想要征服。我希望人们明白纯素是健康、可持续和美味的_肉食者把我推向了这种心态，因为除非我们强迫他们，否则他们不会和我们一起吃饭。

trans-unit.source: Your arrival here in town has created quite the buzz._I will be dining at your restaurant so long as it's vegan options are tasty and not just rabbit food._Actually try to make something delicious, please.
trans-unit.target: 你到城里来引起了很大的轰动_我会在你的餐厅吃饭，只要它的素食选择是美味的，而不仅仅是兔肉_请试着做些美味的东西。

trans-unit.source: I am going to impart some knowledge onto you. Use it as you see fit, but know just know that getting older doesn't mean you get old._Not participating in the world makes you get old.
trans-unit.target: 我将向你传授一些知识。按你认为合适的方式使用它，但要知道，变老并不意味着你变老了_不参与这个世界会让你变老。

trans-unit.source: Ehhh. Ok?
trans-unit.target: 哦。好吗？

trans-unit.source: Okay, will do.
trans-unit.target: 好的，我会的。

trans-unit.source: Not a surprising response, but one that comes from youth. You'll see one day.
trans-unit.target: 这不是一个令人惊讶的反应，但它来自年轻人。总有一天你会看到的。

trans-unit.source: Never stop being a member of society of the world you live in. The moment you close off from it into an isolated bubble is the moment you get old.
trans-unit.target: 永远不要停止成为你所生活的世界社会的一员。当你与社会隔绝成一个孤立的泡沫时，你就变老了。

trans-unit.source: When I was a reality show star, I was told that my fame would last longer than my looks._Today, there isn't a soul who knows my name, but my skin looks amazing.
trans-unit.target: 当我还是一名真人秀明星时，有人告诉我，我的名气会比我的长相持续更长时间_今天，没有人知道我的名字，但我的皮肤看起来很神奇。

trans-unit.source: Replacing the rat race with inner peace is what has helped me survive today's world. I make enough money to live and that's all I need.
trans-unit.target: 用内心的平静取代了激烈的竞争，这帮助我在当今世界生存下来。我挣了足够的钱生活，这就是我所需要的。

trans-unit.source: You're from Billboard City, I know you know this, but that place is a pit. I don't understand why so many people in White Ash Harbor want to go there._Grass is always greener I guess.
trans-unit.target: 你来自Billboard City，我知道你知道这一点，但那个地方是个坑。我不明白为什么白灰港有这么多人想去那里_我想草总是更绿。

trans-unit.source: My experiments with vegan recipes is really starting to pay off! You should try them, no pressure, but I think you're going to dig them.
trans-unit.target: 我对纯素食谱的实验真的开始取得成效了！你应该试试，没有压力，但我认为你会喜欢的。

trans-unit.source: I was speaking to April the other day and she told me that my future is looking so very bright!_It's nice to hear good news is on the horizon for someone at my age. Haha!
trans-unit.target: 前几天我和April聊过，她告诉我，我的未来看起来非常光明_很高兴听到我这个年纪的人即将迎来好消息。哈哈！

trans-unit.source: The Sequoia is a famous place around here, but I have a feeling you're going to try to make its name go beyond this small town._Am I right? Do you have such ambitions?
trans-unit.target: 红杉在这里是一个著名的地方，但我有一种感觉，你会试图让它的名字超越这个小镇_我说的对吗？你有这样的野心吗？

trans-unit.source: I want to stay small if possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的话，我想保持低调。

trans-unit.source: I'm looking to franchise my business.
trans-unit.target: 我想特许经营我的生意。

trans-unit.source: A person of character. I can respect work being recognized and building toward something._I just don't want this town to feel cheap and fake. Your restaurant has the ability to elivate this place, let's hope it's toward something good.
trans-unit.target: 有个性的人。我可以尊重工作得到认可并朝着某个方向发展_我只是不想让这个城市感觉廉价和虚伪。你的餐厅有能力让这个地方变得精致，让我们希望它是朝着好的方向发展的。

trans-unit.source: Oh . . . that's disappointing. I have the feeling you haven't given much thought to what it will do the community at large? I thought you were . . . different, my mistake.
trans-unit.target: 哦。这太令人失望了。我有一种感觉，你没有过多考虑它会对整个社区产生什么影响？我以为你是。不同，我的错。

trans-unit.source: I have no regrets of the time I spent during my youth. It's silly to think about it or even dwell on it because it's gone and I'm still here.
trans-unit.target: 我对年轻时度过的时光并不后悔。想它甚至纠缠它都是愚蠢的，因为它已经过去了，而我还在这里。

trans-unit.source: I wish veganism was as invisible as meat based diets. It's why so many people like to make comments about something they know nothing about._My food tastes great, isn't killing the planet, and is healthier. Meat? Good luck pooping.
trans-unit.target: 我希望素食主义能像肉类饮食一样隐形。这就是为什么这么多人喜欢对他们一无所知的事情发表评论_我的食物味道很好，不会杀死地球，而且更健康。肉？祝你大便好运。

trans-unit.source: It's a bit of a stereotype that vegans can only talk about veganism._I will happily be that stereotype until I can go out to dinner with some proper options to choose from other than steamed vegetables.
trans-unit.target: 素食主义者只能谈论素食主义，这有点老套_我很乐意成为那种刻板印象，直到我可以出去吃饭，除了清蒸蔬菜，还有一些合适的选择。

trans-unit.source: The more noise you make, the faster change comes. Remember that.
trans-unit.target: 你发出的噪音越大，变化就越快。记住这一点。

trans-unit.source: Takashi Farms is one of the most wholesome places around._I visit there quite often so I can appreciate where my ingredients come from before they land in my kitchen. You should go sometime.
trans-unit.target: Takashi农场是周围最健康的地方之一_我经常去那里，这样我就可以在食材进入厨房之前了解它们的来源。你应该找个时间去。

trans-unit.source: I have seen things in my life that I wish I could forget or change._What about you?
trans-unit.target: 我在生活中看到了一些我希望能忘记或改变的事情_那你呢？

trans-unit.source: I wish some moments played out differently.
trans-unit.target: 我希望有些时刻能以不同的方式上演。

trans-unit.source: If anything was different then I wouldn't be here.
trans-unit.target: 如果有什么不同，我就不会在这里了。

trans-unit.source: Alternate realities are where most of us go when something has popped up in our lives that give us pause. It's not good, but it's also normal, I believe.
trans-unit.target: 当我们的生活中突然出现一些让我们停下来的事情时，我们大多数人都会去另一个现实。这并不好，但我相信这也是正常的。

trans-unit.source: There's a thought, if you changed anything about what you've done in the past, you wouldn't be where you are in the first place._And depending on where that is, that could be a bad thing . . .intriguing.
trans-unit.target: 有一种想法，如果你改变了过去所做的任何事情，你就不会处于现在的位置_根据具体情况，这可能是一件坏事。有趣。

trans-unit.source: When you live to be my age, you see a lot of things, but one thing you see is that not a lot actually changes._I think it's why so many people my age are so bitter.
trans-unit.target: 当你活到我这个年纪时，你会看到很多事情，但有一件事你看到的是，实际上并没有太多的变化_我想这就是为什么这么多和我同龄的人如此痛苦的原因。

trans-unit.source: You will not believe this, but once, back when I was on my show, I had this flower seller show up on set to make a quick buck._We threw him into one of the storylines and now he's Edward Felix! A household name! Can you believe it?!
trans-unit.target: 你不会相信的，但有一次，当我在节目中时，我让这个卖花的人出现在片场，以快速赚钱_我们把他扔进了故事情节中，现在他是爱德华·菲利克斯！家喻户晓的名字！你能相信吗？！

trans-unit.source: It doesn't matter how old you get, the feeling of 'is this a good idea?' never leaves you._You just have more information at my age to back your choice and that makes the voice a little quieter.
trans-unit.target: 无论你多大年纪，都会有一种“这是个好主意吗？”的感觉永远不会离开你_在我这个年纪，你有更多的信息来支持你的选择，这让声音有点安静。

trans-unit.source: When I lost my husband, I lost a piece of myself for a while, but I eventually found it. I truly love my life._It took a long time for me to love all of me.
trans-unit.target: 当我失去丈夫时，我失去了一段时间的自我，但我最终找到了。我真的很爱我的生活_我花了很长时间才爱上我所有人。

trans-unit.source: Pomarine and Bowie are two different examples of how to live a long life._I could never do what either does, but staying active is a key ingredient in living a long and healthy life. It's why I get my 10,000 steps in every day.
trans-unit.target: Pomarine和Bowie是如何长寿的两个不同例子_我永远无法做到这两件事，但保持活跃是长寿和健康生活的关键因素。这就是为什么我每天要走一万步。

trans-unit.source: I know we've discussed this already, but it is something that is weighing on my mind regardless._Dear, do you think I am too old for you?
trans-unit.target: 我知道我们已经讨论过这个问题，但不管怎样，这都让我很头疼_亲爱的，你觉得我对你来说太老了吗？

trans-unit.source: It's the soul that matters not the number.
trans-unit.target: 重要的是灵魂，而不是数字。

trans-unit.source: You need to stop fretting, Nabiha!
trans-unit.target: 你需要停止烦恼，纳比哈！

trans-unit.source: Well, good then. A rather artistic answer but I am glad to hear it none the less.
trans-unit.target: 那么，那很好。这是一个颇具艺术性的回答，但我仍然很高兴听到它。

trans-unit.source: I know, I know dear! It's just. . . I never thought someone as young as you would be interested in . . . me.
trans-unit.target: 我知道，亲爱的！只是。我从没想过像你这么年轻的人会对…感兴趣。我。

trans-unit.source: After being around for so long, I just never thought I would find love again, but here I am with someone who adores me for being myself._I am blessed.
trans-unit.target: 在一起这么久之后，我从来没有想过我会再次找到爱，但在这里，我和一个因为做自己而崇拜我的人在一起_我很幸运。

trans-unit.source: I find myself looking forward to my future rather than dreading it._It's such a strange change in my outlook and all it took was finding you and you finding me.
trans-unit.target: 我发现自己对未来充满期待，而不是害怕。我的观点发生了如此奇怪的变化，只需要找到你，你找到我。

trans-unit.source: Have you ever heard of a fortune fall? It's when someone fails to get what they wanted, but they in turn have a better life because they failed._If you had succeeded in that kitchen in Billboard City, we wouldn't be holding hands right now.
trans-unit.target: 你听说过财富缩水吗？这是当有人没有得到他们想要的东西，但他们反过来因为失败而过上了更好的生活_如果你在Billboard City的厨房里取得了成功，我们现在就不会牵手了。

trans-unit.source: I hope that our time together will leave an impression on you that will stay long after I am gone._I'm not depressed, it's just a fact of life, and I'm okay with it.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我们在一起的时间会给你留下一个印象，在我离开后，这个印象会一直持续很久_我并不沮丧，这只是生活中的一个事实，我对此并不介意。

trans-unit.source: When Gregory died, I thought I would never find happiness again._I sat alone and spent my youth in mourning, while trying to keep everyone around me happy._(playername), my wait brought me to you and for that I am happy.
trans-unit.target: 格雷戈里去世时，我以为我再也找不到幸福了_我独自坐着，在哀悼中度过了我的青春，同时努力让周围的人都快乐_(playername)，我的等待把我带到了你身边，为此我很高兴。

trans-unit.source: 124_NABIHA_PROGRESSION
trans-unit.target: 124_纳米比亚_进步

trans-unit.source: Le Sequoia is officially open for business huh? Oh, daring, that is simply wonderful! I hope it brings you miles of happiness!
trans-unit.target: 红杉资本正式开业了吧？哦，太大胆了，太棒了！我希望它能给你带来无尽的幸福！

trans-unit.source: Ah, Lucius, I remember him floating around Billboard City's restaurant scene decades ago._Clingy, needy, the man is simply projecting any of his problems through his reviews. Don't pay him any attention.
trans-unit.target: 啊，Lucius，我记得几十年前他在Billboard City的餐厅里闲逛_这个男人狡猾、贫穷，只是通过他的评论来投射他的任何问题。别理他。

trans-unit.source: I cannot wait to soak in the warm waters there._I've heard tales of the place, but hadn't been able to go because it's always been closed. I cannot wait to dip in.
trans-unit.target: 我迫不及待地想泡在那里的温水里_我听说过这个地方的故事，但没能去，因为它总是关门。我迫不及待地想进去。

trans-unit.source: Your work is paying off, (playername). I had a pair of shoppers today tell me to eat at your restaurant! Isn't that just lovely?
trans-unit.target: 你的工作得到了回报，(playername)。今天有两位顾客叫我去你们餐厅吃饭！这难道不可爱吗？

trans-unit.source: The teahouse is so cute and cozy. You have done an amazing job with the place.
trans-unit.target: 茶馆是如此可爱和舒适。你在这个地方做得很好。

trans-unit.source: I am cheering for you! You've been helping so many people, darling! Keep it up!
trans-unit.target: 我为你欢呼！亲爱的，你帮了这么多人！坚持下去！

trans-unit.source: Nothing is more inspiring than seeing someone strive to help their community as much as you have done for White Ash Harbor._It fills one with hope.
trans-unit.target: 没有什么比看到有人像你为白灰港所做的那样努力帮助他们的社区更鼓舞人心的了_它让人充满希望。

trans-unit.source: I am seeing a lot of vegan choices on your menu. I am proud!
trans-unit.target: 我在你的菜单上看到了很多纯素食的选择。我很自豪！

trans-unit.source: The vegan dishes on your menu are simply delicious, (playername). Don't let anyone tell you different.
trans-unit.target: 你菜单上的纯素菜肴非常美味。不要让任何人告诉你不同。

trans-unit.source: Oh look, boring deadly meat on the menu. How adventurous of you.
trans-unit.target: 哦，看，菜单上那些无聊的致命肉。你真有冒险精神。

trans-unit.source: Dear, if you think what you're doing is inventive, then you're mistaken._Meat, everyone has done meat or animal product, pun intended, to death. You are nothing new.
trans-unit.target: 亲爱的，如果你认为你所做的是创造性的，那么你错了_肉，每个人都做过肉或动物产品，双关语，至死不渝。你不是什么新鲜事。

trans-unit.source: What you're doing I wish everyone else was doing. Keeping their business alive, healthy, and without waste.
trans-unit.target: 你在做什么，我希望其他人也在做。让他们的企业保持活力、健康和无浪费。

trans-unit.source: Keeping our local oceans clear and the forests healthy is the key to our future being an actual future. Thank you for doing your part.
trans-unit.target: 保持当地海洋的清洁和森林的健康是我们未来成为现实未来的关键。谢谢你尽你的职责。

trans-unit.source: I was once like you (playername), lured in by the glamor of the consumer lifestyle._I left that life behind, and I am a happier person now.
trans-unit.target: 我曾经和你一样(playername)，被消费者生活方式的魅力所吸引_我放弃了那种生活，现在我是一个更快乐的人。

trans-unit.source: Ah, here you are, Emperor Trash, king of the heap!_Here's the worst part about what you're doing here, you know its bad, but you keep doing it._Soon, the landscape will be barren of life and full of trash!
trans-unit.target: 啊，你来了，垃圾皇帝，垃圾堆之王_这是你在这里所做的最糟糕的部分，你知道它很糟糕，但你继续这样做。很快，这片土地将没有生命，到处都是垃圾！

trans-unit.source: Tending to my field, my crop, ah! What a lovely feeling. I should have done this decades ago.
trans-unit.target: 照料我的田地，我的庄稼，啊！多么美妙的感觉。我几十年前就该这么做了。

trans-unit.source: When you find something new at my age, it is so exciting. I truly enjoy my garden and the fruits it will bear.
trans-unit.target: 当你在我这个年纪发现新东西时，这太令人兴奋了。我真的很喜欢我的花园和它将结出的果实。

trans-unit.source: I hope my food will give people hope to try something new for not only themselves but for the people they love in their life.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我的食物能给人们带来希望，让他们不仅为自己，也为他们生活中所爱的人尝试新的东西。

trans-unit.source: I believe we have done a service to mankind with our party. Veganism is the way forward!
trans-unit.target: 我相信我们党为人类做出了贡献。素食主义是前进的道路！

trans-unit.source: I cannot wait to see that furniture collection from Topo!
trans-unit.target: 我迫不及待地想看看Topo的家具收藏！

trans-unit.source: I think we may have moved the needle just a little towards making the world a better place.
trans-unit.target: 我认为我们可能已经朝着让世界变得更美好的方向迈出了一小步。

trans-unit.source: 124_NABIHA_INTERACT
trans-unit.target: 124_无人机交互

trans-unit.source: Lots of moisturizer, darling.
trans-unit.target: 很多保湿霜，亲爱的。

trans-unit.source: I read often, it helps keep the mind sharp.
trans-unit.target: 我经常读书，它有助于保持头脑清醒。

trans-unit.source: It's work that needs to be done.
trans-unit.target: 这是需要完成的工作。

trans-unit.source: Vegan food will prevail.
trans-unit.target: 纯素食品将占上风。

trans-unit.source: Just give a hand here, will you darling?
trans-unit.target: 亲爱的，帮帮忙好吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm quiet content.
trans-unit.target: 我很满足。

trans-unit.source: This is exquisite!
trans-unit.target: 这太精致了！

trans-unit.source: This is very pretty! Thank you (playername)!
trans-unit.target: 这太漂亮了！谢谢(playername)！

trans-unit.source: Awww thank you (playername). This is a great gift.
trans-unit.target: 噢，谢谢你(playername)。这是一份很棒的礼物。

trans-unit.source: Whoa! This is a crazy gift. It's not something I can really use . . . but I will cherish it.
trans-unit.target: 哇！这是一份疯狂的礼物。这不是我真正能用的东西。但我会珍惜它。

trans-unit.source: Well happy birthday to Nabiha. Hot damn that's a nice gift! You are a great friend (playername).
trans-unit.target: 祝纳比哈生日快乐。该死的，这真是个好礼物！你是个好朋友(playername)。

trans-unit.source: A bomb darling, go chuck it.
trans-unit.target: 亲爱的，去扔吧。

trans-unit.source: No. I don't like this. It's not very pretty.
trans-unit.target: 不，我不喜欢这样。它不是很漂亮。

trans-unit.source: I don't really know what to do with this (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我真的不知道该怎么处理这个(playername)。

trans-unit.source: I am quite happy. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴。非常感谢。

trans-unit.source: Ah, that's nice. Thank you!
trans-unit.target: 啊，太好了。非常感谢。

trans-unit.source: I am just too busy today. Another time.
trans-unit.target: 我今天太忙了。下次吧。

trans-unit.source: Sells fruits
trans-unit.target: 卖水果

trans-unit.source: Welcome to Nabihas Berries! We have the largest selection of organic fruits and vegan products in White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到纳比亚斯莓果！我们在白灰港拥有最大的有机水果和纯素产品选择。

trans-unit.source: In this shop, we carry only the best.
trans-unit.target: 在这家商店，我们只卖最好的。

trans-unit.source: You will not find another vegan shop that carries this level of quality.
trans-unit.target: 你找不到另一家有这种质量的素食店了。

trans-unit.source: Veganism isn't food and it isn't a lifestyle, it is a good life. Period.
trans-unit.target: 素食主义不是食物，也不是一种生活方式，而是一种美好的生活。期间。

trans-unit.source: Nabihas Berries is here for you to find the best of the best produce on the market.
trans-unit.target: Nabihas Berries在这里为您找到市场上最好的农产品。

trans-unit.source: It's fresh!
trans-unit.target: 它很新鲜！

trans-unit.source: Just got those in today.
trans-unit.target: 今天刚收到那些。

trans-unit.source: That's my last shipment, get it while you can.
trans-unit.target: 这是我最后一批货，趁你还来得及，赶紧拿。

trans-unit.source: I didn't know that variety grew here.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道这种品种在这里生长。

trans-unit.source: I'll have to tell my guy we don't need anymore of that.
trans-unit.target: 我得告诉我的人，我们不再需要这些了。

trans-unit.source: I need to have it in my shop.
trans-unit.target: 我需要把它放在我的店里。

trans-unit.source: This is not very good.
trans-unit.target: 这不是很好。

trans-unit.source: No, thank you.
trans-unit.target: 不用了，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Not the best I've seen.
trans-unit.target: 这不是我见过的最好的。

trans-unit.source: You need more credits, sorry.
trans-unit.target: 你需要更多的信用点，抱歉。

trans-unit.source: Life needs credits to keep it going, sadly.
trans-unit.target: 可悲的是，生活需要信用点来维持下去。

trans-unit.source: You'll have to find some credits.
trans-unit.target: 你得找一些信用点。

trans-unit.source: Yo.
trans-unit.target: 哟。

trans-unit.source: You think you know what's happening? You don't.
trans-unit.target: 你以为你知道发生了什么事吗？你没有。

trans-unit.source: The only reason I am talking to you right now is because I know you're not a cop. I know because while we've been talking I had my A.i. take a dive through the police database and you're not listed in any personnel files. Nice to meet ya.
trans-unit.target: 我现在和你说话的唯一原因是因为我知道你不是警察。我知道，因为在我们谈话的时候，我让我的人工智能潜入了警察数据库，而你没有被列入任何人事档案。很高兴认识你。

trans-unit.source: Name's BadkArma42, you must be, (playername), owner of (BC Restaurant Name) and Le Sequoia. You also run the tea house inside the Peony Bathhouse. Quite the resume you got there, amigo.
trans-unit.target: 名字叫BadkArma42，你必须是(playername)，(BC Restaurant Name)和Le Sequoia的老板。你还经营牡丹浴室里的茶馆。朋友，你的简历真不错。

trans-unit.source: Tell me, how does White Ash Harbor stack up against Billboard City?
trans-unit.target: 告诉我，白灰港与Billboard City相比怎么样？

trans-unit.source: Billboard City has a lot going on all the time. It's exciting, but I'd be lying if I didn't say that I miss White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 公告牌城市一直在发生很多事情。这很令人兴奋，但如果我不说我想念白灰港，那我就是在撒谎。

trans-unit.source: I wish I was in White Ash Harbor right now. Billboard City is big, and frankly, I don't like being here any longer than I have to be.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我现在就在白灰港。Billboard City很大，坦率地说，我不喜欢在这里待得太久。

trans-unit.source: Billboard always has something happening in it. Whether that's a good thing or not is the question.
trans-unit.target: 公告牌总是有一些事情发生。这是好事还是坏事是个问题。

trans-unit.source: It's easier to fade into a crowd here. It's why I haven't moved to White Ash, because the nature of my work demands anonymity.
trans-unit.target: 在这里更容易融入人群。这就是为什么我没有搬到白灰，因为我的工作性质要求匿名。

trans-unit.source: If you ever logged in online, everything you've done has been logged, recorded, and weaponized to be used against you IF the day comes that you wish to try to fix anything without the support of the rich.
trans-unit.target: 如果你曾经在线登录过，那么你所做的一切都会被记录、记录下来，并被武器化，以便在没有富人支持的情况下对你进行修复。

trans-unit.source: My life is keystrokes and living in the sea of information because I need to know how to navigate its waters without leaving a wake. Day in and out, every day, I am improving my skills. I'm a hacker, man.
trans-unit.target: 我的生活就是敲击键盘，生活在信息的海洋中，因为我需要知道如何在不留下痕迹的情况下航行。日复一日，我都在提高自己的技能。我是个黑客，伙计。

trans-unit.source: How do I pay the rent doing what I do? Oh, trust me, there are many avenues to getting financed in this career. I'm not saying its blackmail, but it's blackmail.
trans-unit.target: 我该如何支付房租？哦，相信我，在这个职业生涯中有很多获得资金的途径。我不是说这是勒索，但这是勒索。

trans-unit.source: Want to learn a trick? If you ever sign up for a free mailing list for a discount somewhere, for your name, put in the name of the place that's having you sign up. That way you can see which company sold your information to these scammers.
trans-unit.target: 想学个把戏吗？如果你在某个地方注册了免费邮件列表以获得折扣，请输入你注册的地方的名字。这样你就可以看到哪家公司把你的信息卖给了这些骗子。

trans-unit.source: When you look back at your choices, your legacy, how do you feel about it?
trans-unit.target: 记住，你所做的一切都会被记录下来，我可以访问一个保存这些信息的数据库。我写代码已经很多年了。你想调整一下吗？

trans-unit.source: I think I made some good in the world and have done my best. I feel pretty good about it.
trans-unit.target: 我认为我在世界上做了一些好事，并且已经做到了最好。我对此感觉很好。

trans-unit.source: I've made some mistakes along the way. Spent time incorrectly, if I could, I'd take it back.
trans-unit.target: 我一路上犯了一些错误。如果时间花错了，如果可以的话，我会收回的。

trans-unit.source: That's good to hear. Many people typically have a road of regret behind them as they made their way towards their riches.
trans-unit.target: 很高兴听到这个消息。许多人在走向财富的道路上，通常都有一条悔恨之路。

trans-unit.source: Regret is a natural part of life, but it doesn't have to always be there, haunting you day in and out.
trans-unit.target: 后悔是生活中自然的一部分，但它不一定总是存在，日复一日地萦绕在你心头。

trans-unit.source: What if I could help reset some of that social credit you've spent so your past aligns better with your present goals? I'm working on something that can do that, but it's not ready yet. Soon though, soon.
trans-unit.target: 如果我可以帮助重置你已消耗的部分社会信用，让你的过去与现在的目标更加契合，那会怎样？我正在研究一种可以做到这一点的方法，但尚未准备好。不过很快就能实现。

trans-unit.source: We all have a past we'd like to fix, (playername). Everything behind us is what's pushed us into today. It's why so many people are nostaglic, it's a comfort to know that even if something bad happened that it worked out in someway in the end.
trans-unit.target: 我们都有自己想要修复的过去(playername)。我们身后的一切都是推动我们走到今天的东西。这就是为什么这么多人都没有标语，知道即使发生了坏事，最终也会以某种方式解决，这让人感到安慰。

trans-unit.source: You'd think I love pizza given my profession and living online, but I find it to be meh. Give me a kebob and rice combo any day of the week though. Does it not work at my desk, yup, but I'm not animal who eats at my desk.
trans-unit.target: 考虑到我的职业和网上生活，你会认为我喜欢披萨，但我发现是我。不过，一周中的任何一天都可以给我一份烤面包和米饭的组合。它在我的桌子上不起作用吗，是的，但我不是在桌子上吃东西的动物。

trans-unit.source: The way the neon and the rain mix together, it's as if they were always meant to be together.
trans-unit.target: 霓虹灯和雨混合在一起的方式，就好像它们总是注定要在一起。

trans-unit.source: Remember, everything you do is recorded, and I can access a database that holds this information. I've been working on the code for years. You want to tweak anything around?
trans-unit.target: 记住，你所做的一切都会被记录下来，我可以访问一个保存这些信息的数据库。我写代码已经很多年了。你想调整一下吗？

trans-unit.source: Yes, I would like to redo some of my past choices.
trans-unit.target: 是的，我想重做我过去的一些选择。

trans-unit.source: No, I like me and where I am even if I've made some poor choices along the way.
trans-unit.target: 不，我喜欢我自己和我现在的位置，即使我一路上做了一些糟糕的选择。

trans-unit.source: Give me a little more time and I'll be able to help out with that.
trans-unit.target: 再给我一点时间，我就能帮忙了。

trans-unit.source: You sure? I do respect your decision, but if you ever change your mind about it, let me know. I won't judge ya too much.
trans-unit.target: 你确定吗？我尊重你的决定，但如果你改变主意，请告诉我。我不会对你评价太多。

trans-unit.source: I took on some work for some clients that are a little more . . . needy. I hope I can get their work done asap because I just need the money.
trans-unit.target: 我为一些客户做了一些工作，这些客户有点。贫困。我希望我能尽快完成他们的工作，因为我只需要钱。

trans-unit.source: Remember that client I told you about, they are upset with me because I wouldn't do what they were asking. I went against my one rule of knowing everything upfront before taking on a job.
trans-unit.target: 记得我告诉过你的那个客户，他们对我很生气，因为我不会按照他们的要求去做。我违背了在接受工作之前预先了解一切的一条规则。

trans-unit.source: Nothing new on the whole upset client front. I was able to cover my tracks pretty well, so I'm not too . . . I gotta go.
trans-unit.target: 整个客户方面没有什么新鲜事。我能够很好地掩盖我的踪迹，所以我不太。我得走了。

trans-unit.source: How they found me, I don't know, but they found me. I have to lay low for a while. Don't worry, I'm a clever creature.
trans-unit.target: 他们是怎么找到我的，我不知道，但他们找到了我。我不得不低调一段时间。别担心，我是个聪明人。

trans-unit.source: 125_BADKARMA42_INTERACT
trans-unit.target: 125_BADKARMA42_相互作用

trans-unit.source: How did you get a camera in my place?!
trans-unit.target: 你怎么把相机放在我家的？！

trans-unit.source: I got a guy who made me these threads. Super comfy.
trans-unit.target: 我有个家伙给我做了这些线。超级舒适。

trans-unit.source: My mind is an enigma fueled by caffeine.
trans-unit.target: 咖啡因让我的头脑变得谜一般。

trans-unit.source: If you noticed my work then that's a problem because it shouldn't be noticeable.
trans-unit.target: 如果你注意到我的作品，那就有问题了，因为它不应该引人注目。

trans-unit.source: Thank you, getting support is always nice.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你，得到支持总是很好。

trans-unit.source: I'll take some help. Can't do it all by myself.
trans-unit.target: 我需要一些帮助。我一个人做不到。

trans-unit.source: What I am doing is something that you're probably not able to help with. No offense.
trans-unit.target: 我正在做的是你可能无法帮助的事情。无意冒犯。

trans-unit.source: I've been looking for one of these! I thought they were all gone by now. Thanks!
trans-unit.target: 我一直在找其中一个！我以为他们现在都走了。谢谢！

trans-unit.source: I don't need it.
trans-unit.target: 我不需要它。

trans-unit.source: Oh, I got one of these from you already.
trans-unit.target: 哦，我已经从你那里得到一个了。

trans-unit.source: We're friends, why not?
trans-unit.target: 我们是朋友，为什么不呢？

trans-unit.source: I am in the middle of something, next time.
trans-unit.target: 下一次，我正在做一些事情。

trans-unit.source: I don't do relationships.
trans-unit.target: 我不做人际关系。

trans-unit.source: Oh, excuse me. On my way to a place for a thing. Goodbye. - Avoid any dialogues that says you are going somewhere else. Can't coordinate that in the game.
trans-unit.target: 哦，不好意思。我正要去一个地方办事。再见。-避免任何说你要去别的地方的对话。无法在游戏中协调。

trans-unit.source: A second time. Still going to a different place is all. Goodbye.
trans-unit.target: 第二次。只是去了一个不同的地方。再见。

trans-unit.source: Once is a chance, two times accidental, three though? That feels more planned. You a cop? You know what, later.
trans-unit.target: 一次是机会，两次是偶然，三次呢？这感觉更有计划性。你是警察吗？你知道吗，稍后。

trans-unit.source: Look, I'm blind, but I can see you have an angle. Everyone has one. Goodbye.
trans-unit.target: 看，我是盲人，但我能看到你有一个角度。每个人都有一个。再见。

trans-unit.source: Okay, okay, okay, meet me at my office tomorrow. It's at Excellent Cafe. Don't be a cop.
trans-unit.target: 好的，好的，明天在我办公室见。这是在极好的咖啡馆。别当警察。

trans-unit.source: So, here we are. Just what is it that you need?
trans-unit.target: 所以，我们到了。你到底需要什么？

trans-unit.source: I'm sorry, I don't quite understand what you're talking about.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我不太明白你在说什么。

trans-unit.source: I am here because you invited me. You told me to meet you here at this cafe that is also your office? Do you own the cafe?
trans-unit.target: 我来这里是因为你邀请我。你让我在这家咖啡馆和你见面，这也是你的办公室？这家咖啡馆是你的吗？

trans-unit.source: You have been hounding me all over town and you don't even know what I do? I thought you . . . you sure you're not a cop?
trans-unit.target: 你在镇上到处找我，你甚至不知道我在做什么？我以为你。你确定你不是警察？

trans-unit.source: I don't own the cafe. I am friends with the owner of the cafe and he let's me use it for business.
trans-unit.target: 这家咖啡馆不是我的。我和咖啡馆的老板是朋友，他让我用它做生意。

trans-unit.source: What I do is . . . I get things for people. Things they need but are unable to get through normal channels because of either expense or legality. If red tape were a real thing, I'd be the scissors.
trans-unit.target: 我所做的是。我为人们买东西。他们需要的东西，但由于费用或合法性而无法通过正常渠道获得。如果繁文缛节是真的，我就是剪刀。

trans-unit.source: It isn't like I do anything nefarious, okay? I am simply a man providing a service that is needed for a lot of people in this town because they ain't got no money but have needs, ya dig?
trans-unit.target: 我并没有做任何邪恶的事，好吗？我只是一个为这个镇上的很多人提供服务的人，因为他们没有钱，但有需求，你明白吗？

trans-unit.source: I love listening to the rain. It gives such a texture to my world. It's the reason why I still got single pane windows. Double pane with all the gas inside 'em really kills the sound. No thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢听雨声。它给我的世界带来了这样的质感。这就是为什么我仍然有单层玻璃窗的原因。双层玻璃内部充满了气体，真的能消除声音。不用了，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: World isn't that simple when you're blind. You'd think you'd have less to think about, but that's wrong, so very wrong.
trans-unit.target: 当你失明时，世界就没那么简单了。你会认为你需要考虑的事情更少，但这是错误的，非常错误。

trans-unit.source: I looked you up, (playername). You got that spot in town that's been shooting up the 100. Let's set something up here, if I get you what you need, how's about I get free meals at your restaurant? - Won't be able to set that up in the game
trans-unit.target: 我抬头看了你一眼。你在城里找到了那个一直在拍摄100张照片的地方。让我们在这里设置一些东西，如果我能给你你需要的东西，我在你的餐厅免费吃饭怎么样？-无法在游戏中设置

trans-unit.source: Let me understand this, if you do the job you get paid to do, you're asking me to give you a gift?
trans-unit.target: 让我明白，如果你做了你得到报酬的工作，你是在要求我给你一份礼物吗？

trans-unit.source: Sure, that's pretty fair since you're sticking your neck out for me. What's one free meal?
trans-unit.target: 当然，这很公平，因为你为我伸出了你的脖子。一顿免费饭是多少？

trans-unit.source: Yea, I am, and if you want me to continue to get you what you want at a fraction of the cost, I'd say yes.
trans-unit.target: 是的，我是，如果你想让我继续以一小部分的成本为你提供你想要的东西，我会说是的。

trans-unit.source: One? Oh no, that's not how this shakes out. I'll be by at 5 every day for my usual. Thanks for understanding me. - Won't be able to set that up in the game
trans-unit.target: 一个？哦，不，事情不是这样的。我会像往常一样每天5点来。谢谢你理解我。-在游戏中无法设置

trans-unit.source: You may find this surprising, but not a lot of people like me. They use my services, but that's all I am to them, a service. I think dog walkers get more respect.
trans-unit.target: 你可能会觉得这很奇怪，但像我这样的人并不多。他们使用我的服务，但这就是我对他们的全部，一种服务。我认为遛狗者会得到更多的尊重。

trans-unit.source: There aren't too many services for blind people because everyone expects you to get some implants to fix your vision. Only problem is not everyone can do that sort of thing.
trans-unit.target: 为盲人提供的服务并不多，因为每个人都希望你植入一些东西来修复视力。唯一的问题是不是每个人都能做那种事。

trans-unit.source: Privacy is what I deal in the most. People who want something but don't want it tracked by the many algorithms that control our lives.
trans-unit.target: 隐私是我最关心的事情。那些想要某物但不想被控制我们生活的许多算法跟踪的人。

trans-unit.source: If we're gonna be friends, know this one thing about me, I will not get implants to fix my vision. I have tried, trust me, and I do not need someone reminding me that I can't see, okay?
trans-unit.target: 如果我们要成为朋友，要知道关于我的一件事，我不会做植入物来修复我的视力。我试过了，相信我，我不需要有人提醒我我看不见，好吗？

trans-unit.source: My apologies about not having you help 'fix' my unique view on life. Thing is, everyone thinks my inability to see is a problem, and when you think you're a problem needing fixing that really messes with your head, you dig?
trans-unit.target: 我很抱歉没有你帮助我“修复”我独特的人生观。问题是，每个人都认为我看不见是一个问题，当你认为你是一个需要解决的问题，真的让你头疼时，你会支持吗？

trans-unit.source: I understand, mental health is super important and so is self-worth.
trans-unit.target: 我明白，心理健康非常重要，自我价值也是如此。

trans-unit.source: I mean, I get it, but I understand why people would want to help you see because you're missing out on a lot.
trans-unit.target: 我的意思是，我明白，但我理解为什么人们会想帮助你看到，因为你错过了很多。

trans-unit.source: Someone who gets it! Exactly, when your body rejects every implant on the market, even with adaptation pills helping, you learn that you have to be happy with what you got.
trans-unit.target: 有人得到它！确切地说，当你的身体拒绝市场上的每一个植入物时，即使有适应药丸的帮助，你也会明白你必须对你所得到的感到满意。

trans-unit.source: What exactly am I missing out on, (playername)? Seeing the poverty in this city? Seeing the Earth be ravaged by us for the sake of a number in a bank account? I don't think I'm missing out on as much as you think I am.
trans-unit.target: 我到底错过了什么(playername)？看到这个城市的贫困吗？看到地球被我们为了银行账户里的一个数字而蹂躏？我不认为我错过了你认为的那么多。

trans-unit.source: Having had many implants installed and having had many removal surguries due to implant rejection almost drove me mad, man._When your brain is wired for vision and is given it and has it taken away, it's rough.
trans-unit.target: 已经安装了许多植入物，并且由于植入物排斥而进行了许多移除手术，这几乎让我发疯了，伙计。当你的大脑与视觉相连，被赋予视觉并被移除时，这很艰难。

trans-unit.source: If there is one thing I have learned about people it's that they are always looking for ways to 'fix' themselves. Sometimes that's needed, but sometimes you just need to tell the world to go away.
trans-unit.target: 如果说我对人们有什么了解的话，那就是他们总是在寻找“修复”自己的方法。有时这是必要的，但有时你只需要告诉世界走开。

trans-unit.source: (playername), dearest of all my friends, you and I should do drinks sometime. To celebrate not just our work but our lives and the fact that we get to live them! Sometime soon, ok?
trans-unit.target: (playername)，我最亲爱的朋友，你和我应该找个时间喝一杯。不仅要庆祝我们的工作，还要庆祝我们的生活，以及我们能够享受生活的事实！不久的某个时候，好吗？

trans-unit.source: I have nothing to say to you.
trans-unit.target: 我没什么好说的。

trans-unit.source: Leave this old man alone . . . or you will be sorry.
trans-unit.target: 别管这个老头。否则你会后悔的。

trans-unit.source: Come to my shop in the city if you need any special . . . goods.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要什么特别的。货物。

trans-unit.source: Power is everything in this world.
trans-unit.target: 权力就是这个世界上的一切。

trans-unit.source: I don't like this place.
trans-unit.target: 我不喜欢这个地方。

trans-unit.source: Want some minerals? Or do you prefer rocks?
trans-unit.target: 想要一些矿物质吗？还是你更喜欢石头？

trans-unit.source: I'm an officer of the mining committee.
trans-unit.target: 我是矿业委员会的官员。

trans-unit.source: LELSH is the only home I know . . .
trans-unit.target: LELSH是我所知道的唯一的家。

trans-unit.source: I can't tell you what my mission is. Sorry.
trans-unit.target: 我不能告诉你我的任务是什么。抱歉。

trans-unit.source: White Ash Harbor is a perfect location for . . . nevermind.
trans-unit.target: 白灰港是。没有关系。

trans-unit.source: Sells materials
trans-unit.target: 销售材料

trans-unit.source: Decided to take the plunge huh? Lemme know what you need.
trans-unit.target: 决定冒险一试，是吧？让我知道你需要什么。

trans-unit.source: Extracted these this morning. Whaddya think?
trans-unit.target: 今天早上提取了这些。你怎么想？

trans-unit.source: These weren't easy to get.
trans-unit.target: 这些东西不容易买到。

trans-unit.source: You better not tell anyone I'm here . . .
trans-unit.target: 你最好不要告诉任何人我在这里。

trans-unit.source: I sell to you, and you don't tell anyone. Got it?
trans-unit.target: 我卖给你，你不告诉任何人。知道了？

trans-unit.source: This one was hard to get.
trans-unit.target: 这个很难得到。

trans-unit.source: Best price! I promise.
trans-unit.target: 最优惠的价格！我保证。

trans-unit.source: What will you use this for?
trans-unit.target: 你打算用这个做什么？

trans-unit.source: I'll take it.
trans-unit.target: 我接受。

trans-unit.source: Ok. But just because it's you.
trans-unit.target: 好吧。但就因为是你。

trans-unit.source: Fine. I'll take this one.
trans-unit.target: 好的。我要这个。

trans-unit.source: I don't want it.
trans-unit.target: 我不想要。

trans-unit.source: What the . . .
trans-unit.target: 什么。

trans-unit.source: I'm good, thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我很好，谢谢。

trans-unit.source: You need more credits, sorry.
trans-unit.target: 你需要更多的信用点，抱歉。

trans-unit.source: Life needs credits to keep it going, sadly.
trans-unit.target: 可悲的是，生活需要信用点来维持下去。

trans-unit.source: You'll have to find some credits.
trans-unit.target: 你必须找到一些信用点。

trans-unit.source: (playername), welcome back to Billboard City, but remember, this isn't White Ash Harbor. You're one of hundreds of restaurants in town, so you're going to have to work that much more to get people to notice you.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，欢迎回到Billboard City，但请记住，这里不是白灰港。你是镇上数百家餐馆之一，所以你必须多工作才能让人们注意到你。

trans-unit.source: I'm trying out a new dish at the restaurant. I've been testing it for months and I'm only letting my most cultured clientle try it as it involves liquid nitrogen.
trans-unit.target: 我正在餐厅尝试一道新菜。我已经测试了几个月了，我只让我最有教养的客户尝试一下，因为它涉及液氮。

trans-unit.source: When I get a free moment, I'm going to do some pottery. Clay helps to strengthen my hands and let's allows my mind to focus on something that isn't food a while. It's relaxing and stressful at the same time, the perfect hobby.
trans-unit.target: 当我有空的时候，我要做一些陶器。粘土有助于增强我的双手，让我的大脑暂时专注于一些不是食物的东西。这是一种放松和压力并存的完美爱好。

trans-unit.source: Remember, this restaurant is your shot and it will rely on not only your creativity but also your business sense. Good luck.
trans-unit.target: 记住，这家餐厅是你的选择，它不仅取决于你的创造力，还取决于你对商业的感知。祝你好运。

trans-unit.source: I believe that this is the most we've spoken, ever. I'm glad that we are able to be friends in this stage of our lives. It's good to have you around again.
trans-unit.target: 我相信这是我们有史以来说得最多的一次。我很高兴我们能在人生的这个阶段成为朋友。很高兴你又来了。

trans-unit.source: Remember that night in the kitchen when Canton kicked you out?
trans-unit.target: 还记得坎顿把你赶出去的那个晚上吗？

trans-unit.source: How could I forget? What about it?
trans-unit.target: 我怎么会忘记呢？怎么样？

trans-unit.source: Do I remember perhaps one of the lowest nights of my life? Yes, Koa/Camille, I remember.
trans-unit.target: 我还记得我生命中最低谷的一个夜晚吗？是的，Koa/Camille，我记得。

trans-unit.source: I walked out of his kitchen that next day, and you know what's odd, he doesn't hold as much ire against me like he does for you.
trans-unit.target: 第二天我走出他的厨房，你知道有什么奇怪的，他不像对你那样对我生气。

trans-unit.source: I don't mean to rub salt in any wounds, I am only highlighting the fact that our lives wouldn't be where they are now if it wasn't for that one bad night. Funny how good things can come from bad moments.
trans-unit.target: 我无意在任何伤口上撒盐，我只是强调这样一个事实，如果不是因为那个糟糕的夜晚，我们的生活就不会像现在这样。有趣的是，美好的事物往往源于糟糕的时刻。

trans-unit.source: It's odd how a life can change so quickly when tragedy meets skill. Luck isn't something that happens to you, it's something you make.
trans-unit.target: 当悲剧与技巧相遇时，生活会如此迅速地改变，这很奇怪。运气不是发生在你身上的事情，而是你创造的东西。

trans-unit.source: If you told me during our time in the culinary academy that we would be working together, I would have said you were crazy. Yet, it's been a fun time so far!
trans-unit.target: 如果你在烹饪学院的时候告诉我我们会一起工作，我会说你疯了。然而，到目前为止，这是一段有趣的时光！

trans-unit.source: My father told me once that friends should only be counted on one hand. I believe this to be true because friendships are a give and take system and if too many people are taking from you then there isn't anything left for yourself.
trans-unit.target: 我父亲曾经告诉我，朋友应该只算一只手。我相信这是真的，因为友谊是一个相互给予和索取的系统，如果太多人从你那里拿走，那么你就什么都没有了。

trans-unit.source: I'm a little tired, (playername). Been putting in massive hours at the restaurant, but it has to be a success. Too many people are counting on me and I will not let them down. Now, if you'll excuse me, I'm going to get more work done.
trans-unit.target: 我有点累了。我在餐厅花了很多时间，但一定要成功。太多人指望我了，我不会让他们失望的。现在，请原谅，我要做更多的工作。

trans-unit.source: If you had unlimited funds, where would you go on vacation?
trans-unit.target: 如果你有无限的资金，你会去哪里度假？

trans-unit.source: Somewhere warm. A place with a beach that hopefully isn't full of trash. What about you?
trans-unit.target: 温暖的地方。一个有海滩的地方，希望没有垃圾。那你呢？

trans-unit.source: Somewhere historical. I love learning about the history of a place that I am visiting. What about you?
trans-unit.target: 历史的某个地方。我喜欢了解我正在参观的地方的历史。那你呢？

trans-unit.source: I'm not too partial to beaches, I burn easily, but doing some scuba diving would be fun. Sushi at the beach doesn't sound bad.
trans-unit.target: 我不太喜欢海滩，我很容易晒伤，但潜水会很有趣。海滩上的寿司听起来不错。

trans-unit.source: That's my speed too. I love visiting the local museums in the places I am vacationing. Even if some are more humble than others, they always leave an impact on me.
trans-unit.target: 这也是我的速度。我喜欢在度假的地方参观当地的博物馆。即使有些人比其他人更谦逊，他们总是会对我产生影响。

trans-unit.source: I am trying to take my therapist's advice to heart and figure out a vacation for myself. I love being in the thick of it, but if I don't get a break I am going to fall apart.
trans-unit.target: 我试着把治疗师的建议放在心上，为自己安排一个假期。我喜欢置身其中，但如果我不休息一下，我会崩溃的。

trans-unit.source: Have you ever noticed that the grind culture mentality really wants to make sure you are ground down to nothing? I won't have happen to me what happened to my father who died while on the job.
trans-unit.target: 你有没有注意到，研磨文化心态真的想确保你被研磨成什么？我不会让我的父亲在工作中去世的事情发生在我身上。

trans-unit.source: Hey, sorry, I'm super distracted right now. Things at the restaurant are a little hectic right now and I don't have the bandwidith or the time to explain it all. Later.
trans-unit.target: 嘿，抱歉，我现在超级分心。餐厅里的事情现在有点忙，我没有时间解释这一切。稍后。

trans-unit.source: I feel like a noodle that has been stretched super thin and thrown against the wall. I'm going to go home and pass out.
trans-unit.target: 我感觉自己就像一条被拉伸得极薄的面条，被扔到墙上。我要回家昏倒了。

trans-unit.source: After sleeping for 15 hours, I think I'm ready to take on the day once again.
trans-unit.target: 睡了15个小时后，我想我已经准备好再次开始新的一天了。

trans-unit.source: Are you sure? I think a mental health day wouldn't be a bad idea after the stress you've been going through.
trans-unit.target: 你确定吗？我认为在经历了压力之后，心理健康日并不是一个坏主意。

trans-unit.source: You know yourself and if you think you can do it, then go ahead.
trans-unit.target: 你了解自己，如果你认为你能做到，那就去吧。

trans-unit.source: I'm . . . yeah, I don't know how to take care of myself anymore.
trans-unit.target: 我。是啊，我不知道该怎么照顾自己了。

trans-unit.source: Yeah, I think I . . . I . . . I really can't. I just can't right now. I need to cool off some more.
trans-unit.target: 是的，我想我。一、我真的不能。我现在不能。我需要再冷静一下。

trans-unit.source: I've been mulling over some ideas on how I can improve the mental health of myself and my employees. I've got a plan, but I'll go into details later once I have all the points together. It's work, but the good kind.
trans-unit.target: 我一直在思考如何改善自己和员工的心理健康。我有一个计划，但等我把所有要点都弄清楚后，我会详细说明的。这是工作，但很好。

trans-unit.source: If I am going to make my mental health a priority in my life, I knew I had to offer my employees the same benefits. To be a leader is to be responsible not only to my well being but my employees as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果我要把心理健康作为我生活中的优先事项，我知道我必须为我的员工提供同样的福利。作为一名领导者，不仅要对我的健康负责，还要对我的员工负责。

trans-unit.source: I'm going to put my mental health plan to a vote. If my employees want this benefits package, then we'll have to send money we would spend on bonuses toward it. Since it would effect all of us, we all need to vote on it. Wish me luck, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我要把我的心理健康计划付诸表决。如果我的员工想要这个福利方案，那么我们就必须把花在奖金上的钱寄给他们。因为这会影响我们所有人，我们都需要投票。祝我好运，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: They voted to take the mental health package! Here's to a good first step toward a better future, so long as Mill + Rose continues to function that is.
trans-unit.target: 他们投票决定接受心理健康一揽子计划！这是迈向更美好未来的良好第一步，只要Mill+Rose继续运作。

trans-unit.source: 128_KOA_Random Interact
trans-unit.target: 128_COA_随机交互

trans-unit.source: It still smells like fish. Do I want to get used to it?
trans-unit.target: 它仍然闻起来像鱼。我想习惯它吗？

trans-unit.source: The views from here are lovely. Still, it isn't the Marketplace . . .
trans-unit.target: 从这里看风景很美。不过，这不是市场。

trans-unit.source: I never knew trees could grow so tall.
trans-unit.target: 我从来不知道树能长得这么高。

trans-unit.source: I miss the lights of Billboard City. I never thought I'd say that.
trans-unit.target: 我想念Billboard City的灯光。我从没想过我会这么说。

trans-unit.source: I really just want some R&R for now, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我现在真的只想休息一下，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: I was given a good start. Thanks, Mom.
trans-unit.target: 我有一个良好的开端。谢谢妈妈。

trans-unit.source: I always try to keep myself on point.
trans-unit.target: 我总是努力保持专注。

trans-unit.source: This coming from you? Don't you go soft on me.
trans-unit.target: 这是你说的？别对我太软弱。

trans-unit.source: I can't afford to slip. Consistency is key to making anything happen.
trans-unit.target: 我不能滑倒。一致性是使任何事情发生的关键。

trans-unit.source: . . .if only we were this kind to each other during culinary school. Thanks.
trans-unit.target: …要是我们在烹饪学校时能这样对彼此就好了。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: I don't need help right now. Thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我现在不需要帮助。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: For me? You got this for me? That's rather generous of you. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 为了我？你有这个给我吗？你真慷慨。非常感谢。

trans-unit.source: It really isn't something that I need.
trans-unit.target: 这真的不是我需要的东西。

trans-unit.source: I think you got me one of these already.
trans-unit.target: 我想你已经给我买了一个了。

trans-unit.source: I'm not that much of a hugger.
trans-unit.target: 我不是那么喜欢拥抱。

trans-unit.source: I can't tonight. Too much to do and not enough time.
trans-unit.target: 今晚不行。事情太多，时间不够。

trans-unit.source: I admire your work, but that's as far as my admiration goes.
trans-unit.target: 我钦佩你的工作，但这是我钦佩的程度。

trans-unit.source: 129_CAMILLE
129_CAMILLE_Random Interact
trans-unit.target: 129_CAMILLE_随机交互

trans-unit.source: It still smells like fish. Do I want to get used to it?
trans-unit.target: 它仍然闻起来像鱼。我想习惯它吗？

trans-unit.source: The views from here are lovely. Still, it isn't the Marketplace . . .
trans-unit.target: 从这里看风景很美。不过，这不是市场。

trans-unit.source: I never knew trees could grow so tall.
trans-unit.target: 我从来不知道树能长得这么高。

trans-unit.source: I miss the lights of Billboard City. I never thought I'd say that.
trans-unit.target: 我想念Billboard City的灯光。我从没想过我会这么说。

trans-unit.source: I really just want some R&R for now, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我现在真的只想做一些R&R (playername)。

trans-unit.source: 129_CAMILLE_INTERACT
trans-unit.target: 129_家庭互动

trans-unit.source: Hello, my friend! It's great seeing you. I hope everything is going well so far. I'll see you later.
trans-unit.target: 你好，我的朋友！很高兴见到你。我希望到目前为止一切顺利。稍后见。

trans-unit.source: I found this little shop on the docks that has some of the freshest fish I have ever seen. I've forgotten how good fresh fish is since in Billboard City it's usually shipped frozen.
trans-unit.target: 我在码头上发现了一家小店，里面有我见过的最新鲜的鱼。我忘了新鲜的鱼有多好，因为在Billboard City，它通常是冷冻运输的。

trans-unit.source: Talking to the people in town, it's crazy how much the people here have shifted culturally. A lot of young folks and that's amazing because it means the city will continue to live.
trans-unit.target: 与镇上的人们交谈时，这里的人们在文化上发生了多大的变化，这真是太疯狂了。很多年轻人，这很神奇，因为这意味着这座城市将继续存在。

trans-unit.source: When all is said and done, we have only our stories, which is why I like to chat with Bowie so much. We trade a lot of stories!
trans-unit.target: 当一切尘埃落定时，我们只有自己的故事，这就是为什么我如此喜欢和鲍伊聊天。我们交换了很多故事！

trans-unit.source: Old people, like myself, usually find themselves lamenting over how things used to be and I hate that line of thinking. Unless we are trying to fix a broken system, judging what others do is just complaining and I don't have time for complaining.
trans-unit.target: 像我这样的老年人通常会对过去的事情感到惋惜，我讨厌这种想法。除非我们试图修复一个破碎的系统，否则评判别人的所作所为只是抱怨，我没有时间抱怨。

trans-unit.source: (playername), how's things? Not just with Le Sequoia, but how are you doing?
trans-unit.target: (playername)，近况如何？不仅仅是与Le Sequoia合作，你近况如何？

trans-unit.source: I don't know, I think I'm okay. Just getting a lot done at the restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道，我想我没事。只是在餐厅做了很多事情。

trans-unit.source: I've picked up a few hobbies since arriving in town. I recently got into fishing and it's been fantastic!
trans-unit.target: 自从来到城里，我已经培养了一些爱好。我最近开始钓鱼，感觉太棒了！

trans-unit.source: You shouldn't waste away inside the restaurant. Life is more than just work.
trans-unit.target: 你不应该在餐厅里浪费时间。生活不仅仅是工作。

trans-unit.source: Fantastic! See! Billboard City has a lot going on in it, but you're not going to find something like that there.
trans-unit.target: 好极了！看！Billboard City有很多事情要做，但你不会在那里找到这样的东西。

trans-unit.source: Life is a crazy path to follow. It leads toward an end one day, but hopefully you've seen some sights along the way. In the end, that's all we could ask for.
trans-unit.target: 人生是一条疯狂的道路。总有一天，它会走向终点，但希望你一路上看到了一些风景。最后，这就是我们所能要求的。

trans-unit.source: I've been thinking, a dangerous pastime, I know, but your life isn't just for you. We live among others who lives are just as important as yours. A society is only as good as the people who inhabit it. That's it.
trans-unit.target: 我一直在想，我知道这是一种危险的消遣，但你的生活不仅仅适合你。我们和其他人生活在一起，他们的生活和你的生活一样重要。一个社会的好坏取决于居住在其中的人。就是这样。

trans-unit.source: The wind here is fresh, albeit, a little fishy, but that's part of the charm too.
trans-unit.target: 这里的风很清新，虽然有点可疑，但这也是魅力的一部分。

trans-unit.source: I have an appointment with April for a psychic reading. I'm curious to see what she has to tell me about my future.
trans-unit.target: 我和April约好了一次通灵阅读。我很好奇她对我的未来有什么看法。

trans-unit.source: You've been here a while now, do you feel like you've been making a difference around here?
trans-unit.target: 你在这里已经有一段时间了，你觉得你在这里有所作为吗？

trans-unit.source: I mean, it's a just a restaurant, chef.
trans-unit.target: 我的意思是，这只是一家餐厅，厨师。

trans-unit.source: A town needs everyone in it to help it move toward a better tomorrow. If you don't think you're making a difference by being here then you need to get out and walk around more.
trans-unit.target: 一个城镇需要每个人的帮助，才能走向更美好的明天。如果你不认为你在这里有所作为，那么你需要出去走走。

trans-unit.source: Seeing the good you put out into the world is its own reward. Enjoy the view, it always changes.
trans-unit.target: 看到你为这个世界所做的好事是它自己的回报。欣赏风景，它总是在变化。

trans-unit.source: Walking around here, I get to relive some of the happiest moments of my life. Nostalgia is a strong emotion, but to stay in the warmth of its glow would mean the death of my personal growth.
trans-unit.target: 在这里漫步，我可以重温我生命中最幸福的时刻。怀旧是一种强烈的情感，但停留在它的温暖中意味着我个人成长的死亡。

trans-unit.source: My knee is really acting up today. Please, I implore you, to wear good shoes now! It will only help you out later on in life.
trans-unit.target: 我的膝盖今天真的不舒服。我恳求你，现在就穿好鞋子！它只会在以后的生活中帮助你。

trans-unit.source: I went for a walk along the docks today and I didn't see Bowie. I thought something had happened, but no, he was just eating lunch in a different spot. When you get old, you tend to think the worst when something new happens.
trans-unit.target: 我今天沿着码头散步，没有看到鲍伊。我以为发生了什么事，但没有，他只是在另一个地方吃午饭。当你老了，当新的事情发生时，你往往会想到最坏的情况。

trans-unit.source: Just heading back from my yoga session! I have aches still, yes, but they hurt a lot less because of the yoga. Now, I just need some stretchy pants! Haha!
trans-unit.target: 刚从瑜伽课回来！是的，我仍然很疼，但因为瑜伽，疼痛减轻了很多。现在，我只需要一些弹性裤！哈哈！

trans-unit.source: Sunsets are rather beautiful, aren't they?
trans-unit.target: 日落很美，不是吗？

trans-unit.source: All that light, the colors, why wouldn't it?
trans-unit.target: 所有的光，颜色，为什么不呢？

trans-unit.source: I love 'em, means business is about to boom.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢他们，这意味着生意即将兴隆。

trans-unit.source: I always see sunsets a reflection of the day. It's telling you that it's done now and you can rest. Sounds pretty good to me, I'm beat.
trans-unit.target: 我总是看到日落是白天的倒影。它告诉你，现在已经完成了，你可以休息了。听起来不错，我累坏了。

trans-unit.source: Not everything in life should be about money, (playername). Let a sunset be a sunset. Let it tell you about your day without expectations.
trans-unit.target: 生活中并非所有事情都应该与金钱有关。让日落成为日落。让它告诉你没有期望的一天。

trans-unit.source: Life without something fun, something that brings you joy, is meaningless. Especially if that joy is commodified.
trans-unit.target: 没有乐趣的生活，没有给你带来快乐的生活，是没有意义的。尤其是当这种快乐被商品化的时候。

trans-unit.source: I am craving a nice steak. I might go by Chop to cook one up for myself. When you get to be my age, you find yourself being a little less safe because what's the point? Haha!
trans-unit.target: 我想吃一块美味的牛排。我可能会去Chop给自己做一个。当你到了我这个年纪，你会发现自己有点不安全，因为这有什么意义？哈哈！

trans-unit.source: Oh boy, I am getting tired faster these days. Do you think its the grave calling to me? Haha! I am kidding, but seriously, I gotta take a nap.
trans-unit.target: 哦，天哪，这些天我越来越累了。你觉得这是坟墓在召唤我吗？哈哈！我开玩笑的，但说真的，我得小睡一会儿。

trans-unit.source: You're a good friend, (playername). I wanted you to know that today. No reason, no why, just know that you're a good egg.
trans-unit.target: 你是个好朋友。我今天想让你知道。没有理由，没有理由，只要知道你是个好蛋。

trans-unit.source: Hi (playername). Things are going well?
trans-unit.target: 嗨(playername)。事情进展顺利吗？

trans-unit.source: I do miss this place. Especially the smell of the sea.
trans-unit.target: 我真的很想念这个地方。尤其是大海的味道。

trans-unit.source: Once, I thought I would spend my entire life here . . .
trans-unit.target: 曾经，我以为我会在这里度过我的一生。

trans-unit.source: Le Sequoia is in good hands now.
trans-unit.target: 乐红杉现在得到了很好的照顾。

trans-unit.source: Travelling is difficult for me these days.
trans-unit.target: 这些天旅行对我来说很难。

trans-unit.source: I'm sorry, did you think that you had something interesting to say to me? Doesn't sound like it to me!
trans-unit.target: 对不起，你以为你有什么有趣的话要对我说吗？听起来不像！

trans-unit.source: Move, you're in my way.
trans-unit.target: 快走，你挡住我的路了。

trans-unit.source: I have things to do. Things that don't involve you. Move.
trans-unit.target: 我有事情要做，与你无关的事情。移动。

trans-unit.source: Why do you keep popping up like a bad penny? I really need to get going here.
trans-unit.target: 你为什么总是像坏便士一样突然出现？我真的需要走了。

trans-unit.source: Look . . . you had your shot in my kitchen. You left. End of story.
trans-unit.target: 看。你在我的厨房里开枪了。你走了。故事到此为止。

trans-unit.source: Why do you keep trying to talk to me even though I have no interest in speaking to you?
trans-unit.target: 为什么你一直试图和我说话，即使我没有兴趣和你说话？

trans-unit.source: I mean, you're asking me a question, aren't you? I didn't make you do that.
trans-unit.target: 我的意思是，你在问我一个问题，不是吗？我没有逼你那么做。

trans-unit.source: Because I wonder why you hate me so much.
trans-unit.target: 因为我想知道你为什么这么恨我。

trans-unit.source: I am asking because you seem to constantly find me and I really don't have the time for you.
trans-unit.target: 我问是因为你似乎一直在找我，我真的没有时间陪你。

trans-unit.source: Hate means that I am always thinking about you and want to do something violent towards you because I have such a strong negative feeling toward you. I don't hate you because I don't even think about you when you're not pestering me.
trans-unit.target: 仇恨意味着我总是想着你，想对你做一些暴力的事情，因为我对你有强烈的负面情绪。我不恨你，因为你不烦我的时候，我甚至都不想你。

trans-unit.source: I'll have to have Gale grade those papers for the introductory classes and . . . WHAT DO YOU WANT?!
trans-unit.target: 我得让盖尔给那些入门课的论文打分，然后。你想要什么？！

trans-unit.source: Hi, Gale, what's the status of the gala committee so far? Uh huh, uh huh, good. That's very good. Oh, really? Then you tell him he is fired. (If he's at a phone booth).
trans-unit.target: 嗨，盖尔，晚会委员会到目前为止进展如何？嗯，嗯，很好。那太好了。哦，真的吗？然后你告诉他他被解雇了。（如果他在电话亭）。

trans-unit.source: I want to have time to myself. I run an entire culinary institute, so will you please leave me alone so I can have some quiet for a bloody moment!
trans-unit.target: 我想有自己的时间。我经营着整个烹饪学院，所以请你别管我，这样我就可以安静一会儿了！

trans-unit.source: For someone who walked away from my kitchen and my teachings, you seem awfully clingy because you keep bothering me.
trans-unit.target: 对于一个离开我的厨房和我的教导的人来说，你似乎非常粘人，因为你一直在打扰我。

trans-unit.source: You left my kitchen and I want to know why?
trans-unit.target: 你离开了我的厨房，我想知道为什么？

trans-unit.source: You're giant jerk, Canton! I am not the first nor will I be the last to quit, so why are you dwelling on my leaving so much?!
trans-unit.target: 你是个大混蛋，坎顿！我不是第一个辞职的人，也不会是最后一个辞职的，你为什么对我的离开如此关注？！

trans-unit.source: I thought you didn't care about whether people quit your kitchen or not?
trans-unit.target: 我以为你不在乎人们是否离开你的厨房？

trans-unit.source: Because! Because . . . because when people quit I don't see them anymore. They failed and are gone. You, you just don't know when to quit!
trans-unit.target: 因为！因为。因为当人们辞职时，我再也见不到他们了。他们失败了，走了。你，你只是不知道什么时候该退出！

trans-unit.source: I don't, but those people usually leave my sight forever. They don't go on in the industry and if they do they stay at the appropriate level, dishwasher!
trans-unit.target: 我没有，但那些人通常会永远离开我的视线。他们不会在这个行业继续下去，如果他们继续下去，他们会保持在适当的水平，洗碗机！

trans-unit.source: Upstarts don't last and they certainly aren't remembered beyond their 15 minutes in the spotlight.
trans-unit.target: 初创企业不会持续太久，在聚光灯下15分钟后肯定不会被人们记住。

trans-unit.source: When will you learn that I don't want to talk to you and have zero INTEREST in having a conversation beyond me just yelling at you?!
trans-unit.target: 你什么时候知道我不想和你说话，除了对你大喊大叫，我对谈话毫无兴趣？！

trans-unit.source: Let's try something new, shall we? You go one direction, I go another, and you vanish from my existence forever.
trans-unit.target: 让我们尝试一些新的东西，好吗？你往一个方向走，我往另一个方向，你永远从我的存在中消失。

trans-unit.source: You wouldn't know an original thought if it flew up and slap the side of your head!
trans-unit.target: 如果它飞起来拍打你的脑袋，你就不会知道一个原创的想法！

trans-unit.source: Listen quitter, your food may get some decent reviews but you are still trash to me and until I see otherwise, trash you shall be!
trans-unit.target: 听着，放弃吧，你的食物可能会得到一些不错的评价，但对我来说，你仍然是垃圾，除非我另有打算，否则你就是垃圾！

trans-unit.source: Oh, so you do read the reviews about my food? I thought you didn't care?
trans-unit.target: 哦，所以你确实读过关于我食物的评论？我以为你不在乎？

trans-unit.source: Is someone forever spitting in your cereal and putting you in a bad mood?
trans-unit.target: 有人总是往你的麦片里吐口水，让你心情不好吗？

trans-unit.source: I . . .how dare . . . just, leave me alone!
trans-unit.target: 一、怎么敢。别管我！

trans-unit.source: My cereal is eggs, bacon, toast, and a cup of coffee and is better than yours! I wake in a great mood every day, so stop being bitter about my life!
trans-unit.target: 我的麦片是鸡蛋、熏肉、烤面包和一杯咖啡，比你的好！我每天醒来都心情很好，所以别再对我的生活感到痛苦了！

trans-unit.source: I've got TA's that have grading to do based on my reactions to students dishes, so please, move out of my way.
trans-unit.target: 我有助教要根据我对学生菜肴的反应进行评分，所以请让开。

trans-unit.source: If you're looking an apology or an acknowledgment of your accomplishments, you're barking up the wrong tree.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在寻求道歉或承认你的成就，那你找错人了。

trans-unit.source: You are showing a lot of . . . promise, (playername). Have a good day.
trans-unit.target: 你展示了很多。答应，(playername)。祝您今天过得愉快。

trans-unit.source: You should know that I will forever hold you quitting my kitchen in my heart, but I'd be an idiot to not see what my eyes are telling me. You're a good chef.
trans-unit.target: 你应该知道，我会永远把你从我的厨房里抱出来，但如果我不明白我的眼睛在告诉我什么，我就是个白痴。你是个好厨师。

trans-unit.source: 201_T.E.C. Takoyaki
trans-unit.target: 201_T.E.C.Takoyaki

trans-unit.source: Heya pal, smells good right?
trans-unit.target: 嘿，伙计，闻起来很香，对吧？

trans-unit.source: We got classic, garlic, spicy, and deluxe.
trans-unit.target: 我们有经典、大蒜、辣味和豪华。

trans-unit.source: Did you know, this is a popular destination for dates?
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗，这是一个受欢迎的约会目的地？

trans-unit.source: We are quite popular now thanks to social media.
trans-unit.target: 多亏了社交媒体，我们现在很受欢迎。

trans-unit.source: It's quiet these days. There are very few customers.
trans-unit.target: 这几天很安静。顾客很少。

trans-unit.source: I miss the old days. These docks were filled with people.
trans-unit.target: 我怀念过去的日子。这些码头挤满了人。

trans-unit.source: I hope the mayor can fix things here.
trans-unit.target: 我希望市长能解决这里的问题。

trans-unit.source: Care to buy anything? I've seen few customers today.
trans-unit.target: 想买点什么吗？我今天很少见到顾客。

trans-unit.source: What brings you to this quiet little town?
trans-unit.target: 是什么让你来到这个安静的小镇？

trans-unit.source: It's busy again. Just like the good ol' days.
trans-unit.target: 又忙了。就像过去的好日子一样。

trans-unit.source: It's good to see White Ash Harbor so alive.
trans-unit.target: 很高兴看到白灰港如此生机勃勃。

trans-unit.source: Tourists always come here after the bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 游客总是在澡堂之后来这里。

trans-unit.source: Thanks to you, business is booming again.
trans-unit.target: 多亏了你，生意再次兴隆。

trans-unit.source: Good to see you friend.
trans-unit.target: 很高兴见到你，朋友。

trans-unit.source: This squid was still swimmin in the ocean last night. Come get em while it's fresh!
trans-unit.target: 这只鱿鱼昨晚还在海里游泳。趁新鲜来拿！

trans-unit.source: We got Classic, Garlic, Spicy, and Deluxe. Which one would you like?
trans-unit.target: 我们有经典、大蒜、辣味和豪华。你想要哪一个？

trans-unit.source: Welcome! What would you like to order?
trans-unit.target: 欢迎光临！您想点什么？

trans-unit.source: Looking for some Takoyaki to-go, my friend?
trans-unit.target: 朋友，你在找Takoyaki吗？

trans-unit.source: I especially enjoy the Deluxe. It's like a party in your mouth. And everyone is invited!
trans-unit.target: 我特别喜欢豪华房。这就像你嘴里的派对。所有人都被邀请了！

trans-unit.source: Sit back, and taste the best Takoyaki you've ever had!
trans-unit.target: 坐下来，尝尝你吃过的最好的Takoyaki！

trans-unit.source: You'll enjoy this.
trans-unit.target: 你会喜欢的。

trans-unit.source: Ah, great choice!
trans-unit.target: 啊，不错的选择！

trans-unit.source: This might be useful . . .
trans-unit.target: 这可能有用。

trans-unit.source: I guess I can take this.
trans-unit.target: 我想我可以接受这个。

trans-unit.source: Great! I can use this.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了我可以用这个。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I only sell Takoyaki here.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我这里只卖Takoyaki。

trans-unit.source: I can't buy this.
trans-unit.target: 我不能买这个。

trans-unit.source: I cannot sell this item.
trans-unit.target: 我不能卖这个东西。

trans-unit.source: You don't have enough credits.
trans-unit.target: 你没有足够的信用点。

trans-unit.source: Come back when you have more credits mate.
trans-unit.target: 当你有更多的信用点时回来，伙计。

trans-unit.source: It doesn't look like you have enough credits bud.
trans-unit.target: 看来你的信用点不够，伙计。

trans-unit.source: Hello, welcome to Eight Eleven.
trans-unit.target: 你好，欢迎来到八十一。

trans-unit.source: You look like you need an energy drink.
trans-unit.target: 你看起来需要一杯能量饮料。

trans-unit.source: Thank you, come again!
trans-unit.target: 谢谢，再来！

trans-unit.source: Please come again! We are open 24 hours a day.
trans-unit.target: 请再来！我们全天24小时开放。

trans-unit.source: Please stop it with the weird looks. Yes, I am an android.
trans-unit.target: 请停止用奇怪的眼神。是的，我是安卓。

trans-unit.source: Eight Eleven is owned and operated by LELSH.
trans-unit.target: 8-Eleven由LELSH拥有和经营。

trans-unit.source: It's been quiet today. That's great for me.
trans-unit.target: 今天很安静。这对我来说太好了。

trans-unit.source: LELSH might close this branch due to low business.
trans-unit.target: LELSH可能会因为业务量低而关闭这家分行。

trans-unit.source: The folks here don't like this store. I wonder why?
trans-unit.target: 这里的人不喜欢这家店。我想知道为什么？

trans-unit.source: My supercharger allows me to stay awake 24 hours a day.
trans-unit.target: 我的增压器让我一天24小时保持清醒。

trans-unit.source: Ughhh . . . Why are there so many people now?
trans-unit.target: 啊。为什么现在有这么多人？

trans-unit.source: LELSH decided to invest more into this branch.
trans-unit.target: LELSH决定加大对这家分行的投资。

trans-unit.source: Hello! We have new goods now thanks to LELSH.
trans-unit.target: 你好！多亏了LELSH，我们现在有了新产品。

trans-unit.source: So many strangers now . . .
trans-unit.target: 现在这么多陌生人。

trans-unit.source: I heard LELSH might open up another store here.
trans-unit.target: 我听说LELSH可能会在这里再开一家店。

trans-unit.source: Welcome to Eight Eleven my friend. The one stop shop for all your everyday needs!
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到八十一，我的朋友。满足您所有日常需求的一站式商店！

trans-unit.source: I could never get used to the weather here, and the birds are really annoying. My dream is to one day become an Eight Eleven executive.
trans-unit.target: 我永远无法适应这里的天气，而且鸟儿真的很烦人。我的梦想是有一天能成为一名8-11的高管。

trans-unit.source: You must be the new chef! Please stop by for all your ingredient needs! There is no need to waste your time browsing the market.
trans-unit.target: 你一定是新来的厨师！请随时光临，满足您的所有配料需求！没有必要浪费时间浏览市场。

trans-unit.source: What do you sell here?
trans-unit.target: 你们这里卖什么？

trans-unit.source: We have everything you will ever need! No need to go anywhere else! Eight Eleven is the place to be!
trans-unit.target: 我们有你需要的一切！无需前往其他任何地方！8-11是个好地方！

trans-unit.source: What do you recommend?
trans-unit.target: 你有什么建议吗？

trans-unit.source: If you are heading out into the mountains, I'd recommend taking a couple of energy drinks and snacks. It's a tough trail.
trans-unit.target: 如果你要去山里，我建议你喝点能量饮料和吃点零食。这是一条艰难的道路。

trans-unit.source: Well what can I say? It's a quiet little town with a lot of strange folks. Also, the humidity here is bad for my circuits, but hey, a job's a job.
trans-unit.target: 我能说什么呢？这是一个安静的小镇，有很多奇怪的人。此外，这里的湿度对我的电路不好，但是嘿，工作就是工作。

trans-unit.source: Where should I go?
trans-unit.target: 我该去哪里？

trans-unit.source: I don't know. Talk to the Hotel Rose concierge or the information Kiosk in the center of town if you want some recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道。如果你想得到一些建议，可以咨询玫瑰酒店礼宾部或市中心的信息亭。

trans-unit.source: Eight Eleven has everything you will ever need.
trans-unit.target: 8-Eleven有你需要的一切。

trans-unit.source: There is really no need to buy fresh produce.
trans-unit.target: 真的没有必要买新鲜的农产品。

trans-unit.source: We receive all our goods from the LELSH corporation.
trans-unit.target: 我们从LELSH公司收到所有货物。

trans-unit.source: A lot of kids come by for snacks.
trans-unit.target: 很多孩子来吃零食。

trans-unit.source: I personally recommend the instant noodles.
trans-unit.target: 我个人推荐方便面。

trans-unit.source: This one is great. You have a great eye.
trans-unit.target: 这个很棒。你的眼光很好。

trans-unit.source: We have the same taste. We could be siblings!
trans-unit.target: 我们有相同的品味。我们可以成为兄弟姐妹！

trans-unit.source: Ah, what a great choice!
trans-unit.target: 啊，多么好的选择啊！

trans-unit.source: Interesting.
trans-unit.target: 有趣。

trans-unit.source: I guess I can take this.
trans-unit.target: 我想我可以接受这个。

trans-unit.source: Great! I can use this.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了我可以用这个。

trans-unit.source: This isn't the right item.
trans-unit.target: 这不是正确的项目。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I can't buy this . . .
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我不能买这个。

trans-unit.source: I cannot buy this item.
trans-unit.target: 我买不到这个东西。

trans-unit.source: You don't have enough credits.
trans-unit.target: 你没有足够的信用点。

trans-unit.source: Hmmmm. Doesn't look like you can afford this.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。看起来你买不起这个。

trans-unit.source: I think you may need more credits.
trans-unit.target: 我想你可能需要更多的信用点。

trans-unit.source: Please wear shoes and a shirt within hotel premises.
trans-unit.target: 请在酒店内穿鞋子和衬衫。
