trans-unit.source: Hi, I'm Robert. Have a fantastic stay!
trans-unit.target: 嗨，我是罗伯特。祝您住宿愉快！

trans-unit.source: Ehh. . . whatever.
trans-unit.target: 呃。无论什么。

trans-unit.source: Please let me know if you need anything.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要什么，请告诉我。

trans-unit.source: Do you have any bags you would like us to pick up?
trans-unit.target: 你有什么包要我们拿吗？

trans-unit.source: Hello. Would you like a room here? Oh . . .
trans-unit.target: 你好。你想要一个房间吗？哦。

trans-unit.source: We don't get many visitors these days . . .
trans-unit.target: 这些天来我们的客人不多。

trans-unit.source: This hotel has seen better days. Oh, it was so lively!
trans-unit.target: 这家酒店经历了更好的日子。哦，太热闹了！

trans-unit.source: I hope the mayor will provide funds for refurbishments.
trans-unit.target: 我希望市长能为翻修提供资金。

trans-unit.source: Listen to that . . . the echoes of laughter from the past . . .
trans-unit.target: 听着。过去的笑声回响。

trans-unit.source: This is incredible. The rooms are all booked up!
trans-unit.target: 这太不可思议了。房间都订满了！

trans-unit.source: The laughter has returned. It is no longer a dream.
trans-unit.target: 笑声又回来了。这不再是一场梦。

trans-unit.source: The energy here makes me feel young again.
trans-unit.target: 这里的活力让我再次感到年轻。

trans-unit.source: The bathhouse has attracted so many visitors!
trans-unit.target: 澡堂吸引了这么多游客！

trans-unit.source: Aylin is a strange woman no? But very beautiful too.
trans-unit.target: 艾琳是个奇怪的女人，不是吗？但也很漂亮。

trans-unit.source: Welcome to our fine establishment. Would you like a room?
trans-unit.target: 欢迎光临我们的精品店。你想要一个房间吗？

trans-unit.source: I am the concierge of this fine hotel. Ask me anything.
trans-unit.target: 我是这家高档酒店的礼宾。问我任何事。

trans-unit.source: Hi, my name is Robert. Let me know if I may be of service.
trans-unit.target: 你好，我叫罗伯特。如果我能帮上忙，请告诉我。

trans-unit.source: What is this place?
trans-unit.target: 这是什么地方？

trans-unit.source: Why this is Hotel Rose, a famous historic site of White Ash Harbor! _ When Princess Eliza II first landed here over 200 years ago, she fell in love with the beach and built this magnificent hotel for her court to come visit.
trans-unit.target: 为什么这里是白灰港著名的历史遗迹玫瑰酒店！_200多年前，当伊丽莎二世公主第一次来到这里时，她爱上了海滩，并为她的宫廷建造了这座宏伟的酒店。

trans-unit.source: Where should I go relax?
trans-unit.target: 我应该去哪里放松？

trans-unit.source: Well, besides the famous bathhouse, you can relax at the tourist beach just east of town._If you are feeling adventurous, there is a scenic hiking trail to the north. But do beware of animals!
trans-unit.target: 好吧，除了著名的澡堂，你还可以在城镇以东的旅游海滩放松身心_如果你喜欢冒险，有一条通往北方的风景优美的远足径。但一定要小心动物！

trans-unit.source: Where can I get some food?
trans-unit.target: 我在哪里可以买到食物？

trans-unit.source: You can find White Ash Harbor's popular Takoyaki shop by the docks. For drinks, you should check out Bea's Bar and Bubble Shack.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在码头边找到白灰港受欢迎的Takoyaki商店。对于饮料，你应该去Bea's Bar和Bubble Shack看看。

trans-unit.source: Got any advice for me?
trans-unit.target: 你有什么建议吗？

trans-unit.source: Make sure to decorate your restaurant. It really improves the guests' experience and they may leave more tips!
trans-unit.target: 一定要装饰你的餐厅。这确实改善了客人的体验，他们可能会留下更多的提示！

trans-unit.source: 204_YVONNE_HOTEL_BAGGAGE
trans-unit.target: 204_元_酒店_行李

trans-unit.source: Hello.
trans-unit.target: 你好。

trans-unit.source: Welcome to Hotel Rose.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到玫瑰酒店。

trans-unit.source: Do you need anything?
trans-unit.target: 你需要什么吗？

trans-unit.source: Oh sorry, didn't see you there.
trans-unit.target: 哦，对不起，没看见你在那里。

trans-unit.source: Hello. I'm Yvonne. Do you have luggage?
trans-unit.target: 你好。我是伊冯。你有行李吗？

trans-unit.source: I work here as a bellhop to earn my tuition fees.
trans-unit.target: 我在这里当行李员挣学费。

trans-unit.source: If you have questions, please ask the Robert the concierge.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有任何疑问，请咨询礼宾部的罗伯特。

trans-unit.source: Not much to do around here . . .
trans-unit.target: 这里没什么可做的。

trans-unit.source: Do do do do do do do do . . .
trans-unit.target: 做，做，做。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, I just sit in the corner and study.
trans-unit.target: 有时候，我只是坐在角落里学习。

trans-unit.source: Ughhhh. These tourists are too rowdy.
trans-unit.target: 啊。这些游客太吵闹了。

trans-unit.source: It's busy, but the extra tips are nice I guess.
trans-unit.target: 虽然很忙，但我想额外的小费很不错。

trans-unit.source: Um . . . Sorry but I'm soooo busy right now!
trans-unit.target: 嗯。对不起，我现在太忙了！

trans-unit.source: With all these tips, I can afford school soon!
trans-unit.target: 有了这些建议，我很快就能负担得起上学了！

trans-unit.source: This is the liveliest I've seen this place.
trans-unit.target: 这是我见过的最热闹的地方。

trans-unit.source: 205_CORA_DOCK_WORKER
trans-unit.target: 205_CORA_DOCK_工人

trans-unit.source: I love the smell of the sea in the morning.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢早上大海的味道。

trans-unit.source: Please be careful on the docks.
trans-unit.target: 请在码头上小心。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to go fishing in the open sea, talk to the captain.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想去公海钓鱼，和船长谈谈。

trans-unit.source: Have you been to the fishing platform?
trans-unit.target: 你去过钓鱼平台吗？

trans-unit.source: Ughhh. I haven't caught anything today.
trans-unit.target: 啊。我今天什么也没抓到。

trans-unit.source: Fishing is a hard business. Especially when there are few buyers.
trans-unit.target: 钓鱼是一项艰巨的任务。尤其是当买家很少的时候。

trans-unit.source: It's a quiet sea today.
trans-unit.target: 今天海面很平静。

trans-unit.source: Have you met Aloys? He's soooo cool. Ah . . .
trans-unit.target: 你见过Aloys吗？他太酷了。啊。

trans-unit.source: Mom says there isn't a future for me here.
trans-unit.target: 妈妈说我在这里没有未来。

trans-unit.source: You are a chef? What's that like?
trans-unit.target: 你是厨师吗？那是什么感觉？

trans-unit.source: Oh boy. It's a little crowded on the docks lately.
trans-unit.target: 哦，天哪。最近码头有点拥挤。

trans-unit.source: We've been having better luck out at sea.
trans-unit.target: 我们在海上运气比较好。

trans-unit.source: Mom says I should stay here and work to become the captain.
trans-unit.target: 妈妈说我应该留在这里，努力成为队长。

trans-unit.source: Our fish has been getting bought out recently.
trans-unit.target: 我们的鱼最近被买光了。

trans-unit.source: I've saved up enough to travel to Billboard City!
trans-unit.target: 我已经存够了去Billboard City的钱！

trans-unit.source: 206_LEON_BOAT_CAPTAIN
trans-unit.target: 206_船_船_船长

trans-unit.source: You have no idea of the creatures that live here . . .
trans-unit.target: 你根本不知道生活在这里的生物。

trans-unit.source: The waters are calm today.
trans-unit.target: 今天海水很平静。

trans-unit.source: I only feel alive amidst the open sea.
trans-unit.target: 我只觉得在大海中活着。

trans-unit.source: Yer don't look like no fisherman to me.
trans-unit.target: 在我看来，你不像一个渔夫。

trans-unit.source: The waters are quiet today . . .
trans-unit.target: 今天海水很平静。

trans-unit.source: Do you fear the waters? Well . . . you should.
trans-unit.target: 你害怕水吗？嗯。你应该。

trans-unit.source: I miss relaxing in the bathhouse after a long day at sea.
trans-unit.target: 在海上度过漫长的一天后，我想念在澡堂放松。

trans-unit.source: The ocean has claimed many friends. Their spirits call out to me.
trans-unit.target: 大海夺走了许多朋友。他们的灵魂向我呼喊。

trans-unit.source: My boat is being repaired at the moment.
trans-unit.target: 我的船现在正在修理。

trans-unit.source: It's good to see the docks alive again.
trans-unit.target: 很高兴看到码头又恢复了生机。

trans-unit.source: Oh boy. What I wouldn't give for a bottle of rum right now.
trans-unit.target: 哦，天哪。我现在不会为一瓶朗姆酒付出代价。

trans-unit.source: The waters are lively today.
trans-unit.target: 今天的水很活跃。

trans-unit.source: Something dreadful lies underneath White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 白灰港下面有可怕的东西。

trans-unit.source: Ah, it's good to be able to visit the bathhouse again.
trans-unit.target: 啊，能再次参观澡堂真是太好了。

trans-unit.source: Eh, you must be the new chef. I'm looking forward to dining at your restaurant this weekend.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，你一定是新来的厨师。我期待着这个周末在你们餐厅用餐。

trans-unit.source: Aye matey, me ship is being repaired at the moment. Please come back in a few weeks. I can take yer to the open sea.
trans-unit.target: 是的，伙计，我的船现在正在修理。请几周后回来。我可以带你去大海。

trans-unit.source: I nagged a giant tuna last month. Fed my family for weeks. Ye can only catch big ones like that in the open sea.
trans-unit.target: 上个月我唠叨了一条巨大的金枪鱼。喂了我的家人好几个星期。你只有在公海才能钓到这样的大鱼。

trans-unit.source: Where can you take me?
trans-unit.target: 你能带我去哪里？

trans-unit.source: For 500 creds, I can take yer to the open sea fer some good ol fishin. For 2000, I'll sail yer to the fishin platform. That will be a six hour trip.
trans-unit.target: 500克，我可以带你去公海钓些好鱼。2000年，我将航行你到钓鱼平台。那将是一次六个小时的旅行。

trans-unit.source: How can I catch fish?
trans-unit.target: 我怎样才能捕鱼？

trans-unit.source: You'll need some fishin tools. Pomarine sells them at her on the docks.
trans-unit.target: 你需要一些钓鱼工具。Pomarine在码头上把它们卖给她。

trans-unit.source: Where can I catch fish?
trans-unit.target: 我在哪里可以捕鱼？

trans-unit.source: You can nag em right here on the docks with a good 'o rod. If you wanna catch them crabs and lobsters, you can find them in the caves to the west. Be careful though, them besties ain't so gentle.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在码头上用一根好棍子唠叨他们。如果你想抓螃蟹和龙虾，你可以在西边的洞穴里找到它们。不过要小心，他们的闺蜜没那么温柔。

trans-unit.source: What's out there?
trans-unit.target: 外面是什么？

trans-unit.source: Well yer lookin at open sea my friend. The only thing out there is the fishin platform. Aside from that, nothin but fishies out there!
trans-unit.target: 好吧，你看大海，我的朋友。外面唯一的东西就是钓鱼平台。除此之外，外面除了鱼什么都没有！

trans-unit.source: 207_MARY_ANNE_GRANDMA
trans-unit.target: 207年_月_安_兰玛

trans-unit.source: Hi sweety.
trans-unit.target: 嗨，甜心。

trans-unit.source: Lulu is always workin so hard.
trans-unit.target: 露露总是那么努力地工作。

trans-unit.source: Anna is obsessed with her computer games.
trans-unit.target: 安娜痴迷于她的电脑游戏。

trans-unit.source: Have you seen my husband? I can't remember where he went.
trans-unit.target: 你看见我丈夫了吗？我不记得他去哪里了。

trans-unit.source: If I were younger, I'd still be helpin' out on the farm.
trans-unit.target: 如果我年轻一点，我仍然会在农场帮忙。

trans-unit.source: I've lived here for most of my life. Oh, it was so lively then.
trans-unit.target: 我大部分时间都住在这里。哦，那时候太热闹了。

trans-unit.source: Lulu used to befriend all the tourists when she was younger.
trans-unit.target: 露露年轻时常常和所有的游客交朋友。

trans-unit.source: LELSH buys up most of our crops now.
trans-unit.target: LELSH现在收购了我们的大部分作物。

trans-unit.source: My husband and I started this farm after getting married.
trans-unit.target: 我和丈夫结婚后开始经营这个农场。

trans-unit.source: If I were younger, I'd fight to revitalise this town!
trans-unit.target: 如果我年轻一点，我会为振兴这个城镇而战！

trans-unit.source: How come you never told me you were such a great chef?
trans-unit.target: 你怎么从来没告诉我你是个很棒的厨师？

trans-unit.source: Hello dear. Hungry for some cookies?
trans-unit.target: 你好，亲爱的。想吃饼干吗？

trans-unit.source: The liveliness of White Ash Harbor reminds me of my youth.
trans-unit.target: 白灰港的热闹让我想起了我的青春。

trans-unit.source: Anna is a talented child. She just doesn't fit in with the world.
trans-unit.target: 安娜是个有天赋的孩子。她就是不适合这个世界。

trans-unit.source: I just hope Anna and Lulu can live happy lives.
trans-unit.target: 我只希望安娜和露露能过上幸福的生活。

trans-unit.source: 208_CASPER_GRANDPA
trans-unit.target: 208_阿斯珀_格兰帕

trans-unit.source: Hmmm, looks like a good day to go fishin.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，看起来今天是钓鱼的好日子。

trans-unit.source: I hope Lulu finds a good man one day.
trans-unit.target: 我希望露露有一天能找到一个好男人。

trans-unit.source: Anna is a strange one. I don't understand kids these days.
trans-unit.target: 安娜是个奇怪的人。这些天我不了解孩子们。

trans-unit.source: Did you know? My Anna is an artist!
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗？我的安娜是个艺术家！

trans-unit.source: Hey kid. Did you know I used to be a swimming champion?
trans-unit.target: 嘿，孩子。你知道我曾经是游泳冠军吗？

trans-unit.source: Back in the day, I would beat all the tourists at arm wrestling!
trans-unit.target: 以前，我会在摔跤比赛中打败所有的游客！

trans-unit.source: The closure of the bathhouse saddens me.
trans-unit.target: 澡堂的关闭让我很难过。

trans-unit.source: Fight for this town kid. I know you have it in you.
trans-unit.target: 为这个镇上的孩子而战。我知道你有它在你。

trans-unit.source: Lulu is a hard worker. I hope it doesn't go to waste.
trans-unit.target: 露露是个勤奋的人。我希望它不会被浪费。

trans-unit.source: Anna May will become a famous artist one day. I know it!
trans-unit.target: 安娜·梅总有一天会成为著名的艺术家。我知道！

trans-unit.source: I can go to the bathhouse again!
trans-unit.target: 我可以再去澡堂了！

trans-unit.source: I might go fishin again. Waddaya think kid?
trans-unit.target: 我可能会再去钓鱼。Waddaya认为孩子？

trans-unit.source: Takashi Farms is doing great thanks to Lulu.
trans-unit.target: 多亏了露露，高桥农场做得很好。

trans-unit.source: Back in the day, I wrestled a giant marlin out of the water!
trans-unit.target: 从前，我从水中挣扎出一条巨大的马林鱼！

trans-unit.source: My wife and I have been raising Takashi Farms for ages.
trans-unit.target: 我和妻子养高市农场已经很久了。

trans-unit.source: 209_GAVIN_MAYOR
trans-unit.target: 209.加文少校

trans-unit.source: Huh, youngsters these days.
trans-unit.target: 啊，这些年轻人。

trans-unit.source: Can't you see I'm busy?
trans-unit.target: 你没看见我很忙吗？

trans-unit.source: Do you have a gift for me? No? Why are you still standing here?
trans-unit.target: 你有礼物给我吗？不？你为什么还站在这里？

trans-unit.source: Ugh, why does everyone come to me with their complaints?
trans-unit.target: 啊，为什么每个人都来找我抱怨？

trans-unit.source: This job doesn't pay well enough.
trans-unit.target: 这份工作的薪水不够高。

trans-unit.source: Everyone is looking at me to solve White Ash Harbor's problems.
trans-unit.target: 每个人都在看着我解决白灰港的问题。

trans-unit.source: How about you fetch me a nice cheesecake?
trans-unit.target: 你给我拿个美味的芝士蛋糕怎么样？

trans-unit.source: Man, I wish more tourists would show up. I could collect more tax.
trans-unit.target: 伙计，我希望有更多的游客来。我可以征收更多的税。

trans-unit.source: I can't wait to retire in a luxury apartment in Billboard City.
trans-unit.target: 我迫不及待地想在Billboard City的豪华公寓里退休。

trans-unit.source: Prisca is my helper. Go see her if you need anything.
trans-unit.target: 普里斯卡是我的帮手。如果你需要什么，就去找她。

trans-unit.source: More tourists . . . Nice ain't it?
trans-unit.target: 更多游客。不错吧？

trans-unit.source: Blimey . . . The tax coffer is piling high.
trans-unit.target: 天哪。国库堆积如山。

trans-unit.source: I just went to a BTL 42 concert. VIP pass baby!
trans-unit.target: 我刚刚参加了BTL 42的演唱会。VIP通行证宝贝！

trans-unit.source: Guess what? LELSH's CEO personally called me last week!
trans-unit.target: 你猜怎么着？LELSH的首席执行官上周亲自给我打了电话！

trans-unit.source: Gah. Too many kids running around.
trans-unit.target: 啊。太多的孩子到处乱跑。

trans-unit.source: What are ya doing here kid? You know that this is city hall right?
trans-unit.target: 孩子，你在这里干什么？你知道这是市政厅吧？

trans-unit.source: Being the mayor is a lot of work. Therefore I should be paid more than everyone in town, and live in the biggest house.
trans-unit.target: 当市长是一项繁重的工作。因此，我应该比镇上的每个人都得到更多的报酬，住在最大的房子里。

trans-unit.source: The locals here should be working harder to satisfy the tourists. Our annual tax revenues could be a lot higher.
trans-unit.target: 这里的当地人应该更加努力地满足游客的需求。我们的年度税收收入可能会高得多。

trans-unit.source: What do you do here?
trans-unit.target: 你在这里做什么？

trans-unit.source: As the mayor of White Ash Harbor, I oversee the town's finances, host events, and make sure everything is running in tip-top shape.
trans-unit.target: 作为白灰港的市长，我负责监督该镇的财务，举办活动，并确保一切都处于最佳状态。

trans-unit.source: How can I purchase a home?
trans-unit.target: 我如何购买房屋？

trans-unit.source: Talk to Prsica, she handles property sales.
trans-unit.target: 与Prsica交谈，她负责房地产销售。

trans-unit.source: How can renovate buildings?
trans-unit.target: 如何对建筑物进行翻新？

trans-unit.source: We don't have a carpenter in town, but Prisca can organize construction projects if you can supply the required materials.
trans-unit.target: 我们城里没有木匠，但如果你能提供所需的材料，Prisca可以组织建筑项目。

trans-unit.source: What are the annual events?
trans-unit.target: 年度活动有哪些？

trans-unit.source: Ughhhh, enough questions! Let me get back to my livestre . . . ehhh I mean my work. Please leave me be.
trans-unit.target: 啊，问题够多了！让我回到我的生活。嗯，我是说我的工作。请别管我。

trans-unit.source: 210_MEI_BATHHOUSE_BOUTIQUE
trans-unit.target: 210_mi_浴室_户外

trans-unit.source: Ahhh. . . sorry. . . please, go ahead.
trans-unit.target: 啊。对不起。请继续。

trans-unit.source: Are. . . are you lookin for someone?
trans-unit.target: 是。你在找人吗？

trans-unit.source: Why are you looking at me like that?
trans-unit.target: 你为什么那样看着我？

trans-unit.source: Working at the baths is the only life I know.
trans-unit.target: 在浴室工作是我唯一知道的生活。

trans-unit.source: Are you looking for miss Aylin? She is very busy.
trans-unit.target: 你在找艾林小姐吗？她很忙。

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 没有

trans-unit.source: I . . . I am very excited to be working for Aylin!
trans-unit.target: 一、我很高兴能为Aylin工作！

trans-unit.source: Wow! You are a chef?
trans-unit.target: 哇！你是厨师吗？

trans-unit.source: I am honoured to be a part of Peony Bathhouse's reopening.
trans-unit.target: 我很荣幸能参与牡丹浴室的重新开放。

trans-unit.source: Aylin is so beautiful. I want to try her clothes . . .
trans-unit.target: 艾林太漂亮了。我想试试她的衣服。

trans-unit.source: Bathhouse work is hard, but I really like it here!
trans-unit.target: 澡堂的工作很辛苦，但我真的很喜欢这里！

trans-unit.source: Wel . . welc . . . welcome to White Ash Bathhouse. The changerooms are just through the entrance behind me.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。welc。欢迎来到白灰浴室。更衣室就在我身后的入口处。

trans-unit.source: Wou . . . would you like to know the history of this bathhouse? Uhhh . . . never mind, sorry to bother you.
trans-unit.target: 那。你想知道这个澡堂的历史吗？嗯。没关系，很抱歉打扰你。

trans-unit.source: I very much admire Miss Aylin and Miss Nadjet. They keep this bathhouse running smoothly.
trans-unit.target: 我非常钦佩Aylin小姐和Nadjet小姐。他们让这个澡堂运转顺畅。

trans-unit.source: What is this place?
trans-unit.target: 这是什么地方？

trans-unit.source: This is the legendary bathhouse of White Ash Harbor! Tourists come from all across the globe to visit!_The waters are naturally heated by the volcano.
trans-unit.target: 这就是白灰港的传奇澡堂！来自世界各地的游客前来参观_水被火山自然加热。

trans-unit.source: What do you do here?
trans-unit.target: 你在这里做什么？

trans-unit.source: My. . . my job is very important! I make sure the bathhouse is in tip-top shape. I also run the boutique when Miss Nadjet is busy with other work.
trans-unit.target: 我的。我的工作很重要！我确保澡堂处于最佳状态。当Nadjet小姐忙于其他工作时，我也会经营这家精品店。

trans-unit.source: How long has this bathhouse been here?
trans-unit.target: 这个澡堂在这里多久了？

trans-unit.source: It's the oldest remaining building in White Ash Harbor! It was constructed by Lord Ose Toshio as a gift to his second wife Makino Takara. That was over 300 years ago.
trans-unit.target: 这是白灰港现存最古老的建筑！它是由Ose Toshio勋爵建造的，作为送给他的第二任妻子Makino Takara的礼物。那是300多年前的事了。

trans-unit.source: Where can I find some jobs?
trans-unit.target: 我在哪里可以找到工作？

trans-unit.source: Ask miss Nadjet if she needs some help! Miss Aylin is not accepting any visitors today.
trans-unit.target: 问Nadjet小姐是否需要帮助！艾林小姐今天不接待任何访客。

trans-unit.source: Um . . . Welcome to the Bathhouse Boutique!
trans-unit.target: 嗯。欢迎来到澡堂精品店！

trans-unit.source: We sell swimwear and a variety of soaps.
trans-unit.target: 我们卖泳装和各种肥皂。

trans-unit.source: Hi there! Anything you are looking for in particular?
trans-unit.target: 你好！你有什么特别要找的吗？

trans-unit.source: I just started working here . . . But I'm very excited!
trans-unit.target: 我刚开始在这里工作。但我很兴奋！

trans-unit.source: Aylin is sooo cool. She is also kinda scary.
trans-unit.target: 艾林太酷了。她也有点吓人。

trans-unit.source: I would have chosen that one too.
trans-unit.target: 我也会选择那个。

trans-unit.source: Not a bad choice, if I do say so myself.
trans-unit.target: 如果我自己这么说的话，这是一个不错的选择。

trans-unit.source: You will love that one.
trans-unit.target: 你会喜欢那个的。

trans-unit.source: Interesting.
trans-unit.target: 有趣。

trans-unit.source: I guess I can take this.
trans-unit.target: 我想我可以接受这个。

trans-unit.source: Great! I can use this.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了我可以用这个。

trans-unit.source: This isn't the right item.

trans-unit.source: I think you may need more credits.
trans-unit.target: 我想你可能需要更多的信用点。

trans-unit.source: Yo, want some soap?
trans-unit.target: 哟，要肥皂吗？

trans-unit.source: Whew, all this scrubbing takes a lot out of ya.
trans-unit.target: 呼，这些擦洗让你筋疲力尽。

trans-unit.source: My god, it's really steamy in here.
trans-unit.target: 天哪，这里真的很潮湿。

trans-unit.source: I'd better check on the valves.
trans-unit.target: 我最好检查一下阀门。

trans-unit.source: This is tiring work. I need a break.
trans-unit.target: 这工作很累。我需要休息一下。

trans-unit.source: The humidity here is killing me. Yeah, I came from a dry place.

trans-unit.source: I wish Ms. Aylin would give us longer breaks.

trans-unit.source: The name is Duncan. I'm the most handsome man in town!
trans-unit.target: 我叫邓肯。我是镇上最帅的男人！

trans-unit.source: You are a cool person. I can tell.
trans-unit.target: 你是个很酷的人。我看得出来。

trans-unit.source: The bathhouse is pretty awesome right?

trans-unit.source: I'm gonna be the next manager of the bathhouse!

trans-unit.source: 213_DIMITRI_TRAIN_TICKETS
trans-unit.target: 213_地铁_车票

trans-unit.source: Welcome to White Ash Harbor!
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到白灰港！

trans-unit.source: Check out the convenience store if you are hungry!
trans-unit.target: 如果你饿了，去便利店看看！

trans-unit.source: I've always dreamed of working for Lelsh!
trans-unit.target: 我一直梦想着为Lelsh工作！

trans-unit.source: Ignore her, she's always in a bad mood.
trans-unit.target: 别理她，她总是心情不好。

trans-unit.source: See you next time!
trans-unit.target: 下次见！

trans-unit.source: We are a duty free shop. What do you need?
trans-unit.target: 我们是一家免税店。你需要什么？

trans-unit.source: Hello friend. You are the first customer today!
trans-unit.target: 你好，朋友。您是今天的第一位顾客！

trans-unit.source: Here to do some last minute gift shopping?
trans-unit.target: 在这里做最后一刻的礼物购物？

trans-unit.source: LELSH is a great company.
trans-unit.target: LELSH是一家伟大的公司。

trans-unit.source: LELSH is keeping this town alive.
trans-unit.target: LELSH让这座城市保持活力。

trans-unit.source: We are a duty free shop. Our gifts are very popular.
trans-unit.target: 我们是一家免税店。我们的礼物很受欢迎。

trans-unit.source: The train station sure is busier these days.
trans-unit.target: 这些天火车站肯定更繁忙了。

trans-unit.source: Welcome to White . . . Oh . . . It's you.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到白。哦。是你。

trans-unit.source: LELSH is thinking of upgrading the train to the new model.
trans-unit.target: LELSH正在考虑将列车升级到新型号。

trans-unit.source: Ah, the great chef arrives.
trans-unit.target: 啊，伟大的厨师来了。

trans-unit.source: Welcome to White Ash Station. Are you looking to purchase a ticket? We also offer VIP lifetime passes for 5000 credits.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到白灰站。你想买票吗？我们还提供5000信用点的VIP终身通行证。

trans-unit.source: Hello friend. Please let me know if you have any questions.
trans-unit.target: 你好，朋友。如果你有任何问题，请告诉我。

trans-unit.source: This train goes to Billboard City. Have you ever been? It's a crazy place, full of tall buildings and fantastic attractions.
trans-unit.target: 这列火车去公告牌城。你去过吗？这是一个疯狂的地方，到处都是高楼大厦和奇妙的景点。

trans-unit.source: Where does the train go?
trans-unit.target: 火车去哪里？

trans-unit.source: The final station is Billboard City.
trans-unit.target: 最后一站是Billboard City。

trans-unit.source: When is the next train?
trans-unit.target: 下一班火车是什么时候？

trans-unit.source: Trains arrive every day at 10:00 A:M and 10:00 PM. The train will wait in the station for one hour before departing.
trans-unit.target: 火车每天上午10:00和晚上10:00到达。火车将在车站等一个小时后出发。

trans-unit.source: Where can I stay?
trans-unit.target: 我可以住在哪里？

trans-unit.source: You can find accommodations in the Circuit Lodge or Hotel Rose. You can also visit city hall if you wish to purchase property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在Circuit Lodge或Hotel Rose找到住宿。如果您想购买房产，也可以参观市政厅。

trans-unit.source: Can you tell me about this town?
trans-unit.target: 你能告诉我这个城镇的情况吗？

trans-unit.source: This is White Ash Harbor, named after the volcano. This town thrives on fishing, farming, and tourism.
trans-unit.target: 这是白灰港，以火山命名。这个城镇以渔业、农业和旅游业为生。

trans-unit.source: Hi, my name is Dimitri. How can I help you today?
trans-unit.target: 你好，我叫迪米特里。今天有什么需要我帮忙的吗？

trans-unit.source: Welcome to White Ash Station. Would you like a ticket?
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到白灰站。你想要一张票吗？

trans-unit.source: We also sell some souvenirs here too.
trans-unit.target: 我们这里也卖纪念品。

trans-unit.source: Remember to get some souvenirs as gifts.
trans-unit.target: 记得买些纪念品作为礼物。

trans-unit.source: Here to do some last minute shopping before leaving?
trans-unit.target: 在离开前的最后一刻来这里购物？

trans-unit.source: That's a nice one.
trans-unit.target: 这个不错。

trans-unit.source: Can I have one too?
trans-unit.target: 我也可以要一个吗？

trans-unit.source: Great choice friend!
trans-unit.target: 伟大的选择朋友！

trans-unit.source: Interesting.
trans-unit.target: 有趣。

trans-unit.source: I guess I can take this.
trans-unit.target: 我想我可以接受这个。

trans-unit.source: Great! I can use this.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了我可以用这个。

trans-unit.source: This isn't the right item.
trans-unit.target: 这不是正确的项目。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I can't buy this.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我不能买这个。

trans-unit.source: I cannot buy this item.
trans-unit.target: 我买不到这个东西。

trans-unit.source: You don't have enough credits.
trans-unit.target: 你没有足够的信用点。

trans-unit.source: Hmmmm. Doesn't look like you can afford this.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。看起来你买不起这个。

trans-unit.source: I think you may need more credits . . .
trans-unit.target: 我想你可能需要更多的信用点。

trans-unit.source: Uh huh.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。

trans-unit.source: Anyways, have a good day I guess.
trans-unit.target: 不管怎样，祝你今天过得愉快。

trans-unit.source: I see. Bye then.
trans-unit.target: 我懂了。那再见。

trans-unit.source: Goodbye.
trans-unit.target: 再见。

trans-unit.source: What do you want?
trans-unit.target: 你想要什么？

trans-unit.source: I'm busy.
trans-unit.target: 我很忙。

trans-unit.source: LELSH? Huh, I'm just here for my paycheck.
trans-unit.target: 莱什？嗯，我只是来领薪水的。

trans-unit.source: It's quiet. I like that.
trans-unit.target: 这里很安静。我喜欢。

trans-unit.source: What do you think of my nails?
trans-unit.target: 你觉得我的指甲怎么样？

trans-unit.source: The best part of LELSH is their black uniform.
trans-unit.target: LELSH最好的部分是他们的黑色制服。

trans-unit.source: Can't you see that I'm busy?
trans-unit.target: 你没看见我很忙吗？

trans-unit.source: Ughhh . . . Why do people keeping trying to talk to me?
trans-unit.target: 啊。为什么人们总是试图和我说话？

trans-unit.source: Let me guess. You forgot to buy a gift right?
trans-unit.target: 让我猜猜。你忘了买礼物，对吧？

trans-unit.source: Buy a bottle of wine and wrap a bow on it. It's what I do.
trans-unit.target: 买一瓶酒，在上面包个蝴蝶结。这就是我的工作。

trans-unit.source: I hope my boyfriend visits soon. I'm so bored.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我男朋友很快能来。我好无聊。

trans-unit.source: Uhhh. Welcome. What do you want?
trans-unit.target: 嗯。欢迎。你想要什么？

trans-unit.source: Not another one. . . ahem. What do you need?
trans-unit.target: 不是另一个。啊哼。你需要什么？

trans-unit.source: This is White Ash Station. Do you want to buy a ticket or not?
trans-unit.target: 这里是白灰站。你到底想不想买票？

trans-unit.source: Where does the train go?
trans-unit.target: 火车去哪里？

trans-unit.source: Uhhh . . . Billboard City. Obviously.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。公告牌城市。显然。

trans-unit.source: When is the next train?
trans-unit.target: 下一班火车是什么时候？

trans-unit.source: Trains arrive every day at 10:00 A:M and 10:00 PM. Can you remember that?
trans-unit.target: 火车每天上午10点和晚上10点到达。你还记得吗？

trans-unit.source: Where can I stay?
trans-unit.target: 我可以住在哪里？

trans-unit.source: Why do you have so many questions? Just head into town. I'm sure you'll find somewhere to sleep.
trans-unit.target: 你为什么有这么多问题？就进城去吧。我相信你会找到睡觉的地方。

trans-unit.source: Can you tell me about this town?
trans-unit.target: 你能告诉我这个城镇的情况吗？

trans-unit.source: Do I look like a tour guide? Please, just leave me be.
trans-unit.target: 我看起来像导游吗？求求你，别管我。

trans-unit.source: Eh . . . What do you want?
trans-unit.target: 呃。你想要什么？

trans-unit.source: Soon . . . I won't have to work here much longer.
trans-unit.target: 很快。我不必在这里工作太久了。

trans-unit.source: My name? I have a name tag dummy.
trans-unit.target: 我的名字？我有一个名牌假人。

trans-unit.source: Looking to start a new life in the big city huh?
trans-unit.target: 想在大城市开始新的生活，是吗？

trans-unit.source: We have souvenirs too, since you clearly forgot to buy gifts.
trans-unit.target: 我们也有纪念品，因为你显然忘了买礼物。

trans-unit.source: Last minute gift huh?
trans-unit.target: 最后一刻的礼物？

trans-unit.source: Surprise surpise . . .
trans-unit.target: 惊喜超过。。。

trans-unit.source: Can we make this quick?
trans-unit.target: 我们能快点吗？

trans-unit.source: Interesting.
trans-unit.target: 有趣。

trans-unit.source: I guess I can take this.
trans-unit.target: 我想我可以接受这个。

trans-unit.source: Great! I can use this.

trans-unit.source: This isn't the right item.
trans-unit.target: 这不是正确的项目。

trans-unit.source: Just drop off your parcels in the box.
trans-unit.target: 把包裹放进箱子里就行了。

trans-unit.source: I can't wait to get back home and watch TV.
trans-unit.target: 我迫不及待地想回家看电视。

trans-unit.source: Wish I had more stuff to do here.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我在这里有更多的事情要做。

trans-unit.source: What do ya want?
trans-unit.target: 你想要什么？

trans-unit.source: Are you lost?
trans-unit.target: 你迷路了吗？

trans-unit.source: White Ash Harbor is so dull. It's so . . . OLD!
trans-unit.target: 白灰港太沉闷了。太。老！

trans-unit.source: You playing Dungeons and Demons? You're probably a noob.
