trans-unit.source: Got a parcel to ship?
trans-unit.target: 有包裹要寄吗？

trans-unit.source: At least it's chill here.
trans-unit.target: 至少这里很冷。

trans-unit.source: My dad left me a house here. I can't afford a place in Billboard City.
trans-unit.target: 我爸爸在这里给我留下了一栋房子。我在Billboard City买不起房子。

trans-unit.source: Man, people order a lot of deliveries!
trans-unit.target: 伙计，人们订了很多货！

trans-unit.source: So many parcels . . . It's hard to keep track.
trans-unit.target: 这么多包裹。很难追踪。

trans-unit.source: Hey there. Sorry if I'm in a bad mood sometimes. It's hard you know?
trans-unit.target: 嘿。抱歉，如果我有时心情不好。这很难，你知道吗？

trans-unit.source: Everyone knows who you are now. I'm Benjamin by the way.
trans-unit.target: 现在每个人都知道你是谁了。顺便说一句，我叫本杰明。

trans-unit.source: Do you play Dungeons and Demons? You should!
trans-unit.target: 你玩地下城和魔鬼吗？你应该！

trans-unit.source: Um . . . hello. You seem lost. Can I help you? This is just a post office.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。你好。你好像迷路了。我能帮助你吗？这只是一个邮局。

trans-unit.source: Do you want to know how your parcels make it to their destination? I would love to know too.
trans-unit.target: 你想知道你的包裹是如何到达目的地的吗？我也很想知道。

trans-unit.source: Bruh, I'm just an employee. Perhaps you are looking for the manager?
trans-unit.target: 布鲁，我只是个员工。也许你在找经理？

trans-unit.source: What do you do here?
trans-unit.target: 你在这里做什么？

trans-unit.source: Hey bud. This is Parcel Co, drop off your parcels and we'll ship em around the world and back.
trans-unit.target: 嘿，伙计。这里是Parcel Co，放下你的包裹，我们会把它们运到世界各地再运回。

trans-unit.source: How do I ship parcels?
trans-unit.target: 我如何运送包裹？

trans-unit.source: Just drop em in the box in front. The one with a green arrow.
trans-unit.target: 把它们放在前面的盒子里。那个有绿色箭头的。

trans-unit.source: Who picks up the parcels?
trans-unit.target: 谁来拿包裹？

trans-unit.source: The Lelsh workers take care of that . . . somehow. They sneak in with their black uniforms at night. In the morning, all the parcels are gone.
trans-unit.target: Lelsh的工人负责处理。不知何故。他们晚上穿着黑色制服偷偷溜进来。早上，所有的包裹都不见了。

trans-unit.source: It's a very difficult and expensive service. You'll have to speak to the Parcel Co director in Billboard City to coordinate this.
trans-unit.target: 这是一项非常困难和昂贵的服务。你必须与Billboard City的Parcel联合总监沟通，以协调此事。

trans-unit.source: You are cute.
trans-unit.target: 你很可爱。

trans-unit.source: Did you know that this train travels 300 kilometers an hour?
trans-unit.target: 你知道这列火车每小时行驶300公里吗？

trans-unit.source: Welcome to the LELSH Express Train.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎乘坐LELSH特快列车。

trans-unit.source: Yes, I am an android.
trans-unit.target: 是的，我是安卓。

trans-unit.source: Please enjoy your trip!
trans-unit.target: 祝您旅途愉快！

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I cannot serve drinks right now.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我现在不能提供饮料。

trans-unit.source: First time going to White Ash Harbor? Good luck hun.
trans-unit.target: 第一次去白灰港？祝你好运，洪。

trans-unit.source: Hello. I'm Ema. Pleased to meet you.
trans-unit.target: 你好。我是伊玛。很高兴认识你。

trans-unit.source: We don't see too many visitors these days.
trans-unit.target: 这些天我们没有看到太多的游客。

trans-unit.source: Sugar, I'd offer you a drink, but we are arriving soon.
trans-unit.target: 糖，我想请你喝一杯，但我们很快就要到了。

trans-unit.source: Hi sweety, would you like a drink?
trans-unit.target: 嗨，甜心，你想喝点什么吗？

trans-unit.source: It's a long ride, why not relax with a cocktail?
trans-unit.target: 这是一段漫长的旅程，为什么不喝杯鸡尾酒放松一下呢？

trans-unit.source: Hey! Nice to see you again.
trans-unit.target: 嘿！很高兴再次见到你。

trans-unit.source: Ever been to Billboard City's underground district before?
trans-unit.target: 你以前去过Billboard City的地下区吗？

trans-unit.source: We have a great selection of drinks and snacks.
trans-unit.target: 我们有很多饮料和小吃可供选择。

trans-unit.source: Heyo - what are you looking for?
trans-unit.target: 嘿，你在找什么？

trans-unit.source: What can I get for you?
trans-unit.target: 我能为你拿什么？

trans-unit.source: Welcome! What would you like to order today?
trans-unit.target: 欢迎光临！你今天想点什么？

trans-unit.source: Hey there. Check out my wares!
trans-unit.target: 嘿。看看我的商品！

trans-unit.source: What would you like to buy today?
trans-unit.target: 你今天想买什么？

trans-unit.source: Yum! That one is my favorite.
trans-unit.target: 呀呣那是我最喜欢的。

trans-unit.source: That's top-quality product! Would you like anything else today?
trans-unit.target: 那是最优质的产品！你今天还想吃点别的吗？

trans-unit.source: Ah, great choice!
trans-unit.target: 啊，不错的选择！

trans-unit.source: Interesting . . .
trans-unit.target: 有意思。

trans-unit.source: I guess I can take this.
trans-unit.target: 我想我可以接受这个。

trans-unit.source: Great! I can use this.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了我可以用这个。

trans-unit.source: This isn't the right item.
trans-unit.target: 这不是正确的项目。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, I can't buy this.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我不能买这个。

trans-unit.source: I cannot buy this item.
trans-unit.target: 我买不到这个东西。

trans-unit.source: You don't have enough credits.
trans-unit.target: 你没有足够的信用点。

trans-unit.source: Hmmmm. Doesn't look like you can afford this.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。看起来你买不起这个。

trans-unit.source: I think you may need more credits.
trans-unit.target: 我想你可能需要更多的信用点。

trans-unit.source: You must be the new chef! Welcome.
trans-unit.target: 你一定是新来的厨师！欢迎。

trans-unit.source: Let me know if you need any directions.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要任何指示，请告诉我。

trans-unit.source: I love working for Lelsh.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢为Lelsh工作。

trans-unit.source: Lelsh is a fantastic company!
trans-unit.target: Lelsh是一家出色的公司！

trans-unit.source: I think she has a crush on me.
trans-unit.target: 我觉得她暗恋我。

trans-unit.source: White Ash Harbor has seen better days.
trans-unit.target: 白灰港经历了更好的日子。

trans-unit.source: The LELSH mines are closed. Please don't try to enter.
trans-unit.target: LELSH矿场已经关闭。请不要试图进入。

trans-unit.source: The townsfolk don't like us very much . . .
trans-unit.target: 城里人不太喜欢我们。

trans-unit.source: I'm Sahil. But you probably already knew that.
trans-unit.target: 我是沙希尔。但你可能已经知道了。

trans-unit.source: The girl standing next to me is Duri. She's my future wife.
trans-unit.target: 站在我旁边的女孩是杜丽。她是我未来的妻子。

trans-unit.source: I can't believe it! Duri didn't want to go out with me!
trans-unit.target: 我简直不敢相信！杜丽不想和我出去！

trans-unit.source: She gives me that look sometimes. You know?
trans-unit.target: 她有时会这样看我。你知道的？

trans-unit.source: LELSH is very happy to see more tourists here.
trans-unit.target: LELSH很高兴在这里看到更多的游客。

trans-unit.source: Do you want to join LELSH? Fill out an application here.
trans-unit.target: 你想加入LELSH吗？在此处填写申请表。

trans-unit.source: Got any ideas on how to make Duri love me?
trans-unit.target: 你有什么办法让杜丽爱上我吗？

trans-unit.source: Welcome to White Ash Harbor! What would you like to know?
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到白灰港！你想知道什么？

trans-unit.source: Lelsh provides electricity, fresh water, and transportation for White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: Lelsh为白灰港提供电力、淡水和交通。

trans-unit.source: The locals here still aren't too fond of us, but our services provide a more comfortable life for everyone in White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 这里的当地人仍然不太喜欢我们，但我们的服务为白灰港的每个人提供了更舒适的生活。

trans-unit.source: Tell me about this town.
trans-unit.target: 跟我说说这个城镇。

trans-unit.source: White Ash Harbor used to be small fishing and agricultural colony, but slowly grew into a tourist hotspot.
trans-unit.target: 白灰港曾经是一个小型的渔业和农业殖民地，但慢慢发展成为一个旅游热点。

trans-unit.source: Can you tell me about the locals?
trans-unit.target: 你能告诉我当地人的情况吗？

trans-unit.source: For the most part, they aren't very fond of technology. But with all the tourists comin' in, they're slowly getting used to it.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，他们不太喜欢技术。但随着所有游客的到来，他们慢慢习惯了。

trans-unit.source: Where can I find ingredients?
trans-unit.target: 我在哪里可以找到配料？

trans-unit.source: You should head to the docks if you want to buy some ingredients. On the other hand, I heard you could catch some crabs in the caves.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想买一些配料，你应该去码头。另一方面，我听说你可以在洞穴里抓螃蟹。

trans-unit.source: Where can I buy some clothes?
trans-unit.target: 我在哪里可以买到衣服？

trans-unit.source: Talk to Milo by the lower promenade to get fitted for some new clothing.
trans-unit.target: 在下长廊与米洛交谈，试穿一些新衣服。

trans-unit.source: 218_DURI_LELSH_INFORMATION
trans-unit.target: 218_DURI_LELSH_信息

trans-unit.source: I love working for Lelsh.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢为Lelsh工作。

trans-unit.source: Night shifts are the worst.
trans-unit.target: 夜班是最糟糕的。

trans-unit.source: I wish I were home, enjoying a hot bowl of Kimchi soup.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我在家，享受一碗热腾腾的泡菜汤。

trans-unit.source: This town is a nice change from Billboard City.
trans-unit.target: 这个城镇与Billboard City相比，变化很大。

trans-unit.source: I think he has a crush on me.
trans-unit.target: 我觉得他暗恋我。

trans-unit.source: I like standing here. I get to look at the ocean all day.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢站在这里。我整天都在看大海。

trans-unit.source: Hi I'm Duri. What can I do you for?
trans-unit.target: 你好，我叫杜丽。有什么我能帮忙的吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm not sure why LELSH needs an office in such a small town.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道为什么LELSH需要在这样一个小镇上建一个办公室。

trans-unit.source: This is a LELSH office. Don't ask what we do here.
trans-unit.target: 这是LELSH的办公室。不要问我们在这里做什么。

trans-unit.source: One day, I'll join the corporate office in Billboard City!
trans-unit.target: 总有一天，我会加入公告牌城的公司办公室！

trans-unit.source: Sahil keeps propositioning me. Guy can't take a hint.
trans-unit.target: 沙希尔一直向我求婚。那家伙一点也不懂。

trans-unit.source: We are busier than usual. Oh . . . nevermind . . .
trans-unit.target: 我们比平时更忙。哦。没关系。

trans-unit.source: Yes . . . we are working on some . . . stuff . . . back there.
trans-unit.target: 是的。我们正在研究一些。东西。回到那里。

trans-unit.source: LELSH's operations are none of your business.
trans-unit.target: LELSH的运营与你无关。

trans-unit.source: Soon, LELSH will make White Ash Harbor great!
trans-unit.target: 很快，LELSH将使白灰港变得伟大！

trans-unit.source: You are the new chef right? I wish there was a restaurant here for vegetarians like me.
trans-unit.target: 你是新来的厨师，对吗？我希望这里有一家像我这样的素食主义者餐厅。

trans-unit.source: May Lou and Nabiha both have a great selection of fresh ingredients. You should visit their shops.
trans-unit.target: May Lou和Nabiha都有很多新鲜食材可供选择。你应该去他们的商店看看。

trans-unit.source: Welcome to the Lelsh Information Center. Please let us know if you have any questions.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到Lelsh信息中心。如果您有任何问题，请告诉我们。

trans-unit.source: Tell me about this town.
trans-unit.target: 跟我说说这个城镇。

trans-unit.source: This town was visited by various lords and monarchs in the past, leading to conflicts to gain control of this port.
trans-unit.target: 这个城镇过去曾被各种领主和君主访问过，导致了争夺这个港口控制权的冲突。

trans-unit.source: Can you tell me about the locals?
trans-unit.target: 你能告诉我当地人的情况吗？

trans-unit.source: They are a strange but passionate bunch. They aren't too fond of outsiders, but will treat you like family if you do well by them.
trans-unit.target: 他们是一群奇怪但充满激情的人。他们不太喜欢外人，但如果你和他们相处得好，他们会像家人一样对待你。

trans-unit.source: Where can I find ingredients?
trans-unit.target: 我在哪里可以找到配料？

trans-unit.source: Where can I buy some clothes?
trans-unit.target: 我在哪里可以买到衣服？

trans-unit.source: There is a clothing store down by the lower promenade. Bianca at Bits & Pieces sells some accessories. Both of those store owners are a bit strange though . . .
trans-unit.target: 在下长廊的下面有一家服装店。Bits&Pieces的Bianca出售一些配饰。不过，这两家店的老板都有点奇怪。

trans-unit.source: 219_HENRI_LA_GALERIE
trans-unit.target: 219亨利画廊

trans-unit.source: Bonjour, mon ami! Feel free to browse our fine selection.
trans-unit.target: 你好，我的朋友！欢迎浏览我们的精选。

trans-unit.source: La Galerie has been passed down my family for generations.
trans-unit.target: La Galerie是我家世世代代传承下来的。

trans-unit.source: Did you know that this is the first store in White Ash Harbor?
trans-unit.target: 你知道这是白灰港的第一家店吗？

trans-unit.source: Please, no food and drinks inside the store!
trans-unit.target: 请不要在商店里吃东西和饮料！

trans-unit.source: We just received a shipment of fine, modern pieces last month.
trans-unit.target: 上个月我们刚收到一批精美的现代货。

trans-unit.source: Ah finally, a real customer!
trans-unit.target: 终于，一个真正的客户！

trans-unit.source: I'm so glad that you are here friend. Need some chairs?
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴你在这里，朋友。需要一些椅子吗？

trans-unit.source: A water fountain would look great in your restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 在你的餐厅里放一个喷泉会很好看。

trans-unit.source: I'm so glad you are reopening Le Sequoia. So glad!
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴你重新开放红杉。太高兴了！

trans-unit.source: Can't have a great restaurant without great furniture!
trans-unit.target: 没有好的家具，就没有好的餐厅！

trans-unit.source: Two restaurants to decorate? That's fantastic!
trans-unit.target: 两间餐厅要装修吗？太棒了！

trans-unit.source: Now that the town is businer, we've received some new stuff.
trans-unit.target: 现在这个城镇更繁忙了，我们收到了一些新东西。

trans-unit.source: Mon ami!
trans-unit.target: 我的朋友！

trans-unit.source: You should try some new decor for the Teahouse.
trans-unit.target: 你应该为茶馆尝试一些新的装饰。

trans-unit.source: It's good to see more customers these days.
trans-unit.target: 这些天看到更多的顾客真是太好了。

trans-unit.source: Bonjour. Welcome to La Galerie. We have the finest furniture selection money can buy!
trans-unit.target: 你好欢迎来到La Galerie。我们有钱能买到的最好的家具选择！

trans-unit.source: We used to only sell traditional European designs, but now, we've acquired some elegant modern pieces as well.
trans-unit.target: 我们过去只卖传统的欧洲设计，但现在，我们也收购了一些优雅的现代作品。

trans-unit.source: Think about this. What kind of furniture set defines you as a person?
trans-unit.target: 想想这个。什么样的家具组合让你成为一个人？

trans-unit.source: It's been a struggle competing with IKOA, we've really had to shift our business strategy and search for finer wares to stay afloat.
trans-unit.target: 与IKOA竞争一直很艰难，我们真的不得不改变我们的业务战略，寻找更优质的产品来维持运营。

trans-unit.source: Our selection of French table and chair designs would look great in your restaurant!
trans-unit.target: 我们精选的法式桌椅设计在您的餐厅看起来会很棒！

trans-unit.source: Tres bien!
trans-unit.target: 非常好！

trans-unit.source: Oui, oui, oui! You have fine taste!
trans-unit.target: 对，对，对！你有很好的品味！

trans-unit.source: Ah, I didn't think you could afford that one!
trans-unit.target: 啊，我原以为你买不起那件！

trans-unit.source: That's a great piece for my collection.
trans-unit.target: 这是我收藏的一件很棒的作品。

trans-unit.source: Mon ami, that's beautiful!
trans-unit.target: 我的朋友，太美了！

trans-unit.source: I suppose this one could go in the back . . .
trans-unit.target: 我想这个可以放在后面。

trans-unit.source: My friend, I cannot take this . . .
trans-unit.target: 朋友，我受不了这个。

trans-unit.source: Non, non. You cannot sell that here.
trans-unit.target: 不，不。你不能在这里卖。

trans-unit.source: I don't want to buy this.
trans-unit.target: 我不想买这个。

trans-unit.source: My friend, you do not have enough credits to purchase that.
trans-unit.target: 我的朋友，你没有足够的信用点来购买它。

trans-unit.source: Non, non, non. That's not enough credits.
trans-unit.target: 不，不，不。这还不够信用点。

trans-unit.source: I think this one is a bit, how you say, out of your budget?
trans-unit.target: 我觉得这个有点，你怎么说，超出了你的预算？

trans-unit.source: Welcome to our fine establishment. Have any questions?
trans-unit.target: 欢迎光临我们的精品店。有什么问题吗？

trans-unit.source: Bonjour mon ami! Let me know if you need a recommendation!
trans-unit.target: 你好，我的朋友！如果你需要推荐，请告诉我！

trans-unit.source: It's a lovely day for shopping, isn't it?
trans-unit.target: 今天是购物的好天气，不是吗？

trans-unit.source: What should I buy for my restaurant?
trans-unit.target: 我应该为我的餐厅买什么？

trans-unit.source: Tables and chairs of course! Also, make sure to buy the appliances required to cook your recipes.
trans-unit.target: 当然是桌椅！此外，一定要购买烹饪食谱所需的电器。

trans-unit.source: Should I purchase decorations?
trans-unit.target: 我应该买装饰品吗？

trans-unit.source: Of course! Decorations will improve the atmosphere of your restaurant, which will enhance guests' experience.
trans-unit.target: 当然！装饰将改善您餐厅的氛围，从而提升客人的体验。

trans-unit.source: What should I buy for my home?
trans-unit.target: 我应该为我的家买什么？

trans-unit.source: A bed and a shower are very important! Other than that, purchase anything you'd like to make your home cosier.
trans-unit.target: 床和淋浴非常重要！除此之外，购买任何你想让你的家更舒适的东西。

trans-unit.source: What styles of furniture do you sell?
trans-unit.target: 你们卖什么款式的家具？

trans-unit.source: We possess a great selection of classic designs, and a few modern pieces as well.
trans-unit.target: 我们有很多经典设计，也有一些现代作品。

trans-unit.source: 220_ASHER_TRAIN_INFORMATION
trans-unit.target: 220_培训_信息

trans-unit.source: Hey there, kiddo! Are you excited to ride the train?
trans-unit.target: 嘿，孩子！你对坐火车感到兴奋吗？

trans-unit.source: Today's weather forecast predicts a smooth ride.
trans-unit.target: 今天的天气预报预测平稳。

trans-unit.source: Let's make this train ride one to remember!
trans-unit.target: 让我们让这趟火车成为难忘的回忆！

trans-unit.source: Talk to Ema at Saloon 9 for refreshments.
trans-unit.target: 与9号沙龙的Ema交谈以获取点心。

trans-unit.source: Wow! Check out that amazing view!
trans-unit.target: 哇！看看那令人惊叹的景色！

trans-unit.source: Soon, I will be home to my model railroad set!
trans-unit.target: 很快，我就可以回到我的铁路模型了！

trans-unit.source: White Ash Harbor still uses pay phones. Pay phones!
trans-unit.target: 白灰港仍然使用付费电话。付费电话！

trans-unit.source: Choo-choo! Oh, I'm sorry, can I help you?
trans-unit.target: 呼呼！哦，对不起，我能帮你吗？

trans-unit.source: This train used to be so busy . . .
trans-unit.target: 这列火车以前很忙。

trans-unit.source: Back in the day, I even saw celebrities on this train!
trans-unit.target: 当年，我甚至在这列火车上看到了名人！

trans-unit.source: They are talking about upgrading this train.
trans-unit.target: 他们正在谈论升级这列火车。

trans-unit.source: Ah yes, you are that chef. Pleased to meet you.
trans-unit.target: 啊，是的，你就是那个厨师。很高兴认识你。

trans-unit.source: I saw you in the news! I'm Asher by the way.
trans-unit.target: 我在新闻里看到你了！顺便说一句，我叫亚瑟。

trans-unit.source: Away we go. Again and again.
trans-unit.target: 我们走吧。一次又一次。

trans-unit.source: It's good to see so many travellers again.
trans-unit.target: 很高兴再次见到这么多游客。

trans-unit.source: 220_ASHER_CUTSCENES
Attention passengers, this is your conductor speaking!
trans-unit.target: 乘客们请注意，我是列车员！

trans-unit.source: We will be arriving in White Ash Harbor shortly.
trans-unit.target: 我们很快就会到达白灰港。

trans-unit.source: Please gather your belongings and prepare to disembark the train!
trans-unit.target: 请收拾好行李，准备下车！

trans-unit.source: 221_ELIZA_LIBRARIAN
trans-unit.target: 221_ELIZA_图书管理员

trans-unit.source: Have you met my husband Henri? He sells furniture.
trans-unit.target: 你见过我丈夫亨利吗？他卖家具。

trans-unit.source: I wish the mayor would pay me a bit more.
trans-unit.target: 我希望市长能多给我一点钱。

trans-unit.source: Prisca is such a hard worker. That girl is going places . . .
trans-unit.target: 普里斯卡工作很努力。那个女孩去了很多地方。

trans-unit.source: I've been the librarian for thirty years. I've enjoyed every second.
trans-unit.target: 我当图书管理员已经三十年了。我享受每一秒。

trans-unit.source: Now, where did I put that book . . .
trans-unit.target: 现在，我把那本书放在哪里了。

trans-unit.source: There are very few kids here. But they still need a teacher.
trans-unit.target: 这里的孩子很少。但他们仍然需要一位老师。

trans-unit.source: There used to be more kids here. Their parents moved away.
trans-unit.target: 这里以前有更多的孩子。他们的父母搬走了。

trans-unit.source: I constantly have to stop the kids from running into the forest.
trans-unit.target: 我总是要阻止孩子们跑进森林。

trans-unit.source: The abandoned bathhouse scares the kids.
trans-unit.target: 废弃的澡堂吓坏了孩子们。

trans-unit.source: It's sad to see one of my students leave White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 看到我的一个学生离开白灰港，我很难过。

trans-unit.source: More tourists! More ideas! How exciting!
trans-unit.target: 更多游客！更多想法！太令人兴奋了！

trans-unit.source: The kids are all worked up by the bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 孩子们都被澡堂弄得筋疲力尽。

trans-unit.source: My students are all hyper from seeing the tourists.
trans-unit.target: 我的学生们看到游客都很兴奋。

trans-unit.source: I would love to visit the Teahouse sometime.
trans-unit.target: 我很想找个时间去茶馆。

trans-unit.source: I might try the bathhouse myself. It is seems exciting.
trans-unit.target: 我可能会自己去澡堂试试。这似乎很令人兴奋。

trans-unit.source: Hello young one. Welcome to the town library. What are you looking for?
trans-unit.target: 你好，年轻人。欢迎来到镇图书馆。你在找什么？

trans-unit.source: I am Eliza, the local librarian. Let me know if I can help you with anything.
trans-unit.target: 我是伊丽莎，当地的图书管理员。如果我能帮你什么，请告诉我。

trans-unit.source: Oh my . . . Now where did I put that copy of 1001 Knitting Patterns?
trans-unit.target: 哦，我的。现在，我把1001针织图案放在哪里了？

trans-unit.source: What is this place?
trans-unit.target: 这是什么地方？

trans-unit.source: Well honey, this is the library of White Ash Harbor. It's a humble little place, but we still have some great books.
trans-unit.target: 亲爱的，这是白灰港的图书馆。这是一个不起眼的小地方，但我们仍然有一些好书。

trans-unit.source: Can I find cookbooks here?
trans-unit.target: 我可以在这里找到烹饪书吗？

trans-unit.source: We receive new books everyday. You might find some cookbooks from time to time.
trans-unit.target: 我们每天都收到新书。你可能会不时地找到一些烹饪书。

trans-unit.source: What do you do here?
trans-unit.target: 你在这里做什么？

trans-unit.source: As the librarian, I manage our book exchange and new book deliveries. I also put books back into their shelves.
trans-unit.target: 作为图书管理员，我负责管理我们的图书交换和新书交付。我也把书放回书架上。

trans-unit.source: How are you doing today?
trans-unit.target: 你今天好吗？

trans-unit.source: Oh, could be better. Some rowdy kids seem to have made off with some books. But thanks for asking.
trans-unit.target: 哦，可能会更好。一些吵闹的孩子似乎偷了一些书。但谢谢你的邀请。

trans-unit.source: 223_HENRIETTA_PET SHOP OWNER
trans-unit.target: 223_HENRIETTA_PET店主

trans-unit.source: They're cute, aren't they?
trans-unit.target: 它们很可爱，不是吗？

trans-unit.source: White Ash Harbor is becoming busier these days.
trans-unit.target: 白灰港最近越来越繁忙。

trans-unit.source: We breed our pets ourselves.
trans-unit.target: 我们自己饲养宠物。

trans-unit.source: So, are you a dog person or a cat person?
trans-unit.target: 那么，你是爱狗还是爱猫？

trans-unit.source: Woof.
trans-unit.target: Woof。

trans-unit.source: I love the ambience of Hotel Rose.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢玫瑰酒店的氛围。

trans-unit.source: Animals have been my passion, since I was a little girl.
trans-unit.target: 从我小时候起，动物就是我的爱好。

trans-unit.source: I want to spread the joy of animals.
trans-unit.target: 我想传播动物的快乐。

trans-unit.source: I don't like the city. This quiet seaside town suits me better.
trans-unit.target: 我不喜欢这个城市。这个安静的海滨小镇更适合我。

trans-unit.source: We just opened, but things are looking hopeful.
trans-unit.target: 我们刚刚开业，但事情看起来充满希望。

trans-unit.source: Welcome to Bark & Meow!
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到Bark&Meow！

trans-unit.source: We sell food for cats & dogs here.
trans-unit.target: 我们这里卖猫狗的食物。

trans-unit.source: Hi! We just opened. Thank you for your patronage.
trans-unit.target: 你好！我们刚刚开业。感谢您的惠顾。

trans-unit.source: We sell high quality products here. Your pet deserves the best!
trans-unit.target: 我们在这里销售高质量的产品。你的宠物值得最好的！

trans-unit.source: Woof . . . Uh . . . I mean, how do you do today?
trans-unit.target: 汪。嗯你今天过得怎么样？

trans-unit.source: Remember, don't eat this yourself!
trans-unit.target: 记住，不要自己吃这个！

trans-unit.source: This one is great. Just really great.
trans-unit.target: 这个很棒。真的很棒。

trans-unit.source: Your pet will love this.
trans-unit.target: 你的宠物会喜欢这个的。

trans-unit.source: Interesting . . .
trans-unit.target: 有意思。

trans-unit.source: I guess I can take this.
trans-unit.target: 我想我可以接受这个。

trans-unit.source: Great! I can use this.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了我可以用这个。

trans-unit.source: Um . . . this is a pet shop . . .
trans-unit.target: 嗯。这是一家宠物店。

trans-unit.source: Sorry. We don't sell that here.
trans-unit.target: 对不起的。我们这里不卖。

trans-unit.source: This is not a pet-related item.
trans-unit.target: 这不是与宠物有关的物品。

trans-unit.source: This is too expensive for you.
trans-unit.target: 这对你来说太贵了。

trans-unit.source: This is a pet store, not a charity.
trans-unit.target: 这是一家宠物店，不是慈善机构。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, you will need more credits.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，你需要更多的信用点。

trans-unit.source: Congratulations on your new pet!
trans-unit.target: 恭喜你的新宠物！

trans-unit.source: Awwww. It's hard to say goodbye.
trans-unit.target: 噢。说再见很难。

trans-unit.source: Your new pet will be delivered to your home.
trans-unit.target: 你的新宠物将被送到你家。

trans-unit.source: 301_BONNIE_Bea & Aime Daughter
trans-unit.target: 301 Bonnie Bea&Aime女儿

trans-unit.source: Hi! I'm Bonnie! Pleased to meet you.
trans-unit.target: 你好！我是邦妮！很高兴认识你。

trans-unit.source: Mom sells drinks at her bar. Have you met her?
trans-unit.target: 妈妈在酒吧卖饮料。你见过她吗？

trans-unit.source: Simon is the worst. He stole my favorite scarf.
trans-unit.target: 西蒙是最糟糕的。他偷了我最喜欢的围巾。

trans-unit.source: Hello. Do you like to play video games too?
trans-unit.target: 你好。你也喜欢玩电子游戏吗？

trans-unit.source: Wow! Being a chef sounds so cool!
trans-unit.target: 哇！当厨师听起来很酷！

trans-unit.source: 302_LISA_Bea & Aime Daughter
trans-unit.target: 302-Lisa-Bea和Aime女儿

trans-unit.source: I want to be the mayor when I grow up!
trans-unit.target: 我长大后想当市长！

trans-unit.source: Have you read the Scarlight series? You really should!
trans-unit.target: 你读过Scarlight系列吗？你真的应该！

trans-unit.source: Don't tell my sisters, but I actually like to go to school.
trans-unit.target: 别告诉我的姐妹们，但我其实很喜欢上学。

trans-unit.source: I study hard so I can be productive citizen one day!
trans-unit.target: 我努力学习，以便有一天能成为有生产力的公民！

trans-unit.source: 303_SOPHIA_Bea & Aime Daughter
trans-unit.target: 303-Sophia-Bea&Aime女儿

trans-unit.source: Mom won't buy me makeup . . .
trans-unit.target: 妈妈不给我买化妆品。

trans-unit.source: Hi there. Can you help me take a nice photo?
trans-unit.target: 你好。你能帮我拍张好看的照片吗？

trans-unit.source: Why do we have to go to school? It's so lame.
trans-unit.target: 我们为什么要上学？这太蹩脚了。

trans-unit.source: I wish we lived in the city. Boys there are waaaay cooler.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我们住在城里。那里的男孩们很酷。

trans-unit.source: Ughhh . . . What do you want? Whatever . . .
trans-unit.target: 啊。你想要什么？不管怎样。

trans-unit.source: 304_ALAIN_Bea & Aime Son
trans-unit.target: 304-Alain-Bea&爱她的

trans-unit.source: I want to grow up big and strong like dad!
trans-unit.target: 我想长大，像爸爸一样强壮！

trans-unit.source: What? Do you want to fight? I've been training man.
trans-unit.target: 什么？你想打架吗？我一直在训练男人。

trans-unit.source: Dad has been teaching me Judo. It's really hard work.
trans-unit.target: 爸爸一直在教我柔道。这确实是一项艰巨的工作。

trans-unit.source: Our family hangs out by the bar every weekend.
trans-unit.target: 我们一家每个周末都会去酒吧。

trans-unit.source: You're a chef? Can you make me a protein shake?
trans-unit.target: 你是厨师？你能给我做一杯蛋白奶昔吗？

trans-unit.source: 305_SIMON_Bea & Aime Son
trans-unit.target: 305-Simon-Bea&爱她的

trans-unit.source: I'm Simon. Who are you again?
trans-unit.target: 我是西蒙。你又是谁？

trans-unit.source: You like heavy metal? No? Lame.
trans-unit.target: 你喜欢重金属吗？不？拉梅。

trans-unit.source: Valentina is cool. She likes horror movies too.
trans-unit.target: 瓦伦蒂娜很酷。她也喜欢恐怖电影。

trans-unit.source: Valentina took care of me when I got sick. Isn't she cool?
trans-unit.target: 我生病时瓦伦蒂娜照顾我。她是不是很酷？

trans-unit.source: To be honest, I feel like a black sheep in my family.
trans-unit.target: 说实话，我觉得自己是家里的害群之马。

trans-unit.source: 306_LOUIS_Bea & Aime Son
trans-unit.target: 306-Louis-Bea&爱她的

trans-unit.source: Dad says you are the new chef. Can you make pizza?
trans-unit.target: 爸爸说你是新来的厨师。你会做披萨吗？

trans-unit.source: I really enjoy the smell of freshly cut grass.
trans-unit.target: 我真的很喜欢新鲜割草的味道。

trans-unit.source: I love flying kites with Lisa. My brothers are jerks.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢和丽莎一起放风筝。我的兄弟们都是混蛋。

trans-unit.source: Honestly, I'm impartial towards physical activity.
trans-unit.target: 老实说，我对体育活动是公正的。

trans-unit.source: Have you read the full encyclopedia on wild boars? I have.
trans-unit.target: 你读过关于野猪的完整百科全书吗？我有。

trans-unit.source: 307_AMINATA_Nacim Daughter
trans-unit.target: 307_AMINATA_Nacim女儿

trans-unit.source: Dad works at Circuit Lodge. Have you been there?
trans-unit.target: 爸爸在Circuit Lodge工作。你去过那里吗？

trans-unit.source: I can't wait to go to Wonderland again!
trans-unit.target: 我迫不及待地想再次去仙境！

trans-unit.source: Hi. Have you seen my teddy? Why not?!
trans-unit.target: 你好。你看到我的泰迪熊了吗？为什么不？！

trans-unit.source: Hi there. I'm Aminata. Remember my name.
trans-unit.target: 你好。我是阿米纳塔。记住我的名字。

trans-unit.source: Adelaide is really stressing me out. She cries all the time.
trans-unit.target: 阿德莱德真的让我很紧张。她一直在哭。

trans-unit.source: 308_ADELAIDE_Nacim Daughter
trans-unit.target: 308_ADELAIDE_纳辛女儿

trans-unit.source: Hello. I'm . . . I'm Adelaide . . .
trans-unit.target: 你好。我。我是阿德莱德。

trans-unit.source: Daddy does crafts with us every week. It's so fun!
trans-unit.target: 爸爸每周都和我们一起做手工艺品。太有趣了！

trans-unit.source: Do you know where daddy is?
trans-unit.target: 你知道爸爸在哪里吗？

trans-unit.source: Do you like origami? I love making cranes.
trans-unit.target: 你喜欢折纸吗？我喜欢做鹤。

trans-unit.source: I've spent all of my allowance on bubble tea.
trans-unit.target: 我把所有的零用钱都花在泡奶茶上了。

trans-unit.source: 309_OLIVER_Henri & Eliza Son
trans-unit.target: 309_利物浦_儿子亨利和伊丽莎

trans-unit.source: Have you met my dad? He sells all kinds of furniture!
trans-unit.target: 你见过我爸爸吗？他卖各种家具！

trans-unit.source: Halt! I shall strike you down with my holy sword!
trans-unit.target: 站住！我要用我的圣剑把你打倒！

trans-unit.source: Just you wait . . . I shall defeat the dragon soon.
trans-unit.target: 你就等着。我很快就会打败龙。

trans-unit.source: Have you watched Kingdom of Thrones?
trans-unit.target: 你看过《权力的王国》吗？

trans-unit.source: My mom is also my teacher. The other kids make fun of me.
trans-unit.target: 我妈妈也是我的老师。其他孩子都取笑我。

trans-unit.source: 401_TRAIN OLD MAN - Cutscene
trans-unit.target: 401_蓝老头-过场动画

trans-unit.source: Do you know where I am?
trans-unit.target: 你知道我在哪里吗？

trans-unit.source: I heard there are great drinks at Bea's Bar.
trans-unit.target: 我听说Bea酒吧有很棒的饮料。

trans-unit.source: Please, can you get me a drink?
trans-unit.target: 拜托，你能给我拿杯饮料吗？

trans-unit.source: My grandson is a strapping young man.
trans-unit.target: 我孙子是个身材魁梧的年轻人。

trans-unit.source: Where . . . where am I? Who are you?
trans-unit.target: 哪里。我在哪里？你是谁？

trans-unit.source: 402_TRAIN YOUNG MAN - Cutscene
trans-unit.target: 402_蓝男-过场动画

trans-unit.source: I'm taking gramps to visit White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 我要带爷爷去白灰港。

trans-unit.source: I have to make sure gramps doesn't get lost.
trans-unit.target: 我必须确保爷爷不会迷路。

trans-unit.source: White Ash Harbor is kinda lame. Even the bathhouse closed.
trans-unit.target: 白灰港有点跛脚。连澡堂都关门了。

trans-unit.source: Gramps keeps going on and on about this girl named Bea.
trans-unit.target: 爷爷一直在说这个叫Bea的女孩。

trans-unit.source: I've been to White Ash Harbor a few times. It's not so great.
trans-unit.target: 我去过白灰港几次。它不是那么好。

trans-unit.source: 424_ACADEMY INSTRUCTOR
trans-unit.target: 424_资深讲师

trans-unit.source: Have you made up your mind (playername)?
trans-unit.target: 你下定决心了吗？

trans-unit.source: The graduation cookoff is starting soon.
trans-unit.target: 毕业野餐马上就要开始了。

trans-unit.source: Ah . . . another year goes by.
trans-unit.target: 啊。又一年过去了。

trans-unit.source: You guys will be professional chefs soon.
trans-unit.target: 你们很快就会成为专业厨师。

trans-unit.source: I still remember my graduation . . . I miss those days.
trans-unit.target: 我仍然记得我的毕业典礼。我怀念那些日子。

trans-unit.source: TASK DIALOGUES
trans-unit.target: 任务对话

trans-unit.source: Appreciate your help!
trans-unit.target: 感谢你的帮助！

trans-unit.source: Ah, thank you.
trans-unit.target: 啊，谢谢你。

trans-unit.source: Thanks! I will remember that.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢！我会记住的。

trans-unit.source: Ah, hope it wasn't too difficult.
trans-unit.target: 啊，希望不太难。

trans-unit.source: Thank you, friend.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你，朋友。

trans-unit.source: Your efforts mean a lot.
trans-unit.target: 你的努力意义重大。

trans-unit.source: This means a lot. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着很多。非常感谢。

trans-unit.source: Fantastic stuff. Glad you could help.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了。很高兴你能帮忙。

trans-unit.source: RESTAURANT CUSTOMERS
trans-unit.target: 餐厅顾客

trans-unit.source: Where is my (dishName)?
trans-unit.target: 我的(dishName)在哪里？

trans-unit.source: Could the service be any slower? I've been waiting for (waitTime) minutes!
trans-unit.target: 服务可以再慢一点吗？我已经等了(waitTime)分钟了！

trans-unit.source: Huh. The food better be good. This sure is a long wait . . .
trans-unit.target: 呵呵。食物最好是好的。这确实是一个漫长的等待。

trans-unit.source: Hello waiter! I've been waiting forever for my order!
trans-unit.target: 你好，服务员！我一直在等我的订单！

trans-unit.source: Ughh. It's been (waitTime) minutes! I wonder what's going on?
trans-unit.target: 啊。已经(waitTime)分钟了！我想知道发生了什么事？

trans-unit.source: What terrible service.
trans-unit.target: 多么糟糕的服务。

trans-unit.source: I've had better meals.
trans-unit.target: 我吃过更好的饭。

trans-unit.source: Don't think I'll be coming back.
trans-unit.target: 别以为我会回来。

trans-unit.source: The food was no good and neither was the service.
trans-unit.target: 食物不好，服务也不好。

trans-unit.source: This place needs some major improvements if it wants to survive.
trans-unit.target: 这个地方需要一些重大的改进，如果它想生存。

trans-unit.source: What great service!
trans-unit.target: 多么好的服务啊！

trans-unit.source: I love this restaurant! I'll definitely come back!
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢这家餐厅！我一定会回来的！

trans-unit.source: That was delicious!
trans-unit.target: 太好吃了！

trans-unit.source: What a fantastic restaurant. I'll be taking my friends here for sure!
trans-unit.target: 多棒的餐厅啊。我一定会带我的朋友来这里！

trans-unit.source: Delicious food and great service!
trans-unit.target: 美味的食物和优质的服务！

trans-unit.source: The food was great, but service was a bit slow.
trans-unit.target: 食物很棒，但服务有点慢。

trans-unit.source: That was a long wait for the food, but it was worth it.
trans-unit.target: 等了很长时间才拿到食物，但这是值得的。

trans-unit.source: That was tasty, but now I'm late.
trans-unit.target: 那很好吃，但现在我迟到了。

trans-unit.source: Long wait, but tasty.
trans-unit.target: 漫长的等待，但美味。

trans-unit.source: The service wasn't great. Thank goodness the food is good.
trans-unit.target: 服务不是很好。谢天谢地，食物很好吃。

trans-unit.source: The service is great, but the food is pretty bland.
trans-unit.target: 服务很好，但食物很平淡。

trans-unit.source: Not bad, but the food could have been tastier.
trans-unit.target: 不错，但食物本可以更美味。

trans-unit.source: The food arrived very fast, but it could have tasted better.
trans-unit.target: 食物很快就到了，但味道本可以更好。

trans-unit.source: The food was just meh. Quick service though.
trans-unit.target: 食物只是meh。快速服务。

trans-unit.source: The waiters carried this restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 服务员经营着这家餐厅。

trans-unit.source: This really hits the spot!
trans-unit.target: 这真的击中了要害！

trans-unit.source: This (dishName) is really tasty!
trans-unit.target: 这个(dishName)真好吃！

trans-unit.source: Delicious!
trans-unit.target: 好吃！

trans-unit.source: Wow, the flavours are great!
trans-unit.target: 哇，味道真好！

trans-unit.source: This is surprisingly tasty.
trans-unit.target: 这令人惊讶地美味。

trans-unit.source: This food is lame!
trans-unit.target: 这食物糟透了！

trans-unit.source: It doesn't taste very good . . .
trans-unit.target: 味道不太好。

trans-unit.source: What a disappointment.
trans-unit.target: 真是令人失望。

trans-unit.source: Well, this food sure is a letdown.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，这种食物确实令人失望。

trans-unit.source: I do not like this taste . . .
trans-unit.target: 我不喜欢这种味道。

trans-unit.source: What interesting decor!
trans-unit.target: 多么有趣的装饰啊！

trans-unit.source: I wonder if the food here is good.
trans-unit.target: 我想知道这里的食物是否好吃。

trans-unit.source: This place smells amazing!
trans-unit.target: 这个地方闻起来很香！

trans-unit.source: Mhmmmhm.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。

trans-unit.source: I'm hungry.
trans-unit.target: 我饿了。

trans-unit.source: I heard this place is great.
trans-unit.target: 我听说这个地方很棒。

trans-unit.source: I hope they have ice cream here.
trans-unit.target: 我希望他们这里有冰淇淋。

trans-unit.source: The atmosphere is very peculiar.
trans-unit.target: 气氛非常奇特。

trans-unit.source: Hunger is a natural state of being.
trans-unit.target: 饥饿是一种自然状态。

trans-unit.source: The chefs look like they have a fighting spirit.
trans-unit.target: 厨师们看起来很有战斗精神。

trans-unit.source: Hi, are you the chef?
trans-unit.target: 嗨，你是厨师吗？

trans-unit.source: When will the food get here?
trans-unit.target: 食物什么时候到？

trans-unit.source: Is this restaurant any good?
trans-unit.target: 这家餐厅好吗？

trans-unit.source: You must be the chef. It's a pleasure.
trans-unit.target: 你一定是厨师。很荣幸。

trans-unit.source: Hmmmm.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。

trans-unit.source: Oui chef! Tres bien.
trans-unit.target: 是的，老板！很好。

trans-unit.source: That's a sharp knife you got there.
trans-unit.target: 你拿的那把刀很锋利。

trans-unit.source: I can't wait to try out the food!
trans-unit.target: 我迫不及待地想尝尝这些食物！

trans-unit.source: Hi chef. I hope you do not disappoint.
trans-unit.target: 嗨，厨师。我希望你不要失望。

trans-unit.source: Shouldn't you be cooking something?
trans-unit.target: 你不应该做饭吗？

trans-unit.source: That's it, I cannot wait any longer.
trans-unit.target: 就是这样，我不能再等了。

trans-unit.source: The service here is way too slow. I'm leaving.
trans-unit.target: 这里的服务太慢了。我要走了。

trans-unit.source: Still no food. I won't be coming back here.
trans-unit.target: 仍然没有食物。我不会再回来了。

trans-unit.source: Ah that's it! I've been waiting for so long. Time to go.
trans-unit.target: 啊，就是这样！我已经等了这么久了。该走了。

trans-unit.source: If I stay here any longer, I will starve to death.
trans-unit.target: 如果我再呆在这里，我会饿死的。

trans-unit.source: Time to go.
trans-unit.target: 该走了。

trans-unit.source: I don't think I'm getting my food today.
trans-unit.target: 我想我今天吃不到东西了。

trans-unit.source: I'm just going to go order pizza.
trans-unit.target: 我正要去订披萨。

trans-unit.source: My stomach is empty. And my mood is ruined.
trans-unit.target: 我的胃是空的。我的心情被毁了。

trans-unit.source: I think this restaurant needs to hire more staff.
trans-unit.target: 我认为这家餐厅需要雇佣更多的员工。

trans-unit.source: What? I Haven't finished eating yet!
trans-unit.target: 什么？我还没吃完呢！

trans-unit.source: We have to go? Now?
trans-unit.target: 我们得走了？现在？

trans-unit.source: But I'm still hungry . . .
trans-unit.target: 但我还是饿了。

trans-unit.source: This is very unexpected . . .
trans-unit.target: 这太出乎意料了。

trans-unit.source: I haven't finished eating yet. I don't like this place.
trans-unit.target: 我还没吃完呢。我不喜欢这个地方。

trans-unit.source: I can't believe this! I'm outraged!
trans-unit.target: 我简直不敢相信！我很生气！

trans-unit.source: Fine. I was leaving anyways.
trans-unit.target: 好的。不管怎样，我都要离开了。

trans-unit.source: Well this is very rude . . .
trans-unit.target: 这太粗鲁了。

trans-unit.source: Can I finish eating first?
trans-unit.target: 我可以先吃完吗？

trans-unit.source: How can you kick out your customers? Whyyyyy?
trans-unit.target: 你怎么能赶走你的客户？为什么？

trans-unit.source: How can a restaurant not have food?
trans-unit.target: 餐馆怎么可能没有食物？

trans-unit.source: I can't believe there is no more food left!
trans-unit.target: 我简直不敢相信，已经没有食物了！

trans-unit.source: Well . . . This is disappointing.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。这令人失望。

trans-unit.source: No more food? This is madness!
trans-unit.target: 没有食物了？这太疯狂了！

trans-unit.source: No food left? But I'm so hungry . . .
trans-unit.target: 没有食物了？但我饿极了。

trans-unit.source: No more food? I will come back another time.
trans-unit.target: 没有食物了？我改天再来。

trans-unit.source: Well this is largely disappointing. I will come back.
trans-unit.target: 这在很大程度上令人失望。我会回来的。

trans-unit.source: The chef will do well to provide more food next time.
trans-unit.target: 厨师下次会提供更多的食物。

trans-unit.source: This is a large setback. I will have to come back.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个巨大的挫折。我必须回来。

trans-unit.source: How long am I supposed to wait for food?
trans-unit.target: 我应该等多久才能拿到食物？

trans-unit.source: Hello! I'm very hungry here!
trans-unit.target: 你好！我在这里很饿！

trans-unit.source: Where is the food that I ordered?
trans-unit.target: 我点的食物在哪里？

trans-unit.source: Man, the service here is slow . . .
trans-unit.target: 伙计，这里的服务很慢。

trans-unit.source: I wonder when I can eat some food . . .
trans-unit.target: 我想知道我什么时候能吃点东西。

trans-unit.source: Where is the service today?
trans-unit.target: 今天的服务在哪里？

trans-unit.source: Did they forget about my food?
trans-unit.target: 他们忘了我的食物了吗？

trans-unit.source: I have been waiting for ages!
trans-unit.target: 我等了好久了！

trans-unit.source: WHERE IS MY FOOD!!
trans-unit.target: 我的食物在哪里！！

trans-unit.source: I am hungry. I am sad.
trans-unit.target: 我饿了。我很难过。

trans-unit.source: Uh huh.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。

trans-unit.source: I'll wait a little bit longer.
trans-unit.target: 我再等一会儿。

trans-unit.source: Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 非常感谢。

trans-unit.source: It's ok, I can wait a little more.
trans-unit.target: 没关系，我可以再等一会儿。

trans-unit.source: Ah I see. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 啊，我明白了。非常感谢。

trans-unit.source: Ok.
trans-unit.target: 好 啊。

trans-unit.source: Fine, I can wait a bit more.
trans-unit.target: 好吧，我可以再等一会儿。

trans-unit.source: It's ok, I understand.
trans-unit.target: 没关系，我理解。

trans-unit.source: As long as he food is delicious.
trans-unit.target: 只要他的食物是美味的。

trans-unit.source: The food better be good!
trans-unit.target: 食物最好是好的！

trans-unit.source: RESTAURANT CUSTOMER EVENT DIALOGUES
trans-unit.target: 餐厅客户活动对话

trans-unit.source: Hey there!
trans-unit.target: 嘿！

trans-unit.source: I'm so excited!
trans-unit.target: 我太兴奋了！

trans-unit.source: I wonder what we will eat today?
trans-unit.target: 我想知道我们今天吃什么？

trans-unit.source: This party makes me nervous.
trans-unit.target: 这个聚会让我很紧张。

trans-unit.source: I can't wait for the main event!
trans-unit.target: 我等不及主赛事了！

trans-unit.source: The decor here is very interesting . . .
trans-unit.target: 这里的装饰很有趣。

trans-unit.source: I heard the food here is great.
trans-unit.target: 我听说这里的食物很棒。

trans-unit.source: I can't wait!
trans-unit.target: 我等不及了！

trans-unit.source: I've been looking forward to this.
trans-unit.target: 我一直对此充满期待。

trans-unit.source: I wonder if the grub will be good.
trans-unit.target: 我想知道这根虫子是否好吃。

trans-unit.source: Did you get (npc)'s memo?
trans-unit.target: 你收到(npc)的备忘录了吗？

trans-unit.source: I love exclusive parties.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢独家派对。

trans-unit.source: I'm so glad we didn't invite Steve.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴我们没有邀请史蒂夫。

trans-unit.source: Ughhh. Why did (npc) invite this person again?
trans-unit.target: 啊。为什么(npc)再次邀请这个人？

trans-unit.source: Would you like to join my secret society?
trans-unit.target: 你愿意加入我的秘密社团吗？

trans-unit.source: I kinda miss Steve.
trans-unit.target: 我有点想念史蒂夫。

trans-unit.source: I'm so glad (npc) invited me this time!
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴(npc)这次邀请了我！

trans-unit.source: Psssst. Hey. Wanna hear a secret?
trans-unit.target: 嘘。嘿。想听听秘密吗？

trans-unit.source: Don't worry. I would never spill any secrets.
trans-unit.target: 别担心。我绝不会泄露任何秘密。

trans-unit.source: Hey! I'm not the one who brought Steve.
trans-unit.target: 嘿！我不是带史蒂夫来的人。

trans-unit.source: Thank you all for coming to my secret party._I'm so happy to see all of you again._Just please remember to keep these meetings to yourselves._We don't want another situation like with Steve._Now, enjoy the food!
trans-unit.target: 谢谢大家来参加我的秘密聚会_很高兴再次见到你们_请记住，这些会议要保密_我们不希望再出现像史蒂夫那样的情况_现在，享受食物吧！

trans-unit.source: Thanks for inviting us!_I love secret parties._It's all Steve's fault._I really don't like Steve._Yay! I'm starving.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你邀请我们_我喜欢秘密聚会_这都是史蒂夫的错_我真的不喜欢史蒂夫_耶！我饿死了。

trans-unit.source: Hi Everyone! I'm so glad we could sneak in here._Big thanks to (playername) for making this happen._Remember, secrets make you unique._Be secretive. It is the best path for life._Now, go enjoy the delicious meal!
trans-unit.target: 大家好！我很高兴我们能偷偷溜进来_非常感谢(playername)让这一切发生_记住，秘密让你独一无二_保密。这是人生最好的道路_现在，去享受这顿美味的饭菜吧！

trans-unit.source: It was very tricky._Thanks (playername)!_Makes sense._Is this really true?_Finally! What I came for.
trans-unit.target: 这很棘手_谢谢(playername)_有道理_这是真的吗_终于！我来这里是为了什么。

trans-unit.source: Thank you for coming to my secret party!_Please remember to keep quiet about these events._That includes your spouses._We all remember what happened with Steve._See you all next time!
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你来参加我的秘密聚会_请记住对这些事件保持沉默_这包括你的配偶_我们都记得史蒂夫发生了什么事_下次见！

trans-unit.source: Can I bring my friend next time?_Can I tell my wife?_Oh . . ._I hate it when someone ruins something good._See you (npc)!
trans-unit.target: 下次我可以带我的朋友来吗_我可以告诉我妻子吗_哦_我讨厌有人破坏好东西_再见(npc)！

trans-unit.source: I love BKB 49 so much!
trans-unit.target: 我非常喜欢BKB 49！

trans-unit.source: Did you see Yang's latest dance?
trans-unit.target: 你看杨最新的舞蹈了吗？

trans-unit.source: I saw Kelpsy last Friday in a supermarket!
trans-unit.target: 上周五我在一家超市看到了Kelpsy！

trans-unit.source: BKB 49 is seriously cool.
trans-unit.target: BKB 49真的很酷。

trans-unit.source: No no no. Benny is the best member.
trans-unit.target: 不，不，本尼是最好的成员。

trans-unit.source: Oh. I thought BKB 49 members would be here . . .
trans-unit.target: 哦。我原以为BKB 49的成员会在这里。

trans-unit.source: Honestly, Yang is so extra.
trans-unit.target: 说实话，杨真的很特别。

trans-unit.source: I just purchase the BKB 49 VR concert. It feels real.
trans-unit.target: 我刚刚购买了BKB 49 VR演唱会。感觉很真实。

trans-unit.source: Benny hasn't responded to my letters!
trans-unit.target: 本尼还没有回复我的信！

trans-unit.source: Hey BKBees. It's fantastic to see you all._It looks like we have some new members today._The power of BKB can join people from all aspects of life!_I hope you enjoy the food provided by (playername)._Now let's celebrate!
trans-unit.target: 嘿，BKBees。见到你们真是太好了_看起来我们今天有一些新成员_BKB的力量可以连接生活各个方面的人_我希望你喜欢(playername)提供的食物_现在让我们庆祝一下！

trans-unit.source: I love BKB 49!_I wish (randomFirstName) was here . . ._Bee power forever!_Yay (playername)!_Let's eat BKBees!
trans-unit.target: 我爱 BKB 49！_我希望(randomFirstName)在这里..._蜜蜂力量永存！_耶(playername)！_我们吃 BKBees 吧！

trans-unit.source: I love BKB 49 . . ._That is the emotion that has brought us all here._Unfortunately, they have declined our invitation for the 33rd time._But we must persist and continue to devote our love!_For Yang. For Kelpsy. For Benny!
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢BKB 49_正是这种情感把我们带到了这里_不幸的是，他们已经第33次拒绝了我们的邀请_但我们必须坚持下去，继续奉献我们的爱_为了杨。为了Kelpsy。为了本尼！

trans-unit.source: I love them more!_This is so powerful . . ._Not again. I want to make Yang my husband._Don't worry. They will come one day._Don't forget about Xixi!
trans-unit.target: 我更爱他们_这太强大了_不会了。我想让杨做我的丈夫_别担心。他们总有一天会来的_别忘了西溪！

trans-unit.source: That was a fun party folks._We will definitely have a BKB member here next time!_In the mean time, remember to keep sending fanmail._Persistence is the key to winning the hearts of BKB!_Till next time!
trans-unit.target: 那是一个有趣的聚会，伙计们_下次我们一定会有一个BKB会员_同时，记得继续发送粉丝邮件_坚持是赢得BKB心的关键_下次见！

trans-unit.source: Yeah!_Crossing my fingers!_I sent 6 letters last week. I think they will respond soon._True. Let's not give up._Thank you for the party (npc).
trans-unit.target: 是啊_交叉我的手指_我上周发了6封信。我想他们很快就会回应_没错。我们不要放弃_谢谢你的聚会。

trans-unit.source: I think I was a caveman in my previous life.
trans-unit.target: 我想我前世是个穴居人。

trans-unit.source: I love the smell of charred boar in the morning.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢早上烧焦的野猪的味道。

trans-unit.source: I'm impartial to elk.
trans-unit.target: 我对麋鹿是公正的。

trans-unit.source: Have you tried Burger Emperor in Billboard?
trans-unit.target: 你在广告牌上试过汉堡王吗？

trans-unit.source: To be honest, I don't really eat vegetables.
trans-unit.target: 说实话，我真的不吃蔬菜。

trans-unit.source: Nothing better than a big-ol T-bone steak.
trans-unit.target: 没有什么比一大块T骨牛排更好的了。

trans-unit.source: I prefer a small charcoal grill than a big barbeque.
trans-unit.target: 我更喜欢小炭烤架，而不是大烤架。

trans-unit.source: My girlfriend says I have a pork belly.
trans-unit.target: 我女朋友说我有猪肚。

trans-unit.source: Do we they intestines here? It's my favorite.
trans-unit.target: 我们在这里吃肠子吗？这是我最喜欢的。

trans-unit.source: Have you tried CFK's Cholesterol burger?
trans-unit.target: 你吃过CFK的胆固醇汉堡吗？

trans-unit.source: Hello my fellow meat lovers._We are back for another annual celebration of all things protein._Just some housekeeping. Remember your eating manners._I'm looking at you (randomGuestName)._Now let's feast!
trans-unit.target: 各位肉食爱好者们，大家好。_我们又回来参加一年一度的蛋白质庆祝活动了。_只是一些家务事。记住你的饮食礼仪。_我正在看着你(randomGuestName)。_现在让我们大快朵颐吧！

trans-unit.source: Hi (npc)!_I'm definitely hitting the gym after this._I'm not sure if I can control myself._You eat like a pig (randomGuestName)._Let's goooo.
trans-unit.target: 你好(npc)_之后我肯定会去健身房_我不确定我是否能控制自己_你吃得像头猪(randomGuestName)_我们走吧。

trans-unit.source: Welcome to another annual MeatUp._I'm so excited to be eating a meal provided by (playername)._I heard the meat served here is extraordinary._Before we start . . . eh forgot it._Let's eat some meat!
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到另一个年度聚餐_我很高兴能吃到(playername)提供的饭菜_我听说这里的肉很特别_在我们开始之前。啊，忘了。我们吃点肉吧！

trans-unit.source: I've been waiting for this all year . . ._This restaurant is on the Culinary Hot List._I can't wait for the meat . . ._Can we move along . . ._Yes! This is gonna be great.
trans-unit.target: 我一整年都在等这个_这家餐厅在烹饪热门名单上_我等不及吃肉了_我们能继续走吗_对！这将是伟大的。

trans-unit.source: I hope you you guys enjoyed that barbeque._It's always a pleasure to dine with fellow meat lovers._Big thanks to (playername) for providing all the great food._Next time, let's go hunting and cook some fresh meat!
trans-unit.target: 我希望你们喜欢那个烧烤_与肉食爱好者共进晚餐总是很愉快_非常感谢(playername)提供所有美味的食物_下次，我们去打猎，煮些新鲜的肉吧！

trans-unit.source: It was pretty good._How can you not love meat?_Yay (playername)!_That sounds quite exciting . . .
trans-unit.target: 它相当不错_你怎么能不喜欢肉呢_耶_听起来很刺激。

trans-unit.source: Let's play Dungeons and Demons after this.
trans-unit.target: 在这之后，让我们玩地下城和魔鬼。

trans-unit.source: I just received Lelsh's new L-Glasses in the mail.
trans-unit.target: 我刚收到莱什的新L眼镜的邮件。

trans-unit.source: You work in the Lelsh tech department? Must be cushy.
trans-unit.target: 你在Lelsh技术部门工作？一定很舒服。

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the new P1 chip? It's out of this world.
trans-unit.target: 你看到新的P1芯片了吗？这太棒了。

trans-unit.source: I'm still trying to build myself an android girlfriend.
trans-unit.target: 我仍在努力为自己打造一个机器人女友。

trans-unit.source: I find I connect better with androids than humans.
trans-unit.target: 我发现我与机器人的联系比与人类更好。

trans-unit.source: I'm trying to build my own android too!
trans-unit.target: 我也在努力构建自己的android！

trans-unit.source: This is my first time out in months.
trans-unit.target: 这是我几个月来第一次外出。

trans-unit.source: Anyone play Dungeons and Demons here?
trans-unit.target: 有人在这里玩《地下城与魔鬼》吗？

trans-unit.source: I can't wait to get my new graphics card.
trans-unit.target: 我等不及要我的新显卡了。

trans-unit.source: Hello my fellow connoisseurs of technology._You cannot comprehend my excitement for this meeting._We will chat technoloy. We will eat some tasty food._What more could you ask for?_Let's get the festivities started!
trans-unit.target: 你好，我的技术鉴赏家们_你无法理解我对这次会议的兴奋_我们将讨论技术。我们将吃一些美味的食物_你还能要求什么_让我们开始庆祝吧！

trans-unit.source: Actually, I consider myself an aficionado._Correct. My excitement is palpable._I want to talk about the new M18 Android Series._Well . . . A lot actually._Yay.
trans-unit.target: 事实上，我认为自己是个狂热者_对的。我的兴奋是显而易见的_我想谈谈新的M18安卓系列_嗯。实际上很多_耶。

trans-unit.source: Hello my fellow technological aficianados._Here we have engineers, programmers, and gamers._Despite our differences, we are joined by our love for technology._We are also joined by our love for food. So let's eat!
trans-unit.target: 你好，我的技术爱好者们_这里有工程师、程序员和游戏玩家_尽管我们有分歧，但我们对技术的热爱使我们团结在一起_我们也因对食物的热爱而结合在一起。那我们吃吧！

trans-unit.source: Actually, I would call myself a connoisseur._Ahem. I'm actually an electrician._Technology is the future of mankind!_Well. I do enjoy a good pizza.
trans-unit.target: 事实上，我会称自己为鉴赏家_啊哼。我其实是个电工_技术是人类的未来_好。我确实喜欢吃一个好披萨。

trans-unit.source: Well that's it folks. I really hope you enjoyed this event._You all owe me 250 Doggy Coins each._We are meeting up for a Dungeons and Demons party tomorrow._Remember to bring your VR headsets.
trans-unit.target: 好了，伙计们。我真的希望你喜欢这次活动_你们每人欠我250个小狗硬币_我们明天要开会参加地下城与魔鬼派对_记得带上你的VR耳机。

trans-unit.source: I would put this in the A-tier of all our events._Alright. Skydrop incoming._Well. I was going to go play the Zombie Dawn game . . ._I can't wait! See you tomorrow (npc).
trans-unit.target: 我会把它放在我们所有活动的A级_好吧。Skydrop即将到来_好。我原本打算去玩《僵尸黎明》游戏_我等不及了！明天见(npc)。

trans-unit.source: Happy birthday (npc)!
trans-unit.target: 生日快乐(npc)！

trans-unit.source: I hope (npc) likes my present.
trans-unit.target: 我希望(npc)喜欢我的礼物。

trans-unit.source: Was I supposed to bring a present?
trans-unit.target: 我应该带礼物吗？

trans-unit.source: Hey! You didn't come to my birthday party.
trans-unit.target: 嘿！你没来参加我的生日聚会。

trans-unit.source: Birthdays give me anxiety.
trans-unit.target: 生日让我很焦虑。

trans-unit.source: These birthday presents are getting expensive . . .
trans-unit.target: 这些生日礼物越来越贵了。

trans-unit.source: Why do we celebrate growing one year closer to death?
trans-unit.target: 为什么我们庆祝离死亡更近的一年？

trans-unit.source: I wish people came to my birthday party.
trans-unit.target: 我希望人们能来参加我的生日聚会。

trans-unit.source: Can we have cake soon?
trans-unit.target: 我们能很快吃蛋糕吗？

trans-unit.source: Haaaappy biiiirthday toooo youuu . . . Oh . . .
trans-unit.target: 哈哈，我也是你的生日。哦。

trans-unit.source: Hi friends. Thanks for coming to my birthday!_I'm one year older. But I feel one year younger._Especially when I'm joined by old friends._Now let's all have fun. And show me those presents!
trans-unit.target: 嗨，朋友们。谢谢你来参加我的生日_我比你大一岁。但我觉得自己年轻了一岁_尤其是当我和老朋友在一起的时候_现在，让我们都玩得开心。给我看看那些礼物！

trans-unit.source: Wait. This is a birthday party?_But you look five years older._Wouldn't miss it for the world._Uh (randomGuest) . . . did you remember to bring the cake?
trans-unit.target: 等待。这是生日聚会吗_但你看起来老了五岁_无论如何都不会错过的_呃(randomGuest)。你记得带蛋糕了吗？

trans-unit.source: First off, I'm so happy to see you guys again!_Thanks for coming to celebrate this special day._To be honest, I normally dread birthdays._But having you guys here makes this day a lot better._Now let's enjoy some delicious food.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我很高兴再次见到你们_谢谢你来庆祝这个特殊的日子_说实话，我通常害怕生日_但有你们在这里，这一天会好得多_现在，让我们品尝一些美味的食物。

trans-unit.source: Happy to see you (npc)!_I heard there was going to be delicious food._Me too. Me too._Awwww . . ._Yay let's eat!
trans-unit.target: 很高兴见到你(npc)_我听说会有美味的食物_我也是。我也是_噢_耶，我们吃吧！

trans-unit.source: Thank you for coming to my birthday everyone!_It always warms my heart to celebrate this day with friends._Getting old sucks. But you guys make it worthwhile._Big thanks to chef (playername) for the delivious food!
trans-unit.target: 谢谢大家来参加我的生日聚会_和朋友一起庆祝这一天总是让我感到温暖_变老很糟糕。但你们让这一切变得值得_非常感谢厨师(playername)的美味佳肴！

trans-unit.source: Wouldn't miss it for the world!_Awwww._But you are still so young . . ._(playername) lived up to my expectations.
trans-unit.target: 全世界都不会错过的_噢_但你还这么年轻_(playername)没有辜负我的期望。

trans-unit.source: Sir, did you get the (npc)'s latest memo?
trans-unit.target: 先生，你收到(npc)的最新备忘录了吗？

trans-unit.source: (randomFirstName) didn't even greet me today. How rude!
trans-unit.target: (randomFirstName)今天甚至没有问候我。太粗鲁了！

trans-unit.source: Good day. Pleasure to see you again.
trans-unit.target: 很好的一天。很高兴再次见到你。

trans-unit.source: Politeness is the key to a better life!
trans-unit.target: 礼貌是改善生活的关键！

trans-unit.source: Be good. Be polite.
trans-unit.target: 要乖。要有礼貌。

trans-unit.source: I was coached by Sir Tommy Polite himself!
trans-unit.target: 我是由汤米·波利特爵士亲自指导的！

trans-unit.source: We are the embodiment of class and elegance.
trans-unit.target: 我们是阶级和优雅的化身。

trans-unit.source: My friends are not as polite as myself.
trans-unit.target: 我的朋友不如我礼貌。

trans-unit.source: Politeness is the highest virtue.
trans-unit.target: 礼貌是最高的美德。

trans-unit.source: I want my kids to join the Polite Society when they grow up.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我的孩子长大后加入礼貌协会。

trans-unit.source: Welcome to the annual gathering of the Polite Society._We are joined today by our class and elegance._Despite our likeable personalities, we must stay vigilant._We must continue to grow our politeness!_Now, let us dine!
trans-unit.target: 欢迎参加礼貌协会的年度聚会_今天，我们的班级和优雅加入了我们_尽管我们性格讨人喜欢，但我们必须保持警惕_我们必须继续提高我们的礼貌_现在，让我们吃饭吧！

trans-unit.source: We are honoured (npc)._Mhhmm. This is true._Ah yes. We must stay humble._I believe it will be difficult to advance my politeness._Remember to chew with your mouths closed folks!
trans-unit.target: 我们很荣幸(npc)_毫米。这是真的_啊，是的。我们必须保持谦逊_我相信很难提高我的礼貌_记得闭着嘴咀嚼，伙计们！

trans-unit.source: Ladies and gentlemen. Welcome._We are gathered here for the 40th annual meeting of our Polite Society._It is our mission to better our personalities._We must always be polite to others._Now, let us dine in a polite manner!
trans-unit.target: 女士们，先生们。欢迎_我们聚集在这里参加礼貌协会第40届年会_改善我们的个性是我们的使命_我们必须始终对他人保持礼貌_现在，让我们礼貌地用餐！

trans-unit.source: Greetings._I feel so classy with you fine folks at my side._Well spoken._This is the way._We must always remember our eating manners!
trans-unit.target: 你好_有你们这些好人在我身边，我感觉很优雅_说得好_就是这样_我们必须时刻记住我们的饮食习惯！

trans-unit.source: Ladies and gentlemen. It was a pleasure._Today, we have truly embodied the meaning of grace and elegance._To be polite to our host, please tidy up your tables and push your chairs in._Don't forget to say thank you to the chef!
trans-unit.target: 女士们，先生们。我很高兴_今天，我们真正体现了优雅的意义_为了对主人礼貌，请收拾好桌子，把椅子推进去。别忘了向厨师说声谢谢！

trans-unit.source: Likewise._Indeed. I behaved quite elegantly._No need to tell us. For we are very considerate._I am feeling quite grateful twoards chef (playername).
trans-unit.target: 同样_的确。我表现得相当优雅_不用告诉我们。因为我们很体贴_我很感激这两位厨师(playername)。

trans-unit.source: I just want to stuff my face today.
trans-unit.target: 我今天只想往脸上塞东西。

trans-unit.source: I need a meal fit for a king!
trans-unit.target: 我需要一顿适合国王吃的饭！

trans-unit.source: What!? This place isn't all-you-can-eat?
trans-unit.target: 什么！？这个地方不是你唯一能吃的吗？

trans-unit.source: My doctor tells me I should eat less.
trans-unit.target: 我的医生告诉我应该少吃点。

trans-unit.source: I'm on a diet, but today is my cheat day!
trans-unit.target: 我在节食，但今天是我的作弊日！

trans-unit.source: I've been fasting for 3 days to prepare for this!
trans-unit.target: 我已经禁食3天了，为这个做准备！

trans-unit.source: Ughhhh. This will definitely ruin my diet.
trans-unit.target: 啊。这肯定会毁了我的饮食。

trans-unit.source: My food costs have been very high lately.
trans-unit.target: 我最近的食品价格一直很高。

trans-unit.source: Do you have a bottomless stomach as well?
trans-unit.target: 你也有一个无底的胃吗？

trans-unit.source: I wish I had a banquet like this every day.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我每天都能有这样的宴会。

trans-unit.source: Ahem. Well hi friends. Good to see you all._Welcome to this year's great feast._This is the day in which you can eat as much as you desire._Bask in the glory of your gluttony._Let's feast!
trans-unit.target: 啊哼。嗨，朋友们。很高兴见到你们_欢迎来到今年的盛宴_在这一天，你可以随心所欲地进食_尽情享受你暴饮暴食的荣耀_让我们盛宴！

trans-unit.source: Good to see you (npc)!_I can't wait to chow down._My partner says this isn't good for my health._I've been doing that for the last 20 years._Let's stuff ourselves!
trans-unit.target: 很高兴见到你(npc)_我等不及要狼吞虎咽了_我的伴侣说这对我的健康不好_在过去的20年里，我一直在做这件事_让我们填饱肚子吧！

trans-unit.source: Hi folks. Welcome to our annual celebration of gluttony._This year, chef (playername) will provide us with an amazing feast._Don't hold back. Don't give up._Don't stop until you collapse. Let's eaaaatttt!
trans-unit.target: 大家好。欢迎参加我们一年一度的暴饮暴食庆祝活动_今年，厨师(playername)将为我们提供一场精彩的盛宴_不要退缩。不要放弃_不要停止，直到你崩溃。让我们欢呼吧！

trans-unit.source: I'm so pumped for this._I heard (playername)'s food is incredible._You know I won't._Let's eat!
trans-unit.target: 我为此感到非常兴奋_我听说(playername)的食物太棒了_你知道我不会的。我们吃吧！

trans-unit.source: Whew. That's it folks. I'm stuffed._I'll need to be on a week long diet after that meal._What an experience!_I hope you guys had as much fun as I had._I hope to see your friendly faces at the next event!
trans-unit.target: 呼。就是这样，伙计们。我吃饱了_那顿饭后，我需要节食一周_多么美妙的经历啊_我希望你们和我一样开心_我希望在下次活动中看到你们友好的面孔！

trans-unit.source: I'm sooooo fullll._I just want to go to sleep._This day will be one of my best memories._Eating is my favorite hobby._If there is food, I'll be there.
trans-unit.target: 我非常高兴_我只想去睡觉_这一天将是我最美好的回忆之一_吃饭是我最喜欢的爱好_如果有食物，我会在那里。

trans-unit.source: I really need to satisfy my sweet tooth.
trans-unit.target: 我真的需要满足我对甜食的喜爱。

trans-unit.source: I love cupcakes!
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢纸杯蛋糕！

trans-unit.source: I just want to eat whipped cream. Only whipped cream.
trans-unit.target: 我只想吃生奶油。只有生奶油。

trans-unit.source: I hope we can eat some chocolate.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我们能吃些巧克力。

trans-unit.source: My doctor tells me to watch my sugar intake.
trans-unit.target: 我的医生告诉注意我的糖摄入量。

trans-unit.source: I just can't stop eating sweets. Oh well.
trans-unit.target: 我就是忍不住吃甜食。好吧。

trans-unit.source: Have you tried Horsey's new Mega Sweet Heartstopper bar?
trans-unit.target: 你试过Horsey的新Mega Sweet Heartstopper酒吧吗？

trans-unit.source: So you have a sweet tooth too?
trans-unit.target: 所以你也爱吃甜食？

trans-unit.source: I get withdrawals if I don't get my daily dose of sugar.
trans-unit.target: 如果我没有摄入每日剂量的糖，我就会提款。

trans-unit.source: I hope the beverages are sweet too.
trans-unit.target: 我希望饮料也很甜。

trans-unit.source: Hi friends. Welcome to my humble party for sweet tooths._Today, the amazing chef (playername) will be serving us._An amazing selection of sweets will be provided for us._But remember, all things in moderation!
trans-unit.target: 嗨，朋友们。欢迎参加我为甜食举办的简陋聚会_今天，令人惊叹的厨师(playername)将为我们服务。_将为我们提供各种美味的糖果。_但请记住，一切都要适度！

trans-unit.source: I prefer to just eat sugar._I'm so excited!_I wonder if there will be chocolate?_I'll worry about my health tomorrow. Let's eat!
trans-unit.target: 我宁愿只吃糖_我太兴奋了_我想知道是否会有巧克力_我明天会担心我的健康。我们吃吧！

trans-unit.source: Welcome to our annual Cupcake Party._Today is an especially special event._Chef (playername) is a rising star in the culinary world._I'm incredibly excited to try (playername)'s sweets._Now, let's start the party!
trans-unit.target: 欢迎参加我们一年一度的纸杯蛋糕派对_今天是一个特别的日子_厨师(playername)是烹饪界的一颗新星_我非常兴奋能尝试(playername)的糖果_现在，让我们开始聚会吧！

trans-unit.source: I'd never miss a chance to eat more sweets._But why?_Ohhhh. I've never heard of (playername)._Me too!_Let's eat some sweets!
trans-unit.target: 我绝不会错过吃更多甜食的机会_但是为什么呢_哦。我从未听说过(playername)_我也是_我们吃点甜食吧！

trans-unit.source: Hey friends. Thank you for coming to my party._I really hope you enjoyed all those sweets._I feel lightheaded and tingly after eating all that sugar!_What an effort by chef (playername)'s team!_I hope to see every again soon!
trans-unit.target: 嘿，朋友们。谢谢你来参加我的聚会_我真的希望你喜欢那些糖果_吃了那么多糖后，我感到头晕目眩，浑身刺痛_厨师(playername)的团队付出了多大的努力啊_我希望很快能再见到你！

trans-unit.source: If there is sugar, I'm there._Ohhhh . . . I don't feel so good._You might have diabetes._Woot woot!_I hope there is a chocolate fondue next time . . .
trans-unit.target: 如果有糖，我就在那里_哦。我感觉不太好_你可能患有糖尿病_汪汪_我希望下次有巧克力火锅。

trans-unit.source: The smell of fish makes me feel right at home.
trans-unit.target: 鱼的味道让我有宾至如归的感觉。

trans-unit.source: Nothing like a nice bowl of chowder in the morning!
trans-unit.target: 没有什么比早上一碗美味的浓汤更好的了！

trans-unit.source: I wish we can eat food like this out at sea . . .
trans-unit.target: 我希望我们能在海上吃这样的食物。

trans-unit.source: Did you know I saw a giant squid last week? I swear!
trans-unit.target: 你知道我上周看到一只巨型鱿鱼了吗？我发誓！

trans-unit.source: My boat broke down yesterday. I need a repair.
trans-unit.target: 我的船昨天抛锚了。我需要修理。

trans-unit.source: There are some strange creatures out in the open sea.
trans-unit.target: 公海上有一些奇怪的生物。

trans-unit.source: I hope they have some charcoal grilled fish . . .
trans-unit.target: 我希望他们有木炭烤鱼。

trans-unit.source: Can't wait to go back out to the sea.
trans-unit.target: 迫不及待地想回到大海。

trans-unit.source: Does anyone have a new rod? Mine broke.
trans-unit.target: 有人有新手杖吗？我的坏了。

trans-unit.source: I smell some fresh fish.
trans-unit.target: 我闻到了一些新鲜鱼的味道。

trans-unit.source: Ahem. My fellow seafaring friends._I'm so excited to join you all on this special day._Chef (playername) will be creating a banquet of the sea for us to enjoy._I heard the seafood here is mindblowing._Let's all have fun!
trans-unit.target: 啊哼。我的航海朋友们_在这个特殊的日子里，我很高兴能和大家一起_厨师(playername)将为我们打造一场大海盛宴_我听说这里的海鲜很好吃_让我们都玩得开心！

trans-unit.source: Hi (npc). Lookin fresh._Just give us the grub!_I wonder if they serve swordfish here?_Only if the fish are freshly caught._Let's chow down!
trans-unit.target: 你好(npc)。看起来很新鲜_把食物给我们_我想知道这里有没有卖旗鱼_只要鱼是新鲜捕捞的_我们狼吞虎咽吧！

trans-unit.source: Welcome to our annual Fisherman's banquet._I'm so excited._All of the food served by chef (playername) are freshly caught._So today, you will reap the rewards of your hard work._Now let's get eating!
trans-unit.target: 欢迎参加我们一年一度的渔人宴会_我太兴奋了_厨师(playername)提供的所有食物都是新鲜捕捞的_所以今天，你将收获你辛勤工作的回报。_现在我们开始吃饭吧！

trans-unit.source: I heard these banquets are a blast._Me excitement is palpable._I wonder if the menu contains the shrimp I caught this morning?_I can't wait to eat some fresh fish._Let's go. I'm hungry!
trans-unit.target: 我听说这些宴会很热闹_我的兴奋是显而易见的_我想知道菜单上有没有我今天早上抓到的虾_我等不及要吃新鲜的鱼了_走吧。我饿了！

trans-unit.source: Well that's a wrap everyone._That was some great seafood served by chef (playername)._Thank you all for coming to our event._It can be lonely out a sea sometimes._So seeing everyone together brings me great joy.
trans-unit.target: 好了，大家都说完了_那是厨师(playername)烹制的美味海鲜_谢谢大家来参加我们的活动_有时候，在海边会很孤独_看到大家在一起，我感到非常高兴。

trans-unit.source: Whew. That was some good grub._I could taste the ocean._Well . . . I had nothing better to do._I prefer to be alone with the sea._Good to see you all!
trans-unit.target: 呼。那真是美味的食物_我能尝到大海的味道_嗯。我没有更好的事可做。我宁愿一个人在海边_很高兴见到你们！

trans-unit.source: I do miss the taste of meat sometimes.
trans-unit.target: 我有时确实很怀念肉的味道。

trans-unit.source: Have you tried tofu burgers? They are quite good.
trans-unit.target: 你吃过豆腐汉堡吗？它们相当不错。

trans-unit.source: One day, I want to open my own vegan restaurant!
trans-unit.target: 有一天，我想开一家自己的素食餐厅！

trans-unit.source: The smell of greens is lovely.
trans-unit.target: 绿色的味道很好闻。

trans-unit.source: As long as alcohol remains vegan, I'm set.
trans-unit.target: 只要酒精仍然是素食主义者，我就做好了准备。

trans-unit.source: My doctor says I have a protein deficiency. What can I do?
trans-unit.target: 我的医生说我缺乏蛋白质。我该怎么办？

trans-unit.source: I hear the veggie dishes here are really good.
trans-unit.target: 我听说这里的蔬菜菜真的很好吃。

trans-unit.source: The dishes here better have some umami.
trans-unit.target: 这里的菜最好有鲜味。

trans-unit.source: My friend ate a big beef burger right next to me. Yuck!
trans-unit.target: 我的朋友在我旁边吃了一个大牛肉汉堡。真恶心！

trans-unit.source: I wish there was more to eat than just salad.
trans-unit.target: 我希望有比沙拉更多的东西吃。

trans-unit.source: Greetings my fellow vegans._It's good to see new members join us for our events._Chef (playername) has created a delicious vegan menu for us._(playername) is a rising star in the culinary world._I'm very excited to try the food!
trans-unit.target: 问候我的素食主义者_很高兴看到新成员加入我们的活动_厨师(playername)为我们制作了一份美味的纯素菜单。_(playername)是烹饪界的一颗新星_我很兴奋能尝尝这些食物！

trans-unit.source: I'm only here because of my doctor . . ._I heard there was gonna be delicious food._It's hard to create delicious vegan food._I saw (playername) in Food Fanatatic magazine._I hope the dishes will have great umami.
trans-unit.target: 我来这里只是因为我的医生_我听说会有美味的食物_很难做出美味的素食_我在《Food Fanatatic》杂志上看到了(playername)_我希望这些菜的鲜味很好。

trans-unit.source: Good to see you all folks._I'm excited to see so many members for today's event._Our group's goal is not only to promote the benefits of veganism._But also enjoy some great food and have fun._Now let's get eating!
trans-unit.target: 很高兴见到大家_我很高兴看到这么多成员参加今天的活动_我们团队的目标不仅是推广素食主义的益处_但也要享受一些美味的食物，玩得开心_现在，我们开始用餐吧！

trans-unit.source: Hi (npc). You look great!_My girlfriend roped me in._It is an important cause._I'm primarily here because I heard the food was great._Yay let's eat!
trans-unit.target: 你好(npc)。你看起来棒极了_我女朋友把我拉了进来。这是一个重要的原因_我来这里主要是因为我听说这里的食物很棒_耶，我们吃吧！

trans-unit.source: So that's the end of our event._I hope you enjoyed the vegan course by chef (playername)!_I know I loved it!_Remember, vegan foods can be delicious too!_I don't even remember the taste of meat anymore . . .
trans-unit.target: 我们的活动到此结束_我希望你喜欢厨师(playername)的素食课程_我知道我喜欢它_记住，素食也可以很美味_我甚至不记得肉的味道了。

trans-unit.source: Awww. But I'm still hungry._The food had a surprising amount of umami._It was ok I guess._This is very true . . ._Me neither . . .
trans-unit.target: 噢。但我还是饿了_这食物有惊人的鲜味_我想还可以_这是真的_我也不。

trans-unit.source: I only eat foods below zero degrees.
trans-unit.target: 我只吃零度以下的食物。

trans-unit.source: If it ain't cold, I'm not eating it.
trans-unit.target: 如果不冷，我就不吃了。

trans-unit.source: Molecular Gastronomy is fascinating.
trans-unit.target: 分子营养学令人着迷。

trans-unit.source: Hey (npc), have you tried frozen sushi?
trans-unit.target: 嘿(npc)，你吃过冷冻寿司吗？

trans-unit.source: I prefer my steaks frozen.
trans-unit.target: 我更喜欢冷冻牛排。

trans-unit.source: As long as this place serves ice cream, I'm happy.
trans-unit.target: 只要这个地方有冰淇淋，我就很高兴。

trans-unit.source: I just bought the new LP Freezer 3000. It's powerful!
trans-unit.target: 我刚买了新的LP冷冻机3000。它很强大！

trans-unit.source: Food tastes better when left in a freezer for a day.
trans-unit.target: 食物放在冰箱里一天味道更好。

trans-unit.source: Cold food gives me a wonderous feeling.
trans-unit.target: 冷食给我一种奇妙的感觉。

trans-unit.source: Is it hot in here? Or is it just me?
trans-unit.target: 这里热吗？还是只有我？

trans-unit.source: Good to see you Fanatics._It took a while to find a restaurant that serves our food._Chef (playername) has prepared a delectable frozen course for us._Personally, I'm happy if there is ice cream. Now, let's get our freeze on!
trans-unit.target: 很高兴见到你，狂热分子_我们花了一段时间才找到一家供应我们食物的餐厅_厨师(playername)为我们准备了一道美味的冷冻菜肴。_就个人而言，如果有冰淇淋，我很高兴。现在，让我们开始冻结！

trans-unit.source: All hail the Frozen Fanatics!_We could always just get ice cream._I heard this place is great._True that._This better be good.
trans-unit.target: 为《冰雪奇缘》粉丝们欢呼_我们总是可以只吃冰淇淋_我听说这个地方很棒_确实如此_这最好是好的。

trans-unit.source: Welcome to the annual meeting of the Frozen Fanatics!_We are here to worship the world of frozen cuisine!_Food tastes best served below zero degrees._All hail ice cream!_All hail refridgerators!_All hail the Frozen Fanatics!
trans-unit.target: 欢迎参加冰雪奇缘狂热者年会_我们在这里崇拜冷冻美食的世界_食物最好在零度以下食用_冰淇淋万岁_所有冰雹制冷机_为《冰雪奇缘》粉丝们欢呼！

trans-unit.source: My wife doesn't like it when I come here._I prefer food that is slightly cold. But not too cold._True that!_All hail ice cream!_All hail refridgerators!_All hail the Frozen Fanatics!
trans-unit.target: 我妻子不喜欢我来这里_我喜欢稍微凉一点的食物。但不要太冷_确实如此_冰淇淋万岁_所有冰雹制冷机_为《冰雪奇缘》粉丝们欢呼！

trans-unit.source: My fellow Fanatics, our event must come to a close._But we must never stop our pursuit for frozen cuisine!_Please remember to recruit more members for our cause._I want to see twice as many Fanatics at our next event!
trans-unit.target: 我的狂热分子们，我们的活动必须结束了_但我们绝不能停止对冷冻美食的追求_请记得为我们的事业招募更多的成员_我希望在我们的下一次活动中看到两倍多的狂热分子！

trans-unit.source: I don't feel cold enough yet . . _Let's get ice cream after!_My friends keep ignoring my invitations . . ._I think we have fewer members compared to our last meeting.
trans-unit.target: 我觉得还不够冷_之后我们去吃冰淇淋吧_我的朋友们总是无视我的邀请_我认为与上次会议相比，我们的成员减少了。

trans-unit.source: I just want to enjoy a private meal.

trans-unit.source: Being social is overrated.

trans-unit.source: I like the ambience here.

trans-unit.source: This wasn't cheap. But it was worth it.

trans-unit.source: I like being alone in big spaces.

trans-unit.source: I think this private meal will make me feel better.

trans-unit.source: Inebriation is a natural state of being.

trans-unit.source: Oh yes, the taste is the best part of alcohol.

trans-unit.source: My favorite drink is vodka martini. Stirred.

trans-unit.source: I'm something of a mixologist myself.

trans-unit.source: Good to see you Connoisseurs. Today is a great day._Why you may ask? Well because of where we are._This is the restaurant run by rising start chef (playername)._And we get to enjoy the amazing drinks served here._Cheers!
trans-unit.target: 很高兴见到你们鉴赏家。今天是个好日子_你为什么会问？因为我们在哪里_这是由初出茅庐的厨师(playername)经营的餐厅_我们可以享受这里提供的美味饮料_干杯！

trans-unit.source: I've been waiting a long time for this day._I'm . . . I'm kinda drunk . . . Where are we?_This is very promising._Oh my god I'm so ready for this._Let's get drinking!
trans-unit.target: 我等这一天等了很久_我。我有点醉了。我们在哪里_这很有希望_哦，天哪，我已经准备好了_我们去喝酒吧！

trans-unit.source: Hello my fellow Connoisseurs._I'm so happy to be joined by friends who share the same passion._Remember folks, we are here to enjoy the art of mixology._This is not a place to get drunk._Please control yourselves!
trans-unit.target: 你好，我的鉴赏家们_我很高兴有志同道合的朋友加入我_记住，伙计们，我们在这里享受调酒的艺术_这不是喝醉的地方_请控制自己！

trans-unit.source: Hello (npc). Good day ain't it?_I am deeply in love with this passion._It would be great if I were tipsy while enjoy this mixology._Wait what?_Booo! Don't tell me what to do!
trans-unit.target: 你好(npc)。今天过得不错，不是吗_我深深地爱上了这种激情_如果我在享受这种调酒的同时喝醉了，那就太好了_等等什么_嘘！别告诉我该怎么做！

trans-unit.source: Whew . . . I love you all!_Um . . . Wait what did I want to say?_Huh? . . . Who are you people? Where did you come from?_You're not my real family!_Hey guys. Hey guys. Wanna go get some beef nuggets?
trans-unit.target: 呼。我爱你们所有人_嗯。等等，我想说什么_嗯。你们是谁？你从哪里来_你不是我真正的家人_嘿，伙计们。嘿，伙计们。想去吃些牛肉块吗？

trans-unit.source: Ughhhhhh . . . My head is spinning._Damn! Everyone here looks so hot. I hadn't noticed before!_I don't believe we have met before today._Yeaaaahhh . . . Ugh . . . That sounds like a good plan . . .

trans-unit.source: This (dishName) will be great.

trans-unit.source: C'mon hurry!
trans-unit.target: 快点！

trans-unit.source: (dishName). Ready!
trans-unit.target: (dishName)准备好了！

trans-unit.source: (dishName). Coming up.

trans-unit.source: Amazing, if I do say so myself.

trans-unit.source: Order done!

trans-unit.source: The guest is going to love this one.
trans-unit.target: 客人会喜欢这个的。

trans-unit.source: I hope there aren't any critics among the crowd . . .
trans-unit.target: 我希望人群中没有任何批评者。

trans-unit.source: Whew. Hope I can have a rest soon.
trans-unit.target: 呼。希望我能很快休息一下。

trans-unit.source: I think this will be a great service.
trans-unit.target: 我认为这将是一项很棒的服务。

trans-unit.source: These ingredients are fantastic.
trans-unit.target: 这些配料太棒了。

trans-unit.source: Can't wait to try preparing this new menu.
trans-unit.target: 迫不及待地想尝试准备这个新菜单。

trans-unit.source: Something doesn't smell right . . .
