trans-unit.source: Let's move people!
trans-unit.target: 让我们移动人们！

trans-unit.source: The guests will be blown away today.
trans-unit.target: 客人今天会被吹走的。

trans-unit.source: I have high hopes for this service.
trans-unit.target: 我对这项服务寄予厚望。

trans-unit.source: Has anyone seen my knife?
trans-unit.target: 有人看到我的刀了吗？

trans-unit.source: Hey (playername).
trans-unit.target: 嘿(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Hi Chef.
trans-unit.target: 嗨，厨师。

trans-unit.source: Are we changing our menu today?
trans-unit.target: 我们今天要换菜单吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm excited to work with these rare ingredients.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴能使用这些稀有成分。

trans-unit.source: Whew. I'm nervous for today's service.
trans-unit.target: 呼。我对今天的礼拜感到紧张。

trans-unit.source: Don't worry, I got this.
trans-unit.target: 别担心，我知道了。

trans-unit.source: I feeling good today chef!
trans-unit.target: 我今天感觉很好，厨师！

trans-unit.source: Got anything special planned for today?
trans-unit.target: 今天有什么特别的计划吗？

trans-unit.source: The menu looks great chef.
trans-unit.target: 菜单看起来很棒，厨师。

trans-unit.source: Are there any special guests coming?
trans-unit.target: 有什么特别的客人要来吗？

trans-unit.source: It seems this customer has already left.
trans-unit.target: 这位客户似乎已经离开了。

trans-unit.source: This order has went to waste.
trans-unit.target: 这个订单被浪费了。

trans-unit.source: The customer is already gone.
trans-unit.target: 客户已经离开了。

trans-unit.source: I guess the customer couldn't wait any longer.
trans-unit.target: 我想客户已经等不及了。

trans-unit.source: I'm going to have to throw this out.
trans-unit.target: 我得把这个扔掉。

trans-unit.source: Ah, this one is going to waste.
trans-unit.target: 啊，这个要浪费了。

trans-unit.source: I wish I could have served this.
trans-unit.target: 我真希望我能端上这个。

trans-unit.source: I hope the customer isn't mad.
trans-unit.target: 我希望客户没有生气。

trans-unit.source: This dish would have tasted great.
trans-unit.target: 这道菜本来会很好吃的。

trans-unit.source: I'm going to have to throw this out.
trans-unit.target: 我得把这个扔掉。

trans-unit.source: I feel a little tired.
trans-unit.target: 我觉得有点累。

trans-unit.source: Whew. I need a break soon.
trans-unit.target: 呼。我需要尽快休息一下。

trans-unit.source: How much longer?
trans-unit.target: 还要多久？

trans-unit.source: My energy is running out.
trans-unit.target: 我的精力正在耗尽。

trans-unit.source: I'm going to need a break soon.
trans-unit.target: 我很快就要休息了。

trans-unit.source: Ahhh. I need to stop for a while.
trans-unit.target: 啊。我需要停一会儿。

trans-unit.source: Whew. I'm a little dizzy.
trans-unit.target: 呼。我有点头晕。

trans-unit.source: This is too much. Let me rest for a bit.
trans-unit.target: 这太过分了。让我休息一会儿。

trans-unit.source: I need to stop cooking for now.
trans-unit.target: 我现在需要停止做饭。

trans-unit.source: I don't feel so good chef.
trans-unit.target: 我觉得厨师不太好。

trans-unit.source: Whew. I feel a lot better now.
trans-unit.target: 呼。我现在感觉好多了。

trans-unit.source: That really hits the spot. I feel alive!
trans-unit.target: 这确实切中要害。我感觉活着！

trans-unit.source: I feel energized.
trans-unit.target: 我感到精力充沛。

trans-unit.source: This will keep me going for a little longer.
trans-unit.target: 这会让我再坚持一段时间。

trans-unit.source: This should keep me awake.
trans-unit.target: 这应该让我保持清醒。

trans-unit.source: What was I cooking again?
trans-unit.target: 我又在煮什么？

trans-unit.source: Which ingredients was I supposed to use again?
trans-unit.target: 我应该再次使用哪些成分？

trans-unit.source: Aghhhh . . . I forgot the recipe again.
trans-unit.target: 啊。我又忘了食谱。

trans-unit.source: Oh dear. What was I doing?
trans-unit.target: 哦，天哪。我刚才在做什么？

trans-unit.source: To be honest, I'm a little lost.
trans-unit.target: 说实话，我有点迷路了。

trans-unit.source: RANDOM NPCS
trans-unit.target: 随机核电站

trans-unit.source: Ugh. So many tourists here.
trans-unit.target: 啊。这里有这么多游客。

trans-unit.source: Move along people!
trans-unit.target: 跟着人们走！

trans-unit.source: I hate it when it rains.
trans-unit.target: 我讨厌下雨。

trans-unit.source: I feel sick.
trans-unit.target: 我觉得不舒服。

trans-unit.source: I hate walking so much. Where are the cars?
trans-unit.target: 我非常讨厌走路。车在哪里？

trans-unit.source: Ugh. The humidity is ruining my hair.
trans-unit.target: 啊。湿气毁了我的头发。

trans-unit.source: I don't like seagulls.
trans-unit.target: 我不喜欢海鸥。

trans-unit.source: There is a fishy smell. Where is it coming from?
trans-unit.target: 有股鱼腥味。它是从哪里来的？

trans-unit.source: I prefer the big city.
trans-unit.target: 我更喜欢大城市。

trans-unit.source: Why are there no massage parlours here?
trans-unit.target: 为什么这里没有按摩院？

trans-unit.source: What a lovely day!
trans-unit.target: 多么美好的一天啊！

trans-unit.source: Can't wait to hit the beach!
trans-unit.target: 迫不及待地想去海滩！

trans-unit.source: White Ash Harbor is such a chill town.
trans-unit.target: 白灰港是一个寒冷的小镇。

trans-unit.source: I love these old buildings.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢这些旧建筑。

trans-unit.source: Can't wait to visit the bathhouse!
trans-unit.target: 迫不及待地想参观澡堂！

trans-unit.source: The weather matches my mood perfectly.
trans-unit.target: 天气与我的心情非常吻合。

trans-unit.source: The view here is lovely.
trans-unit.target: 这里的景色很美。

trans-unit.source: This town gives me good vibes.
trans-unit.target: 这个城镇给了我很好的氛围。

trans-unit.source: I'm glad that Lelsh supports this town.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴Lelsh支持这个城镇。

trans-unit.source: Can these people walk any slower?
trans-unit.target: 这些人能走慢点吗？

trans-unit.source: Move! Move!
trans-unit.target: 快走！快走！

trans-unit.source: Hey! Get out of the way!
trans-unit.target: 嘿！让开！

trans-unit.source: Hey hey! Please don't just stand there.
trans-unit.target: 嘿嘿！请不要只是站在那里。

trans-unit.source: I need to find a place to eat!
trans-unit.target: 我需要找个地方吃饭！

trans-unit.source: I need to find a bathroom!
trans-unit.target: 我需要找个浴室！

trans-unit.source: I don't want to miss my train!
trans-unit.target: 我不想错过我的火车！

trans-unit.source: Honey? Where did you go? I'm sorry ok!
trans-unit.target: 蜂蜜？你去哪里了？对不起，好吧！

trans-unit.source: I just want to go lie down.
trans-unit.target: 我只想躺下。

trans-unit.source: I wish I could get a taxi here.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我能在这里叫辆出租车。

trans-unit.source: Hey! Does anyone know where the bathhouse is?
trans-unit.target: 嘿！有人知道澡堂在哪里吗？

trans-unit.source: I wonder where I can get something to eat?
trans-unit.target: 我想知道在哪里可以买到吃的？

trans-unit.source: I really don't know where I am.
trans-unit.target: 我真的不知道我在哪里。

trans-unit.source: Does anyone know where the train station is?
trans-unit.target: 有人知道火车站在哪里吗？

trans-unit.source: Help! I've lost my wallet.
trans-unit.target: 救命！我的钱包丢了。

trans-unit.source: I'm lost.
trans-unit.target: 我迷路了。

trans-unit.source: Is there an airport here?
trans-unit.target: 这里有机场吗？

trans-unit.source: That seagull took my phone!
trans-unit.target: 那只海鸥拿走了我的手机！

trans-unit.source: Do you know how I can get to Billboard City?
trans-unit.target: 你知道我怎么去公告牌城吗？

trans-unit.source: Does anyone know where the town hall is?
trans-unit.target: 有人知道市政厅在哪里吗？

trans-unit.source: Hey-yo!
trans-unit.target: 嘿哟！

trans-unit.source: Hello neighbor!
trans-unit.target: 你好，邻居！

trans-unit.source: Look forward to doing absolutely nothing today!
trans-unit.target: 期待今天什么都不做！

trans-unit.source: I don't really feel like doing anything today.
trans-unit.target: 我今天真的不想做任何事情。

trans-unit.source: Lovin the vibe here.
trans-unit.target: 喜欢这里的氛围。

trans-unit.source: The ocean is mesmerizing.
trans-unit.target: 大海令人着迷。

trans-unit.source: Seagulls are funny.
trans-unit.target: 海鸥很有趣。

trans-unit.source: Hi there. Good day ain't it?
trans-unit.target: 你好。今天过得不错，不是吗？

trans-unit.source: Today is a great day to explore.
trans-unit.target: 今天是探索的好日子。

trans-unit.source: I would love to check out the fishing platform.
trans-unit.target: 我很想看看钓鱼平台。

trans-unit.source: This place is off the charts!
trans-unit.target: 这个地方太棒了！

trans-unit.source: Such lovely people in this town.
trans-unit.target: 这个镇上的人真可爱。

trans-unit.source: Boop boop beep beep ba!

trans-unit.source: Wake up people! These seagulls are watching you!
trans-unit.target: 醒醒吧！这些海鸥在看着你！

trans-unit.source: I hope that volcano doesn't erupt anytime soon . . .
trans-unit.target: 我希望火山不会很快爆发。

trans-unit.source: Such a strange town. It feels like I'm in a dream.
trans-unit.target: 这样一个奇怪的小镇。感觉就像我在做梦。

trans-unit.source: I should take my girlfriend here.
trans-unit.target: 我应该带我的女朋友来这里。

trans-unit.source: The atmosphere here is kinda nice.
trans-unit.target: 这里的气氛有点好。

trans-unit.source: I hope there is something good to eat here.
trans-unit.target: 我希望这里有好吃的。

trans-unit.source: I'm feeling good today.
trans-unit.target: 我今天感觉很好。

trans-unit.source: The people here are very photogenic.
trans-unit.target: 这里的人很上镜。

trans-unit.source: I can't wait to try Le Sequoia.
trans-unit.target: 我迫不及待地想尝试Le Sequoia。

trans-unit.source: The Takoyaki shop was fantastic.
trans-unit.target: Takoyaki商店太棒了。

trans-unit.source: I want to go for a swim.
trans-unit.target: 我想去游泳。

trans-unit.source: The bathhouse is so cool!
trans-unit.target: 澡堂太酷了！

trans-unit.source: Nothing can keep me down today!
trans-unit.target: 今天没有什么能让我失望！

trans-unit.source: Hi lovely.
trans-unit.target: 嗨，可爱。

trans-unit.source: It's gonna be a great day.
trans-unit.target: 这将是美好的一天。

trans-unit.source: One day, I'll own my own restaurant too.
trans-unit.target: 有一天，我也会拥有自己的餐厅。

trans-unit.source: Peasant.
trans-unit.target: 农民。

trans-unit.source: Sorry, your outfit is just . . . Ugh . . . Never mind . . .
trans-unit.target: 对不起，你的衣服只是。啊。没关系。

trans-unit.source: This is the worst day ever!
trans-unit.target: 这是有史以来最糟糕的一天！

trans-unit.source: What a boring place. I miss Billboard City.
trans-unit.target: 多么无聊的地方。我想念Billboard City。

trans-unit.source: My disappointment is immeasurable and my day is ruined.
trans-unit.target: 我的失望是无法估量的，我的一天被毁了。

trans-unit.source: Ughhh . . . I want to go home.
trans-unit.target: 啊。我想回家。

trans-unit.source: Please leave me be.
trans-unit.target: 请放开我。

trans-unit.source: Hey, can you not?
trans-unit.target: 嘿，你不能吗？

trans-unit.source: Um . . . Do I know you?
trans-unit.target: 嗯。我认识你吗？

trans-unit.source: Hello. Goodbye.
trans-unit.target: 你好。再见。

trans-unit.source: Howdy.
trans-unit.target: 你好。

trans-unit.source: Are you the chef of Le Sequoia?
trans-unit.target: 你是红杉的厨师吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm loving the vibe of this town.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢这个城市的氛围。

trans-unit.source: White Ash Harbor is a strange and beautiful place.
trans-unit.target: 白灰港是一个奇特而美丽的地方。

trans-unit.source: This weather makes me want to go for a swim.
trans-unit.target: 这种天气让我想去游泳。

trans-unit.source: Bonjour.
trans-unit.target: 你好。

trans-unit.source: Hello stranger. Good day ain't it?
trans-unit.target: 你好，陌生人。今天过得不错，不是吗？

trans-unit.source: Wow. You have beautiful eyes.
trans-unit.target: 哇！你的眼睛很漂亮。

trans-unit.source: I just want to say . . . I really like your hair.
trans-unit.target: 我只想说。我真的很喜欢你的头发。

trans-unit.source: Nothing in the world can keep me down.
trans-unit.target: 世界上没有什么能让我失望。

trans-unit.source: Whoa whoa!
trans-unit.target: 哇哇！

trans-unit.source: I don't have time for this.
trans-unit.target: 我没有时间做这个。

trans-unit.source: Ehhh . . . what do you want?
trans-unit.target: 呃。你想要什么？

trans-unit.source: Some of us have things to do . . .
trans-unit.target: 我们中的一些人有事情要做。

trans-unit.source: Move along kid.
trans-unit.target: 走吧，孩子。

trans-unit.source: Uhhhh . . . I need to find a bathroom!
trans-unit.target: 嗯。我需要找个浴室！

trans-unit.source: Hey! I need to be somewhere.
trans-unit.target: 嘿！我需要去某个地方。

trans-unit.source: You are blocking my pathway.
trans-unit.target: 你挡住了我的去路。

trans-unit.source: Please stay outside my personal bubble.
trans-unit.target: 请远离我的私人圈子。

trans-unit.source: Yes? I do not have all day . . .
trans-unit.target: 对？我没有一整天。

trans-unit.source: Do you know where I can get something to eat?
trans-unit.target: 你知道我在哪里可以买到吃的吗？

trans-unit.source: The more people there are, the more anxious I feel.
trans-unit.target: 人越多，我就越焦虑。

trans-unit.source: I'm thinking of going fishing today.
trans-unit.target: 我今天想去钓鱼。

trans-unit.source: Hey there! Do you know how I can get to the beach?
trans-unit.target: 嘿！你知道我怎么去海滩吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm thinking of exploring the deep woods.
trans-unit.target: 我在考虑探索深林。

trans-unit.source: Do you know where I can get some fast food?
trans-unit.target: 你知道我在哪里可以买到快餐吗？

trans-unit.source: Have you seen my son?
trans-unit.target: 你看见我儿子了吗？

trans-unit.source: Have you seen my cat Coco?
trans-unit.target: 你看见我的猫可可了吗？

trans-unit.source: Do you know if the volcano is open to tourists?
trans-unit.target: 你知道这座火山是否对游客开放吗？

trans-unit.source: This is embarrassing. I'm lost.
trans-unit.target: 这太尴尬了。我迷路了。

trans-unit.source: You look a little tired.
trans-unit.target: 你看起来有点累。

trans-unit.source: You are very strange.
trans-unit.target: 你真奇怪。

trans-unit.source: This place feels a bit run down.
trans-unit.target: 这个地方感觉有点破旧。

trans-unit.source: Hi cutie, can I buy you a drink?
trans-unit.target: 嗨，小可爱，我能请你喝一杯吗？

trans-unit.source: Cool outfit.
trans-unit.target: 很酷的衣服。

trans-unit.source: The sound of the ocean is really calming.
trans-unit.target: 大海的声音真的很平静。

trans-unit.source: You give me good vibes.
trans-unit.target: 你给了我很好的感觉。

trans-unit.source: You are a chef right? Cooool dude.
trans-unit.target: 你是厨师，对吧？酷家伙。

trans-unit.source: Hehe . . . Hehe . . . I'm kinda drunk. You are cute.
trans-unit.target: 呵呵。呵呵。我有点醉了。你很可爱。

trans-unit.source: You vibin with this town? I'm vibin with this town.
trans-unit.target: 你在这个镇上？我是这个城市的维宾。

trans-unit.source: Have you met the locals here? They are a strange bunch . . .
trans-unit.target: 你在这里见过当地人吗？他们是一群奇怪的人。

trans-unit.source: You are very strange.
trans-unit.target: 你真奇怪。

trans-unit.source: Have you heard the story of Pompeii?
trans-unit.target: 你听说过庞贝城的故事吗？

trans-unit.source: I hope that volcano is dormant . . .
trans-unit.target: 我希望火山处于休眠状态。

trans-unit.source: Don't all these seagulls bother you?
trans-unit.target: 这些海鸥不打扰你吗？

trans-unit.source: Have you tried the Takoyaki at the docks?
trans-unit.target: 你在码头试过Takoyaki吗？

trans-unit.source: Are you a fan of BKB 49 as well? Yang is sooo coool!
trans-unit.target: 你也是BKB 49的粉丝吗？杨太酷了！

trans-unit.source: Do you know the meaning of life? Cause I don't.
trans-unit.target: 你知道生命的意义吗？因为我没有。

trans-unit.source: Why would you live in a shabby old town like this?
trans-unit.target: 你为什么要住在这样一个破旧的老城区？

trans-unit.source: LELSH is taking over! LELSH will take over our free will!
trans-unit.target: LELSH接管了！LELSH将接管我们的自由意志！

trans-unit.source: Are you a cat person? You look like a cat person.
trans-unit.target: 你喜欢猫吗？你看起来像个爱猫的人。

trans-unit.source: One day, I will travel the world!
trans-unit.target: 总有一天，我会环游世界！

trans-unit.source: The volcano looks beautiful from here.
trans-unit.target: 从这里看火山很美。

trans-unit.source: I could live in this small town forever.
trans-unit.target: 我可以永远住在这个小镇上。

trans-unit.source: Have you met the bubble tea girl? She is so fun!
trans-unit.target: 你见过那个泡奶茶的女孩吗？她太有趣了！

trans-unit.source: Check it out. I just got the new LELSH P-Phone 2000!
trans-unit.target: 过来看。我刚买了新的LELSH P-Phone 2000！

trans-unit.source: Life is hard, but you should always be positive.
trans-unit.target: 生活是艰难的，但你应该始终保持积极的态度。

trans-unit.source: Positivity is the key to a happy life.
trans-unit.target: 积极是幸福生活的关键。

trans-unit.source: Do you know about the Polite Society? I'm a member.
trans-unit.target: 你知道礼貌协会吗？我是会员。

trans-unit.source: One day, you will be great! I just know it!
trans-unit.target: 终有一天，你会变得伟大！我就知道！

trans-unit.source: CHILDREN RANDOM
trans-unit.target: 儿童随机

trans-unit.source: I want to be a chef when I grow up!
trans-unit.target: 我长大后想当厨师！

trans-unit.source: I want to become a robot when I grow up!
trans-unit.target: 我长大后想成为一个机器人！

trans-unit.source: Tommy was so mean today. I want to go home.
trans-unit.target: 汤米今天太刻薄了。我想回家。

trans-unit.source: Hi. Does anyone know where my teddy is?
trans-unit.target: 你好。有人知道我的泰迪熊在哪里吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm lost. I can't find mommy.
trans-unit.target: 我迷路了。我找不到妈妈。

trans-unit.source: This town is very boring. Where is the arcade?
trans-unit.target: 这个城镇很无聊。拱廊在哪里？

trans-unit.source: I can't wait to go to Wonderworld next month!
trans-unit.target: 我迫不及待地想下个月去仙境！

trans-unit.source: Ughhh . . .
trans-unit.target: 啊。

trans-unit.source: Doo doo do do dooooooo do doooooo.
trans-unit.target: 嘟嘟，嘟嘟，嘟嘟。

trans-unit.source: That volcano looks scary. I heard it can melt people!
trans-unit.target: 那座火山看起来很可怕。我听说它能融化人！

trans-unit.source: I don't want to go to school.
trans-unit.target: 我不想去上学。

trans-unit.source: Ba bum bada bum ba ba bum bum bada bada bum.
trans-unit.target: 如果是屁股屁股屁股屁股然后屁股。

trans-unit.source: I want some cheese balls.
trans-unit.target: 我想要一些奶酪球。

trans-unit.source: Has anybody seen my dad?
trans-unit.target: 有人看见我爸爸了吗？

trans-unit.source: Something smells great. I hope it's Fish N Chips.
trans-unit.target: 有些东西闻起来很香。我希望是炸鱼薯条。

trans-unit.source: I've been tricked . . . This isn't Wonderworld!
trans-unit.target: 我被骗了。这不是仙境！

trans-unit.source: Where are the other kids hang out?
trans-unit.target: 其他孩子在哪里玩？

trans-unit.source: Adults are so lame. All they do is work and work.
trans-unit.target: 成年人真是跛脚。他们所做的就是工作和工作。

trans-unit.source: I want to play Death Fighter 6 when I go home.
trans-unit.target: 我回家后想玩《死亡战士6》。

trans-unit.source: Does anyone know where I can get some beer?
trans-unit.target: 有人知道我在哪里可以买到啤酒吗？

trans-unit.source: Sup big person.
trans-unit.target: 超级大人物。

trans-unit.source: Yo. What are you looking at?
trans-unit.target: 哟。你在看什么？

trans-unit.source: I will be taller than you one day.
trans-unit.target: 总有一天我会比你高。

trans-unit.source: Can I have some money for candy?
trans-unit.target: 我能要些钱买糖果吗？

trans-unit.source: Dad says I'm not allowed to go into the woods.
trans-unit.target: 爸爸说我不能进树林。

trans-unit.source: I saw a big monster in the woods last week!
trans-unit.target: 上周我在树林里看到一个大怪物！

trans-unit.source: Hello. Are you a teacher?
trans-unit.target: 你好。你是老师吗？

trans-unit.source: Mommy says I shouldn't talk to strangers.
trans-unit.target: 妈妈说我不应该和陌生人说话。

trans-unit.source: How do you do?
trans-unit.target: 你好？

trans-unit.source: I don't care for your fancy food. I prefer chocolate.
trans-unit.target: 我不喜欢你的花哨食物。我更喜欢巧克力。

trans-unit.source: Please make an appointment with my butler.
trans-unit.target: 请与我的管家预约。

trans-unit.source: That robot girl that sells bubble tea is sooo coool!
trans-unit.target: 那个卖奶茶的机器人女孩太酷了！

trans-unit.source: My dad took me to eat Takoyaki yesterday.
trans-unit.target: 我爸爸昨天带我去吃泷崎。

trans-unit.source: Dad wants to go fishing, but I think it's boring.
trans-unit.target: 爸爸想去钓鱼，但我觉得很无聊。

trans-unit.source: My parents are fighting again. So I ran away.
trans-unit.target: 我父母又吵架了。所以我跑掉了。

trans-unit.source: I saw some kids go into the caves! But I'm too scared.
trans-unit.target: 我看到一些孩子进了山洞！但我太害怕了。

trans-unit.source: I heard you can find diamonds in the volcano!
trans-unit.target: 我听说你可以在火山里找到钻石！

trans-unit.source: Mommy says I should stop playing and go study.
trans-unit.target: 妈妈说我应该停止玩耍，去学习。

trans-unit.source: I want to go to Wonderworld! I want it! I want it!
trans-unit.target: 我想去仙境！我要！我要！

trans-unit.source: My dad is on a fishing trip. He told me to wait here.
trans-unit.target: 我爸爸正在钓鱼。他让我在这里等着。

trans-unit.source: PLAYER
trans-unit.target: 玩家

trans-unit.source: I don't think I can fish here.

trans-unit.target: 这里没有鱼。

trans-unit.source: The fishing rod will not work here.

trans-unit.target: 我的鱼竿可能太弱了。

trans-unit.source: I need a stronger fishing rod.
trans-unit.target: 我需要一根更结实的钓竿。

trans-unit.source: That fish is too strong for my fishing rod.

trans-unit.source: I shouldn't take May-Lou's crops without her permission.

trans-unit.source: 11010_INTRO_Player wakes up and sees letter

trans-unit.source: Hmmm . . . It looks like I got mail.

trans-unit.source: This envelope . . . It must be from Chef Casteau.

trans-unit.source: I hope he is doing well.

trans-unit.source: Attention passengers, this is your conductor speaking!

trans-unit.source: We will be arriving in White Ash Harbor shortly.

trans-unit.source: Please gather your belongings and prepare to disembark the train!

trans-unit.id: 11012_INTRO_Old & Young man walk out of train
trans-unit.source: 11012_INTRO_Old & Young man walk out of train

trans-unit.source: We have arrived at White Ash Harbor. Don't you remember?
trans-unit.target: 我们已经到达白灰港。你不记得了吗？

trans-unit.source: Oh right! I'm heading to Bea's Bar for a drink!
trans-unit.target: 哦，对了！我要去Bea酒吧喝一杯！

trans-unit.source: Mannnn, White Ash Harbor sucks.
trans-unit.target: 曼恩，白灰港糟透了。

trans-unit.source: Ughhh . . . I'm not looking forward to this.
trans-unit.target: 啊。我对此并不期待。

trans-unit.source: 11013_INTRO_Old & Young + Meeting Hasel
trans-unit.target: 11013_INTRO_老&年轻+会议Hasel

trans-unit.source: Come on, grandpa! Gah, it even smells bad!
trans-unit.target: 来吧，爷爷！哎呀，它甚至闻起来都很臭！

trans-unit.source: Where are we going again?
trans-unit.target: 我们又要去哪里？

trans-unit.source: Salutations! You must be (playername), the new chef! I am Hasel; I run the Bubble Shack in White . . . whi . . . btzzzzt . . . _I mean, White Ash Harbor. I hope you enjoyed your train ride. It's a very scenic route.
trans-unit.target: 问候！你一定是(playername)，新来的厨师！我是哈塞尔；我经营着白色的泡泡屋。哇。btzzzzt_我是说，白灰港。我希望你喜欢坐火车。这是一条风景优美的路线。

trans-unit.source: Now that you are here, I can help you settle into this little hamlet by the sea._Chef Casteau asked me to show you his old restaurant. I hop . . . hop . . . h btzzzzt . . .
trans-unit.target: 既然你来了，我可以帮你在海边的这个小村庄安顿下来_Casteau厨师让我带你参观他的老餐馆。我跳。跳。哎呀。

trans-unit.source: Hey, are you ok?
trans-unit.target: 嘿，你还好吗？

trans-unit.source: You don't look like the other androids I've seen.
trans-unit.target: 你看起来不像我见过的其他机器人。

trans-unit.source: . . . Ahem. It's all good! That happens a lot, my chip was damaged by all the water in the dumpster where I was found._Did I tell you I was found in a dumpster? I can't remember anything from before then. That was five years ago . . .
trans-unit.target: . . . 啊哼。一切都好！这种情况经常发生，我的芯片被发现的垃圾箱里的水都损坏了_我有没有告诉过你，我被发现在垃圾桶里？在那之前，我什么都不记得了。那是五年前的事了。

trans-unit.source: . . . Ahem. Ah, sorry about that. My chip can get a little buggy nowadays . . . You see, I'm an older model, pre - 2048, before the synthetic skin overhauls and the P1 processor upgrades._But no matter, what I lack in brawn, I make up for in grit!
trans-unit.target: . . . 啊哼。啊，很抱歉。我的芯片现在有点毛病。你看，我是一个老型号，2048年之前，在合成皮肤大修和P1处理器升级之前_但不管怎样，我缺乏的是勇气！

trans-unit.source: You must be curious about the restaurant that Chef Casteau left to you. It's called Le Sequoia, named after a wonderful tree.
trans-unit.target: 你一定对Casteau厨师留给你的餐厅很好奇。它被称为Le Sequoia，以一棵美丽的树命名。

trans-unit.source: I know a lot about trees. Did you know the sequoia needs fire for their seeds to drop and have a chance to grow?_Without fire, the trees would never populate.
trans-unit.target: 我对树了解很多。你知道红杉需要火才能让种子落下并有机会生长吗_没有火，树木永远不会生长。

trans-unit.source: Hmmmm. Interesting . . .
trans-unit.target: 嗯。有意思。

trans-unit.source: Whoa! There's a frog on your head!
trans-unit.target: 哇！你头上有一只青蛙！

trans-unit.source: Ah, sorry for rambling on. As an android, I have an eternal fascination with all things living . . . _Anyhow, you must be dying to see your new restaurant. Let's get moving!
trans-unit.target: 啊，抱歉说得太多了。作为一个机器人，我对所有生物都有着永恒的迷恋_不管怎样，你一定很想看看你的新餐厅。我们出发吧！

trans-unit.source: Oh . . . oh yes, do not worry! This is my friend Boba._Ever since I awoke from the dumpster in Billboard City, he's been with me the whole time._Let's get moving shall we? I'll tell you more about Boba along the way.
trans-unit.target: 哦。哦，是的，别担心！这是我的朋友波巴_自从我从公告牌城的垃圾桶里醒来，他一直和我在一起_我们出发吧，好吗？一路上我会告诉你更多关于波巴的事。

trans-unit.source: 11014_INTRO_Hasel Shows you White Ash Harbor
trans-unit.target: 11014_INTRO_Hasel为您展示白灰港

trans-unit.source: Welcome to White Ash Harbor! It's not big, but I've lived here for 5 years and I love it here._We are walking through the central market. This is where you can purchase a lot of your ingredients. Look over there!
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到白灰港！它不大，但我在这里住了5年，我喜欢这里_我们正穿过中央市场。在这里你可以买到很多食材。看那边！

trans-unit.source: That's my friend Uriel! Busy as always with his shop._I think he overworks himself too much.
trans-unit.target: 那是我的朋友乌列尔！像往常一样忙着他的商店_我认为他工作过度了。

trans-unit.source: You'll meet him later. Let's keep going!
trans-unit.target: 你稍后会见到他。让我们继续前进！

trans-unit.source: Up here is the Town Hall. This is where you should come if you want to purchase a home or make make upgrades to your restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 这里是市政厅。如果你想买房或升级你的餐厅，这就是你应该去的地方。

trans-unit.source: C'mon! C'mon! You'll have plenty of time to explore the town! Let me show you where you will be staying!
trans-unit.target: 拜托！拜托！您将有充足的时间探索这座城市！让我带你去你住的地方！

trans-unit.source: 11015_INTRO_Hasel shows you Le Sequoia
trans-unit.target: 11015_INTRO_Hasel为您展示乐红杉

trans-unit.source: This is our local Circuit Lodge. Chef Casteau has arranged for you to stay here as long as you like, free of charge!_Nacim runs the lodge. Say hello for me later!
trans-unit.target: 这是我们当地的Circuit Lodge。Casteau厨师为您安排了免费的住宿时间_纳西姆经营着这家旅馆。请稍后为我打招呼！

trans-unit.source: Let's go! Heyo! To the last stop!
trans-unit.target: 走吧！嘿！到最后一站！

trans-unit.source: Here we are. Le Sequoia. Isn't it lovely? I know it looks a bit run down, but I'm sure you'll get it looking spiffy in no time._Before you see inside, let me go in and clean up a bit.
trans-unit.target: 我们到了。红杉。这难道不可爱吗？我知道它看起来有点破旧，但我相信你很快就会让它看起来很漂亮_在你看到里面之前，让我进去打扫一下。

trans-unit.source: While I'm doing that, go and meet some of the shop owners in town._They'll be expecting you and will have a welcoming gift ready for you!
trans-unit.target: 当我这样做的时候，去见见城里的一些店主_他们会期待你的到来，并为你准备了一份欢迎礼物！

trans-unit.source: Here's a list, most of the people on the list are friends of mine, so say hi from me!_I love lists! When you get back, we'll set up the restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 这是一份名单，名单上的大多数人都是我的朋友，所以请代我问候_我喜欢列表！当你回来时，我们会安排餐厅。

trans-unit.source: ACT 1
trans-unit.target: 第1幕

trans-unit.source: 2101 - HASEL'S FIRST MEAL
trans-unit.target: 2101-哈塞尔的第一顿饭

trans-unit.source: A new face? We don't get too many of those around here, which probably means you're the new chef Hasel was telling us about.
trans-unit.target: 新面孔？我们这里没有太多这样的人，这可能意味着你就是哈塞尔告诉我们的新厨师。

trans-unit.source: I'm Mae-Lou, my family owns Takashi Farms. You're going to want to use our produce in your restaurant since it's the freshest around._Here are some samples, but if you want to try your hand at foraging, take this scythe.
trans-unit.target: 我叫Mae Lou，我家拥有Takashi农场。你会想在你的餐厅里使用我们的农产品，因为它是周围最新鲜的_这里有一些样本，但如果你想尝试觅食，就拿着这把镰刀。

trans-unit.source: It will cut down most plant-life and any ankles that get in its way._I mean that. That thing is not a toy, so respect it at all times.
trans-unit.target: 它会杀死大多数植物和任何妨碍它的脚踝_我是这个意思。那东西不是玩具，所以要始终尊重它。

trans-unit.source: Fantastic ingredients can be found in these lands. Just do be careful. Nice to meet you and good luck!
trans-unit.target: 在这些土地上可以找到神奇的成分。请务必小心。很高兴见到你，祝你好运！

trans-unit.source: Would you look at that! It's the new chef Hasel was telling us about! Sorry, I'm Uriel._I'm the butcher here in White Ash Harbor. I always have the best cuts of beef available for my customers.
trans-unit.target: 你看！这是新厨师Hasel告诉我们的！对不起，我是乌列尔_我是白灰港的屠夫。我总是为顾客提供最好的牛肉。

trans-unit.source: Since you just arrived, I'm sure you'll be needing some ingredients to get started. I got some fresh eggs lying around here._Also, if you are brave enough to hunt for your own ingredients, there's plenty of wildlife out there.
trans-unit.target: 既然你刚到，我肯定你需要一些原料才能开始。我这里有一些新鲜的鸡蛋_此外，如果你有足够的勇气寻找自己的食材，那里有很多野生动物。

trans-unit.source: Take this old bow. It's a bit worn, but it will get the job done. If you are serious about hunting, you should chat with old lady Pomarine by the western cliffs.
trans-unit.target: 拿着这个旧弓。它有点破旧，但能完成工作。如果你真的想打猎，你应该和西悬崖边的波马林老太太聊天。

trans-unit.source: Pomarine took me hunting once, and I couldn't keep up with her! So fast for someone who is so . . . mature._Good luck then! I gotta fill these orders, but it was nice to meet ya!
trans-unit.target: Pomarine带我去打猎一次，我跟不上她！对于一个如此。成熟_那么，祝你好运！我必须完成这些订单，但很高兴认识你！

trans-unit.source: Ah, it's ghastly to be steps away from all of that meat. Ugh._Oh! Hello darling, I'm Nabiha, pleasure to meet you.
trans-unit.target: 啊，离那些肉只有几步之遥，真是太可怕了。啊_哦！你好，亲爱的，我叫纳比哈，很高兴认识你。

trans-unit.source: You're that new chef I've heard so much about. Welcome to our little corner of the world. It's a small town, but it is a quaint one I assure you._The culture here is working class, but it's been on the rise as of late.
trans-unit.target: 你就是我听说过很多的新厨师。欢迎来到我们这个世界的小角落。这是一个小镇，但我向你保证，它很古朴_这里的文化是工人阶级，但最近一直在上升。

trans-unit.source: Take some of these. The freshest and most organic fruits you will find anywhere!_And try this recipe for making a delicious apple pie. It has made me very popular at potlucks! Enjoy, darling. Tata!
trans-unit.target: 拿一些。您在任何地方都能找到最新鲜、最有机的水果_试试这个做美味苹果派的食谱。它让我在聚餐中很受欢迎！享受吧，亲爱的。塔塔！

trans-unit.source: Sup, I'm Aloys. You're the chef from that shack over on the other side of town? You're braver than most._Look, I'm not supposed to do this, but Hasel is a friend, so here's some shrimp to start you off.
trans-unit.target: 苏，我叫阿洛伊斯。你是镇另一边那间小屋的厨师吗？你比大多数人都勇敢_听着，我不应该这样做，但哈塞尔是我的朋友，所以这里有一些虾可以让你开始。

trans-unit.source: Also, here's an old fishing pole to catch some fish yourself, since I can't supply you with free inventory forever._Teach a man to fish, blah blah blah. Gotta get back to it. Bye.
trans-unit.target: 此外，这里有一根旧钓竿，你可以自己钓到一些鱼，因为我不能永远为你提供免费库存_教一个人钓鱼，等等等等等等。我得回去了再见。

trans-unit.source: Oh yes, you must be the new chef. I don't see what the big deal is with Le Sequoia. It just looks like a dinky old building to me.
trans-unit.target: 哦，是的，你一定是新来的厨师。我不明白Le Sequoia有什么大不了的。在我看来，它就像一座简陋的旧建筑。

trans-unit.source: Anyways, I'm Thelio. Come by if you need basic cooking ingredients._Oh no no, this isn't my shop. I'm just running it while the owner is away. Why would anyone name their store Milk & Wheat?
trans-unit.target: 不管怎样，我是忒里奥。如果你需要基本的烹饪食材，请过来_哦，不，不，这不是我的店。我只是在主人不在的时候运行它。为什么有人会把他们的商店命名为Milk&Wheat？

trans-unit.source: Look, I don't have a lot I can spare right now, but I can give you something as a welcoming gift._My boss won't notice if a small amount of inventory is off.
trans-unit.target: 听着，我现在没有多少多余的，但我可以送你一些欢迎礼物_我的老板不会注意到是否有少量库存。

trans-unit.source: I'm glad to help, but I can't do any more freebies after this. Sorry, I'm trying to keep this job. Good luck.
trans-unit.target: 我很乐意帮忙，但在此之后我不能再提供任何赠品了。对不起，我想保住这份工作。祝你好运。

trans-unit.source: You met everyone? Aloys? Mae-Lou? Sebastian? Sorry, I don't even know Sebastian, but I hope he's okay._Great. Allow me to officially welcome you to your restaurant. Look at Boba! He's just so jazzed right now! Follow me!
trans-unit.target: 你见过所有人吗？阿洛伊斯？美楼？塞巴斯蒂安？对不起，我甚至不认识塞巴斯蒂安，但我希望他没事_太棒了请允许我正式欢迎您光临您的餐厅。看波巴！他现在太兴奋了！跟着我！

trans-unit.source: So . . . em . . . yeah . . . It has seen better days. It's a little worn, but we can fix it up later._First things first. We can't have a restaurant without furniture.
trans-unit.target: 所以。嗯。是啊。它已经看到了更好的日子。它有点磨损，但我们可以稍后修理_先做第一件事。我们不能没有家具的餐厅。

trans-unit.source: The townsfolk managed to scrounge up some furniture and cooking appliances, so you should have enough to get started. Enter 'build mode' to start placing furniture.
trans-unit.target: 镇上的人设法弄到了一些家具和烹饪器具，所以你应该有足够的东西开始。进入“构建模式”开始放置家具。

trans-unit.source: Next, you should pl . . . . pl . . . . Place your ing . . . . btzzztt . . . _ . . . Whew, no worries. You should place the ingredients you wish to use in this fridge.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，你应该。pl。把你的戒指放在。顺便说一句。呼，别担心。你应该把你想用的食材放在这个冰箱里。

trans-unit.source: Finally, you can manage your restaurant and set your menu here, using this computer.
trans-unit.target: 最后，您可以使用这台电脑管理您的餐厅并在此处设置菜单。

trans-unit.source: Since you'll be the cook, you'll need someone to wait the tables and serve the food._Thankfully, we still get a lot of travellers who look for temporary work. You can hire staff using the computer.
trans-unit.target: 既然你是厨师，你就需要有人来伺候餐桌和上菜_幸运的是，我们仍然有很多旅行者在找临时工作。你可以用电脑雇佣员工。

trans-unit.source: That seems like everything! Why don't we give everything a test run?_When you're ready, open up and I get to be the first ever customer of the new Le Sequoia!_Yaaahoooo!
trans-unit.target: 这似乎就是一切！我们为什么不试运行一下呢_当你准备好了，敞开心扉，我将成为新Le Sequoia的第一位客户_哈哈哈！

trans-unit.source: I'm so excited to be the new Le Sequoia's first customer!
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴能成为新的Le Sequoia的第一位客户！

trans-unit.source: I'll take the (dish). It looks right up my alley.
trans-unit.target: 我要这道菜。它看起来很适合我。

trans-unit.source: This (dish) is truly delectable.
trans-unit.target: 这道菜真好吃。

trans-unit.source: I think Boba wants a bite of this!
trans-unit.target: 我觉得波巴想尝尝这个！

trans-unit.source: Thanks for the meal! I'll let you finish up here.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你的饭！我让你在这里结束。

trans-unit.source: Wow! That was a delicious meal. I . . . I . . . Izzzzttt . . . I think Le Sequoia will soar high with you in charge._So chef, what should we do next?
trans-unit.target: 哇！那顿饭真好吃。一、一、伊兹兹特。我想乐红杉在你的带领下会飞得很高。_厨师，接下来我们该怎么办？

trans-unit.source: I think we should have a soft opening.
trans-unit.target: 我认为我们应该有一个软开放。

trans-unit.source: I'm not sure . . . What do you think?
trans-unit.target: 我不确定。你怎么认为？

trans-unit.source: I always open doors gently. I feel bad when they get slammed . . . oh . . . you mean for the restaurant. Silly me.
trans-unit.target: 我总是轻轻地开门。当他们被猛烈抨击时，我感到很难过。哦。你是说去餐馆。我真傻。

trans-unit.source: Huh . . . well I think we should should invite more friends to come eat right?
trans-unit.target: 嗯。好吧，我想我们应该邀请更多的朋友来吃饭，对吧？

trans-unit.source: You have to get this place in shape now! Chef Casteau left me a list of stuff you need to do to reopen Le Sequoia._You can view them inside the restaurant. If you follow these steps, you are set!
trans-unit.target: 你现在必须把这个地方收拾好！Casteau厨师给我留下了一份重新打开Le Sequoia需要做的事情清单_你可以在餐厅内看到它们。如果你遵循这些步骤，你就准备好了！

trans-unit.source: For furniture, check out La Galerie in the center of town._The locals might also give you some furniture pieces if you help them out!
trans-unit.target: 对于家具，可以去市中心的La Galerie看看_如果你帮忙，当地人也可能会给你一些家具！

trans-unit.source: How can I get more refrigerator space?
trans-unit.target: 我怎样才能得到更多的冰箱空间？

trans-unit.source: That freezer seems deteriorated. Think it will last?
trans-unit.target: 那个冰箱似乎坏了。你认为它会持续下去吗？

trans-unit.source: Yes, that fridge seems a bit small. I suppose a good chef requires space for a lot of ingredients.
trans-unit.target: 是的，那台冰箱看起来有点小。我想一个好厨师需要空间来放很多食材。

trans-unit.source: I'm sure it will! I'm a little bit deteriorated myself but look at me! Alive and kickin after all these years!_But I suppose it could use an upgrade . . .
trans-unit.target: 我肯定会的！我自己有点堕落，但看看我！这么多年了，还活着，踢球吧_但我想它可能需要升级。

trans-unit.source: Yes . . . you should speak to Bianca. She is a super-smart lady and I'm sure she will know how._Be careful though. Her help doesn't come cheap . . . I can never afford her help.
trans-unit.target: 是的。你应该和比安卡谈谈。她是个超级聪明的女人，我相信她会知道的_不过要小心。她的帮助并不便宜。我永远负担不起她的帮助。

trans-unit.source: I'll be going now. I have to get back to my shop before those pesky ki . . . ki . . . bzzzzt . . . kids steal some drinks._ . . . Anyways, good luck!
trans-unit.target: 我现在就走。我必须在那些讨厌的家伙之前回到我的商店。ki。bzzzzt。孩子们偷了一些饮料。不管怎样，祝你好运！

trans-unit.source: 11009_INTRO_Leaving Apartment
trans-unit.target: 11009_INTRO_逸林公寓

trans-unit.source: Bags are packed. Stuff has been sold. This is it.
trans-unit.target: 袋子都收拾好了。东西已经卖了。就是这样。

trans-unit.source: It's a bit shabby, but I will miss this kitchen . . . I think.
trans-unit.target: 有点破旧，但我会想念这个厨房的。我想。

trans-unit.source: Well, time to go.
trans-unit.target: 好了，该走了。

trans-unit.source: 2102 - THERMAL TROUBLE
Hello? Anyone here?
trans-unit.target: 你好？有人吗？

trans-unit.source: Huh. A visitor today?
trans-unit.target: 呵呵。今天有客人吗？

trans-unit.source: Hi (playername). What do you need today?
trans-unit.target: 嗨(playername)。你今天需要什么？

trans-unit.source: Yes . . . oh, you're new. What do you want?
trans-unit.target: 是的。哦，你是新来的。你想要什么？

trans-unit.source: Hasel said you could help me.
trans-unit.target: 哈塞尔说你可以帮我。

trans-unit.source: Oh, is this a bad time?
trans-unit.target: 哦，现在不是时候吗？

trans-unit.source: Hasel said I would help you? With what?
trans-unit.target: 哈塞尔说我会帮你？用什么？

trans-unit.source: I'm just having my daily dose of frustration, but I'll survive.
trans-unit.target: 我只是每天都在经历挫折，但我会活下来的。

trans-unit.source: Wait, this is about that old restaurant . . . Wait! Did she volunteer me?!_Hasel . . . you are a sweetheart, but girl, I do not . . . Ugh! She mentioned you . . . might need help.
trans-unit.target: 等等，这是关于那家老餐馆的。等待！她是我的志愿者吗_哈塞尔。你是个甜心，但女孩，我不。啊！她提到你。可能需要帮助。

trans-unit.source: The refrigerator in the restaurant is broken.
trans-unit.target: 餐厅的冰箱坏了。

trans-unit.source: She told me you could help.
trans-unit.target: 她告诉我你可以帮忙。

trans-unit.source: I see why she recommended me.
trans-unit.target: 我明白她为什么推荐我了。

trans-unit.source: Oh yes. She said the fridge was broken. Fine fine.
trans-unit.target: 哦，是的。她说冰箱坏了。很好。

trans-unit.source: I said I would help, but I'm gonna need something in return. My 'inspiration' if you will._Speak to Thelio at Milk and Wheat. Tell him 'the eagle crows at midnight.'
trans-unit.target: 我说过我会帮忙，但我需要一些回报。我的“灵感”，如果你愿意的话_在Milk and Wheat与Thelio交谈。告诉他“鹰在午夜啼叫。”

trans-unit.source: If you can get it for me, I will fix up the refrigerator for you._Bring it back here, and I'll . . . help. That word is odd to say. Yep.
trans-unit.target: 如果你能帮我拿，我会为你修理冰箱_把它带回来，我会。帮助。这个词说起来很奇怪。是的。

trans-unit.source: Hello! Is there something I can get for you?
trans-unit.target: 你好！有什么我可以帮你的吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm here to get . . . something from you . . . a thing for Bianca.
trans-unit.target: 我来这里是为了。你的东西。比安卡的一件事。

trans-unit.source: Bianca says, 'the eagle crows at midnight.'
trans-unit.target: 比安卡说：“鹰在午夜啼叫。”

trans-unit.source: A thing for Bianca . . . OH!
trans-unit.target: 给比安卡的一件事。哦！

trans-unit.source: Eagles don't crow, they screech, I think. Regardless, what? Bianca wouldn't, OH!
trans-unit.target: 我想，鹰不会啼叫，它们会尖叫。不管怎样，什么？比安卡不会的，哦！

trans-unit.source: You're here for that thing she wanted!_So I do have one left. It ain't cheap though. It will cost you 500 credits.
trans-unit.target: 你是为了她想要的东西而来的_所以我还有一个。不过也不便宜。这将花费你500个信用点。

trans-unit.source: Wow, that is really expensive . . . Fine. I'll take it. So what is it?
trans-unit.target: 哇，那真的很贵。好的。我要了。那是什么？

trans-unit.source: 500 Credits! I cannot afford this right now.
trans-unit.target: 500信用点！我现在买不起这个。

trans-unit.source: Here you go. It's a very rare limited edition item. Bianca has a taste for things like this.
trans-unit.target: 干得好。这是一件非常罕见的限量版商品。比安卡喜欢这样的东西。

trans-unit.source: I'm not surprised. Well, come back if you change your mind.
trans-unit.target: 我并不感到惊讶。好吧，如果你改变主意，就回来。

trans-unit.source: Oh, just a bit of advice, I wouldn't mention it to Bianca if I were you._You don't want to get on her bad side.
trans-unit.target: 哦，只是一点建议，如果我是你，我不会向比安卡提及此事_你不想惹她生气。

trans-unit.source: Do you have . . . the item?
trans-unit.target: 你有。项目？

trans-unit.source: Yes, I bought your expensive box of Goldilocks Chocolate.
trans-unit.target: 是的，我买了你那盒昂贵的金发姑娘巧克力。

trans-unit.source: Yes, I have it right here.
trans-unit.target: 是的，我就在这里。

trans-unit.source: If I were you, I would not say that so loud. Since this is the first time we've met, I'll spare you just this once . . .
trans-unit.target: 如果我是你，我不会这么大声说。既然这是我们第一次见面，我就饶你一次。

trans-unit.source: Thank you. You will do well to keep this to yourself, yes?
trans-unit.target: 非常感谢。你最好把这件事保密，是吗？

trans-unit.source: I can fix your kitchen now. This is the last time you're getting anything like that from me, so enjoy._If you need anything else, it will cost a lot more. Meet me at your restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 我现在可以修好你的厨房了。这是你最后一次从我这里得到这样的东西，所以好好享受吧_如果你还需要其他东西，它的价格会高得多。在你的餐厅见我。

trans-unit.source: All fixed. Of course, something like this is a piece of cake for me. The fridge is fixed now, and the storage space is much larger now.
trans-unit.target: 都修好了。当然，这样的东西对我来说是小菜一碟。冰箱现在修好了，存储空间也大了很多。

trans-unit.source: Come see me if you need any specialized machinery made. Anyways . . . see you around . . .
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要任何专门制造的机器，请来找我。不管怎样。回头见。

trans-unit.source: (playername), it's almost time.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，时间差不多了。

trans-unit.source: Please choose a classmate for your graduation cookoff.
trans-unit.target: 请为你的毕业野餐选择一位同学。

trans-unit.source: Head into the master kitchen when you are ready.
trans-unit.target: 当你准备好了，就去主厨房。

trans-unit.source: I'm so excited!
trans-unit.target: 我太兴奋了！

trans-unit.source: Quick! This way.
trans-unit.target: 快！这种方式。

trans-unit.source: The graduation cookoffs are starting soon!
trans-unit.target: 毕业晚宴马上就要开始了！

trans-unit.source: I wonder who will compete . . .
trans-unit.target: 我想知道谁会参加比赛。

trans-unit.source: It's exciting, isn't it? Graduating and all. I will miss the time we spent together._How about it (playername)? One last dance in the kitchen? Just don't be upset when I kick your butt again._Choose Koa?
trans-unit.target: 这很令人兴奋，不是吗？毕业和一切。我会怀念我们共度的时光_怎么样(playername)？厨房里的最后一支舞？我再踢你屁股的时候，别生气_选择Koa？

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是的

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 不

trans-unit.source: Exciting! I always imagined we would be facing off in the graduation cookoff._Don't hold back (playername), because even your best dish will have a hard time against my secret recipe._Ah . . . it looks like we need to head in now.
trans-unit.target: 令人兴奋！我一直以为我们会在毕业晚宴上对峙_不要退缩(playername)，因为即使你最好的菜也很难与我的秘方抗衡_啊。看来我们现在需要进去了。

trans-unit.source: Scared huh? I don't blame you. I'll still be here if you whip up the courage again.
trans-unit.target: 害怕？我不怪你。如果你再鼓起勇气，我还会在这里。

trans-unit.source: It's been a great couple of years. This academy wasn't easy, but we managed to pull through._Would you like to face me in the graduation cookoff? Just remember, I won't go easy on you (playername)._Choose Camille?
trans-unit.target: 这几年过得很好。这所学院并不容易，但我们设法渡过了难关_你愿意在毕业晚宴上面对我吗？记住，我不会对你(playername)太宽容的_选择卡米尔？

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是的

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 不

trans-unit.source: Great! One final clash before we become professional chefs. I hope you will give it your all (playername). I'll be using my best recipe, so don't hold back.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了在我们成为专业厨师之前的最后一场冲突。我希望你能全力以赴。我会用我最好的食谱，所以不要犹豫。

trans-unit.source: Ah, that's a shame. I'll be here if you change your mind.
trans-unit.target: 啊，太可惜了。如果你改变主意，我会在这里。

trans-unit.source: Let's go friend. May the best chef be victorious.
trans-unit.target: 我们走吧，朋友。愿最好的厨师获胜。

trans-unit.source: Shall we go (playername)? The instructors are waiting.
trans-unit.target: 我们去(playername)好吗？教练们正在等待。

trans-unit.source: An Old Friend
trans-unit.target: 老朋友

trans-unit.source: (playername), when I walked into Otto Canton's kitchen the other day, and heard you had quit, I was shocked.
trans-unit.target: 前几天，当我走进奥托·坎顿的厨房，听说你辞职了，我感到震惊。

trans-unit.source: Chef Casteau mentioned that you were taking over an old space of his in White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: Casteau厨师提到你要接管他在白灰港的一个旧空间。

trans-unit.source: We've often talked about owning our own restaurants one day, but I didn't think you would run off to the edge of the world to that small little town.
trans-unit.target: 我们经常谈论有一天会拥有自己的餐馆，但我没想到你会跑到世界的边缘去那个小城镇。

trans-unit.source: I hope you know what you are doing. I'm intrigued to say the least, and wish you luck, because I want to see where this is heading.
trans-unit.target: 我希望你知道自己在做什么。至少可以说，我很好奇，并祝你好运，因为我想看看事情的发展方向。

trans-unit.source: 2103 - SOFT OPENING

I wanted to stop by and . . . and see how everything is going?_When do you think you'll open the restaurant? That food you made me was delicious_Now that you have your refrigerator working I assume it'll be soon?
trans-unit.target: 我想过来看看。看看一切进展如何_你打算什么时候开这家餐馆？你给我做的食物很好吃。现在你的冰箱还能用了，我想很快就会用了吧？

trans-unit.source: Well, the restaurant is all set up now. I'm ready.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，餐厅现在都准备好了。我准备好了。

trans-unit.source: I want to explore White Ash Harbor a bit more.
trans-unit.target: 我想多探索一下白灰港。

trans-unit.source: Perfect. I'm . . . I'm . . . Bzztttttt . . . So excited!
trans-unit.target: 太好了！我。我。Bzztttttt。太激动了！

trans-unit.source: That's great! There are lots to explore around this area._I'm sure you want to think about your menu some more and gather up more ingredients.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了！这个地区有很多值得探索的地方_我相信你想多想想你的菜单，收集更多的食材。

trans-unit.source: After today, talk to me when you are ready to do the soft opening._I can invite everyone who helped you get started in Might Bash Tarbor, I mean, White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 今天之后，当你准备好进行试营业时，请告诉我_我可以邀请所有帮助你在Might Bash Tarbor开始的人，我的意思是，白灰港。

trans-unit.source: They are all really excited to try your food._See you later! I'm off to go collect strawberries with Boba!
trans-unit.target: 他们都很兴奋能尝尝你的食物_回头见！我要和波巴去摘草莓了！

trans-unit.source: 11008_INTRO_Otto Canton's Kitchen
trans-unit.target: 11008_INTRO_广东厨房

trans-unit.source: Two Top Sirloin TarTars with Micro Greens!
trans-unit.target: 两种带有微绿的顶级西冷柏油！

trans-unit.source: Four Chocolate Lava Cakes!
trans-unit.target: 四块巧克力熔岩蛋糕！

trans-unit.source: Yes, Chef!
trans-unit.target: 是的，厨师！

trans-unit.source: Yes, Chef!
trans-unit.target: 是的，厨师！

trans-unit.source: Yes, Chef!
trans-unit.target: 是的，厨师！

trans-unit.source: Yes, Chef!
trans-unit.target: 是的，厨师！

trans-unit.source: Yes, Chef!
trans-unit.target: 是的，厨师！

trans-unit.source: (playername)! You sure took your time with that bathroom break. Get back to your station now!_We need an order of Wagyu with Cherry Sauce. Get on it!
trans-unit.target: (playername)！你上厕所的时间真是太慢了。立刻返回您的岗位_我们需要一份樱桃酱和牛。上车！

trans-unit.source: Are we serving dogs here? I didn't know we served dogs. Take this outside and feed it to the dogs._And while you're out there, don't come back inside. Maybe tomorrow you could TRY to make some food humans can eat.
trans-unit.target: 我们这里有狗吗？我不知道我们有狗。把这个拿到外面喂狗_当你在外面的时候，不要回到里面。也许明天你可以试着做一些人类可以吃的食物。

trans-unit.source: Oh, this is cute. You made this? It's perfect, so perfect in fact that I need you to go and chuck it into the trash!_My recipe requires THREE ginger slices. You put in FOUR! My kitchen, my recipe, nothing else! Get out!
trans-unit.target: 哦，这太可爱了。这是你做的？它太完美了，事实上太完美了我需要你去把它扔进垃圾桶_我的食谱需要三片姜。你投了四分！我的厨房，我的食谱，什么都没有！走出！

trans-unit.source: Oh, while you are out, go to the doctor and get your taste buds checked. They don't seem to be workin!
trans-unit.target: 哦，你出去的时候，去看医生，检查一下你的味蕾。他们似乎不工作！

trans-unit.source: Oh, and while you're at at, get your taste sensors tweaked, you tin can!
trans-unit.target: 哦，当你在的时候，调整一下你的味觉传感器，你可以！

trans-unit.source: Hi, (playername), how's the soft opening prep going? Is it ready? IS IT READY?!! IS IT?!!!
trans-unit.target: 嗨，(playername)，开场准备进展如何？准备好了吗？准备好了吗？！！它是？！！！

trans-unit.source: I'm not ready yet, but I'm close.
trans-unit.target: 我还没准备好，但我已经接近了。

trans-unit.source: Whoa! I can hear you just fine. Also, yes, it's ready.
trans-unit.target: 哇！我听得很清楚。而且，是的，它已经准备好了。

trans-unit.source: I'm sure you got it! Just let me know when you are ready.
trans-unit.target: 我肯定你明白了！你准备好了就告诉我。

trans-unit.source: OH! Sorry, my ability to control my volume goes out the window when I get excited. I'll keep the guest list as small as a kangaroo rat, which are not, in fact, the same size as an actual kangaroo._Anyways . . . I'll let everyone know!
trans-unit.target: 哦！对不起，当我兴奋的时候，我控制音量的能力就消失了。我会把客人名单保持得像袋鼠一样小，事实上，它们的大小与实际的袋鼠不一样_不管怎样。我会让大家知道的！

trans-unit.source: Welcome to Le Sequoia everyone!
trans-unit.target: 欢迎大家来到乐红杉！

trans-unit.source: I'll try the (dish) this time.
trans-unit.target: 这次我要尝尝这道菜。

trans-unit.source: Wait, you can . . . you can eat that?
trans-unit.target: 等等，你可以。你能吃那个吗？

trans-unit.source: The blend of both liquids and solids is extraordinary.
trans-unit.target: 液体和固体的混合是非同寻常的。

trans-unit.source: The texture is nice, I think.
trans-unit.target: 我觉得质地很好。

trans-unit.source: That was great, wasn't it Boba?
trans-unit.target: 太棒了，不是吗，波巴？

trans-unit.source: I like this dark ambience.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢这种黑暗的氛围。

trans-unit.source: Huh. Maybe this will be good.
trans-unit.target: 呵呵。也许这会很好。

trans-unit.source: I did not expect that.
trans-unit.target: 我没想到会这样。

trans-unit.source: The ambiance is, nice.
trans-unit.target: 氛围很好。

trans-unit.source: Oh, this is . . . intriguing.
trans-unit.target: 哦，这是。有趣。

trans-unit.source: That wasn't half bad.
trans-unit.target: 这还不错。

trans-unit.source: Hmmm, I think this place could use a touch up.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，我觉得这个地方需要装修一下。

trans-unit.source: I'll take the (dish). Thanks.
trans-unit.target: 我要这道菜。谢谢。

trans-unit.source: Oh, this is new.
trans-unit.target: 哦，这是新的。

trans-unit.source: Ah! I see what you did.
trans-unit.target: 啊！我看到你做了什么。

trans-unit.source: You know, this ain't that bad.
trans-unit.target: 你知道，这没那么糟糕。

trans-unit.source: What a great meal! I'll be back for sure.
trans-unit.target: 多么美味的一顿饭啊！我一定会回来的。

trans-unit.source: It looks . . . rustic.
trans-unit.target: 看起来。乡村的。

trans-unit.source: I think the (dish) will satisfy me.
trans-unit.target: 我想这道菜会让我满意的。

trans-unit.source: The spice use is something to note.
trans-unit.target: 香料的使用值得注意。

trans-unit.source: Hey, this is, I haven't seen it like that before.
trans-unit.target: 嘿，这是，我以前没见过这样的。

trans-unit.source: Excuse me, I need a moment.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，我需要一点时间。

trans-unit.source: What a lovely meal!
trans-unit.target: 多么美味的一餐啊！

trans-unit.source: It looks like you are getting the hang of running a restaurant. That was great, wasn't it Boba?
trans-unit.target: 看起来你正在掌握经营餐馆的诀窍。太棒了，不是吗，波巴？

trans-unit.source: Not many people know about Le Sequoia right now . . ._Hmmm. I got it! You should do a grand opening! We can have a big celebration and attract a lot of customers!
trans-unit.target: 现在很少有人知道勒红杉_嗯，我明白了！你应该做一个盛大的开幕式！我们可以举办一场盛大的庆祝活动，吸引很多顾客！

trans-unit.source: That does sound like a good idea . . . but let's let (playername) decide on when that happens._I'm sure running a restaurant is hard. Hosting a big grand opening sounds like a lot of pressure . . .
trans-unit.target: 这听起来确实是个好主意。但让我们(playername)决定什么时候发生_我敢肯定经营一家餐馆很难。举办一场盛大的开幕式听起来压力很大。

trans-unit.source: The food wasn't bad, but the restaurant looks a bit run down. Just my two cents anyways . . .
trans-unit.target: 食物还不错，但餐厅看起来有点破旧。不管怎样，这只是我的两分钱。

trans-unit.source: Ho ho ho ho! Bianca is always blunt with her words, but she is right.
trans-unit.target: 呵呵呵呵！比安卡总是直言不讳，但她是对的。

trans-unit.source: (playername), you should give the restaurant a proper makeover before having a grand opening._Make a good first impression you know?
trans-unit.target: (playername)，在盛大开业之前，你应该对餐厅进行适当的改造_给人留下好的第一印象，你知道吗？

trans-unit.source: Speak to Prisca at the Town Hall. She manages all the properties and handles renovations. I'm sure she can help get those old floors replaced.
trans-unit.target: 在市政厅与普里斯卡交谈。她管理着所有的房产，并负责装修。我相信她能帮忙把那些旧地板换掉。

trans-unit.source: Oh, one last thing. I had some old furniture lying around. Maybe one of these can look great in your restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 哦，最后一件事。我周围有一些旧家具。也许其中一个在你的餐厅看起来很棒。

trans-unit.source: See You Soon
trans-unit.target: 期待很快与您见面

trans-unit.source: Hi friend. I have a short vacation coming up, and I've decided where I want to go : White Ash Harbor!
trans-unit.target: 嗨，朋友。我即将迎来一个短暂的假期，我已经决定要去哪里：白灰港！

trans-unit.source: You didn't think I would sit on the sidelines and watch, did you? I want to see for myself what you are capable of accomplishing with your restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 你没想到我会坐在场边看，是吗？我想亲眼看看你的餐厅能做些什么。

trans-unit.source: See you soon.
trans-unit.target: 期待很快与您见面。

trans-unit.source: 2104 - NO MORE SHABBY FLOORS
trans-unit.target: 2104-不再有破旧的地板

trans-unit.source: Hello? Is Prisca here?
trans-unit.target: 你好？普里斯卡在吗？

trans-unit.source: If you come back again, you'll be sorry!!!
trans-unit.target: 如果你再回来，你会后悔的！！！

trans-unit.source: Ughhh. What now?
trans-unit.target: 啊。现在怎么办？

trans-unit.source: Hey (playername). It's been a rough day.
trans-unit.target: 嘿(playername)。今天过得很艰难。

trans-unit.source: You're new here. Wait, Hasel told me about a new arrival in town . . ._Oh, are you here to take over that old restaurant on the edge of town, correct?
trans-unit.target: 你是新来的。等等，哈塞尔告诉我有个新来的人_哦，你是来接管镇边那家老餐馆的，对吗？

trans-unit.source: Pardon the commotion, I was in the middle of . . . something._So, Le Sequoia huh. Tell me, what is your vision for it?
trans-unit.target: 抱歉，我当时正在。什么东西_那么，勒红杉，嗯。告诉我，你对它的愿景是什么？

trans-unit.source: A simple but classy spot for folks to eat.
trans-unit.target: 一个简单但优雅的地方供人们吃饭。

trans-unit.source: A place that pushes the culinary envelope.
trans-unit.target: 一个突破烹饪极限的地方。

trans-unit.source: Safe, but the name alone could help pull in people.
trans-unit.target: 安全，但仅凭名字就可以吸引人们。

trans-unit.source: Don't go too far out. It could scare away folks from White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 不要走得太远。它可能会吓跑白灰港的人们。

trans-unit.source: Hasel told me you might come by. Le Sequoia is a really old building and I remember the floors needed to be replaced. I can help, but I'll need something first.
trans-unit.target: 哈塞尔告诉我你可能会来。红杉是一座非常古老的建筑，我记得地板需要更换。我可以帮忙，但我首先需要一些东西。

trans-unit.source: Our carpenter . . . lost his tools when he was doing some work on the bathhouse._If you can go in and find them, we would happily give Le Sequoia a fix up.
trans-unit.target: 我们的木匠。他在澡堂干活时丢了工具_如果你能进去找到他们，我们很乐意给乐红杉一个解决方案。

trans-unit.source: Why can't he just get them?
trans-unit.target: 为什么他不能直接得到它们？

trans-unit.source: What is he doing in the bathhouse?
trans-unit.target: 他在澡堂里干什么？

trans-unit.source: Our carpenter believes that the old bathhouse is haunted. Why he was even there doing work in an abandoned building was odd in the first place . . .
trans-unit.target: 我们的木匠认为那个旧澡堂闹鬼。他为什么在一栋废弃的建筑里工作，一开始就很奇怪。

trans-unit.source: Now that you mentioned it . . . he didn't say. There have been some sightings of activities going on inside the bathhouse . . ._ . . . Even though it's supposed to be abandoned.
trans-unit.target: 既然你提到了。他没说。有人看到澡堂里正在进行一些活动。尽管它本应被遗弃。

trans-unit.source: Regardless, his tools are expensive to replace, and getting them will allow us to fix your floors.
trans-unit.target: 无论如何，他的工具更换起来很贵，得到它们将使我们能够修复您的地板。

trans-unit.source: I could have retrieved the tools, but . . . I . . . I'm too busy to look around in a haunted bathhouse._VERY BUSY. Both day and night. BUSY!
trans-unit.target: 我本可以取回工具的，但是。一、我太忙了，没时间在闹鬼的澡堂里四处看看_非常忙。白天和黑夜。忙碌的！

trans-unit.source: Got em! I can take these to Prisca.
trans-unit.target: 抓住他们了！我可以把这些带给普里斯卡。

trans-unit.source: I should keep searching.
trans-unit.target: 我应该继续寻找。

trans-unit.source: They are not here.
trans-unit.target: 他们不在这里。

trans-unit.source: Nope. Not here.
trans-unit.target: 不。不是这里。

trans-unit.source: Nothing to see here.
trans-unit.target: 这里没什么可看的。

trans-unit.source: It's just junk. The tools are not here.
trans-unit.target: 这只是垃圾。工具不在这里。

trans-unit.source: The tools! Thank you so much! What a relief! We've had so many projects on hold._No one would get them from the very haunted old bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 工具！非常感谢！真是松了一口气！我们搁置了这么多项目_没有人会从闹鬼的旧澡堂里得到它们。

trans-unit.source: I thought you said it was 'possibly' haunted.
trans-unit.target: 我以为你说它“可能”闹鬼。

trans-unit.source: I don't know what you're talking about. Ghosts aren't real.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道你在说什么。鬼魂不是真的。

trans-unit.source: I did say that, yes. And you did it! Yay!
trans-unit.target: 我确实说过，是的。你做到了！耶！

trans-unit.source: . . . Yes . . . yes you are right.
trans-unit.target: . . . 是的。是的，你说得对。

trans-unit.source: We can fix your floors now. Please choose a floor style that you would like. The first renovation is on the house!
trans-unit.target: 我们现在可以帮你修地板了。请选择您喜欢的地板风格。第一次装修是在房子上！

trans-unit.source: I'll have the carpenter come over to the restaurant asap. This is a great help to the town, thank you!
trans-unit.target: 我会让木匠尽快到餐厅来。这对这个城市有很大的帮助，谢谢！

trans-unit.source: The floors are all fixed up. Go in and see for yourself!_Come see me in the town hall if you want to do any other renovations.
trans-unit.target: 地板都修好了。进去亲眼看看吧_如果你想做任何其他装修，请到市政厅见我。

trans-unit.source: We can even expand your restaurant . . . but it won't be cheap. You should wait for when Le Sequoia is filled to the brim with customers, and you need more space!
trans-unit.target: 我们甚至可以扩大您的餐厅。但它不会便宜。你应该等到Le Sequoia挤满了顾客，你需要更多的空间！

trans-unit.source: Oh, and I had some extra cooking appliances lying around._Just don't tell Gavin I gave them to you!_I think I speak for the town when I say we are very excited for Le Sequoia's grand opening. Good luck!
trans-unit.target: 哦，我还有一些额外的烹饪用具_别告诉加文是我给你的_当我说我们对Le Sequoia的盛大开业感到非常兴奋时，我想我代表了整个小镇。祝你好运！

trans-unit.source: Hi, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 嗨，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: (rival).
trans-unit.target: (rival)。

trans-unit.source: You got here pretty fast, (rival).
trans-unit.target: 你来得很快，(rival)。

trans-unit.source: Stoic, (playername). Same as always.
trans-unit.target: 斯多葛学派(playername)。一如既往。

trans-unit.source: I had some vacation time available, so I took it. I didn't want to miss the grand opening.
trans-unit.target: 我有一些假期，所以我去了。我不想错过盛大的开幕式。

trans-unit.source: How's the restaurant been going?
trans-unit.target: 餐厅最近怎么样？

trans-unit.source: I'm slowly getting the hang of things.
trans-unit.target: 我慢慢地掌握了事情的窍门。

trans-unit.source: Not gonna lie, it's been difficult.
trans-unit.target: 我不会撒谎的，这很难。

trans-unit.source: You were trained by some of the best chefs in the nation._I think you can make this work. Just don't let your teachers down!
trans-unit.target: 你曾接受过全国顶尖厨师的培训_我想你能做到的。别让你的老师失望！

trans-unit.source: Ha! Well what did you expect? A old restaurant in a small little town like this? It was never gonna be easy.
trans-unit.target: 哈！那么，你期望什么呢？像这样的小镇上的一家老餐馆？这从来都不容易。

trans-unit.source: In culinary school, you were the only classmate I had to worry about showing me up._Taking on this restaurant out here, in a town that smells like fish all the time, just isn't what most people would do.
trans-unit.target: 在烹饪学校，你是我唯一一个需要担心露面的同学_在一个总是闻起来像鱼的小镇上，在这里经营这家餐厅，并不是大多数人会做的。

trans-unit.source: Tell me, why did you leave Billboard City?
trans-unit.target: 告诉我，你为什么离开公告牌城？

trans-unit.source: There is potential in this town.
trans-unit.target: 这个城市有潜力。

trans-unit.source: I just wanted to get away from the city.
trans-unit.target: 我只是想离开这座城市。

trans-unit.source: I see. I heard Le Sequoia was once a great establishment. You'd better do it justice._Deep down, I'm hoping you will return to the city. So that I can beat you in cooking competitions like back in the school days!
trans-unit.target: 我懂了。我听说Le Sequoia曾经是一个伟大的机构。你最好公正地对待它_在内心深处，我希望你能回到这座城市。这样我就可以在烹饪比赛中打败你，就像上学时一样！

trans-unit.source: You mean from chef Canton right? He's a mean-spirited man for sure._But deep down I think he does it out of his love for food. You will return to the city one day. I guarantee it!
trans-unit.target: 你是说坎顿厨师，对吧？他肯定是个刻薄的人_但在内心深处，我认为他这样做是出于对食物的热爱。总有一天你会回到城里的。我保证！

trans-unit.source: I'll be around town for the grand opening. You better believe I'll be the first one in line. I'll be seeing around, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我将在城里参加盛大的开幕式。你最好相信我会是第一个排队的人。我会四处看看的。

trans-unit.source: 2105 - GRAND OPENING
trans-unit.target: 2105-盛大开业

trans-unit.source: Hi (playername). How do you feel about starting the grand opening?
trans-unit.target: 嗨(playername)。你觉得开幕式怎么样？

trans-unit.source: Really good. I couldn't have made it this far without your help.
trans-unit.target: 真的很好。有你的帮助，我不可能走这么远。

trans-unit.source: Uhhh . . . I don't wanna. Thinking about it makes me tired.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。我不想。一想到它，我就累了。

trans-unit.source: Awww it's no biggie. I . . . I . . . bztttzzzz . . . really enjoy helping with this stuff._Also, I want your restaurant to succeed so I can enjoy tasty food every day.
trans-unit.target: 噢，这没什么大不了的。一、一、bztttzzz。真的很喜欢帮忙做这些事情_此外，我希望你的餐厅能成功，这样我就可以每天享受美味的食物。

trans-unit.source: No no no. You . . . you . . . bztttt . . . have to believe in yourself (playername). I believe in you. Look at Boba, he believes in you too!_I know it can be hard work, but you could end up doing something great.
trans-unit.target: 不不你。你。bztttt。必须相信自己(playername)。我相信你。看看波巴，他也相信你_我知道这可能很难，但你最终可能会做一些很棒的事情。

trans-unit.source: Just one more things. I think Le Sequoia needs some decorations to celebrate the grand opening._You should talk to Milo about it. He is a great designer. You can usually find him at his clothing shop.
trans-unit.target: 还有一件事。我认为Le Sequoia需要一些装饰来庆祝盛大的开业_你应该和米洛谈谈这件事。他是个伟大的设计师。你通常可以在他的服装店找到他。

trans-unit.source: Hello (playername). You need some decorations for Le Sequoia's grand opening?_You've come to the right guy.
trans-unit.target: 你好(playername)。你需要为Le Sequoia的盛大开业做些装饰吗_你找对人了。

trans-unit.source: Hello there. What is this? Hasel said I would be able to help with decorations?_Well, Hasel is my friend, but you are not. However, I am still willing to offer my hand since it's Hasel asking.
trans-unit.target: 你好。这是什么？哈塞尔说我可以帮忙装饰_好吧，哈塞尔是我的朋友，但你不是。然而，我仍然愿意伸出我的手，因为这是哈塞尔的要求。

trans-unit.source: Hmmm . . . yes . . . yes . . . I've got it! Oh yes, this should do nicely.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。是的。是的。我明白了！哦，是的，这应该很好。

trans-unit.source: Wow, you already have a design idea?
trans-unit.target: 哇，你已经有设计想法了？

trans-unit.source: Can we get on with this . . .
trans-unit.target: 我们能继续吗。

trans-unit.source: You bet! Thanks to my many years of creating clothing, I can come up with great designs in an instant!
trans-unit.target: 当然！多亏了我多年的服装创作，我可以在一瞬间想出很棒的设计！

trans-unit.source: It's . . . ha! my designs are no trifle. They are the result of years of hard work and experimentation.
trans-unit.target: 这是。哈！我的设计可不是小事。它们是多年辛勤工作和实验的结果。

trans-unit.source: Now, I will need a few things. First, we will need a big banner for your restaurant._I have some leftover fabrics for the banner, but I will need some rope to hang everything up. Speak to Aloys down by the docks. He might have some.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我需要一些东西。首先，我们需要为您的餐厅准备一个大横幅_我有一些剩余的布料做横幅，但我需要一些绳子把所有东西都挂起来。和码头边的阿洛伊斯谈谈。他可能有一些。

trans-unit.source: Next, I will need some items for the decorations. Bring me some seashells and watercress.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我需要一些装饰品。给我拿些贝壳和豆瓣菜来。

trans-unit.source: What are those for?
trans-unit.target: 那些是干什么用的？

trans-unit.source: That sounds . . . interesting.
trans-unit.target: 听起来。有趣。

trans-unit.source: Ah you will see. It will be too long to explain. Now, off with you!
trans-unit.target: 啊，你会看到的。解释起来太长了。现在，和你一起走！

trans-unit.source: I don't want to spoil it. You will understand when you see it. Now, off you go!
trans-unit.target: 我不想破坏它。当你看到它时，你会明白的。现在，你走吧！

trans-unit.source: Sup (playername). What brings you here on this fine day?
trans-unit.target: 你好(playername)。这么好的日子，你来这里是为了什么？

trans-unit.source: I'm looking for some rope.
trans-unit.target: 我在找绳子。

trans-unit.source: Got any rope to go?
trans-unit.target: 有绳子吗？

trans-unit.source: Well mate, there's gotta be some rope lying around here._Maybe search around the barrels.
trans-unit.target: 伙计，这附近一定有绳子_也许在桶周围搜索。

trans-unit.source: Nope. But maybe you kind find some if you look inside the barrels here.
trans-unit.target: 不。但如果你看看这里的桶里，也许你能找到一些。

trans-unit.source: Found some rope!
trans-unit.target: 找到绳子了！

trans-unit.source: There is not rope in these barrels.
trans-unit.target: 这些桶里没有绳子。

trans-unit.source: Nope. Nada.
trans-unit.target: 不，不行。没什么。

trans-unit.source: Just some fish in here.
trans-unit.target: 这里只有一些鱼。

trans-unit.source: No rope in here.
trans-unit.target: 这里没有绳子。

trans-unit.source: What do we have here? Oh. Nevermind.
trans-unit.target: 我们这里有什么？哦。没有关系。

trans-unit.source: It looks like you have everything I need. Now hand them over, and I can get started.
trans-unit.target: 看起来你有我需要的一切。现在把它们交出来，我就可以开始了。

trans-unit.source: Could you tell me what you are making?
trans-unit.target: 你能告诉我你在做什么吗？

trans-unit.source: So when can you finish?
trans-unit.target: 那么，你什么时候能完成？

trans-unit.source: It's too hard to explain. Meet me back here tomorrow, and we can start setting everything up.
trans-unit.target: 这太难解释了。明天在这里见我，我们可以开始安排一切。

trans-unit.source: Hey! It's done when it's done. Maybe it will be done tomorrow. Maybe it will be done next week._Now, give me some space to work.
trans-unit.target: 嘿！当它完成时，它就完成了。也许明天就能完成。也许下周就能完成_现在，给我一些工作的空间。

trans-unit.source: Hi (playername). The decorations are ready. I think this will look really good.
trans-unit.target: 嗨(playername)。装饰品准备好了。我认为这看起来真的很好。

trans-unit.source: You are amazing Milo!
trans-unit.target: 你真了不起，米洛！

trans-unit.source: I suppose you need my help to carry this?
trans-unit.target: 我想你需要我帮忙搬这个吧？

trans-unit.source: Well of cou . . . well it's no big deal. If Le Sequoia succeeds, it will bring some much needed customers to this town.
trans-unit.target: 好吧，cou。嗯，这没什么大不了的。如果Le Sequoia成功，它将为这个小镇带来一些急需的客户。

trans-unit.source: Obviously. It's far too big to carry on my own . . .
trans-unit.target: 显然。它太大了，我一个人搬不动。

trans-unit.source: Now come pick it up from over here. Lets go!
trans-unit.target: 现在过来从这里把它捡起来。走吧！

trans-unit.source: Oh wow. That looks good.
trans-unit.target: 哇。看起来不错。

trans-unit.source: There! All set. What do you think?
trans-unit.target: 那里！准备就绪。你怎么认为？

trans-unit.source: Not bad. I think it could work.
trans-unit.target: 还不错。我认为它可以工作。

trans-unit.source: That looks beautiful.
trans-unit.target: 看起来很漂亮。

trans-unit.source: Not bad? NOT BAD? This design accentuates the proportions of the architecture._It's like a perfectly fitting dress. Ughhh. Non artistic folk never understand . . .
trans-unit.target: 还不错？还不错？这种设计突出了建筑的比例_它就像一件非常合身的裙子。啊。非艺术人士永远不会理解。

trans-unit.source: Thank you. I don't normally do this kind of work, but it's kinda like designing a dress I suppose._You have to select the right colors and forms to match the body.
trans-unit.target: 非常感谢。我通常不做这种工作，但我想这有点像设计一件衣服_你必须选择合适的颜色和形状来匹配身体。

trans-unit.source: Le Sequoia looks all set now. Look at Boba. He is bursting with excitement!_I'm sure you still have some preparations to take care of._When you are ready, come talk to me, and I'll let the invited guests know.
trans-unit.target: Le Sequoia现在看起来一切就绪。看看波巴。他激动得要命_我相信你还有一些准备工作要做_当你准备好了，来和我谈谈，我会让受邀的客人知道的。

trans-unit.source: The grand opening will make a big impact. The menu should be as good as possible and have a lot of dishes for guests to try._If it goes well, word will spread quickly._So (playername), are you ready to start the grand opening?
trans-unit.target: 盛大的开幕式将产生巨大的影响。菜单应该尽可能好，有很多菜供客人尝试_如果进展顺利，消息会很快传开_那么(playername)，你准备好开始盛大的开幕了吗？

trans-unit.source: All set!
trans-unit.target: 准备就绪！

trans-unit.source: Not yet.
trans-unit.target: 还没有。

trans-unit.source: Exciting! I'll let everyone know. There will be a lot of guests, so I think you should set up seating for at least 8 guests at a time!_Open the restaurant when you are ready chef!
trans-unit.target: 令人兴奋！我会让大家知道的。会有很多客人，所以我认为你应该一次至少为8位客人安排座位_厨师，等你准备好了，就开餐厅吧！

trans-unit.source: Oh, okay, take your time to make a great menu! People are really looking forward to this.
trans-unit.target: 哦，好吧，慢慢来做一份很棒的菜单！人们真的很期待这一点。

trans-unit.source: Everyone, thank you for coming tonight.
trans-unit.target: 各位，谢谢你们今晚的光临。

trans-unit.source: I truly hope this service is a delight to you all.
trans-unit.target: 我真的希望这项服务能让你们所有人感到高兴。

trans-unit.source: My staff and I cannot wait to serve you this evening.
trans-unit.target: 我和我的员工等不及今晚为您服务了。

trans-unit.source: It is the hope that Le Sequoia will bring people together.
trans-unit.target: 希望勒红杉能把人们聚集在一起。

trans-unit.source: With that in mind, let's start making some food, shall we?
trans-unit.target: 考虑到这一点，让我们开始做些食物，好吗？

trans-unit.source: And I will only serve the best food here, so bon appetite!
trans-unit.target: 我只会在这里提供最好的食物，所以祝你胃口好！

trans-unit.source: Riveting!
trans-unit.target: 铆接！

trans-unit.source: Thank goodness (playername) is a chef.
trans-unit.target: 谢天谢地(playername)是一名厨师。

trans-unit.source: I just want to try the food!
trans-unit.target: 我只想尝尝这些食物！

trans-unit.source: This is the big one folks.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个大人物。

trans-unit.source: (dish). This looks good.
trans-unit.target: (dishName)。这看起来不错。

trans-unit.source: This food just gets better and better.
trans-unit.target: 这种食物越来越好了。

trans-unit.source: This (dish) excites my taste buds!
trans-unit.target: 这(dishName)让我的味蕾兴奋不已！

trans-unit.source: I think I am eating an entire ecosystem.
trans-unit.target: 我想我正在吃掉整个生态系统。

trans-unit.source: I think this will attract a lot more visitors.
trans-unit.target: 我认为这将吸引更多的游客。

trans-unit.source: Can we make this quick?
trans-unit.target: 我们能快点吗？

trans-unit.source: The (dish) sounds quite nice.
trans-unit.target: 这道菜听起来不错。

trans-unit.source: I hope we can wrap this up soon, I have to go back.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我们能尽快结束这件事，我得回去了。

trans-unit.source: Oh . . . oh this is . . . this is . . .
trans-unit.target: 哦。哦，这是。这是。

trans-unit.source: Can I get this to go?
trans-unit.target: 我能把这个拿走吗？

trans-unit.source: I think there is definitely room for improvement.
trans-unit.target: 我认为肯定有改进的余地。

trans-unit.source: I hope there is seafood.
trans-unit.target: 我希望有海鲜。

trans-unit.source: Alright. I'll have the (dish).
trans-unit.target: 好吧。我要这道菜。

trans-unit.source: It is quite good.
trans-unit.target: 它相当不错。

trans-unit.source: This is my jam.
trans-unit.target: 这是我的果酱。

trans-unit.source: This flavor is very complex . . .
trans-unit.target: 这种味道很复杂。

trans-unit.source: This was fun . . . yes . . .
trans-unit.target: 这很有趣。是的。

trans-unit.source: Oh, how exciting! This is fabulous.
trans-unit.target: 哦，太令人兴奋了！这太棒了。

trans-unit.source: Ok ok. I got it. I'll take this, and this.
trans-unit.target: 好的，好的。我明白了。我要这个，还有这个。

trans-unit.source: Simple, yet delightful!
trans-unit.target: 简单，但令人愉快！

trans-unit.source: You know, I could eat this all day.
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗，我可以一整天都吃这个。

trans-unit.source: This is going to ruin my diet for sure.
trans-unit.target: 这肯定会毁了我的饮食。

trans-unit.source: That was splendid. I look forward to coming often.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了。我期待着经常来。

trans-unit.source: Ah, these floors do look great.
trans-unit.target: 啊，这些地板真好看。

trans-unit.source: The (dish) sounds perfect.
trans-unit.target: 这道菜听起来很完美。

trans-unit.source: This (dish) is really good.
trans-unit.target: 这(dishName)真好吃。

trans-unit.source: Dishes made from local ingredients? Love it!
trans-unit.target: 用当地食材做的菜？喜欢！

trans-unit.source: I think Gavin would really like this.
trans-unit.target: 我认为加文真的会喜欢这个。

trans-unit.source: This will be really good for White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 这对白灰港来说真的很好。

trans-unit.source: I think the interior design can be better.
trans-unit.target: 我认为室内设计可以做得更好。

trans-unit.source: Yes hello, the (dish) will suffice.
trans-unit.target: 是的，你好，这道菜就够了。

trans-unit.source: What a strange flavor profile.
trans-unit.target: 味道真奇怪。

trans-unit.source: The umami of this (dish) is surprising.
trans-unit.target: 这道菜的鲜味令人惊讶。

trans-unit.source: This dish is inspiring.
trans-unit.target: 这道菜很有启发性。

trans-unit.source: Ah, that was a splendid meal.
trans-unit.target: 啊，那顿饭真好吃。

trans-unit.source: I do like the ambience here . . .
trans-unit.target: 我确实喜欢这里的氛围。

trans-unit.source: Yes hello. I'll take this one.
trans-unit.target: 是的，你好。我要这个。

trans-unit.source: This cooking style is familiar . . .
trans-unit.target: 这种烹饪风格很熟悉。

trans-unit.source: (playername), you always surprise me.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，你总是给我惊喜。

trans-unit.source: Chef Casteau would like this.
trans-unit.target: Casteau厨师想要这个。

trans-unit.source: I think you've got something here (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我想你这里有些东西(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Wow (playername)! That was a wonderful service! I think that was the best dinner I've ever had!_Le Sequoia will be quite popular after this. Word will spread. I'm sure of it!
trans-unit.target: 哇(playername)！这是一个美妙的服务！我觉得这是我吃过的最好的晚餐_在此之后，乐红杉将非常受欢迎。消息会传开的。我敢肯定！

trans-unit.source: That was a great service (playername). The food was top notch as always._I'm so happy to see the once abandoned Le Sequoia so lively again. I have a really good feeling about this.
trans-unit.target: 那是一次很棒的服务(playername)。食物一如既往地一流_我很高兴看到曾经被遗弃的红杉再次如此生动。我对此感觉很好。

trans-unit.source: I really enjoyed that dinner (playername). It wasn't perfect, but I think the guests were quite satisfied._I look forward to see what Le Sequoia will become.
trans-unit.target: 我真的很喜欢那顿晚餐。它并不完美，但我认为客人很满意_我期待着看到Le Sequoia会变成什么样子。

trans-unit.source: Hmmm . . . that could have gone better._Oh . . . no I didn't mean it like that! . . ._I did enjoy some of the food. I really did! I just hope the other guests are happy with that . . .
trans-unit.target: 嗯。这本来可以做得更好_哦。不，我不是那个意思_我确实喜欢一些食物。我真的做到了！我只希望其他客人对此感到满意。

trans-unit.source: Oh dear . . . oh dear . . . that did not go well. The guests did not enjoy that . . ._Wait . . . I mean, don't let it get you down (playername). We can always regroup._I'm sure Le Sequoia will bounce back from one bad night!
trans-unit.target: 哦，天哪。哦，天哪。事情进展得并不顺利。客人不喜欢这个_等等。我的意思是，不要让它让你失望(playername)。我们总是可以重组的_我相信乐红杉会从一个糟糕的夜晚中恢复过来！

trans-unit.source: Well damn. I don't normally say this. But that meal was spectacular. I will come back often, especially if you serve seafood.
trans-unit.target: 该死的。我通常不会这么说。但那顿饭太棒了。我会经常回来的，特别是如果你提供海鲜的话。

trans-unit.source: That meal was pretty sick. Those great flavours are still lingering in my mouth.
trans-unit.target: 那顿饭很恶心。那些美味的味道仍然萦绕在我的嘴里。

trans-unit.source: Not bad (playername). I think Le Sequoia will be something special one day.
trans-unit.target: 不错(playername)。我认为Le Sequoia总有一天会很特别。

trans-unit.source: I don't know what that one guy was talking about. I enjoyed the meal.
trans-unit.target: 我不知道那家伙在说什么。我很喜欢这顿饭。

trans-unit.source: Hey it's no worries mate. We all have em ups and downs.
trans-unit.target: 嘿，别担心，伙计。我们都有起有落。

trans-unit.source: Well (playername), this success will be fantastic for White Ash Harbor for sure!_I have some contacts in Billboard City in the department of tourism. I'm sure we can get some advertisements set up.
trans-unit.target: 好吧(playername)，这次成功对白灰港来说肯定是太棒了_我在Billboard City的旅游部门有一些熟人。我确信我们可以设置一些广告。

trans-unit.source: That was some great grub (playername). I really needed that after a hard day of work._Having a popular restaurant in White Ash Harbor should attract a lot more visitors than we are currently getting.
trans-unit.target: 那真是美味的食物。经过一天的辛勤工作，我真的很需要它。_在白灰港拥有一家受欢迎的餐厅应该会吸引比我们目前更多的游客。

trans-unit.source: That food was pretty good. I might come here after my busy work days to relax.
trans-unit.target: 那食物相当不错。我可能会在繁忙的工作日后来这里放松一下。

trans-unit.source: That wasn't bad. Especially since you are just starting out. I can see myself coming here for a quick bite after work.
trans-unit.target: 这还不错。尤其是你刚刚开始。我可以想象自己下班后会来这里快速吃一口。

trans-unit.source: I'm sorry, but you really need to step up your game (playername)._That could have gone a lot better. I heard that Le Sequoia used to be filled with customers every night._Chef Casteau must be a great chef.
trans-unit.target: 很抱歉，但你真的需要加强你的游戏(playername)_这本可以做得更好。我听说Le Sequoia过去每天晚上都挤满了顾客_Casteau厨师一定是个很棒的厨师。

trans-unit.source: What a crazy night. No matter the result, I'll never forget this day, spent with friends!_Le Sequoia will win some national restaurant awards one day. I know it!
trans-unit.target: 多么疯狂的夜晚。无论结果如何，我永远不会忘记与朋友共度的这一天_Le Sequoia总有一天会赢得一些国家餐厅奖。我知道！

trans-unit.source: Well, I'll be off then! This has inspired me to work on some new bubble tea recipes._Maybe we can exchange recipes one day huh? C'mon. Let's go Boba!
trans-unit.target: 好吧，那我就走了！这启发了我研究一些新的奶茶配方_也许有一天我们可以交换食谱，嗯？拜托。走吧，波巴！

trans-unit.source: Goodbye folks.
trans-unit.target: 再见了，伙计们。

trans-unit.source: See ya.
trans-unit.target: 再见。

trans-unit.source: You got this, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 你明白了，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: What are you going to do now?
trans-unit.target: 你现在打算做什么？

trans-unit.source: Glad you enjoyed my food.
trans-unit.target: 很高兴你喜欢我的食物。

trans-unit.source: Dunno, dunno.
trans-unit.target: 不知道，不知道。

trans-unit.source: The food quality was never a question in my mind.
trans-unit.target: 食物质量在我心中从来不是问题。

trans-unit.source: You know, I did see a small place up for rent in Billboard City. Maybe I'll take a leap of faith, just like you._Either way, I have a lot of thinking to do.
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗，我确实在Billboard City看到了一个出租的小地方。也许我会像你一样，大胆地相信_不管怎样，我都有很多事情要做。

trans-unit.source: Oh, you didn't think I'd come without a gift did you? Try out one of these recipes. Might help you out on your journey._Good luck out here, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 哦，你不会以为我没有礼物就来吧？试试这些食谱中的一个。可能会帮助你在旅途中_祝你好运，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: 11010_INTRO_Casteau's Letter
trans-unit.target: 11010_INTRO_Casteau的信

trans-unit.source: (playername), I hope this letter will help lift your spirits.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，我希望这封信能帮助你振作起来。

trans-unit.source: I understand you have been facing challenges in chef Canton's kitchen lately. He can be overly strict and does not allow creativity in the kitchen. And I know you always try to experiment and push the boundaries with your cooking.
trans-unit.target: 我知道你最近在坎顿厨师的厨房里遇到了挑战。他可能过于严格，不允许厨房里有创造力。我知道你总是试图在烹饪中尝试和突破界限。

trans-unit.source: I have a special mission and purpose that I believe will both challenge you and provide you with a second chance to reach your potential.
trans-unit.target: 我有一个特殊的使命和目标，我相信这将挑战你，并为你提供第二次发挥潜力的机会。

trans-unit.source: As you may know, my first restaurant, Le Sequoia, located in the seaside town of White Ash Harbor, has been abandoned for the past decade. Due to my current physical limitations, I am unable to personally revive it.
trans-unit.target: 如你所知，我的第一家餐厅Le Sequoia位于海滨小镇白灰港，在过去的十年里一直被废弃。由于我目前的身体限制，我无法亲自复活它。

trans-unit.source: I am offering you the opportunity to take on this challenge and bring new life to the once-glorious kitchen of Le Sequoia.
trans-unit.target: 我为您提供接受这一挑战的机会，为曾经辉煌的Le Sequoia厨房带来新的生机。

trans-unit.source: If you accept this challenge, I will gift you the restaurant, in the hopes that you can work with the community of White Ash Harbor to restore the restaurant to its former glory.
trans-unit.target: 如果你接受这个挑战，我会把餐厅送给你，希望你能与白灰港社区合作，将餐厅恢复到昔日的辉煌。

trans-unit.source: Sincerely,
trans-unit.target: 真诚地

trans-unit.source: Antione Casteau
trans-unit.target: 安提阿城堡

trans-unit.source: A Few Months Later . . .
trans-unit.target: 几个月后。

trans-unit.source: 11016_INTRO_Finished Letter
trans-unit.target: 11016_INTRO_已完成的信件

trans-unit.source: Chef Casteau's old restaurant? I wonder why now?
trans-unit.target: Casteau厨师的老餐馆？我想知道为什么是现在？

trans-unit.source: White Ash Harbor . . . I heard it's a shabby old town.
trans-unit.target: 白灰港。我听说那是个破旧的老城区。

trans-unit.source: Maybe . . . Just maybe . . .
trans-unit.target: 也许。只是也许。

trans-unit.source: ACT 2
trans-unit.target: 第2幕

trans-unit.source: 22001_INTRO_Lucius office
trans-unit.target: 22001_INTRO_卢修斯办公室

trans-unit.source: Sir, have you finished your latest review?
trans-unit.target: 先生，你最近的评论写完了吗？

trans-unit.source: The editor at the Tribune has been requesting it.
trans-unit.target: 《论坛报》的编辑一直在要求。

trans-unit.source: . . . Right, that place . . .
trans-unit.target: . . . 对，那个地方。

trans-unit.source: It was a bomb, wasn't it, sir?
trans-unit.target: 那是一枚炸弹，不是吗，先生？

trans-unit.source: Tiresome, Alice. Just so very tiresome. If you will wait right there, I'll put my finishing touches on the review.
trans-unit.target: 累了，爱丽丝。真是令人厌烦。如果你愿意在那里等，我会对复习做最后的润色。

trans-unit.source: . . . The ambiance of a restaurant is just as important as the food it serves._In this department, I found Ranger Remy's to be severely lacking as its walls were covered in kitsch farmhouse sayings.
trans-unit.target: . . . 餐厅的氛围和它提供的食物一样重要_在这个部门，我发现Ranger Remy严重缺乏，因为它的墙壁上满是媚俗的农舍谚语。

trans-unit.source: Lacking any taste for both interior design and the menu itself, I would tell you to instead visit one of the protein cart vendors in town.
trans-unit.target: 由于对室内设计和菜单本身都没有任何兴趣，我建议你去城里的一家蛋白质推车供应商那里。
