trans-unit.source: At least you won't be overcharged, and your experience will be more memorable than anything inside Chef Remy's establishment.
trans-unit.target: 至少你不会被收取过高的费用，你的经历将比雷米厨师店内的任何事情都更令人难忘。

trans-unit.source: Very good sir. I didn't think that chef Remy would be able to impress.
trans-unit.target: 很好，先生。我没想到雷米厨师会给人留下深刻印象。

trans-unit.source: I do not think his restaurant will survive this review.
trans-unit.target: 我认为他的餐厅不会通过这次审查。

trans-unit.source: Have my reviews closed restaurants in the past? Yes, but if I don't siv out the trash, this city would be choking on slop.
trans-unit.target: 我的评论过去关闭过餐馆吗？是的，但如果我不把垃圾倒出来，这座城市就会被污水呛得喘不过气来。

trans-unit.source: But . . . I confess, that my work is getting a bit one-note. How much more do I have to say about food in this city?
trans-unit.target: 但是。我承认，我的工作有点乏味。关于这个城市的食物，我还要说多少？

trans-unit.source: Oh, one more thing. I thought you might be interested.
trans-unit.target: 哦，还有一件事。我想你可能会感兴趣。

trans-unit.source: It's Vincent Casteau's first restaurant, Le Sequoia.
trans-unit.target: 这是Vincent Casteau的第一家餐厅Le Sequoia。

trans-unit.source: THE SAVORY SENTINEL
trans-unit.target: 美味的哨兵

trans-unit.source: Le Sequoia Reopens!
trans-unit.target: 红杉重新开业！

trans-unit.source: By Chloe Alonso
trans-unit.target: 克洛伊·阿隆索

trans-unit.source: Day (date), (season), Year (year)
trans-unit.target: (year)年 (date)日 (season)

trans-unit.source: Le Sequoia, the first restaurant of legendary chef Vincent Casteau, has officially reopened in the seaside town of White Ash Harbor. The restaurant first opened in the year 2017 when chef Casteau was just at the tender age of 32.
trans-unit.target: 传奇厨师Vincent Casteau的第一家餐厅Le Sequoia在海滨小镇白灰港正式重新开业。这家餐厅于2017年首次开业，当时厨师Casteau只有32岁。

trans-unit.source: He has went on to open over a dozen successful restaurants across the globe.
trans-unit.target: 他在全球开设了十几家成功的餐厅。

trans-unit.source: Chef Casteau closed Le Sequoia in 2038 to focus his attention on his Billboard City establishments, as well as teaching young chefs at the famous Academie Rouge culinary school.
trans-unit.target: 厨师Casteau于2038年关闭了Le Sequoia，将注意力集中在他的Billboard City餐厅，并在著名的Academie Rouge烹饪学校教授年轻厨师。

trans-unit.source: One of these young chefs he taught goes by the name of (playername).
trans-unit.target: 他教的其中一位年轻厨师名叫(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Today, the age old Le Sequoia has been passed down and reopened by chef (playername).
trans-unit.target: 如今，古老的Le Sequoia已被传承下来，并由厨师(playername)重新开放。

trans-unit.source: Although inexperienced, chef (playername) has trained under Vincent Casteau for many years, and has worked as a line cook at restaurant Berliner under culinary heavyweight Otto Canton.
trans-unit.target: 虽然经验不足，但厨师(playername)已经在文森特·卡斯托手下接受了多年的培训，并在烹饪重量级人物奥托·坎顿手下的柏林餐厅担任流水线厨师。

trans-unit.source: A complete unknown in the cooking world, it would be easy to write off Le Sequoia as an experiment.
trans-unit.target: Le Sequoia在烹饪界完全不为人知，很容易将其视为一项实验。

trans-unit.source: Only time will tell if this young chef can bring back this storied restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 只有时间会证明这位年轻的厨师能否让这家传奇餐厅起死回生。

trans-unit.source: The locals have been writing about it online too. They say it's a hit.
trans-unit.target: 当地人也在网上写这件事。他们说这很成功。

trans-unit.source: For those who are uneducated about what it means to eat, yes, you're correct, Alice.
trans-unit.target: 对于那些不了解吃意味着什么的人来说，是的，你是对的，爱丽丝。

trans-unit.source: Chef Vincent Casteau, one of the best chef's in the world, has allowed an unknown cook to reopen his first restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 世界上最好的厨师之一Vincent Casteau允许一位不知名的厨师重新开设他的第一家餐厅。

trans-unit.source: I'll have to plan a visit to . . . White Ash Harbor and try out Le Sequoia for myself.
trans-unit.target: 我得计划一次去。白灰港，自己试试红杉。

trans-unit.source: 22002_INTRO_New tourists arrive in train
trans-unit.target: 22002_INTRO_新游客乘火车抵达

trans-unit.source: I heard this place has an amazing restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 我听说这个地方有一家很棒的餐厅。

trans-unit.source: I got a need. A need to fish! Let's gill!!!!
trans-unit.target: 我有个需求。需要钓鱼！让我们吉尔！！！！

trans-unit.source: Le Sequoia, yeah! Let's eat there.
trans-unit.target: 红杉，是的！我们在那里吃饭吧。

trans-unit.source: I want to explore the abandoned bathhouse. I heard it's haunted.
trans-unit.target: 我想探索废弃的澡堂。我听说那里闹鬼。

trans-unit.source: 22003_INTRO_Meet Hasel & Lucius Letter
trans-unit.target: 22003_INTRO_梅特·哈塞尔和卢修斯信件

trans-unit.source: Good morning! Word of Le Sequoia's grand opening is spreading around. I think there are a lot more visitors than just a few weeks before.
trans-unit.target: 早上好！Le Sequoia盛大开业的消息传开了。我认为游客比几周前多得多。

trans-unit.source: I . . . I . . . bzzztttt. I really hope that this can continue!
trans-unit.target: 一、一、bzzztttt。我真的希望这能继续下去！

trans-unit.source: All I can do is make Le Sequoia the best it can be.
trans-unit.target: 我所能做的就是让红杉成为最好的。

trans-unit.source: More tourists means more money!
trans-unit.target: 更多的游客意味着更多的钱！

trans-unit.source: That's what I love to hear. Passion! And you've got it in spades.
trans-unit.target: 这就是我喜欢听到的。激情！你完全明白了。

trans-unit.source: Oh yes. The tourists will definitely help the businesses in town.
trans-unit.target: 哦，是的。游客肯定会帮助城里的企业。

trans-unit.source: I can't wait to see what Le Sequoia has in store next . . .
trans-unit.target: 我迫不及待地想看看Le Sequoia接下来会有什么。

trans-unit.source: (playername)? Letter for you. From one Lucius Delacourt.
trans-unit.target: (playername)？给你的信。来自卢修斯·德拉考特。

trans-unit.source: I'll be off then.
trans-unit.target: 那我就走了。

trans-unit.source: Dear (playername),
trans-unit.target: 亲爱的(playername)：，

trans-unit.source: I do not know you, but you should know me. I am Lucius Delacourt, food critic for the Billboard City Tribune. My words have been known to make or break establishments.
trans-unit.target: 我不认识你，但你应该认识我。我是Lucius Delacourt，《公告牌城市论坛报》的美食评论家。众所周知，我的话决定着机构的成败。

trans-unit.source: I see my work as a service to the city, to help inform the public as to what is worth their time and money and what is not.
trans-unit.target: 我认为我的工作是为城市服务，帮助公众了解什么值得他们花时间和金钱，什么不值得。

trans-unit.source: I heard that Le Sequoia has returned. I've read some reviews from more pedestrian critics, and while the simplest menus easily wow them, I am not so easily impressed.
trans-unit.target: 我听说勒红杉回来了。我读过一些来自更平庸的评论家的评论，虽然最简单的菜单很容易让他们惊叹，但我并没有那么容易印象深刻。

trans-unit.source: I do not take the words of my colleagues seriously, so I will be coming to see what you have to offer me.
trans-unit.target: 我不认真对待同事们的话，所以我会来看看你们能给我什么。

trans-unit.source: I challenge you to try. Try to impress me, because it is clear that while everyone else seems taken by your skill, I have yet to be in awe of anything from what I've read about your establishment and its menu.
trans-unit.target: 我挑战你试试。试着给我留下深刻印象，因为很明显，虽然其他人似乎都被你的技能所吸引，但我还没有对我读到的关于你的餐厅及其菜单的任何内容感到敬畏。

trans-unit.source: See you soon,
trans-unit.target: 期待很快与您见面，

trans-unit.source: Lucius Delacourt
trans-unit.target: 卢修斯·德拉考特

trans-unit.source: Lucius Delacourt isn't someone you brush off, (playername). You're going to have to step up your game._Step up to where, I don't really know, I don't see any stairs, but it should go up.
trans-unit.target: 卢修斯·德拉库尔不是你不屑一顾的人，(playername)。你必须提高你的水平。_我不知道该往哪里走，我没看到任何楼梯，但应该可以往上走。

trans-unit.source: I have a couple of recipes up my sleeve.
trans-unit.target: 我手头有几个食谱。

trans-unit.source: Got any ideas on how to prepare?
trans-unit.target: 对如何准备有什么想法吗？

trans-unit.source: How do you fit that up your sleeve? Does it get sweaty up there?
trans-unit.target: 你是怎么把它套起来的？上面会出汗吗？

trans-unit.source: Well nothing in particular . . . critics are picky people. They expect good food, good service, and good decorations.
trans-unit.target: 没什么特别的。批评家是挑剔的人。他们希望有好的食物、好的服务和好的装饰。

trans-unit.source: No matter what, you should improve your restaurant for Lucius' arrival. Adding some new drinks might help. Have you met April? She just returned from a research trip. Maybe she can share some of her findings?
trans-unit.target: 不管怎样，你应该为卢修斯的到来改进你的餐厅。添加一些新饮料可能会有所帮助。你见过四月吗？她刚结束一次研究旅行回来。也许她可以分享她的一些发现？

trans-unit.source: April is a tea expert. No, no, not bubble teas. More like . . . traditional steeped teas. She says she also has . . . . psychic abilities._You will have to see it to believe it. I think she's over at the Lonely Cliffs last I saw her. Good luck!
trans-unit.target: April是一位茶专家。不，不，不是奶茶。更像是。传统的浸泡茶。她说她也有。心理能力_你必须亲眼目睹才能相信。我想我上次见到她是在孤独悬崖。祝你好运！

trans-unit.source: 2201 - THE TEA OF LIFE
trans-unit.target: 2201：生命之茶

trans-unit.source: My studies in the divine arts allow me to decipher the fate of our timeline._There are only a few people on this planet that have this ability, and I am one of them.
trans-unit.target: 我对神圣艺术的研究使我能够解读我们时间线的命运_这个星球上只有少数人有这种能力，我就是其中之一。

trans-unit.source: My ability is also greatly enhanced by various tea combinations, which is why you are here.
trans-unit.target: 各种茶的组合也大大提高了我的能力，这就是你来这里的原因。

trans-unit.source: Hasel told me you could give me some tips on making tea?
trans-unit.target: 哈塞尔告诉我，你可以给我一些泡茶的技巧吗？

trans-unit.source: I don't believe in fortune-telling.
trans-unit.target: 我不相信算命。

trans-unit.source: Ah, Hasel, such a lovely android. She's correct, I can share some entry level techniques with you.
trans-unit.target: 啊，哈塞尔，这么可爱的机器人。她说得对，我可以和你分享一些入门级的技巧。

trans-unit.source: Coming into contact with . . . the gift, can be rather jarring at first._I understand your lack of imagination and sense of wonder have been crushed under the wheels of ultra-capitalism for far too long.
trans-unit.target: 接触到。这份礼物一开始可能会相当刺耳_我理解你缺乏想象力和惊奇感已经在极端资本主义的车轮下被压垮了太久。

trans-unit.source: But first, I will need some help before I can share my secrets of tea making.
trans-unit.target: 但首先，在分享我的泡茶秘诀之前，我需要一些帮助。

trans-unit.source: It's just tea, right? It can't be that hard to make.
trans-unit.target: 这只是茶，对吧？做起来不会那么难。

trans-unit.source: I guess I can help . . . what do you need?
trans-unit.target: 我想我能帮上忙。你需要什么？

trans-unit.source: It can't be that hard to . . . ?! Different ingredients will yield amazingly beneficial results under the correct conditions._I'll chalk up your comment to ignorance and will not take it as an insult.
trans-unit.target: 这不会那么难吧？！在正确的条件下，不同的成分会产生惊人的有益效果_我会把你的评论归结为无知，不会把它当作一种侮辱。

trans-unit.source: Excellent. I knew you would help. I already predicted it with my abilities.
trans-unit.target: 杰出的。我就知道你会帮忙的。我已经用我的能力预测到了。

trans-unit.source: What I need from you is 30 Sugar Cane, 30 Elderberries, and 30 Chili peppers._If you bring them to me, I can show you the secrets of tea making._I know it's a bit of a bother, but I think you can handle it. See you soon.
trans-unit.target: 我需要你给我30个甘蔗、30个接骨木和30个辣椒_如果你把它们带给我，我可以向你展示泡茶的秘密_我知道这有点麻烦，但我认为你能应付。回头见。

trans-unit.source: Ah here we are. That took . . . some time. Let's head over to my house and I can show you how to make tea.
trans-unit.target: 啊，我们到了。这花了。一些时间。我们去我家吧，我可以教你怎么泡茶。

trans-unit.source: Please ignore the mess, I've been gone for a while, and haven't had a chance to clean up.
trans-unit.target: 请忽略这一团糟，我已经离开一段时间了，还没有机会收拾干净。

trans-unit.source: I'm not a fan of modern technology, but this Tea Dispenser just makes things so much easier, so I made an exception this one time.
trans-unit.target: 我不喜欢现代技术，但这款茶饮机让事情变得更容易了，所以这次我破例了。

trans-unit.source: So all you have to do is put the ingredients into this machine, and it will do the rest._You must make sure you add enough of the primary ingredient, which is Tea Leaves.
trans-unit.target: 所以你所要做的就是把配料放进这台机器里，剩下的就交给它了。你必须确保你添加了足够的主要配料，也就是茶叶。

trans-unit.source: Then, you can add secondary ingredients into the mix._Just be aware that adding more ingredients will dilute the tea leaves, which will make it weaker.
trans-unit.target: 然后，您可以在混合物中添加次要成分_请注意，添加更多的成分会稀释茶叶，使其变弱。

trans-unit.source: Take these ingredients and give it a go!
trans-unit.target: 拿着这些配料，试试看！

trans-unit.source: Yes yes, that's not half bad. Your tea has a decent flavor. Drinking tea will always boost your stamina._Depending on which ingredients you add to the tea, you can receive additional health benefits.
trans-unit.target: 是的，是的，还不错。你的茶味道不错。喝茶总是会增强你的耐力_根据您添加到茶中的成分，您可以获得额外的健康益处。

trans-unit.source: You know what? Why don't you take my old Tea Dispenser? I don't use this one anymore._Gather your own ingredients and see what kind of brews you can come up with.
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗？你为什么不拿走我的旧茶饮机？我不再用这个了_收集你自己的配料，看看你能想出什么样的啤酒。

trans-unit.source: Since you are running a restaurant, you may notice your staff running out of energy._Brewing some tea for them could raise their energy levels.
trans-unit.target: 既然你在经营一家餐馆，你可能会注意到你的员工已经没有精力了。给他们倒些茶可以提高他们的能量水平。

trans-unit.source: I have noticed that my staff are a bit tired mid-service.
trans-unit.target: 我注意到我的员工在服务期间有点累。

trans-unit.source: That greenhouse beside your house. Is that yours?
trans-unit.target: 你房子旁边的那个温室。那是你的吗？

trans-unit.source: Exactly! I'm sure working at a restaurant is hard work._The worst part is, you have to be working during the time you are supposed to be eating! I'm sure your staff will appreciate it if you prepare some tea for them.
trans-unit.target: 确切地！我敢肯定在餐馆工作很辛苦。最糟糕的是，你必须在应该吃饭的时候工作！如果你为他们准备一些茶，我相信你的员工会很感激的。

trans-unit.source: Yes, it is, and you can use it, so long as you know how to farm crops. If you don't know how to yet, then you can't._Don't look so shocked, I'm a psychic, I knew you were going to ask that question before you thought to ask it.
trans-unit.target: 是的，它是，你可以使用它，只要你知道如何种植作物。如果你还不知道该怎么做，那你就不能。别看起来那么震惊，我是个通灵师，在你想问这个问题之前，我就知道你会问这个问题。

trans-unit.source: Now then. Be off. I have some experiments to run.
trans-unit.target: 那么，现在。走吧。我有一些实验要做。

trans-unit.source: Settling In
trans-unit.target: 安顿下来

trans-unit.source: Hasel informed me that you are getting settled in White Ash Harbor. It's a lovely little town isn't it?
trans-unit.target: 哈塞尔告诉我，你将在白灰港定居。这是一个可爱的小镇，不是吗？

trans-unit.source: What was the name of that kind young lady who sells drinks in the town center? In my old age I've forgotten her name._She makes some top notch drinks. I even tried to bring her on as a student, but she had her own life goals . . .
trans-unit.target: 在市中心卖饮料的那位善良的年轻女士叫什么名字？在我年老的时候，我忘记了她的名字_她做了一些顶级饮料。我甚至试图让她成为一名学生，但她有自己的人生目标。

trans-unit.source: I'm very proud of you for taking this leap of faith and trying to revive Le Sequoia. I know you will make great strides with your cooking.
trans-unit.target: 我为你做出这一信念的飞跃，并试图重振红杉感到非常自豪。我知道你会在烹饪方面取得长足的进步。

trans-unit.source: 2202 - THELIO'S STOLEN GOODS
trans-unit.target: 2202年-提里奥的赃物

trans-unit.source: Oh . . . hi (playername). This day has just been the worst.
trans-unit.target: 哦。嗨(playername)。今天是最糟糕的一天。

trans-unit.source: You look . . . distraught.
trans-unit.target: 你看起来。心烦意乱的。

trans-unit.source: Anything I can do to help?
trans-unit.target: 有什么我能帮忙的吗？

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, I just feel like I'm losing control over my life. Do you get that feeling?
trans-unit.target: 有时候，我只是觉得我正在失去对生活的控制。你有这种感觉吗？

trans-unit.source: Thanks for offering. But I know you are busy with your restaurant, and I'm not sure you can help me anyways.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你的提议。但我知道你的餐厅很忙，我不确定你能不能帮我。

trans-unit.source: Some thieves broke in last night and stole all my flour. It's not that valuable, but I'm afraid my boss will take it out of my pay._She checks the inventory all the time. When the count is off she always blames me for it. *Sigh*
trans-unit.target: 昨晚有几个小偷闯入，偷走了我所有的面粉。它没那么值钱，但我担心我的老板会从我的工资中扣除_她一直在检查库存。当计数结束时，她总是怪我。*叹气*

trans-unit.source: That's horrible. Let me catch the thieves that did this!
trans-unit.target: 太可怕了。让我抓住做这件事的小偷！

trans-unit.source: Let's try to find these goods . . . or replace them.
trans-unit.target: 让我们试着找到这些货物。或者替换它们。

trans-unit.source: The thieves have hit the other shops. No one has been able to catch them._Only Nabiha says she's seen them, but it was from a distance. She said they looked like shadowy racoons.
trans-unit.target: 小偷袭击了其他商店。没有人能抓住他们_只有纳比哈说她见过他们，但那是从远处看到的。她说它们看起来像阴影中的浣熊。

trans-unit.source: Well . . . I suppose we can try. Thank you for your concern (playername).
trans-unit.target: 嗯。我想我们可以试试。谢谢你的关心(playername)。

trans-unit.source: If you really want to look, I've heard the thieves might be hiding out in the beach caves._It's been recently reopened, so I suppose it's mostly safe. Just be careful!
trans-unit.target: 如果你真的想看看，我听说小偷可能躲在海滩洞穴里_它最近重新开放了，所以我想它基本上是安全的。小心点！

trans-unit.source: Hello? Anyone in there?
trans-unit.target: 你好？里面有人吗？

trans-unit.source: You know what?
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm going to tell Thelio I couldn't find the goods.
trans-unit.target: 我要告诉忒里奥我找不到货物。

trans-unit.source: Hmmm. Is this one of the stolen boxes?
trans-unit.target: 嗯。这是偷来的箱子吗？

trans-unit.source: I can show this to Thelio.
trans-unit.target: 我可以把这个给Thelio看看。

trans-unit.source: So? Did you find anything?
trans-unit.target: 那又怎样？你找到什么了吗？

trans-unit.source: All I could find were these leftover scraps. The rest is gone.
trans-unit.target: 我只能找到这些剩下的残羹剩饭。其余的都不见了。

trans-unit.source: There is an abandoned house with a monster inside!
trans-unit.target: 有一座废弃的房子，里面有个怪物！

trans-unit.source: I didn't even expect you to find this much. The flour is probably all gone. Thanks for trying.
trans-unit.target: 我甚至没想到你会发现这么多。面粉可能都吃光了。谢谢你的努力。

trans-unit.source: You mean that old house inside the caves? It's an old mining outpost, and it's been empty forever._I heard that they used some crazy chemicals in those mines. That's why so many miners . . . you know what, nevermind.
trans-unit.target: 你是说洞穴里的那座老房子吗？这是一个古老的采矿前哨，永远都是空的_我听说他们在那些矿井里使用了一些疯狂的化学物质。这就是为什么这么多矿工。你知道吗，没关系。

trans-unit.source: I have an idea! I'm just gonna make some flour to replace what was taken. It'll be cheaper, but we will need a Flour Mill._Bianca would be the one person in town I know who could make one.
trans-unit.target: 我有个主意！我只是要做一些面粉来代替吃的。它会更便宜，但我们需要一个面粉厂_比安卡是镇上我认识的唯一一个能做的人。

trans-unit.source: I was in the middle of something, what's up?
trans-unit.target: 我正在做什么，怎么了？

trans-unit.source: Do you know how to make a Flour Mill?
trans-unit.target: 你知道怎么做面粉厂吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm helping Thelio. He needs to mill some flour.
trans-unit.target: 我在帮忒里奥。他需要磨一些面粉。

trans-unit.source: A Flour Mill? I think I got a copy of Build Everything 1985 around here with a schematic in it.
trans-unit.target: 面粉厂？我想我在这里得到了一份《构建一切1985》的副本，里面有一个示意图。

trans-unit.source: I hope you are charging him for the help. Time is valuable, (playername). Never forget it! Anyways, I've never made a Flour Mill, but that hasn't stopped me before.
trans-unit.target: 我希望你向他收取帮助费。时间很宝贵。永远不要忘记！不管怎样，我从来没有做过面粉厂，但这并没有阻止我。

trans-unit.source: I will need some materials. 10 Iron Ore for the plating, 5 Copper Ore for the wiring, and 15 Plant Roots for the frame._Bring them to me, and I can get to work. You will need an electric drill to mine ore.
trans-unit.target: 我需要一些材料。10号铁矿石用于电镀，5号铜矿石用于布线，15号植物根系用于框架_把它们带给我，我就可以开始工作了。你需要一个电钻来开采矿石。

trans-unit.source: Luckily, I have an old one here that you can use. Sometimes, I have better ones in stock, but they won't be free._As for my payment . . . I've been craving some Mead. 5 bottles should suffice. Bea usually sells them at her bar.
trans-unit.target: 幸运的是，我这里有一个旧的，你可以用。有时，我有更好的库存，但它们不会免费_至于我的付款。我一直很想吃米德。5瓶就足够了。Bea通常在她的酒吧里卖。

trans-unit.source: Looks like you brought all the required materials and my mead too. Good job (playername)._I'll need some time to enjoy my mead and build the mill. In the meantime, you will need some grains for the mill. See if Thelio has any.
trans-unit.target: 看来你带了所有必需的材料，还有我的蜂蜜酒。干得好_我需要一些时间来享用我的蜂蜜酒并建造磨坊。与此同时，你需要一些谷物供磨坊使用。看看Thelio有没有。

trans-unit.source: Bianca is working on building the flour mill? Great! So . . . em . . . one more thing._I can't give you the grains we carry in the store. I'm sorry, but my boss checks the inventory.
trans-unit.target: 比安卡正在建面粉厂？太棒了所以。嗯。还有一件事_我们商店里的粮食我不能给你。对不起，我的老板正在检查库存。

trans-unit.source: Can you . . . go collect some grains?
trans-unit.target: 你能。去收集一些谷物吗？

trans-unit.source: Your boss doesn't sound like a good person.
trans-unit.target: 你的老板听起来不像是个好人。

trans-unit.source: I have to collect more things???
trans-unit.target: 我必须收集更多的东西吗？？？

trans-unit.source: Yeah . . . well . . . it's just a temporary job. My hope is to save up and run my own shop one day._That won't happen if she is taking losses out of my pay.
trans-unit.target: 是啊。嗯。这只是一份临时工作。我希望有一天能存起来开自己的店_如果她从我的工资中扣除损失，那就不会发生。

trans-unit.source: You offered to help (playername). We can't leave things half finished.
trans-unit.target: 你主动提出要帮忙(playername)。我们不能半途而废。

trans-unit.source: I believe there's some wild Sorghum plants growing near the cliffs of the old bathhouse._30 should be enough to replace what was lost.
trans-unit.target: 我相信有一些野生高粱植物生长在老澡堂的悬崖附近_30应该足以弥补损失。

trans-unit.source: (playername), it looks like you got everything! I'm so glad this'll be over soon._I've been having to distract my boss and I've officially run out of annoying vendors they have to call to check on our orders.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，看起来你什么都有！我很高兴这很快就会结束_我一直在分散老板的注意力，他们不得不打电话来检查我们的订单，我已经没有烦人的供应商了。

trans-unit.source: My shift is up in a few, let's meet up at Bianca's shop.
trans-unit.target: 我的班次再过几班，我们在比安卡的商店见面吧。

trans-unit.source: Wow. This looks impressive.
trans-unit.target: 哇！这看起来令人印象深刻。

trans-unit.source: Thelio, I know (playername) isn't the kind to say this, but I am. You owe them big. Just put the grains in and it will mill it into flour.
trans-unit.target: Thelio，我知道(playername)不适合这么说，但我是。你欠他们很多。只要把谷物放进去，它就会把它磨成面粉。

trans-unit.source: I have enough flour to replace the lost goods!_The self-help book I'm reading said to trust others in times of need and here we are! Thank you to you both!
trans-unit.target: 我有足够的面粉来替换丢失的货物_我正在读的自助书说，在需要的时候要相信别人，我们到了！谢谢你们俩！

trans-unit.source: No hugging. No, thank you. Glad this is over, now please leave my shop, I have work to do.
trans-unit.target: 不要拥抱。不用了，谢谢。很高兴这一切都结束了，现在请离开我的商店，我有工作要做。

trans-unit.source: Hasel came by my shop while you were out and let me know about that reviewer, Lucius, that's coming by your restaurant?_Sounds crazy stressful.
trans-unit.target: 你不在的时候，Hasel来过我的店，让我知道那个来自你餐厅的评论家Lucius_听起来压力很大。

trans-unit.source: You did me a solid, so allow me to do one for you. One of my business books said to offer criticism but then offer a solution.
trans-unit.target: 你给了我一个坚实的基础，所以请允许我为你做一个。我的一本商业书说，要提出批评，但要提出解决方案。

trans-unit.source: Last time I ate at Le Sequoia I thought it was missing something._I don't know what, but that might factor into this guy's thoughts on your place.
trans-unit.target: 上次我在Le Sequoia吃饭时，我以为它缺少了什么_我不知道是什么，但这可能会影响这个人对你家的看法。

trans-unit.source: Anna May, Mae Lou's sister, is not just a farmer. She's a bit of a renaissance woman._She does carving, furniture making, and painting.
trans-unit.target: 美楼的妹妹安娜·梅不仅仅是一个农民。她有点文艺复兴时期的女人_她从事雕刻、家具制作和绘画。

trans-unit.source: She's crazy talented! Maybe she could help you with your decor? Just a thought! Good luck!
trans-unit.target: 她天赋异禀！也许她能帮你装饰一下？只是一个想法！祝你好运！

trans-unit.source: 2203 - THE SOURCE OF INSPIRATION
trans-unit.target: 2203-灵感之源

trans-unit.source: Hm? (playername), ah, hi! Sorry, I was off somewhere while I've been working on this piece.
trans-unit.target: 百米(playername)啊，嗨！抱歉，我在写这篇文章的时候不在。

trans-unit.source: What are you doing?
trans-unit.target: 你在做什么？

trans-unit.source: That is a very interesting piece of art.
trans-unit.target: 那是一件非常有趣的艺术品。

trans-unit.source: I am trying to understand . . . why I created this piece._What was the process that led me from receiving a plain tree trunk, to this strange form that stands before us?
trans-unit.target: 我试图理解。我为什么要创作这件作品_是什么过程让我从收到一棵普通的树干，变成了摆在我们面前的这种奇怪的形状？

trans-unit.source: Interesting? Almost anything anyone makes grabs interest and is interesting. Intriguing? Beguiling? Boring?_Those are words that say something. I'd recommend dropping interesting from your mental dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 有趣？几乎任何人做的东西都会引起人们的兴趣，而且很有趣。有趣？诱人？无聊_这些话说明了一些事情。我建议从你的心理词典中删除有趣的内容。

trans-unit.source: Tell me (playername), what do you think makes art, well . . . art?
trans-unit.target: 告诉我(playername)，你认为是什么造就了艺术，嗯。艺术？

trans-unit.source: Something that is beautiful to look at?
trans-unit.target: 有什么好看的东西吗？

trans-unit.source: It should be an object of deep meaning.
trans-unit.target: 它应该是一个具有深刻意义的对象。

trans-unit.source: That is a very pedestrian viewpoint. Art does not need to be beautiful, and beauty is defined within the eyes of the beholder._Art can exist in so many forms.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个非常行人的观点。艺术不一定是美的，美是在观者的眼中定义的_艺术可以以多种形式存在。

trans-unit.source: Fair enough, though art could exist as anything, and it does not necessarily possess meaning._Sometimes, it can serve a functional purpose, like a beautiful chair, or a lamp.
trans-unit.target: 很公平，尽管艺术可以作为任何东西存在，但它不一定有意义_有时，它可以起到功能性的作用，比如一把漂亮的椅子或一盏灯。

trans-unit.source: Personally, I prefer art that does something useful. The viewer will engage with the art more, and that makes me happy.
trans-unit.target: 就我个人而言，我更喜欢做一些有用的事情的艺术。观众会更多地参与艺术，这让我很高兴。

trans-unit.source: I got a feeling you're not here to discuss the finer points of art and the creation of it?_So, what's up?
trans-unit.target: 我有一种感觉，你不是来讨论艺术的细节和创作的_怎么了？

trans-unit.source: Thelio told me that Le Sequoia needs some . . . sprucing up.
trans-unit.target: Thelio告诉我Le Sequoia需要一些。打扮起来。

trans-unit.source: I need my restaurant to look good for a food critic.
trans-unit.target: 我需要我的餐厅对美食评论家来说看起来不错。

trans-unit.source: Thelio! I've known him since high school. He was. . . nevermind._If Thelio thinks your restaurant is lacking, he's probably not wrong. He's many things, but on that front, he's usually not wrong.
trans-unit.target: 忒里奥！我从高中就认识他了。他是。没关系_如果Thelio认为你的餐厅不够，他可能没有错。他有很多东西，但在这方面，他通常没有错。

trans-unit.source: You have come to the right place. Welcome to my wonderland of creativity!
trans-unit.target: 你来对地方了。欢迎来到我的创意仙境！

trans-unit.source: Being a farmer, I had to learn to make due with what's around me, and I had to fix things because it's cheaper than buying new.
trans-unit.target: 作为一名农民，我必须学会珍惜身边的一切，我必须修理东西，因为这比买新的便宜。

trans-unit.source: I hated it growing up because it was easier to just buy something new._But now, I can make most pieces of furniture as well as paint landscapes.
trans-unit.target: 我从小就讨厌它，因为买新东西更容易_但现在，我可以制作大多数家具，也可以画风景。

trans-unit.source: If you're coming to me, you want some bespoke pieces made._You could've gone to a flatpack shop and be done, but you want something more. I can provide that last touch Le Sequoia needs.
trans-unit.target: 如果你来找我，你想要一些定制的作品_你本可以去扁平包装店完成，但你想要更多。我可以提供Le Sequoia需要的最后一点。

trans-unit.source: Let's start with something simple and effective: Lighting. I'm going to need some Uncut Quartz for the light bulb._With our crunched timeline, I can cut five and make the lamps, so get going!
trans-unit.target: 让我们从简单而有效的东西开始：照明。我需要一些未切割的石英灯泡_有了我们紧凑的时间表，我可以切五个，做灯，所以开始吧！

trans-unit.source: Slick! In order to design artwork for your restaurant, I'm going to need to taste what you're serving._I need to experience what a customer experiences. It's for . . . inspiration.
trans-unit.target: 滑！为了给你的餐厅设计艺术品，我需要尝尝你提供的食物_我需要体验客户的体验。这是为了。灵感。

trans-unit.source: Well come on by!
trans-unit.target: 来吧！

trans-unit.source: Is that really necessary?
trans-unit.target: 真的有必要吗？

trans-unit.source: Solid! It really is a necessary part of the design process. It really is!
trans-unit.target: 坚实！这确实是设计过程中不可或缺的一部分。确实如此！

trans-unit.source: How dare you question my process! I cannot understand without experiencing._If you create without understanding, then you will have hollow thoughts adorning your walls. Without inspiration, my artwork will suffer.
trans-unit.target: 你怎么敢质疑我的过程！没有经历，我无法理解_如果你在没有理解的情况下创造，那么你的墙上就会装饰着空洞的想法。没有灵感，我的作品会受到影响。

trans-unit.source: When you are ready, I will drop by and eat what you are serving._I want to feel every aspect as a customer, except paying for the food as that will hinder the creative process!_Okay? Goodbye for now.
trans-unit.target: 等你准备好了，我会顺便来吃你端的菜_作为顾客，我想感受到每一个方面，除了为食物付钱，因为这会阻碍创作过程_可以？再见了。

trans-unit.source: Yes yes. I can see what the problem is.
trans-unit.target: 是的，是的。我能看出问题所在。

trans-unit.source: The (dish) looks good. I'll have that one.
trans-unit.target: 这道菜看起来不错。我要那个。

trans-unit.source: You know what? I'm inspired.
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗？我受到了启发。

trans-unit.source: I haven't had a good meal in a long time.
trans-unit.target: 我已经很久没吃过一顿美餐了。

trans-unit.source: Whew. It's the first time I've been full in a while.
trans-unit.target: 呼。这是我很久以来第一次吃饱了。

trans-unit.source: Wow (playername). That might have been the best meal I've ever had. Seriously!_You've given me a lot to think about. Yes . . . yes . . . I have some great ideas for your design.
trans-unit.target: 哇(playername)。那可能是我吃过的最好的一餐。说真的_你给了我很多思考。是的。是的。我对你的设计有一些好主意。

trans-unit.source: Whew, what a great meal! I haven't enjoyed a dinner like that in ages._Look at my belly, it's soooo full!_This gave me some ideas for your lamp design.
trans-unit.target: 呼，这顿饭真好吃！我好久没吃过这样的晚餐了_看我的肚子，太饱了_这给了我一些关于你的灯具设计的想法。

trans-unit.source: That was quite a tasty meal (playername)! I definitely have some inspiration now._In fact, you could say I'm . . . full of inspiration.
trans-unit.target: 那顿饭真好吃！我现在肯定有一些灵感_事实上，你可以说我是。充满灵感。

trans-unit.source: That meal wasn't bad. At least I'm full, so there's that. Don't worry, I will still create you a pair of lamps, as promised.
trans-unit.target: 那顿饭还不错。至少我吃饱了，所以就是这样。别担心，我还是会像承诺的那样给你做一盏灯。

trans-unit.source: Ummm, you know (playername), I'm going to be honest. That was not a great meal._But a deal is a deal, I will make you a pair of lamps that suits your . . . restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，你知道(playername)，我要说实话。那顿饭不好吃_但交易就是交易，我会给你做一对适合你的灯。餐厅。

trans-unit.source: Drop by my place tomorrow. I think you will be pleasantly surprised.
trans-unit.target: 明天来我家看看。我想你会感到惊喜的。

trans-unit.source: Ah here we are (playername). So, what do you think?
trans-unit.target: 啊，我们到了(playername)。你觉得呢？

trans-unit.source: This is it? I was expecting more.
trans-unit.target: 就这些？我原本期待更多。

trans-unit.source: You know what? I love it!
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗？我喜欢！

trans-unit.source: What . . . what!?? I put a lot of effort into this! Or perhaps, you just can't appreciate art?_This is the result from the inspiration I received at your restaurant. You can take it or leave it.
trans-unit.target: 什么。什么！？？我为此付出了很多努力！或者，你只是不能欣赏艺术_这是我从你们餐厅得到的灵感的结果。你可以接受它，也可以放弃它。

trans-unit.source: Slick! I knew this would really strike a chord with you. Lighting can be incredibly forgiving when applied correctly._It helps hide what you don't want seen and illuminates what you want people to focus on during their time in Le Sequoia.
trans-unit.target: 滑！我就知道这会引起你的共鸣。如果使用得当，照明可以令人难以置信地宽容_它有助于隐藏你不想看到的东西，并阐明你希望人们在Le Sequoia期间关注的东西。

trans-unit.source: Now that I have experienced your menu, I can make furniture that enhances what people are eating._I'm always here to help, as long as you bring the required materials . . . and payment. See you around, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 现在我已经体验过你的菜单了，我可以做家具来增强人们的饮食_只要你带上所需的材料，我随时都会帮助你。以及付款。回头见，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: 2204 - CHEF'S NEMESIS
trans-unit.target: 2204-厨师的克星

trans-unit.source: So, this is who Chef Casteau has entrusted to bring Le Sequoia back? A no-name line cook?_Casteau usually has vision, but from where I am standing, it's looking a bit foggy.
trans-unit.target: 那么，这就是Casteau厨师委托他把Le Sequoia带回来的人吗？一个无名厨师_Casteau通常有视力，但从我站的地方看，它有点模糊。

trans-unit.source: Where are my manners, I am Lucius Delacourt. I wrote to you about my arrival and the eventual review of Le Sequoia._I was hoping I would've caught you today, but alas, train delays kept me from arriving earlier.
trans-unit.target: 我的礼貌在哪里，我是卢修斯·德拉考特。我给你写了关于我的到来和最终对Le Sequoia的评论_我本来希望今天能赶上你，但唉，火车晚点让我没能早点到。

trans-unit.source: It looks like I'm a little late today, since you have already closed. But no matter, I will wait for your next restaurant service.
trans-unit.target: 看来我今天有点晚了，因为你们已经关门了。但没关系，我会等你的下一次餐厅服务。

trans-unit.source: No matter, let's make this a bit more sporting? I'll swing in the day after tomorrow._Give you a chance to really be ready for me.
trans-unit.target: 没关系，让我们把它做得更运动一点吧？后天我会去荡秋千_给你一个机会，让你真正为我做好准备。

trans-unit.source: I will be ready for you.
trans-unit.target: 我会为你准备好的。

trans-unit.source: Do you enjoy shattering the work of chefs?
trans-unit.target: 你喜欢打破厨师的工作吗？

trans-unit.source: You may come to regret your naive confidence (playername)._I frequently dine in the greatest establishements in the nation, and Le Sequoia will be reviewed by the same standard. It will be difficult to impress me.
trans-unit.target: 你可能会后悔你天真的自信(playername)_我经常在全国最大的餐厅用餐，而Le Sequoia将以同样的标准接受审查。很难给我留下深刻印象。

trans-unit.source: Only those that put out mediocre cuisine. Why should I allow them to take a spot that another more qualified chef could fill?
trans-unit.target: 只有那些提供平庸美食的人。我为什么要允许他们占据另一个更合格的厨师可以填补的位置？

trans-unit.source: It's late, and I am going to get some rest. I suggest you do the same. You'll need it. Good day.
trans-unit.target: 很晚了，我要休息一下。我建议你也这样做。你需要它。再见。

trans-unit.source: 22003_INTRO_Meet Hasel & Lucius Letter
trans-unit.target: 22003_INTRO_梅特·哈塞尔和卢修斯信件

trans-unit.source: Interesting decor . . .
trans-unit.target: 有趣的装饰。

trans-unit.source: The (dish) piques my interest.
trans-unit.target: 这道菜引起了我的兴趣。

trans-unit.source: This (dish) is quite curious . . .
trans-unit.target: 这道菜很奇怪。

trans-unit.source: I have seen this one before.
trans-unit.target: 我以前见过这个。

trans-unit.source: Will this live up to my expectations?
trans-unit.target: 这会达到我的期望吗？

trans-unit.source: You've given me a lot to think about . . .
trans-unit.target: 你给了我很多思考。

trans-unit.source: Ah, it's a beautiful day. I'm in the mood to review a restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 啊，今天天气真好。我有心情去评价一家餐馆。

trans-unit.source: Hmmm, if I look closely, I'm still devilishly handsome.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，如果我仔细看，我仍然非常英俊。

trans-unit.source: Wait. Is that who I think it is?
trans-unit.target: 等待。那是我想的人吗？

trans-unit.source: Isn't he that famous critic? What is he doing here?
trans-unit.target: 他不是那位著名的评论家吗？他在这里干什么？

trans-unit.source: Whoa, I've seen him in the news before.
trans-unit.target: 哇，我以前在新闻里见过他。

trans-unit.source: Hey, it's that famous food critic from Billboard City!
trans-unit.target: 嘿，是公告牌城的那位著名美食评论家！

trans-unit.source: (playername)! (playername)! I heard that Lucius' review has arrived. Oh I'm so nervous!
trans-unit.target: (playername)！(playername)！我听说卢修斯的评论已经到了。哦，我好紧张！

trans-unit.source: Come! You should have received it in the mailbox. Let's look at it together._No matter what happens, I think you did amazing!
trans-unit.target: 过来！你应该已经在邮箱里收到了。让我们一起来看看_不管发生什么，我认为你做得太棒了！

trans-unit.source: Amazing! You got him, (playername). You hit it out of the park!_Lucius Delacourt reviews the best restaurants in Billboard City and he rarely gives out reviews like this.
trans-unit.target: 太神了！你抓住他了，(playername)。你把它打出了公园_Lucius Delacourt评论了Billboard City最好的餐厅，他很少给出这样的评论。

trans-unit.source: Hey . . . whoa . . . you know what? It sounded like he really liked it. That's amazing (playername)!_To impress a critic like Lucius Delacourt ain't easy. I think Chef Casteau really made great decision giving you Le Sequoia.
trans-unit.target: 嘿。哇。你知道吗？听起来他真的很喜欢它。太棒了(playername)_给Lucius Delacourt这样的评论家留下深刻印象并不容易。我认为Casteau厨师给你Le Sequoia真的做出了很好的决定。

trans-unit.source: It looks like he liked it! I know I know, but his reviews are usually far more critical, so I'd say this is a win._He is a big shot critic from Billboard City, so he is definitely not easy to impress!
trans-unit.target: 看起来他很喜欢！我知道我知道，但他的评论通常更具批判性，所以我想说这是一场胜利_他是Billboard City的大人物评论家，所以他绝对不容易给人留下深刻印象！

trans-unit.source: You know what? I think you did great! You don't need to worry about Lucius._It's just his opinion, and he's snooty anyway! We all think your food is super tasty, (playername). Keep . . . keep . . . keep it up!
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗？我认为你做得很好！你不用担心卢修斯_这只是他的观点，而且他很傲慢！我们都认为你的食物非常美味。保持。保持。坚持下去！

trans-unit.source: Well . . . well . . . you know what? He is just a snobby critic from the city that only likes high-end food._Everyone in town likes your food (playername), so don't let this get you down.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。嗯。你知道吗？他只是一个势利的评论家，只喜欢高档食品_镇上的每个人都喜欢你的食物，所以不要让这件事让你失望。

trans-unit.source: His reviews get a lot of readers. A lot of people will see this._This means that Le Sequoia, and by extension, White Ash Harbor will only keep growing. It's sooo exciting!
trans-unit.target: 他的评论吸引了很多读者。很多人会看到这一点_这意味着Le Sequoia以及白灰港只会继续增长。太令人兴奋了！

trans-unit.source: I think a lot of people will see this review._A positive word from him will go a long way._Even more people will visit White Ash Harbor. Whew, I better start preparing my next batch of bubble teas!
trans-unit.target: 我想很多人都会看到这篇评论_他说一句积极的话会有很大的帮助_更多的人将参观白灰港。呼，我最好开始准备下一批奶茶了！

trans-unit.source: You should celebrate (playername). Le Sequoia's first review, and it's a positive one!_I'm sure Le Sequoia will only get better and better from here.
trans-unit.target: 你应该庆祝一下。Le Sequoia的第一篇评论，而且是积极的_我相信Le Sequoia只会从这里变得越来越好。

trans-unit.source: This is your first review. It only get's better from here (playername)._You will grow stronger, and one day he will say that your food is delicious. I know it!
trans-unit.target: 这是你的第一次评论。从这里开始，一切只会变得更好_你会变得更强壮，有一天他会说你的食物很美味。我知道！

trans-unit.source: It's just a first review. I'm sure Chef Casteau had some bad reviews when he was starting out, so don't worry about it!_You'll kick Lucious Delacourt's butt one day. I'm . . . I'm . . . I'm sure of it!
trans-unit.target: 这只是第一次审查。我敢肯定Casteau厨师刚开始的时候有一些不好的评价，所以不用担心_总有一天你会踢Lucious Delacourt的屁股。我。我。我敢肯定！

trans-unit.source: Now, get out there and be the best chef that you can.
trans-unit.target: 现在，走出去，尽你所能成为最好的厨师。

trans-unit.source: 11007_FLASHBACK_Culinary School
trans-unit.target: 11007_FLASHBACK_乌克兰学校

trans-unit.source: (playername), you stormed out of the classroom so fast . . ._Look, it was just some feedback from your peers. This is part of the process.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，你这么快就冲出了教室_看，这只是你同事的一些反馈。这是过程的一部分。

trans-unit.source: They didn't have to be so bitter! So critical!!
trans-unit.target: 他们不必如此痛苦！太挑剔了！！

trans-unit.source: Today was a disaster. Maybe I shouldn't be a chef.
trans-unit.target: 今天是一场灾难。也许我不应该当厨师。

trans-unit.source: My . . . oh my . . . hahaha!
trans-unit.target: 我的。哦，我的。哈哈哈！

trans-unit.source: My . . . you are a funny student (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我的。你是个有趣的学生。

trans-unit.source: Hahahahahaha! Ohhh, I am sorry, (playername). I am not laughing at you._You made me remember that I said this very same thing once.
trans-unit.target: 哈哈哈哈哈哈！哦，对不起，(playername)。我不是在嘲笑你_你让我想起我曾经说过同样的话。

trans-unit.source: That feeling in you? The the anger, the doubt, every great chef has felt these feelings before._Whether it's out there or here in school, criticism is part of life._It's why we incorporate it into the curriculum.
trans-unit.target: 你内心的那种感觉？愤怒、怀疑，每一位伟大的厨师都曾有过这样的感受_无论是在外面还是在学校，批评都是生活的一部分_这就是为什么我们把它纳入课程。

trans-unit.source: My hope is you learn what they are saying and ignore how they're saying it. Besides, you make some bad dishes today._But do you know what you have that many of your classmates do not?
trans-unit.target: 我希望你能学会他们在说什么，忽略他们是怎么说的。此外，你今天做了一些糟糕的菜_但是你知道你有很多同学没有的东西吗？

trans-unit.source: I don't know, chef. What?
trans-unit.target: 我不知道，厨师。什么？

trans-unit.source: My dashing good looks?
trans-unit.target: 我帅气的外表？

trans-unit.source: Most talented people have the same problem you have, and that shouldn't surprise me. But here I am, surprised.
trans-unit.target: 大多数有才华的人都有和你一样的问题，这不应该让我感到惊讶。但在这里，我很惊讶。

trans-unit.source: Calm down, (playername). I am here to boost your spirits, not feed your ego.
trans-unit.target: 冷静点。我来这里是为了振奋你的精神，而不是满足你的自尊心。

trans-unit.source: Confidence. You let yourself shine through your cooking. Yes, you can follow a recipe, but anyone can do that._What makes a cook into a chef is their ability to make something only they could make and no one else.
trans-unit.target: 信心。你让自己在烹饪中大放异彩。是的，你可以遵循食谱，但任何人都可以做到_厨师之所以能成为厨师，是因为他们有能力做出只有自己能做的东西，而不是别人能做的。

trans-unit.source: To find your signature, your specialty, it takes a lot of failure to achieve._Take today's failures and grow from it. Now breathe, gather yourself, and come back to class.
trans-unit.target: 要找到你的签名，你的专长，需要很多失败才能实现_接受今天的失败，从中成长。现在呼吸，振作起来，回到课堂上。

trans-unit.source: 2205 - A MYSTERIOUS REQUEST
trans-unit.target: 2205：一个神秘的请求

trans-unit.source: Meet me at Hotel Rose as soon as you get this. I have rented out the royal suite - room 201.
trans-unit.target: 你一拿到这个，就在玫瑰酒店见我。我已经把201号皇家套房租出去了。

trans-unit.source: Lucius
trans-unit.target: 卢修斯

trans-unit.source: (playername), thank you for joining me.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，谢谢你加入我。

trans-unit.source: I've exceed your expectations. What is this about?
trans-unit.target: 我已经超出了你的期望。这是怎么回事？

trans-unit.source: Are you here to admit defeat?
trans-unit.target: 你是来认输的吗？

trans-unit.source: Your successful review is the very reason why I wanted to speak with you.
trans-unit.target: 你的成功评论正是我想和你谈谈的原因。

trans-unit.source: There is no victory or defeat here (playername). I am simply doing my duty of informing the masses and speaking the plain truth._If you truly want to know, I do take some joy in eviscerating unworthy chefs.
trans-unit.target: 这里没有胜利或失败。我只是在尽我的职责，告诉群众，说实话_如果你真的想知道，我真的很喜欢那些不称职的厨师。

trans-unit.source: Talented individuals need guidance, (playername). I've been in this business for a long time, and I can tell you talent only takes you so far.
trans-unit.target: 有才华的人需要指导(playername)。我从事这个行业已经很长时间了，我可以告诉你，天赋只能让你走这么远。

trans-unit.source: Once its been worn down, you better have a plan in place for when you are running on empty._That is why I asked you to meet me here.
trans-unit.target: 一旦它被磨损了，你最好有一个空着跑步的计划_这就是为什么我请你在这里见我。

trans-unit.source: Your restaurant and cooking style have piqued my interest._Tell me (playername), why do you cook?
trans-unit.target: 你的餐厅和烹饪风格引起了我的兴趣_告诉我(playername)，你为什么做饭？

trans-unit.source: I simply love cooking.
trans-unit.target: 我只是喜欢做饭。

trans-unit.source: I want to have a successful restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 我希望有一家成功的餐厅。

trans-unit.source: Passion for food is great. It's an important thing to have. But to become a great chef, you will need more than that._What you need is a vision, a vision of a culinary paradise you wish to achieve.
trans-unit.target: 对食物的热情是伟大的。这是一件重要的事情。但要成为一名伟大的厨师，你需要的不仅仅是这些_你需要的是一个愿景，一个你希望实现的烹饪天堂的愿景。

trans-unit.source: So it's prestige you are after? Rather blunt, but I admire your honesty._If you wish to have a successful restaurant that stands the test of time, you will need something greater: A vision.
trans-unit.target: 所以你追求的是声望？相当直率，但我钦佩你的诚实_如果你想拥有一家经得起时间考验的成功餐厅，你需要更大的东西：愿景。

trans-unit.source: I may seem like someone who just critics restaurants for money, but I have a greater vision._The culinary industry in this nation requires a change._Therefore, I'm always on the lookout for talented chefs to join my cause.
trans-unit.target: 我可能看起来像是一个只为了钱而批评餐馆的人，但我有更大的视野_这个国家的烹饪业需要改变_因此，我一直在寻找有才华的厨师加入我的事业。

trans-unit.source: Whatever scheme you have cooked up, I am not interested.
trans-unit.target: 无论你想出什么计划，我都不感兴趣。

trans-unit.source: I may be able to help. What do you have in mind?
trans-unit.target: 我也许能帮上忙。你有什么想法？

trans-unit.source: I don't scheme, I plan. If you change your short-sighted mind, I'll be here.
trans-unit.target: 我不计划，我计划。如果你改变短视的想法，我会在这里。

trans-unit.source: Excellent! Open mindedness. I like that in a chef. No, I will not reveal my plans to you just yet. All in due time.
trans-unit.target: 杰出的！思想开放。我喜欢厨师那样。不，我现在还不会向你透露我的计划。一切都在适当的时候。

trans-unit.source: Well then, off you go (playername). You have a restaurant to run, no?
trans-unit.target: 那么，你走吧(playername)。你有一家餐馆要经营，不是吗？

trans-unit.source: Why are you staying here and not going back to the city?
trans-unit.target: 你为什么留在这里，不回城里？

trans-unit.source: You don't look like you are here for a quick visit.
trans-unit.target: 你看起来不像是来这里快速拜访的。

trans-unit.source: The trees are nice. Good day (playername).
trans-unit.target: 这些树很漂亮。你好(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Indeed. I will be staying in White Ash Harbor for an extended period of time._That is all I am willing to share at the moment, but you will see me around. Good day (playername).
trans-unit.target: 的确。我将在白灰港停留很长一段时间_这就是我目前愿意分享的，但你会看到我的。你好(playername)。

trans-unit.source: ACT 3
trans-unit.target: 第3幕

trans-unit.source: Hello (playername). I see Le Sequoia is back in business again.
trans-unit.target: 你好(playername)。我看到Le Sequoia又回来了。

trans-unit.source: Chef Casteau!
trans-unit.target: 卡斯托厨师！

trans-unit.source: I was hoping you would have come earlier chef.
trans-unit.target: 我希望你早点来，厨师。

trans-unit.source: Ho ho ho! Yes my decision to come to White Ash Harbor was a bit sudden.
trans-unit.target: 呵呵！是的，我来白灰港的决定有点突然。

trans-unit.source: Well I'm a bit worse for wear I'm afraid. It's difficult for an old man like me to travel._I see you've managed everything on your own quite well.
trans-unit.target: 恐怕我的穿着有点差。像我这样的老人很难旅行_我看你一个人把一切都做得很好。

trans-unit.source: I read Lucius' review, and I wanted to see Le Sequoia again._You've done a great job with it, (playername). I haven't seen it like this in a long time.
trans-unit.target: 我读了Lucius的评论，我想再看看Le Sequoia_你做得很好，(playername)。我好久没看到这样了。

trans-unit.source: Thank you, Chef.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你，厨师。

trans-unit.source: I think I'm getting the hang of it. Still learning a lot.
trans-unit.target: 我想我已经掌握了窍门。还学到了很多。

trans-unit.source: Ho ho ho, I haven't been your boss for some time now. Vincent is fine, but I get the habit is hard to break.
trans-unit.target: 呵呵，我已经有一段时间没做你的老板了。文森特很好，但我明白这个习惯很难改掉。

trans-unit.source: Being out of your depth can feel odd at first, but you're looking like you're swimming pretty well now.
trans-unit.target: 刚开始，你可能会觉得很奇怪，但你现在看起来游得很好。

trans-unit.source: White Ash Harbor is looking a bit nicer these days. I'm glad you believed in it enough to give it a go._Besides, I'm happy to see you flourishing rather than working for Otto Canton.
trans-unit.target: 白灰港这些天看起来好多了。我很高兴你对此深信不疑，决定尝试一下_此外，我很高兴看到你蓬勃发展，而不是为奥托·坎顿工作。

trans-unit.source: He is a great chef, but his drive and attitude have burned out more aspiring chefs than I can remember._Anyways, I confess that I have to ask you for another favor._Can you meet me tonight at the Peony Bathhouse?
trans-unit.target: 他是一位伟大的厨师，但他的干劲和态度让我记忆中有抱负的厨师们精疲力竭_不管怎样，我承认我必须请你再帮我一个忙_今晚你能在牡丹馆见我吗？

trans-unit.source: The haunted place up on the hill?!
trans-unit.target: 山上闹鬼的地方？！

trans-unit.source: Chef Casteau, why do you want to meet up there?
trans-unit.target: Casteau厨师，你为什么想在上面见面？

trans-unit.source: Haunted eh? Perhaps I've been gone for too long . . . It's an old and storied building. Have ghosts taken over the place?
trans-unit.target: 闹鬼？也许我离开太久了。这是一座历史悠久的建筑。鬼魂已经占据了这个地方吗？

trans-unit.source: It's the other reason why I came to White Ash Harbor. I will tell you more later.
trans-unit.target: 这也是我来到白灰港的另一个原因。稍后我会告诉你更多。

trans-unit.source: Please come alone and do not mention it to anyone. I know it's an odd ask, but I promise it will be worth it.
trans-unit.target: 请独自前来，不要向任何人提及此事。我知道这是一个奇怪的要求，但我保证这是值得的。

trans-unit.source: Whoooooo, goes there?
trans-unit.target: 哇，去那里吗？

trans-unit.source: (playername), chef of Le Sequoia.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，Le Sequoia厨师。

trans-unit.source: Are you a ghost?
trans-unit.target: 你是鬼吗？

trans-unit.source: Name's Nadjet, and if you know what's good for ya, you better not mouth off when we head inside._I work for Aylin, the owner of the bathhouse, and if you bug her at all, I will not hesitate to break your fingers. Comprende?
trans-unit.target: 我叫Nadjet，如果你知道什么对你有好处，我们进去的时候你最好不要说出口_我为澡堂的老板Aylin工作，如果你打扰她，我会毫不犹豫地打断你的手指。组成？

trans-unit.source: The boss is waiting for you inside. Mind your hands and take nothing. We don't call the cops around here.
trans-unit.target: 老板在里面等你。小心你的手，什么都不要拿。我们这里不叫警察。

trans-unit.source: The main floor looks nicer, but it isn't all cleaned up yet. Some sheets still lie over some of the furniture while a few pieces are entirely uncovered._Welcome to the Peony Bathhouse. Don't track any dirt inside. Follow me upstairs.
trans-unit.target: 主楼看起来不错，但还没有全部打扫干净。一些家具上还铺着一些床单，而几件家具则完全暴露在外_欢迎来到牡丹浴室。不要在里面发现任何污垢。跟我上楼。

trans-unit.source: Boss, our visitor has arrived.
trans-unit.target: 老板，我们的客人来了。

trans-unit.source: (playername), you came! Sit, please. Have some tea. Allow me to introduce you to Aylin. The owner of the Peony Bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 你来了！请坐。喝点茶。请允许我把你介绍给艾林。牡丹浴室的主人。

trans-unit.source: A pleasure to meet you, (playername)._Has Vincent told you why you were invited to this abandoned bathhouse in the middle of the night?
trans-unit.target: 很高兴见到你，(playername)_文森特有没有告诉过你为什么半夜被邀请到这个废弃的浴室？

trans-unit.source: I trust him to know that it would be something important.
trans-unit.target: 我相信他知道这将是一件重要的事情。

trans-unit.source: Not at all.
trans-unit.target: 一点也不。

trans-unit.source: Vincent is indeed trustworthy, and I am glad that he kept the contents of this meeting a secret.
trans-unit.target: 文森特确实值得信赖，我很高兴他对这次会议的内容保密。

trans-unit.source: Good. I want to keep the contents of this meeting a secret for now.
trans-unit.target: 很好。我想暂时对这次会议的内容保密。

trans-unit.source: I've known Aylin for a very long time. She was the first investor in Le Sequoia._Even though she's a friend, she took a chance on me, and for that I must repay the kindness.
trans-unit.target: 我认识艾林很久了。她是Le Sequoia的第一位投资者_尽管她是我的朋友，但她还是给了我一个机会，为此，我必须报答她的好意。

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, I am too old and frail. But I have enough trust in you that you will be able to rise up the challenge._So (playername), would you be willing to help out Aylin in my place?
trans-unit.target: 不幸的是，我太老了，太虚弱了。但我对你有足够的信任，你一定能迎接挑战_那么(playername)，你愿意代替我帮助艾林吗？

trans-unit.source: Bring it on!
trans-unit.target: 放马过来

trans-unit.source: A friend of yours is a friend of mine chef.
trans-unit.target: 你的一个朋友是我厨师的朋友。

trans-unit.source: Ho ho ho that's the spirit! Well Aylin, it looks like my student is eager to help. I'll let you explain the situation then.
trans-unit.target: 呵呵，这就是精神！艾林，看来我的学生很乐意帮忙。那我让你解释一下情况。

trans-unit.source: I am grateful (playername)._Aylin has done a lot for me, and it is with great sadness that I am unable to help her on my own._We'll Aylin, I'll leave it to you then.
trans-unit.target: 我很感激(playername)_Aylin为我做了很多，我非常难过地无法独自帮助她_我们叫艾林，那就交给你了。

trans-unit.source: As you have seen (playername), the bathhouse has been abandoned for a long time._It used to be the main draw of White Ash Harbor. People from all over the world would visit and enjoy these sulfur baths.
trans-unit.target: 正如你所看到的(playername)，澡堂已经废弃了很长时间_它曾经是白灰港的主要景点。来自世界各地的人们将参观并享受这些硫磺浴。

trans-unit.source: Now that its empty, White Ash Harbor has really felt the impact and has been struggling._As you may have guessed, we wish to reopen the bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 现在它空了，白灰港真的感受到了影响，一直在挣扎_如您所料，我们希望重新开放澡堂。

trans-unit.source: Why now?
trans-unit.target: 为什么是现在？

trans-unit.source: I suppose you will need my help?
trans-unit.target: 我想你需要我的帮助吧？

trans-unit.source: There is another important component of this bathhouse: the Teahouse._After a hot bath, guests love to refresh themselves by enjoying a nice beverage or a delicious meal.
trans-unit.target: 这个澡堂还有另一个重要组成部分：茶馆_洗完热水澡后，客人喜欢通过享用一杯美味的饮料或一顿美味的饭菜来提神。

trans-unit.source: Indeed. An important component of the Bathhouse's success was the Teahouse._Guests would often partake in some afternoon tea and desserts after enjoying their bath.
trans-unit.target: 的确。茶馆是澡堂成功的一个重要组成部分_客人洗完澡后，经常会喝一些下午茶和甜点。

trans-unit.source: Your efforts in reviving Le Sequoia have been quite successful._And I believe you would make an excellent candidate to manage the Teahouse. Previously, there was no one else who could do it.
trans-unit.target: 你重振红杉的努力非常成功_我相信你会成为管理茶馆的优秀人选。以前，没有其他人能做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: Before I can hand over such an important part of this operation, we will need some help with getting the bathhouse up and running._If you can assist with our rebuilding efforts, I would be more comfortable with you taking over Teahouse.
trans-unit.target: 在我移交这项行动的重要部分之前，我们需要一些帮助来启动和运行澡堂_如果你能协助我们的重建工作，我会更愿意你接管茶馆。

trans-unit.source: I've done work that isn't in a kitchen. I can help out.
trans-unit.target: 我做过不在厨房里的工作。我可以帮忙。

trans-unit.source: You don't trust me yet?
trans-unit.target: 你还不相信我？

trans-unit.source: . . . That's good to hear. I look forward to your full effort. It will be worth it, I promise.
trans-unit.target: . . . 很高兴听到这个消息。我期待着你的全力。这将是值得的，我保证。

trans-unit.source: Trust and belief are two very different things. I believe that you have abilities that are useful to this town and myself._Trust requires time. I will need to know that you have what it takes to uphold the reputation of this establishment.
trans-unit.target: 信任和信念是两回事。我相信你的能力对这个城市和我自己都有用_信任需要时间。我需要知道，你有能力维护这个机构的声誉。

trans-unit.source: Nadjet can give you the list of items we need assistance with to open the bathhouse._It is getting late. Do you have any other questions, (playername)?
trans-unit.target: Nadjet可以给你一份我们需要帮助打开澡堂的物品清单_天色已晚。你还有其他问题吗？

trans-unit.source: Why did you shutter the bathhouse in the first place?
trans-unit.target: 你当初为什么把澡堂关上？

trans-unit.source: I do not have any more questions.
trans-unit.target: 我没有其他问题了。

trans-unit.source: That is the one topic I am not going to discuss at this time._Perhaps one day . . . when I feel a greater trust towards you.
trans-unit.target: 这是我目前不打算讨论的一个话题_也许有一天。当我对你有了更大的信任。

trans-unit.source: Good! We shall part ways for now then. I have other matters to attend to.
trans-unit.target: 好！那我们暂时分道扬镳。我还有其他事情要处理。

trans-unit.source: Thank you for joining us this evening, (playername). Discretion is key during this phase of the bathhouse's revitalization.
trans-unit.target: 感谢您今晚加入我们，(playername)。在澡堂复兴的这个阶段，谨慎是关键。

trans-unit.source: Do not mention what you are doing here with the people in town. I will give you the list of repairs we need to accomplish._Follow me downstairs. Deviate, and there will be bruising of some kind.
trans-unit.target: 别提你在这里和城里人做什么。我会给你我们需要完成的维修清单_跟我下楼。偏离正道，就会有某种瘀伤。

trans-unit.source: Nadjet, please, show a little civility.
trans-unit.target: Nadjet，请表现出一点礼貌。

trans-unit.source: Sorry Aylin. Follow me downstairs, please.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，艾林。请跟我下楼。

trans-unit.source: I'll come with you, (playername). I am a bit tired as well.
trans-unit.target: 我和你一起去。我也有点累。

trans-unit.source: We are going to need some items to help fix some of the old mechnical units._First, we will need a couple of copper pipes. I heard that there was a great engineer in town. Perhaps she can help.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要一些物品来帮助修理一些旧的机械装置_首先，我们需要几根铜管。我听说城里有一位伟大的工程师。也许她能帮忙。

trans-unit.source: Just make sure not to tell her what the pipes are used for. That will be all for now._I am going to bed. You know how to let yourselves out. I'll be seeing ya around.
trans-unit.target: 我也要去睡觉了；你知道如何释放自己。我们回头见。

trans-unit.source: I am going to bed as well; you know how to let yourselves out. I'll be seeing ya around.
trans-unit.target: 我也要去睡觉了；你知道如何释放自己。我们回头见。

trans-unit.source: They might not be the most amicable of crowds, but this task is important for revitalising this town.
trans-unit.target: 他们可能不是最友善的人群，但这项任务对振兴这个城镇很重要。

trans-unit.source: Do you know more about them chef?
trans-unit.target: 你对厨师了解更多吗？

trans-unit.source: They don't seem very polite.
trans-unit.target: 他们看起来不太礼貌。

trans-unit.source: I do. But their secrets are not mine to share. Perhaps they will tell you more when you get to know them better.
trans-unit.target: 我知道。但他们的秘密不是我可以分享的。也许当你更好地了解他们时，他们会告诉你更多。

trans-unit.source: Ho ho ho yes they can be blunt with their words, but they have been through a lot, and they have heart._At the end of the day, that is the most important, and why we should help them.
trans-unit.target: 呵呵，是的，他们可以直言不讳，但他们经历了很多，他们有心_归根结底，这是最重要的，也是我们为什么要帮助他们。

trans-unit.source: Truth be told, my pride is at fault here._I left for Billboard City to make a name for myself because it is the Mecca of food.
trans-unit.target: 说实话，我的骄傲是这里的错_我前往Billboard City是为了让自己出名，因为它是美食的圣地。

trans-unit.source: After everything she had done for me, I left this town, and her, behind._I shuttered Le Sequoia even though it was doing fine without me because I wanted to believe it couldn't run without me.
trans-unit.target: 在她为我所做的一切之后，我离开了这个小镇，还有她_我关闭了Le Sequoia，即使没有我它也做得很好，因为我想相信没有我它就无法运行。

trans-unit.source: When you get to my age, you find a lot of regrets to ponder over._The bathhouse, Le Sequoia, these two must exist to help White Ash Harbor thrive.
trans-unit.target: 当你到了我这个年纪，你会发现很多遗憾需要思考_这两家名为Le Sequoia的澡堂必须存在，才能帮助白灰港蓬勃发展。

trans-unit.source: That is why helping her is so important and why you shouldn't let your pride guide your way through this life._You are doing better than me, (playername), and that's all I've ever wanted._Goodnight (playername).
trans-unit.target: 这就是为什么帮助她如此重要，也就是为什么你不应该让你的骄傲来指引你的人生_你做得比我好，(playername)，这就是我一直想要的_晚安。

trans-unit.source: Hello (playername). The town is looking livelier now, no thanks to you._Unfortunately, more and more tourists are wandering through my shop, but tourists do not require my services.
trans-unit.target: 你好(playername)。多亏了你，这个城镇现在看起来更热闹了_不幸的是，越来越多的游客在我的商店闲逛，但游客不需要我的服务。

trans-unit.source: I must find a way to capitalize on this increased traffic. Got any ideas?
trans-unit.target: 我必须找到一种方法来利用这种增加的流量。有什么想法吗？

trans-unit.source: Maybe you can make and sell smart watches?
trans-unit.target: 也许你可以制造和销售智能手表？

trans-unit.source: I think you should sell beach clothes.
trans-unit.target: 我认为你应该卖沙滩装。

trans-unit.source: Hmmm . . . That's not a bad idea (playername)._A smart watch can tell time, provide navigation, predict the weather, maybe even . . . even diagnose diseases . . ._You've given me a lot to think about.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。这主意不错_智能手表可以报时、导航、预测天气，甚至。甚至诊断疾病_你给了我很多思考。

trans-unit.source: What do you take me for? Some ordinary shopgirl?_They are much greater things I can do with my time and skills.
trans-unit.target: 你以为我是什么？一个普通的女店员_它们是我可以用我的时间和技能做的更大的事情。

trans-unit.source: Now then, what was the reason for coming to see me today?_Huh, you need some copper pipes made? What will you use them for?
trans-unit.target: 那么，今天来看我的原因是什么_嗯，你需要做些铜管吗？你会用它们做什么？

trans-unit.source: It's a secret.
trans-unit.target: 这是个秘密。

trans-unit.source: I need some copper pipes to repair the bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 我需要一些铜管来修理澡堂。

trans-unit.source: You know what (playername), I do not like secrets being kept from me._But still . . . I can help you. For the right payment of course.
trans-unit.target: 你知道吗(playername)，我不喜欢别人瞒着我秘密。我可以帮你。当然是为了正确的付款。

trans-unit.source: The Bath . . . bathhouse? Is somebody planning on repairing that old thing?_About time. Fine, I can help you.
trans-unit.target: 洗澡。澡堂？有人打算修理那件旧东西吗_差不多了。好吧，我可以帮你。

trans-unit.source: I will need 5 Copper Ores, 5 Iron Ores, and let's say . . . 5 bottles of Vodka as payment._Let's go, chop chop.
trans-unit.target: 我需要5个铜矿，5个铁矿，假设。5瓶伏特加作为付款_我们走吧，砍砍。

trans-unit.source: Ah, it looks like you brought everything. Good._I will need some time to smelt these. Meet me at my shop tomorrow.
trans-unit.target: 啊，看起来你把所有东西都带来了。很好_我需要一些时间来闻闻这些。明天在我的商店见。

trans-unit.source: Hi Bianca.
trans-unit.target: 嗨，比安卡。

trans-unit.source: Hee . . . hee . . . hee
trans-unit.target: 嘿。嘿。嘻嘻

trans-unit.source: Oh good (playername) you are here . . . I'm assuming you are here for the . . . pipes? . . ._Let's see, where did I put them . . . Huh my memory is all fuzzzzy for some reason.
trans-unit.target: 哦，太好了(playername)你来了。我想你是来这里的。管道_让我想想，我把它们放在哪里了。不知什么原因，我的记忆力都很模糊。

trans-unit.source: And why do I . . . I have this headache . . . mussht the weather. Right the pipes! The . . . They're over here if I do remember.
trans-unit.target: 我为什么。我头疼。扰乱天气。正确的管道！这个。如果我记得的话，他们在这里。

trans-unit.source: Here you go. They weren't easy to make . . . Better put em to good use!
trans-unit.target: 干得好。他们不容易做。最好好好利用它们！

trans-unit.source: Ah good, you got the items? This will do for now. I will need to make some repairs today._Come back tomorrow and we can discuss the next order of business. I'll be off then.
trans-unit.target: 啊，太好了，你拿到东西了吗？这就够了。我今天需要修理一下_明天再来，我们可以讨论下一笔生意。那我就走了。

trans-unit.source: I Went For It
trans-unit.target: 我为此而去

trans-unit.source: Hi (playername). I did something crazy today. Remember when I mentioned there was a place for rent in Billboard City? Well . . . I took the leap and signed a lease.
trans-unit.target: 嗨(playername)。我今天做了件疯狂的事。还记得我提到Billboard City有一个出租的地方吗？嗯。我一跃而起，签了一份租约。

trans-unit.source: It's a shabby looking place, but it's mine! With some work, it could really become my culinary fortress one day. I'm calling my new restaurant Aurora Bistro!
trans-unit.target: 这是一个破旧的地方，但它是我的！只要稍加努力，它总有一天会成为我的烹饪堡垒。我打电话给我的新餐厅奥罗拉小酒馆！

trans-unit.source: It's exciting. It really is. But boy is it hard! I need to get a new kitchen done, hire staff, and create a new menu from scratch! When it's ready, you will come visit won't you?
trans-unit.target: 这太令人兴奋了。确实如此。但男孩，这很难！我需要完成一个新的厨房，雇佣员工，从头开始创建一个新菜单！当它准备好了，你会来拜访的，是吗？

trans-unit.source: 2302 - The Source of Aroma
trans-unit.target: 2302-香气的来源

trans-unit.source: Boss wants to see ya. Follow me.
trans-unit.target: 老板想见你。跟着我。

trans-unit.source: What's going on?
trans-unit.target: 发生什么事？

trans-unit.source: I don't have time right now.
trans-unit.target: 我现在没有时间。

trans-unit.source: You'll find out after you follow me.
trans-unit.target: 你跟着我就会知道的。

trans-unit.source: Oh, did ya think I was asking a question? Follow me, now.
trans-unit.target: 哦，你以为我在问问题吗？跟我来，现在。

trans-unit.source: I got 'em, boss. Picked (playername) up from our very doorsteps.
trans-unit.target: 我找到了，老板。从我们家门口的台阶上捡起来。

trans-unit.source: Thank you Nadjet.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你，Nadjet。

trans-unit.source: I'm not a sack of potatoes.
trans-unit.target: 我不是一袋土豆。

trans-unit.source: So, what's next on the to-do list?
trans-unit.target: 那么，待办事项清单上的下一步是什么？

trans-unit.source: I apologize about the tone my employee uses some of the time. She is curt, but a good person once you get to know her.
trans-unit.target: 我对我的员工有时使用的语气表示歉意。她很粗鲁，但一旦你了解她，她就是个好人。

trans-unit.source: I appreciate your eagerness (playername). I think we will do great work together.
trans-unit.target: 我很感激你的热心。我认为我们会一起做得很好。

trans-unit.source: I asked you here today because I need help in securing something important for the bathhouse._You see, the secret of the Peony baths were the complex mixture of ingredients we added to the water.
trans-unit.target: 我今天请你来这里是因为我需要帮助为澡堂弄到一些重要的东西_你看，牡丹浴的秘密是我们添加到水中的成分的复杂混合物。

trans-unit.source: One important ingredient is sulfur, specifically, sulfur from within the volcano._Without the sulfur, the baths won't be as rejuvenating.
trans-unit.target: 一个重要的成分是硫磺，特别是来自火山内部的硫磺_没有硫磺，沐浴就不会那么有活力。

trans-unit.source: Why not just buy the sulfur?
trans-unit.target: 为什么不直接购买硫磺呢？

trans-unit.source: So I just need to go into the volcano . . .
trans-unit.target: 所以我只需要进入火山。

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, the LELSH Corporation have stopped sulfur mining globally._Ever since the discovery of lab-produced Selenium, a sulpur replacement, the sulpur mines have been abandoned._Sulpur is hard to come by these days.
trans-unit.target: 不幸的是，LELSH 公司已经在全球范围内停止了硫磺开采。自从发现实验室生产的硫磺替代品硒以来，硫磺矿就被废弃了。现在硫磺很难获得。

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your understanding, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你的理解，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: The barricade to the volcano have recently been removed. You can now reach the old sulpur mines._Peony Bathhhouse's sulpur have always been locally sourced, but with my fragile mechanisms and Nadjet's fear of fire . . .
trans-unit.target: 火山的路障最近被拆除了。你现在可以到达老硫磺矿了_牡丹浴室的硫磺一直都是当地采购的，但由于我脆弱的机制和Nadjet对火灾的恐惧。

trans-unit.source: Hey! You said you wouldn't tell nobody!
trans-unit.target: 嘿！你说过你不会告诉任何人的！

trans-unit.source: Nadjet, do you want to go to the volcano and get the sulfur?
trans-unit.target: Nadjet，你想去火山取硫磺吗？

trans-unit.source: . . . I, but I . . .
I didn't think so. (playername), only you can gather the sulfur we need._After retrieving it, Nadjet will show you our secret of creating the perfect sulfur bath.
trans-unit.target: 我不这么认为。(playername)，只有你能收集我们需要的硫磺_取回后，Nadjet将向您展示我们创造完美硫浴的秘诀。

trans-unit.source: Okay, I'll get the sulfur, but how do I not die?
trans-unit.target: 好吧，我会得到硫磺，但我怎么能不死呢？

trans-unit.source: Isn't it really hot inside the volcano?
trans-unit.target: 火山内部真的很热吗？

trans-unit.source: Ah, well technology is quite amazing these days. LELSH have recently come out with these instant Ice Packs._Using one will give you temporary protection from the heat. I believe the local infirmary should sell them.
trans-unit.target: 啊，这些天技术真是太神奇了。LELSH最近推出了这些即时冰袋_使用一个可以暂时保护你免受高温。我认为当地医务室应该卖掉它们。

trans-unit.source: Yes, it is quite hot. You will need a great deal of heat resistance. You should buy a couple Instant Ice Packs from the local infirmary_Just pour one over your head and it will create a thermal layer that will protect you from the heat.
trans-unit.target: 是的，天气很热。你需要很强的耐热性。你应该从当地的医务室买几个速溶冰袋——只需把一个倒在你的头上，它就会形成一个隔热层，保护你免受高温。

trans-unit.source: Remember to use some heat resistance before entering the volcano._If you don't have any . . . well it won't be pretty. Be safe, (playername)! We really need that sulpur!
trans-unit.target: 进入火山前记得使用一些耐热性_如果你没有。好吧，这不会很漂亮。安全点，(playername)！我们真的需要硫磺！

trans-unit.source: Hi (playername). I have a lot of patients to help and medicine to deliver today. Please be quick.
trans-unit.target: 嗨(playername)。今天我有很多病人要帮助，也有很多药要送。请快点。

trans-unit.source: (playername) right? Le Sequoia is really helping to liven up the town._You don't happen to serve blood pudding do you? . . . Ah well, that's unfortunate._Anyways, what can I help you with?
trans-unit.target: (playername)对吗？Le Sequoia确实在为这座城市注入活力_你不会碰巧提供血布丁吧。啊，那太不幸了_不管怎样，我能帮你什么吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm heading into the volcano.
trans-unit.target: 我要去火山。

trans-unit.source: I heard you sell Instant Ice Packs.
trans-unit.target: 我听说你们卖速溶冰袋。

trans-unit.source: You . . . you are doing WHAT? I swear, I am not dragging your melted corpse back into my clinic!_If you are going to go do something so crazy, you better have a TON of heat protection.
trans-unit.target: 你。你在做什么？我发誓，我不会把你融化的尸体拖回我的诊所_如果你要去做这么疯狂的事情，你最好有一吨隔热材料。

trans-unit.source: Yes . . . I do have a few lying around. They are industrial-grade, and not meant for everyday use._Why do you . . . Nevermind. I don't want to know.
trans-unit.target: 是的。我确实有几个躺在那里。它们是工业级的，不适合日常使用_你为什么。没有关系。我不想知道。

trans-unit.source: I can sell you some Instant Ice Packs, but they aren't cheap._I can offer 5 of them for a discount . . . so a total of 2000 Credits.
trans-unit.target: 我可以卖给你一些速溶冰袋，但它们不便宜_我可以提供5个折扣。所以总共2000信用点。

trans-unit.source: It's expensive, but . . . alright. I'll take them.
trans-unit.target: 它很贵，但是。好吧。我来拿。

trans-unit.source: 2000 Credits is too expensive for me.
trans-unit.target: 2000信用点对我来说太贵了。

trans-unit.source: Here you go. Just don't accidentally open one. These ain't cheap._If you run out, I have more in stock. But I can't give you any more discounts I'm afraid._Running a clinic isn't cheap. Now off you go. I have more patients to help!
trans-unit.target: 干得好。只是不要不小心打开一个。这些不便宜_如果你用完了，我有更多的库存。但恐怕我不能再给你折扣了_经营一家诊所并不便宜。现在你走吧。我有更多的病人需要帮助！

trans-unit.source: I understand. Well, come back if you have more Credits.
trans-unit.target: 我理解。好吧，如果你有更多信用点，就回来吧。

trans-unit.source: Oh, the sulfur has a stink to it. Pahhhhh! Let's get it over to the processor.
trans-unit.target: 哦，硫磺有臭味！让我们把它交给处理器。

trans-unit.source: So here we are (playername). I will share to you the secret of creating a great bathing experience._Here at the Peony bathhouse, we have developed a new system for giving baths a great aroma.
trans-unit.target: 所以我们到了(playername)。我将与您分享创造美好沐浴体验的秘诀_在牡丹澡堂，我们开发了一种新的系统，可以让浴室散发出浓郁的香气。

trans-unit.source: Using sulfur, and a couple fragrant ingredients, we create highly condensed aroma cubes called Bath Bloks._These Bath Bloks are then fed into the main bathing area to give each bath unique qualities.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用硫磺和一些芳香成分，创造出高度浓缩的芳香立方体，称为Bath Bloks_这些沐浴露随后被送入主沐浴区，为每个沐浴区赋予独特的品质。

trans-unit.source: I'll give you a couple ingredients to start. Give the machine a whirl and see what kind of Blok you create.
trans-unit.target: 我先给你一些配料。旋转一下机器，看看你创造了什么样的Blok。

trans-unit.source: Not bad, but with some practice, you can create higher quality Bloks._Depending on what ingredients you mix, bath blocks will have different qualities.
trans-unit.target: 不错，但通过一些练习，你可以创造出更高质量的衬衫_根据你混合的成分，沐浴露的质量会有所不同。

trans-unit.source: You should have received some Peony Tickets. Once the bathhouse is open, you can trade these in for unique items._The higher quality the Blok, the more tickets you will receive.
trans-unit.target: 你应该已经收到一些牡丹票了。澡堂开放后，您可以用这些物品换取独特的物品_Blok的质量越高，您收到的门票就越多。

trans-unit.source: Bathing in the baths will give health benefits, depending on the type of Blok used._Since the bathhouse is closed, we won't be able to use the baths yet.
trans-unit.target: 在浴缸里洗澡会对健康有益，具体取决于所使用的Blok类型_由于澡堂已经关闭，我们还不能使用浴室。

trans-unit.source: Sit tight, because we are going need a lot more Bath Bloks for the grand opening and beyond!_For now, we have a lot more work left to get the bathhouse ready.
trans-unit.target: 请坐，因为我们需要更多的沐浴露来迎接盛大的开幕式及以后_目前，我们还有很多工作要做，把澡堂准备好。

trans-unit.source: 2303 - Teahouse Soft Opening
trans-unit.target: 2303-茶馆软开门

trans-unit.source: Whoa! Look at that.
trans-unit.target: 哇！你看。

trans-unit.source: What is going on here?
trans-unit.target: 这里发生了什么事？

trans-unit.source: Would you look at that gramps? It's . . . it's real.
trans-unit.target: 你能看看那张照片吗？这是。这是真的。

trans-unit.source: Oh . . . My . . . God . . .
trans-unit.target: 哦。我的。天啊。

trans-unit.source: The Bathhouse is reopening?
trans-unit.target: 澡堂要重新开放了吗？

trans-unit.source: C'mon folks. Keep moving. This is a construction site!
trans-unit.target: 来吧，伙计们。继续走。这是一个建筑工地！

trans-unit.source: Huh. Can I have a break?
trans-unit.target: 呵呵。我能休息一下吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm going to have a whale of a time in there.
trans-unit.target: 我打算在那里度过一段美好的时光。

trans-unit.source: My . . . my . . . This brings back memories . . .
trans-unit.target: 我的。我的。这唤起了人们的回忆。

trans-unit.source: C'mon, let's go. Move it!
trans-unit.target: 来吧，我们走。快！

trans-unit.source: Oh good (playername). As you can see, renovations are under way._The town is buzzing today. It seems everyone is excited about a potential reopening.
trans-unit.target: 哦，太好了。正如你所看到的，装修正在进行中_今天这个城镇很热闹。似乎每个人都对重新开放的可能性感到兴奋。

trans-unit.source: Come, Aylin wishes to discuss the next order of business inside.
trans-unit.target: 来吧，艾林想在里面讨论下一个订单。

trans-unit.source: Ah (playername). Thank you for assisting with the various tasks to prepare for the bathhouse opening.
trans-unit.target: 啊(playername)。感谢您协助我们为澡堂开业做准备。

trans-unit.source: As you can see, renovations are under way._This bathhouse needs to look as beautiful as it did on the day it first opened, if we want this reopening to be a success.
trans-unit.target: 正如你所看到的，装修正在进行中_如果我们想让这次重新开放取得成功，这个澡堂需要看起来和它第一次开放时一样漂亮。

trans-unit.source: Although you have helped been of great help, there is something else I will need._It is an important step if I am to entrust the Teahouse to you to manage.
trans-unit.target: 虽然你帮了大忙，但我还需要别的东西_如果我把茶馆委托给你管理，这是重要的一步。

trans-unit.source: Anything you need Aylin.
trans-unit.target: 你需要什么，艾林。

trans-unit.source: Haven't I proved my trustworthiness?
trans-unit.target: 我没有证明我的可信度吗？

trans-unit.source: That is what I like to hear. I think this will be a great partnership.
trans-unit.target: 这就是我喜欢听到的。我认为这将是一个伟大的伙伴关系。

trans-unit.source: Managing the Teahouse is no trifle and I require someone I trust deeply to share this important part of my establishment with._If you cannot appreciate this, then perhaps you should go your seperate way.
trans-unit.target: 管理茶馆绝非易事，我需要一个我非常信任的人与我分享这一重要部分_如果你不能欣赏这一点，那么也许你应该分道扬镳。

trans-unit.source: Now then, I will need a mature and capable leader to manage the teahouse._You may have had a few successful services, but I require a chef with a reputation of excellence and consistency.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我需要一个成熟而有能力的领导者来管理茶馆_你可能有过一些成功的服务，但我需要一位以卓越和始终如一而闻名的厨师。

trans-unit.source: This renovation will take some time. Once you have reached a level of reputation I am content with, I will give you the teahouse.
trans-unit.target: 这次翻修需要一些时间。一旦你达到我满意的声誉水平，我就把茶馆给你。

trans-unit.source: Hi (playername). It looks like you did it. The Teahouse is yours. Why don't you go in and take a look?
trans-unit.target: 嗨(playername)。看起来是你干的。茶馆是你的。你为什么不进去看看呢？

trans-unit.source: The next order of business is to prepare a soft opening for the staff, and some locals, so that we can gauge the customer experience._You may start preparing the Teahouse and open when you are ready.
trans-unit.target: 下一步的业务是为员工和一些当地人准备一个软开放，这样我们就可以衡量客户体验_你可以开始准备茶馆，准备好后就开门。

trans-unit.source: I won't let you down, Aylin.
trans-unit.target: 我不会让你失望的，艾林。

trans-unit.source: Do you have any suggestions for me?
trans-unit.target: 你对我有什么建议吗？

trans-unit.source: Good. This grand opening has to be perfect. Let's put in our best effort.
trans-unit.target: 很好。这个盛大的开幕式必须完美。让我们尽最大努力。

trans-unit.source: Customer experience is everything. Think about what this means (playername)._What would you like to experience, if you were a guest at this Bathhouse?_That is the most important advice I can give. The rest is up to you.
trans-unit.target: 客户体验就是一切。想想这意味着什么(playername)_如果你是这家澡堂的客人，你想体验什么_这是我能给出的最重要的建议。剩下的取决于你。

trans-unit.source: (playername), so what's going on here now?
trans-unit.target: (playername)，那么现在这里发生了什么？

trans-unit.source: I'm working . . . that's what's happening right now.
trans-unit.target: 我在工作。这就是现在发生的事情。

trans-unit.source: I'm setting up my new restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 我正在筹建我的新餐厅。

trans-unit.source: I get that dummy, I get that you're working. Duh, I got eyes.
trans-unit.target: 我明白了，我明白了你在工作。啊，我有眼睛。

trans-unit.source: Aylin handed it over huh? You must have earned her trust. Good for you._It's not easy for her you know? Giving away such an important part of her operation. It's like giving away her child . . . not that she a has a real child.
trans-unit.target: 艾林把它交了出来，是吗？你一定赢得了她的信任。对你有好处_这对她来说并不容易，你知道吗？放弃了她手术中如此重要的一部分。这就像放弃她的孩子。并不是说她有一个真正的孩子。

trans-unit.source: When are we gonna start packing in this place? Five, six months from now? A year?
trans-unit.target: 我们什么时候开始收拾行李？五、六个月后？一年？

trans-unit.source: We should do a soft opening first.
trans-unit.target: 我们应该先做一个软开放。

trans-unit.source: We need to test out the menu and see how it is first.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要先测试一下菜单，看看它怎么样。

trans-unit.source: A soft opening? That's a weird one. It will be more difficult to renovate the lobby if people are coming in and out . . but if the boss says it's necessary . . .
trans-unit.target: 软开放？这是一个奇怪的。如果人们进进出出，大厅的翻修将更加困难。但如果老板说有必要。

trans-unit.source: Ah, I get it! You need to test drive the car before you buy it.
trans-unit.target: 啊，我明白了！你买这辆车之前需要试驾一下。

trans-unit.source: Just make sure you don't let any weirdos in here. Boss wants to have the perfect grand opening, ya know?_She would flip out if people started messing up the decorations. Everything has been planned precisely . . . like clockwork.
trans-unit.target: 只要确保你不让任何怪人进来。老板希望有一个完美的盛大开幕，你知道吗_如果人们开始弄乱装饰品，她会大发雷霆的。一切都是精心策划的。像钟表一样。

trans-unit.source: Also, even though this is just a trial run, I wouldn't take this service lightly. Miss Aylin has high expectations._Failure to deliver will be . . . unpleasant. Anyways, I'll leave you to it.
trans-unit.target: 此外，即使这只是一次试运行，我也不会轻视这项服务。艾林小姐有很高的期望_未能交付将。不愉快。不管怎样，我会让你来处理。

trans-unit.source: Yes . . . Yes . . . I see where you are going with this.
trans-unit.target: 是的。是的。我明白你的意图。

trans-unit.source: Please serve me the (dish).
trans-unit.target: 请给我上菜。

trans-unit.source: This is quite . . . interesting.
trans-unit.target: 这太。有趣。

trans-unit.source: This may not be good enough for my precious Teahouse.
trans-unit.target: 这对我珍贵的茶馆来说可能还不够好。

trans-unit.source: This dish can still be improved . . . yes.
trans-unit.target: 这道菜还可以改进。对。

trans-unit.source: Well, it's a decent start I suppose . . .
trans-unit.target: 嗯，我想这是一个不错的开始。

trans-unit.source: Hey, this looks kinda good (playername).
trans-unit.target: 嘿，这看起来有点不错(playername)。

trans-unit.source: This one looks juicy. I'll take it. Better be quick!
trans-unit.target: 这个看起来很多汁。我接受。最好快点！

trans-unit.source: Oh yes. That hits the spot.
trans-unit.target: 哦，是的。这击中了要害。

trans-unit.source: This (dish) should be saltier . . .
trans-unit.target: 这(dishName)应该更咸。

trans-unit.source: Wish I had some hot sauce to go with this.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我有一些辣酱来搭配这个。

trans-unit.source: It's really coming together boss. I'll really excited about this.
trans-unit.target: 老板，真的要团结起来了。我会对此感到非常兴奋。

trans-unit.source: I like this feeling. It feels . . . cozy.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢这种感觉。感觉。舒适的。

trans-unit.source: I'll have this one, please.
trans-unit.target: 请给我这个。

trans-unit.source: This (dish) just warms me up.
trans-unit.target: 这(dishName)让我暖和起来。

trans-unit.source: This (dish) makes me feel at home.
trans-unit.target: 这道菜让我有宾至如归的感觉。

trans-unit.source: What great grub for the working man!
trans-unit.target: 对于工人来说，这是多么美味的食物啊！

trans-unit.source: I hope I can eat here for free . . . everyday.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我能在这里免费吃饭。每天。

trans-unit.source: Sick man.
trans-unit.target: 病人。

trans-unit.source: Oh, I'm definitely having this one.
trans-unit.target: 哦，我一定要吃这个。

trans-unit.source: Cheers folks! Pray to the food gods!
trans-unit.target: 干杯，伙计们！向食物之神祈祷！

trans-unit.source: Alright. This would go great with some beer.
trans-unit.target: 好吧。这和啤酒很配。

trans-unit.source: Whew I'm full. But I just can't stop.
trans-unit.target: 当我吃饱了。但我就是停不下来。

trans-unit.source: I'm definitely eating here every day.
trans-unit.target: 我肯定每天都在这里吃饭。

trans-unit.source: Oooohh, this is exciting!
trans-unit.target: 哦，这太令人兴奋了！

trans-unit.source: I . . . Uh . . . . I'll have this one! And this one!
trans-unit.target: 一、嗯我要这个！还有这个！

trans-unit.source: This reminds me of mom's cooking.
trans-unit.target: 这让我想起了妈妈的烹饪。

trans-unit.source: Yummy!
trans-unit.target: 好吃！

trans-unit.source: This texture is very . . . smooth. I like it.
trans-unit.target: 这种质地非常。光滑。我喜欢。

trans-unit.source: That was a great meal, right Nadjet?
trans-unit.target: 那顿饭真好吃，对吧，纳杰特？

trans-unit.source: Ah hello (playername).
trans-unit.target: 啊，你好(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Ah yes . . . this will do. Very promising.
trans-unit.target: 啊，是的。这就足够了。非常有希望。

trans-unit.source: Yes . . . I see what you did here.
trans-unit.target: 是的。我看到你在这里做了什么。

trans-unit.source: Fascinating. A great take on the (dish).
trans-unit.target: 迷人的。这道菜吃得很好。

trans-unit.source: The flavor profile is promising, but still room for improvement.
trans-unit.target: 风味特征很有希望，但仍有改进的空间。

trans-unit.source: You've come a long way (playername).
trans-unit.target: 你已经走了很长的路(playername)。

trans-unit.source: I cannot believe that I doubted you at all. What I experienced tonight was beyond anything that I have had in my lifetime._Vincent placed his trust in the right chef.
trans-unit.target: 我简直不敢相信我竟然怀疑你。今晚我所经历的是我一生中从未经历过的_文森特信任合适的厨师。

trans-unit.source: That was a great start (playername). With some improvements here and there, the Teahouse will become a guest favorite._Thank you Vincent, for recommending (playername).
trans-unit.target: (playername)，这是一个很好的开始。经过一些改进，茶馆将成为客人的最爱。_谢谢文森特推荐(playername)。

trans-unit.source: My experience here tonight was serviceable. The food was edible and the service was fast. I am okay with you serving this food here.
trans-unit.target: 我今晚在这里的经历很有用。食物可以吃，服务很快。我同意你在这里提供这种食物。

trans-unit.source: That could have gone better . . . . yes . . . much improvement is needed._(playername), this is simply not the standard for the Peony Bathhouse. You'd better get back to work.
