trans-unit.target: 这本来可以做得更好。是的。需要大量改进_(playername)，这根本不是牡丹浴室的标准。你最好回去工作。

trans-unit.source: That was simply horrendous. Is this how you run Le Sequoia? Seeing how far you have come, I think not._The grand opening isn't far. If this is how the grand opening turns out, there will be . . . repercussions . . .
trans-unit.target: 这简直太可怕了。这就是你经营Le Sequoia的方式吗？看你走了多远，我想不会_盛大的开幕式并不遥远。如果这就是盛大开幕的结果，那么将会有。影响。

trans-unit.source: Hey, you are alright (playername). That was some delicious grub. Maybe you can cook a private meal for me sometime huh?_Uhhhh . . . Joking boss! I'm joking of course!
trans-unit.target: 嘿，你没事(playername)。那真是美味的食物。也许你什么时候可以给我做一顿私人餐，嗯_嗯。开玩笑的老板！我当然是在开玩笑！

trans-unit.source: I never knew this could be food. If this is food, then what have I been eating my entire life?_I am questioning my food choices because what I ate here was delicious.
trans-unit.target: 我从来不知道这可能是食物。如果这是食物，那么我这一生都在吃什么_我质疑我的食物选择，因为我在这里吃的很好吃。

trans-unit.source: This was about as good as Gessepi's Spoon back in my old neighborhood. You could get oysters 24 hours a day._It was a good spot, better than your food today, but yours is close.
trans-unit.target: 这和我以前住的街区的Gessepi的勺子差不多好。你可以一天24小时吃牡蛎_这是一个好地方，比你今天的食物好，但你的食物很接近。

trans-unit.source: Listen to Aylin, (playername). We have to take this seriously if we want the grand opening to go well._Better get back to work.
trans-unit.target: 听艾林(playername)说。如果我们想让盛大的开幕式顺利进行，我们必须认真对待这一点_最好回去工作。

trans-unit.source: Miss Aylin forbade my from using physical violence. I . . . I think it's made me a better person._But it doesn't stop me from using my imagination.
trans-unit.target: 艾林小姐禁止我使用身体暴力。一、我认为这让我成为了一个更好的人_但这并不能阻止我发挥想象力。

trans-unit.source: Fantastic work (playername). I'm proud of how far you have come. I truly am. But don't get distracted!_Our main purpose is to create delicious food for guests to enjoy. That means the grand opening. That's where it counts.
trans-unit.target: 出色的工作(playername)。我为你取得的成就感到骄傲。我确实如此。但不要分心_我们的主要目的是为客人创造美味的食物。这意味着盛大的开幕式。这才是关键所在。

trans-unit.source: The time at the academy wasn't wasted no? You've come a long way (playername)._The mark of a good chef is their ability to adapt to different situations, and different ingredients.
trans-unit.target: 在学院的时间没有浪费，不是吗？你已经走了很长的路(playername)_一个好厨师的标志是他们适应不同情况和不同食材的能力。

trans-unit.source: It was a good start (playername). Some tweaks in the menu here and there, and the Teahouse could become a popular spot indeed.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个好的开始(playername)。这里和那里的菜单进行了一些调整，茶馆确实可能成为一个受欢迎的地方。

trans-unit.source: Ho ho, it's alright (playername). It wasn't smooth sailing at the academy either, but you managed to overcome difficult challenges._I have confidence that you can turn it around for the grand opening.
trans-unit.target: 呵呵，没关系。在学院里也不是一帆风顺的，但你设法克服了困难的挑战_我相信你能在盛大的开幕式上扭转局面。

trans-unit.source: It wasn't good (playername). That's the truth. But that's ok. Remember what I said (playername)?_Finding your signature takes a long road of failures to achieve. If you are the chef I know you to be, you can fix this.
trans-unit.target: 情况不太好。这是事实。但没关系。还记得我说的话吗(playername)_找到你的签名需要经历漫长的失败之路。如果你是我认识的厨师，你可以解决这个问题。

trans-unit.source: The grand opening isn't far off. We still have a few things to fix around bathhouse, but (playername), you should focus on the Teahouse._Before we go, anything else you need to know?
trans-unit.target: 盛大的开业已经不远了。我们在澡堂周围还有一些东西要修，但是(playername)，你应该把注意力放在茶馆上_在我们走之前，你还有什么需要知道的吗？

trans-unit.source: Why is reopening the Bathhouse so important to you?
trans-unit.target: 为什么重新开放澡堂对你来说如此重要？

trans-unit.source: What was the Bathhouse like . . . before?
trans-unit.target: 澡堂是什么样子的。以前？

trans-unit.source: It was a duty passed down to me from a previous generation. The Bathhouse fulfills an important role in White Ash harbor.
trans-unit.target: 这是上一代人传给我的责任。澡堂在白灰港扮演着重要的角色。

trans-unit.source: It was wonderful. People from all around the world came to visit. When it closed, the town lost a part of its soul.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了。来自世界各地的人们前来参观。当它关闭时，这座城镇失去了一部分灵魂。

trans-unit.source: Fishing is what made this town, tourism helped it grow, but the Peony Bathhouse is what held it all together._It was the sinew of White Ash Harbor because it's where people come to relax, chat, and know one another.
trans-unit.target: 钓鱼造就了这个小镇，旅游业帮助了它的发展，但牡丹浴室是把它团结在一起的_它是白灰港的支柱，因为人们来这里放松、聊天和相互了解。

trans-unit.source: Human beings are . . . complicated._People are isolated more than ever, and they aren't talking with one another, instead they're talking at each other.
trans-unit.target: 人类是。复杂_人们比以往任何时候都更加孤立，他们彼此之间没有交谈，而是在互相交谈。

trans-unit.source: A lack of connection kills a community, and I will no longer sit by and watch this town die a slow death._This is why we must reopen because if White Ash Harbor is to have a future.
trans-unit.target: 缺乏联系会杀死一个社区，我不会再坐视这个城镇慢慢死去_这就是为什么我们必须重新开放，因为白灰港要有未来。

trans-unit.source: Now then, we all have our jobs to do. It will be hard, but if we succeed, we can deliver something truly special to our guests._Najdet, help Vincent back to the hotel. He's having some . . . pains today.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们都有自己的工作要做。这将很难，但如果我们成功了，我们可以为客人提供真正特别的东西_Najdet，帮文森特回酒店。他正在吃。今天疼痛。

trans-unit.source: Will do boss. Come, Chef Casteau, this way.
trans-unit.target: 将做老板。过来，卡斯托厨师，这边走。

trans-unit.source: Thank you dear._Oh . . . I can't wait . . . The reopening of Peony Bathhouse. Never thought I'd see it . . .
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你，亲爱的_哦。我等不及了。牡丹浴室重新开放。从没想过我会看到它。

trans-unit.source: 2304 - Danger at the Eleventh Hour
trans-unit.target: 2304-第十一个小时的危险

trans-unit.source: Can we talk? In private.
trans-unit.target: 我们能聊聊吗？私下里。

trans-unit.source: Good day to you too, Nadjet.
trans-unit.target: 我也祝你今天过得愉快，Nadjet。

trans-unit.source: Uhhhhh, why?
trans-unit.target: 啊，为什么？

trans-unit.source: Yeah, nice day, birds flyin.
trans-unit.target: 是啊，天气不错，鸟儿飞来飞去。

trans-unit.source: I need a solid. Please?
trans-unit.target: 我需要一个固体。拜托？

trans-unit.source: Let's go somewhere private and talk.
trans-unit.target: 我们去个私密的地方谈谈吧。

trans-unit.source: Whew, this'll be easier in private, you see, I got a problem and I need help with it. I know, I know, this isn't like me, but I got nowhere else to go.
trans-unit.target: 呼，私下里会更容易，你看，我有个问题，我需要帮助。我知道，我知道，这不像我，但我别无选择。

trans-unit.source: You see . . . before I worked for Aylin . . ._. . . I worked for the Colombo crime family out of Billboard City.
trans-unit.target: 你看。在我为Aylin工作之前。我在Billboard City的科伦坡犯罪家族工作。

trans-unit.source: You worked for the mob?!
trans-unit.target: 你为暴徒工作？！

trans-unit.source: I never inferred this from your demeanor and stories.
trans-unit.target: 我从来没有从你的举止和故事中推断出这一点。

trans-unit.source: Yeah, I did. It was a long time ago.
trans-unit.target: 是的，我做了。那是很久以前的事了。

trans-unit.source: What can I say? I'm a good actor. Subtly, that's me.
trans-unit.target: 我能说什么呢？我是个好演员。微妙地说，那就是我。

trans-unit.source: Anyway, I was in town yesterday getting some groceries and . . . I was caught by Damien, one of the heads of the family.
trans-unit.target: 不管怎样，我昨天在城里买了些杂货，然后。我被一家之主达米安抓住了。

trans-unit.source: You see, two years ago, the family had sent me to steal the deed to the bathhouse, since it was abandoned and all._I . . . I was in a different place in my life. I had no one, and nowhere to go, so I obliged. I . . . just wanted a home.
trans-unit.target: 你看，两年前，这家人派我去偷澡堂的契约，因为它已经被遗弃了_一、我在我生命中的另一个地方。我没有人，也没有地方可去，所以我只好去了。一、只是想要一个家。

trans-unit.source: But when I arrived at the abandoned bathhouse, I . . . met Aylin._There was . . . something about her. Someone who is scary . . . but deep down very kind, you know? She thought I was just some street kid and took me in.
trans-unit.target: 但当我到达废弃的澡堂时，我。遇见了艾林_有。关于她的一些事情。一个可怕的人。但内心深处很善良，你知道吗？她以为我只是个流浪儿，就收留了我。

trans-unit.source: Even though I had just met her, I . . . felt like I finally had a home. I . . . never told her what I was doing here._I made sure that the family received a message, informing them that I had died in an accident.
trans-unit.target: 尽管我刚刚认识她，但我。感觉我终于有了家。一、我从未告诉她我在这里做什么_我确保家人收到一条消息，通知他们我在一次事故中丧生。

trans-unit.source: Now my problem is me being dead is now, well, dead. Damien caught me._He told me that . . . that if I didn't steal the deed to the bathhouse and go back with him . . ._He's going to tell the Aylin about my past!
trans-unit.target: 现在我的问题是，我死了，好吧，死了。达米安抓住了我。他告诉我。如果我不偷澡堂的契约和他一起回去_他要把我的过去告诉艾林家！

trans-unit.source: Intriguing story, but what is it that you need from me?
trans-unit.target: 有趣的故事，但你需要我做什么？

trans-unit.source: What can I do to help?
trans-unit.target: 我能帮上什么忙？

trans-unit.source: I'm getting to that part! This story needs context!
trans-unit.target: 我要到那一部分了！这个故事需要背景！

trans-unit.source: Good of you to offer!
trans-unit.target: 很高兴你能提供！

trans-unit.source: Anyway, Damien's a foodie. He only dines in restaurants run by great chefs . . ._You picking up what I'm putting down? I figure I can bribe him with a fancy dinner made by ya._Hopefully I can smooth things over with a great dinner.
trans-unit.target: 不管怎样，达米恩是个美食家。他只在名厨经营的餐馆吃饭_你捡起我放下的东西了吗？我想我可以用你做的丰盛晚餐贿赂他_希望我能用一顿丰盛的晚餐把事情平息下来。

trans-unit.source: I see, and what if I don't do this?
trans-unit.target: 我明白了，如果我不这样做呢？

trans-unit.source: One time, and he's gone, right?
trans-unit.target: 有一次，他走了，对吧？

trans-unit.source: Do you want this town overrun by the mob? No? Then guess what, buttercup? Ya gonna cook for the man.
trans-unit.target: 你想让这个城镇被暴徒占领吗？不？那你猜怎么着，毛茛？你要给那个人做饭。

trans-unit.source: I'm sure of it. He may be pissed at me, but this will work.
trans-unit.target: 我敢肯定。他可能会生我的气，但这会奏效的。

trans-unit.source: I have him coming to Le Sequoia tonight. Already got it set up._Once he's had something that knocks his socks off, he'll leave.
trans-unit.target: 我让他今晚来勒红杉。已经设置好了_一旦他吃了什么让他大吃一惊的东西，他就会离开。

trans-unit.source: You volunteered my restaurant without even asking?!!
trans-unit.target: 你甚至不问就主动来我的餐厅？！！

trans-unit.source: I'll make him a great meal. Don't have a choice, do I?
trans-unit.target: 我会给他做一顿丰盛的饭。我别无选择，是吗？

trans-unit.source: Hey! Don't shout. It will be fine. I promise. If anything happens, I . . . I can take care of it. Thanks for this. Please go get Le Sequoia ready. I'll see ya soon.
trans-unit.target: 嘿！不要大喊大叫。一切都会好起来的。我保证。如果发生什么事，我。我可以处理。谢谢你。请去把勒红杉准备好。我很快就会见到你。

trans-unit.source: Thanks for this. Please prepare Le Sequoia. I'll see ya soon.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你。请准备好乐红杉。我很快就会见到你。

trans-unit.source: They should be here soon.
trans-unit.target: 他们应该很快就会到。

trans-unit.source: Damien, this is (playername). (playername), Damien.
trans-unit.target: 达米安，这是(playername)。达米安。

trans-unit.source: I've been promised a meal that will be so good that I will forget the lies spilled by Nadjet._It isn't easy to forget such a breach in trust, so I am intrigued by what I am going to eat here tonight.
trans-unit.target: 有人答应过我一顿饭会很好吃，我会忘记Nadjet撒的谎_很难忘记这种背信弃义的行为，所以我很好奇今晚我要在这里吃什么。

trans-unit.source: Le Sequoia huh? I've heard about this place.
trans-unit.target: 红杉？我听说过这个地方。

trans-unit.source: Commence.
trans-unit.target: 开始。

trans-unit.source: Yes, this isn't bad I suppose.
trans-unit.target: 是的，我想这还不错。

trans-unit.source: Hmmmm . . . interesting. I think I've tasted this before . . .
trans-unit.target: 嗯。有趣。我想我以前尝过这个。

trans-unit.source: This tastes . . . familiar.
trans-unit.target: 这味道。熟悉。

trans-unit.source: Let's speak outside. C'mon Nadjet.
trans-unit.target: 我们到外面谈谈吧。来吧，Nadjet。

trans-unit.source: Pretty nice in here, right Damien?
trans-unit.target: 这里很不错，对吧，达米安？

trans-unit.source: I recommend this. Looks great huh?
trans-unit.target: 我推荐这个。看起来不错吧？

trans-unit.source: So . . . eh . . . about that task you asked of me . . .
trans-unit.target: 所以。呃。关于你要求我完成的任务。

trans-unit.source: I don't think the bathhouse will be useful for you.
trans-unit.target: 我认为澡堂对你没有用。

trans-unit.source: It's been a while Damien. Eh . . . how are your kids?
trans-unit.target: 达米安，好久不见了。呃。你的孩子怎么样？

trans-unit.source: Whew. Hope you guys enjoyed that! I sure did.
trans-unit.target: 呼。希望你们喜欢！我当然知道了。

trans-unit.source: Huh, I've seen better places in my back alleyway.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，我在后巷见过更好的地方。

trans-unit.source: This better be good. Or else!
trans-unit.target: 这最好是好的。否则！

trans-unit.source: Whoa, this is kinda go . . . uh gooey.
trans-unit.target: 哇，这有点。嗯，好的。

trans-unit.source: Hmmhhmm . . . Hmmnnhmmmm
trans-unit.target: 嗯。嗯

trans-unit.source: Is there more? I . . I mean . . . The portion was too small. Yeah!
trans-unit.target: 还有吗？一、我是说。这部分太小了。是 啊！

trans-unit.source: Not that good. Right boss?
trans-unit.target: 没那么好。对老板？

trans-unit.source: This ain't impressive, right boss?
trans-unit.target: 这并不令人印象深刻，对吧，老板？

trans-unit.source: Be quick about it.
trans-unit.target: 快点。

trans-unit.source: Got any hot sauce to go with this?
trans-unit.target: 有辣酱配这个吗？

trans-unit.source: Needs more cheese. LOTS of cheese.
trans-unit.target: 需要更多的奶酪。很多奶酪。

trans-unit.source: I guess this ain't bad.
trans-unit.target: 我想这还不错。

trans-unit.source: Not gonna lie. That was some good grub.
trans-unit.target: 我不会撒谎的。那真是美味的食物。

trans-unit.source: You are a great chef (playername), and it was a delicious meal. One of the best I've ever had._However Nadjet, the family never forgets. We came here for the deed, and we will not leave without it.
trans-unit.target: 你是一位出色的厨师，这顿饭非常美味。这是我吃过的最好的之一_然而，Nadjet一家永远不会忘记。我们来这里是为了契约，我们不会没有契约就离开的。

trans-unit.source: This was a memorable meal, thank you, but the family never forgets, Nadjet. You know this._You will acquire the deed for the bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 这是一顿难忘的饭，谢谢你，但家人永远不会忘记，Nadjet。你知道的_你将获得澡堂的地契。

trans-unit.source: So, Nadjet, I have humored you with this dinner, but it's time to be serious again._The deed to the Bathhouse was your mission. Get it, or your precious Aylin will know the reason you were originally here.
trans-unit.target: 所以，Nadjet，我已经用这顿饭逗乐了你，但现在是时候再次认真对待了_澡堂的契约是你的使命。得到它，否则你珍贵的Aylin会知道你最初来这里的原因。

trans-unit.source: So Nadjet, you bring me here for this stale meal. Did you think this was enough to forgive your sins?_No . . . not even close. Bring me the deed to the Bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: Nadjet，你带我来吃这顿不新鲜的饭。你认为这足以赦免你的罪吗_不。甚至没有接近。把澡堂的契约给我。

trans-unit.source: What? What is the meaning of this? Did you think feeding me this disgusting meal would make me forgive and forget?_Either you bring the deed, or we will pay Aylin a nice visit. Your choice.
trans-unit.target: 什么？这是什么意思？你以为喂我这顿恶心的饭会让我原谅和忘记吗_要么你把契约带来，要么我们去拜访艾林。你的选择。

trans-unit.source: Wait . . . no! I . . . I thought we could work something out? I can't do that to Aylin! Please.
trans-unit.target: 等等。不！一、我想我们能想出办法吗？我不能这样对艾林！拜托。

trans-unit.source: You will do what I tell you. When you have it, the family will forgive you for the betrayal, and we can go back to the city together._You can choose to come back to us, or have no home at all.
trans-unit.target: 你会照我说的做。当你拥有它时，家人会原谅你的背叛，我们可以一起回到城市_你可以选择回到我们这里，或者根本没有家。

trans-unit.source: No. You will do no such thing.
trans-unit.target: 不，你不会做这种事的。

trans-unit.source: Boss?!!
trans-unit.target: 老板？！！

trans-unit.source: Ah. You must be Aylin. I am . . .
trans-unit.target: 啊。你一定是艾林。我。

trans-unit.source: I don't actually care, I only care about one thing: That you leave here tonight and never return.
trans-unit.target: 我其实并不在乎，我只在乎一件事：你今晚离开这里，再也不回来了。

trans-unit.source: And why should we . . .
trans-unit.target: 我们为什么要。

trans-unit.source: Because if you don't, I will call the authorities and inform them that you were blackmailing Nadjet._That, plus the line of work you engage in, I'm sure would only lead to your extended stay in a prison cell.
trans-unit.target: 因为如果你不这样做，我会打电话给当局，告诉他们你在勒索Nadjet_再加上你从事的工作，我敢肯定，这只会让你在牢房里呆得更久。

trans-unit.source: Ha! Fine. We will leave. However . . . did your little girl tell you why we are here in the first place?
trans-unit.target: 哈！好的。我们要走了。然而。你的小女儿告诉你我们为什么来这里了吗？

trans-unit.source: I already know. She was sent here 2 years ago to steal the deed to the bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 我已经知道了。她两年前被派来这里偷澡堂的契约。

trans-unit.source: I always knew . . . Nadjet. But it didn't matter to me, what your past was. To me, you were a little girl who needed a home.
trans-unit.target: 我一直都知道。纳杰特。但对我来说，你的过去是什么并不重要。对我来说，你是一个需要家的小女孩。

trans-unit.source: . . ._Boss!!
Your gambit has failed and I am willing to not mention this to anyone so long as you leave tonight and never step foot in White Ash Harbor again.
trans-unit.target: 你的策略失败了，只要你今晚离开，再也不踏入白灰港，我愿意不向任何人提及此事。

trans-unit.source: You're dead to me, Nadjet!
trans-unit.target: 你对我来说已经死了，Nadjet！

trans-unit.source: DEAD!
trans-unit.target: 死了！

trans-unit.source: YEAH!
trans-unit.target: 是 啊！

trans-unit.source: I ALREADY WAS!
trans-unit.target: 我已经是了！

trans-unit.source: Childish, just like before. Aylin . . . interesting._And (playername), a chef huh?_We will be off then. I'm sure we will meet again . . . soon.
trans-unit.target: 孩子气，就像以前一样。艾林。有趣_还有(playername)，厨师，嗯_那我们就出发。我相信我们会再见面的。很快。

trans-unit.source: SOON!
trans-unit.target: 快！

trans-unit.source: YEAH!
trans-unit.target: 是 啊！

trans-unit.source: How? How did you know?
trans-unit.target: 怎么用？你怎么知道的？

trans-unit.source: You've been acting out of sorts and seeing you trying to sneak off tonight, I knew I had to follow. It's a good thing I did too.
trans-unit.target: 你一直表现得不太好，看到你今晚试图偷偷溜走，我知道我必须跟上。我也做了一件好事。

trans-unit.source: You knew this whole time? And you still brought me on?
trans-unit.target: 你一直都知道吗？你还带我来？

trans-unit.source: You chose to become a different person, Nadjet. I wouldn't hold you to the beliefs of the person you were._You are trustworthy and brave and that's all that has and still does matter to me.
trans-unit.target: 你选择成为一个不同的人，Nadjet。我不会让你坚持你自己的信仰_你是值得信赖和勇敢的，这就是我所拥有和仍然重要的。

trans-unit.source: Anyone want to fill me in on the why to this story?
trans-unit.target: 有人想告诉我为什么要写这个故事吗？

trans-unit.source: I'm lost, what's happening?
trans-unit.target: 我迷路了，怎么了？

trans-unit.source: It doesn't matter anymore.
trans-unit.target: 这已经不重要了。

trans-unit.source: Just finishing up some old business.
trans-unit.target: 刚刚完成一些旧业务。

trans-unit.source: I can explain. The Columbo family wanted to see if the bathhouse could be used as an illegal android manufacturing base._As you have seen, they use theft, intimidation, and blackmail to get what they want
trans-unit.target: 我可以解释。Columbo家族想看看澡堂是否可以被用作非法的机器人制造基地_正如你所看到的，他们使用盗窃、恐吓和勒索来得到他们想要的东西

trans-unit.source: I'm glad things worked out today, but I'm sure they will have something up their sleeve. We have to be careful._I'm thankful for your help today (playername), truly. And Aylin . . .
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴今天事情解决了，但我相信他们会有所准备。我们必须小心_我真的很感谢你今天的帮助。还有艾林。

trans-unit.source: Everything is fine now Nadjet. It is in the past. We have more pressing matters to focus on._The grand opening is almost upon us. It's been a long day. Let's get some rest. We have much work ahead of us . . .
trans-unit.target: 现在一切都很好，Nadjet。那是过去的事了。我们有更紧迫的事情要关注。盛大的开幕式就要来了。这是漫长的一天。我们休息一下吧。我们前面还有很多工作要做。

trans-unit.source: Yeah!
trans-unit.target: 是 啊！

trans-unit.source: 2305 - I Bathe, Therefore I Am
trans-unit.target: 2305我洗澡，故我在

trans-unit.source: We are almost there (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我们快到了(playername)。

trans-unit.source: It looks magnificent!
trans-unit.target: 它看起来很壮观！

trans-unit.source: You must be very proud, Aylin.
trans-unit.target: 你一定很自豪，艾林。

trans-unit.source: Yes . . . it does. It looked just like this . . . before.
trans-unit.target: 是的。确实如此。它看起来就像这样。之前。

trans-unit.source: Yes . . . yes you are right. I am proud. Despite the odds, and despite our past setbacks, we have come far.
trans-unit.target: 是的。是的，你说得对。我很自豪。尽管困难重重，尽管我们过去遭遇过挫折，但我们已经取得了长足的进步。

trans-unit.source: Ma'am, we are all done in there. We've cleaned up everything.
trans-unit.target: 女士，我们都完了。我们把一切都清理干净了。

trans-unit.source: Ah yes, thank you.
trans-unit.target: 啊，是的，谢谢你。

trans-unit.source: Come (playername). Let's take a look shall we?
trans-unit.target: 来(playername)。我们来看看，好吗？

trans-unit.source: So, we've installed ultramarine tile floors.
trans-unit.target: 所以，我们安装了群青瓷砖地板。

trans-unit.source: And new copper heat pumps. Per your request ma'am.
trans-unit.target: 以及新的铜热泵。根据您的要求，女士。

trans-unit.source: Excellent! . . . Thank you. You may go.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了。非常感谢。你可以走了。

trans-unit.source: (playername), I feel like a missing part of my body has been returned to me._This bathhouse is my life, and it pained me dearly to see it in a broken and deteriorated state.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，我觉得我身体缺失的一部分已经回到了我身边。_这个澡堂是我的生命，看到它处于破碎和恶化的状态，我感到非常痛苦。

trans-unit.source: Now that I think about, you helped make some Bath Bloks before, but you've never been in here yet no?_Let me give you a quick tour then. We are currently in the change room. Here, guests can use the lockers and change into bathing gear.
trans-unit.target: 现在我想起来了，你以前帮我做过一些沐浴露，但你从来没有来过这里，不是吗_那么，让我为您简要介绍一下。我们现在在更衣室。在这里，客人可以使用储物柜并换上泳衣。

trans-unit.source: This is the main atrium, and the main baths. A lot of guests can use these baths at once, and this area becomes quite lively._On the right, we have some small private baths for guests that prefer a more intimate experience.
trans-unit.target: 这是主中庭和主浴室。许多客人可以同时使用这些浴室，这个地区变得非常热闹_在右边，我们为喜欢更亲密体验的客人提供了一些小型私人浴室。

trans-unit.source: Finally, up here, we have the upper baths. It's great for small groups and parties._Ideally, each bathing area has a different aroma, meaning a different Bath Blok for each bath.
trans-unit.target: 最后，在这里，我们有上层浴室。它非常适合小团体和聚会_理想情况下，每个沐浴区都有不同的香气，这意味着每个沐浴区有不同的沐浴露。

trans-unit.source: Now then, we want to make a great first impression for our grand opening. Every bathing area should be using a Bath Blok._So (playername), any last questions before we go?
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们希望为盛大的开幕式留下良好的第一印象。每个沐浴区都应该使用沐浴露_那么(playername)，在我们离开之前还有什么问题吗？

trans-unit.source: Why do all the baths need to be different?
trans-unit.target: 为什么所有的浴室都需要不同？

trans-unit.source: How often do Bath Bloks need to be refilled?
trans-unit.target: 沐浴露需要多久补充一次？

trans-unit.source: Guests have different preferences. Each Blok gives unique aromas and heath benefits._If you have the time, you can try out the baths yourself after creating some Bloks. I think you will be plesantly surprised.
trans-unit.target: 客人有不同的偏好。每种Blok都有独特的香气和健康益处_如果你有时间，你可以在制作了一些Bloks后自己尝试洗澡。我想你会非常惊讶的。

trans-unit.source: Usually, we will need to change the water once a day. But if no guests are present, a Bath Blok can last longer.
trans-unit.target: 通常，我们需要每天换一次水。但如果没有客人在场，沐浴露可以持续更长时间。

trans-unit.source: Thank you (playername). Remember, you must be meticulous and thorough in every pursuit._We are close to the finish line, but we must not lose our focus.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你(playername)。记住，你在每一次追求中都必须一丝不苟_我们已经接近终点线，但我们不能失去注意力。

trans-unit.source: It looks like the baths are ready. I can smell the aroma from here. Good work._So (playername), are you ready to begin the grand opening?
trans-unit.target: 看起来浴室已经准备好了。我能闻到这里的香味。干得好。那么(playername)，你准备好开始盛大的开幕了吗？

trans-unit.source: I need a little more time.
trans-unit.target: 我需要多一点时间。

trans-unit.source: I'm ready.
trans-unit.target: 我准备好了。

trans-unit.source: It must be perfect. We can wait.
trans-unit.target: 它必须是完美的。我们可以等。

trans-unit.source: Excellent. Let's begin. When you are ready, open your Teahouse, and we will open the Bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 杰出的。开始吧。当你准备好了，打开你的茶馆，我们将打开澡堂。

trans-unit.source: Whoa! It's really happening!
trans-unit.target: 哇！这真的发生了！

trans-unit.source: I can't wait for a hot sulfur bath!
trans-unit.target: 我等不及要洗个热水澡了！

trans-unit.source: Aye matey! This be a great day.
trans-unit.target: 是的，伙计！今天是个好日子。

trans-unit.source: There is hope for this town . . .
trans-unit.target: 这个城市还有希望。

trans-unit.source: Look honey! It's Aylin! She looks . . . different.
trans-unit.target: 看，亲爱的！是艾林！她看起来。不同。

trans-unit.source: Hotel Rose will be very busy . . .
trans-unit.target: 玫瑰酒店将会非常繁忙。

trans-unit.source: Most of you do not know me. I am Aylin, the owner of the Peony Bathhouse._This bathhouse is my family's legacy, and once brought great joy to the town of White Ash Harbor. Back then, people from around the nation would come visit.
trans-unit.target: 你们大多数人都不认识我。我是艾林，牡丹澡堂的老板_这个澡堂是我家的遗产，曾经给白灰港镇带来了巨大的欢乐。那时，全国各地的人们都会来参观。

trans-unit.source: When I closed these doors forty years ago, I felt I was doing the right thing for myself._It was only after I had sealed the bathhouse and myself from the town that I realized my mistake.
trans-unit.target: 四十年前，当我关上这些门时，我觉得我在为自己做正确的事_直到我把澡堂和我自己都封起来，才意识到我的错误。

trans-unit.source: From afar, I watched as White Ash Harbor fell apart, and my family's heritage abandoned and deterioriated._This once lively building was empty and quiet. Despite my personal struggles, I could no longer bear to see it in such a state.
trans-unit.target: 在远处，我看着白灰港分崩离析，我家族的遗产被遗弃和退化_这座曾经热闹的建筑空荡荡的，很安静。尽管我个人很挣扎，但我再也无法忍受在这种状态下看到它。

trans-unit.source: This Bathhouse was a place for locals and travellers alike to gather and share happy moments._Thanks to the help from people of this town, the Peony Bathhouse is open once again. Welcome to the opening of the Peony Bathhouse!
trans-unit.target: 这个澡堂是当地人和旅行者聚会和分享快乐时刻的地方_多亏了这个镇上的人们的帮助，牡丹浴室又重新开放了。欢迎来到牡丹馆的开幕式！

trans-unit.source: Get those towels into the locker room!
trans-unit.target: 把那些毛巾拿到更衣室！

trans-unit.source: Make sure the salts are set at the correct intervals!
trans-unit.target: 确保盐的设置间隔正确！

trans-unit.source: If you need anything, please speak to one of our staff!
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要什么，请与我们的工作人员联系！

trans-unit.source: No running! Enjoy the bathhouse!
trans-unit.target: 不要跑！享受澡堂！

trans-unit.source: We just entered a new world, haven't we Boba?
trans-unit.target: 我们刚刚进入了一个新世界，不是吗，波巴？

trans-unit.source: Sick. Hasel, wait for me!
trans-unit.target: 生病了。哈塞尔，等等我！

trans-unit.source: Guys, can we go eat first? I'm hungry.
trans-unit.target: 伙计们，我们可以先去吃饭吗？我饿了。

trans-unit.source: Hey gramps . . . this was a great trip after all.
trans-unit.target: 嘿，爷爷。毕竟，这是一次很棒的旅行。

trans-unit.source: What did I tell you sonny? Don't underestimate this town!
trans-unit.target: 我跟你说什么了，孩子？不要低估这个城市！

trans-unit.source: What a nice teahouse. Right Boba?
trans-unit.target: 多么漂亮的茶馆啊。对吧，波巴？

trans-unit.source: This one looks tasty.
trans-unit.target: 这个看起来很好吃。

trans-unit.source: Hey (playername), you should sell bubble teas!
trans-unit.target: 嘿(playername)，你应该卖奶茶！

trans-unit.source: No no Boba. You can't have any!
trans-unit.target: 不，不，波巴。你不能吃！

trans-unit.source: No. No. Boba stay away. You can't eat this!
trans-unit.target: 不，不，波巴，离远点。你不能吃这个！

trans-unit.source: I will remember this day forever.
trans-unit.target: 我会永远记住这一天。

trans-unit.source: I like this atmosphere.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢这种氛围。

trans-unit.source: Huh. This looks great. I'll take it.
trans-unit.target: 呵呵。这看起来很棒。我接受。

trans-unit.source: I think Bianca would like this one.
trans-unit.target: 我想比安卡会喜欢这个的。

trans-unit.source: It's a bit loud. Thankfully the food is great.
trans-unit.target: 声音有点大。谢天谢地，食物很棒。

trans-unit.source: That bath was great. I feel like a new person.
trans-unit.target: 那次洗澡很棒。我感觉自己像个新人。

trans-unit.source: Whew. I need a nap after that.
trans-unit.target: 呼。之后我需要小睡一会儿。

trans-unit.source: Delicious food after a hot bath? I'm all in.
trans-unit.target: 洗完热水澡后吃的好吃吗？我全力以赴。

trans-unit.source: Huh. This one looks right up my alley.
trans-unit.target: 呵呵。这个看起来很适合我。

trans-unit.source: Hey Hasel, have you tried this (dish)?
trans-unit.target: 嘿，哈塞尔，你尝过这道菜吗？

trans-unit.source: Slow down (Uriel). Plenty of food here.
trans-unit.target: 慢着(Uriel)。这里有很多食物。

trans-unit.source: Fantastic stuff (playername).
trans-unit.target: 奇妙的东西(playername)。

trans-unit.source: This place is perfect after a long day of work.
trans-unit.target: 经过一整天的工作，这个地方真是完美。

trans-unit.source: That bath was amazing. I smell great!
trans-unit.target: 那次洗澡太棒了。我闻起来很香！

trans-unit.source: I would like something cold.
trans-unit.target: 我想要点凉的。

trans-unit.source: Succulent!
trans-unit.target: 多汁的！

trans-unit.source: Just great. Just great.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了。太棒了。

trans-unit.source: Hey Bea, opening up the bar later?
trans-unit.target: 嘿，Bea，晚点开酒吧？

trans-unit.source: What I perfect day. I feel like dancing.
trans-unit.target: 我完美的一天。我想跳舞。

trans-unit.source: It's so great to see everyone gathered . . .
trans-unit.target: 很高兴看到大家聚在一起。

trans-unit.source: Wow. You serve this here?
trans-unit.target: 哇！你在这里供应这个吗？

trans-unit.source: This (dish) is great (playername).
trans-unit.target: 这道菜很好吃。

trans-unit.source: Aylin is very strange.
trans-unit.target: 艾林很奇怪。

trans-unit.source: Oh yes, I had to approve the Bathhouse renovation.
trans-unit.target: 哦，是的，我不得不批准澡堂的翻修。

trans-unit.source: White Ash Harbor is back!
trans-unit.target: 白灰港回来了！

trans-unit.source: Ah . . . I still remember this place.
trans-unit.target: 啊。我仍然记得这个地方。

trans-unit.source: I can't wait for this (dishname).
trans-unit.target: 我等不及这个(dishname)了。

trans-unit.source: Uriel, don't eat so much!
trans-unit.target: 乌里尔，别吃那么多！

trans-unit.source: This is some of the best food I've ever had.
trans-unit.target: 这是我吃过的最好的食物之一。

trans-unit.source: This reminds me of food I had when I was young.
trans-unit.target: 这让我想起了我年轻时吃过的食物。

trans-unit.source: Whew. Time to go home.
trans-unit.target: 呼。是时候回家了。

trans-unit.source: Huh, I hope the meat is freshly caught . . .
trans-unit.target: 嗯，我希望这肉是新鲜捕捞的。

trans-unit.source: I'll take this. Thank you dear.
trans-unit.target: 我要这个。谢谢你，亲爱的。

trans-unit.source: Yes . . . Yes I like this flavor.
trans-unit.target: 是的。是的，我喜欢这种味道。

trans-unit.source: I prefer something spicier. Where's the spice?
trans-unit.target: 我更喜欢辣一点的。香料在哪里？

trans-unit.source: Got any peppercorns?
trans-unit.target: 有胡椒粉吗？

trans-unit.source: It was a good meal, but I prefer the baths.
trans-unit.target: 这顿饭很好吃，但我更喜欢洗澡。

trans-unit.source: (playername), you've come far.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，你已经走了很远。

trans-unit.source: I think you would like this grandpa.
trans-unit.target: 我想你会喜欢这位爷爷的。

trans-unit.source: Oh, I think these are my veggies!
trans-unit.target: 哦，我想这些是我的蔬菜！

trans-unit.source: Careful grandma. Remember to drink water!
trans-unit.target: 小心奶奶。记得喝水！

trans-unit.source: Wish Anna May was here to enjoy this . . .
trans-unit.target: 希望Anna May能在这里享受这一切。

trans-unit.source: That's it. I'm dragging Anna May here next time . . .
trans-unit.target: 就是这样。下次我要把安娜·梅拖到这里来。

trans-unit.source: I've found my new oasis.
trans-unit.target: 我找到了我的新绿洲。

trans-unit.source: Oh yes. That looks good!
trans-unit.target: 哦，是的。看起来不错！

trans-unit.source: Aime, this reminds me of our honeymoon!
trans-unit.target: 艾米，这让我想起了我们的蜜月！

trans-unit.source: Amazing. Just amazing.
trans-unit.target: 太神了。太神奇了。

trans-unit.source: Can I just stay here forever?
trans-unit.target: 我能永远留在这里吗？

trans-unit.source: Uhhh Aime? I want to go for another bath.
trans-unit.target: 嗯，艾米？我想再洗一次澡。

trans-unit.source: This looks like my kind of place!
trans-unit.target: 这看起来像我喜欢的地方！

trans-unit.source: This will be perfect. Right Bea?
trans-unit.target: 这将是完美的。对吧，Bea？

trans-unit.source: Seconds please!
trans-unit.target: 请稍等！

trans-unit.source: I could eat this all day.
trans-unit.target: 我可以整天吃这个。

trans-unit.source: This is perfect after a day of gains.
trans-unit.target: 经过一天的收获，这是完美的。

trans-unit.source: Bea, I'm going to need another workout!
trans-unit.target: Bea，我需要再锻炼一次！

trans-unit.source: Just like back then . . .
trans-unit.target: 就像当年。

trans-unit.source: (playername), this menu looks great.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，这个菜单看起来很棒。

trans-unit.source: Just fantastic. This would be great even in Billboard City.
trans-unit.target: 太棒了。即使在Billboard City，这也会很棒。

trans-unit.source: The flavors are well balanced.
trans-unit.target: 味道很平衡。

trans-unit.source: I'm very pround (playername).
trans-unit.target: 我很自豪(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Ah . . . I think will . . . work out after all.
trans-unit.target: 啊。我想会。毕竟要锻炼。

trans-unit.source: A delicious meal after a hot bath? I'll come here every day!
trans-unit.target: 洗完热水澡后吃一顿美味的饭？我每天都会来这里！

trans-unit.source: I'm soooo hungry. I'll take anything!
trans-unit.target: 我饿极了。我愿意接受任何东西！

trans-unit.source: Oh yess . . . This . . . is . . . so . . . good . . .
trans-unit.target: 哦，是的。这个。是。所以。好。

trans-unit.source: Can I have more please?
trans-unit.target: 我可以要更多吗？

trans-unit.source: Good stuff (playername). I could eat this forever.
trans-unit.target: 好东西(playername)。我可以永远吃这个。

trans-unit.source: C'mon Aloys, Hasel. We're coming back tomorrow right?
trans-unit.target: 来吧，阿洛伊斯，哈塞尔。我们明天回来，对吧？

trans-unit.source: My feet feel like they're about to explode. You did good today, ya putts. Boss wants to talk to ya.
trans-unit.target: 我的脚感觉好像要爆炸了。你今天做得很好，推杆。老板想和你谈谈。

trans-unit.source: Thank you, Nadjet.
trans-unit.target: 谢谢你，Nadjet。

trans-unit.source: I may or may not be passed out when you're finished talking.
trans-unit.target: 你讲完后，我可能会也可能不会昏过去。

trans-unit.source: (playername), the grand opening was perfect, thanks to you. I've never seen the guests happier, in all the time I've managed this place._People especially enjoyed the Teahouse. I can see news of this reopening spreading far and wide.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，多亏了你，盛大的开幕式非常完美。在我管理这个地方的所有时间里，我从未见过客人如此高兴_人们特别喜欢茶馆。我可以看到这次重新开放的消息传播得很广。

trans-unit.source: (playername), you did an excellent job with the Teahouse. The guests couldn't be happier to enjoy such a good meal, after a hot bath._I think we will do great things with this place . . . together.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，你在茶馆做得很好。洗完热水澡后，客人们吃了这么丰盛的饭菜，高兴得不得了_我想我们会在这个地方做很多事情。一起。

trans-unit.source: That was a great start (playername). As well as I could have hoped for. The guests were very happy.
trans-unit.target: 那是一个很好的开始(playername)。正如我所希望的那样。客人们非常高兴。

trans-unit.source: It was a decent opening (playername). Guests were very happy with baths, but it seemed like the Teahouse didn't impress._We have more work to do. As I mentioned before, everything must be perfect.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个不错的开场(playername)。客人对浴室很满意，但茶馆似乎没有给人留下深刻印象_我们还有更多的工作要做。正如我之前提到的，一切都必须完美。

trans-unit.source: (playername), the service and food at the Teahouse could have been much better. That is the honest truth. Thankfully, guests really enjoyed the baths.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，茶馆的服务和食物本可以更好。这是诚实的事实。幸运的是，客人真的很喜欢洗澡。

trans-unit.source: (playername), seeing the bathhouse filled today was . . . beyond exciting. I sense a massive change in White Ash Harbor, and I can attribute that shift to you.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，看到澡堂今天挤满了人。超越兴奋。我感觉到白灰港发生了巨大的变化，我可以把这种变化归功于你。

trans-unit.source: You came here, gave these people hope._You showed them that they were not forgotten by the world. Myself included.
trans-unit.target: 你来到这里，给了这些人希望_你向他们展示了他们没有被世界遗忘。包括我自己。

trans-unit.source: I still have a question: Why close in the first place?
trans-unit.target: 我仍然有一个问题：为什么一开始就很接近？

trans-unit.source: I need to know you closed the bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 我需要知道你关了澡堂。

trans-unit.source: That's a fair question and I've been deflecting for far too long.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个公平的问题，我已经转移注意力太久了。

trans-unit.source: That's a rather brash attitude to take. I can see Nadjet has rubbed off on you.
trans-unit.target: 这是一种相当傲慢的态度。我看得出来，Nadjet已经对你产生了影响。

trans-unit.source: You see . . . I was once human. I fell ill, and my body started to shut down._My doctor convinced me to undergo an experimental procedure and moved my brain into this android shell.
trans-unit.target: 你看。我曾经是人类。我生病了，我的身体开始停止运转_我的医生说服我接受一项实验性手术，并将我的大脑转移到这个机器人外壳中。

trans-unit.source: At the time, androids weren't recognized as independent beings yet._Humans saw me as a monster, and I, in turn, saw them the same way. I closed up and waited. Perhaps time would help fix hearts and change minds.
trans-unit.target: 当时，机器人还没有被视为独立的生物_人类将我视为怪物，而我也以同样的方式看待他们。我关上了门，等待着。也许时间会帮助修复心灵，改变想法。

trans-unit.source: Are the people who were cruel to me then still around? A few, but it is clear that the winds have shifted._Androids walk among the people of my town and they are not run out. They are working side by side with their human counterparts.
trans-unit.target: 当时对我残忍的人还在吗？有一些，但很明显风向已经改变了_机器人在我们镇上的人们中间行走，它们并没有用完。它们与人类同行并肩工作。

trans-unit.source: It was a long time ago. Most of the residents in White Ash Harbor are too young to know me . . . back then._I realized my growing sadness in having closed down my family's treasured Bathhouse, so I decided to come back.
trans-unit.target: 那是很久以前的事了。白灰港的大多数居民都太年轻，不认识我。那时候_我意识到自己关闭了家里珍贵的澡堂，这让我越来越难过，所以我决定回来。

trans-unit.source: Now then (playername). It's late. Get some rest. We may have completed our grand opening, but we have much work to do.
trans-unit.target: 现在(playername)。很晚了。休息一下。我们可能已经完成了盛大的开幕式，但我们还有很多工作要做。

trans-unit.source: 23058_ACT 3 END_Casteau Leaves
trans-unit.target: 23058_ACT 3结束_烤树叶

trans-unit.source: Boba and I will miss you chef. Remember to take care of yourself!
trans-unit.target: 鲍勃和我会想念你的厨师。记得照顾好自己！

trans-unit.source: Yes . . . Vincent. Thank you for coming all this way. After all this time, I'm . . . grateful that you were by my side for the reopening.
trans-unit.target: 是的。文森特。谢谢你远道而来。经过这么长时间，我。感谢你在我身边重新开放。

trans-unit.source: I'm grateful for you all. Coming here . . . has brought back so many memories. Seeing you all work together to revive the town . . ._Oh! I feel like a young man again. You guys will do great things together. I'm sure of it.
trans-unit.target: 我感谢你们所有人。来这里。带回了那么多回忆。看到你们共同努力振兴这座城镇_哦！我感觉自己又像个年轻人了。你们会一起做伟大的事情。我对此深信不疑。

trans-unit.source: What will you do now chef?
trans-unit.target: 厨师，你现在要做什么？

trans-unit.source: I wish you could stay longer.
trans-unit.target: 我希望你能多呆一会儿。

trans-unit.source: This old man needs to rest. Afterwards, I might take a train to Mount Santino to see my grandkids. They are growing up so fast!
trans-unit.target: 这位老人需要休息。之后，我可能会坐火车去桑提诺山看望我的孙子。他们成长得太快了！

trans-unit.source: I wish this too (playername). I wish I could jump into the kitchen and start cooking, ha! But my old age has caught up to me._It's time to go home. Who knows, I might have the energy to give a lecture or two at the academy!
trans-unit.target: 我也希望如此(playername)。我希望我能跳进厨房开始做饭，哈！但我的晚年已经赶上了我。我该回家了。谁知道呢，我可能有精力在学院做一两场讲座！

trans-unit.source: (playername), I'm proud that you have taken the decision to come here. I know it wasn't an easy one._Seeing where you are now, I couldn't imagine Le Sequoia in better hands._You will be a great chef, I know it!
trans-unit.target: (playername)，我很自豪你决定来这里。我知道这并不容易_看到你现在的位置，我无法想象Le Sequoia会得到更好的照顾_我知道你会成为一名伟大的厨师！

trans-unit.source: As an instructor, I have no more lessons to give you. Just go out there, and be your own chef._I started Le Sequoia, but now it's time for you to make it your own. Keep pushing, and discover what kind of chef you want to be (playername).
trans-unit.target: 作为一名讲师，我没有更多的课要给你了。走出去，做自己的厨师_我创办了Le Sequoia，但现在是时候让它成为你自己的了。继续努力，发现你想成为什么样的厨师(playername)。

trans-unit.source: Last call folks. Train will be leaving shortly!
trans-unit.target: 最后一个电话，伙计们。火车很快就要开了！

trans-unit.source: Ho ho ho! Looks like it's time to go.
trans-unit.target: 呵呵！看来该走了。

trans-unit.source: Bye!
trans-unit.target: 再见！

trans-unit.source: Farewell, Vincent.
trans-unit.target: 再见，文森特。

trans-unit.source: Hey wait . . . you didn't give me back my pipe!
trans-unit.target: 嘿等等。你没把烟斗还给我！

trans-unit.source: 6020 - CHEAPER BY THE DOZEN
trans-unit.target: 6020-便宜一打

trans-unit.source: Ah, yes, how are you, (playername)? Me, I've been thinking. Been thinking about children._Wipe that look off your face, not with you! I got 12 already and you're not my type!
trans-unit.target: 啊，是的，你好吗，(playername)？我，我一直在想。一直在想孩子_擦掉你脸上的那种表情，不要和你一起！我已经有12个了，你不是我喜欢的类型！

trans-unit.source: No, I was thinking about how best to show my children how much I love each and every one of them._They're coming into town for my birthday and I was thinking I could make them each a basket with some delightful food in it.
trans-unit.target: 不，我在想如何最好地向我的孩子们展示我有多爱他们每一个人_他们要来镇上过我的生日，我想我可以给他们每人做一个篮子，里面装着一些美味的食物。

trans-unit.source: I don't need anything, but I'm recovering from a procedure with my shoulder, and can't hunt right now. Could you help me?
trans-unit.target: 我什么都不需要，但我的肩膀正在从手术中恢复，现在不能打猎。你能帮帮我吗？

trans-unit.source: Help you make gifts for your kids? Sure.
trans-unit.target: 帮你给孩子做礼物？当然。

trans-unit.source: I don't have time, maybe later?
trans-unit.target: 我没有时间，也许晚些时候？

trans-unit.source: I would rather die than ask for help, but also, I want to live to see grandchildren one day and I'm hurt, so here we are.
trans-unit.target: 我宁愿死也不愿寻求帮助，但我也希望有一天能活着看到孙子孙女，我很受伤，所以我们在这里。

trans-unit.source: Oh, yes, it's not like my birthday is approaching anytime soon, right? When was I born anyway?
trans-unit.target: 哦，是的，我的生日不会很快到来，对吧？我到底是什么时候出生的？

trans-unit.source: For each child, I was thinking of giving them 2 cuts of meat and ingredients to make something tasty and stick them into a basket with ribbons and such.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个孩子，我想给他们两块肉和配料，做成美味的东西，然后把它们放在一个有缎带之类的篮子里。

trans-unit.source: Do you put ribbons on a basket?_Whatever we do to gussy it up, it has to have 24 pieces of boar, 24 pieces of salmon, 24 pieces of cinnamon, and 24 pieces of mountain mushrooms.
trans-unit.target: 你会在篮子上系丝带吗_无论我们做什么来装饰它，它都必须有24块野猪肉、24块鲑鱼、24块肉桂和24块山蘑菇。

trans-unit.source: That should do it! Thank you again, (playername) for assisting. Once you have the supplies, come find me, we'll put it all together.
trans-unit.target: 应该可以了！再次感谢(playername)的协助。一旦你有了补给，来找我，我们会把它们都放在一起。

trans-unit.source: Ah ha! Yes, these will be perfect! They will love these baskets! Thank you, and for helping me out, allow me to do the same.
trans-unit.target: 啊哈！是的，这些将是完美的！他们会喜欢这些篮子的！谢谢你，请允许我也这样做。

trans-unit.source: I'll bring you 20 pieces of select meat for your restaurant daily. Just tell me which type you'll want. Thank you, again!
trans-unit.target: 我每天给你的餐厅带20块精选肉。告诉我你想要哪种类型。再次感谢！

trans-unit.source: 6021 - POMARINE'S FINAL HUNT
trans-unit.target: 6021年——油桃的最后一次狩猎

trans-unit.source: (playername), oh, hello . . . sorry, you caught me thinking._Have you every had something you've always wanted, but never achieved?_Something . . . that got away from you?
trans-unit.target: (playername)，哦，你好。对不起，你让我陷入沉思_你是否每个人都有你一直想要但从未实现的东西_有东西。它从你身边溜走了？

trans-unit.source: Like a lost love?
trans-unit.target: 就像失去的爱？

trans-unit.source: Like something I couldn't achieve?
trans-unit.target: 就像我无法实现的事情？

trans-unit.source: No no no . . . that . . . yes, but no. More . . . like something you could never accomplish. And at my old age, I realized that my chance has finally slipped away.
trans-unit.target: 不，不，不。那个。是的，但不是。更多。就像你永远无法完成的事情。在我年老的时候，我意识到我的机会终于溜走了。

trans-unit.source: Exactly! Especially with this blasted hip, my hunting days are coming to an end I'm afraid. It's sad to think . . . I couldn't do it . . .
trans-unit.target: 确切地！尤其是臀部受伤，恐怕我的狩猎生涯即将结束。想到…真是令人难过。我做不到。

trans-unit.source: You must be confused as to what this old woman is blabbering about. You see, there's a creature in the woods . . . a monstrosity know as the ancient razorback._A creature I've been trying to hunt my whole life, but has always eluded me.
trans-unit.target: 你一定不明白这位老妇人在说什么。你看，树林里有个生物。一种被称为古代剃刀背的怪物_一种我一辈子都在追捕的生物，但总是躲开我。

trans-unit.source: I haven't seen it for years. I thought it had died of old age, but the other day, I saw it in the deep woods!_I picked up my bow, and I . . . I just couldn't. I realized that if I tried to take it own, it would be over for this old lady.
trans-unit.target: 我已经很多年没看过了。我以为它已经老死了，但前几天，我在深林中看到了它_我拿起弓，然后。我就是做不到。我意识到，如果我试着自己动手，对这位老太太来说就完了。

trans-unit.source: So (playername), do you think you could do it?_Take down the Ancient Razorback and put my heart at rest?
trans-unit.target: 那么(playername)，你觉得你能做到吗_取下古Razorback，让我的心安息？

trans-unit.source: I can help you, Pomarine.
trans-unit.target: 我可以帮你，Pomarine。

trans-unit.source: I don't think I'm strong enough to fight it.
trans-unit.target: 我不认为我有足够的力量去对抗它。

trans-unit.source: . . . That's a relief to hear. As much as I usually don't need anyone . . . I do need help this time. Thank you._We leave tomorrow. Get any gear you'll need and meet me at my home in the morning. LETS HUNT!
trans-unit.target: . . . 听到这个消息我松了一口气。尽管我通常不需要任何人。这次我确实需要帮助。非常感谢。我们明天出发。带上你需要的任何装备，早上在我家见我。我们去打猎吧！

trans-unit.source: I see. It's true. That beast requires an extraordinary hunter to take down._Come back when you are stronger.
trans-unit.target: 我懂了。这是真的。那只野兽需要一个非凡的猎人才能干掉_等你强壮了再回来。

trans-unit.source: Ready (playername)?
trans-unit.target: 准备好了吗？

trans-unit.source: Let's go for a hunt!
trans-unit.target: 我们去打猎吧！

trans-unit.source: On second thought, I need more time.
trans-unit.target: 再想想，我需要更多的时间。

trans-unit.source: Alright. Follow me. You better keep up!
trans-unit.target: 好吧。跟我来，你最好跟上！

trans-unit.source: Don't keep me waiting (playername).
trans-unit.target: 别让我久等了。

trans-unit.source: Keep up slowpoke!
trans-unit.target: 慢慢来！

trans-unit.source: Can we have a rest please?
trans-unit.target: 我们能休息一下吗？

trans-unit.source: I love these woods. So calm, so peaceful. Keep up.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢这些树林。如此平静，如此平和。跟上。

trans-unit.source: . . . Alright . . .
Notice how the birds spread the seeds around? Amazing.
trans-unit.target: 注意到鸟儿是如何传播种子的吗？太神了。

trans-unit.source: You are awfully calm before hunting . . . oh wait.
trans-unit.target: 狩猎前你非常冷静。哦，等等。

trans-unit.source: This beast is vicious. Don't let your guard down.
trans-unit.target: 这只野兽很凶猛。不要放松警惕。

trans-unit.source: I don't remember my knees being this tired.
trans-unit.target: 我不记得我的膝盖这么累了。

trans-unit.source: One wrong move . . . well . . . it won't be pretty.
trans-unit.target: 一个错误的举动。嗯。它不会很漂亮。

trans-unit.source: I'll be okay, just moving at your speed is frightening to me.
trans-unit.target: 我会没事的，只是以你的速度移动对我来说很可怕。

trans-unit.source: Shhhh . . . There it is! Let's move quiet, closer, before you attack.
trans-unit.target: 嘘。就在那里！在你进攻之前，让我们安静地靠近一点。

trans-unit.source: WHAT THE??? That's the biggest . . .
trans-unit.target: 这是什么？？？这是最大的。

trans-unit.source: There it is (playername). Isn't she a beauty._If you take her down, I may have to pass down the mantle of this town's greatest hunter._Are you ready?
trans-unit.target: 它在那里(playername)。她是不是很漂亮_如果你干掉她，我可能不得不继承这个镇上最伟大的猎人的衣钵_你准备好了吗？

trans-unit.source: WHAT!!!?? That thing's huge!!!
trans-unit.target: 什么！！！？？那东西太大了！！！

trans-unit.source: I . . . I think I'm ready.
trans-unit.target: 一、我想我已经准备好了。

trans-unit.source: The largest I've ever seen (playername). But not impossible to beat. It may be big, so you have to be smart._Try not to stay too close to it. Use the environment to your advantage.
trans-unit.target: 我见过的最大的(playername)。但并非不可能被击败。它可能很大，所以你必须聪明_尽量不要离它太近。利用好环境。

trans-unit.source: That's the spirit. Now remember, avoid the horns, obviously. It's also got a pretty deadly stomp too._So try not to stay too close to it, or you will be sorry.
trans-unit.target: 这就是精神。现在记住，显然要避开号角。它也有一个相当致命的跺脚_所以尽量不要离它太近，否则你会后悔的。

trans-unit.source: Onwards (playername). I'm too old to be battling that thing. I'll be over there . . . in the woods . . . awaiting your victory. Don't want to get hurt, now do I?
trans-unit.target: 继续(playername)。我太老了，不能和那东西打架。我会在那边。在树林里。等待你的胜利。我现在不想受伤，是吗？

trans-unit.source: She was a worthy opponent. I thank you for your life . . . what is this? And ID tag?_This . . . this is from LELSH! I always wondered how The Ancient Razorback was so big and red . . .
trans-unit.target: 她是一个值得尊敬的对手。我感谢你的生命。这是什么？ID标签呢_这个。这是LELSH的！我一直想知道古Razorback是怎么这么大这么红的。

trans-unit.source: It must have escaped some facility or something . . . or maybe they set it loose here? No, that would be . . . humans are the worst, regardless.
trans-unit.target: 它一定是从某个设施或什么地方逃出来的。或者他们把它放在这里？不，那将是。无论如何，人类是最糟糕的。

trans-unit.source: Except for you. I'm glad we were able to end this creature's life because it was invasive to the area, clearly. Now nature will find balance in its absence.
trans-unit.target: 除了你。我很高兴我们能够结束这种生物的生命，因为它显然侵入了该地区。现在，大自然将在它的缺席中找到平衡。

trans-unit.source: My hip is also telling me that this is my last time being up here for a hunt . . . It's been a good run.
trans-unit.target: 我的臀部也告诉我，这是我最后一次来这里打猎。这是一个很好的运行。

trans-unit.source: As a show of gratitude, I want to give you something, my bow. I won't be needing such a high powered bow for the game_I'll be hunting moving forward, but you, you're still young.
trans-unit.target: 为了表示感谢，我想给你一些东西，我的弓。我在比赛中不需要这么高功率的弓——我会继续狩猎，但你，你还年轻。

trans-unit.source: You can go anywhere you please, and that bow will keep you safe no matter where you end up._Now, if you'll excuse me, I have a cup of tea waiting for me at the bathhouse. Thank you, (playername).
trans-unit.target: 你可以去任何你想去的地方，无论你去哪里，那把弓都会保证你的安全_现在，如果你能原谅我，我有一杯茶在澡堂等着我。谢谢你，(playername)。

trans-unit.source: 6022 - ONE WITH THE SEEDS
trans-unit.target: 6022-一个有种子的

trans-unit.source: I knew we would speak today and it would be about this grave matter that is clouding my thoughts. I am . . . LOW ON SEEDS!
trans-unit.target: 我知道我们今天会谈谈，这件严重的事情会让我的思绪蒙上阴影。我。种子不足！

trans-unit.source: (playername), I want to send my most organic seeds to Regrow the Planet, a non-profit that is trying to reclaim the Earth from the exploitations of mankind one plant at a time.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，我想把我最有机的种子送到Regrow the Planet，这是一个非营利组织，试图一次一株地从人类的剥削中拯救地球。

trans-unit.source: My harvest from the greenhouse has been rather meager, I wasn't able to chant as much to the plants this season because business in the shop has picked up so much._I was curious if you could help me find the seeds I need to send?
trans-unit.target: 我从温室里收获的收成相当微薄，这个季节我无法对植物唱那么多歌，因为商店的生意已经好转了很多_我很好奇你能不能帮我找到我需要寄的种子？

trans-unit.source: Who doesn't want to help save the planet? Sure.
trans-unit.target: 谁不想帮助拯救地球？当然。

trans-unit.source: I mean, I want to help out, but I can't at the moment.
trans-unit.target: 我的意思是，我想帮忙，但我现在不能。

trans-unit.source: I knew you would be helpful in this endeavor. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: 我就知道你会在这项努力中有所帮助。非常感谢。

trans-unit.source: I . . . I didn't foresee this . . . I mean, that's okay, let me know when you can.
trans-unit.target: 一、我没有预见到这一点。我的意思是，没关系，可以的时候告诉我。

trans-unit.source: I need 5 Potato Seeds, 5 Orange Tree Seeds, and 5 Grape Seeds._I'll be at the shop when you have them all.
trans-unit.target: 我需要5颗土豆籽、5颗橘子籽和5颗葡萄籽_等你把它们都吃完，我就去商店。

trans-unit.source: Perfect, these will help save the planet, (playername)! You watch and see! You know what, for helping me, you can have some of these great tea-making ingredients I've collected!
trans-unit.target: 太好了，这些将有助于拯救地球，(playername)！你看吧！你知道吗，为了帮助我，你可以吃一些我收集的这些很棒的泡茶原料！

trans-unit.source: You will be able to make a pretty great brew with this. Your staff will thank me, I'm sure!
trans-unit.target: 你可以用它酿造出非常棒的啤酒。我相信你的员工会感谢我的！

trans-unit.source: 6023 - APRIL'S CRYSTAL BALL
trans-unit.target: 6023-四月的水晶球

trans-unit.source: (playername)!, this is a disaster! I can't believe this. Everything . . . everything is ruined!_What am I supposed to do now!
trans-unit.target: (playername)！，这是一场灾难！我简直不敢相信。一切。一切都毁了_我现在该怎么办！

trans-unit.source: What happened here!?
trans-unit.target: 这里发生了什么事！？

trans-unit.source: April! Pull yourself together!
trans-unit.target: 四月！振作起来！

trans-unit.source: It was a Boar! A sloppy, disgusting, rancid, rascal of an animal! It somehow broke through the door.
trans-unit.target: 那是一只野猪！一个邋遢、恶心、腐臭、流氓的动物！它不知怎么闯了门。

trans-unit.source: Sorry . . . Yes . . . I lost myself there. A boar came through here. It destroyed everything!
trans-unit.target: 对不起。是的。我在那里迷失了自我。一头野猪从这里经过。它摧毁了一切！

trans-unit.source: The worst part is, it destroyed my crystal gazing ball. Without it, I can no longer commune with the spirts of the forest.
trans-unit.target: 最糟糕的是，它毁了我的水晶球。没有它，我再也无法与森林的灵魂交流。

trans-unit.source: I cannot perform my readings without my crystal ball! What am I supposed to do?
trans-unit.target: 没有水晶球，我无法进行阅读！我该怎么办？

trans-unit.source: Maybe I can help you create a new one?
trans-unit.target: 也许我可以帮你创建一个新的？

trans-unit.source: Can't you use some cards or something instead?
trans-unit.target: 你不能用一些卡片什么的吗？

trans-unit.source: Can you do that? Yes . . . I think it is possible. We would first need to collect a perfect quartz crystal._They are very hard to find and extract. I think you should talk to Bianca. I believe she knowns how to extract such a mineral.
trans-unit.target: 你能做到吗？是的。我认为这是可能的。我们首先需要收集一个完美的石英晶体_它们很难找到和提取。我想你应该和比安卡谈谈。我相信她知道如何提取这种矿物质。

trans-unit.source: No no no! You don't understand! My crystal gazing ball was blessed by the spirits of the forest!_Uggghh . . . You non-telepaths never understand!
trans-unit.target: 不，不，不！你不明白！我的水晶凝视球受到了森林精灵的祝福_啊。你们这些非通灵者永远不会明白！

trans-unit.source: Ehhh . . . I'm a little busy today. Make it quick.
trans-unit.target: 呃。我今天有点忙。快点。

trans-unit.source: So you are looking to extract a perfect quartz crystal huh? It requires a very powerful drill to get through that dense silica._Luckily, I do have a tool that is powerful enough to drill through. It won't come cheap though.
trans-unit.target: 所以你想提取一个完美的石英晶体，是吗？它需要一个非常强大的钻头来穿透致密的二氧化硅_幸运的是，我确实有一个足够强大的工具可以钻穿。不过，它不会便宜。

trans-unit.source: I'll offer it to you for a discount. How does 1500 Credits and 5 Power Cells sound?
trans-unit.target: 我给你打折。1500信用点和5个动力电池听起来怎么样？

trans-unit.source: It will cost you 4000 Credits and 10 Power Cells. Does that work for you?
trans-unit.target: 它将花费你4000个信用点和10个电池。那对你有用吗？

trans-unit.source: I'll take it!
trans-unit.target: 我接受！

trans-unit.source: Um . . . It's too expensive for me right now.
trans-unit.target: 嗯。现在对我来说太贵了。

trans-unit.source: Here you go. This is an advanced diamond drill that will melt through rocks like butter._As for perfect quartz crystals, I believe they sometimes appear in the beach caves. Look for large, continuous crystalline structures.
trans-unit.target: 干得好。这是一种先进的金刚石钻头，可以像黄油一样融化岩石_至于完美的石英晶体，我相信它们有时会出现在海滩洞穴中。寻找大而连续的晶体结构。

trans-unit.source: Come back to me if you change your mind.
trans-unit.target: 如果你改变主意，就回来找我。

trans-unit.source: Great (playername)! It looks like you got a fantastic quartz crystal there. We can definitely work with this._Next, we need to polish it into a perfect sphere. The only sculptor in town is Anna-May. Perhaps she can help?
trans-unit.target: 太棒了！看起来你那里有一块神奇的石英晶体。我们绝对可以做到这一点_接下来，我们需要把它打磨成一个完美的球体。镇上唯一的雕刻家是安娜·梅。也许她能帮忙？

trans-unit.source: After you have a perfect crystal ball, the next step is very important. So listen carefully._You must bring the crystal ball into the deep woods, to a stone pedestral in front of the Great Sequoia Tree.
trans-unit.target: 当你有了一个完美的水晶球后，下一步非常重要。所以仔细听_你必须把水晶球带进深林，带到大红杉前的一个石制步行台上。

trans-unit.source: You must also bring some food offerings to the spirits of the forest, or else they will not help us._The crystal and food offerings must be left on the stone altar overnight.
trans-unit.target: 你还必须带些供品给森林的灵魂，否则他们不会帮助我们。水晶和供品必须放在石坛上过夜。

trans-unit.source: Well this makes sense. Even spirits need to eat.
trans-unit.target: 这是有道理的。即使是灵魂也需要进食。

trans-unit.source: Is all this necessary? We even need an offering?
trans-unit.target: 这一切都是必要的吗？我们甚至需要报价？

trans-unit.source: Exactly! The food is also a sign of respect to the sprits of the forest. Food is one of the few things in which we can connect to the other realm with._The spirits don't often get to eat delicious food, especially from a skilled chef such as yourself.
trans-unit.target: 确切地！食物也是对森林精神的尊重。食物是我们可以与其他领域联系的少数东西之一_精灵们往往吃不到美味的食物，尤其是像你这样技艺精湛的厨师。

trans-unit.source: Of course it's necessary! Food is one of the few things in which we can connect to the other realm with._It also a sign of respect for asking for their help.
trans-unit.target: 当然有必要！食物是我们可以与其他领域联系的少数东西之一_这也是对寻求他们帮助的尊重。

trans-unit.source: Now let's get on shall we? People need their fortunes told!
trans-unit.target: 现在我们开始吧，好吗？人们需要知道他们的命运！

trans-unit.source: Hey (playername). Hope you are having a better day than I. I have a headache from playing video games all night.
trans-unit.target: 嘿(playername)。希望你今天过得比我好。我整晚玩电子游戏都头疼。

trans-unit.source: What's that? You need a crystal polished? That sounds quite difficult and requires a lot of precision._Unfortunately I cannot work until my headache is cured._Can you bring me some medicine?
trans-unit.target: 那是什么？你需要抛光水晶吗？这听起来相当困难，需要很高的精度_不幸的是，在头痛痊愈之前，我不能工作_你能给我拿些药来吗？

trans-unit.source: Ah thank you (playername). That feels much better. Now let me see your crystal._. . . _ . . . _ Mhhhmmm I see. Yes . . . This should be no problem. Meet me back at my studio and I will help polish the crystal.
trans-unit.target: 啊，谢谢你(playername)。感觉好多了。现在让我看看你的水晶嗯，我明白了。是的。这应该没问题。回到我的工作室见我，我会帮你擦亮水晶。

trans-unit.source: And here you go! One perfectly spherical quartz ball!_What?? You are heading into the deep woods? Be careful out here. I heard there are large beasts that roam around at night.
trans-unit.target: 给你！一个完美的球形石英球_什么？？你要去森林深处？小心这里。我听说有大型野兽在夜间游荡。

trans-unit.source: I should go check on the crystal ball.
trans-unit.target: 我应该去看看水晶球。

trans-unit.source: Ah (playername) my saviour! You did it! It looks as good as new! And yes, I can feel the energy of the spirit flowing within._The dishes you made them must have been delicious to the spirits._You must be wanting your reward then?
trans-unit.target: 啊，我的救世主！你做到了！它看起来和新的一样好！是的，我能感觉到精神的能量在里面流动_你做的菜一定很好吃_那你一定想要你的奖励吧？

trans-unit.source: I possess a couple of very powerful amulets, passed down from my family through generations._Like the gazing crystal, they are infused with the blessings of forest spirits. Since you really saved me, you can pick one to keep!
trans-unit.target: 我有几个非常强大的护身符，是我家世代相传的_就像凝视的水晶一样，它们充满了森林精灵的祝福。既然你真的救了我，你可以挑一个留着！

trans-unit.source: MISC CUTSCENES
trans-unit.target: 杂项过场动画

trans-unit.source: 1006 - PET STORE OPENING
trans-unit.target: 1006-宠物店开业

trans-unit.source: Hello all! Welcome to Bark & Meow's grand opening!
trans-unit.target: 大家好！欢迎来到Bark&Meow的盛大开幕式！

trans-unit.source: We have some super-cute cats and dogs for you to adopt.
trans-unit.target: 我们有一些超级可爱的猫和狗供你收养。

trans-unit.source: I hope you can find your perfect pet to bring home!
trans-unit.target: 我希望你能找到你的完美宠物带回家！

trans-unit.source: Oh my god. I'm sooo ready.
trans-unit.target: 哦，我的上帝。我已经准备好了。

trans-unit.source: New shop opening? That's unexpected.
trans-unit.target: 新店开业？这太出乎意料了。

trans-unit.source: Hey gramps. Do you want a puppy?
trans-unit.target: 嘿，爷爷。你想要一只小狗吗？

trans-unit.source: I just want a drink sonny.
trans-unit.target: 儿子，我只想喝一杯。

trans-unit.source: This is so exciting! But be careful in there Boba. Don't run off!
trans-unit.target: 这太令人兴奋了！但要小心，鲍勃。不要跑！

trans-unit.source: Haven't seen a new shop open in a while . . .
trans-unit.target: 好久没看到新店开业了。

trans-unit.source: 1007 - Meet Hugo
trans-unit.target: 1007-认识雨果

trans-unit.source: Not bad . . . not bad . . .
trans-unit.target: 不错。不错。

trans-unit.source: Hello.
trans-unit.target: 你好。

trans-unit.source: Don't see many people around this area . . ._I'm Hugo, B-Level Officer of the LELSH corporation. Need something?
trans-unit.target: 这个地区周围人不多_我是雨果，LELSH公司的B级官员。需要什么吗？

trans-unit.source: Not really. What are you doing here?
trans-unit.target: 不是真的。你在这里干什么？

trans-unit.source: I'm (playername). I've never seen you around?
trans-unit.target: 我是(playername)。我从没见过你？

trans-unit.source: Sorry, that's classified. Info for top LELSH personnel only.
trans-unit.target: 对不起，这是机密。仅适用于LELSH高层人员的信息。

trans-unit.source: I'm from the city. I'm here on a classified LELSH assignment.
trans-unit.target: 我来自城市。我是来执行LELSH的机密任务的。

trans-unit.source: Since you are scouting the Volcano, may I presume you are in search of minerals? I have to collect rock samples for my . . . job._I can let you take some off my hands . . . for the right price.
trans-unit.target: 既然你在寻找火山，我可以假设你在寻找矿物吗？我必须为我的…收集岩石样本。工作_我可以让你从我手里拿一些。以合适的价格。

trans-unit.source: I thought LELSH abandoned these mines?
trans-unit.target: 我以为LELSH放弃了这些矿？

trans-unit.source: Are you supposed to be doing that?
trans-unit.target: 你应该这么做吗？

trans-unit.source: They have. There is no more need for sulfur mining._But LELSH still has a use for this place. I cannot say any more than that.
trans-unit.target: 他们有。不再需要开采硫磺_但LELSH仍然有这个地方的用途。我只能这么说。

trans-unit.source: No, but you don't look like someone who will tell on me. Right friend?_If we keep this a secret, it can be mutually beneficial for the both of us.
trans-unit.target: 没有，但你看起来不像是会告发我的人。对吧，朋友_如果我们保守这个秘密，对我们双方都有利。

trans-unit.source: I'm just here on weekends. Find me if you need some raw materials._You can always go in and get them yourself, but it can be . . . dangerous in there. Anyways, I'm heading in. See you later.
trans-unit.target: 我只是在周末来这里。如果你需要一些原材料，请找我_你总是可以自己进去拿，但也可以。里面很危险。不管怎样，我要进去了。回头见。

trans-unit.source: 1008 - First time entering hotel
trans-unit.target: 1008-第一次进入酒店

trans-unit.source: Hi, are you new here or do I really need to go out more often?_Oh I see. You are the new chef taking over Le Sequoia! I mistook you for a tourist. My apologies._My name is Nacim by the way. Pleased to meet you.
trans-unit.target: 嗨，你是新来的，还是我真的需要更经常地出去_哦，我知道了。你是接管乐红杉的新厨师！我误以为你是个游客。我道歉_顺便说一句，我叫纳西姆。很高兴认识你。

trans-unit.source: I remember eating at Le Sequoia when I was a little boy. It was one of the best memories of my life. It's a shame that it's been closed for so long._I'm confident I speak for the whole town when I say that we can't wait to see it reopen!
trans-unit.target: 我记得小时候在红杉餐厅吃饭。这是我一生中最美好的回忆之一。很遗憾，它已经关闭了这么久_我有信心，当我说我们迫不及待地想看到它重新开放时，我代表了整个城镇！

trans-unit.source: Chef Casteau has already reserved a room for you to stay in. Room 1B, just up the stairs._Please enjoy your time in White Ash Harbor!
trans-unit.target: Casteau厨师已经为您预订了一个房间。1B房间，就在楼上_请享受您在白灰港的时光！

trans-unit.source: RANDOM LEFTOVER DIALOGUES
trans-unit.target: 随机剩余对话

trans-unit.source: Hey! Hey! Sorry, I'm in a rush!
trans-unit.target: 嘿！嘿！对不起，我赶时间！

trans-unit.source: Excuse me, coming through!
trans-unit.target: 对不起，过来一下！

trans-unit.source: It's a disaster! Why do these things always happen?_Hey, can you step aside? I need to get to the baths!
trans-unit.target: 这是一场灾难！为什么这些事情总是发生_嘿，你能靠边站吗？我需要去洗澡！

trans-unit.source: Ah, yes (playername). Good of you to come. You must be wondering why I requested you._You see, this bathhouse is my pride and joy. Every part of it needs to function perfectly to keep my guests happy. But lately, things are not going so well.
trans-unit.target: 啊，是的(playername)。很高兴你能来。你一定想知道我为什么要求你_你看，这个澡堂是我的骄傲和快乐。它的每一部分都需要完美运作，才能让我的客人满意。但最近，事情进展得不太顺利。

trans-unit.source: The chef of my Teahouse crumpled under the pressure. He has since decided he would rather work in a relaxed, third tier restaurant in the city._Now, I am without a chef to run the Teahouse.
trans-unit.target: 我茶馆的厨师在压力下瘫倒了。从那以后，他决定宁愿在城里一家轻松的三线餐厅工作_现在，我没有厨师来经营茶馆。

trans-unit.source: Your restaurant seems to show some promise. And since Monsieur Casteau has personally vouched for you, I believe you have some potential.
trans-unit.target: 你的餐厅似乎显示出一些前景。既然Casteau先生亲自为你担保，我相信你有一些潜力。

trans-unit.source: However before I give you this great honor, you must prove yourself worthy._Please come back to me you have pushed Le Sequoia to greater heights, so I know you possess the skills to run my Teahouse.
trans-unit.target: 然而，在我授予你这一殊荣之前，你必须证明自己是值得的_请回到我身边，你把乐红杉推到了更高的高度，所以我知道你有能力经营我的茶馆。

trans-unit.source: Yes . . . I see you have proved yourself._A promise is a promise. Here are the keys to the Teahouse. Please be careful to not tarnish the good name of my bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 是的。我看你已经证明了自己_承诺就是承诺。这是茶馆的钥匙。请小心，不要玷污我澡堂的好名声。

trans-unit.source: You must be meticulous and thorough in every pursuit. Do not fail me, or else you will live to regret it.
trans-unit.target: 每一次追求都必须一丝不苟。别让我失望，否则你会后悔的。

trans-unit.source: Hey! What are you doing on my grounds kid? . . . Oh, you are the new chef. Grownups these days look younger and younger.
trans-unit.target: 嘿！孩子，你在我的地盘上干什么。哦，你是新来的厨师。如今的成年人看起来越来越年轻。

trans-unit.source: I'm Pomarine, the legendary hunter of White Ash Harbor. Are you surprised? Well, looks can be deceiving kid._On the topic of hunting, have you tried hunting wild game before? There is plenty of wildlife out there.
trans-unit.target: 我是白灰港的传奇猎人波马林。你感到惊讶吗？好吧，外表可能会欺骗孩子_关于狩猎，你以前试过狩猎野生动物吗？那里有很多野生动物。

trans-unit.source: I gather and hunt my own ingredients, and you should too._Those store vendors will always tell you how their goods are the freshest, but nothing beats ingredients gathered directly from nature.
trans-unit.target: 我自己收集和寻找食材，你也应该这样做_那些商店小贩总是告诉你他们的商品是最新鲜的，但没有什么比直接从大自然中收集的食材更好的了。

trans-unit.source: Take this scythe and bow, and try it out yourself._Roaming the wild is exhilarating. Just don't go too far into the woods, not until you have some experience!_Come back to me if you need more tools.
trans-unit.target: 拿着这把镰刀和弓，自己试试_在野外漫游是令人兴奋的。只是不要深入树林太远，除非你有一些经验_如果你需要更多的工具，请回来找我。

trans-unit.source: . . . Oh! You're saying hi to me. Hello there, I'm Bowie, the greatest old man of White Ash Harbor. A title I gave myself because I earned it! Ha!
trans-unit.target: . . . 哦！你在跟我打招呼。你好，我是鲍伊，白灰港最伟大的老人。我给自己一个头衔，因为这是我应得的！哈！

trans-unit.source: I've also given myself the title of Fish King, since I sell the best fish in town! We get top quality product, freshly caught every morning!
trans-unit.target: 我也给自己起了鱼王的称号，因为我卖镇上最好的鱼！我们每天早上都会新鲜捕捞到最优质的产品！

trans-unit.source: Oh? You are the new chef of Le Sequoia? Well ain't that somethin? Here, have some shrimp on the house. We usually end up with too much shrimp anyways.
trans-unit.target: 哦？你是乐红杉的新厨师？这难道不重要吗？来，家里有一些虾。不管怎样，我们通常都会吃太多虾。

trans-unit.source: No no, please take them! . . . What? You don't know what to do with them?_Well let me see . . . ah! Here's a great shrimp recipe that the trendy folk love to eat. Best of luck kid and hope to see you around!
trans-unit.target: 不，不，请收下。什么？你不知道该怎么办_让我想想。啊！这是一个很好的虾食谱，时髦的人喜欢吃。祝你好运，孩子，希望在附近见到你！

trans-unit.source: Also, there is a home in town that is available for purchase if you want a more permanent place to stay. It's just behind Circuit Lodge.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果你想有一个更永久的住处，城里有一套房子可以购买。就在Circuit Lodge后面。

trans-unit.source: Ah, I'm very excited for you that you have a permanent home in town.
trans-unit.target: 啊，你在城里有一个永久的家，我为你感到非常兴奋。

trans-unit.source: It belonged to an old fisherman. After he got old, he decided to move back in with his children in the city.
trans-unit.target: 它属于一位老渔夫。等他老了，他决定搬回城里和孩子们住在一起。

trans-unit.source: We have a couple pieces of furniture that you can take with you. If it sits here any long, I'd have to throw it away.
trans-unit.target: 我们有几件家具，你可以随身携带。如果它在这里呆太久，我就得把它扔掉。

trans-unit.source: Fantastic! I'll get to work. It's very exciting to see Le Sequoia growing like this. It really brings hope to our community here.
trans-unit.target: 好极了！我要开始工作了。看到红杉如此成长，真是令人兴奋。这真的给我们的社区带来了希望。

trans-unit.source: We have some nice furniture pieces lying around from the Mayor's party last week. Take them. Just don't let him know it was me!
trans-unit.target: 上周市长的聚会上，我们发现了一些漂亮的家具。把他们带走。别让他知道是我！

trans-unit.source: Oh! . . . One more thing! Aylin, the bathhouse owner, has requested to meet with you._I'm not sure what she wants, but she rarely speaks to the rest of the townsfolk, so it must be important.
trans-unit.target: 哦。还有一件事！澡堂老板Aylin要求见你_我不知道她想要什么，但她很少和镇上的其他人说话，所以这一定很重要。
